column2: Yeesu Kristu ɗɛntɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ zaŋgya̧ dɔgl gɛrɛ. Yeesu Kristu zaŋgɔ fu̧u̧ a Dawda dɔ̧ɔ̧t du. Dawda be zaŋgɔ fu̧u̧ a Abraham ge.
Abraham mɔɔ Isaaku. Isaaku mɔɔ Yakuba. Yakuba mɔɔ Yahuda hi hindaɔ hiya hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧.
Yahuda mɔɔ Farɛs hi Zaara (naaya̧ gɛ Tamar). Farɛs mɔɔ Hesrun. Hesrun mɔɔ Aram.
Aram mɔɔ Aminadab. Aminadab mɔɔ Naasun. Naasun mɔɔ Salmuna.
Salmuna mɔɔ Bowas (nɔɔtɔ gɛ Rahab). Bowas mɔɔ Obɛd (nɔɔtɔ gɛ Rud). Obɛd mɔɔ Yɛsa.
Yɛsa mɔɔ waar gbɔɔl bɔ Dawda.
Dawda mɔɔ Sulemaanu (nɔɔtɔ gɛ Uriya nistɔ).
Sulemaanu mɔɔ Robowam. Robowam mɔɔ Abiya. Abiya mɔɔ Asa.
Asa mɔɔ Yusufat. Yusufat mɔɔ Zoram. Zoram mɔɔ Uziya.
Uziya mɔɔ Zotama. Zotama mɔɔ Akas. Akas mɔɔ Hezekiya.
Hezekiya mɔɔ Manase. Manase mɔɔ Amɔŋ. Amɔŋ mɔɔ Zoziyas.
Zoziyas mɔɔ Zekuniya hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ a wɛlyɔ hi tuus Israhilaya wɔ a hi hɛbt du hi ka̧hi a Baabila gedu.
Yɔ hi kam Israhilaya wɔ a Baabila, Zekuniya mɔɔ Salatiyɛl. Salatiyɛl mɔɔ Zorobabɛl.
Zorobabɛl mɔɔ Abihuda. Abihuda mɔɔ Elyakim. Elyakim mɔɔ Azora.
Azora mɔɔ Zadoka. Zadoka mɔɔ Akim. Akim mɔɔ Elyuda.
Elyuda mɔɔ Eliyazar. Eliyazar mɔɔ Matan. Matan mɔɔ Yakuba.
Yakuba mɔɔ Mariyama waltɔ Yusufu. Mariyama gii mɔɔ Yeesu yɔ nuŋgɔ a Masihu, raakɔ a Za̧a̧nyɔ Bɛt yaazige.

Zaŋgɔ baar a Abraham ge gi tuur a Dawda ge, baa zaŋg koobl daa nasɔ. Yɔ baar a Dawda ge gi tuur a wɛl yɔ hi tuus Israhilaya wɔ a hi hɛbt du hi ka̧hi a Baabila gedu baa zaŋg koobl daa nas be, yɔ baar a Israhilaya wɔ kaŋkya̧ bɔ Baabila gedu gi tuur a Yeesu Masihu zaŋgɔ bɔ gedu gi zaŋg koobl daa nas be.
Yeesu Kristu mɔɔkɔ bɔ tuur anyɔ lɛ: yɔ nɔɔtɔ Mari-yama gi Yusufu gbaagɔ, hi ɔksir nɛ gɛ, zɛm Mariyama buud ma hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ tɛŋkɔ.
Yɔ gbaagɔ Yusufu gi ɗɔbsig Bɛt hi rɔb be, wɛɛ gi hā̧ā̧ge an gi ha̧a̧n Mariyama seem a dood lɔlgbar gɛ, mɔk an gi hɛɛtin hi gii bɔ doo gi mɛɛ.
Anyɔ gi mɔkig hin anbɔ, Waar Bɛtwalsɛr za zaa ge a yorum du
a mɔɔ Yusufu Dawda waawalɔ, bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ Mariyama look an nis mɔ. Bud waa bɔ hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ tɛŋk ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Gi mɔɔ waawalɔ mɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ a Yeesu gii gi za̧a̧s doodɔ a hinha̧a̧lya̧ wɔ gedu.
Hin wɔrɔ sɛw hi tuur an hinyɔ Waar Bɛt dɔg a ya̧a̧kɛŋkɔya bɔ gi ya̧a̧ du gi
a yɛrɛ nis bɔ mɛɛ walya̧a̧ gɛ gi budɔ, gi mɔɔ waawalɔ hi dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ a Emanuyɛl, hinɔ raakɔ a Bɛt gi hi wɛya.
Yusufu yɔ rɛmɔ woo anyɔ Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ
Yɔ anbɔ nis bɔ mɔɔ waa bɔ kete, ɓɔr hi ɔɔ ɔksig lɛlgbunu. Yusufu wɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧s waa bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yeesu.
Yɔ Yeesu mɔɔy a Baytilaama a Yahuduya hɛbt du a wɛl yɔ Hirudus gi waar gedu, hinmɛɛkya dubtɛ hi fu̧u̧z a ɔ̧tkazigi hi zaa a Urusalima hi warɔ
a Yahuduya waar bɔ mɔɔy ay nɔ?
Wi gbɛn sɛwalɔ mid a ɔ̧tkazigi, hinɔ giya wi zaa an wi ɗɔbsige.
Yɔ waar gbɔɔl bɔ Hirudus lag anbɔ kpoosɔ naamɔ hi dood Urusalimaya wɔ sɛw.
Hirudus mɔks Bɛtmaak-wookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ sɛw warihi lɛlyɔ Masihu bɔ gɔ gi mɔɔy du.
Hi raasige
a gi an gi mɔɔy a Baytilaama a Yahuduya hɛbt du. Yɔ anbɔ hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkya bɔ bi̧i̧ amntɔnɔ gɛrɛ:
a Bɛt raa a yɛrɛ mɔɔ Baytilaama a Yahuduya hɛbt du, mɔ kōd mɔ dāār Yahuduya waal gbɔlɛ wɔ sɛw gɛ, anyɔ waar gbɔɔl gɔ gi fu̧u̧ a mɔɔge, an gi oo dood be Israhilaya wɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Hirudus el hinmɛɛkya dubtɛ wɔ luurlɛlɛ warihi ɔ̧tyɔ sɛwal bɔrɔ mid du rɔbtɔnɔ. Yɔ hi raasig ɔ̧tɔ,
wɛɛ yaahi a Baytilaama
a rekin a Baytilaama nɛ ɓɛɛ waayɛ̧s bɔ rɔbtɔnɔ, gɔ nɛ zɛŋge nɛ kamsib ramsɔ an bee hɛw be rek be ɗɔbsige.

Yɔ hi kɛms waar bɔ dɔglɔ gi da̧a̧ anbɔ hi ɗund hi rekɔ. Yaala sɛwal bɔ hi gbɛnig nɛ a hi hɛbtdu a ɔ̧tkazigi wɛɛ mida. Yɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ daarlɛlɛ. Sɛwal bɔ dosihi muut du, tuur a lɛlyɔ waayɛ̧s bɔ gi ge erɔ.

Hi gul luk bɔ gedu hi zɛm waayɛ̧s bɔ hi nɔɔtɔ Mariyama, hi zagl di hi ɗɔbsige; hi wɛɛ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧r wɔdya̧ hi ha̧s hɛɛlmɔto hi tɛ̧ɛ̧mɛk okt ki̧i̧lhɛmntya, hi tɛ̧ɛ̧mɔt za ki̧i̧lhɛmntya nuŋgɔ a ɗaasɛ-rɛyɔ, hi gaa waayɛ̧s bɔ.
Kuudu yɔ Bɛt wɛɛ gi
Yɔ hinmɛɛkya dubtɛ wɔ hi rekɔ, Waar Bɛtwalsɛrɔ za zaa Yusufu ge a yorum du
a wag kaasi, Hirudus gi ɓɛɛk waa bɔ an gi gbɔŋge. Ɗukum mɔ loo waa bɔ hi nɔɔtɔ mɔ nɔɔnihi mɔ renihi a Misra hɛbt du, mɔ kɔm hɔ gi tuur an gɔ be raamɔ mɔ wɛɛza.
Yusufu ɗundɔ loo waa bɔ hi nɔɔtɔ Mariyama a yɛms du hi retin a Misra.
Hi kɔm hɔ tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ Hirudus wɔr gedu. Hin bɔ lab tuur an hinyɔ Waar Bɛt dɔg a ya̧a̧kɛŋkɔya bɔ gi ya̧a̧ du a be elz waa be tuuz a Misra gi

Yɔ Hirudus gbɛn an hinmɛɛkya wɔ hi maagma, kpoosɔ nɔɔsig ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, yaa layaadɛ hi rek hi gbɔm walɛwaat wɔ hi gin wɛl eerɛ hi wɔ hi tuur wɛl eer gɛ sɛw a Baytilaama hɛbt du sɛw anyɔ lag ɔ̧t yɔ sɛwal bɔ mid du a hinmɛɛkya dubtɛ wɔ hi ya̧a̧ du.
Yɔ anbɔ hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Zeremi da dɔg amntɔnɔ
a hi lag sɛbt boo a Rama hi kaalɛ, hi hekil ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, Rahila gii gi kaak waatɔ wɔrko. Yɔ waatɔ wɔ hi wɔr be, ta̧a̧ an hi rɔɔg ma gɛ.
Yɔ Hirudus bɛɛ wɔrko, Waar Bɛt walsɛr bɔ zaa Yusufu ge a yorum du a Misra,
a ɗundum mɔ loo waa bɔ hi nɔɔtɔ nɛ wɛɛtin a Israhila hɛbt du. Dood wɔ hi ɓɛɛk nɛ waa bɔ an hi gbɔŋge hi wɔɔr ma.
Yusufu ɗundɔ loo waa bɔ hi nɔɔtɔ Mariyama hi wɛɛ a Israhila hɛbt du.

Hɔnɛyɔ Yusufu lag a waar Hirudus waawal Arkelawus gii wɛɛ gi yɛr baatɔ waar umsɔ a Yahuduya, hoobha̧a̧gha̧ rekɔ a Yahuduya hɛbto. Yɔ Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ wɛɛ raasig a yorum du a bɔgi ɗɔɔt hɔ, dɔŋgɔ, da rek a Galile hɛbt du.
Da ɗɔɔt a waal gbɔɔl za bɔ nuŋgɔ a Nazarɛd gedu. Wɛɛ hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkya bɔ dɔg nɛ
a Bɛt raa a hi elig a gi Nazarɛdyayɔ.
A ɔ̧tɔ ge Yohana Doo Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ mid a Yahuduya a hɛtdɔŋ du a lɛl koot ha,
a Bɛt wáátɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ, zɛmrin kpoos nɛ!
Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya boo dɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧n gi raa
a hi kɛm za̧a̧n za gi ya̧a̧ɓoolik a hɛtdɔŋdu, a gɛmntsin Waar bɔ gbɔnɔ, gɛmntsinge gbɔnɔ wɔ hi er bɛttɔnɔ!
Gii Yohana heg gbanyɔ hi gɔn gɛloba bɛntigi hi nahi̧i̧l see du. Gi za̧a̧nik leesɔ dagrɛ hi hɔ̧dkurumi.
Yɔ anbɔ dood Urusali-maya wɔ hi dood Yahuduya wɔ sɛw hi dood waalya zaadɛ wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b a Urdum zɛɛ dɔŋdi sɛw hi zaak a ge.
Yɔ hi walk hinha̧a̧lya̧, Yohana hotinihi Bɛtmɛm gɔ a Urdum zɛɛ du.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yohana gbɛn Farisaya wɔ kittɔnɔ hi zaak a ge hi Sadukiya wɔ kittɔnɔ an hi loo Bɛtmɛmɛ,
a nɛɛ kpolumdɔ̧ɔ̧t wɛ, bɔ goksinɛ a nɛ nɔɔ Bɛt nɔɔtigɔ yɔ gi zaak nɔ?
Yɔ anbɔ woon woos yɔ gɔ gi zuun a nɛ zɛmr kpoos nɛ nɛ ɔɔ woos nɛ amntɛ wɔ.
Bɔnɛ mɔk an nɛ raa zul nɛ a baa wɛ Abraham gii gi baa wɛ. Yɔ anbɔ, be gisin raako a Bɛt ɗɛɛ an gi loo bet wɛrɛ gi gɔns Abraham waato.
Yɛrɛ hi gbaa gaal a tɛ̧ɛ̧yɛ̧ɛ̧s wɔ hi muul da̧a̧da̧ ma an gi dɛ̧ɛ̧tiro; tɛ̧ɛ̧ wɔ hi hum rɔbtɔnɔ gɛ sɛw hi gboblihi hi yaahi laa du.

Bee be gin hotingo Bɛtmɛm hi mɛm tɔs an nɛ zuun a nɛ zɛmr kpoos nɛ, nɛ ɔɔ woos nɛ ha̧a̧l wɔ. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi zaak be kuudu daaribdaarɔ hi tɛŋko, bee be tuur doo rɔb an be pid taalɔ gɛ. Gii gi hotinnɛ Bɛtmɛm hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi laa.
Gin dɛkilɔ naandu an gi fɛ totɔ gi gɛ̧ɛ̧ gaato hi zulɛ. Gi gaas daŋkɔ gi tuu tot bɔ gi tɔ̧ɔ̧ bil du, gi wɛɛ gi kpɔɔ kas wɔ a laa yɔ gɔ niŋ gɛ gedu.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu fu̧u̧z a Galile zaa Yohana ge a Urdum zɛɛ du an gi hotinge Bɛtmɛmɛ. Raa Yohana a hotinbe Bɛtmɛmɛ.
Yohana ha̧a̧g an gi iinɔ, raa Yeesu
a bee ha̧a̧be an mɔɔ mɔ hotinbe Bɛtmɛm be, mɔɔ mɔ wɛɛ mɔ zaak a beege be ya?
Yeesu wɛɛ
a ta̧a̧mɔ an hinɔ gi wooy anbɔ ɓɔryɔ; bɛr an wɛ woo hinyɔ rii a Bɛt muutdu sɛw anbɔ.
Yohana wɛɛ ta̧a̧ ma hotinge Bɛtmɛm bɔ gɔ ma si̧.
Yɔ hi bɛɛ Yeesu Bɛtmɛm bɔ hotingo kaza mɛm bɔ gedu; a ya̧a̧gbun bɔ gedu, bɛtha kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ, wɛɛ gbɛn Bɛt Mɔkilɔ fu̧u̧z bɛtha gi sizig gi muulɛ an gutu buu.
Wɛɛ ya̧a̧ za booyz bɛtha
a Za̧a̧n yɛrɛ gi waa be yɔ ha̧a̧be hi kpoos be sɛw, hat be sɛw gi a ge.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ kam Yeesu a hɛtdɔŋ du an loorɛha̧a̧l gi maatige.
Yɔ lilhin ɔ̧t dumbili nasɔ hi yɛms dumbili nasɔ gi lehin gɛ, kuudu a̧a̧kil ha̧a̧ge.
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ zaa maatig
a mɔd gi Bɛt waayɔ, raam bet wɛrɛ hi wɛɛ koko.
Yeesu ta̧a̧ a
Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa a doo gɔ za̧a̧n kok kpɔd gɛ, gi an gi za̧a̧n dɔgl yɔ Bɛt gɔ dɔg sɛw.
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ wɛɛ kaŋg a Bɛt waal gbɔɔl bɔ Urusalima gedu da kasig a Bɛtluk hɔɔt zulha,
a gid mɔ gi Bɛt waayɔ, gi̧i̧m hɛbt di. Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa a Bɛt gi raas walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ dɔgl mɔ, hí ka̍m a naan du, an bɔmɔ kubr dɔɔ mɔ a bet muulɛ.
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa hɛw a bɔmɔ maat Waar mɔ Bɛto.
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ wɛɛ kaŋge a ga̧a̧t za hɔɔt ha̧a̧l zulha zunsig wáát yɔ waal du sɛw hi gbɔlumsya̧ sɛw
wɛɛ
a an mɔ zagl di mɔ ɗɔbsibe, be gaamɔ hin wɛrɛ sɛw.
Yeesu wɛɛ ninige
a Saydanu, da mɔ rek hɔ! Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa a mɔ ɗɔbs Waar mɔ Bɛto, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ woos gii hin kpɔd.
Yɔ anbɔ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ ɔɔge, Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi zaa hi woosig hinɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu lag a hi yaa Yohana a luknɔ du, gii wɛɛ ɗund rek a Galile.
Ɗɔ̄ɔ̄t a Nazarɛd gɛ, dɔŋg da ɗɔɔt a waal gbɔɔl bɔ Kapɛrnayum yɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b hi Galile mɛmbal bɔ gedu a Zaabulɔŋ hɛbt du hi Nɛbtali hɛbt du,
an hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya dɔg nɛ gi da̧a̧
a Zaabulɔŋ hɛbtɔ, Nɛbtali hɛbtɔ yɔ tuur a mɛmbal bɔ ge hi Urdum kasiŋ zaabɔ ge, a Galile, a dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduyaadɛ gɛ hi waalɛ:
Dood nɛ wɔ hi ɗɔɔtig nɛ a lɛlwil du hi gbɛn lɛlgaal gbɔɔlɛ, wɔ hi ɗɔɔtig nɛ a wɔrk hɛbt du, a zeksɔ gedu, lɛlgaal gaaga hi zulha.
Bɛɛ anbɔ Yeesu yɛɛl Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔkyɔ, raa
a zɛmrin kpoos nɛ, Bɛt wáátɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Anyɔ Yeesu gi fɔk a Galile mɛmbalya̧ gbɛn dutwa̧a̧k-yaadɛ eerɛ, Simɔŋ yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Piyɛr hi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Andrɛ hi gbalik zagr mɛmbal du hi dut wa̧a̧nuko.
a fɔbzinbe an be wɛɛnin dood kamzigyaadɛ a Bɛt wáát du an dut yɔ nɛ wa̧a̧zig be.
Ɓɔrbɔ hi ɔɔ zagrya̧ wɔ hi fɔge.
Yɔ Yeesu rek doosɛ wɛɛ da gbɛn walɛ eerɛ: Zebede waawal Yakuba hi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Yohana a lɛmb du hi baaya̧ Zebede hi gɛmsig zagrya̧, elihi
hi ɔɔ lɛmb bɔ hi baaya̧ Zebede ɓɔrbɔ hi fɔge.
Yeesu gbɛ̧ɛ̧k a Galile hɛbt du sɛw gis dood hingok a hi mɔksilluk wɔ du, gi dɔk Bɛt wáátɔ dɔglɛ, gi za̧a̧sig gumtil wɔ hi gin gums gaŋsɛ gaŋsɛ sɛw.

Nuŋgɔ ɗuk gɔ a Siriya waal du sɛw. Yɔ dood hi lag anbɔ hi kamsig gumtil wɛ hi gin gums zaadɛ wɛ sɔmsɔm, hi dood wɔ hi kɛŋk kosgumnɛ an loorɛha̧a̧lya wɔ hi gin muul du, hi zulnɔɔya wɛ be, hi zaŋdɛ wɛ, gihi za̧a̧sugo.
Dood saal gbɔlɛ hi fu̧u̧zig a Galile, a Waal Gbɔlɛ Kooblɛ, a Urusalima, a Yahuduya hi a da Urdum zɛɛ kasiŋ zaa bɔ ge hi gig fɔko.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn saal wɔ anbɔ kar ga̧a̧t ha, ɗɔɔtɔ, wɛɛ fɔkɔya wɔ hi zaa a ge.
Yeesu barsihi hingok anyɔ lɛ
a hat gi a dood wɔ hi mɛɛ a be gi doo ya̧a̧rya a Bɛt muut du hi. Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt wáátɔ gi ya̧a̧nɛ.
Hat gi a dood wɔ hi gi kaal du hi, yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gi rɔɔhi.
Hat gi a dood zulhɔnikya wɔ hi, yɔ anbɔ hi dag hɛbt bɔ Bɛt raa a gi gaahi.
Hat gi a dood wɔ hi kɛŋk waabil riit a̧a̧kil hi, gi wɛɛ gi gihi ha̧a̧sig an mɛmɛ, yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gi gaahi hinɔ buuya̧ gi hi̧i̧.
Hat gi a dood wɔ hi gis dood zaadɛ ya̧a̧rmɛɛk hi, yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gi mɛɛsihi ya̧a̧r be.
Hat gi a dood kpoosgaatya wɔ hi, yɔ anbɔ hi gbɛn Bɛto.
Hat gi a dood wɔ hi gaak dood boolum hi, yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gi elihi a waat beenɛ.
Hat gi a dood wɔ gɔ hi zɛksihi hi, a hinriit yɔ hi wook gi dɔŋgo. Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt wáátɔ gi ya̧a̧nɛ.
Dood hi niinɛ hi zɛksinɛ, hi wɛɛ hi ralsin ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l yɔ gi sɛw a be dɔŋgo, yɔ anbɔ hat gi a nɛɛge.
Dagin hato, kpoos nɛ kpɛ̧ɛ̧ge, yɔ anbɔ dɔɔrɔɔs za gbɔɔl gin ook a bɛtha. Hi da hi gɔs nɛ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi dosin anbɔ be.
Nɛɛ fɔkbeya wɛ, nɛɛ gi manda a waal du. Yɛrɛ à manda gbɛɛr gɛ, yɔ hi wɛɛnig gbɛrtilɔ ri nɔ? Wōō hinza ma gɛ, gi an hi bisig lakdi dood hi ɗa̧a̧kig dɔɔ du, daarɔ.
Nɛɛ gi lɛlgaal a waal du. Waal gbɔɔl yɔ gi a ga̧a̧t ha ɗɛɛ an gi yaat gɛ.
Gbunɔ, gɔ hí kpōō pitila hi mibt a dɔn du gɛ, gɔ hi wiig a wiikɔ bɔ gedu an gi gaas dood wɔ hi gi luk bɔ gedu sɛw.
Lɛlgaal nɛ gaag a dood muutdu sɛw anbɔ an hi gbɛn hinrɔb yɔ nɛ wooko hi ɗɔbs Baa nɛ yɔ gi a bɛtha.
Bɔnɛ mɔk a be zaa hɛbtdi an be pid Muusa maakdɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, zaabe Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hingokya̧ wɔ. Bé zāā an be pidihi gɛ. Be zaa an be woo dɔglya̧ be da̧a̧sɔ.

Be gisin raak rɔbo, hi taa ha̧sig Bɛt maakdɔgl bɔ dɔglɔ za bi̧i̧sɔ za fɛŋ, zaabe, hinɔ fɛŋwaat wɔ zulha zaa gbunu, gi tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ hinwɔ sɛw gɔ hi wooy hi da̧a̧ gedu, wɛɛ bɛtha hi hɛbtdi hi da̧a̧ gedu sɛw.

Yɔ anbɔ za̧a̧nyɔ ɓɛd maakdɔgl wɔ wansɔ zaa gbun hɛw gi wɛɛ gi goks dood an hi woo anbɔ be, hi elig a gi wans mɔɔti a Bɛt wáát du. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ fɔ maakdɔgl wɔ gi wɛɛ gi goks dood zaadɛ an hi woo anbɔ be, hi elig a gi gbɔɔl mɔɔti a Bɛt wáát du.
Be gisin raako, gid nɛ́ wōō hinriit nɛ daar Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi Farisaya wɔ gɛ, nɛ taa gulk a Bɛt wáát du nɛ zaŋ.
Nɛ da nɛ lag a hi dɔks ɗɛntɛ nɛ wɔ doosɛ a bɔmɔ gbɔm zulɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ gbɔm zulɛ hi gbaasig dɔglɛ.

Yɛrɛ bee be gisin raako a za̧a̧nyɔ gin nɔɔtig a naaza zulha, woo hinha̧a̧l yɔ rii dɔgl-gbaaki. Za̧a̧nyɔ nii naaza a zul mɔ taaro! Woo hinha̧a̧l za yɔ rii an hi wa̧a̧ge hi kaŋg a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi muutdu hi gbaasig dɔglɛ; za̧a̧nyɔ nii naaza a yoo ha̧a̧lɛ! Woo hinha̧a̧l za gbɔɔl yɔ rii an hi wa̧a̧g hi yaag a laazɛŋk du.
Yɔ anbɔ, mɔ́ zaa mɔ́ gaak Bɛt gaas a Bɛtmaaksɛŋko, mɔ́ mɔk mɔ́ mɛɛ a namɔza gig nɔɔk mɔ zulha,
ɔɔm gaas mɔ bɔ a Bɛtmaak sɛŋk bɔ dɔŋgɔdi, mɔ rek mɔ bool hi gii kete, ɓɔr mɔ ɔɔ zaak Bɛtgaas bɔ gaako.

Za̧a̧n za gi gɛ̧ɛ̧num hinɛ nɛ gi rek lɛlgbun a dɔgl-gbaak luk du, boolum nɔɔktɔnɔ hi giya a gbɔnɔdi an bɔgi gaamɔ a dɔgl-gbaakya bɔ gi naan du gi wa̧a̧mɔ gi wɛɛ gi gaamɔ laaya naan du gi re gi yaam a luknɔ du.
Be gisum raak rɔbo, yɔ anbɔ mɔ́ tòò tus yɔ gim fɔk sɛw kete, ɓɔr mɔ ɔɔ tuuk a luknɔ bɔ gedu.
Nɛ da nɛ lag a hi
Yɛrɛ bee be gin raako a za̧a̧nyɔ see naaza nis gi wɛɛ gi ɗɔkinge, gɔ mans hi gii a gi kpoos du da̧a̧da̧ ma bɔ.
Yɛrɛ yɔ̧l mɔ bɔ naanrɔb gi matum a hinha̧a̧l du, wigumɔge mɔ bisige, daar an mɔ waks hinza a mɔ muul gbunu yɔ riisumɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ mɔ ɔɔ muul mɔ sɛw gi yaay a laazɛŋk du.
Naanrɔb mɔ gi yaam a hinha̧a̧l du, dɛ̧ɛ̧mɔge mɔ bisige, daar an mɔ waks hinza a mɔ muul gbunu, yɔ riisumɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ mɔ ɔɔ muul mɔ hi bisum a laazɛŋk du sɛw.
Hi dɔg nɛ hɛw a za̧a̧nyɔ gi hɛɛtingo hi nistɔ gi gaag ɗɛɛrwol hɛɛtinsya gaatyɔ.
Yɛrɛ bee be gisin raako a za̧a̧nyɔ nin nistɔ hinɔ gi taa an doo za kɛsig gɛ, wɛɛnig mansyayɔ. Za̧a̧nyɔ loo nis yɔ hi bisig be, gɔ mansyɔ.
Nɛ da nɛ lag nɛ a hi dɔks nɛ ɗɛntɛ wɛ hii doosɛ a bɔmɔ dɛŋglhin hi ya̧a̧faanɛ, mɔ woo hinyɔ mɔ dɛŋgl rɔb a Waar Bɛt muut du gaattɔnɔ giya.
Yɛrɛ bee be gin raako a bɔnɛ dɛŋgl nɛ hin zaŋ. Bɔnɛ dɛŋglhin hi fɛɛtiha nuŋgɔ, yɔ anbɔ gi Bɛt waar umsɔ ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ.
Bɔnɛ dɛŋglhin hi hɛbt nuŋgɔ, anyɔ gi Bɛt dɔɔɔ ɗa̧a̧tillɛlɛ; bɔnɛ dɛŋglhin hi Urusalima nuŋgɔ, anyɔ gi Waar gbɔɔl bɔ waal gbɔɔl ɔ̧nɛ;
bɔmɔ dɛŋglin zul mɔ hin hɛw anyɔ mɔ ɗɛɛ susug mɔ zaa gbun sɔɔs wɛɛnik gɛ, zaabe an mɔ wisig gɛ.
Ta̧a̧n kpɔd a hɔɔ, zaabe a ɛ̧-ɛ̧; hinyɔ daar hin yɛrɛ ma gi fu̧u̧zig a loorɛha̧a̧l mɔkil du.
Nɛ lag hi dɔg nɛko a lɔlɛ hi lɔlɛ, nuŋgo hi nuŋgo.
Yɛrɛ bee be gin raako a bɔnɛ ɓaas zul nɛ a doo ha̧a̧l gbaŋgi. Za̧a̧nyɔ dɛ̧mɔ hi naanɔ rɔb kuu a wɛkt naanrɔbo, wɛɛm mɔ zɛmrsig bɔ naanyɛ̧l hɛw.
Za̧a̧nza gi tɛb an gi ka̧mɔ a dɔgl-gbaak luk du gi loo hinhek mɔ, ɔɔmɔg gi loo gban mɔ gbɔɔl bɔ hɛw.
Za̧a̧nyɔ fɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ an mɔ pɛɛsig wɔdɔ mɔ kamsig kilomɛɛtre gbunu, mɔɔ wɛɛm mɔ kamsig kilo-mɛɛtre eerɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ zɔ̧m hinɛ, gaamɔge, za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g an gi loo wɔd mɔ belko, bɔmɔ ansige.
Nɛ lag hi raako a yɛgi ha̧a̧mɔ a namɔza muulɛ, wɛɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧num za̧a̧nyɔ gim lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nik be.
Yɛrɛ bee be raanɛ a yɛgi ha̧a̧nɛ a zɛnɛ wɔ hi gin lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nik hi muulɛ, wɛɛn nɛ zɔ̧bs wɔ hi gin gɔluko hi wɛɛ hi gin ya̧a̧kɛtingo Bɛto,
an nɛ wɛɛs Baa nɛ yɔ gi a bɛtha wāātɔ. Yɔ anbɔ gi haasig ɔ̧t a dood ha̧a̧l wɔ hi rɔbɛ wɔ hi zulha hɛw; gi naŋsig bɛl a dood riitɛ wɔ hi ha̧a̧lwookya wɔ hi zulha.
À ha̧a̧nɛ a dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi nɛ muul hi muul be, à lab ma nɛ ook nɔ dɔɔrɔɔsɔ a Bɛt ge ɓɛ? Tooszekya wɔ hi taa wook an gbun bɔ hɛw ya?
Àn nɛ book yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ nɛ hii kpɔd, gi an nɛ wook nɔ hinɔ gɛrsyaɔ nɔ? Dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi taa wook an gbun bɔ hɛw ya?
Wɛɛn dood rɔbɛ tib an Baa nɛ Bɛt yɔ gi a bɛtha gi doo rɔb tib be.
Oon zul nɛ an bɔnɛ woo Bɛtmaakfɔk nɛ a dood muutdu an hi mɛksinɛ. Nɛ́ wook anbɔ nɛ taa dɔɔrɔɔs nɛ dak a Baa nɛ yɔ gi a bɛtha gi naan du.
Gɔ mɔ gaak ya̧a̧rya wɔ gaasɛ, bɔmɔ ɓoolya̧a̧ an dood mɛlya wɔ gɔ hi wook a mɔksilluk wɔ hi du, hi gbɔnɔ wɔ hi du an dood hi baanihi. Be gisin dɔk rɔbo: dood wɔrɔ lab hi dag dɔɔrɔɔsya̧ dag ma.
Yɛrɛ mɔɔ gɔ mɔ gi gaas gaako, bɔ naanyɛ̧l mɔ gi mɛɛ hinyɔ naanrɔb mɔ gi gɔko,
an gaas mɔ bɔ gi kɔm a yaatil du, an Baa mɔ yɔ gi gbɛnik hinyɔ gɔ hi wook a yaatil du gi gaam dɔɔrɔɔs mɔ.

Gɔ nɛ gi Bɛt zɔ̧ko, bɔnɛ riitin an dood mɛlya wɔ. Yɔ anbɔ, ha̧a̧hi erkig a mɔksilluk wɔ hi du, hi a gbɔnɔ hɛksum wɔ hi du an hi zɔ̧b Bɛto dood sɛw hi gbɛnihi hi mɛksihi. Be gisin raak rɔbo: dood wɔrɔ sɛw hi dag dɔɔ-rɔɔsya̧ dag ma.
Yɛrɛ mɔya, gɔ mɔ zɔ̧k Bɛto, gulum mɔ luk du mɔ kpɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɔnɔ, mɔ zɔ̧b Baa mɔ Bɛt yɔ gi a yaatil du, wɛɛ Baa mɔ yɔ gi gbɛnik hinyɔ gɔ hi wook a yaatil du gi gaam dɔɔrɔɔs mɔ.
Gɔ nɛ gi zɔ̧ko bɔnɛ dɔg dɔgl kittɔnɔ tɔstɔs anyɔ dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ gɔ hi gɔko. Yɔ anbɔ hi mɔk a Bɛt gi kɛmsib a dɔgl be kit wɔ hi dɔŋgo.
Bɔnɛ riitin an hiya; Baa nɛ yɔ gi a bɛtha mɛ̍ɛ̍dir nɛ hinyɔ ha̧a̧n gaatyɔ.
Zɔ̧k yɔ gɔ nɛ zɔ̧bɔ gi anyɔ lɛ: Baa wi yɔ gi a bɛtha, an nuŋg mɔ gi ɗɔbɔ,
an waar ums mɔ gi zaa, an ha̧a̧tig mɔ gi wooy hɛbt di an bɛtha.
Gaawi lees yɔ gɔ gi riiwi nɛɛko.
Bitsiwi hinha̧a̧l wi, an wii yɔ wi bitsig dood zaadɛ hi gɔsiw be.
Bɔmɔ ka̧wi a maatil du, za̧a̧siwi a loorɛha̧a̧l tɛŋk du. [Waar umsɛ, tɛŋko, hi gbɔlumsɛ hi gi mɔɔ faa. Aanbɔ! ]
Yɔ anbɔ gid nɛ bits dood zaadɛ hinha̧a̧lya̧ wɔ hi gɔsinɛ, Baa nɛ yɔ bɛtha gi bitsin hinha̧a̧l nɛ be.
Nɛ́ bı̄tsihi hinha̧a̧lya̧ wɔ gɛ, Baa nɛ yɔ bɛtha taasin hinha̧a̧l nɛ wɔ bisig be.
Gɔ nɛ gi hinlilko, bɔnɛ mim an dood ha̧a̧l mɛlya wɔ gɔ hi zɛmr muutya̧ an dood sɛw gɔ hi gbɛnihi, hi mɛɛ a hi hinlilko. Be raasin rɔbo: dood wɔrɔ lab hi dag dɔɔrɔɔsya̧ dag ma.
Yɛrɛ mɔɔ gɔ mɔ hinlilko, huum kurum mɔ zulha, urum muut mɔ,
an bɔ dood hi mɛɛ a mɔ lilk hinɛ, gɛ Baa mɔ yɔ gi a yaatillɛl du hɔdi gɔ gi mɛɛ kpɔd; wɛɛ Baa mɔ yɔ gi gbɛnik hin yɔ gɔ hi wook a yaatillɛl du gi gaamɔ dɔɔrɔɔs mɔ.
Bɔnɛ mɔkts zul nɛ rɔɔs a waal du, a lɛlyɔ hin gɔ kug gedu, wɛɛ ga̧a̧r gɔ hi ha̧tir gedu, wɛɛ a lɛlyɔ luurɛ gɔ hi ɓɛlk luk ge hi tɛŋko an hi loo wɔd luurɛ.
Mɔktsin zul nɛ rɔɔs a bɛtha a lɛlyɔ hin gɔ kɔɔ du gɛ, wɛɛ ga̧a̧r gɔ hi ha̧tir hin du gɛ, a lɛlyɔ luurɛ gɔ hi gun tɛŋk an hi loo hin luur du gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ lɛlyɔ rɔɔs mɔ gi ge, kpoos mɔ gi lɛlɔge be.
Yɔ̧l gi muul pitilayɔ, yɔ̧l mɔ gi gi gaak rɔbtɔnɔ, muul mɔ sɛw gi gaak rɔbtɔnɔ be.
Wɛɛ yɔ̧l mɔ gi gaa gɛ, muul mɔ sɛw gis lɛlwilɔ. Lɛlgaal yɔ mɔ muul gigi lɛlwilɔ, lɛlwil bɔ wilkɔ gi ri!

Doo za ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi woos baa eer woos gɛ; yɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧n zaa gbun lɔlɛ, yɔ wɛɛ yɔ ha̧a̧g a zaa bɔ gi muulɛ; zaabe, yɔ ɗɔbs zaa gbunu, wɛɛ yɔ bɔ̧ɔ̧ zaa gbunu. Nɛ́ ɗɛɛ an nɛ woos Bɛt woosɔ hi tus woosɔ eer sɛw ya̧a̧gbun du gɛ.

Hinɔ gii be gisin raako a bɔnɛ zɛks zul nɛ a kol nɛ dɔŋgo nɛ ɛrɔ a be zɛm leesɔ ay be le an be za̧a̧n nɔ? Be zɛm hinyɔ̧k ay be yɔ̧ nɔ? Gbunɔ, bɔnɛ zɛks zul nɛ nɛ ɛrɔ a be zɛm gbandil ay be heg muul nɔ? Kol taa hinɗɔbt dāār lees gɛ ya? Muul taa hinɗɔbt dāār gbandil gɛ ya?
Seen nɔɔs wɔ bɛtha hi balhin gɛ, hi ɓɛr gɛ, hi tɔ̧ɔ̧ hinza bil du gɛ. Yɛrɛ Baa nɛ yɔ bɛtha gihi leniko. Nɛ́ wɛ̄ɛ̄ gbɔɔl nɛ daarihi gɛ ya?
A nɛ teesdu bɔ ɗɛɛ hi zulɔ zɛksigɔ an gi zibts kolɔ yɛms kaasi nɔ?
Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ zɛksig zul nɛ nɔ hi gbandil dɔglɛ? Seen tulkɔ̧ɔ̧r wɔ hɛt du tɔɔkya̧ ma mi! Hi taa hinza wooko wɛɛ hi taa hinza tɛɛko, hi wɛɛ hi gi hinbɛt be!
Yɛrɛ be raasinɛ, Sulemaanu hi zulɔ hi gbɔlumsɔ sɛw, dāg gbandil bɛtigya an wɔrɔ zaaya̧ gɛ.
Nɛ Bɛt gi heksig hɛt wɔ hi za̧a̧k nɛɛko hi yɔ gɔ hi kpɔɔhi yoosig a laa du gbandil bɛti, yɔ heks nɛɛ gbandil yɔ daarlɛl gɛ ya? Nɛɛ dood ɗɔbsil fɛŋya wɛ!
Yɔ anbɔ bɔnɛ zɛks zul nɛ nɛ raa a be le nɔ? Zaa lab gɛ, be yɔ̧ nɔ? Be heg nɔ?
Yɛrɛ hin wɔrɔ lab sɛw, dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi gi hinya̧ hii tɛko. Baa nɛ yɔ gi a bɛtha mɛɛmɛ a hin wɔrɔ ha̧a̧n sɛw.
Yɛɛlin nɛ woos Bɛt wáátɔ hinɛ hi hinyɔ ha̧a̧g kete, kuudu Bɛt gi wɛɛ gi goktsin hin wɛrɛ ha sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ bɔnɛ zɛks zul nɛ hi hinyɔ gɔ gi tuur yoosugo. Yoosig bɔ hinɔ gi zɛks zul ɔ̧ɔ̧n be. Ya̧a̧rhant yɔ gi zaak ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw, rii ɔ̧t ɔ̧nɛ gbunu.
Bɔnɛ gbaas doo dɔgl an bɔ Bɛt gi gbaas nɛɛ dɔgl be.
Bɛt gi gbaas nɛɛ dɔgl anyɔ nɛ gis dood gbaak be. Bɛt gi goosin hin hi goonis yɔ nɛ gis dood hin goonik be.
Nɔ mɔ seek betwaa yɔ gi a namɔza yɔ̧l du mɔ gbɛ̄n ga̧a̧t yɔ gi a mɔ yɔ̧l du gɛ?
Mɔɔ yɔ mɔ gin ga̧a̧t yɔ̧l du, gi an mɔ raa namɔza ri a ɔbe ha̧tsum betwaa mɔ yɔ̧l du, nɔ?
Mɛlya ha̧a̧lɛ! Ha̧sum ga̧a̧t bɔ gi mɔ yɔ̧l du kete, ɓɔr yɔ̧l mɔ gi ɔɔ gaak rɔbtɔnɔ an mɔ ha̧ts namɔza betwaa ɔnɛ bɔ gi yɔ̧l du.
Bɔnɛ gaa kaa wɔ hin gaatyɔ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge an bɔhi zɛmrzɔ hi lɔmtinɛ. Bɔnɛ bits hab wɔ root nɛ rɔbɛ wɔ, an bɔhi ɗa̧a̧k dɔɔ du tɔs.
Ɛrinɛ hi gaanɛ, tɛnɛ nɛ zɛmɔ, ɓàànɛ hi gborsinɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ zɔ̧bɔ gi dagɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ tɛbɔ gi zɛmɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ ɓaa luk gbɔnɔ hi kpɛ̧rsige.
Bɔ za̧a̧nɔ a nɛ teesdu waaɔ gi ɛrig koko gi gaag bet nɔ?
Gi ɛrig dutu, gi gaag beks nɔ?
Nɛɛ yɔ nɛ gi ha̧a̧lɛ nɛ́ mɛɛ waat nɛ hii hinrɔb gaako, gi gis Baa nɛ yɔ bɛtha gii gi ɔs dood wɔ hi ɛrig hinrɔb gaak ya?
Yɔ anbɔ hinyɔ ha̧a̧nɛ an dood hi woosin sɛw, nɛɛ be woosinɛhi anbɔ be; Bɛtmaakdɔglɔ hi hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi dɔg nɛ giibɔ.
Guzin a gbɔnɔ ɓɔ̧ɔ̧yyik bɔ gedu! Gbɔnɔ za fɛɛt giro, hi gbɔnɔ zayɔ bɛr daaki, gii gi kaŋk laa du, wɛɛ dood kittɔnɔ hi fɔk gedu.
Yɛrɛ gbɔnɔ yɔ gi kaŋk a za̧a̧tig du daakɔ ɓaaɓa, wɛɛ daaklɛl bɔ ɓɔ̧ɔ̧yyɔ. Wɔ hi gi fɔk gedu hi kit gɛ.
Oon zul nɛ hi Bɛt-ya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya wɔ hi zaak a nɛɛge hi wɛɛnik muulya̧ an tamɔ. Wɛɛ a hi kpoos du be hi gi ler-gumyɔ.
Nɛ́ mɛɛhi a hi woos du. Nɛ̍ mɛɛ be a gɔ hí ha̧b inaboohi a tɛ̧ɛ̧-kobsya muul gɛ. Wɛɛ gɔ hí ha̧b yɔmntnɔɔ huml a gaŋzaŋ muul gɛ.
Tɛ̧ɛ̧ rɔb sɛw gɔ hum huml rɔbo, tɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧a̧l be gɔ hum huml ha̧a̧l be.
Tɛ̧ɛ̧ rɔb dɛɛ̄ an gi hum huml ha̧a̧l gɛ, wɛɛ tɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧a̧l be ɗɛɛ an gi hum huml rɔb gɛ be.
Tɛ̧ɛ̧ yɔ gi sɛw gí hum huml rɔb gɛ hi gboge hi yaag laa du.
Yɔ anbɔ, nɛ mɛɛnihi woosya̧ bɔ giya.
Dood wɔ gɔ hi elib a Waar i, Waar i, hii taa gulik hi sɛw a Bɛt wáát du. Gɛ dood wɔ gɔ hi woo hinyɔ Baa be bɛtha ha̧a̧ge.

A dɔgl gbaak ɔ̧ti dood kittɔnɔ hi raabe a Waar i, Waar i, nɛ wi kɛm dɔgl a mɔ ya̧a̧ du wi dɔg a mɔ nuŋg du mi? Nɛ wi nin loorɛha̧a̧l a mɔ nuŋg du mi? Nɛ wi woo gɛrs kittɔnɔ a mɔ nuŋg du mi? Ri mɔ giw ɔɔk kaŋkɔ a Bɛt wáát du nɔ?
Bee be wɛɛ be
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧n yɔ gi lak dɔgl yɛrɛ be dɔko, gi wɛɛ gi woo hinɔ, riitin an doo yɔ mɛɛhin gi zul du gi wɔm lukɔ a hɛɛlkpar ha.
Bɛl naŋgɔ, mɛm tuu zɛɛ du, zɛk ha̧a̧l fɛb a luk bɔ muulɔ ge hi tɛŋko, anyɔ hi wɔŋg a hɛɛlkpar ha be, ɛ̧b gɛ.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ lag dɔgl wɛrɛ be dɔko gi wɛɛ gi wōō hinɔ gɛ, riitin an za̧a̧nyɔ taan zul gɛ gi wɔm lukɔ a hɔ̧ɔ̧l ha.
Bɛl naŋgɔ, mɛm tuu zɛɛ du, zɛk ha̧a̧l fɛb a luk bɔ muulɔ ge, luk bɔ ɛ̧btir hɛbt di sɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu da̧a̧s dɔglɔ, dood saal wɔ hi kɛmɔ, hinɔgok bɔ kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Anyɔ gii bōō dɔglɔ an Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ gɔ hi book gɛ, gisihi hingok an dooyɔ gin tɛŋko.
Yɔ Yeesu gi sizig a ga̧a̧t bɔ hage, dood saal kittɔnɔ hi fɔbzige.
Yaala ɗobtilya za zaa zagl gi muutdu
a hingokya , gi ha̧a̧mɔ, mɔ ɗɛɛ an mɔ za̧a̧sibe ɗobtil be bɔ gi da̧a̧.
Yeesu yɔd naanɔ ki̧i̧ge, wɛɛ
a ha̧a̧be, ɗobtil mɔ bɔ da̧a̧ge!
Ɓɔrbɔ wal bɔ ɗobtilɔ bɔ da̧a̧ gi muulɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a lagum bɛttɔnɔ, bɔmɔ raas doo za hinza. Wɛɛm mɔ rek a Bɛtmaakwookya bɔ ge mɔ zunsig muul mɔ; wɛɛm mɔ da mɔ gɔs Bɛt maak anyɔ Muusa
Anyɔ Yeesu gul a waal gbɔɔl bɔ nuŋgɔ a Kapɛr-nayum gedu, laya za gbɔɔl Romaya sɔɔz Yeesu dɔŋdi,
zɔ̧ge
a Waar i, walsɛr be gi gumtil gi kusig raa du gi zaŋgdyɔ, gi ya̧a̧rha̧a̧k ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Yɔ dɔg gi da̧a̧ anbɔ Yeesu
a be rekɔ an be za̧a̧sige.
Hɔnɛ laaya gbɔɔl bɔ wɛɛ ta̧a̧ge
a Waar i, bé rı̄ı̄ an mɔ zaa mɔ gul be raa du gɛ; dɔgum hin gbun kpɔd, walsɛr be bɔ gi za̧a̧.

Yɔ anbɔ, bee hi zul be, be gi a gbɔlɛ be wɛɛdisɛ, be gin laya dɛɛt a be dɔɔ di be; gɔ be raa zaa a rekumɔ! Rekɔ. Gɔ be wɛɛ be raa zaa bɔ a zaamɔ! za̧a̧n bɔ zaaza. Gɔ be raa walsɛr be bɔ a woom hin lɛ! Woo hinɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu kɛm dɔgl wɔrɔ hin gi wɛɛsig gɛrsɛ, raa dood wɔ hi gig fɔko a be raasin hi rɔbo:
a Israhila du hɛw, be zɛmdir doo za ɗɔbs Bɛt an wal yɛrɛ gɛ zaŋ.
Be gisin raak rɔbo a dood kittɔnɔ hí fu̧u̧z a ɔ̧tkazigi, zaa a ɔ̧tleki hi le lees lɛlgbunu hi Abraham hi Isaaku hi Yakuba a Bɛt wáát du.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt wáátɔ ginɛ Yahuduya wɔ yaanɛ, Bɛt bilsihibils a lɛlwil du a lakdi; a hɔ, dood hi kaa hi gboo nuŋya̧.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa
laaya gbɔɔl bɔ a rekum mɔ lɛlɛ, Bɛt gi woosum anyɔ mɔ ɗɔbsɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gi raak anbɔ be, laaya gbɔɔl bɔ walsɛrɔ bɔ gi za̧a̧k be.
Yɔ Yeesu rek a Piyɛr raa du, zɛm Piyɛr gɔnsiŋ zul gig laak gi kusig a leeso ha, sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi,
ki̧i̧ naanɔ, nis bɔ muulɔ sa̧a̧k bɔ da̧a̧. Wɛɛ ɗundɔ gaa Yeesu leesɛ le.
Yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ, hi kams Yeesu dood kittɔnɔ hi gin loorɛ-ha̧a̧l muul du. Dɔg dɔgl gbunu gi tuusil loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi gi a dood muul du, wɛɛ za̧a̧sil gumtil zaadɛ wɔ sɛw.
Yeesu woo anbɔ an hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya
a gii hi zulɔ loo zaŋgdums wɛ yɔ wɛ gi nɛ waanuko, wɛɛ pɛrsɛ gums wɛnɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn dood saal kittɔnɔ hi rɔge, wɛɛ raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a wɛ́ tal a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaa bɔ ge.
Bɛtmaakdɔkya za zaa a ge
a hingokya , bé fɔmɔ a lɛl yɔ gɔ mɔ rek ge sɛw.
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a bɛrtɔkgɛ hi gin luko, nɔɔs wɔ bɛtha hi gin zɛko. Yɛrɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ taan lɛlyɔ gɔ gi kus gi gbaa zulɔ du.
Walsɛrɔ zaa gbun
a Waar i, gaabe gbɔnɔ an be rek be i̧i̧z baa be wɔrkɔ kete.
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧
a mɔnɛ fɔbzibe, ɔɔm wɔrkɛ wɔ hi i̧i̧ wɔrkɛya̧ hɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu re gi kar a lɛmb du, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi fɔg duhɔ.
Zɛk za ha̧a̧l yɛɛl fɛk a mɛmbal bɔ geha, mɛmɗukil wɔ hi zɛks lɛmb bɔ an hi imsige. Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu gi nɛ yok be,
hi sɔɔ hi kpooge hi
a Waar i, za̧a̧siwi! Wɛ wɔrkwɔrɔ!
Yɔ Yeesu rɛmɔ warihi
a hoob gin ha̧a̧k nɔ? Nɛɛ dood Bɛt ɗɔbsig kaasiya wɛ!
Gɔma wɛɛ ɗund ya̧a̧l zɛk ha̧a̧l bɔ hi mɛmbal bɔ, lɛl kɔm gɔ seseg.
Yɔ dood hinkɔmsihi gɛrs be hi warɔ
a nɔ nɛ za̧a̧nɔ anyɔ zɛk hɛw hi mɛmɛ hi lagsig nɛ tɔn anyɔ be?

Yɔ Yeesu tuur a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaabɔ ge a Gadarɛnɛ hɛbt du, dood loorɛha̧a̧lya zaadɛ eerɛ hi tuuz a loorlɛlɛ hi zaa hi dagtin hi giya. Doodya̧ hi ha̧a̧hoob ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, doo za ɗɛɛ an gi fɔb gbɔnɔ bɔ hɔ gɛ.
Hi ɓooya̧a̧ hi
war Yeesu a dɔgl wi nɔ du hi mɔya, Bɛt waaɔ? Mɔ zaa hɛdi an mɔ ha̧a̧niw ya̧a̧r anyɔ ya̧a̧rhant bɔ ɔ̧tɔ hi dɛ̧ɛ̧ du tuur hɛw gɛ ya?
Hɔnɛ hab kittɔnɔ hi tɔk hɛto, hɛml hi lɛlyɔ hi gi ge kaasi.
Loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi zɔ̧ Yeesu hi
a mɔ giw niniko, yaawi a hab wɛrɛ hi muul du.
Yeesu
a tuunɛ nɛ rekɔ.
Hi tuu gɔ dood eerɛ wɔ hi muul du hi re hi gul a hab wɔ hi muul du be. Ɓɔrbɔ hab wɔ maasya̧ sɛw hi nɔɔ hi tii a kasiŋ disɛ hi da hi gi̧i̧l a mɛmbal du hi wɔrɔ.
Hab nɛɛrɛwaat wɔ hí gbɛn anbɔ be hi nɔɔ hi rek a waal gbɔɔl du hi fɔk hinyɔ tal sɛw, hi hinyɔ daa a dood loorɛha̧a̧lya eerɛ wɔ hi muulɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ dood wɔ a waal bɔ gedu sɛw hi tuuz hi zaa a Yeesu ge, yɔ hi zɛŋge hi zɔ̧ge an gi ɗund gi ɔɔ hɛbtya̧ bɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu re gi kar a lɛmb za du, wɛɛ kar mɛmbal bɔ rek a gi waal gbɔɔl du.
Yɔ rek anbɔ hi kamsig wal za zaŋgdi a sil ha. Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn dood wɔ ɗɔbsigya̧ be, raa
wal zaŋgd bɔ a waa be, ɓaasum muul mɔ, be bitsum hinha̧a̧l mɔ bitsɔ!
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛtmaakdɔkya zaadɛ hi mɔkig hi kpoos du be a wal yɛrɛ gi book ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l
a Bɛt zulha!
Yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ hinyɔ wɔrɔ hi mɔkig hi kpoos du be, warihi
a nɔ nɛ gin mɔkil ha̧a̧l wɔrɔ nɛ kpoos du anbɔ nɔ?
An be raa doo zaŋgd bɔ a be bitsim hinha̧a̧l mɔ wɔ bitsɔ, hi zaa ráákɔ a ɗukum ha mɔ ɛmbɔ, nɔni ɓaa gi daarlɛl nɔ?
Yɛrɛ ɔbe zunsin hin an nɛ mɛɛ a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gin tɛŋk a hɛbtdi an gi bits dood hinha̧a̧lɛ.
Wɛɛ raa
doo zaŋgd bɔ a ɗukumɔ mɔ loo sil mɔ mɔ wɛɛ mɔ lɛlɛ!
Wal bɔ ɗundɔ loo silɔ re gi lɛlɛ.
Yɔ dood saal wɔ hi gbɛn hini daa anbɔ hoobha̧a̧hiha̧, hi wɛɛ hi baan Bɛto anyɔ gaa dood tɛŋk anbɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu ɗund hɔdi gi fɔk gbɔnɔ a tooslukya̧ gbarɔ, gbɛn doo za gi ɗɔɔtig a toosluk bɔ gedu nuŋgɔ a Mata, elige,
a fɔbzibe.
Mata ɗundɔ fɔge.
Yɔ Yeesu ɗɔɔt gi hinlek a Mata raa du, tooszekyaadɛ hi dood hinha̧a̧l wookyaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi zaa hi ɗɔɔt hi hinlek elo, hi Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ be.
Yɔ Farisaya wɔ hi zaa hi gbɛn anbɔ hi war walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a hingokya nɛ bɔ gi hinlek nɔ hi tooszekya wɔ hi hinha̧a̧l wookya wɔ nɔ?
Yɔ Yeesu lag anbɔ raa
a dood wɔ muulya̧ gi rɔbtɔnɔ ha̧a̧hi gɛr gɛ, ha̧a̧ gumtil wɔ hiya.

Da nɛ gok hinyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du, an nɛ kɛm hinɔ rɔbtɔnɔ: a Bɛt raa a ha̧a̧be an hi mɛɛtin ya̧a̧rɛ, hā̧ā̧be maaknamb wɔ hi gbɛɛtirgo gɛ. Yɛrɛ bé zāā an be el dood rɔbɛ gɛ, be zaa an be el dood hinha̧a̧lya wɔ hiya.
Yohana walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi zaa a Yeesu ge hi warige
a wiya hi Farisaya wɔ wi hinlilko, nɔ ɔnɛ walɛsɛrɛ mɔ wɔ hi lilhin ya̧nɛ zaŋ gɛ?
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a nɛ mɔk a rɔ̀bɛ wɔ hi elzihi a lottins naab du hi ɗɛɛ an hi mimɔ anyɔ hi gi hi nislookya bɔ ket ya? Taa anbɔ! Yɛrɛ ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ hí wa̧a̧ nislookya bɔ hi ha̧sig a hi teesdu, gɔ gi tuurɔ hi lil gɔ.
Doo za gɔ lōō gbandil taakil seg yɔ nukt gɛ an gi haktin gbandil wɔm gɛ, à anbɔ gɛ, gbandil seg taakil bɔ nukt gɛ yɔ taar gbandil wɔm bɔ yɔ daarlɛl ɓɛ.
Gɔ hi tɔ̧ɔ̧ bum mukt a tik wɔm du gɛ, à anbɔ gɛ, tik wɔm bɔ yɔ foo bum bɔ yɔ gub hɛbtdi. Gɔ hi tɔ̧ɔ̧ bum mukt a tik seg du, bum bɔ hi tik bɔ sɛw hi kɔm rɔbtɔnɔ. Anbɔ hinza yɔ ha̧tir gɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu gisihi hin wɔrɔ dɔk anbɔ Yahuduya mɔk-silluk zulya za zaa zagl gi muutdu
a waa be siŋg wɔr ɓɔryɔ, yɛrɛ zaamɔ mɔ gbaasig naan muulɛ gi za̧a̧.
Yeesu ɗukɔ hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi fɔ wal bɔ.
Nis za lis gig fɔk wɛl kooblɛ daa eerɛ, zaa pɛt gi kuudu, ki̧i̧ gbandilɔ tɔlya̧ bɔ.
Da gi mɔkig a gi kpoos du be
a à be ki̧i̧ nɛ gbandilɔ bɔ gii mɔɔti, be mɛɛ a be za̧a̧za̧.
Yɔ nis bɔ zɛmr gi ki̧i̧ gbandilɔ bɔ anbɔ Yeesu zɛmr seege wɛɛ
a waa be siŋgo, ɓaasum muul mɔ, yɔ mɔ ɗɔbs a mɔ kpoos du a be za̧a̧, mɔ za̧a̧za̧.
Yɔ anbɔ nis bɔ lisɔ bɔ da̧a̧ gɔ ɓɔrbɔ be.
Yɔ Yeesu zaa a mɔksilluk zulya bɔ gi raa du gi zɛm dood hi waŋgoor utugo, zaadɛ hi ya̧a̧ɓooluko hi kaal be,
a tuunɛ, yɛrɛ waa bɔ wɔr gɛ, gi yokyo.
Yɔ dood wɔ hi lag anbɔ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lig-kpɛ̧ɛ̧lɔ.
Hɔnɛyɔ hi yaa dood saal wɔ hi tuu lakdi, Yeesu gul gɔ a luk bɔ gedu wa̧a̧ waasiŋ bɔ naan muulɛ, waa bɔ ɗund gɔ ha.
Dɔglɔ hɛks gɔ waal bɔ gedu sɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu ɗuk hɔdi gi daak gi rek lɛlza, yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ eerɛ hi fɔge hi ya̧a̧ɓooliki
a Dawda waawalɔ, mɛɛsiwi ya̧a̧rɛ!
Yɔ Yeesu re gi tuur raa du, yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ eerɛ hi sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi, gii wɛɛ warihi
a nɛ ɗɔbs nɛ kpoos du a be gin tɛŋk an be woo hinɔ ya?
Wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ hi ta̧a̧ge a hɔɔ,
Waar i, wi ɗɔbsɔ!
Yeesu gbaa naan hi lɔl du
a an hinɔ gi wooy anyɔ nɛ ɗɔbs nɛ kpoos du!
Dood eerɛ wɔ lɔlya̧ wɛɛ gaa hi gbɛn gɔ, Yeesu wɛɛ
hi naati a lagin bɛttɔnɔ, bɔ doo gi mɛɛ hinɔ.
Hɔnɛ yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ hí bɛɛ tuuko hi rek hi ɛmbin nuŋgɔ a waal bɔ gedu sɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu tuu gi rek hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ, dood hi kams Yeesu za̧a̧nza yɔ gin loorɛha̧a̧l gi muul du gi wɛɛnig su̧u̧ki.
Yɔ tuus loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ a za̧a̧n bɔ gi muul du, za̧a̧n bɔ baar ya̧a̧booko. Yɔ dood saal wɔ hinkɔmsihi gɛrs be hi raa
a hi gbɛn hinza tuudir a Israhila hɛbt du gi riitin an yɛrɛ gɛ.
Hɔnɛ wɛɛ Farisaya wɔ hi dɔg be
a loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ waar ya̧ bɔ gii gaa Yeesu tɛŋko gi tuusin loorɛha̧a̧lɛ!
Yeesu ɛmb gbɛ̧ɛ̧ka a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ du hi raat dɛɛt wɔ du sɛw gi hingok a mɔksilluk wɔ duge gi dɔk Bɛt wáátɔ Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ, gi tuusilgo gums sɛw hi gums sa̧ytya zaadɛ kittɔnɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn dood saal wɔ hi mɔɔ be, muulya̧ gi wɔlihi an tam wɔ hi taan nɛɛrawaa be, hi ha̧a̧sig ya̧a̧rɛ.
Raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a totɓɛs bɔ woosɔ tɔɔtɔ, wɛɛ woosya hi kit gɛ be.
Da nɛ zɔ̧b wooszulya bɔ gi yaaz woosya kittɔnɔ hi zaa a totɓɛsɔ bɔ gedu.
Yeesu el walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ gaahi tɛŋko an hi ninin loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ, hi tuusil gums sɛw a dood muulɛ hi zaŋdums sɛw.
Tɔmsya wɔ koobl daa eerɛ nuŋgya̧ gɛrɛ: doos bɔ nuŋgɔ a Simɔŋ (nuŋgɔ zaa a Piyɛr ), yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Andrɛ, Zebede waatɔ Yakuba hi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Yohana.
Filib hi Bartelemi, Tumas hi tooszekya bɔ Mata, Alfe waawal Yakuba hi Taade;
Simɔŋ Hɛbtwaa Gàbs bɔ hi Yahuda Iskaryudi yɔ rɛ̧ɛ̧ Yeesu .
Yeesu yaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ koobl daa eer wɛrɛ woosɛ
anyɔ lɛ a bɔnɛ rek a lɛlyɔ dood hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ ge, bɔnɛ rek a Samariya waal za gbɔɔl du.
Rekin a dood Israhilaya wɔ hi gi an tam yɔ wag hi.
Gɔ nɛ réko gin Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔk nɔɔha nɛ raako a Bɛt wáátɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Za̧a̧sin gumtil wɔ, rɛmsin wɔrkɛ wɔ, za̧a̧sin dood wɔ hi gin ɗobtil muulɛ. Tuusin loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi gi a dood muul du. Yɛrɛ nɛ dag Bɛt tɛŋkɔ ya̧a̧rtɔs, da nɛ gaa dood ya̧a̧rtɔs be.
Gɔ nɛ reko, bɔnɛ loo hɛɛlmɔto, bɔnɛ loo tusɛ, zaabe tus dɛɛto nɛ yaa a nɛ ziba du,
bɔnɛ loo saa, bɔnɛ loo gbandil eerɛ, bɔnɛ loo taalɛ, bɔnɛ loo sɔɔlɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, rii an woosya gi dag leesɔ dagɔ.
Gɔ nɛ gul a waal gbɔɔl za du, zaabe, a raat dɛɛt zaadɛ du, warin kinsa doo rɔb gi du an gi dagin a gi lɛl du; gɔ gi anbɔ ɗɔɔtin a za̧a̧n bɔ gi lɛl du gi tuur a rek nɛ ɔ̧ti.
Gɔ nɛ gulk a raa bɔ gedu boonɛge, nɛ raa a an Bɛt boolumɔ gigi hi nɛya!
Gid dood wɔ hi waak a raa bɔ gedu hi rii an hi daginɛ, boolum nɛ bɔ ɔksige hi dood wɔ duhɔ. Wɛɛ gid hi tuur dood rɔbɛ an hi dagin hi raa du gɛ, boolum nɛ bɔ bɔgi ɗɔɔt a hi zulha, wɛɛzig a nɛɛ ge.
Gid nɛ tuur a raa za du, zaa lab gɛ a waal gbɔɔl za du doodya̧ hi dāgin gɛ, hi tā̧ā̧sin dɔgl nɛ bɔ lak gɛ, tuunɛ nɛ ɔɔ raa bɔ, zaabe waal gbɔɔl bɔ nɛ pubsihi luus bɔ nɛ dɔɔkuu ha.
Be gisin raak rɔbo: waal gbɔɔl bɔrɔ ya̧a̧rhantɔ gi ɓaa gi daar Sodɔma hi Gɔmɔra hɛbt ɔnɛ a dɔgl gbaak-ɔ̧ti.
Laginɛ, yɛrɛ be gin yaak an tamɔ a lergum tees du. Ginin kɛ̧ɛ̧tig an beksɛ, wɛɛn dood zulhɔnikyaadɛ an gutu.
Oon zul nɛ hi doodɛ. Dood hi wa̧a̧nɛ hi ka̧nɛ a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k-yaadɛ muutdu hi lɛbtin a hi mɔksilluk wɔ du hi kpooti.
Hi wɛɛ hi dirkinɛ hi kanɛ a hɛbtzulya wɔ hi, hi waar ɛ wɔ hi muutdu a be dɔŋgo an nɛ boo dɔgl be a hi muutdu hi a dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi muutdu.
Gɔ hi wa̧a̧nɛ hi ka̧nɛ a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi muutdu bɔ kol gi tuunɛ a nɛ dɔg ri, zaabe a hinyɔ gɔ nɛ dɔg geha. Hinyɔ gɔ nɛ dɔko, Bɛt gii gin gaazig ɓɔrbɔ an nɛ
Dɔgl wɔrɔ lab hi taa fu̧u̧k a nɛ zulha, Baa nɛ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gii gi bookya̧a̧ a nɛ kpoos du.
Dood hi gaa yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛya̧ an hi gbɔ̧hi, baaba wɔ be hi gaa waatya̧ an hi gbɔ̧hi be. Waat wɔ be hí ɗund a baa wɔ raa du hi zulha hi gbɔ̧hi.
Dood sɛw hi hɛ̧ɛ̧ninlɔl a be dɔŋgo. Yɔ anbɔ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi mɔm hin wɔrɔ gi tuur a da̧a̧ki gi za̧a̧.
Gɔ hi gin zɛksig a waal za gbɔɔl du, nɔɔn nɛ dɔŋg a waal za gbɔɔl du. Be gisin raak rɔbo: Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gɔ gi zaako nɛɛ nɛ ɛmbik a Israhila waal gbɔlɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ du te, nɛ da̧a̧sir kɛn gɛ hɛw.
Walsɛr dāār ɗɛntɔ hi gbɔlums gɛ, wɛɛ taa an gbaar gi daar ɗɛntɔ hi gbɔlums be.
Rii an walsɛr gi wɛɛ an ɗɛntɔ, gbaar bɔ be gi wɛɛ an báátɔ, à hi el za̧a̧n raatya bɔ gii a Belzebil, yɔ hi dɔ̧ɔ̧s doodɔ wɔ raa du nuŋg ha̧a̧l yɔ daarlɛl gɛ ya?
Yɔ anbɔ, bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ doodɛ. Hinyɔ yaat sɛw, hí ɔɔg midigɔ gɛ, hinyɔ gi ya̧a̧luurya sɛw hí ɔɔg mɛksigɔ gɛ.
Hinyɔ be gisin raak a lɛlniŋkum du raalin a ɔ̧t du a dood lɔlgbar sɛw. Hinyɔ be gisin raak hi ya̧a̧tamsɛ, karin a luk zulha nɛ ɓoolɔ.
Wɛɛ bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ dood wɔ hi gbɔŋk muulɛ hi wɛɛ hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ kol gbɔŋk gɛ. Hoobha̧a̧nɛg Bɛt yɔ ɗɛɛ kol gbɔŋko hi muulɛ hi yaakɔ a laazɛŋk du.
Nɛ gɔ hi zebr zaw eerɛ tus dɛɛt gbun ma mi? Yɛrɛ gi hā̧ā̧ Baa nɛ Bɛt gɛ nɔɔs za gbun taa mɛɛk hɛbtdi.
Bɛt ɓɛr susug nɛ wɔ zulha sɛw.
Bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ hinza; nɛ wɛɛ hin ɗɔbt nɛ daar zaw kittɔnɔ daarɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, za̧a̧n yɔ boo dɔgl be a dood muutdu, bee be boo dɔglɔ a Baa be Bɛt yɔ gi bɛtha gi muutdu be.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ faabe a dood muutdu a mɛɛb gɛ, bee hɛw be faage a Baa be yɔ gi a bɛtha gi muutdu a be mɛɛg gɛ be.
Bɔnɛ mɔk a be zaa an be kamz boolumi a waal du, bé kāmz boolum gɛ, be kamzig nɔko.
Be zaa an be gɛ̧ɛ̧ waa hi baatɔ, waasiŋgo hi nɔɔtɔ, nisɛ hi waltɔ nɔɔtɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, dood wɔ hi gi a za̧a̧n za raa du hii hi wɛɛsig lɔlɔhɛ̧ɛ̧nikyaadɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧ge baatɔ, zaabe nɔɔtɔ gi daar beya tuur doo rɔb an gi wɛɛ fɔkya be gɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ pɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧rɔ gi fɔ̄bzib gɛ, rı̄ı̄ an gi waa hi bee gɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g an gi za̧a̧s kolɔ gi waksige. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ waks kolɔ a be dɔŋg be, gı̄ zɛm za̧a̧tigɔ a Bɛt wáát du.
Za̧a̧nyɔ daginɛ, dag beya. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ dag beya, dag Za̧a̧nyɔ yaazib ga.

Za̧a̧nyɔ dag Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya a Bɛt ya̧a̧ɔ bɔ gi kɛŋk gi gi dɔk gi dɔŋgo, gi dag dɔɔrɔɔsɔ gi riitin an Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ ɔnɛ bɔ, wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ dag doo riiti a woosɔ riit bɔ gi dɔŋgo, gi dag dɔɔrɔɔsɔ gi riitin an doo riit bɔ ɔnɛ bɔ be.
Be raasin rɔbo: za̧a̧nyɔ gaa waat wɛrɛ zaaya̧ gbun mɛmyɔ̧k dakwaa gbunu anyɔ gi fɔkya benɛ, taa dɔɔrɔɔsɔ lɔɔk nɛ zaŋ.
Yɔ Yeesu da̧ts walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ koobl daa eer wɔ hingoko, ɗund hɔdi re hingoko hi Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔki a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ hi gi a hi hɛbt du gedu.
Yɔ Yohana gi luknɔ du gi kɛm Kristu woosɔ dɔglɛ, yaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ zaadɛ an hi warig hinɛ. Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rekɔ hi warige
a mɔɔ gi za̧a̧nyɔ wi mɛɛ a gi zaak ya? Gi an wi oo zaa dɔɔmi ya?
Yeesu ta̧a̧hi
a rekin nɛ fɔks Yohana hinyɔ nɛ lako hi hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnko:
Yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ hi gbɛnik lɔlɛ, dɔɔ gumtilya wɔ dɔɔya̧ ɓaa hi wɛɛ hi ɛmbuko, ɗobtilya wɔ ɗobtilya̧ da̧a̧ hi muul be, lagɛ wɔ hi tɔnkɛŋk be, wɔrkɛ wɔ hi rɛmlik be, wɛɛ hi dɔgsig ya̧a̧rya wɔ Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ be.
Wɛɛ hat gi a za̧a̧nyɔ simdɔɔ a be dɔŋg gɛ ge.
Yɔ Yohana walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi wɛɛko, Yeesu wɛɛ yɛls dood saal wɔ kuudu Yohana dɔglɔ bookɔ, raa
a nɛ da nɛ re nɔ seezig a hɛtdɔŋ du nɔ? Nɛ re an nɛ seez bɔ̧ɔ̧k zayɔ zɛk gig namsig gii ya?
Nɛ re nɔ seezig nɔ? Wal za yɔ heg gbandil bɛt muul gii ya? Dood wɔ hi heg gbandil bɛtɛ hi waak ya̧nɛ a waar raa du.
Nɛ nɛ rek nɔ wɛ? An nɛ seez Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya za ya? Hɔɔ! Ɔbe raasinɛ, wal bɔrɔ daar Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya hɛw.
Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa Yohana dɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ a be yaak tɔmsbeya gɛrɛ a mɔ muutdu an gi gɛmtsim gbɔnɔ.
Be gin raak rɔbo: dood wɔ nɛɛd hi mɔɔhi sɛw, za̧a̧nza tɔ̄ɔ̄ daar Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ hi gbɔlumsɔ gɛ. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi wans a Bɛt wáát du tɔɔ daarigdaarɔ.
A ɔ̧tyɔ Yohana yɛɛl Bɛt wáátɔ dɔglɔ dɔk gedu gi tuur ɓɔryɔ lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya wɔ hi wa̧a̧ dɔgl bɔ hi tɛŋko, dood ha̧a̧l wɔ hi tɛk an hi wɔɔ dɔgl bɔ hi tɛŋk be.
Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ sɛw hi Muusa maakdɔglɔ hi boo Bɛt waar umsɔ dɔglɔ tuur a Yohana wɛlɛ.
Gi ha̧a̧nɛ an nɛ ta̧a̧ hinɔ, Yohana gii gi Eliya yɔ gɔ gi zaa.
An za̧a̧nyɔ gin tɔn an gi kɛmɔ gi kɛmɔ!
Be gòksin dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɛrɛ hi gi ɔ̧ti gi zul hi nɔ? Hi riitin an ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ gɔ hi ɗɔɔtig a luum ha hi ya̧a̧ɓoltingo hi nayza hii hi dɔko
a wi usin fɛ̧ɛ̧brɛ̧ɛ̧yɔ, nɛ nahin gɛ. Wi ɛɛsin ya̧a̧rnaabo, nɛ kāā gɛ be!
Yɔ anbɔ, Yohana zaa lehin rɔb gɛ, yɔ̧ bumhob gɛ; dood hi gig raako a gin loorɛha̧a̧l gi muul du!

Wɛɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaa gi hin sɛw leko, gi bumhob yɔ̧ko. Hi wɛɛ hi raak ɓɛ a gi hinlekya ha̧a̧lɛ, wɛɛ gi bumyɔ̧kya ha̧a̧l be. Gi tooszekya wɔ hi hinha̧a̧l wookya wɔ sa̧a̧mya̧ be. Yɛrɛ Bɛt hinmɛɛkɔ rɔb bɔ zuun woosɔ wɔ a gi rɔbo.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu wɛɛ yɛɛl waal gbɔlɛ wɔ woo nɛ gɛrs gbɔlɛ kit gedu a Galile hɛbt du niiki anyɔ dood wɔ hi tā̧ā̧ kpoosya̧ zɛmrik gɛ. Yeesu

a mɔɔ Koraziŋ waal gbɔɔlɔ, mɔ gin ya̧a̧rhanto; mɔɔ Baytizaada, mɔ gin ya̧a̧r-hanto. An woos gɛrsya wɔ hi wooy a nɛ teesdu da wooy nɛ a Tirus waal gbɔɔl du hi Sidɔŋg waal gbɔɔl du, yɔ hi zɛmr nɛ kpoosya̧ amntɔnɔ hi heg ya̧a̧rnaab saa haŋsili hi wɛɛ hi kpuu tam hi muulɛ an hi zuun a be zɛmr kpoos be.
Hinɔ gii be gisin raako a ya̧a̧rhant nɛnɛ bɔ gi ɓaa gi daar Tirus ɔnɛ hi Sidɔŋg ɔnɛ a dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti.

Mɔɔ Kapɛrnayum, mɔ mɔkig a Bɛt dɔɔsumdɔɔs a bɛtha ya ri? Hí tidsum mɔ tuur a wɔrkɛ ɗɔɔtil lɛlɛ. An woos gɛrsya wɔ hi wooy a mɔɔ ge hi da hi wooy nɛ a Sodɔma, waal bɔrɔ yɔ kɔm yɔ tuur nɛ a ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ.
Hinɔ gii be gisin raako a ya̧a̧rhant nɛ gi ɓaa gi daar Sodɔma waal ɔnɛ a dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti.
A ɔ̧tɔ ge Yeesu zɔ̧ Bɛt raa
a Baa, Waar a bɛtha hi hɛbtdi, be baanumɔ anyɔ mɔ zuns waat wɔ hinyɔ mɔ yats nɛ dood hinmɛɛkya dubtɛ wɔ hi wɔ hi zaŋgɔ.
Hɔɔ, Baa, hinɔ riisum anbɔ anyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ.
Baa be Bɛt gaabe hin naan du sɛw. Doo za mɛɛ Bɛt waa bɔ gɛ, gɛ Baa Bɛt mɛɛge. Doo za mɛɛ Baa Bɛt gɛ, gɛ Bɛt Waa bɔ mɛɛge hi dood wɔ Bɛt Waa bɔ ha̧a̧ge an gi zunsihige.
Nɛɛ yɔ nɛ pɛɛk hinɗɔmn nɛ mɔɔ sɛw, zaan a beege, be sitsin hinɗɔmn nɛ, nɛ́ dag holumi.
Ha̧n gbɔŋgil be a nɛ durk du, fɔn hinyɔ be gisin goko. Yɔ anbɔ, be gi doo kpoos saŋktya hi zultiisigya, zaanɛ nɛ zɛms kol nɛ holumlɛlɛ.
Gbɔŋgil yɔ gɔ be heksinɛ pɛɛkɔ ɗɔb gɛ, wɛɛ hinɗɔmn yɔ gɔ be gbaasinɛ gi ɗagtilyɔ.
A ɔ̧tɔ ge Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi daa gbɔnɔ a totbak wɔ du a holum-ɔ̧ti. Yɔ a̧a̧kil gi ha̧a̧k walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi halkig tot wɔ hi kɔɔlik hi tɔko.
Yɔ Farisaya wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi raas Yeesu
a seem walɛsɛrɛ mɔ wɔ hi wook hinyɔ Bɛtmaakdɔgl wɛ ansɛ a holum-ɔ̧ti!
Yeesu warihi
a nɛ́ zaŋga hinyɔ Dawda woo ɔ̧tza hi zulɔ hi doodɔ yɔ a̧a̧kil gihi ha̧a̧k gɛ ya?
Dawda gul a Bɛtluk du hi doodɔ hi loo kok kiml wɔ hi gbaas Bɛto hi le; taa nɛ an gii hi doodɔ hi le kok bɔ, maak wɛ gaa Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ hii gbɔnɔ an hi le kpɔd.
Zaabe nɛ zaŋga Muusa maakɔ bɔ gaa, a Bɛtmaak wookya wɔ hi fɔ̄b holum-ɔ̧t maak a Bɛtluk du a holum-ɔ̧t gɛ sɛw hi taan a̧a̧b gɛ ya? Nɛ lag anbɔ gɛ ya?
Yɛrɛ be gisin dɔko a hinyɔ be goksinɛ gbɔlumsɔ daar Bɛtluk bɔ hɛw.
À nɛ mɛɛ nɛ hin bɔ raakɔ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du a ha̧a̧be an hi mɛɛtin ya̧a̧rɛ, hā̧ā̧be maaknamb wɔ hi gbɛɛtirgo gɛ, yɔ nɛ gbāās nɛ dood wɔ hi gɔ hin-a̧a̧b gɛ dɔgl gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gii gi holum-ɔ̧t waar i.
Yeesu ɗund hɔdi, rek gul a hi mɔksilluk du.
Zɛm doo za naanwɔlya gi a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu. Yɔ dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi an hi kɛtinge ya̧a̧ hi warige:
a maak wɛ gaa gbɔnɔ an hi za̧a̧s doo a holum-ɔ̧t ya?
Yeesu wɛɛ warihi:
a à doo za gbun gi nɛ teesdu gi gin tamɔ gi mat a zɛŋk dubt du a holum-ɔ̧ti, za̧a̧nɔ taa an gi rek gi kadz tamɔ bɔ a zɛŋk bɔ gedu ya?
Doo gii gi hinɗɔbt gi daar tamɔ. Yɔ anbɔ maakdɔgl wɛ gaa gbɔnɔ an hi gɔs doo hinrɔb a holum-ɔ̧ti.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa
wal naanwɔlya bɔ a yɔdum naan mɔ.
Wal bɔ yɔd naanɔ wɛɛ bɛr an zaa bɔ.
Hɔnɛ Farisaya wɔ hi tuu a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu hi rek hi mɔks hi wɔya̧a̧ a Yeesu zulha an hi mɛɛ gbɔŋkɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ hin bɔrɔ gi kpoos du ɗun ɔɔ lɛl bɔ rekɔ, dood kittɔnɔ hi fɔge. Gii wɛɛ za̧a̧s gumtil wɔ sɛw.
hi naati
a bɔhi raas dood a gii gi za̧a̧nɔ.
Hinɔ wooy an gi da̧a̧s hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya boo dɔglɔ gi raa
a Bɛt raa a wal be sɛr bɔ be herig gɛrɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧b ge hi kpoos be sɛw, hat be sɛw gi a ge. Bé gbaa Mɔkil be a gi zulha, gi wɛɛ gi dɔks dood wɔ hi mɛ̄ɛ̄be gɛ ha̧a̧tig be dɔglɛ.
Taa gbaatingo hi doo, taa ya̧a̧ɓooluko, taa an hi lagig hindɔk a gbɔnɔnɔɔdɛ du.
Taa bɔ̧ɔ̧k yɔ yees ɓɛdugo, taa nimsig pitila yɔ gi uus-uuko, gi tuur an gi kam woosriit hatya a ɗɛɛt du kete.
Wɛɛ dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduyaadɛ gɛ hi gbaak mɔkilya̧ a gi nuŋg du.
Yɔ dood hi kams Yeesu doo za yɔ gin loorɛha̧a̧l gi muul du gi yɔ̧ɔ̧sige, gi wɛɛnig su̧u̧ki, Yeesu za̧a̧sige, wal su̧u̧k bɔ booya̧a̧ wɛɛ gbɛn lɔlɛ.
Yɔ dood saal wɔ sɛw hi gbɛn anbɔ gi kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ hi warɔ
a wal yɛrɛ nɛ Waar Dawda Waawal gii ma mi?
Hɔnɛyɔ Farisaya wɔ hi kɛmɔ hi raa
a wal yɛrɛ gi tuusingo loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi waar ya̧ bɔ nuŋgɔ a Belzebili tɛŋk ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ!
Anyɔ Yeesu mɛɛ mɔkilya̧
a waar ums yɔ zulɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧y du eerɛ, gi ha̧a̧tiro. Waal gbɔɔl yɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧y du eerɛ, zaabe, raa gi gɛ̧ɛ̧y du eerɛ, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi er gɛ.
Saydanu gi nin Saydanu, gɛ̧ɛ̧ zul ɔ̧ɔ̧n eerɛ, waar umsɔ gi er ri?
Gi gi an be tuusig loorɛha̧a̧l hi Belzebil tɛŋkɔ, fɔkya nɛ wɔ hi tuusingo loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi nɔ tɛŋkɔ be? Yɔ anbɔ, walɛsɛrɛ nɛ wɔ hii hi gbaasin dɔgl hi zulya̧.
Yɛrɛ gid be tuusig loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi Bɛt Mɔkilyɔ, Bɛt wáátɔ zaaza ma a nɛɛge.
Gi an doo za gi gul ri a za̧a̧nza tɛŋkya raa du an gi tuut wɔdɔ luurɛ, gi wɔg nɛ ba̧a̧n du ket gɛ! Yɔ wɔb za̧a̧n raatya bɔ kete, an gi ɔɔ talk a gi raa du an gi tuut wɔdɔ luurɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ taa hi bee gɛ, gi lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya beenɛ; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ ɔks hi bee an gi mɔks dood gɛ, gihi hɛksighɛksɔ.
Hinɔ gii be gisin raako a hinha̧a̧lyɔ dood gɔ hi woo sɛw hi ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l yɔ gɔ hi boo sɛw Bɛt gi bitsihi dɔglɔ. Yɛrɛ Bɛt taas dood ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l yɔ gɔ hi boo a Bɛt Mɔkil zulha bisugo.

Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi zulha, Bɛt gi bitsig hinha̧a̧lɔ; yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Bɛt Mɔkil bɔ gi zulha, Bɛt taasig hinha̧a̧lɔ bisig a ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ, hi ɔ̧t bɔ gi zaak kuudu gedu hɛw.
Nɛ see tɛ̧ɛ̧ gi gi tɛ̧ɛ̧ rɔbo, humlɔ bɔ gi rɔb be; tɛ̧ɛ̧ gi gi tɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧a̧lɛ, humlɔ bɔ gi ha̧a̧l be. Yɔ anbɔ, gɔ hi mɛɛ tɛ̧ɛ̧ a gi huml muulɛ.
Kpolum dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɛrɛ! Nɛ gi dood ha̧a̧l be, gi an nɛ boo ya̧a̧ rɔb ri nɔ? Ya̧a̧ gi tuusig hinyɔ hi̧i̧s a kpoos du giya.
Doo rɔb gi tuusig hinrɔb a gi rɔɔs rɔb yɔ gin kpoos du gedu. Doo ha̧a̧l be gi tuusig hinyɔ bɛr gɛ gii a gi rɔɔs ha̧a̧l du be.
Be dɔgsinɛ a dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti, dood hi ɓɛr ya̧a̧boonya̧ tɔs wɔ gɔ hi boo nɛ sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ, ya̧a̧boon mɔɔn gi wɛɛnum doo riiti, zaabe, a̧a̧bgɔkya.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛtmaakdɔkya zaadɛ hi Farisaya zaadɛ hi zaa hi raa Yeesu
a hingokya , ha̧a̧wi an mɔ woo gɛrs wi gbɛnɔ.
Yeesu ta̧a̧hi
a dood ha̧a̧l wɔ hi waak ɓɔryɔ hi ɔɔ Bɛt an nis yɔ gi naakmansi gi ɔɔ waltɔ, hi ɓɛɛk gɛrsɛ. Gɛrs za taasihi tuuko, gɛ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Zonas gɛrsɔ bɔ tutsihi kpɔd.
Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi waa ɔ̧t taarɛ hi yɛms taarɛ a loor du be, anyɔ Zonas waa dut gbɔɔl buudu ɔ̧t taarɛ hi yɛms taar be.

A dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti dood Niniiviya wɔ hí ɗuk a dood wɔ ɔ̧ti gi zul hi muut du an hi matinihi dɔglɛ. Yɔ hi kɛm Zonas gi gisihi Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔko, hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi ta̧a̧ Bɛto. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ daarin Zonas gbɔlums gi dihɛ.

A dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti, nis waar bɔ fu̧u̧z a ɔ̧tkazig naanyɛ̧li, gi er a dood wɔ hi gi ɔ̧ti gi zul hi muutdu gi matinihi dɔglɛ, anyɔ fu̧u̧z a waal doorumlɛlɛ an gi kɛm Sulemaanu hin-mɛɛkɔ bɔ gi dɔko. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ daarin Sulemaanu gbɔlums hi hinmɛɛki gi hɛdi.
Yɔ loorɛha̧a̧l za tuu a doo kpoos du, gbɛ̧ɛ̧k a lɛl koot wɔ hi an gi ɓɛɛ lɛl gi holɔ, wɛɛ dag gɛ.
Yɔ dag holklɛl gɛ raa a be wɛɛ a luk yɔ be ɔz nɛ gedu. Gɔ wɛɛza zaa zɛm luk bɔ ɗɛndilɛ, hi hɛdige hi gɛms lɛl rɔbtɔnɔ.

Wɛɛ da looz loorɛha̧a̧l zaadɛ wɔ hi ha̧a̧l hi daar gii nɔɔn-erɛ hi zaatin lɛlgbunu hi tal a luk bɔ gedu. Hinɔ anbɔ ro za̧a̧n bɔ gikɔ gi bɔbt gi daar yɔ biitirnaan du. Hinɔ gi turs dood ha̧a̧l wɔ hi gi ɔ̧ti gi zul anbɔ.
Anyɔ Yeesu gi bookya̧a̧ hi dood saal wɔ luk du tɛ̧, nɔɔtɔ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi zaa hi er lakdi hi gig ooko an hi booya̧a̧ hi giya.
Doo za wɛɛ
a nàà mɔ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mɔ hi zaa hi erk lakdi hi gim ooko, ha̧a̧hi an hi booya̧a̧ hi mɔya.
Yeesu wɛɛ war za̧a̧n bɔ
a bɔ gi nàà be hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be nɔ?
Wɛɛ zu un naan a walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi zulha raa
a nàà be hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be hi gi gɛrɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ za̧a̧nyɔ gi wook hinyɔ Baa be yɔ bɛtha ha̧a̧ge, gi yɛ̧ɛ̧ be, gi siŋg be hi nàà be sɛw.
A ɔ̧tɔge Yeesu tuu raa du da rek ɗɔɔt a mɛmbalya̧ gis dood hingoko.
Yɔ saalzanɔ gbɔɔl zaa hi mɔks gi dɔŋdi, gii be kar ɗɔ̀ɔ̀t a lɛmb za du. Dood saal wɔ hi ɗɔ̀ɔ̀t a mɛmbalya̧ di be.
Dɔksihi hin kittɔnɔ hi ya̧a̧daaniki
a doo za tuu an gi dɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧to a gi bak du.
Yɔ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧t bɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧k a gi bak du, dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi mɛɛl hi fɔ gbɔnɔya̧ bɔ: nɔɔs hi zaa hi sɛ̧ɛ̧.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi mɛɛl a betwaat lɛl du, a lɛlyɔ hɛbt tɔ̄ɔ̄ ge gɛ. Anyɔ hɛbt ɗɔb lɛlɔ ge gɛ, dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi pir nɔɔktɔnɔ,
ɔ̧tyɔ haa, dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi pir nɛko yɛ̧ɛ̧sya̧ gi naab gɛ, ɔ̧t haahi hi kootɔ.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi mɛɛl a tɛ̧ɛ̧ kobsyaadɛ tees du. Tɛ̧ɛ̧ kobsya wɔ hi hɔɔ hi gbáá hindɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi pirɔ.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi mɛɛl a hɛbt rɔb lɛl du hi tuus gaato. Zaadɛ hi tuus gaatya̧ yɔ̧ɔ̧ nɔɔnɛ, zaa dumbili nɔɔngbunu, zaabe dumbili taarɛ.
An za̧a̧nyɔ gin tɔn an gi kɛmɔ gi kɛmɔ!
Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi sɔɔz gi dɔŋdi hi warige
a nɔ mɔ gis dood hindɔk hi ya̧a̧daanik nɔ?
Gii ta̧a̧hi
a nɛya nɛ dag gbɔnɔ an nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ yaat nɛ a Bɛt wáát du, hii be, hí dāg gbɔnɔ anbɔ gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ gin hinza, hi gaag zaa ha gi daarlɛlɛ; za̧a̧nyɔ taan nɛ hinza gɛ be, gi gin nɛ fɛŋ be hi loo fɛŋwaa bɔ da gin nɛ hɛw.
Hinɔ gii be gis dood hindɔk hi ya̧a̧daaniki anyɔ hi seeko wɛɛ hi gbɛn gɛ, wɛɛ hi lako hi taa kɛŋko.
Hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya raa tursihi anyɔ lɛ: a Bɛt raa a nɛ gbor lako, wɛɛ nɛ kɛ̄ŋ gɛ, nɛ seeko, wɛɛ nɛ́ gbɛn gɛ.

Ya̧a̧nɛ dood wɛrɛ kpoosya̧ ɓaaɓa. Hi zug tɔnya̧ be, hi ims lɔlya̧ be, an bɔ yɔ̧lya̧ gi gbɛn hinɛ, an bɔ tɔnya̧ gi lag hinɛ, an bɔ mɔkilya̧ gi mɛɛ hinɛ, an bɔhi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi zaa beege an be za̧a̧sihi.
Yɛrɛ nɛnɛ nɛ gin hato, lɔl nɛ gi gbɛnik hinɛ, wɛɛ tɔn nɛ gi kɛŋk hinɛ. Yɔ anbɔ, hat gi a nɛɛge!
Be gisin raak rɔbo: Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya kittɔnɔ hi dood riitɛ zaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi ɓɛɛ an hi gbɛn hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnko, wɛɛ hi gbɛn gɛ; an hi kɛm hinyɔ nɛ kɛŋko wɛɛ hi kɛŋ gɛ.
Yeesu a ɓaan tɔn nɛ nɛ kɛm ya̧a̧daanik bɔ hinɔ a bakbalkya zulha.
Dood wɔ hi lak hi book Bɛt wáát dɔgl hi kɛm hinɔ gɛ hi riitin an gbɔnɔya̧ yɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧t kpɔm ge: Saydanu gɔ zaa wɔɔd Bɛt dɔgl yɔ lugiy a hi kpoos du renɔ.
Dood zaadɛ hi riitin an betwaat lɛlyɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧t kpɔm ge: doodya̧ hii gɔ kɛm Bɛt dɔgl bɔ hi ta̧a̧g hi kpoos du nɔɔktɔnɔ hi hato.
Wɛɛ hi ɔ̄ɔ̄ Bɛt dɔgl bɔ yaa yɛ̧ɛ̧sɔ hi kpoos du gɛ, hi ɗɔbs dɔgl bɔ am kaasi, ya̧a̧rhant gɔ bɛɛsihi tuuruko hi zɛksil a Bɛt dɔgl bɔ dɔŋgɔ hi ɔɔ ɗɔbsugɔ nɔɔktɔnɔ.

Dood zaadɛ hi riitin hi hɛbt yɔ dag dɔ̧ɔ̧t a tɛ̧ɛ̧ kobsya tees du: dood wɔrɔ lab hii gɔ kɛm Bɛt dɔglɔ hi kpoos du, rɔɔs maatilɔ hi hinyɔ gɔ hi zɛksin zulya̧ a waal du hi zaa hi yɛ̧g Bɛt dɔgl bɔ hi kpoos du, Bɛt dɔgl bɔ wɛɛ wōō hinza ma gɛ.
Dood zaadɛ hi dag dɔ̧ɔ̧t a hɛbt rɔb lɛl du: dood wɔrɔ lab hii gɔ lag Bɛt dɔglɔ hi kɛm hi kpoos du hi ɗɔbsɔ; hii gɔ hum ɗɔbsil huml yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ, zaa dumbili nɔɔngbunu, zaabe dumbili taarɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ fɔksihi ya̧a̧daanik za dɔgl anyɔ lɛ:
a hinyɔ riitin hi Bɛt wáátɔ dɔgl gɛrɛ: za̧a̧n za re dɔ̧ɔ̧ hindɔ̧ɔ̧t rɔb a gi bak du,
yɔ dood hi yok a yɛms du, za̧a̧n za yɔ gig lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nuko loo kagi kam da lug a bak bɔ za̧a̧n bɔ lug nɛ tot rɔb gedu wɛɛ wɛɛ gi lɛlɛ.
Yɔ tot rɔbɛ wɔ hi pirɔ hí hɔɔ hí wɛɛ hi hibɔ hí kɛ̧ɛ̧ lɔlɛ, kag wɔ hi mid be.
Woosya wɔ hi rek hi gbɛnɔ hi zaa hi war bakzulya bɔ a ɗɛntyɔ, nɛ mɔ lug nɛ ma tot rɔbɛ a mɔ bak du mi, nɛ kag wɔ hi fu̧u̧ ay be?
Gii ta̧a̧hi a za̧a̧n bɔ gib lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nik gii re gi lug kag wɔrɔ. Woosya wɔ hi wɛɛ hi warige a nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ an wi re wi dur kag wɔrɔ ya?
Gii ta̧a̧ a ewwee! An nɛ rek nɛ dur kag wɔ, yɔ nɛ dur tot rɔbɛ dur du hɛw.

Ɔɔnɛhi hi ram hi tot rɔbɛ wɔ lɛlgbun sɛw gi tuur a totɓɛs du. Totɓɛs gɔ gi rii, be raa totɓɛrkya wɔ hi re hi dur kag wɔ hii doosi hi wɔb lɛlgbun sud an hi kpɔɔhi laa du. Kuudu hi kam tot rɔbɛ wɔ hi tɔ̧ɔ̧hi bil du.
Yeesu wɛɛ fɔksihi ya̧a̧daanik za ɓɛ anyɔ lɛ,
a Bɛt wáátɔ riitin hi sitahi lɛŋks yɔ doo za gɔ loo gi lug a bak du giya.
Sitahi lɛŋks bɔ dɛɛb daar hinza lɛŋks wɛ sɛw, gɔ pirɔ daar tɛ̧ɛ̧ dɛɛt wɛ sɛw. Gɔ tɔɔ nɔɔs hi zaa hi nɛbt zɛk gedu hi waa.
Yeesu wɛɛ dɔksihi ya̧a̧daanik za lɛ
a Bɛt wáátɔ riitin an hɛ̧ɛ̧t yɔ nis za loo gi goo a goonis du dɔɔ taarɛ gi ya̧a̧g hi zumɛ an gi ɗuksige.
Yeesu bons saal wɔ hin wɔrɔ sɛw hi ya̧a̧daanikyɔ; gɔ ɔ̄sihi hinza book hi ya̧a̧daanik gɛ.
Yeesu gi woonik hin hi ya̧a̧daanik bɔ anbɔ an hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ dɔg nɛ gi
a be boosihi hin hi ya̧a̧daanikyɔ, be dɔg hinyɔ yaat nɛ gi yɛɛl a waalkiŋk-ɔ̧ti.
Yɔ Yeesu yaa dood saal wɔ hi rekɔ gii wɛɛ gul raa du, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi hi warige,
a wadsiwi ya̧a̧daanik bɔ a kag wɔ bak du hi muulɛ wi kɛmɔ.
Yeesu goo
a za̧a̧nyɔ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧k dɔ̧ɔ̧t rɔbo, gɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ.
Bak bɔ be, gɛ waal du. Lɛŋks rɔbɛ wɔ be, gɛ dood wɔ gɔ hi tal a Bɛt wáát du. Kag wɔ be, gɛ dood wɔ hi gi doo bɔbtin bɔ ɔnɛ.
Za̧a̧n lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya bɔ lug kag be, gɛ loorɛha̧a̧lɛ; totɓɛs be, gɛ waalda̧a̧ki. Totɓɛsya wɔ be, gɛ Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ be.
Kag durk bɔ yaakɔ laa du, waalda̧a̧k gi gi anbɔ.
Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi yaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi ha̧sil dood wɔ hi yaak nayza hinha̧a̧l du hi wɔ hi wook hinha̧a̧lɛ,
hi gbalihi laazɛŋk du, hi gbuu kaalɛ, hi gboo nuŋgya̧ gedu.
Gɔ gi anbɔ dood riitɛ wɔ be, hí gáa an ɔ̧ti a Baaya̧ Bɛt wáát du. An za̧a̧nyɔ gin tɔnɛ gi kɛmɔ!
Bɛt wáátɔ riitin an rɔɔs yɔ hi yaat a bak za du. Za̧a̧nza gi zol gi yaatige. Hin harig gbɔɔltɔnɔ an gi re gi zebr hinyɔ gin nɛ sɛw gi dag tusɔ gi zaa gi zemn bak bɔ.
Bɛt wáátɔ dɔglɔ riitin hi wɔdriŋnikya yɔ gi ɓɛɛk root an gi zebɔ.
Yɔ gbɛn root za tusɔ gi an gi dag hinza ha gbɔɔltɔnɔ, ɗun rek zebr hinyɔ gin nɛ sɛw, wɛɛ zaa zeb root bɔ hi wɔdɔ wɔ tusɔ dagzɔ.
Bɛt wáátɔ dɔglɔ riitin hɛw an zagr yɔ doo za gɔ gbal a mɛmbal gbɔɔl du gi tunz dut dɔ̧ɔ̧t yɔ gi sɛw.
Zagr bɔ hi̧i̧sɔ, dutwa̧a̧kya wɔ hi diz a mɛmbalya̧ di hi ɗɔɔt hi ha̧sil dut wɔ a zagr bɔ gedu. Hi yaa dut rɔbɛ wɔ dɛl du, hi wɛɛ hi bisil dut ha̧a̧l wɔ mɛmbal du.
Hinɔ gi gi anbɔ a waalda̧a̧ki: Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi zaa hi ha̧sil dood ha̧a̧l wɔ a dood rɔbɛ wɔ hi tees du.
Hi loo dood ha̧a̧l wɔrɔ hi yaahi a laazɛŋk du. Hi gbuu kaalɛ hi wɛɛ hi gboo nuŋgya̧ gedu.
Yeesu war walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a nɛ kɛm hin wɛrɛ sɛw ya?
Hi ta̧a̧
a hɔɔ, wi kɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ!
Wɛɛ
a yɔ anbɔ, Bɛtmaak-dɔkya yɔ hi gogsig Bɛt wáátɔ dɔgl gi fɔk sɛw riitin an za̧a̧n za rɔɔszulya yɔ gi tuusig hin seg hi hin wɔm a rɔɔsɔ bɔ gedu.
Yɔ Yeesu da̧a̧s ya̧a̧daanik wɔrɔ bookɔ ɗund hɔdi,
rek a waal bɔ da tɔɔz nɛ gedu. Wɛɛ da yɛls dood hingok a mɔksillukya̧ bɔ gedu. Yɔ hingokɔ bɔ kɔms dood wɔ hi gi di sɛw gɛrsɛ hi watinu
a hinmɛɛk wɛrɛ hi tɛŋk bɔ an gi woo gɛrs wɛrɛ hi gisig fu̧u̧zig ay?
Yusufu tɛ̧ɛ̧hɛɛkya bɔ waawal gii yɔ gɛ ya? Nɛ nɔɔtɔ gii Mariyama ma mi? Yakuba hi Yusufu hi Simɔŋ hi Yahuda hi taa yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ ya?
Nɛ siŋdɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛw hi waak wɛ teesdu dihɛ ma mi? Zɛm tɛŋk bɔ ay nɔ?
Hin wɔrɔ hi dɔkt lab gii aanihi Yeesu ɗɔbsugo. Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ
a hi ta̧a̧k Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya a lɛlza sɛw, wɛɛ gi waal du, a doodɔ hi teesdu hi gig lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nuko.
Yeesu wōō gɛrs kit hɔ gɛ, anyɔ hi tā̧a̧g ɗɔbsig gɛ.
A ɔ̧tɔ ge waar gbɔɔl bɔ Hirudus a Galile yɔ lag hi book Yeesu nuŋgɔ lɛl sɛwi,
raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ ga! Rɛml a wɔrkɛ tees du! Hinɔ gii tɛŋk wɛrɛ hi midig lab a gi naan du.
Yɔ anbɔ, Hirudus da raa nɛ dood hi wa̧a̧ Yohana hi wɔge hi yaage a luknɔ du a yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Filib nistɔ Hiruduya dɔŋgɔ,
anyɔ da Yohana raa Hirudus
a rı̄ı̄ an mɔ loo yɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ nisɔ an nis mɔ gɛ.
Yɔ Hirudus ha̧a̧g nɛ an gi gbɔm Yohana be, yɔ mɛɛ a dood hi gig seek an Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya yɔ hoobha̧a̧gha̧ naan yaak gi muulɛ.
Yɔ Hirudus naab wɛlɔ yɔ hi mɔɔg gedu tuurɔ, nis bɔ Hiruduya waasiŋ zaa nabhin a dood rɔ̀bɛ wɔ hi lɔlgbar sɛw. Yɔ Hirudus gbɛn anbɔ kpoosɔ gi harige,
raa hi hindɛŋgliki
a be gaag hinyɔ gɔ gi warib sɛw.
An hinyɔ nɔɔtɔ sɔmbinge wawa bɔ rek warige
a gaabe Yohana zulɔ bɔ gii a hɛb du.
Yɔ waar bɔ lag anbɔ kpoosɔ ɗɔɔbɔ; hɔnɛ a hinyɔ dɛŋgl geha sɛwi, hi a dood rɔ̀bɛ wɔ hi dɔŋgo, raa dood an hi gaage.
Yaa doo za rek dɛ̧ɛ̧z Yohana zulɔ bɔ a luknɔ du,
hi kamz hɛb du hi zaa hi gaa wawa bɔ kam a nɔɔtɔ ge.
Yɔ Yohana walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi lag anbɔ hi zaa hi loo Yohana wɔrkɔ bɔ hi rek hi i̧i̧ gɔ. Hi rek hi raas Yeesu dɔglɔ be.

Yɔ Yeesu kɛm dɔgl bɔrɔ ɗun hɔdi rek a mɛmbalya̧, da kar lɛmb du rek lɛlza dɔɔmi gi gbunu. Hɔnɛyɔ dood saal wɔ hi kɛm anbɔ hi tuuz a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ hi du hi ren dɔɔ hi daa gbɔnɔ a mɛmbalya̧ hi fɔ Yeesu.
Yɔ sil a lɛmb du gi gbɛn saal kitɛ wɔrɔ, mɛɛsihi ya̧a̧rɛ za̧a̧s gumtilya̧ wɔ hi kamsig nɛ be.
Yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ, walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi zaa Yeesu ge hi
a nɛ lɛl gi bulik be, wɛɛ lɛlyɔ di hɛtdɔŋ be, yaam dood saal wɛrɛ hi rek a raat dɛɛt wɔ du an hi zebz leesɛ.
Yeesu
a taa an hi rekɔ; nɛɛ hi zul nɛ gaanɛhi leesɛ.
Wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ hi googe
a gɛ wi gin kok kiml nɔɔn dihɛ hi dut eerɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a kamsinbe kok bɔ hi dut bɔ hɛdi.
Wɛɛ raa dood saal wɔ hi ɗɔɔt a hɛtyɛ̧s ha. Wɛɛ loo kok kiml nɔɔn wɔ hi dut eerɛ wɔ pɛɛ lɔl wɛɛha baan Bɛto. Ɓɛɛl kok kiml wɔ gaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧s dood saal wɔ.
Dood wɔ sɛw hi le kok wɔ hi hi̧i̧. Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi mɔks kok ɓɛɛkil wɔ hi zɛ̧ɛ̧r dɛl koobl daa eerɛ.
Walɛ wɔ hi le kok wɔ sɛw kitigya̧ gi an duk nɔɔnɛ. Nɛɛd wɔ hi waat wɔ hi ɓɛrihi gɛ.
Kuudu Yeesu wɛɛ fɛ̧ɛ̧ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi kar lɛmb du hi dor a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaa bɔ ge an gii gi yaak saal wɔ kuudu be.
Yɔ yaa saal wɔ gi da̧a̧, gii wɛɛ da dɔɔ a ga̧a̧t ha gi gbunu an gi zɔ̧ Bɛto. Yɔ yɛ̧ms bulɔ gi a ga̧a̧t bɔ hage gi gbunu.
Lɛmb bɔ hɛmlɔ gi a mɛmbal teesdu, yɔ zɛk gi fɛko, gi a̧a̧nik lɛmb rekɔ doosɛ, mɛmɗukil wɔ hi gig zɛksig be.
A bi̧i̧l ɗɔbt du Yeesu ɛmz a mɛm bɔ hage zaa a walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi a lɛmb du.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gbɛnig gi zaak a mɛm bɔ hage kol tuuhitu, hi raa a ɗoodyɔ. Yɔ hoobha̧a̧hi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, hi ɓoo kaalɛ.
Hɔnɛ ɓɔrbɔ Yeesu
a beya, ɓaasin kpoos nɛ, bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ!
Piyɛr wɛɛ
a Waar i, gid mɔya, raabe be re be dagumɔ a mɛm bɔ hage.
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a nɛ zaamɔ.
Piyɛr sil a lɛmb bɔ gedu ɛmb rek a Yeesu ge a mɛm bɔ hage.
Hɔnɛyɔ gbɛn zɛk gi fɛk ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hoobha̧a̧gha̧, wɛɛ baar iŋk a mɛm du, ɓoo kaalɛ
a Waar i, za̧a̧sibe!
Ɓɔrbɔ Yeesu yɔd naanɔ wa̧a̧ge
a hey! mɔɔ doo ɗɔbsigkaasiya, nɔ mɔ faa nɔ?
Hi wɛɛ hi kar a lɛmb du hi eer sɛw zɛk bɔ wɛɛ erɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ walɛsɛrɛ zaadɛ wɔ hi gi a lɛmb bɔ gedu hi wɛɛ hi zagl a Yeesu muutdu hi ɗɔbsige hi
a hi rɔbo mɔ gi Bɛt Waayɔ!
Yɔ Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi kar mɛmbal bɔ gi da̧a̧ hi tuur a Gerezanɛ hɛbt du, hi silɔ.
Dood wɔ hi gi a lɛl bɔ ge hi bɛɛ Yeesu gbɛnik hi mɛɛge, hi rek hi raam ramsɔ a lɛl sɛw. Yɔ dood wɔ hi lag anbɔ hi kamsig gumtil kit wɔ,
hi zɔ̧ge an gi ɔɔhi hi ki̧i̧ gbandilɔ tɔlya̧ bɔ mɔɔti an hi za̧a̧. Dood wɔ hi gig ki̧i̧k sɛw hi za̧a̧za̧.
Farisaya zaadɛ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya zaadɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Urusalima hi zaa hi zɛm Yeesu hi warige
a nɔ walɛsɛrɛ mɔ wɔ hi fɔ̄b maak yɔ ɗɛntɛ hi gog gɛ hi hinlek hi naan ɓi̧i̧lim nɔ?
Yeesu wɛɛ goohi
a nɛɛ be, nɔ nɛ fɔ̄b maakdɔgl yɔ Bɛt gaa gɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ fɔk maakdɔgl yɔ ɗɛntɛ nɛ hi goksin giya?
Bɛt raa be a ɗɔbsum baa mɔ hi nàà mɔ; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi nii baatɔ zaabe nɔɔtɔ hi gbɔŋge.
Yɛrɛ nɛ hinza goko a doo gi raa baatɔ, zaa lab gɛ nɔɔtɔ a rɔɔs yɔ gɔ be ɓeg nɛ an be ɗansumɔ hi gbaas Bɛt ga, za̧a̧nɔ gi raa anbɔ taa an gi ɗɔbs baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ.
Nɛ gɔ nɛ ha̧tirgo Bɛt dɔgl tɛŋkɔ anyɔ ro hi maakdɔgl nɛ bɔ.
Nɛɛ dood mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, Esaya dɔg rɔbo a nɛ zulha gi raa
a Bɛt raa a dood wɛrɛ hi gib ɗɔbsig hi dɔgl tɔsyɔ, wɛɛ kpoosya̧ hɛml hi beya.
Hi gib ɗɔbsig di tɔs, hi gok dɔgl yɔ dood hi ɔɔnihi gii an hinɔ gi Bɛt dɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ el dood saal wɔ
a ɓaan tɔn nɛ nɛ kɛm hinyɔ be dɔko.
Hinyɔ gi gulk a doo ya̧a̧ du wɛɛnig ɓi̧i̧lumya gɛ, hinyɔ gi tuuzig doo kpoos du gii gig ɓi̧i̧luko.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi sɔɔ Yeesu ge hi warige
a mɔ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ a Farisaya wɔ hi kɛm hin bɔrɔ anbɔ kpoosya̧ nɔɔhinɔ gɛ ya?
Gii goo
a Baa be yɔ gi a bɛtha tɛ̧ɛ̧ yɔ rɛɛ gɛ sɛw hi durige.
Ɔɔnɛhi hɔ! Hi gi yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ hi tɛlik yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ zaadɛ hiya. Yɔ̧ɔ̧r gi gi tɛlik yɔ̧ɔ̧r za, hi mat eer sɛw a zɛŋk du.
Piyɛr wɛɛ
a wadsiwi ya̧a̧daanik bɔrɔ hinɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a nɛ taan zul an nɛ kɛm hin bɔrɔ te ya?
Nɛ́ kɛ̄m a hinyɔ gi talik a ya̧a̧ du gii gi tiik a buudu gi wɛɛ gi tuuk a yaatillɛl du gɛ ya?
Yɛrɛ hinyɔ gi tuuzig a doo ya̧a̧ du gi gi fu̧u̧zig a gi kpoos du gii gi gaak doo ɓi̧i̧limi.
Mɔkil ha̧a̧l wɔ gi tuuk a doo kpoos du gɛrɛ: zulgbɔŋki, mansi, ɓi̧i̧limi, luurɛ, ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ hi mɛlbooki.
Hinwɔ hi gi dood ɓi̧i̧lik hii wɔ. Hinlek hi naan libto ɓı̧̄ı̧̄l doo gɛ.
Yeesu ɗund hɔdi rek a Tirus hi Sidɔŋg hɛbto.
Nɛɛ za Kananaya yɔ gi waak a lɛl bɔ ge zaa a ge ɓooya̧a̧
a Waar i, Dawda Waawalɔ, mɛɛsibe ya̧a̧rɛ! Waa be siŋg gin loorɛha̧a̧l a gi muul du, gig ha̧a̧nik ya̧a̧r ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu goo hinza fɛŋ mɔɔt gɛ be, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi zaa hi
a yaamɔge gi rekɔ, giwɛ kaal fɔmnzugo.
Gii wɛɛ ta̧a̧ raa
a hi yaazib an be tɛb tam wɔ hi wag a Israhila hii kpɔd.
Nis bɔ zaa zagl a Yeesu muutdu raa
a Waar i, ɗaasibe!
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧
a bɛ̄r an hi loo ya̧a̧mwaat leesɛ hi bits kaa gɛ.
Nis bɔ wɛɛ goo
a hɔɔ, Waar i, mɔ dɔg rɔbo! Yɛrɛ kaa wɔ hi lek lees rumnt wɔ hi mɛɛlik a ɗɛntya̧ silya̧ di gii hɛw.
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧ge
a eh! Naadyɔ, ɗɔbsig mɔ daar lɛl gɔ! Hinyɔ mɔ ɛrɔ mɔ daagɔ.
Nis bɔ waasiŋ za̧a̧ gɔ ɓɔrbɔ be.
Yɔ Yeesu ɗund hɔdi gi rek a Galile mɛmbalya̧ da kar ɗɔɔt a ga̧a̧t ha.
Dood saal gbɔlɛ hi zaa a ge hi kamsig gumtil kittɔnɔ, dɔɔ ɓɛrkilya wɔ be, yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ be, dɔɔ duulya wɔ be, su̧u̧kɛ wɔ be hi gumtil zaadɛ sɔmsɔm hi zaa hi gihi gbaak a Yeesu dɔɔ dɔŋdi gihi za̧a̧sugo.
Dood wɔ hi gbɛn su̧u̧kɛ wɔ hi ya̧a̧booko, dɔɔ wɔlya wɔ be dɔɔya̧ wɛɛ gɛmsɔ, dɔɔ gumtilya wɔ be hi wɛɛ hi ɛmbuko, yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ be hi gbɛnik lɔl be. Yɔ hin kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ, hi baan Israhila Bɛtɔ gɔ.
Yeesu el walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a dood wɛrɛ hi ha̧a̧sib ya̧a̧rɛ, anyɔ hi gihi bee ɔ̧t taarɛ hi taan lees an hi le, wɛɛ hā̧ā̧be an be yaahi a̧a̧kil hi matil a gbɔnɔ di gɛ.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi warige
a gi an wi zɛm kokɔ ay wi gaa dood saalzanɔ yɛrɛ gi riihi a hɛt dɔŋdu hɛ nɔ?
Yeesu wɛɛ ɛrihi
a nɛ gin kok kiml baari?
Hi ta̧a̧
a nɔɔn-erɛ hi dut dɛɛt kaasi.
Wɛɛ raa dood saal wɔ hi ɗɔɔt a hɛbtdi.
Loo kok kiml nɔɔn-er wɔ hi dut wɔ baan Bɛto, ɓɛɛlɔ gaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧s dood saal wɔ.
Dood sɛw hi le kok bɔ hi hi̧i̧. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi mɔks kok ɓɛɛkil wɔ hí le gí zɛ̧ɛ̧r dɛl hi̧i̧sil nɔɔn-eerɛ.
Walɛ wɔ hi le kok wɔ sɛw kitigya̧ gi duk nasɔ. Hí ɓɛr nɛɛd wɔ hi waat wɔ kitigya̧ gɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu yaa saal wɔ gi da̧a̧, re kar lɛmb du da rek a Magadaŋ hɛbto.
Farisaya wɔ hi Sadukiya wɔ hi zaa a Yeesu ge an hi tolige hi dɔglɛ;
hi zɔ̧ge an gi woo hinmɛksingoya gi zuun a tɛŋkɔ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge.
Yeesu goohi
a ɔ̧t gɔ gi leko, nɛ raako a bɛtha hoobɔ, yoosig lɛl gi bɛrɔ.

Gɔ gi bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ, nɛ dɔko a nɛɛk ha̧a̧g naŋkyɔ, bɛtha hoobɔ, wɛɛ kuus gi bɛtha ɓilkumɓilkum. Nɛya nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ bɛtha woosɔ gɛ̧ksugo, nɛ wɛ̄ɛ̄ nɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ hinwɔ hi tuurik a ɔ̧ti gi zul woosya̧ gii gɛ̧ksig gɛ ya?
Nɛ dood ha̧a̧l wɔ nɛ waak ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ nɛ ɔɔ Bɛto an nis yɔ gi naakmansi nɛ ɛrk gɛrsɛ, gɛrs za taasin tuuko, gɛ Zonas gɛrsɔ bɔ zunsin kpɔd.
Wɛɛ ɔɔhi dihɔ wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ reekɔ.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi tal hi tuur a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaabɔ ge, hi mɛks a hi zɛ̧ɛ̧n kokya̧ looko.
Yeesu
a oon zul nɛ hi Farisaya wɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧tya̧ hi Sadukiya wɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧tya̧.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi watin hi teesdu
a yɔ gi dɔk anbɔ yɔ wɛ zɛn kok wɛ loozig giya.
Yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ gi kpoos du anbɔ warihi
a nɔ nɛ watingo a nɛ teesdu a nɛ taan kok nɔ? Nɛɛ dood ɗɔbsigya kaasiya wɛ!
Nɛ́ kɛ̄m hinza gɛ te ya? Nɛ́ mɔ̄k nɛ mɛɛ kok kiml nɔɔn wɔ be ɓɛls dood duk nɔɔn wɔ hi kok ɓɛɛkil dɛl hi̧i̧sil kit wɔ nɛ tuut gɛ ya?
Nɛ́ mɔ̄k nɛ mɛɛ kok kiml nɔɔn-er wɔ be ɓɛls dood duk nas wɔ hi kok ɓɛɛkil dɛl hi̧i̧sil kit wɔ nɛ tuut gɛ ya?
Ri nɛ kɛms nɛ hinɔ a be taasin book kok kiml dɔgl gɛ? Yɛrɛ oon zul nɛ hi Farisaya wɔ hi Sadukiya wɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧tya̧.
Kuudu walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi kɛm gɔ a Yeesu
Yɔ Yeesu re gi tuurik a Kaysariya-Filipi waal gbɔɔl dɔŋdi war walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a dood hi raak nɔ a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi zulha nɔ?
Hi goo
a dood zaadɛ hi raako a mɔɔ Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ, zaadɛ hi raak be a mɔ Eliya giya,
zaadɛ hi wɛɛ hi raak a mɔɔ Zeremi, zaadɛ be a gi lab gɛ mɔ gi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ zaaya̧ gbunyɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ warihi
a nɛɛ be, nɛ raak a bee bɔ?
Simɔŋ yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Piyɛr wɛɛ goo
a mɔɔ Masihu bɔ, mɔɔ gi Bɛt Za̧a̧til bɔ bɛtha Waawalɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a hat gi a mɔɔ, Zonas waawal Simɔŋ; Baa be yɔ bɛtha gii goksum hinɔ, doo a hɛbtdi goksum hinɔ gɛ.
Yɛrɛ bee be gisum raak a nuŋg mɔ gi a Piyɛr. Wɛɛ a hɛɛl bɔ geha bé wɔm fɔkya be wɔ ɔksilya̧ yɔ wɛɛsib an luko. Wɔrk hi zulɔ tɛŋkɔ taag ɗɛɛk nɛ zaŋ.
Bé gaamɔ Bɛt wáát gboorinsɔya. Hinyɔ gɔ mɔ wɔb a hɛbtdi hinɔ gi wɔy a bɛtha be, hinyɔ gɔ mɔ pid a hɛbtdi sɛw hinɔ gi pid a bɛtha be.
Kuudu Yeesu wɛɛ naa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a bɔhi raas doo za a bee gi Masihu bɔ.

Yɔ a ɔ̧tɔ ge anbɔ Yeesu yɛls ma walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ dɔgl gaasigyɔ, a gi an be rek a Urusalima an be yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant gbɔɔltɔnɔ a Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi naandu. Hi gbɔ̧be, be wɛɛ be rɛmlɔ be ɗund a ɔ̧t taasimɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ Piyɛr tɔrig aakil du da biglige
a kay! Waar i, an Bɛt gi a̧a̧nɔ an bɔ hinɔ gi tursum nɛ zaŋ!
Yeesu wɛɛ zɛmrɔ raa Piyɛr
a wɛɛm be kuudu, Saydanu! Mɔ ɓɛɛk an mɔ matib a hinha̧a̧l du. Mɔ́ mɔ̄khin an Bɛt gɛ, mɔ mɔkig an dood her.
Wɛɛ zɛmr raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧ge an gi fɔbzibe gi ɔs zulɔ hinmɔkugɔ gi pɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧rɔ gi fɔbzibe.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g kolɔ za̧a̧sugo gi wagsige; za̧a̧nyɔ wags kolɔ a be dɔŋg be, gi zolige.
À za̧a̧nza dag nɛ waal sɛw ɔnɛ gi wɛɛ gi waks kolɔ, yɔ ɗaasig nɔ? Doo yɔ gàà nɔ an kolɔ gi za̧a̧ nɔ?
Gɔ gi anbɔ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi zaa gɔ a Baatɔ Bɛt gbɔlums du lɛlgbun hi Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ gi wɛns za̧a̧nyɔ woo hinɔ dɔɔrɔɔsɔ gbunu gbunu anyɔ woo nɛ be.
Be gisin raak rɔbo, dood zaadɛ wɔ hi erk dihɛ hi taa wɔrko, hi gbɛn Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaakɔ a gi waar ums du ketgba̧.
Kuudu ɔ̧t nɔɔn-gbunu Yeesu loo Piyɛr , Yakuba hi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Yohana ka̧hi a ga̧a̧t za hɔɔt ha mukya̧,
da zɛmr muulɔ a hi lɔlgbarɔ, muutɔ gaa an ɔ̧ti, gbandilɔ buu fɛr an lɛlgaalɛ.
Kuudu walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi gbɛn Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔrkɛ amntɛ wɔ Eliya hi Muusa hi ya̧a̧book hi Yeesu.
Yɔ Piyɛr gbɛn anbɔ ma raa Yeesu
a Waar i, yɔ wɛ gi dihɛ, bɛɛrɔ, gi ha̧a̧mɔ be ɗuks duul taarɛ, gbunu mɔnɛ, zaa gbunu Muusa ɔnɛ, zaa gbun be Eliya ɔnɛ.
Yɔ gi ya̧a̧boosig te, kuus gaati zaa yaatihi, hi wɛɛ hi lag ya̧a̧ za booy a kuus bɔ gedu
a yɛrɛ gi waa be wal yɔ ha̧a̧b ge hi kpoos be sɛw giya. Hat be sɛw gi a ge. Kɛmsinɛge!
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi lag ya̧a̧boon bɔrɔ anbɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧hi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, hi gbuut a hɛbtdi.
Yeesu sɔɔz ki̧i̧hi
a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ, ɗukin ha.
Yɔ hi pɛɛ lɔlya̧ wɛɛha hi gbɛ̄n doo za gɛ be, gɛ Yeesu gi gbunu.
Yɔ hi wɛɛ hi sizig a ga̧a̧t bɔ hage Yeesu
a hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnɔ bɔnɛ fɔks doo za, nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ buudu gi tuur an Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi rɛmlɔ gi ɗund a wɔrkɛ teesdu.
Walɛ-sɛrɛ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi war Yeesu
a nɔ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi dɔko a gi an Eliya gi zaa ket nɔ?
Gii goohi
a Eliya gi zaako an gi gɛms hin sɛw kete.
Yɛrɛ Eliya bɔ za̧a̧nɔ zaaza ma hɛw, wɛɛ dood hí mɛ̄ɛg gɛ be, hi gɔsig hinyɔ ha̧a̧hi. Hí wɛ̍ɛ̍ hi ha̧a̧n Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ ya̧a̧r anbɔ be.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi kɛm gɔ ma a gisihi book Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ dɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu tuur hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ a dood saal lɛl wɔ hi gi ge, wal za zaa a ge zagl gi muutdu,
a Waar i, mɛɛsum waa be wal ya̧a̧rɛ, gin zulnɔɔ, wɛɛ kosgumn gig tɔk ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ. Gɔ matig a laa du be, mɛm du be,
be kamzig a walɛsɛrɛ mɔ wɔ hi, hi ɗɛ̄ɛg za̧a̧sig gɛ.
Yeesu goo
a hey! nɛɛ dood ha̧a̧l wɔ nɛ waak a ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ nɛ ta̧a̧ ɗɔbsig gɛ, be kɔm ɔ̧t baari hi nɛɛ an be mɔm dɔgl nɛ nɔ? Kamsinbe waa bɔ hɛdi. Hi kamsig waa bɔ.
Wɛɛ ya̧a̧l loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ gi waa bɔ muul du, loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ tuu ɔɔ waa bɔ ɓɔrbɔ.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi sɔɔz Yeesu ge mukya̧ hi warige
a winɛ ri wi ɗɛɛ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔrɔ tuusig gɛ nɔ?
Wɛɛ goohi
a ɗɔbsig nɛ kooda. Be dɔksin rɔbo a à nɛ gin nɛ ɗɔbsig nɛ an sitahi lɛŋksɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ raa ga̧a̧t yɛrɛ a ha̧sum hɛdi mɔ rek hɔ, hinza yɔ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄nɛ gɛ, ga̧a̧t bɔ yɔ ha̧a̧sɔ. [
Yɛrɛ loorɛha̧a̧l wɔrɔ lab gɔ hi tuusihi hi Bɛt zɔ̧ki hi hinlilki kpɔd. ]
Ɔ̧tzayɔ Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi gi lɛlgbun a Galile hɛbt du, Yeesu dɔgsihi:
a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi gaay ma a dood naandu
an hi gbɔŋge, gi rɛml gi ɗund a ɔ̧t taasimɛ.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi lag anbɔ kpoosya̧ ɗɔb ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rek hi tuur a Kapɛr-nayum, Bɛtluk tooszekya wɔ hi sɔɔ a Piyɛr dɔŋdi hi warige
a ɗɛnt nɛ bɔ gɔ too Bɛtluk toos gɛ ya?
Piyɛr
a hɔɔ, gɔ gi tookto ro!
Yɔ Piyɛr gi gulk a luk du Yeesu baar warige
a Simɔŋ, mɔ mɔkig nɔ? Waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ a waal du dihɛ hi lootig hin hi tɛŋko, zaabe an toosɛ a bɔ ge nɔ? Hɛbtwaat gi gaak ya? Zɛ̧nɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z hɛbt za dɔɔm hii ya ri?
Piyɛr ta̧a̧
a dood zaadɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z hɛbt za dɔɔm hii gɔ gi tooko.
Yeesu raa
a nɛ gi gi anbɔ, hɛbtwaat wɔ hi taa tooko.
Yɛrɛ an bɔwɛ nɔɔsihi kpoosɛ, rekum a mɛmbal du mɔ gbal galo, dut biitir bɔ gɔ mɔ wa̧a̧ mɔ aa ya̧a̧ɔ mɔ́ zɛm tus gaat gbun yɔ gɔ gi rii toos benɛ hi mɔnɛ gedu, mɔ loo mɔ kamz mɔ gaahi.
Yɔ anbɔ a ya̧a̧gbun bɔ gedu walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi zaa Yeesu ge hi warige
a bɔ gi gbɔɔl gi daarlɛl a Bɛt wáát du nɔ?
Yeesu el waa za fɛŋ looge esig hi muutdu,
a be raasin rɔbo gid nɛ zɛmr kpoos nɛ nɛ wɛɛn zul nɛ fɛŋ an waat gɛ, nɛ taa gulk a Bɛt wáát du.
Za̧a̧ni wɛɛn zulɔ wɛɛdis an waa yɛrɛ, gi gbɔɔl gi daarlɛl a Bɛt wáát du.
Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ dag waa za an waa yɛrɛ lɛ a be dɔŋgo, dag beya hi zul be.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ mat waat wɛrɛ zaaya̧ gbun yɔ gib ɗɔbsugo a hinha̧a̧l du, à hi loo nɛ naalnɔɔ hi wɔbsig a durk du hi bisig a mɛmbal du gi wɔrɔ yɔ bɛsig gi daarɔ.
Ya̧a̧rhant gis waalɛ anyɔ gin hinwɔ gɔ hi matig dood a hinha̧a̧l du. Gi an hin dɔɔsiŋkya gi giro. Yɛrɛ ya̧a̧rhant gi a za̧a̧n yɔ woohin an dood zaadɛ hi simdɔɔ muulɔge.

Naan mɔ gi matum hinha̧a̧l du, zaabe dɔɔ mɔ gi matum a hinha̧a̧l du, dɛ̧ɛ̧m mɔ bisige, an mɔ gun naan gbunu zaabe dɔɔ gbunu a za̧a̧tig rɔb du daarɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ mɔ kɔm naan eerɛ zaalab gɛ hi dɔɔ eerɛ mɔ yaay a laazɛŋk yɔ gi waak faa gedu.
Gid lɔl mɔ gim matig a hinha̧a̧l du, wigumɔge mɔ bisige, an mɔ gul fɛŋki a za̧a̧tig rɔb bɔ gedu daarɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ mɔ kɔm hi lɔl eerɛ hi bisum a laazɛŋk du.
Yeesu
a oon zul nɛ an bɔnɛ see waat wɛrɛ zaaya̧ gbun an hintɔs. Ɔbe raasinɛ, waat wɔ Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ ya̧ hi waak erki a Baa be yɔ gi bɛtha gi muutdu hi gig seeko. [
Yɔ anbɔ, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaa an gi ɓɛɛ dood wɔ hi wagɔ gi za̧a̧sihi. ]
Nɛ mɔk ri? À za̧a̧n za gin tam yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ, zaa gbun gi wagɔ, taa an gi ɔɔ tam dumbili ɔnaangbun daatɔ ɔnaangbun wɔ a ga̧a̧t ha an gi re gi tɛbz gbun bɔ wag ya?
Be raasin rɔbo, à za̧a̧n bɔ wɛɛ gi zol tam gbun bɔ wagɔ, yɔ dag hat dɔŋgɔ ge yɔ daar hatɔ bɔ dag a tam dumbili naanza daatɔ naanza wɔ hi wagdir nɛ gɛ hi dɔŋg gɛ.
Gbunɔ be, Baa nɛ yɔ gi bɛtha hā̧ā̧ge an waat wɛrɛ zaaya̧ gbun gi wag gɛ.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ gi woo hinha̧a̧lɛ, rekum mɔ zɛŋge mɔ dɔksig a̧a̧bɔ yɔ woo nɛ watin hinɔ nɛ eerɛ; gi kɛmsumɔ, mɔ ɗaasig da̧a̧da̧.
Gi kɛ̄msum dɔgl mɔ bɔ gɛ, loom doo za gbunu, zaabe eerɛ hi ɔks hi mɔya, an dood segyaadɛ wɔ eerɛ, hi mɔɔ du taarɛ nɛ ɔks ya̧a̧ nɛ gbunu an segyaadɛ a dɔgl yɔ gɔ gi booy hage sɛw.
Gi kɛmsihi gɛ, rekum mɔ raas dood Bɛtfɔkya wɔ dɔglɔ; gi wɛɛ gi kɛms dood Bɛtfɔkya wɔ ya̧a̧ya̧ gɛ, gi ma an dooyɔ mɛ̄ɛ̄ Bɛt gɛ mɔ muutdu, zaabe an tooszekya mɔ muutdu.
Be raasin rɔbo: hinyɔ gɔ nɛ wɔb hɛbtdi sɛw gi wɔy a bɛtha be. Hinyɔ gɔ nɛ pid a hɛbtdi sɛw gi pid a bɛtha be.
Gbunɔ, be gisin raako, gid dood eerɛ a hɛbtdi a nɛ teesdu hi wɔ ya̧a̧ya̧ gbunu an hi zɔ̧ hinza a Bɛt ge, Baa be yɔ gi a bɛtha gi woosihi hinɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, lɛlyɔ dood eerɛ, zaa taarɛ hi mɔks ge a be nuŋg du, be gi hi teesdu.
Yɔ anbɔ Piyɛr zaa a Yeesu ge warige
a Waar i, naabeza gi gɔsib hinha̧a̧lɛ, be bitsig dɔɔ baari? Gi tuur dɔɔ nɔɔn-er ya?
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge
a ɛ̧-ɛ̧! Taa anbɔ, bé rāam a gi tuur dɔɔ nɔɔn-er kpɔd gɛ, mɔ́ bitsig gi tuur dɔɔ dumbili nɔɔn-erɛ dɔɔ nɔɔn-er be.
Ya̧a̧nɛ hin yɔ riitin hi wáát yɔ bɛtha gɛrɛ: hinɔ riitin hi doo za waar yɔ
gi baksig rɔɔsɔ hi gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ gid hi kamsig gbaarɔ za yɔ gii gig fɔk tus duk uznɛɛrɛ kooblɛ.
Wal bɔ taan tus an gi toos ɗɛntɔ bɔ tusɔ be; ɗɛntɔ bɔ raa a hi looge hi zebrig a doo za, hi wɛɛ hi zebr nistɔ hi waatɔ hi hinyɔ gin sɛw an tusɔ belk bɔ gi wɛɛzɔ.
Gbaar bɔ zaa zagl a ɗɛntɔ bɔ gi muutdu zɔ̧g
Ɗɛntɔ bɔ seesig ya̧a̧rɔ ɔsig belkɔ bɔ wɛɛ ɔɔg rekɔ.
Gbaar bɔ tuu rek dagtin hi naaza za gbaar yɔ gig tusbelk fɔk tus gaat gbunu. Wa̧a̧g durk du firige,
Naaza bɔ zagl gi dɔɔ dɔŋdi zɔ̧ge a mɔmsibe, be ɗɛl be toosumɔ!
Bɔrɔ iinɔ, wɛɛ looge yaage a luknɔ du gi oonik an gi toosig belkɔ bɔ.
Yɔ naaza gbaarɛ wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ kpoosya̧ gi ɗɔb ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi rek hi raas ɗɛntya̧ bɔ hinyɔ tal sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ gbaar bɔ ɗɛntɔ bɔ yaa doo za elz gbaar ha̧a̧l bɔ zaa
Nɛ yɛrɛ bɛr nɛ an mɔɔ be, mɔ mɛɛs namɔza gbaar bɔ ya̧a̧r anyɔ bee be mɛɛs nɛ mɔɔ ya̧a̧r be mi?
Yɔ hin nɔɔ ɗɛntɔ bɔ anbɔ looge gaag luknɔ-ookya wɔ naandu a luknɔ du gi tuur an gi toosig belk bɔ sɛw.
Yeesu wɛɛ dɔg goks ha a nɛɛ hɛw, gid nɛ tā̧ā̧ an nɛ bits nanza hinha̧a̧lɔ hi kpoos nɛ sɛw gɛ, Baa be yɔ gi bɛtha gi woosin anbɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu da̧a̧s dɔgl wɔrɔ bookɔ anbɔ ɔɔ Galile hɛbtɔ rek a Yahuduya hɛbt wel du a zɛɛ Urdum kasiŋ zaabɔ ge.
Dood saal kittɔnɔ hi fɔge, za̧a̧s gumtil wɔ a hi teesdu a lɛl bɔ ge be.
Yɔ Farisaya wɔ hi sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi an hi wa̧a̧nig dɔglɛ, hi warige
a maak wɛ gaa gbɔnɔ an doo gi hɛɛtin hi nisɔ a dɔgl za dɔŋg ya?
Yeesu wɛɛ goo
a nɛ́ zaŋga a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du a Za̧a̧n Kiŋkya bɔ kim walɔ hi nisɛ a waalyɛɛlik gɛ ya? Yɔ ki̧hi
a wal gi ɔɔ baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ gi ɔks hi nisɔ, hi eerɛ hi wɛɛ muul gbunu.
Yɔ anbɔ muulya̧ gɛ̧ɛ̧y eer gɛ, ɔks gi muul gbunu. Bɔ doo gi gɛ̧ɛ̧ hinyɔ Bɛt ɔksɔ.
Farisaya wɔ hi wɛɛ hi warige
a nɔ ɔn Muusa gi raa a doo gi gaa nisɔ ɗɛɛrwol hɛɛtinsya gi ɔɔg yaak nɔ?
Yeesu
a yɔ nɛ gin kpoos ɓaatil gii Muusa gi gaan gbɔnɔ an nɛ hɛɛtin hi nɛɛ nɛ. Yɛrɛ hin da taa anbɔ doosɛ.
Wɛɛ be raasinɛ, a za̧a̧nyɔ hɛɛtin hi nisɔ gi taa an doo za kɛsig gɛ, gi wɛɛ gi lootin hi nis za dɔɔmi, gɔ mansyɔ.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi
a wal dɔgl gi gi anbɔ a nisɔ gbaŋgi bɛ̄r ma an dood hi lootin gɛ si̧.
Yeesu goohi
a dood sɛw hi taan tɛŋk an hi ta̧a̧ hingok be yɛrɛ, gɛ dood wɔ Bɛt gaahi tɛŋk kpɔd.

Hinwɔ hi ya̧a̧nik dood an bɔhi lootinnu hi gi kittɔnɔ an wɛrɛ lɛ: dood zaadɛ hi giro, naaya̧ mɔɔhi sɔɔdɛ; zaadɛ be, dood wɛɛnihi sɔɔdɛ. Zaadɛ hi kɔm anbɔ hi loo nis gɛ a Bɛt wáát dɔŋgɔ. Za̧a̧nyɔ dɛɛ an gi kɛm hingok wɛrɛ be, gi kɛmɔ.
Dood hi kams Yeesu ya̧a̧mwaato an gi gbaasihi naan zulha gi rɔbsihi gi wɛɛ gi zɔ̧bsihi Bɛto. Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi za̧br waat kamzigya wɔ a Yeesu ge.
Yeesu raa
a ɔɔn ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ hi zaa a be, bɔnɛ a̧a̧nihi. Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt wáátɔ gi a wɔ hi riitin an ya̧a̧mwaat hi.
Wɛɛ gbaa naan a ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ hi zulha rɔbsihi wɛɛ ɗund rekɔ.
Wal za zaa a Yeesu ge warige
a Hingokya , be woo nɔ rɔbɔ an be dag za̧a̧tig faa nɔ?
Yeesu warige
a nɔ mɔ warib hinrɔb dɔglɛ? Za̧a̧n rɔb gi gbun kpɔd gɛ Bɛto. Gi ha̧a̧mɔ gulk a za̧a̧tig du, fɔm dɔglɔ wɔ gaa.
Wal bɔ warɔ
a dɔglya̧ gɛ nɔni?
Yeesu wɛɛ raa
a dɔglya̧ gɛrɛ a bɔmɔ gbɔm zulɛ; bɔmɔ naamansi; bɔmɔ looluurɛ; bɔmɔ gɔ̧ɔ̧s doo ya̧a̧;
ɗɔbsum baa mɔ hi naa mɔ. Gi ha̧a̧mɔ a namɔza muul an zul mɔ.
Walsɛr bɔ gòò
a be fɔb maak wɔrɔ sɛw, nɛ yɛrɛ zɛ̧rsib nɔ an be wɛɛ be woo ɓɛ?
Yeesu wɛɛ
a gi ha̧a̧mɔ an mɔ wɛɛ doo rɔb tib, rekum mɔ zebr hinwɔ mɔ gin sɛw, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧s ya̧a̧rya wɔ hin wɔ mɔ zebr tusɔ, ɓɔr mɔ dag rɔɔs yɔ gi a bɛtha. Gɔ gi kuudu, zaam mɔ fɔbzibe.
Yɔ walsɛr bɔ lag dɔgl wɔrɔ anbɔ gi gin rɔɔs gbɔɔltɔnɔ be, wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ rek hi mimlɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a be raasin rɔbo, ɓaaɓa, an doo rɔɔsya gi gul a Bɛt wáát du.
Be wɛɛ be gisin raak gɛrɛ ɓɛ a ɓaaɓa an gɛloba gi tal a zelgɔ̧ɔ̧s du, wɛɛ ɓaa daarlɛl zaŋ an doo rɔɔsya gi gul a Bɛt wáát du.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi lag hin bɔrɔ lab gi kɔmsihi gɛrs ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi warɔ
a nɛ à hinɔ anbɔ bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi za̧a̧ ma nɔ?
Yeesu wɛɛ seehi
a hin bɔ lab ɗɛɛ dood ɗɛɛ, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ Bɛt ɔnɛ gɛ. Bɛt ɗɛɛ hin sɛw.
Piyɛr wɛɛ warig
a kɛmɔ, wi ɔɔ hin sɛw wi fɔbz mɔya, wí da̍g nɔ hinɔ ma nɔ?
Yeesu wɛɛ

a be gisin raak rɔbo, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gɔ gi ɗɔɔt a waar ums leeso gbɔɔl ha a waal seg du, nɛɛ yɔ nɛ fɔbzibe, nɛ ɗɔɔt a waar ums leeso koobl daa eer ha an nɛ gbaas dood Israhilaya dɔ̧ɔ̧tya̧ koobl daa eer wɔ dɔgl be.
Dood wɔ gɔ hi ɔz raatya̧, hindaya̧, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛya̧, siŋgdɛya̧, baaya̧, naaya̧, waatya̧, zaa bakya̧ a be dɔŋgo, hi dag hin wɔrɔ gi daar yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔn hɛw hi wɛɛ hi dag za̧a̧tig faa bɔ be.
Yɛrɛ dood kit wɔ hi gi doosɛ hi wɛɛ kuudɛ, wɛɛ kuudɛ wɔ hi wɛɛ doosɛ be.
Yɔ anbɔ be, Bɛt wáátɔ riitin an wal za raatya yɔ tuu bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ an gi tɛb doodɛ gi loohi woosɛ hi basig tɛ̧ɛ̧huml bakɔ.
Yɔ dag dood wɔ hi watin gi da̧a̧ a tus gaat gbunu gbunu ha an gi toohi ɔ̧t nuŋgo yaahi bak du an hi rek hi balɔ.
Za̧a̧n bakya bɔ wɛɛ tuu bi̧i̧l du a kusaal ɓaat du, gbɛn dood zaadɛ hi erkig a luumha tɔs.
a nɛya, rekin be bak du nɛ basib hin be toon anyɔ. Wɔrɔ hi rek woos bɔ a bak bɔ gedu hi wooko.
Za̧a̧n bakya bɔ wɛɛ tuu a lurk teesdu, wɛɛ tuu ɓɛ a naaba̧a̧n du, woo anbɔ ɓɛ.
Yɔ̧ɔ̧sumɔ wɛɛ tuu a lɛɛsig-gbarya̧ di zɛm dood zaadɛ hi erkig a luumha ɓɛ, warihi a nɔ nɛ erkig dihɛ lurknɔ gbɔɔl tɔs nɔ?
Wɔrɔ hi ta̧a̧ a nɛ doo za loowi woos gɛ be, wi gɔ nɔ? Gii goohi a nɛ bɛɛrɔ! Nɛ yɛrɛ rekin be bak du nɛ woosib hin hɛw.
Yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ, bakya bɔ raa gbɔɔlɔ zaa bɔ fɔg di a rekum mɔ elz woosya wɔ bak du mɔ toohi tusya̧ ma. Mɔ bààr mɔ too wɔ hi zaa woos kuudu, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ too wɔ hi doz woos du.
Dood wɔ hi baar woos a lɛɛsigya̧ di hi zaa hi toohi tus gaat gbunu gbunu.
Wɔ hi doz nɛ woos du hi zaa be, hi mɔk a ya̧nɛ hi dag gi daarɔ. Yɔ anbɔ hi toohi, bɔbe dag tus gaat gbunu gbunu.
Yɔ hi look tus bɔ hin nɔɔhi a za̧a̧n bakya bɔ ge,
hi
Bakya bɔ ta̧a̧ zaa gbunu a sa̧a̧ɔ, bé gɔ̄sum ha̧a̧l gɛ. Yɔ wɛ watinu mɔ ta̧a̧ a be woo ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw a tus gaat gbun ha gɛ ya, taa lab ya?
Loom tus mɔ mɔ rekɔ. Yɛrɛ ha̧a̧be an be too wal yɔ be loozig woos kuudu an mɔɔ hɛw.
Be taan gbɔnɔ an be woo hinyɔ ha̧a̧be hi tus be ya? Yɔ be gi doo rɔb gii mɔ gin kubl be zulha ya ri?
Yeesu wɛɛ
a yɔ anbɔ, wɔ hi gi kuudɛ hi wɛɛ doosɛ, doosɛ wɔ be hi wɛɛ kuudɛ be.
Anyɔ Yeesu gi dɔɔk a Urusalima, loo walɛsɛrɛ wɔ koobl daa eer mukya̧
a yɛrɛ wɛ dɔɔk gɛrɛ a Urusalima, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi gaay ma a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi naandu an hi gbaasig dɔgl gi wɔrɔ,
hi wɛɛ hi gaage dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi naandu hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lige, hi lɛge hi wɛɛ hi dooge a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha; gi wɛɛ gi rɛml a wɔrk du gi ɗund a ɔ̧t taasimɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ Zebede nistɔ zaa Yeesu ge hi waatɔ walɛ wɔ elo, zagl gi muutdu zɔ̧g hinɛ.
Yeesu warige
a ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ?
Nis bɔ goo
a raamɔ an waat be eerɛ wɛrɛ, gbunu gi ɗɔɔt a mɔ naanrɔbo, zaa gbunu gi ɗɔɔt a mɔ naanyɛ̧li, a mɔ wáát du.
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧
a nɛ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ nɛ ɛrk gɛ. Nɛ ɗɛɛ an nɛ yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant a dakwaa ya̧a̧rhantya bɔ gɔ be yɔ̧ gedu ya?
Hi goo
a wi ɗɛɛɗɛ.
Yeesu goohi
a oo, nɛ yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant bɔ a dakwaa be bɔ gedu. Yɛrɛ bé dāg gbɔnɔ an be gaa dood ɗɔɔtillɛl a be naanrɔbo hi a be naanyɛ̧l gɛ. Ɗɔɔtillɛl wɔrɔ, Baa be Bɛt gii gɛmsihi, gi wɛɛ gi gaa dood wɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧hi.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ koobl wɔ hi kɛm dɔgl bɔrɔ kpoosya̧ nɔɔhinɔ a Zebede waatɔ eerɛ wɔ hi muulɛ.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ elihi
a nɛ mɛɛ a dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi teesdu waar ɛ gbɔlɛya̧ wɔ hi gisihi waar ums zuunuko, dood gbɔlɛya̧ wɔ hi gisihi tɛŋk zuunik be.
Taa an hinɔ gi gi anbɔ nɛ teesdu; yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧ge an gi wɛɛ gbɔɔl a nɛ teesdu, gi wɛɛsin woosya̧ nɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧ge an gi wɛɛ zul a nɛ teesdu be gi wɛɛsin gbaar nɛ walɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zāā an dood hi woosigwoos gɛ, gii ɔnɛ zaa an gi woohinɛ gi wɛɛ gi gaa kolɔ gi wɔr an i̧i̧nisɛ an gi za̧a̧s dood kit a hinha̧a̧l du be.
Yɔ Yeesu gi tuuzig a Zeeriko hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ, dood saal kittɔnɔ hi fɔbzige.
Yɔ yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ eerɛ wɔ hi ɗɔɔt a gbɔnɔya̧ hi lag a Yeesu gi daako, hi ɓooya̧a̧
a Hingokya , Dawda Waawalɔ, mɛɛsiwi ya̧a̧rɛ!
Dood saal wɔ hi ya̧a̧l yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ an hi waks ya̧a̧ya̧ɓoolik bɔ. Hii be hi wɛɛ hi ɓoolya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ
a Hingokya , Dawda Waawalɔ, mɛɛsiwi ya̧a̧rɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Yeesu erɔ elihi warihi hinɔ
a ha̧a̧nɛ an be woosin nɔ?
Hi googe
a Hingokya gɔsuwi an lɔl wi gi gaa wi gbɛnɔ.
Yɔ wɔrɔ hi ha̧a̧s Yeesu ya̧a̧rɛ ki̧i̧ lɔlya̧ bɔ; ɓɔrbɔ dood eerɛ wɔ hi gbɛnlɔlɛ hi wɛɛ hi fɔge.
Yɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b a Urusalima ya̧di, hi zaa a Baytifaaze a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧t ha, Yeesu her walɛsɛrɛ eerɛ yaahi hi dorɔ,
a rekin a raat bɔ gi nɛ muut duge nɛ zɛm pɛɛzumnɔɔ za ha̧y hi waaɔ dɔɔ di, pidinɛge nɛ kamsibe,
za̧a̧nza gi warin hinza raanɛg a ha̧a̧ Ɗɛnt bɔ giya, gɔ gi anbɔ ɓɔrbɔ gi ɔɔ pɛɛzum wɔ hi zaa.
Hin bɔ lab gi tuur anyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ
a raasin Siyona Waasiŋ a seem Waar mɔ gbɔɔl bɔ gi zaak gɛrɛ a mɔɔge, doo zultiisigya kar a pɛɛzum yɛl ha, hi a pɛɛzumwaa yɛl ha.
Walɛsɛrɛ eer wɔ hi rek hi woo hinyɔ Yeesu raa nɛko.
Hi kamz pɛɛzumnɔɔ bɔ hi waaɔ dɔɔ di, hi zaa hi ɓuu gbanya̧ a pɛɛzum wɔ hi yɛl ha. Yeesu kar ɗɔɔt gɔ a gbandil wɔ hi ɓuu hage.
Dood kittɔnɔ hi ɓuu gbanya̧ a gbɔnɔdu, zaadɛ hi gbobz tɛ̧ɛ̧kpas hi kamz hi ɓuuk a gbɔnɔ bɔ gedu an hi zuun hatya̧.
Saal wɔ hi gi a Yeesu muutdu hi wɔ hi gig fɔk kuudu hi ya̧a̧ɓooluko
a Hozana! raakɔ a seko gbɔɔltɔnɔ, Dawda waawalɔ! An Bɛt gi rɔbs Za̧a̧nyɔ zaa a Waar Bɛt nuŋg du! An bant gi wooy a bɛtha a Bɛt ge!
Yɔ Yeesu gul a Urusalima kɔms dood Urusalimaya wɔ sɛw gɛrsɛ hi warɔ
a bɔ wal yɛrɛ?
Dood saal hi ta̧a̧
a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yeesu yɔ fu̧u̧ a Nazarɛd a Galile hɛbtdu ga.
Yeesu tal a Bɛtluk du nin dood hinriŋsya wɔ hi zekya wɔ hi gi duhɔ sɛw; bisil tus-i̧i̧kya wɔ silya̧ hi gutu zebtigya wɔ doolya̧ ɗɔɔtilya wɔ.
Wɛɛ
a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa a hi el luk be a Bɛtzɔ̧k luko. Wɛɛ nɛɛ be nɛ gig wɛɛnik luurɛ wa̧lɔ!
Yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ hi dɔɔ gumtilya wɔ hi zaak Yeesu ge a Bɛtluk du gihi za̧a̧sugo.
Yɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi gbɛn gɛrs wɔ Yeesu gi wooko, wɛɛ hi lag ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ hi ya̧a̧ɓoolik a Bɛtluk du
a Hozana, raakɔ a seko gbɔɔltɔnɔ, Dawda Waawalɔ!
nɔɔhinɔ, hi war Yeesu
a mɔ lag hinyɔ ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ hi raak ya?
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a hɔɔ be lagɔ. Nɛ nɛ́ zaŋga lɛlza bɔ hi bi̧i̧ hi dɔg a mɔɔ Bɛto mɔ tuts zul mɔ bant rɔb a ya̧a̧mwaat ya̧a̧ du hi waatyɛ̧s ya̧a̧ du ɔ̧tza gɛ ya?
Kuudu wɛɛ tuu waal gbɔɔl bɔ ɔɔhi dihɔ rek da yoz a Betani.
Yoosugɔ bi̧i̧l du yɔ Yeesu gi wɛɛzig a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu a̧a̧kil gi ha̧a̧ge,
gbɛn yɔmntnɔ za a gbɔnɔya̧ sɔɔ an gi gbɛn humlɔ gi ha̧b gi le, gbɛn kpas gii kpɔd, huml taaro. Raa yɔmntnɔ bɔ
a bɔmɔ hum zaa nɛ zaŋ.
Ɓɔrbɔ yɔmntnɔ bɔ koot ɓaw.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hin gi kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ, hi war Yeesu
a yɔmntnɔ bɔ koot ri ɓɔriɓɔri lɛ be?
Yeesu goohi

a be raasin rɔbo: gid nɛ ɗɔbsig nɛ kpoos du nɛ faa nɛ gɛ zaŋ, taa an nɛ ɗɛɛ hinyɔ be gɔs yɔmntnɔ bɔ gii gɔkɔ kpɔd, nɛ ɗɛɛ an nɛ raa ga̧a̧t yɛrɛ a ha̧sum hɛdi mɔ da mɔ gbaliy a mɛmbal du, hinɔ yɔ wooy hɛw.
Gid nɛ ɗɔbsɔ nɛ dag hinyɔ nɛ zɔ̧k a Bɛt ge sɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu re gi gul a Bɛtluk du gi yɛls dood hingoko, Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi zaa hi war Yeesu
a mɔ wook hin wɛrɛ hi nɔ tɛŋkɔ? Bɔ gaamɔ gbɔnɔ an mɔ gɔ hin wɛrɛ anbɔ?
Yeesu goohi
a ɔbe ɛrin hin gbun kpɔd, gid nɛ goosib lɛlɔge bee be wadsin tɛŋk yɔ be woonik hin wɛrɛ be.
Bɔ yaaz Yohana an gi hotin dood Bɛtmɛm nɔ, Bɛt gii ya, dood ya ri?
Wɔrɔ hi
wɛɛ hi mɔk hin bɔrɔ hi watin hi teesdu a an wɛ ta̧a̧ a Bɛt gii yaazige, yɔ warɛ a nɛ nɛ ɔɔ Yohana ɗɔbsig ma nɔ?
Wɛɛ an wɛ raa a dood yaazig be, wɛɛ hoobha̧a̧wɛ dood saal wɔ. Hii sɛw hi seek Yohana an Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya be.
Hi wɛɛ hi ta̧a̧ge
a wi mɛɛ gɛ.
Yeesu goohi be
a nɛ gi lab be bee hɛw be taasin wadig tɛŋk yɔ be woonik hin wɔrɔ be.
Yeesu wɛɛ
Wala bɔ ta̧a̧ a ha̧a̧be gɛ. Kuudu wɛɛ mɔkɔ ɗund rek a bak bɔ gedu, da balɔ.
Baatɔ wɛɛ rek a waa za wans bɔ ge
Waat wɔ hi eerɛ nɔni woos hinyɔ baatɔ ha̧a̧g nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧
a waa doos bɔ ga.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a be raasin rɔbo: tooszekya wɔ hi nɛɛd kaatɛ ha̧a̧l wɔ hii gisin dork a Bɛt wáát du.
