Yɔ anbɔ, Yohana zaa nɛɛge an gi goksin gbɔnɔ yɔ rii, wɛɛ nɛ ta̧a̧g ɗɔbsig gɛ. Yɛrɛ tooszekya wɔ hi nɛɛd kaatɛ wɔ ya̧nɛ hi ta̧a̧gta̧a̧. Anyɔ nɛ gbɛn anbɔ hɛw, nɛ zɛmr kpoos nɛ kuudu an nɛ ɗɔbsig hɛw gɛ.

Lagin ya̧a̧daanik za gɛrɛ: ɗɛnt raatyaza bal tɛ̧ɛ̧ huml-yaadɛ bakɔ, gɔ̧ɔ̧n rɔkili. Wɛɛ loo beto gɔ suknààli an gɔ gi ɓɔ̧ɔ̧ huml wɔ mɛkya̧ gedu, wɛɛ rɛɛ ooko. Wɛɛ loo woosɔ-yaadɛ, ɔɔ tɛ̧ɛ̧ wɔ hi naandu gii wɛɛ rek rɔbsi.
Yɔ huml wɔ hi ɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧kɔ gi rii, yaaz gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a tɛ̧ɛ̧-ookya wɔ hi an hi gaahi huml ɔ̧ɔ̧tɛ wɔ ɔnɛ be hi kamsige.
Ookya wɔ hi wa̧a̧ gbaarɛ wɔ, zaabɔ hi lɛge, eesim bɔ hi gbɔŋge, taasum bɔ hi duutinge bet wɔrɔ.
Za̧a̧n bakya bɔ wɛɛ yaaz gbaarɛ zaadɛ kitɛ hi daar wɔ hi doz nɛ hɛw. Bak-ookya wɔ hi wɛɛ hi wa̧a̧ wɔrɔ hi woosihi hin gbuna bɔ.
Yɔ̧ɔ̧sumɔ wɛɛ yaasihi waawalɔ, raa a yɛrɛ hi ɗɔbs waa be yɛrɛ ɔnɛ.
Wɛɛ yɔ bak-ookya wɔ hi gbɛn waawal bɔ gi zaako hi watinu a za̧a̧n bɔ gɔ gi yɛr bak bɔ kuudu gii yɔ, ɗɛnwɛ rek wɛ wa̧a̧ge wɛ gbɔŋge, bak bɔ gi wɛɛ wɛɛnɛ.
Hi wa̧a̧ge hi tuunig a bak tɔlya̧ hi da hi gbɔŋge hi bisige.
Yeesu warɔ
a za̧a̧n tɛ̧ɛ̧bakya bɔ gɔ gi zaa rɛ, gi woos nɔ dood bak-ookya wɔrɔ nɔ?
Dood wɔ hi ta̧a̧
a gi gbɔm bak-ookya ha̧a̧l wɔrɔ, taasihi ya̧a̧rmɛɛko, gi wɛɛ gi looz dood bak-ookya zaadɛ hi zaa hi ha̧bsig tɛ̧ɛ̧huml ɔ̧ɔ̧tɛ wɔ hi yaasig a ɔ̧tyɔ ha̧a̧g gedu sɛw.
Yeesu wɛɛ warihi
a nɛ zaŋg hinza Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du a bet yɔ lukwɔŋkya wɔ hi bisige gii wɛɛ bet gbɔɔl tɛŋkya nɛ gɛ zaŋ ya? Waar Bɛt gii woo hinɔ anbɔ, yɔ wɛ gbɛn lɔl du gisɛ wɛnɛ gɛrsɛ!
[Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi mat a bet bɔ geha muulɔ gi ɓɛdɔ; bet bɔ gi mɛɛ a za̧a̧nza muul be gi hɔnsige an luusɛ. ] Wɛɛ
Yɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Farisaya wɔ hi kɛm Yeesu ya̧a̧daanikɔ wɔ hi mɛɛmɛ a gi book dɔgl ya̧a̧nɛ;
hi tɛ gbɔnɔ an hi wa̧a̧ge, wɛɛ hoobha̧a̧hi saal wɔ be, anyɔ hi mɛɛ a dood hi seek Yeesu an Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkyayɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ dɔks dood dɔgl hi ya̧a̧daanik ɓɛ
a Bɛt wáátɔ riitin an waar za yɔ gi gɛmtsig waawal lottins lees gbɔɔlɛ.
Yaa gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rek hi elz dood wɔ gɔ hi le lottins lees bɔ an hi zaa hi le hinɛ, dood wɔ be hi iin zaakɔ.
Wɛɛ yaa gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ zaadɛ dɔɔmɛ
Dood wɔ hi elihi ya̧nɛ dɔglya̧ taa du, hi rek woos ya̧a̧nɛ, zaadɛ hi re bako, zaadɛ be, hi rek wɔdya̧ riŋnik be.
Dood zaadɛ wɔ be, hi wa̧a̧ waar bɔ gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi niihi, hi wɛɛ hi gbɔ̧hi.
Yɔ waar bɔ lag dɔglɔ gi nɔɔsig ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, yaa laaya ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rek hi wa̧a̧hi hi gbɔ̧hi, hi kpɔɔ waal gbɔɔlya̧ bɔ be.
Kuudu wɛɛ raa gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a hi gɛms lottins lees bɔ da̧a̧da̧, wɛɛ dood wɔ hi elihi nɛ hí rı̄ı̄ an hi zaa hi le gɛ be.
Yɔ anbɔ rekin a bɔrignɔɔ wɔ hi du nɛ elz dood wɔ gɔnɛ zɛmzihi sɛw hi zaa lottins lees bɔ.
Gbaarɛ wɔ hi rek a bɔrignɔɔ wɔ hi du hi elz dood wɔ hi zɛ̧hi sɛw, dood bɔbtin wɔ hi dood rɔ́bɛ wɔ sɛw, hi kamzihi a lottins lɛl bɔ ge, lɛl hi̧i̧s gɔ deder.
Hɔnɛyɔ waar bɔ gul raa du gi see dood wɔ hi elzihi, gbɛn doo za gidu hegz lottins gban muul gɛ,
warige a sa̧a̧ɔ mɔ guz ri hɛdi mɔ hegz lottins gban mɔ muul gɛ be? Wal bɔ kɔm hititi, tā̧ā̧ hinza gɛ.
Waar bɔ raa lottins lees woosya wɔ a loozin ba̧a̧ni nɛ wɔmn wal yɛrɛ dɔɔɔ wɔ hi naanɔ wɔ nɛ gbalig lak di a lɛlwil du, gi kaa gi gboo nuŋgɔ a lak hɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a yɔ anbɔ, hi el dood kittɔnɔ, wɛɛ dood wɔ hi herihi hi kit gɛ.
Kuudu Farisaya wɔ hi rek hi watin an hi ton Yeesu hi hinwarki hi dɔglɔyɔ gɔ gi booko.
Farisaya wɔ hi wɛɛ hi yaa walɛsɛrɛ ya̧ hi Waar Hirudus doodɔ an hi warig hinɛ
a Hingokya , wi mɛɛ a mɔ gi doo kpoosrɔbya, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gok Bɛt gbɔnɔ hi rɔbo, hoobhā̧ā̧mɔ dood gɛ, mɔ taa seek dood bɛtig a muutdu be.
Raasiwi hinyɔ mɔ mɔkig a dɔgl yɛrɛ hage: maak wɛ gaa gbɔnɔ an hi toos Waar gbɔɔl bɔ Kaysara toos ya, gaa gɛ ya ri?
Yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ ha̧a̧lya̧, warihi
a nɛɛ dood mɛlha̧a̧lya wɛ, nɛ gib tolik hi dɔgl nɔ?
Zunsinbe tusyɔ nɛ toonik toosɛ.
Hi kamsig tus gaat gbunu,
Yeesu wɛɛ warihi
a bɔ muut yɛrɛ hi nuŋg yɛrɛ hi bi̧i̧ du yɔ nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧
a waar gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ Kaysara ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
gɔ a wɛɛnsin waar bɔ Kaysara hinyɔ ginɔ, wɛɛn nɛ wɛɛns Waar Bɛt hinyɔ gin be.
Yɔ hi lag dɔgl bɔrɔ anbɔ hin kɔmsihi gɛrs hi ɗund hi ɔɔge hi rek be.
A ɔ̧t gbun bɔ gedu Sadukiya zaadɛ wɔ gɔ hi dɔk a wɔrkɛ hi taa zaa rɛmluko hi zaa a Yeesu ge hi warige
a Hingokya , Muusa raa a walza gi gin nisɛ, wal bɔ gi wɔrɔ gi ɔɔ waat gɛ, yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ gi yɛr kuur bɔ an hi daks hindaɔ waato.
Ɔ̧tza walɛ zaadɛ hi ginɛ wi teesdu, hi mɔɔhi hi nɔɔn-erɛ, gbɔɔl bɔ wɔr ma ɔs yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ gii kuurɔ bɔ.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ bɔ wɛɛ wɔrɔ, taasum bɔ wɔrɔ, wɔrk da̧a̧sihi hi nɔɔn-er sɛw. Hi nɔɔn-er sɛw hi yɛtin nɛ kuur bɔ gbunu gbunu be.
Gɔ yɔ̧ɔ̧sumɔ nis bɔ wɛɛ wɔr be.
Gɔ gi rɛmtig ɔ̧ti, yɔ hi nɔɔn-er sɛw bɔ, nis bɔ gi er bɔ ɔnɛ tir nɔ? Hii sɛw, hi waatin hi gii be!
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧
a anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol hi Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ gɛ, nɛ hɛɛ gbɔnɔyɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, a rɛmtig ɔ̧ti dood hi taa lootingo, hi wɛɛ an Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ a bɛtha.
Yɛrɛ nɛ́ záŋga rɛmtig dɔgl a ɗɛɛrwol du yɔ Bɛt raasinɛ
a bee gi Abraham Bɛtɔ hi Isaaku Bɛtɔ, hi Yakuba Bɛtɔ gɛ ya? Bɛt ɔnɛ taa wɔrkɛ Bɛto, gi dood za̧a̧til wɔ Bɛt ya̧a̧nɛ.
Yɔ dood saal wɔ hi kɛm Yeesu hingokɔ bɔ anbɔ hin kɔmsihi gɛrs ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Yɔ Farisaya wɔ hi lag a Yeesu ɗɛɛn Sadukiya wɔ dɔglɛ, hi eltin hi mɔksɔ.
Doo za Bɛtmaakdɔkyayɔ gi hi teesdu yɔ ha̧a̧ge an gi tɛmn Yeesu ya̧a̧ɗantigi, war Yeesu
a Hingokya , maakdɔglyɔ ɗɔb gi daarlɛl gɛ nɔni?
Yeesu ta̧a̧ raa
a maakdɔgl yɔ ɗɔb gi daarlɛl gɛ a gi ha̧a̧mɔ Waar mɔ Bɛt hi kpoos mɔ sɛw, hi kol mɔ sɛw, hi mɔkil mɔ sɛw.
Maakdɔgl biitir yɔ ɗɔb gi daarlɛl nɛ zaŋ giibɔ.
Maakdɔgl eesim bɔ riitin zaaɔ gɛrɛ a gi ha̧a̧mɔ a namɔza ge an zul mɔ.
Muusa maakdɔglɔ wɔ sɛw, hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hingokya̧ wɔ sɛw hi fu̧u̧ a maakdɔgl eerɛ wɛrɛ gedu.
Anyɔ Farisaya wɔ hi mɔks lɛlgbunu Yeesu warihi hin
a nɛ mɔkig nɔ a Masihu bɔ gi zulha nɔ? Fu̧u̧ a bɔ zaŋgd du nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧ge
a Masihu bɔ fu̧u̧ a Dawda zaŋgd du.
Yeesu goo
a nɛ à anbɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ yɔ daas Dawda kpoos du, ri gi elig a Waar be nɔ? Raa
a Waar Bɛt raa Waar be a ɗɔɔtum be naanrɔbo, gi tuur an be gbàà yɔ̧lhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya mɔ wɔ hi wɛɛ dɔɔ mɔ ɗa̧a̧klɛlɛ.
Nɛ an Dawda el Masihu bɔ a Waar be, Masihu bɔ yɔ wɛɛ waaɔ ri be?
Doo za gbun ɗɛɛ dɔglɔ bɔ ta̧a̧k gɛ. Hi sɛw hi kɔm hititi. Baar a ɔ̧tɔge, an bɔnɛ ɓɛ hoobha̧a̧gha̧ Yeesu hinwark ma.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu boos dood saal wɔ hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ dɔgl
a Bɛtmaakdɔkya hi Farisaya gɔ hi wadil Muusa maakdɔglɔ wɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, kɛmsinɛhi tɔnɛ nɛ woo hinyɔ hi raasin sɛw, yɛrɛ bɔnɛ fɔ woosya̧ naandu ɔnɛ. Wɛɛ dɔgl yɔ hi dɔko, hí woo hinɔ du gɛ be.
Hi wɔk hinɗɔmn ɗɔbtɛ hi gis dood gbaak zul ha; ha̧a̧hi naanwalya̧ ki̧i̧nik mɔɔti an hi yɛsihi hinɗɔmnya̧ bɔ gɛ be.
Hi wook woosya̧ sɛw hi zulpɛɛki an dood hi gbɛnihi kpɔd. Bɛtmaakwɔdya̧ yɔ gɔ hi malk muutdu, zaabe a naanyɛ̧li, hi wɛɛnihi fɛɛtɛ hi daarlɛlɛ, hi wɛɛ hi zi̧bs gbanya̧ gbɔlɛ tɔlya̧ wɔ an dood hi seehi.
Ha̧a̧hi ɗɔɔtillɛl rɔbɛ a lees gbɔlɛ leklɛlɛ, hi ɗɔɔtillɛl hɔɔtɛ wɔ daarlɛlɛ a mɔksilluk wɔ gedu.
Ha̧a̧hi an dood hi hu̧u̧r di hi boohi a luum wɔ ha hi, an hi wɛɛ hi elihi a hingokya wɛ.
Yɛrɛ nɛya, taa an hi elin a hingokya. Gɛ nɛ gin hingoknɛya gbun kpɔd: beeya, wɛɛ, nɛɛ sɛw, nɛ gitin yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛyɔ.
Bɔnɛ el doo za hɛbtdi a baa be! Gɛ nɛ gin Baa nɛ Bɛt yɔ gi a bɛtha kpɔd.
Bɔnɛ ɔɔ dood hi elin a waar i. Bee, Masihu bɔ, bee gi Waar nɛ kpɔd.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi gbɔɔl gi daarlɛl a nɛ teesdu gi wɛɛ woosnɛya.
Za̧a̧nyɔ tɔɔs zulɔ be hi tiisige, za̧a̧nyɔ tiis zulɔ wɛɛdis be hi dɔɔsige.
Nɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ hi Farisaya wɛ, mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Nɛ gi dood Bɛt wáátɔ gbɔnɔ yɛ̧ktugo. Nɛɛ hi zul nɛ nɛ gul gɛ, wɛɛ nɛ ɔ̄s dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi Bɛt gbɔnɔ gulk an hi gul gɛ be. [

Nɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ hi Farisaya mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Nɛ wɔɔlik hinyɔ kuurɛ nɛɛd wɔ hi gin sɛw, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ zɔ̧k Bɛt zi̧i̧tɔnɔ an hi seenɛ an dood rɔbɛ. Yɔ anbɔ nɛ́ dag dɔgl-gbaak gi daarlɛlɛ. ]

Nɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ hi Farisaya, mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Nɛnɛ nɛ gbɛ̧ɛ̧kig a lɛlyɔ hɛbt gi ge sɛw, nɛ gbɛ̧ɛ̧kig a mɛmbal wɔ du sɛw a lɛmb du an nɛ dag doo gbunu gi zɛmr mɔkilɔ gi fɔnɛ, wɛɛ yɔ nɛ dagige nɛ wɛɛnig doo laazɛŋk gbɔnɔ fɔkya daar nɛɛ dɔɔ eerɛ.
Nɛɛ yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ nɛ tɛlik yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ zaadɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Nɛ raa a za̧a̧n za gi dɛŋglhin hi Bɛtluk nuŋgɔ, taa hindɛŋglik rɔbo; gi dɛŋglhin hi hɛɛlmɔtyɔ gi a Bɛtluk du, dɛŋglhin rɔb tuu gɔ ma ɓɔrɔ.
Yoo wɛrɛ, yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɛrɛ, nɔni gi hinɗɔbt nɔ? Hɛɛlmɔt gii ya, Bɛtluk yɔ wɛɛn hɛɛlmɔt hingaat gii ya ri?
Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ raa a doo gi dɛŋglhin hi Bɛtmaak sɛŋk nuŋgɔ, taa hindɛŋglik rɔbo. Gid nɛ dɛŋglhin hi gaas yɔ hi gbaa a Bɛtmaak sɛŋk hage nuŋgɔ, hindɛŋglik rɔb tuu gɔ ma ɓɔrɔ.
Yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɛ! Nɔni gi hinɗɔbt nɔ? Gaas gii ya, Bɛtmaak sɛŋk gii ya ri? Nɛ Bɛtmaak sɛŋk gii ma mi?
Za̧a̧nyɔ dɛŋglhin hi Bɛtmaak sɛŋk bɔ nuŋgɔ, dɛŋglhin hi lɛl bɔ hi hinyɔ gi hage sɛw.
Za̧a̧nyɔ dɛŋglhin hi Bɛtluk nuŋgɔ, dɛŋglhin hi Bɛtluk nuŋgɔ hi Bɛt nuŋgɔ yɔ gi waak gedu hɛw.
Za̧a̧nyɔ dɛŋglhin hi bɛtha nuŋgɔ, dɛŋglhin hi Bɛt waar ums ɗɔɔtillɛlɔ bɔ nuŋgɔ hi Bɛt yɔ ɗɔɔt hage.

Nɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ hi Farisaya mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Gɔ nɛ ha̧sig Bɛt gaasɔ a kalde kpas wɛ hi kumbe kpas wɔ nɛ zebtig gedu, nɛ gisig tusɔ gbaako an dimi. Yɛrɛ nɛ wɛɛ nɛ ɔɔ hinwɔ hi gogɔ hi ɗɔb hi daarlɛl a Bɛtmaak du, an hinwooki hi gbɔnɔ, ya̧a̧rmɛɛki, hi ɗɔbsigi. Hin wɛrɛ hii bɛrɔ an nɛ woo. Wɛɛ bɔnɛ ɔɔ wɔ hi zɛ̧ɛ̧r wookɔ.
Yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ nɛ tɛlik yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ zaadɛ! Nɛ dakig tɔmsir waat wɔ nɛ wɛɛ nɛ i̧i̧k gɛloba gii a buudu!
Nɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ hi Farisaya mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Nɛ nɛɛtig mɛmdak bɔ kuuɔ hi kokdak bɔ kuuɔ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ ɔɔ buuya̧ du hi̧i̧s hi doolek nɛ wɔ hi ɗɔkum ha̧a̧l wɔ nɛ kpoos du.
Farisaya yɔ̧ɔ̧ri, nɛɛtum dakwaa bɔ buuɔ kete, ɓɔr kuuɔ bɔ gi gaa gɔ sɛw.
Nɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ hi Farisaya mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Nɛ riitin an looryɔ hi buusige gi bɛr a kuuha, wɛɛ a buu du hi̧i̧s hi wɔrkɛ lɛŋk wɛ hi hinza dokil wɛ sɛw.
Nɛɛ hɛw nɛ gbunɔ giya, nɛ bɛs doo a muulɛ, wɛɛ kpoos nɛ hi̧i̧s hi mɛlɛ hi ha̧a̧lɛ.
Nɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ hi Farisaya mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Nɛ wɔmsig Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi wɔr nɛ loor bɛtɛ; nɛ wɛɛ nɛ bi̧i̧lik kɔ̧ɔ̧tig a dood riitɛ wɔ hi loor ha.
Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ dɔko a an wi gi nɛ a ɗɛntɛ waabil bɔ doos gedu, yɔ wi ɔks hi baa wi hii an wi gbɔm Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ nɛ book dɔgl nɛ nɛ ta̧a̧ko a nɛ gi dood wɔ hi gbɔm Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ waat ya̧a̧nɛ.
Bɛrɔ! Nɛ yɛrɛ da̧a̧sin hinyɔ baa nɛ hi da hi baar nɛ wookɔ ma.
Nɛya, kpolumdɔ̧ɔ̧t wɛ! gi an nɛ nɔ̀ɔ̀ dɔgl yɔ gɔ gi matin laazɛŋk du ri nɔ?

Yɔ anbɔ, laginɛ, be gisin yaak Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkyaadɛ hi dood hinmɛɛkya dubtɛ wɛ hi Bɛtmaakdɔk-yaadɛ. Nɛ gbɔm zaadɛ, nɛ doohi a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha, nɛ lɛbt zaadɛ hi kpooti a mɔksilluk nɛ wɔ hi du be, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ tɛkihi a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ hi du sɔmsɔm an nɛ kɛtinihi ya̧a̧.
Kuudu dood riitɛ wɔ hi gbɔ̧hi nɛ sɛw ga̧a̧mya̧ gi wɛɛ nɛ zulha; gi baar a hinriitwookya bɔ Abɛl wɔrk muulɛ gi tuur a Barakiya waawal Zakariya yɔ nɛ gbɔŋg a Bɛtluk bɔ teesɔ gedu hi Bɛtmaaksɛŋk bɔ.
Be gisin raak rɔbo, wɔrkɛ wɔrɔ ya̧a̧r-hantya̧ bɔ sɛw gi wɛɛ a dood wɔ hi waak ɓɔryɔ hi zulha.

Urusalima! Urusalima! Mɔɔ yɔ mɔ gbɔŋk Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkya wɔ mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gi duutingo dood wɔ Bɛt yaasimɔhi bet an hi wɔrɔ! Ha̧a̧b nɛ an be mɔks waat mɔ wɔ dɔɔ baari a be dɔŋdi an kɔɔnɔɔ gi buuk waatɔ a pakir du? Yɔ anbɔ da ha̧a̧n nɛ gɛ!
Bɛrɔ! Yɛrɛ hi ɔɔ raat nɛ wɛɛ beemɛ.
Yɛrɛ be gisin raako: gi baar ɓɔryɔ nɛ taab zaa gbɛniko gi tuur an nɛ
Yɔ Yeesu tuu Bɛtluk du gi reko, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi sɔɔ hi dɔgsig Bɛtluk bɔ wɔŋkɔ hi wɔmɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu dɔgsihi
a nɛ gbɛn hin yɛrɛ sɛw ya? Be dɔgsin rɔbo: bet za taa kɔŋk goksili; dood gabsya hi zaa hi ɛ̧btir sɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu re gi ɗɔɔt a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧t bɔ hage, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi hi ɛrige
a raasiwi ɔ̧tyɔ hin bɔrɔ gɔ gi tuur gedu hi gɛrs yɔ gɔ gi zunsiw zaak mɔnɛ a waal du hi waal da̧a̧ki.
Yeesu goohi
a oon zul nɛ an bɔ doo za gi maatinɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ dood kittɔnɔ hí zaa a be nuŋg du, hí raa a bee gi Masihu bɔ, hi wɛɛ hi maa dood kittɔnɔ be.
Nɔk gi gi a lɛl zaadɛ sɔmsɔm, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ lag a hi bootig nɔk dɔgl zaadɛ be, bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ a ɔ̧tɔge. Gi an hin bɔ lab gi tuurɔ, wɛɛ hinɔ taa raak waalda̧a̧k kete.
Yɔ anbɔ, hɛbt hi gɔ nɔk hi hɛbt zaadɛ, waar ɛ hi ɗund nɔk a waar ɛ zaadɛ zul ha; wɛɛ tɔs gi giro, hɛbt gi nam a lɛlza sɔmsɔm.
Hin wɔrɔ sɛw gi gi an waagulik kosgumn biitiryɔ.
Gɔ gi anbɔ dood hi wa̧a̧nɛ hi gaan a dood gbɔlɛ naan du hi ha̧a̧nin ya̧a̧rɛ hi wɛɛ hi gbɔ̧nɛ. Dood waal du sɛw hi hɛ̧ɛ̧ninlɔl a be nuŋg dɔŋgo.
Gɔ gi ɔ̧tɔge anbɔ dood kittɔnɔ hi ɔɔbe ɗɔbsigi, hi wɛɛ hi raaltinu, hi wɛɛ hi hɛ̧ɛ̧tinlɔlɛ.
Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi midilo hi zaa hi maa dood kittɔnɔ hi ɔɔb ɗɔbsugɔ.
Ha̧a̧lgɔk gi yɔ̧ɔ̧s lɛlɛ. Yɔ anbɔ, dood kit wɔ hi gin Bɛt hatɔ kpoos du hatya̧ gi niimɔ.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi mɔmɔ gi tuur a waalda̧a̧ki gi za̧a̧.
Hɔnɛ gi an hi dɔg Bɛt wáát Dɔgl Rɔb yɛrɛ gi yɔ̧ɔ̧s waal sɛw an dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi gi sɛw hi kɛm Bɛt wáát dɔgl kete, gɔ gi kuudu waal gi da̧a̧ ma gɔ.
Nɛ́ gbɛn hinyɔ hi elk a hinɓi̧i̧limya ha̧a̧lɛ yɔ Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkya bɔ Daanyɛl boo dɔglɔ gigi ɗɔɔtig a lɛlyɔ Bɛt gi waak gedu ge. (Za̧a̧nyɔ gi zaŋgik hin yɛrɛ gi kɛm bɛttɔnɔ! )
Gɔ gi anbɔ, dood wɔ gɔ hi gi a Yahuduya, nɔ̀ɔ̀hi hi dɔ̀ɔ̀ ga̧a̧ti;
za̧a̧nyɔ gi luk zulha, bɔgi siz a luk du an gi loo wɔdɔ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi a bako, bɔgi wɛɛz raa du an gi loo gbandilɔ.
Ya̧a̧rhant gi gis budaa wɔ a ɔ̧tɔ ge hi waatnɔɔdɛ wɔ hi gaak waat wa̧a̧lɛ!
Zɔ̧n Bɛt an bɔnɛ nɔɔ a zɛrk du, zaabe a holum-ɔ̧ti.
Yɔ anbɔ a ɔ̧tɔge ya̧a̧rhant gi tɔɔ gi daar ya̧a̧rhant zaadɛ wɔ sɛw, yɛɛl a waalyɛɛliki, tuur ɓɔryɔ, wɛɛ riitinsɔ za taa gik anbɔ.
An Bɛt da lɔ̄bs ɔ̧t wɔrɔ gɛ, doo za ɗɛɛ an gi za̧a̧ gɛ. Yɛrɛ lɔbs ɔ̧t wɔrɔ a dood wɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧hi hi dɔŋgo.
A ɔ̧tɔge doo za gi zaa gi raanɛ a sɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, Masihu bɔ gi hɛdi, zaabe a gi yɛhɛ, bɔnɛ ɗɔbsɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ masihu ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya wɔ hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya wɔ hi midɔ hi gɔ gɛrs hinzuunikyaadɛ hi gɛrs gbɔlɛ zaadɛ kittɔnɔ an hi maatin dood wɔ Bɛt sɛ̧ɛ̧hi hɛw à hi ɗɛɛ nɛ hinɔ wooko.
Ɓaanɛ! Be dɔgsin hin wɔrɔ sɛw doorɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, gid hi dɔgsinɛ, a gi gɛrɛ a hɛtdɔŋ du, bɔnɛ rekɔ! Zaabe hi raanɛ a gi yaatig gɛrɛ hɛdi, bɔnɛ ɗɔbsɔ!
Anyɔ bɛlya̧bs gi gaak a bɛtha a ɔ̧tkazigi lɛlgaalɔ gi tuurik a ɔ̧tleki, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi zaa anbɔ be.
Lɛlyɔ hinwɔl gi ge dukumnɔɔ hi mɔks lɛlɔge be.
Nɔɔktɔnɔ a ya̧a̧rhant wɔrɔ hi kuudu, ɔ̧t gi nimɔ, sɛɛ taa gaak buulɛ, sɛwaat hi mɛlz a bɛtha, tɛŋk wɔ hi gi a bɛtha hi bee.
Gɔ gi anbɔ hi gbɛn hinyɔ gɔ gi zunsihi Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaakɔ a bɛtha, dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hɛbtdi sɛw hi kaalɔ. Hi gbɛn Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaakɔ a kuus ha a bɛtha hi tɛŋk gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ.

Gi yaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi ulk pɔ̧r wɔ hi rek a ɔ̧tkazigi, hi a ɔ̧tleki, a ɔ̧tkazig naanrɔbo hi a ɔ̧tkazig naanyɛ̧li hi mɔks dood wɔ Bɛt sɛ̧ɛ̧hi sɛw hi bààr a hɛbt lɛlyɔ yɛɛl ge gi tuur a lɛlyɔ door ge.
Gogin hin a yɔmntnɔ muulɛ: gɔ nɛ gbɛn tɛ̧ɛ̧ya̧a̧n wɔ hi ruutugo hi wɛɛ hi baak kpas yɛ̧sɛ, nɛ mɛɛ a gaak sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Wɛɛ gɔ nɛ gbɛn hin wɔrɔ sɛw hi tuuruko, mɛɛn a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b ma a lukgbɔnɔya̧ hɛw.
Be dɔgsin rɔbo: dɔ̧ɔ̧t yɛrɛ taa wako, hin wɛrɛ sɛw hi tuur kete.
Bɛtha hi hɛbtdi hi talɔ, yɛrɛ dɔgl be taa talk nɛ zaŋ.
Yɛrɛ doo za mɛɛ ɔ̧t bɔ gɛ. Kin lɛlli, Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ bɛtha hi Bɛt waa bɔ hɛw hi mɛɛ ɔ̧tɔ gɛ. Baa bɔ gii mɛɛ kpɔd.
Hinyɔ tal a Nɔwe waabilɔ bɔ gedu, gɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gɔ gi zaa, hinɔ gbunɔ giigi tuurɔ.
A ɔ̧tɔge anyɔ mɛm gɔ gi hi̧i̧s hɛbto, dood hi hinleko, hi yɔ̧ko, hi lootingo hi gaak waatya̧ a lottins du, tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ Nɔwe kar a lɛmb gbɔɔl bɔ gedu.
Hí mɛks hinza gɛ, tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ mɛm hi̧i̧s hɛbt gi ka̧hi du sɛw. Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaakɔ gi gi anbɔ be.
Gɔ gi anbɔ walɛ eerɛ hí gi a bak du, hi loo gbunu hi ɔɔ gbunu;
nɛɛd eerɛ hi hinnaŋk naal ha, hi loo gbunu hi ɔɔ gbunu.
Oonɛ anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ ɔ̧tyɔ Waar nɛ gɔ gi zaa du gɛ.
Mɛɛn hinyɛrɛ: à za̧a̧nraatya bɔ mɛɛnɛ ɔ̧tyɔ doo luur gɔ gi zaa du rɛ, yɔ oonɛ lɛlɛ an gi ya̧nts luur bɔ gbɔnɔtalk gi raa du.
Yɔ anbɔ, nɛɛ hɛw, oondi bed, ya̧a̧nɛ, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi zaak a ɔ̧tyɔ nɛ mɔk a gi zaa gedu gɛ.
Yɛrɛ bɔ gi gbaar woosya hinmɛɛkya dubt yɔ rii an hi gbaa mɔkil a ge nɔ? Gbaar bɔ lab ɗɛntɔ gàà gii woos naandu an gi oo naaza zaadɛ wɔ gi gaahi lees a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ gi ha̧a̧hi duge hi le?
Ɗɛntɔ bɔ gi wɛɛzɔ gi zɛŋge gi wookwoos bɔ, hat gi a gbaarɔ ge.
Be raasin rɔbo: ɗɛntɔ bɔ gi gaag rɔɔsɔ wɔ naan du sɛw.
Yɛrɛ gbaar bɔ gi ha̧a̧lɔ gi raa a gi kpoos du a ɗɛnt be gi aŋk-am zaakɔ,
gi wɛɛ gi yɛɛl naaza gbaarɛ wɔ lɛbtigi, gi yɛɛl hinleki hi yɔ̧ki hi bumwɔniki,
hɔnɛ gɔ gi anbɔ, ɗɛnt bɔ gi zaa a ɔ̧tyɔ taag ook gedu gɛ, wɛɛ kinsa zaakɔ lɛlli be, mɛɛ gɔ gɛ;
gɔ gi zaa gi ha̧a̧n gbaarɔ ha̧a̧l bɔ ya̧a̧r ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, gi wɛɛ gi wa̧a̧ gi wɔge gi yaag a lɛl ha̧a̧l du hi dood mɛl ha̧a̧lya wɔ. Dood hi kaa hi gboo nuŋgya̧ a lɛlɔ gedu.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt wáátɔ riitin an nɛɛdsɛrɛ kooblɛ hi loo pitilaya̧ hi tuuk an hi rek hi dagtin hi wal nislookya a gbɔnɔ du.
Zaadɛ nɔɔnɛ hi gi yooyɔ, wɛɛ nɔɔn zaadɛ wɔ be hi gi nɛɛdsɛrɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧tɛ.
Yɔ yoo wɔ nɔɔnɛ hi look pitilaya̧ hi kām kurum za tik du gɛ.
Wɛɛ nɔɔn zaadɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧tɛ wɔ be hi loo tik hi tɔ̧ɔ̧ kurumya̧ du hi kam hi pitilaya̧.
Anyɔ nislookya bɔ gi amzugo, nɛɛdsɛrɛ wɔ koobl hi tuur hi gig ook be hi yoyo hi sɛw.
A yɛms teesdu der ya̧a̧ɓooyyɔ a nislookya bɔ gi zaak gɛrɛ, tuuzinɛ nɛ rek nɛ dagige!
Hɔnɛ nɛɛdsɛrɛ koobl wɔ hi rɛmɔ hi ɗund hi gɛms pitilaya̧.
Zaadɛ yoo wɔ hi war kɛ̧ɛ̧tɛ wɔ hi kamz nɛ kurumya̧ a gaanwi kurum nɛ bɔ kaasi, pitila wi wɔ hi niŋknimɔ.
Kɛ̧ɛ̧tɛ wɔ hi ta̧a̧ a kurum bɔ yɔ riiwɛ wɛ sɛw gɛ. Rekin a dood kurumzebtigya wɔ hi nɛ zebz nɛnɛ.

Yɔ nɛɛd yoo wɔ hi rek kurum bɔ zebzig luumha be, nislookya bɔ zaa gɔ be. Nɛɛdsɛrɛ zaadɛ nɔɔn wɔ hi gin nɛ kurumya̧ hi gutin lɛlgbun hi nislookya bɔ a lootinslɛl bɔ gedu hi wɛɛ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧ lukgbɔnɔ bɔ hi daksɔ.
Kuudu yɔ nɛɛdsɛrɛ zaadɛ wɔ hi wɛɛza hi rek a lootinslɛl bɔ ge hi elik hinɛ a ɗɛnti, ɗɛnti! gborsuwi gbɔnɔ wi talɔ!
Hɔnɛ ɗɛnt bɔ goozɔ a be raasin rɔbo, be mɛɛn gɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa a yɔ anbɔ, oonɛ anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ ɔ̧tɔ gɔ be zaa du gɛ. Kinsa lɛlli, nɛ mɛɛ gɛ.
Hinza gi tuur an walza gi rɔbs reko gi el gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ an gi gaahi rɔɔsɔ wɔ naan du hi woon hinɛ.
Yɛɛl gaa gbaar biitir bɔ tus gaat duk nɔɔnɛ, zaa bɔ gaag tus gaat duk eerɛ, zaa bɔ be tus gaat duk gbunu; gaa doo gbunu anyɔ tɛŋkɔ gɔ gi ɗɛɛ, wɛɛ ɗund rek rɔbsɔ bɔ.
Gbaar biitir bɔ hi yɛɛl hi gaag nɛ duk nɔɔnɛ rek ɓɔrbɔ zemn wɔd hi tus bɔ riŋnɔ wɛɛ dag duk za kar ha nɔɔn be.
Zaabɔ dag nɛ duk eer be, wɛɛ woo an gbun bɔ wɛɛ dag zaa karha duk eer be.
Hɔnɛ zaabɔ dag nɛ duk gbun be rek da zɛɛ lɛl hɛbtdi i̧i̧ ɗɛntɔ tusɔ bɔ gedu.
Kuudu yɔ am ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ gbaarɛ wɔ ɗɛntya̧ bɔ wɛɛ zaa elihi an gi baks tusɔ bɔ hi hiya.
Gbaar biitir bɔ hi gaag nɛ tus gaat duk nɔɔnɛ kamz duk nɔɔn bɔ hi gaag nɛ hi nɔɔn zaa bɔ dagɔ,
Ɗɛntɔ bɔ
Zaabɔ dag nɛ tus gaat duk eer be zaa raa a ɗɛntyɔ, mɔ gaab nɛ duk eer be, yɛrɛ seemɔ, be wɛɛ be dag zaa gɛrɛ ha eer be.
Ɗɛnt bɔ
Yɔ̧ɔ̧sumɔ, gbaar bɔ dag nɛ tus gaat duk gbun be zaa
Yɔ hoobha̧a̧be, be rek be i̧i̧ tus mɔ bɔ gɔ hɛbtdi; yɛrɛ loom tus mɔ bɔ gɛrɛ.
Ɗɛntɔ bɔ ta̧a̧ge a mɔɔ gbaar ha̧a̧l namri! Mɔ mɛɛ nɛ a be ɓɛrk tot be a lɛlyɔ be lug ge gɛ, be mɔksig tot be a lɛlyɔ be fɛb ge gɛ mi?
Bɛrɔ! Ginɛ an mɔ gbaa tus be bɔ a tusgbaakya wɔ hi, yɔ be zaa nɛko be zɛm tus be bɔ zaa yɔ kar ha.
Wɛɛ raa doodɔ a wɔɔzin tus gaat duk gbun bɔ gi naan du nɛ gaa zaan bɔ gin duk kooblɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ ginɔ hi loo zaa hi goktsig ha gi gin gbɔɔltɔnɔ; za̧a̧nyɔ taan gɛ be hi wɛɛ hi loo fɛŋwaa bɔ da gin nɛ hɛw.
Wa̧a̧n gbaar namr bɔ nɛ bisig a lakdi a lɛlwil du a lɛlyɔ dood gɔ hi kaa hi gboo nuŋgya̧ gedu.
Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gɔ gi zaa gi gbɔlums du hi Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ sɛw an waar gbɔɔlɛ, gi ɗɔɔt a gi waar ums ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ.
Dood hɛbtdi sɛw hi mɔks gi muutdu, gi gɛ̧ɛ̧ dood an oora gi gɛ̧ɛ̧k tam hi isɛ.
Gi wɛɛn tam wɔ gi naanrɔbo, isɛ wɔ be a gi naanyɛ̧li.
Gɔ gi anbɔ waar gbɔɔl bɔ gi raa wɔ hi gi a naanrɔbo a zaanɛ, nɛɛ dood wɔ Baa be Bɛt rɔbsinɛ, talin a Bɛt wáát yɔ hi gɛmtsin a waalyɛɛliki an hi gaanɛ gedu.
Yɔ anbɔ, be da be gi nɛ a̧a̧kili nɛ gaab leesɛ; mɛm da gib ha̧a̧ko nɛ gaab be yɔ̧; be gi nɛ rɔ̀bi nɛ dagib rɔbtɔnɔ nɛ lɛl du.
Be gi nɛ ɔ̧lɛ nɛ heksib gbandili; be gi nɛ gumtili nɛ re nɛ boobe; be gi nɛ luknɔ du nɛ zaa nɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧be.
Dood riitɛ wɔ hi ta̧a̧ge a Waar i, be gbɛnum a̧a̧kilɔ bili be gaam lees nɔ? Mɛmɔ ha̧a̧m bili be gaam mɔ yɔ̧ nɔ?
Be gbɛnum rɔ̀bɔ bili be dagim be lɛl du rɔbtɔnɔ nɔ? Mɔ ginɛ ɔ̧lɔ bili be heksum gbandil nɔ?
Be gbɛnum gumtilɔ bili be re be sɔ̧ɔ̧m nɔ? Be gbɛnum luknɔ du bili be re be boom nɔ?
Waar gbɔɔl bɔ gi gòòhi gɔ a be raasin rɔbo; hinwɔ nɛ woo sɛw a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛrɛ zaa wansɔ gbun muulɛ, nɛ̍ wòòs bee hin wɔrɔ sɛw ma bɔ.
Kuudu waar bɔ gi wɛɛ gi raa dood wɔ hi gi a gi naanyɛ̧li a hɛmlin hi beya, nɛɛ dood wɔ nɛ gin Bɛt booto! Rekin a laazɛŋk yɔ hi gɛmnts Saydanu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ gedu!
Yɔ anbɔ, a̧a̧kil gib nɛ ha̧a̧ko, nɛ gāab lees gɛ; mɛm gib nɛ ha̧a̧ko nɛ gāab be yɔ̧ gɛ.
Be gi nɛ rɔ̀bi nɛ dagib nɛ lɛl du gɛ; be gi nɛ gumtili nɛ re nɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧b gɛ, be gi nɛ a luknɔ du nɛ re nɛ boob gɛ.
Hi wɛɛ hi ta̧a̧ge a Waar i, wi gbɛnum a̧a̧kilɔ bili, mɛmɔ gim ha̧a̧k bili, mɔ gi rɔ̀bɔ bili, mɔ gi ɔ̧lɔ bili, mɔ gi gumtilɔ bili, mɔ gi a luknɔ du bili wi ɗaasum gɛ?
Waar gbɔɔl bɔ gi ta̧a̧hi a be raasin rɔbo, hinwɔ nɛ woos dood wɛrɛ zaa wansɔ gbun gɛ, bee hɛw nɛ woosib gɛ.
Doodya̧ hí rek a laazɛŋk ya̧a̧rhantya faa bɔ gedu; wɛɛ dood wɔ hi woo hin riit be hi rek a za̧a̧tig faa lɛl bɔ a bɛtha gedu be.
Yɔ Yeesu da̧a̧s dɔglɔ wɔrɔ sɛw raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a nɛ mɛɛ a Paska naab zɛ̧ɛ̧r yɛms eerɛ an gi tuurɔ, wɛɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi gaay ma a dood naandu an hi dooge dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha.
A ɔ̧t gbun bɔ gedu Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi dood Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi rek hi mɔks a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ Kayafas raadu.
Hi wɔya̧a̧ an hi rek hi wa̧a̧ Yeesu hi kɛ̧ɛ̧tigi hi gbɔŋge.
Hi wɛɛ hi raa
a taa an wɛ wa̧a̧g naab teesdu, à labɔ, gabs yɔ ɗund a doodsaal teesdu.
Anyɔ Yeesu gi a Betani a Simɔŋ ɗobtilya bɔ gi raa du,
nis za kamz kurum ki̧i̧l hɛmntya tik gbunu tusɔ sa̧a̧ttɔnɔ. Tikɔ hi wɔmn bet za rɔb yɔ gɔ hi el a albaatreyɔ. Yɔ Yeesu ɗɔɔt an gi lehinɛ, nɛɛ bɔ sɔɔ gubsig kurum bɔ zulha.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gbɛn nɛɛ bɔ gub kurum bɔ anbɔ nɔɔhi, hi wɛɛ hi raa
a hinhatirgo bɔrɔ gɔ hi dag nɔ du!
À hi zebr nɛ kurum bɔrɔ tusɔ gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧s ya̧a̧rya wɔ gɔ nɔ?
Yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ hin bɔrɔ warihi
a nɛ mɔɔsig nɛɛ bɔ a nɔ dɔŋ nɔ? Benɛ woosib hinrɔb a be gbaŋgi.
Nɛ gin ya̧a̧rya wɔ nɛ teesdu faa, yɛrɛ beya, be taa waak hi nɛɛ faa.
Nɛɛ bɔ gubsib kurum yɛrɛ be muul an gi gɛmntsib i̧i̧k beenɛ a loor du.
Be raasin rɔbo, a lɛlyɔ gɔ hi dɔk Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ ge a waal du sɛw hí fɔ̀k hinyɔ nis bɔ woosib gii an hi mɛksinge.
Hɔnɛ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ koobl daa eer zaaya̧ gbun bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yahuda Iskaryudi rek a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi,
warihi
a an be gaan Yeesu naan du, nɛɛ be nɛ gaab nɔ?
Wɔrɔ hi ɓɛr tus gaat dumbili taarɛ hi gaage.
Bɛɛ anbɔ ma Yahuda yɛɛl gbɔnɔ ɓɛɛki an gi gaahi Yeesu naan du.
A Paska naab-ɔ̧t biitir bɔ kok gɔ taan hɛ̧ɛ̧t gɛ gedu, walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi zaa hi war Yeesu
a ha̧a̧mɔ an wi rek wi gɛmntsum Paska naab lees ay nɔ?
Yeesu
a rekin a waal gbɔɔl du a nɔɔkin ge nɛ
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi rek hi woo hinyɔ Yeesu
Yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ Yeesu zaa ɗɔɔt gɔ hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ an hi lehinɛ.
Yɔ hi gi hinleko Yeesu
a be raasin rɔbo: zaa nɛ gbun gi rɛ̧ɛ̧be.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi kɛm anbɔ hi mim ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi wɛɛ hi warig gbunu gbunu
a Waar i, nɛ bee ma gɛ mi?
Yeesu wɛɛ goo
a za̧a̧nyɔ yaa naan hi bee lɛlgbunu a kokdak du gii gi rɛ̧ɛ̧sibya̧a̧.
Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi wɔr an hinyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol dɔg gi zulha, yɛrɛ ya̧a̧rhant gis za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi rɛ̧ɛ̧ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ! À hi mɔɔnɛ za̧a̧nɔ gɛ yɔ riisige.
Yahuda, za̧a̧n bɔ gɔ gi rɛ̧ɛ̧ge warige
a Hingokya , nɛ bee ma gɛ mi?
Yeesu googe a anyɔ mɔ
mɔya!
Yɔ hi gi hinleko Yeesu loo kok kiml bɔ baan Bɛto, ɓɛɛlɔ gaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a loonɛ nɛ le, yɛrɛ gi muul beenɛ.
Wɛɛ loo dakwaa bɔ bumhob gi du, baan Bɛto wɛɛ gaahi
a yɔ̧nɛ nɛ sɛw,
yɛrɛ gi ga̧a̧m beenɛ, ga̧a̧m yɔ gi zuunik Bɛt ya̧a̧wɔkɔ hi doodɛ. Gi gub a dood kit dɔŋgo an Bɛt gi bitsihi hinha̧a̧lya̧.
Be dɔgsinɛ: yɛɛl ɓɔryɔ, be taa bumhob yɛrɛ zaa yɔ̧ko gi tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ be yɔ̧k zaa sekt hi nɛɛ a Baa be wáát du.
Hi wɛɛ hi ɛɛ Paska hin-ɛɛnɛ, hi tuu hi re gɔ a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧t ha.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a yɛms yɛrɛ gedu nɛ simdɔɔ a be dɔŋg nɛ sɛw nɛ nɔɔ nɛ ɔɔbe. Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa a be gbɔm nɛɛra bɔ, tam maas wɔ hi gig fɔk sɛw hi hɛksɔ.
Yɛrɛ kuudu gɔ be rɛml wɔrk du be ɗundɔ, be dosin a Galile.
Piyɛr goo
a an nabeza nɔɔ hi ɔɔmɔ si̧, benɛ be taam nɔɔk ɔɔk nɛ zaŋ!
Yeesu
a be raasum rɔbo: a yɛ̧ms yɛrɛ gedu mɔ faab dɔɔ taarɛ a mɔ mɛɛbe gɛ, kɔba gi ɔɔ kekugo.
Piyɛr
a gi gi nɛ an be wɔr hi mɔɔ si̧, be taa nɛ hinɔ faak nɛ zaŋ a be mɛɛmɔ gɛ.
Walɛsɛrɛ zaadɛ wɔ hi ta̧a̧ anbɔ sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu wɛɛ zaatin hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ a lɛlza bɔ nuŋgɔ a Gɛsɛmanɛ ge, yɔ hi tuurɔ
a ɗɔɔtin hɛdi, bee be da be zɔ̧bs Bɛto.
Yɔ gi reko kam Piyɛr hi Zebede waatɔ wɔ eerɛ, Yohana hi Yakuba. Yaala yɛɛl miŋki hi koltuunɛ.
Wɛɛ
a kpoos be gisib wɔtigi hurko. Kɔmbin hɛdi nɛ za̧a̧lɔl hi beya.
Wɛɛ rek hɛml kaasi gbuut a hɛbtdi zɔ̧ Bɛt an yɛrɛ lɛ:
a Baaba, hinɔ gi ɗɛɛ, hɛmlinmɔ dakwaa ya̧a̧rhantya yɛrɛ be muutdu, hinza gɛ, taa anyɔ ha̧a̧be, gi anyɔ ha̧a̧ mɔya.
Wɛɛ wɛɛz a walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ taarɛ wɔ hi, zɛ̧hi yoom du. War Piyɛr
a yɛrɛ ma nɛ́ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an nɛ za̧a̧lɔl hi bee kaasi gɛ ya?
Za̧a̧nlɔlɛ nɛ zɔ̧ Bɛto an bɔnɛ mat a maatil du. Doo bɔ mɔkilɔ ha̧a̧g an gi woo rɔbo, wɛɛ muulɔ hɔ̧nighɔ̧nɔ.
Wɛɛ rek hɛml dɔɔ eesimɛ, wɛɛ zɔ̧ Bɛt an yɛrɛ lɛ:
a Baaba, gi taa an dakwaa ya̧a̧rhantya yɛrɛ gi ha̧sa be yɔ̧g gɛ gɛ, woom anyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ!
Wɛɛ wɛɛz a walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi, wɛɛ zɛ̧hi yoom du ɓɛ, yoom bɔ ɓɛrihi be hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi za̧a̧lɔl gɛ be.
Yeesu wɛɛ hɛml ɔɔhi dɔɔ taasimɛ, rek zɔ̧ Bɛto dɔghin an ya̧a̧ gbuna bɔ.
Kuudu wɛɛ wɛɛz a walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi
a nɛ yok nɛ holikhol ma ya? Yɛrɛ ɔ̧tɔ tuur ma, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi gaayyik ma gɛrɛ a hinha̧a̧lya wɔ hi naandu.
Ɗukinɛ wɛ rekɔ! Yɛrɛ za̧a̧n bɔ gib rɛ̧ɛ̧ko gi gɛdi!

Yɔ Yeesu gi ya̧a̧boosig te walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ koobl daa eer wɔ zaaya̧ gbun bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yahuda zaa, hi dood saal kittɔnɔ. Dood saal kit wɔ hi gig fɔbzugo hi kamzig daŋbɛsim wɛ, hi sɔɔl wɛ. Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hii yaazihi.
Yahuda, za̧a̧n bɔ gi rɛ̧ɛ̧k Yeesu goks nɛ dood saal wɔ hinyɔ gɔgi re gi gɔs Yeesu anyɔ lɛ:
a za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ be re be zɔm wɛktɔ, za̧a̧nɔ giya, wa̧a̧nɛge.
Yahuda yɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ sɔɔ Yeesu dɔŋdi nɔɔktɔnɔ
a seko, Hingokya!
Wɛɛ zɔm wɛktɔ feed.
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧ raa
a sa̧a̧ɔ, nɛ woom hinyɔ mɔ zaa wook ma mi!
Yɔ anbɔ, dood zaadɛ wɔ hi zaanɛ di hi yu̧u̧ hi wa̧a̧g gɔ.
Doo za gbun bɔ gi waatingo nɛ hi Yeesu hɔ̧b daŋ-bɛsim a saŋk du dɛ̧ɛ̧rin Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ gbaarɔ tɔnɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa wal bɔ
a wɛɛnum daŋbɛsim mɔ bɔ saŋk du. Ya̧a̧nɛ, dood wɔ hi gbɔ̧mnik dood daŋbɛsimi, hi gbɔ̧mnihi daŋbɛsim be.
Mɔ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ a be ɗɛɛ an be ɛr Baa be Bɛt gi yaasib walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ layaadɛ gi daar duk koobl daa eerɛ an hi ɗaasib gɛ ya?
Nɛ à be gɔ nɛ anbɔ, hinyɔ gi Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du yɔ da̧a̧ ri nɔ? Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol bɔ raa a gi an hinɔ gi wooy gi da̧a̧ anyɔ lɛ.
A yɛmsɔ gedu, Yeesu wɛɛ raa dood saal wɔ
a gi an nɛ zaan daŋbɛsim wɔ hi sɔɔl wɔ nɛ wa̧a̧be an be gi nɛ luur ha̧a̧l wɔdwɔɔlikya ya? Ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw be ɗɔɔtig nɛ a Bɛtluk du be hingoko, wɛɛ nɛ zāā nɛ wa̧a̧b gɛ be.
Yɛrɛ hin wɔrɔ hi tuur an hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du gi
Yɔ anbɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛw hi nɔɔ hi ɔɔge hi reekɔ.
Dood wɔ hi wa̧a̧ Yeesu hi kaŋg a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ Kayafas ge a lɛlyɔ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi mɔks ge.
Hɔnɛ Piyɛr gi fɔbzig Yeesu kuudu hɛmltɔnɔ be, zaa tuur a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ gi raa du, da gul raa teesdu, gi ɗɔɔtig hi walɛsɛrɛ lɛl-ookya wɔ lɛlgbunu an gi see hinyɔ gɔ gi wooy gi da̧a̧.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ sɛw hi gis Yeesu ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧mik muul an hi wa̧a̧nig dɔglɛ hi gbɔŋge.
An dood zaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi gisig ya̧a̧wɔk si̧, hí zɛ̄m dɔgl za yɔ rii an hi gbaasig dɔgl ha gi wɔr gɛ be. Kuudu dood eerɛ hi sɔɔz gɔ ma ɓɔrɔ,
hi raa
a za̧a̧n yɛrɛ
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ ɗuk war Yeesu
a mɔ taa hinza gook ya? Dood wɛrɛ hi gim nɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧niko?
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu gōō hinza gɛ kɔms sɔsɔg. Bɔrɔ wɛɛ warige
a be gim raak an mɔ dɛŋglsib hin a Bɛt Za̧a̧til bɔ gi nuŋg du, mɔɔ gi Masihu bɔ, Bɛt waaɔ ya? Raasiwi hinɔ, wi mɛɛ.
Yeesu googe
a anyɔ mɔ
Bɛɛ anbɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ taar gbandilɔ gɔ kpa̧s wɛɛ
a yɛrɛ boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Bɛt zulha da̧a̧da̧, ha̧a̧wɛ dɔgl segya ma gɛ! Nɛ lag ya̧a̧ha̧a̧lɔ yɔ boo a Bɛt zulha be!
Nɛ mɔk nɔ?
Wɔrɔ hi ta̧a̧
a nɛ dɔgl wa̧a̧gwa̧, ɔɔ gbɔŋkyɔ.
Bɛɛ ma anbɔ hi yɛlsig set tulsig a muutdu, hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧ɔ̧ge,
zaadɛ hi dɛŋg be, hi wɛɛ hi
a mɔɔ Masihu, Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya gbɔɔlɛ, taamɔ, mɔ dɔgsiw za̧a̧nyɔ dɛ̧mɔ!
Piyɛr rek ɗɔɔt nɛ raa du a luk dɔŋya̧ di be, nis za gbaar zaa
a nɛ mɔɔ da gitin nɛ hi Yeesu Galileya bɔ hɛw ma mi?
Piyɛr faag a dood lɔlgbar sɛw raa
a bé mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ dɔk gɛ.
Yɔ wɛɛ gi rek a tutin-gbar bɔ ge, nis za wɛɛ gbɛnige, raas dood wɔ hi gidi
a za̧a̧n yɛrɛ da gitin hi Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ elo.
Piyɛr wɛɛ faag dɔɔ eesimɛ
a be dɛŋglɔ, be mɛɛ walɔ gɛ.
Kuudu kaasi wɔ hi ginɛ dihɔ hi wɛɛ hi sɔɔz a Piyɛr ge hi
a hi rɔbo, mɔ gi zaaya̧ gbunyɔ. Ya̧a̧boon mɔ bɔ gii zunsiw anbɔ be.
Yɔ anbɔ Piyɛr wɛɛ yɛɛl dɔki
a be dɛŋglɔ, bé gi ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧ko Bɛt gí ha̧a̧nib ya̧a̧rɛ! Bé mɛ̄ɛ̄ wal yɛrɛ gɛ!
Ɓɔrbɔ kɔba kek gɔ gbɔŋ
Piyɛr wɛɛ mɔk mɛɛ hinyɔ Yeesu da raag nɛ be
a an kɔba gɔ gi kekɔ, mɔɔ mɔ faabe gi dor dɔɔ taarɛ a mɔ mɛɛbe gɛ.
Wɛɛ tuu lak di kaa ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Yɔ lɛl gaa bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ sɛw hi mɔks hi wɔ̀ kɔlki a Yeesu zulha an hi gbɔŋge.
Hi wa̧a̧ Yeesu hi wɔge hi wɛɛ hi kaŋge a hɛbtzulya bɔ Pilatu ge.

Yɔ Yahuda, za̧a̧n yɔ rɛ̧ɛ̧ Yeesu gbɛn hi wa̧a̧ Yeesu hi rek hi gisig dɔgl-gbaak anbɔ, mɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ gi woo gɛ, wɛns Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ tus bɔ hi toog nɛko tus gaat dumbili taarɛ,
a yɔ be rɛ̧ɛ̧ za̧a̧n yɔ taan hin-a̧a̧b gɛ, be gaag a wɔrk naan du, be woo hinha̧a̧lɛ!
Wɔrɔ hi googe
a dɔgl wi gidu ya? Dɔgl mɔɔnɛ.
Yahuda yɔ lag anbɔ bis tus bɔ a Bɛtluk du dihɔ wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ tuu rekɔ, da kar ba̧a̧n ɓɛyɔ.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧k tus gaat wɔ bis hɛbtdi hi raa:
a tus yɛrɛ ga̧a̧mtusɛ; maak wɛ gāaw gbɔnɔ an wɛ loo wɛ gbaa a Bɛtluk tusgbaaklɛl du gɛ.
Yɔ hi watin dɔglɔ hi loo tus bɔ, hi zemn nám dɔnwɔŋkya bako an hi gbaas dood rɔ̀bɛ loorlɛlɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, tuur a ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ, hi elik bak bɔ a ga̧a̧mbako,
an hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Zeremi dɔg amntɔnɔ gi
a hi loo tus gaat dumbili taarɛ
hi zemn nám dɔnwɔŋkya bako anyɔ Waar Bɛt raasib dɔglɔ.
Yɔ hi kam Yeesu gi erk a hɛbtzulya bɔ Pilatu muutdu, warige
a mɔɔ gi Yahuduya waar gbɔɔl ya?
Yeesu goo
a anyɔ mɔ raa.
Hɔnɛyɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi gig hingɛ̧ɛ̧nik be, wɛɛ gōō hinza ma gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Pilatu warige
a mɔ taa kɛŋk dɔgl kit wɔ hi gim gɛ̧ɛ̧nik ya?
Yeesu kɔm hititi, gōō nɛ hinza gbun mɔɔt gɛ; bɛɛ anbɔ hin kɔms hɛbtzulya bɔ gɛrs gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Paska naab gɔ rii, hɛbtzulya bɔ gɔ gi waasig dood saal wɔ luknɔya za gbun yɔ hi ɛrige bisigi.
Doo za luknɔya giro nuŋgɔ a Barabas, dood sɛw hi mɛɛ gabsɔ dɔglɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Pilatu war ma dood saal wɔ hi mɔksɔ
a ha̧a̧nɛ an be bitsin bɔ? Barabas gii ya, Yeesu bɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Kristu gii ya?
Gii hɛbtzulya bɔ mɛɛ be a hi gaanib Yeesu naandu hi ka̧a̧syɔ.
Wɛɛ, yɔ Pilatu da gi ɗɔɔtig a dɔgl-gbaak luk du
a gi ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ, nistɔ yaasig ramsɛ a bɔmɔ gɔs nɛ wal riit bɔrɔ hinza nɛ zaŋ. Hinɔ giya lel yɛms du yorum gi ha̧a̧nib ya̧a̧r gbɔɔltɔnɔ a gi dɔŋgo.
Hɔnɛ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi sɔmb dood saal wɔ an hi ɛr Pilatu gi bis Barabas gi ɔɔ Yeesu hi gbɔŋge.
Hɛbtzulya bɔ wɛɛ warihi
a dood eerɛ wɛrɛ ha̧a̧nɛ an be bitsin nɔni?
Wɔrɔ hi ta̧a̧
a Barabas giya!
Wɛɛ warihi
a Yeesu yɔ nuŋgɔ a Kristu be woosig nɔ?
Dood sɛw hi ta̧a̧
a doomɔg dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha!
Pilatu wɛɛ warɔ
a woo nɔ hinɔ ha̧a̧lɔ nɔ?
Wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ hi ɓooya̧a̧ hi tɛŋko
a doomɔg a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha kpɔd!
Yɔ Pilatu ɗɛɛ hinza gɔk gɛ, gi wɛɛ gi gbɛn gabs gi ɗundig a dood teesdu loo mɛm nɛɛn naanɔ a dood saal wɔ hi lɔlgbar sɛw
a wal yɛrɛ wɔrkɔ dɔgl be taa du! Dɔgl nɛɛnɛ!
Dood saal wɔ sɛw hi ta̧a̧
a an ga̧a̧mɔ gi wɛɛz wi zulha hi waat wi zulha!
Bɛɛ anbɔ Pilatu bitsihi Barabas wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ rek be. Wɛɛ raa dood zaadɛ hi lɛb Yeesu hi kpoot yɔ hi yɛɛn tusɛ, wɛɛ loo Yeesu gaa dood naandu an hi rek hi doog dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha.
Pilatu laaya ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi loo Yeesu hi kaŋg hɛbtzulya bɔ raaɔ bɔ ge du, laaya wɔ hi zɛɛr nɛ sɛw hi mɔks lɛlɔdi.
Hi hod gbandilɔ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi heksig dimnaan hob muulɛ.
Hi wɛɛ hi haŋg kal kobsya hi heksig zulha, hi wɛɛ hi gaag bɔ̧ɔ̧kkok wa̧a̧ a naanrɔbo. Hi zagl gi muutdu hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lig hi raag anyɔ lɛ,
a seko ya, Waar Yahuduya!
Hi tulsig set muulɛ, hi wɛɛ hi loo bɔ̧ɔ̧kkok bɔ hi gaag nɛ hi lɛmnig zulha.
Yɔ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lig gi da̧a̧ anbɔ hi hod dimnaan hob bɔ, hi wɛɛ hi heksig gbandilɔ wɔ muulɛ, hi kaŋg ma gɔ an hi rek hi doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧rha.
Yɔ dood hi tuuzig hi Yeesu hi dagtin hi wal za Kirɛnɛya nuŋgɔ a Simɔŋ hi fɛ̧ɛ̧ge pɛɛ Yeesu dɔ̧ɔ̧rɔ bɔ kamɔ.
Yɔ hi rek hi tuur a lɛlyɔ gɔ hi el a Golgota (raakɔ a zullɛŋk lɛlɛ) ge,
hi gaa Yeesu bum yɔ hi ɔksin yɛ̧ɛ̧s zobtil an gi yɔ̧, hɔnɛ gii yɔ dag be iinɔ.
Hi looge hi doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ hage hi wɛɛ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧tin gbandilɔ wɔ hi len subudyɔ.
Hi wɛɛ hi ɗɔɔt dihɔ hi ooge.
Hi bi̧i̧ hinza a tɛ̧ɛ̧hɛɛk fɛɛt ha a ZA̧A̧N YƐRƐ GI YEESU , YAHUDUYA WAAR YƆ, hi doo gi zullɛl ha a dɔ̧ɔ̧r muulɛ, an hi zuun dɔglɔ.
Hi wɛɛ hi doo luurɛ ha̧a̧l eerɛ a dɔ̧ɔ̧r zaadɛ ha a gi dɔŋdi: gbunu a gi naanrɔbo, zaa gbunu a gi naanyɛ̧li.
Dood wɔ hi daak hɔdi hi namsig zulya̧ hi Yeesu niiko,
a mɔɔ Bɛtluk-ɛ̧brikya bɔ, wɔŋkya bɔ ɔ̧t taarɛ! Za̧a̧sum zul mɔ ma! Gid mɔ gi Bɛt waayɔ, sizum dɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ hage ma!
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi Yahu-duya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi gig kpɛ̧ɛ̧lik an hin gbun bɔ hɛw, hi raako:
a woy! za̧a̧s dood zaadɛ be, yɛrɛ ɗɛɛ an gi za̧a̧s zulɔ ma gɛ ya? Nɛ gii gi Israhilaya waar i ma. Sizig ma ɓɔri a dɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ hage, wɛɛ be, wɛ ɗɔbsig ma!
Gbaa kpoosɔ sɛw a Bɛt ge, dɔg a bee be Bɛt waayɔ. Bɛrɔ! Yɛwɛ see kinsa Bɛt ha̧a̧g gi muulɛ an gi za̧a̧sig ɓɔri be!
Wɛɛ luurɛ ha̧a̧l wɔd wɔɔlikya wɔ hi doohi dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha a gi dɔŋdi hi gig niik lab be.
A lurk teesdu der, lɛlwil a waal bɔ gedu sɛw, am tuur a naaba̧a̧n du.
Yɔ ɔ̧t gi a naaba̧a̧n du Yeesu ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ el hinɛ a
ꞌꞌEli, Eli, laama sabaktani? ꞌꞌ
Raakɔ a
Bɛt be, Bɛt be, mɔ ɔɔb nɔ?
Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi erk nɛ lɛlɔdi hi lag anbɔ hi raa
a za̧a̧n yɛrɛ gi elik Eliya giya!
Ɓɔrbɔ zaaya̧ gbun nɔɔ da looz bɔɔm tɔ̧ɔ̧z mɛm haatil gedu sa̧a̧ a bɔ̧ɔ̧kkok mɛs ha dɔns Yeesu ya̧a̧gbarɔ an gi yɔ̧.
Hɔnɛ dood zaadɛ wɔ hi raa
a erum kete, kinsa Eliya gi zaa gi za̧a̧sig be!
Yeesu wɛɛ ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ wɔr gɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ gbandil fɛɛt bɔ hi mal a Bɛtluk du taar tees du der, yɛɛl taarik wɛɛha had wɛɛdisɛ. Hɛbt namɔ, hɛɛl gbɔlɛ wɔ hi ɓɛɛlɔ.
Loor wɔ hi mibtir be Bɛt doodɔ wɔ hi wɔr nɛ kittɔnɔ hi rɛmlɔ hi ɗund
hi tuuz a loor wɔ gedu be. Yɔ hi ɗund a Yeesu rɛmtigɔ kuu, hi gul a waal gbɔɔl gaat bɔ Urusalima gedu, dood kittɔnɔ hi gbɛnihi be.
Laaya gbɔɔl Romaya bɔ gi erk di hi laaya dɛɛt wɔ hi ook nɛ an bɔhi loo Yeesu muulɔ bɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha luurɛ, yɔ hi gbɛn hɛbt bɔ beekɔ anbɔ hi hinyɔ tuur sɛw hoob gi ha̧a̧hi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi
a hi rɔbo, wal yɛrɛ gi nɛ Bɛt waayɔ!
Nɛɛd zaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi gi erk nɛ hɛmltɔnɔ hi lɔl seezugo. Hii da fɔbz nɛ Yeesu a Galile hi gaag nɛ leesɛ.
A hi teesdu Mariyama Magdalaya bɔ giro, Mariyama yɔ gi Yakuba hi Yusufu nàaya̧ hi Zebede waatɔ wɔ naaya̧ hi ginɛ du be.
Yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ doo rɔɔsya zayɔ fu̧u̧ a Arimate waal gbɔɔl du tuurɔ, nuŋgɔ a Yusufu; gi Yeesu fɔkya ɔ̧ɔ̧n hɛw,
rek zɛm Waar Pilatu warig Yeesu muulɔ bɔ. Yɔ anbɔ Pilatu raa a hi rek hi gaa Yusufu Yeesu muulɔ bɔ.
Yusufu rek loo Yeesu muulɔ bɔ, wɛɛ da loo gbandil buu fɛr fɛɛti wɔbtinge,
kam i̧i̧ a loor seg ɔ̧nɛ yɔ su̧u̧ hi naanɔ a hɛɛl gbɔɔl du gedu. Wɛɛ kibl hɛɛl fɛɛti mibtin loor bɔ ya̧a̧gbarɔ rekɔ.
Mari-yama Magdalaya bɔ hi Mariyama zaa bɔ hi gidi hi ɗɔɔt hi riitin hi loor bɔ ya̧a̧gbarɔ der.
Yoosugɔ holum-ɔ̧tyɔ hi gɛms wɔd gedu talɔ, Bɛtmaak-wookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Farisaya wɔ hi rek hi mɔks a Pilatu muutdu,
hi
a ɗɛntyɔ, be mɔk be mɛɛ a Yeesu , wal ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya bɔ ginɛ za̧a̧til da dɔg nɛ a kuudu ɔ̧t taarɛ be rɛmlɔ be ɗundɔ.

Yɛrɛ, raam laaya wɔ hi rek hi oo loor bɔ gi tuur ɔ̧t taasimɛ, an bɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rek hi loo wɔrkɔ bɔ luur an hi wɛɛ hi raas dood kuudu: a Yeesu wɛɛ rɛmlɔ ɗuundɔ. Kuudu ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nɔ yɔ tɔɔ yɔ daar doos bɔ hɛw.
Yɔ Pilatu lag anbɔ wɛɛ
a nɛ loon layaadɛ lɛl-ookyaadɛ gɛrɛ, nɛ da nɛ rek nɛ oo loorlɛl bɔ bɛttɔnɔ anyɔ nɛ ɗɛɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ hi re gɔ. Yɔ hi rekɔ hi see loorbet bɔ, hi wɛɛ hi loo ba̧a̧ni hi wɔmn loorbet bɔ hi wɛɛ hi gbaa laaya wɔ hi oo gɔ.
Yɔ holum-ɔ̧t talɔ, yɔ lɛl gɔ gi gaa a dimaas ɔ̧t bi̧i̧l du, Mariyama Magdalaya bɔ hi Mariyama zaa bɔ hi rek Yeesu loorɔ bɔ seeko.
Yaala Bɛtwalsɛr za siz bɛtha zaa kibl loorbet bɔ bɛrko ɗɔɔt hage. Hɛbt nam gɔ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Bɛt-walsɛr bɔ muulɔ gaa an bɛlya̧bsɛ, gbandilɔ wɔ hi buu an bɛlɓatiri.
Yɔ loor-ookya wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hoobha̧a̧hi ha̧a̧l-tɔnɔ, hi bee hi kɔm di an wɔrko.
Hɔnɛ Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ raa
nɛɛd wɔ a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ, be mɛɛ a nɛ ɓɛɛk Yeesu yɔ hi doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha giya.
Taa hɛdi, rɛmla ɗund anyɔ da raasinɛ, zaan nɛ see lɛl yɔ da kus nɛ gɛrɛ,
nɛ wɛɛ nɛ rek nɔɔko nɛ raas walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a Yeesu rɛmla ɗund wɔrkɛ teesdu, wɛɛ gisin dork a Galile, nɛ rek nɛ gbɛnig hɔ. Hinyɔ gi nɛ an be dɔgsinɛ gii ma bɔ.
Nɛɛd wɔ hi ɔɔ loorlɛl bɔ nɔɔktɔnɔ hi rek hi hoobo hi hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ, hi nɔɔ hi ren ramsɔ an hi fɔks walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧.
Yaala Yeesu zaa dagtin hi nɛɛd wɔ
a seko!
Nɛɛd wɔ hi sɔɔz gi dɔŋdi hi zaglɔ hi wa̧a̧ dɔɔɔ hi ɗɔbsige.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ, rekin nɛ raas yɛ̧ɛ̧ be hiya hi rek a Galile hi gbɛnib hɔ.
Yɔ nɛɛd wɔ hi reko, laaya wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi ook nɛ loor bɔ hi rek a waal gbɔɔl du, hi fɔks Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hinyɔ daa sɛw.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ be, hi mɔks hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi wɔya̧a̧ hi loo tus gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi gaa laaya wɔ,
hi sɔmbihi
a nɛ
Hɛbtzulya bɔ gi lagɔ, wi mɛɛ dɔglyɔ gɔ wi ɗɛɛnige an wi tuusin ya̧a̧rhant du.
Laaya wɔ hi loo tus bɔ hi woo an hinyɔ hi
Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa gbun hi rek a Galile, a ga̧a̧t yɔ da raa nɛ a hí dagtin lɛlɔge.
Yɔ hi tuur hi gbɛn Yeesu hi zagl di hi ɗɔbsige. Zaadɛ hi tees du hi faak hi kpoos du a gii gɛ, doo za dɔɔmyɔ.
Yeesu sɔɔzɔ dɔksihi
a Bɛt gaab tɛŋk sɛw a bɛtha hi hɛbtdi.
Yɔ anbɔ, rekin nɛ wɛɛn dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t waal du sɛw walɛsɛrɛ benɛ. Hotinnɛhi Bɛtmɛmɛ hi Baa nuŋgɔ, hi waaɔ hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ.
Goksinɛhi hinyɔ be dɔgsin sɛw hi fɔb dɔglɔ. Yɛrɛ mɛɛn a be gi hi nɛɛ ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw gi tuur a waalda̧a̧ki. Anbɔ.
Hɛdi dɔgl yɔ gi book Yeesu Kristu Bɛt waaɔ Dɔgl Rɔbɔ gii yɛɛlɔ.
A Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya gi ɗɛɛrwol du hi bi̧i̧:
a Bɛt raa a yɛrɛ be yaak tɔmsbeya gɛrɛ a mɔ muutdu an gi gɛbtsum gbɔnɔ mɔ a dood tees du.
Hi kɛm za̧a̧nza gi ya̧a̧ɓoolik a hɛtdɔŋ du: a gɛbtsin Waar bɔ gbɔnɔɔ̧! Gɛbtsinɛg gbɔnɔ wɔ hi er bɛttɔnɔ!
Yɔ Yohana tuur a hɛtdɔŋg du anbɔ, gi hotingo dood Bɛtmɛmɛ, wɛɛ gisihi hindɔko:
a zɛmrin kpoos nɛ, loon Bɛtmɛmɛ, Bɛt gi bitsin hinha̧a̧l nɛ wɔ.
Dood Yahuduya wɔ hi Urusalimaya wɔ sɛw hi zaa a ge. Hi walk hinha̧a̧lya̧ wɔ a Yohana muutdu. Hotinihi Bɛtmɛm gɔ a Urdum zɛɛ du.
Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ heg gban yɔ hi gɔn gɛloba sɛɛsɛ, hi nahi̧i̧l a see du. Gi za̧a̧nik leesɔ dagrɛ hi hɔ̧dkurumi.
Gi dɔk anyɔ lɛ:
a Za̧a̧n yɔ gɔ gi zaa a be kuudu gin tɛŋk daar bee daarɔ. Bé tuur doo rɔb a gi muutdu an be hu̧u̧r be pid taal ba̧a̧nɔ gɛ.
Bee be gin Bɛtmɛm hotingo hi mɛm tɔs; yɛrɛ giya, gi hotinnɛ Bɛtmɛm hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ.
A ɔ̧tɔ gedu Yeesu fu̧u̧z a Nazarɛd, a Galile hɛbt du; tuur a lɛlyɔ Yohana gi ge, hotinge Bɛtmɛmɛ a Urdum zɛ̧ɛ̧rnɔ du.
Yɔ Yeesu gi tuuzig a mɛm bɔ gedu, gbɛn bɛtha kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ, Bɛt Mɔkil gi sizig gi muul an gutu buu.
Hi wɛɛ hi kɛm ya̧a̧boon za fu̧u̧z bɛtha:
a mɔɔ gi waa be yɔ ha̧a̧be hi kpoos be sɛw; be gaa hat be sɛw a mɔɔ.
Ɓɔrbɔ Bɛt Mɔkil bɔ renig a hɛtdɔŋ du.
Yɔ Saydanu maatige, waa lɛlɔge ɔ̧t dumbili nasɔ. Waa nam hɛtum wɔ hi teesdu, Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi gig ooko.
Yɔ hi yaa Yohana a luknɔ du, kuudu Yeesu rek a Galile, dɔg Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge.
Raa:
a ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt dɛ̧ɛ̧ tuurɔ, wáátɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ! Zɛmrin kpoos nɛ, ɗɔbsin Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ!
Yɔ Yeesu gi daak a mɛmbal ya̧ gbarɔ, a Galile, gbɛn dutwa̧a̧kyaadɛ Simɔŋ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Andrɛ, hi gbalik zagr a mɛmbal du hi wa̧a̧nik dutu.
Yeesu
a fɔbzinbe, an be wɛɛnin doodkamzigyaadɛ a Bɛt wáát du an dut yɔ nɛ wa̧a̧zig be.
Wɔrɔ ɓɔrbɔ hi ɔɔ zagrya̧ wɔ, hi fɔ Yeesu gɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu re gi hɛ̧ml kaasi, gbɛn Zebede waatɔ walɛ wɔ Yakuba hi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Yohana hi gɛbsig zagr a lɛmb du.
Ɓɔrbɔ elihi, hi ɔɔ baaya̧ Zebede a lɛmb du hi woosya wɔ, hii be hi retin hi giya.
Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi tuur a Kapɛrnayum. Yɔ Yahuduya wɔ holum-ɔ̧tya̧ rii, Yeesu gul a mɔksilluk du yɛɛl hingoko.
Anyɔ gii taa an Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ, hingokɔ bɔ kɔms dood wɔ gɛrsɛ; wɛɛ gisihi hingok an doo yɔ gin tɛŋk an gi gog hinɛ.
Za̧a̧n za gi nɛ a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu gin loorɛha̧a̧l muul du. Yɔ Yeesu yɛɛl hingok her, za̧a̧n bɔ ɓooya̧a̧: a dɔgl mɔ nɔ hi wiiya,
Yeesu Nazarɛdya? Mɔ zaa an mɔ ha̧tirwi ha̧tir ya? Be mɛɛ bɛttɔnɔ a mɔɔ bɔ; mɔɔ gi Doo Gaat yɔ Bɛt yaazige!
Yeesu ya̧a̧lig, raag
a loorɛha̧a̧lɛ, wagsumɔ, tuum za̧a̧n yɛrɛ gi muul du!
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ zikt wal bɔ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ tuu gi muul hi kaal ɓoottɔnɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ dood sɛw hin kɔmsihi gɛrs yɛ̧ltɔnɔ, hi ɛtinu:
a hin bɔrɔ lab nɔ hinɔ be?
Hingok seg za hi tɛŋk ya mi! Wal yɛrɛ gɔ raa loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hɛw hi kɛmsig tɔn kɛmsɔ!
Hi wɛɛ hi kɛm Yeesu nuŋgɔ ɗuk a Galile hɛbt du sɛw nɔɔktɔnɔ.
Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi ɔɔ mɔksilluk bɔ, hi wɛɛ hi tuu hi rek a Simɔŋ hi Andrɛ raa du. Yakuba hi Yohana hi fɔhi.
Simɔŋ gɔnsiŋ zulɔ laag gi kusig be. Yeesu bɛɛ tuuruko, hi dɔgsig nis bɔ dɔglɔ.
Yeesu sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi, wa̧a̧ naanɔ ɗuksig ha. Zullaanɔ bɔ da̧a̧ gɔ, nis bɔ wɛɛ gaa Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ leesɛ hi le.
Yɔ lɛɛsig tuurɔ, ɔ̧t gi legɔ, dood hi kams Yeesu gumtil wɔ sɛw hi wɔ hi gin loorɛha̧a̧l muul du.
Dood a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu sɛw hi zaa hi mɔks a luk gbɔnɔya̧ bɔ ge.
Yeesu za̧a̧s dood kit wɔ hi gin nɛ gums gaŋsɛ gaŋsɛ, wɛɛ nin loorɛha̧a̧l kittɔnɔ; gāāhi gbɔnɔ an hi booya̧a̧ gɛ, anyɔ loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi mɛɛ za̧a̧nɔ be.
A bi̧i̧l ɗɔbt du Yeesu tuu waal bɔ rek a lɛl-aakil du an gi zɔ̧ Bɛto.
Simɔŋ hi dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi elo hi tɛge.
Yɔ hi midige, hi
a dood sɛw hi gi mɔɔ tɛko.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ
a ɗɛwɛ rek a lɛlza, a raat wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b di gedu, an be re be dɔg Bɛt dɔglɔ hɔ hɛw, ya̧a̧nɛ be zaa.
Yeesu ɛmb a Galile waalɔ du sɛw, gi Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔk a hi mɔksilluk du be, wɛɛ gi ninik loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ be.
Ɗobtilya za zaa a Yeesu ge, zagl gi muutdu zɔ̧ge:
a gid ha̧a̧mɔ, mɔ ɗɛɛ an mɔ za̧a̧sibe.
Yɔ ha̧a̧sig ya̧a̧rɛ, yɔd naanɔ ki̧i̧ge,
a ha̧a̧be, gaamɔ!
Ɓɔrbɔ ɗobtil bɔ da̧a̧da̧ gi muulɛ, wal bɔ za̧a̧za̧ wɛɛ gaaga.
Kuudu Yeesu yaag ɓɔrbɔ wɛɛ
a kɛm bɛttɔnɔ, bɔmɔ raas nɛ doo za hin yɛrɛ zaŋ! Yɛrɛ yà, remɔ, mɔ zuns Bɛtmaakwookya bɔ gik yɔ mɔ giyɔ. Kuudu wɛɛmɔ mɔ gɔs Bɛt maako anyɔ Muusa raa, an mɔ zuns dood a mɔ gaaga, mɔ za̧a̧za̧.

Hɔnɛyɔ wal bɔ bɛɛ reko yɛls dood sɛw hinyɔ Yeesu woosig fɔkig a lɛl sɛw. Yɔ anbɔ, Yeesu ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ rek a waal gbɔɔl za du an gi zuun muutɔ ma gɛ. Kɔm a lakɛ a lɛl-aakil du. Wɛɛ dood hi fu̧u̧zig a lɛl sɛw hi zaak a ge.
Kuudu yɔ ɔ̧t an eerɛ zaa taarɛ hi talɔ, Yeesu wɛɛz a Kapɛrnayum. Dood hi lag a gi raa du.
Dood kittɔnɔ hi zaa hi mɔks deder, tuur a lukgbarɔ, lɛl-aakil zɛ̧ɛ̧r gɛ. Yeesu gisihi dɔk Bɛt dɔglɔ.
Dood zaadɛ hi zaa hi nasɔ hi kamz doo za zaŋgdi hi tɛŋzig tees du.
Yɔ dood saal hi hi̧i̧s deder be, gbɔnɔ daas lɛl taa an hi sɛ̧bsig a Yeesu ge. Hi kar luk zulha, hi mibr lɛlyɔ riitin hi Yeesu der. Hi sis zaŋgd bɔ kus sil ha a tuutir lɛlyɔ hi gɔ gedu.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn dood wɔ ɗɔbsigya̧, raa zaŋgd bɔ:
a waa be, be bitsum hinha̧a̧l mɔ wɔ bitsɔ.
Bɛtmaakdɔkya zaadɛ hi ɗɔɔt nɛ di hi gi zulya̧ hinwark be:
a wal yɛrɛ yɛɛl ri gi book ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Bɛt zulha nɔ! Bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi bis hinha̧a̧l nɔ? Bɛt gii ɗɛɛ gi gbun kpɔd!
Ɓɔrbɔ yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ hinyɔ wɔrɔ hi mɔkig hi kpoos du be, warihi:
a nɔ nɛ gin mɔkil anbɔ nɔ?
An be raa doo zaŋgd bɔ a ɗukumɔ mɔ́ loo sil mɔ, mɔ́ ɛmbɔ, hi záá raakɔ a be bitsum hinha̧a̧l mɔ bitsɔ, nɔni ɓaa gi daarlɛl nɔ?
Yɛrɛ ha̧a̧be an nɛ mɛɛ a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gin tɛŋk a hɛbtdi an gi bits dood hinha̧a̧lɛ.
Raa doo zaŋgd bɔ:
a be raamɔ, ɗukumɔ, loom sil mɔ, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ lɛlɛ!
A ya̧a̧ gbun bɔ gedu wal bɔ ɗukɔ, loo silɔ tuu a dood lɔlgbar sɛw. Yɔ anbɔ, hi sɛw kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ. Hi wɛɛ hi baan Bɛt hi raa
a wí gbɛ̄ndir nɛ hinza riitin an yɛrɛ zaŋ gɛ!
Yeesu wɛɛ tuu Kapɛrnayum rek a Galile mɛmbal ya̧. Yɔ dood saal wɔ sɛw hi zaa a ge, goksihi hinɛ.
Yɔ gi daako, gbɛn Alfe waawal Lewi ɗɔɔt a toosluk du,
a fɔbzibe!
Lewi ɗukɔ fɔge.
Yɔ Yeesu re gi lekhin a Lewi raa du, tooszekya wɔ hi hinha̧a̧lwookya zaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi lekhin lɛlgbunu hi Yeesu , hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ, dood kittɔnɔ hi fɔg nɛ be.
Yɔ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi gi a Farisaya wɔ hi teesdu hí gbɛ̄n Yeesu gi lekhin hi tooszekya wɔ hi hinha̧a̧lwookya wɔ, hi war walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a nɔ ɗɛnt nɛ gi lek hin hi tooszekya wɛrɛ hi hinha̧a̧lwookya wɛrɛ nɔ?
Yɔ Yeesu kɛmɔ, wɛɛ
a dood wɔ muulya̧ gi rɔbtɔnɔ hā̧ā̧hi gɛr gɛ, ha̧a̧ gumtil wɔ hiya. Bé zāā an be el dood rɔbɛ gɛ, be zaa an be el hinha̧a̧lya wɔ hiya.
Ɔ̧tza ma Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi Farisaya wɔ hi lisig Bɛt leesɛ. Dood hi zaa hi war Yeesu :
a dood wɛrɛ hi hinlilko, nɔ fɔkya mɔ wɔ hí lı̄l ya̧nɛ gɛ nɔ?
Yeesu wɛɛ goohi:
a za̧a̧n nislookya bɔ sa̧a̧mɔ wɔ hi ɗɛɛ hinlilk anyɔ nislookya bɔ gitin hi hii a lottins naab-ɔ̧t ya? Yɔ gitin hi hii be, hí ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi lil gɛ.
Yɛrɛ ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi ha̧s nis lookya bɔ du gi tuurɔ, hi lil ɔ̧tɔ ge.
Doo za gɔ sub gban taakil seg nuktig a gban haŋsil ha gɛ; à labɔ, gban seg bɔ yɔ kpaar gban haŋsil bɔ kpaar gbaŋ za, taakil lɛl bɔ yɔ fɛɛfɛ.
Wɛɛ doo za gɔ kpēl bumhob mukt a tik wɔm du gɛ; à labɔ, bum bɔ nɔɔlɔ yɔ gbɔmr tik bɔ gbɔmrɔ. Bum bɔ hi tik bɔ yɔ hi ha̧tir lɛl gbunu. Yɛrɛ bɛr an hi kpel bum mukt a tik seg du.
Ɔ̧tza a Yahuduyaadɛ holum-ɔ̧ti, Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi talik a tot bak wɔ du. Yɔ hi gi reko, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi yɛɛl tot wɔ halkigi.
Farisaya wɔ hi war Yeesu gɔ:
a sɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ, nɔ walɛsɛrɛ mɔ wɔ hi wook hinyɔ Bɛt maakɔ gāā gbɔnɔ geha a holum-ɔ̧t gɛ nɔ?
Yeesu warihi
a nɛ́ zaŋgir nɛ hinyɔ Dawda woo ɔ̧tza yɔ dag hinza gɛ, a̧a̧kil gi ha̧a̧g hi doodɔ gɛ ya?

Dawda gul Bɛtluk du, le kok kiml wɔ hi gbaas Bɛto. Maak wɛ dɔg a Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ hii hi le kok kiml wɔrɔ kpɔd. Dawda be loo kok kiml wɔ gaa doodɔ be. Abiyata gii gi Bɛtmaak-wookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ a ɔ̧tɔ ge.
Yeesu
a holum-ɔ̧t gɔys doodɛ; dood hí gɔys holum-ɔ̧t gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gii gi holum-ɔ̧t waar i hɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu wɛɛ gi gul a mɔksilluk du, wal za gi du gin naanɔ wɔlɛ.
Dood wɔ hi sɔ̧ɔ̧k Yeesu sɔsɔg a kinsa gi za̧a̧s wal naan wɔlya bɔ a holum-ɔ̧t be, an hi ɗɛɛg dɔgl gɛ̧ɛ̧nuko.
Yeesu raa wal naan wɔlya bɔ:
a ɗukum ha a dood lɔlgbar sɛw.
Kuudu ɛr dood wɔ hi gi sɔ̧ɔ̧ko:
a maak wɛ dɔg a ri? An hí gɔ hin rɔb a holum-ɔ̧t ya? Zaa hí gɔ hinha̧a̧l ya ri? Gi an hí za̧a̧s doo za̧a̧s ya? Zaa gi an hí gbɔŋ-gbɔm ya?
Hɔnɛ dood wɔ hi wɛɛ hi kɔm hititi, hí gōō hinza gɛ.
Hin nɔɔs Yeesu yɛ̧ltɔnɔ a kpoosya̧ ɓaatil bɔ gi dɔŋgo. Wɛɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧hi sɛw hi nɔɔtig lɔlɛ. Wɛɛ raa wal bɔ gɔ:
a yu̧u̧sum naan mɔ.
Naanwɔlya bɔ yu̧u̧s naanɔ, naanɔ bɔ wɛɛ bɛrɔ.
Farisaya wɔ hi gbɛn hin bɔ tal anbɔ nɔɔhi hi tuu a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu, ɓɔrbɔ hi eltin hi da hi mɔksa hi waar bɔ Hirudus doodɔ an hi wɔb kɔlk hi gbɔm Yeesu.
Yeesu ɔɔ lɛl bɔ rek hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ a Galile mɛmbal ya̧. Saal gbɔɔl fɔge. Doodya̧ hi fu̧u̧z a Galile hi a Yahuduya,
a Urusalima, a Udumɛ hɛbt du, a Urdum kasiŋ zaa bɔ ge, hi hɛbt za yɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b a Tiir dɔŋdi hi Sidɔŋg ge. Saal gbɔɔl bɔ gi zaak Yeesu ge anyɔ hi lag hinyɔ gi wook sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ an hi tɛbsig lɛmb wansɛ gi ɗɔɔt gedu, an bɔ saal wɔ hi ɓɔ̧ɔ̧g hɛbtdi.
Anyɔ gi za̧a̧sig dood kittɔnɔ, wɔ gums gi hi tɔk sɛw hi zaak ge hi beet an hi ki̧i̧ge.
Loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ gɔ hi bɛɛg gbɛnko, hi gbuut gi muutdu, hi ɓoo kaalɛ:
a mɔɔ gi Bɛt waaɔ!
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ ɓaasihi a bɔ hi raa a bee gi Za̧a̧nɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu kar a ga̧a̧t ha elz dood wɔ ha̧a̧ge, hi zaa a ge.
Her dood kooblɛ daa eer gaati wɛɛnihi tɔmsyaadɛ an hi waatin elo, gí yaahi hí dɔg Bɛt dɔglɔ,
hí wɛɛ hí dag tɛŋk an hí nin loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ.
Dood koobl daa eerɛ wɔ herihi nuŋgya̧ gɛrɛ: Simɔŋ yɔ Yeesu dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ zaa a Piyɛr ,
Zebede waatɔ walɛ wɔ Yakuba hi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Yohana, dood wɔ Yeesu dɔ̧́ɔ̧́sihi nuŋgya̧ a Bowanɛr, hinɔ raakɔ a bɛlya̧a̧sɛɛk-waatwalɛyɔ.
Andrɛ, Filib, Bartelemi, Mata, Tumas, Alfe waa wal Yakuba, Taadeyus, Simɔŋ Hɛbtwaa Gabs bɔ
hi Yahuda Iskaryudi za̧a̧nyɔ rɛ̧ɛ̧ Yeesu.
Yeesu wɛɛ wɛɛ a raa du. Yɔ dood saal wɔ hi wɛɛ hi mɔks a ge gi daarlɛlɛ, dāg gbɔnɔ an gi lehin hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hɛw gɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu nɛsɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi lag anbɔ hi zaa an hí loog hi tɛŋko. Yɔ anbɔ, dood wɔ hi raak be:
a taan kol ha.
Yɔ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi tiiz a Urusalima hi raa:
a Yeesu gin loorɛha̧a̧l waar Belzebili a gi muul du.
Gii gaag tɛŋk an gi ninin loorɛha̧a̧l wɔrɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu wɛɛ elihi, dɔgsihi dɔgl hi ya̧a̧daaniki:
a Saydanu ɗɛɛ an gi nin zulɔ ri nɔ?
À waar ums za gɛ̧ɛ̧ zulɔ, waar umsɔ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi er gɛ.
À nɛsums za gɛ̧ɛ̧yyɔ, nɛsums bɔ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi er gɛ.
À Saydanu ha̧tir zulɔ, gɛ̧ɛ̧ zul ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ; waar umsɔ bɔ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi er gɛ, tɛŋkɔ yɔ da̧a̧da̧.
Doo za ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi gul a za̧a̧nza tɛŋkya raa du an gi wɔɔl wɔdɔ gɛ, gid wɔ̄b za̧a̧n tɛŋkya bɔ kɛn gɛ. À wɔge, ɗɛɛ an gi loo wɔdɔ sɛw a gi raa du.
Be raasin rɔbo: dood hi ɗɛɛ an hi dag hinha̧a̧lya̧ bisigi hi ya̧a̧ya̧ ha̧a̧l yɔ gɔ hi boo a Bɛt zulha sɛw.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Bɛt Mɔkilɔ zulha, Bɛt taasig nɛ hinha̧a̧lɔ zaa bisig zaŋ; yɔ anbɔ, woo hinha̧a̧l yɔ gɔ gi waa faa giya.
Yeesu dɔgsihi hin bɔrɔ anbɔ yɔ hi raa:
a gin loorɛha̧a̧l gi muul du giya.
Yeesu nɔɔtɔ hi Yeesu yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hiya hi zaa hi er a lak di, hi yaas Yeesu ya̧a̧ hi elzige.
Saal wɔ hi ɗɔɔt gi dɔŋdi hi
nàà mɔ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mɔ hi gi mɔ ɛrk lakɗi.
Yeesu goohi:
a bɔ gi nàà be hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be nɔ?
Kuudu wɛɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧ dood wɔ hi ɗɔɔt elo, raa:
a nàà be hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be hi gi gɛrɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ woo hinyɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧ge, gi yɛ̧ɛ̧ be, siŋg be hi nàà be.
Yeesu wɛɛ yɛɛl hingok ɓɛ a mɛmbal ya̧. Yɔ dood saal wɔ hí mɔks a gi dɔŋdi, gii kar a lɛmb du a mɛm ha ɗɔɔtɔ. Wɛɛ saal wɔ hi gi hɛbtdi a mɛmya̧.
Yeesu gogsihi hin kittɔnɔ hi ya̧a̧daaniki. Raasihi a hingokɔ bɔ duge:
a kɛnɛ! Bakbalkya za tuu an gi dɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧to.
Hɔnɛyɔ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧k dɔ̧ɔ̧t bɔ, dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi mɛɛl a gbɔnɔya̧, nɔɔs hi zaa hi sɛ̧ɛ̧.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaadɛ hi mɛɛl a betwaat lɛl du, a lɛlyɔ hɛbt tɔɔ ge gɛ; anyɔ hɛbt ɗɔ̄b lɛlɔ ge gɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi pir nɔɔktɔnɔ.
Yɔ ɔ̧t haa, dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi pirɔ hí yāā yɛ̧ɛ̧s gɛ hi dɔ̧ɔ̧, hi wɛɛ hi kootɔ.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaadɛ hi mɛɛl a tɛ̧ɛ̧ kobsyaadɛ tees du. Tɛ̧ɛ̧ kobsya wɔ hi hɔɔ hi gbaa dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi pirɔ. Hinɔ gii dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi pirɔ hí hum gɛ.
Hɔnɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaadɛ wɔ hi mɛɛl a hɛbt rɔb lɛl du be, hi pirɔ hi hɔɔ hi hibɔ. Zaadɛ hi tuus gaat dumbili taarɛ, zaadɛ gaat dumbili nɔɔngbunu, wɛɛ zaadɛ wɔ be gaat yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa:
a za̧a̧ni gin tɔn an gi kɛmɔ, gi kɛmɔ!
Yɔ Yeesu hɛml hi saal bɔ, dood wɔ hi er nɛ el hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ, hi zɔ̧ge an gi wad ya̧a̧daanik wɔ hinya̧.
Yeesu goohi:
a Bɛt zuns nɛɛ hinyɔ gi gi wáát du doosɛ, yɛrɛ dood zaadɛ hi kɛŋk hin wɛrɛ sɛw dɔglya̧ an ya̧a̧daanikyɔ, ya̧a̧nɛ.
An dood wɔ hi gbor lɔlseeki, wɛɛ hí gbɛ̄n hinɔ gɛ, hi gbor tɔnlaki, wɛɛ hí kɛ̄m gɛ; an bɔ̄ dood wɔrɔ hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ a Bɛt ge, gi bitsihi hinha̧a̧lya̧.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a nɛ́ kɛ̄m ya̧a̧daanik yɛrɛ hinɔ gɛ ya? Nɛ yɛrɛ nɛ́ kɛm ya̧a̧daanik wɔ sɛw hinɔ ri?
Bakbalkya gi an za̧a̧nyɔ gi raak Bɛt dɔglɔ.
Dood zaadɛ hi riitin an gbɔnɔya̧yɔ. À lɛlyɔ Bɛt dɔglɔ tuur ge: yɔ hi bɛɛ Bɛt dɔglɔ lako, Saydanu zaa wɔɔ dɔgl lukt bɔ hi kpoos du.
Gbunɔ, zaadɛ hi dag dɔ̧ɔ̧t a hɛbt betya ha. Hi kɛm Bɛt dɔglɔ hi ta̧a̧ nɔɔktɔnɔ hi hato.
Hɔnɛ hí ɔ̄ɔ̄ an dɔglɔ gi yaa yɛ̧ɛ̧sɔ hi kpoos du gɛ. Hi wa̧a̧ dɔglɔ hi kpoos du am kaasi. Ya̧a̧rhant gɔ bɛɛ tuuruko, zaa be zɛksil a Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔŋgo, ɓɔrbɔ hi maatɔ.
Dood zaadɛ be, hi dag dɔ̧ɔ̧t a tɛ̧ɛ̧ kobsya teesdu, hi kɛm Bɛt dɔglɔ;
waal mɔkilɔ wɔ, hi rɔɔs ɗɔkum maatilya, hi ɗɔkum zaadɛ gaŋsɛ gaŋsɛ hi gul hi yɛ̧g dɔgl bɔ hi kpoos du, dɔgl bɔ wōō hinza ma hi kpoos du gɛ.

Dood zaadɛ hi dag hin dɔ̧ɔ̧t bɔ a hɛbt rɔb lɛl du; doodya̧ hii kɛm Bɛt dɔgl bɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ hi dag hi kpoos du, hi tuus gaato; zaa tuus gaat dumbili taarɛ, zaadɛ hi tuus gaat dumbili nɔɔn-gbunu, zaadɛ be hi tuus gaat yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ.
Yeesu raa:
a doo za gɔ kamz pitila kpook kubt a dɔn du ya? Zaa lab gɛ yaat a leeso wɛɛdis ya? Nɛ wii ma a lɛlyɔ gɔ hi wiik pitila ge mi?
Nɛ hinza yaatilya taa an hi ɔɔg midigɔ; wɛɛ hinza luurya taa an hi ɔɔg mɛksigɔ a dood lɔlgbar sɛw du.
Za̧a̧ni gin tɔn an gi kɛmɔ, gi kɛmɔ.
Yeesu
a oon hinyɔ nɛ kɛŋkyɔ bɛttɔnɔ. Bɛt gi goonsin hin hi kɔlwaa yɔ nɛ gis dood zaadɛ hin goonik be; hí wɛɛ hí gaan zaa ha.
Gɔ gi anbɔ za̧a̧nyɔ gin hinza, gi dag zaa ha. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ taan gɛ be, hi ha̧s fɛŋwaa bɔ da gin nɛ hɛw.
Yeesu raa ɓɛ:
a hinyɔ riitin hi Bɛt wáátɔ gɛrɛ: doo za dɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧t a gi bak du.
Gi gi yokyo, gi gi lɔlɛ, yɛms du hi lurk du, dɔ̧ɔ̧t bɔ gi pirko gi hɔɔko, mɛ̄ɛ̄ an ri gɛ.
Hɛbt bɔ hi zulɔ pis dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ. Yɛɛlɔ, dɔ̧ɔ̧t bɔ tɛŋtigɔ pirɔ, wɛɛ hɔɔ hibɔ kɛ̧ɛ̧ lɔlɛ,
gaatɔ wɔ gɔ hi bɛɛ raŋko, wal bɔ baar woosɔ hi rɔŋsɔ anyɔ ɓɛsɔ rii.
Yeesu raa ɓɛ:
a wɛ gogsin nɔ hinɔ gi riitin hi Bɛt wáátɔ nɔ? Wɛ gogsin hi nɔ ya̧a̧daanikɔ nɔ?
Bɛt waar umsɔ riitin an sitahi lɛŋksɛ: gɔ hi lugig a hɛbtdi, dɛɛb daar hin lɛŋks zaadɛ wɔ waal du sɛw.
Hɔnɛ gɔ hi lugige, pirɔ, hɔɔ, tɔɔ daar tɛ̧ɛ̧ wɛl gbunya zaadɛ wɔ sɛw. Yaa yā̧a̧n gbɔlɛ an nɔɔs hi nɛbt zɛk a zeksɔ gedu.
Yeesu gaa hingokɔ wɔ sɛw hi ya̧a̧daanik kittɔnɔ anbɔ labɔ; gog an wɔ hi gisig lako, hi ɗɛɛ kɛŋko.
Gɔ́ bōōsihi hinza gi ɔsihi ya̧a̧daanik dɔk du gɛ. Hɔnɛ yɔ gɔ gi nɛ hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi ɔ̧ɔ̧kya̧, gisihi wadig hin sɛw.
A lɛɛsig du yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ, a ɔ̧t gbuna bɔ duge, Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧:
a wɛ tal a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaa bɔ ge.
Yɔ hi ɔɔ saal bɔ, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi kam Yeesu a lɛmb du, a lɛmb bɔ da giz nɛ gedu. Lɛmb zaadɛ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b nɛ hi gi di be.
Wɛɛ zɛk za ha̧a̧l yɛɛl fɛk hi tɛŋko; yɔ mɛmɗukil wɔ hi ga̧a̧y a lɛmb du gi daarlɛlɛ, lɛmb bɔ yɛɛl hi̧i̧sigyɔ.
Yeesu gi yok nɛ a lɛmb kuudu, gbaa zulɔ a kal ha. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi kpooge, hi
a Hingokya! Wɛ wɔrɔ! Hin yɛrɛ lɛ rɛ gɔsum hinza gɛ ya?
Yeesu rɛmɔ, ya̧a̧l zɛk bɔ, wɛɛ raa mɛmbal bɔ:
a sēemɔ! Kɔm sob, bɔmɔ namɔ!
Zɛk bɔ kɔmɔ, lɛl ɗagl gɔ.
Wɛɛ raa walɛsɛrɛ wɔ:
a hoob gin ha̧a̧k nɔ? Nɛ taan ɗɔbsil ket ya?
Hɔnɛyɔ hoob ha̧a̧hi yɛ̧ltɔnɔ be hi wɛɛ hi watin hi tees du:
a bɔ za̧a̧n yɛrɛ ɔ̧nɛ, zɛk hɛw hi mɛm hi lagsig tɔn yɔ?
Hi wɛɛ hi tuur a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaabɔ a Gerezanɛ hɛbt du ge.
Anyɔ Yeesu gi silk a lɛmb du, wɛɛ ɓɔrbɔ doo za yɔ gin loorɛha̧a̧l muul ɗu tuuz a loorlɛlɛ zaa dagtin hi giya.
Za̧a̧n bɔ gɔ gi waak a loorlɛlɛ. Doo za ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi wa̧a̧ge gi wɔg hi ba̧a̧ntus hɛw gɛ.
Gɔ hi wɔb dɔɔɔ wɔ hi gbɔɔsi, naanɔ wɔ hi ba̧a̧ntusɛ, wɛɛ kaatir ba̧a̧ntus wɔ. Za̧a̧n za tɛŋkya taa an gi daarig be.
Faa, yɛms bed hi lurk bed gi lɛɛlik a loor lɛlɛ, a ga̧a̧t ha, gi ya̧a̧ɓoolik be, wɛɛ gi muulɔ ɓuukig hi bet be.
Yɔ gbɛn Yeesu lakyɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ, nɔɔz zaa zagl gi muutdu.
Ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ
a dɔgl be gidu hi mɔɔ ya, Yeesu Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl waaɔ? Be zɔ̧mɔ hi ya̧a̧ hɛmnt a Bɛt nuŋg du an bɔmɔ ha̧a̧nib ya̧a̧rɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu raa nɛ:
a loorɛha̧a̧lɛ tuum za̧a̧n yɛrɛ gi muuldu ro!
Za̧a̧n bɔ gi dɔg anbɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ ɛr za̧a̧n bɔ:
a nuŋg mɔ a ri?
Za̧a̧n bɔ goo raa ge:
a nuŋg be a Saalɛ, anyɔ wi gi kittɔnɔ.
Za̧a̧n bɔ zɔ̧ Yeesu hi tɛŋko, an bɔgi yaa loorɛ-ha̧a̧l wɔ a hɛbt za dɔɔmi.
A lɛlɔdi hab kittɔnɔ hi tɔk hɛt a ga̧a̧t dɔŋya̧di.
Wɛɛ loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi zɔ̧ge:
a yaawi a hab wɛrɛ hi, an wi da wi gul hi muul du.
Yɔ Yeesu ta̧a̧ a rekinɛ, hi tuu za̧a̧n bɔ muulɛ, hi rek hi gul a hab wɔ hi muul du. Hab wɔ sɛw hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b hin duk eerɛ, hi bindɔ hi nɔɔ hi tii a kasiŋ disɛ, hi re hi gi̧i̧l a mɛmbal du, hi wɔrɔ.
Hab nɛɛrɛwaat wɔ hi nɔɔ hi ren ramsɔ, hi fɔk a waal gbɔɔl du hi a raat dɛɛt wɔ du. Dood hi zaa hi sɔ̧ɔ̧ hinyɔ tuurɔ.
Yɔ hi tuur a Yeesu dɔŋdi hi gbɛn za̧a̧n bɔ gin nɛ loorɛ ha̧a̧l wɔ muul du yɔ raa nɛ a nuŋg be a Saalɛ, gi ɗɔɔtugo. Heg gbandilɔ hamad, mɔkilɔ gi rɔbtɔnɔ. Yɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hoob ha̧a̧hiha̧.
Wɔ hi gbɛn hinyɔ tuur anbɔ sɛw hi fɔks wɔrɔ hinyɔ tuur a loorɛha̧a̧lya bɔ gi muulɛ, hi hinyɔ tuur a hab wɔ hi muulɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧ Yeesu an gi ɗuk gi ɔɔ hɛbtya̧ bɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gi kark lɛmb du, za̧a̧n bɔ gin nɛ loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ muul du zɔ̧ge an gi kɔm elo.
Yeesu tā̧ā̧ gɛ. Wɛɛ
a wɛɛm mɔ lɛlɛ, a dood mɔ hi; mɔ fɔksihi hinyɔ Waar woosum sɛw hi kpoosɔ gaattɔnɔ.
Za̧a̧n bɔ rek yɛɛl hinyɔ Yeesu woosig nɛ fɔkig a lɛlyɔ gɔ hi el a Waal Gbɔlɛ Koobl ge. Hi sɛw kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu wɛɛ gi siz lɛmb du a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaabɔ fu̧u̧nɛ ge, saal za nɔ gbɔɔl hi zaa hi mɔks gi dɔŋdi. Gii be gi erk a mɛm ya̧di.
Yɔ mɔksillukya gbɔlɛ wɔ zaaya̧ gbun bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yayirus tuur gi gbɛn Yeesu , zagl gi dɔŋdi.
Zɔ̧ge hi ya̧a̧ hɛmnti, raa
a waa be siŋg gum ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b tɔdigyɔ. Zaam mɔ gbaasig naan muulɛ an gums bɔ gi gogsige gi za̧a̧!
Yeesu retin hi giya. Saalzanɔ gbɔɔl fɔge hi gig ɓɔ̧ɔ̧k tees du be.
Nis za lis gig fɔk wɛl koobl daa eerɛ.
Ha̧a̧ nɛ ya̧a̧r gbɔɔltɔnɔ a gɛr kitɛ naan du, waks tusɔ kpɔkkrɔ; gumsɔ bɔ da̧a̧ gɛ be, wɛɛ gi yɛ̧sugo yɛ̧sugo.
Hɔnɛyɔ kɛm hi book Yeesu nuŋgɔ, zaa a saal bɔ gedu, zaa gi kuudu ɓi̧i̧ gbandilɔ.
Da raa nɛ be
a à be ki̧i̧ gbandilɔ bɔ gii mɔɔti, yɔ be za̧a̧za̧.
Yɔ ɓi̧i̧ Yeesu gbannɔ bɔ anbɔ, lisɔ bɔ da̧a̧ ɓɔrbɔ, kɛm hinza a gi muul du an kosgumnɔ bɔ da̧a̧da̧.
Ɓɔrbɔ Yeesu mɛɛmɛ a tɛŋk za tuu be muul du. Zɛ̧mr a saal tees bɔ gedu, warɔ:
a bɔ ki̧i̧ gbandil be nɔ?
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi
a mɔ gbɛn saal gi mɔ ɓɔ̧ɔ̧k be, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ wark bɔ ma a bɔ ki̧i̧ be?
Hɔnɛ Yeesu zɛ̧btir lɛl hi lɔl gi dɔŋdi an gi gbɛn za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ hinɔ.
Yɔ nis bɔ mɛɛ hinyɔ tursige, bee hoobo, zaa zagl Yeesu dɔŋg di raasig hin sɛw hi rɔbo.
Yeesu
a waa be siŋgo, ɗɔbsig mɔ za̧a̧sumza̧a̧sɔ. Rekum bɛttɔnɔ, bɔ gums mɔ bɔ gi wɛɛsum zaa.
Yɔ Yeesu gi dɔk anbɔ tɛ̧, ramsyaadɛ hi fu̧u̧z a Yayirus raa du hi zaa hi raa Yayirus:
a waa mɔ bɔ wɔɔrɔ. Mɔ mɔɔsig Hingokya bɔ nɔ?
Yeesu kɛ̄msihi dɔglya̧ bɔ hi book gɛ. Wɛɛ raa Yayirus:
a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ, ɗɔbsum kpɔd.
Gāā doo za gbɔnɔ an gi fɔg ma gɛ, gɛ Piyɛr , hi Yakuba, hi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Yohana.
Yɔ hi tuur a Yayirus raa du, a lɛlyɔ gbɛn saal ɗɔbtɛ ge, hi gɔk namsɛ; dood hi kaako, hi sɛɛbik be.
Yeesu gul raa bɔ gedu, warihi
a nɛ gɔk namsɔ nɔ be? Nɛ kaak nɔ? Waa bɔ wɔ̄r gɛ, gi yokyo.
Dood hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lig-kpɛ̧ɛ̧lɔ. Yeesu tuusihi lak di sɛw. Loo waa wɔrk bɔ baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ, hi wɔ hi gitin elo, hi gul a lɛlyɔ waa bɔ gi gedu.
Rek wa̧a̧ waa bɔ naan muulɛ
a ꞋꞋTalita kumꞋꞋ,
hinɔ raakɔ:
a wawayɔ, be raamɔ, ɗukum ha!
Ɓɔrbɔ wawa bɔ ɗuk yɛɛl ɛmbikyɔ. Wawa bɔ gin wɛl kooblɛ daa eerɛ. Yɔ dood hi gbɛn hin bɔ lab kɔmsihi gɛrs yɛ̧ltɔnɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ ɓaasihi an bɔhi raas za̧a̧n za hinɔ. Kuudu wɛɛ
a gaan wawa bɔ lees gi le.
Yeesu ɔɔ lɛl bɔ rek a waal yɔ tɔɔ gedu. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi fɔge.
Yɔ Yahuduya wɔ holum-ɔ̧tya̧ tuurɔ, Yeesu yɛɛl hingok a mɔksilluk du. Dood kit wɔ hi gisig dɔglɔ lako, kɔmsihi gɛrs gbɔɔltɔnɔ. Hi war
a hin wɔrɔ hi gisig fu̧u̧zig hi anbɔ? Dag nɔ nɛ hinmɛɛkɔ anyɔ hi gɛrs wɛrɛ gi wooko?
Nɛ gii gi ma Mariyama waawal tɛ̧ɛ̧hɛɛkya bɔ ma mi? Nɛ gi ma Yakuba hi Yozɛs hi Yahuda hi Simɔŋ hindaya̧ gii ma mi?
Nɛ siŋdɛya̧ hi waak a wɛ teesdu dihɛ ma mi?
Hin bɔ lab gii gi dood wɔ hi dɔg hin anbɔ ya̧a̧nik an bɔhi ɗɔbs Yeesu .
Hɔnɛyɔ anbɔ Yeesu
a hi ta̧a̧k Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya a lɛl sɛw. Yɛrɛ wɛɛ gi doo tɔsi a gi mɔɔklɛlɛ, a nɛsɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi doodɔ hi tees du.
Yeesu ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi woo gɛrs dihɔ gbun mɔɔt gɛ; gɔ gbaa naanɔ gii kpɔd a gumtil zaadɛ wɔ hi muul gi za̧a̧sihi.
Hin kɔms Yeesu gɛrsɛ anyɔ dood wɔ hi ta̧a̧ ɗɔbsig gɛ. Wɛɛ, Yeesu ɛmb gbɛ̧ɛ̧ka a raat dɛɛt wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b di gedu ɓɛ, gi hingok nɔɔha.
Elz walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ yɛɛlihi yaak a lɛl za eerɛ, eerɛ. Gaahi tɛŋk an hi ɗɛɛ loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ,
wɛɛ
a rɔ̀bs bɔ nɛ reko, bɔnɛ loo hinza, gi sɔɔl gɛ. Bɔnɛ loo koko, bɔnɛ loo saa, an tus hɛw a nɛ ziba du, bɔnɛ loo.
Hegin taal nɛ, bɔnɛ heg gbandil eerɛ.
Wɛɛ
a gid nɛ tuur a waal gbɔɔl du, nɛ́ kɔm a raa yɔ gɔ hi elin duge, gi tuur an nɛ ɗuk nɛ ɔɔ waal bɔ.
Gid nɛ rek a lɛlyɔ dood wɔ hi waak ge hí zēnɛ gɛ, hi insin dɔgl nɛ bɔ kɛŋko, ɗukin hɔdi, nɛ́ pub luus wɔ nɛ dɔɔ muulɛ, an gi wɛɛsihi hinmɛksingoya.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi res dood wɔ Bɛt dɔgl bɔ dɔk gɔ an hi zɛmr kpoosya̧.
Hi nink loorɛha̧a̧l kittɔnɔ, hi wɛɛ hi gis gumtil kittɔnɔ kurum huuko hi gihi za̧a̧sugo.
Anyɔ hi book Yeesu nuŋggɔ lɛl sɛwi, waar Hirudus lag hi book Yeesu dɔglɔ. Dood zaadɛ hi raako:
a Yohana bɔ gi dood hotingo nɛ Bɛtmɛm gii wɛɛ gi rɛml a wɔrk du. Yɔ anbɔ gii gin tɛŋk hɛw an gi woo gɛrsɛ.
Hɔnɛ dood zaadɛ hi wɛɛ hi raako:
a Eliya giya.
Zaaɗɛ hi raak ɓɛ:
a riitin hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ amntɔnɔ zaaɔ giya.
Yɔ Hirudus kɛm anbɔ raa:
a Yohana bɔ gi dood hotingo nɛ Bɛtmɛm giya! Be dɛ̧ɛ̧r zulɔ be, wɛɛ rɛmlɔ!
Yɔ amntɔnɔ be, Hirudus hi zulɔ gii ta̧a̧ an doodɔ hi wa̧a̧ Yohana hi wɔ̀ge, hi yaag luknɔ du. Woo hin bɔrɔ a yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Filib nistɔ Hiruduya yɔ gii wɛɛ gi wɔɔg gi dɔŋgo.
Hinɔ gii Yohana gi da gi raa Hirudus:
a rı̄ı̄ an mɔ waa hi yɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ nisɔ gɛ!
Nis bɔ Hiruduya kɛ̄m anbɔ, hin nɔɔgnɔ a Yohana zulha, yɔ anbɔ gbaasig ya̧a̧burs an gi gbɔŋge, wɛɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ gbɔnɔɔ lɛl gɛ be.
Anyɔ Hirudus mɛɛ a Yohana gi doo hinrɔb wookya, doo gaati, hoobha̧a̧ge gig ooko. Gɔ gisig dɔglɔ kɛŋko, yɔɔgyɔ, wɛɛ gisig lak dɔglɔ hi hat be.

Bɔ labɔ, ɔ̧tyɔ ha̧a̧ nis bɔ Hiruduya tursig gɔ a Hirudus wɛlɔ yɔ hi mɔɔg naabɔ gedu. Hirudus gaa dood woosyaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi laya gbɔlɛ wɔ, hi ɗɛntɛ zaadɛ gbɔlɛ rɔbɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Galile lees gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Nis bɔ Hiruduya waasiŋ gul nabhin gɔ a waar bɔ muut du a luk du naas lɛl du. Yɔ hin har Waar bɔ Hirudus hi rɔ̀bɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ, raa wawa bɔ gɔ:
a ɛribe hinyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ, be gaam hinɔ.
Wɛɛ dɛŋglsig hin anyɔ lɛ:
a be dɛŋglsum hin a hinyɔ gɔ mɔ ɛr hage, an hɛbt be gbaŋ za hɛw, be gaamɔ.
Wawa bɔ tuu re ɛr nɔɔtɔ gɔ:
a nàà be, gi an be ɛr nɔ?
Nɔɔtɔ ta̧a̧:
a ɛrum Yohana bɔ gi hotingo nɛ dood Bɛtmɛm zulɔ bɔ giya.
Wawa bɔ wɛɛz nɔɔktɔnɔ a waar bɔ ge, ɛrige:
a ha̧a̧be an mɔ dɛ̧ɛ̧z Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ zulɔ ɓɔryɔ, mɔ gaab a hɛb du.
Waar bɔ lag anbɔ kpoosɔ ɗɔɔbɔ; an hinyɔ dɛŋgl a rɔ̀bɛ wɔ hi lɔlgbar be, hā̧a̧g an gi ans wawa bɔ hinyɔ ɛrig gɛ be.
Wɛɛ ɓɔrbɔ yaa lɛl-ookya za, raag a gi dɛ̧ɛ̧z Yohana zulɔ bɔ gi kamzɔ. Laaya bɔ rek a luknɔ du dɛ̧ɛ̧z Yohana zulɔ bɔ
kamz a hɛb du, zaa gaa wawa bɔ, wɛɛ wawa bɔ zaa gaa nɔɔtɔ.
Yɔ Yohana walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi lag dɔglɔ anbɔ labɔ, hi zaa hi loo Yohana wɔrkɔ bɔ hi re hi i̧i̧ a loor du.
Yeesu tɔmsɔya wɔ hi wɛɛzɔ hi mɔks a gi dɔŋg di, hi fɔksig hinyɔ hi woo, hi hinyɔ hi goks doodɛ.
Dood wɔ hi zaako, hi wɔ hi wɛɛko hi kiitɔ. Yɔ anbɔ lɛl fɛ̄ɛ̄ Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ lees lek ma gɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ gi
a zaan hi beya a lɛl fɛɛtil du an nɛ hol kaasi.
Hi re gɔ mukya̧ a lɛmb du a lɛl fɛɛtil du.
Hɔnɛyɔ dood kittɔnɔ hi gbɛnihi reko. hi mɛksihimɛksɔ; dood wɔ a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ du sɛw hi nɔɔ hi dor a lɛlyɔ Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ gɔ hi tuur nɛ ge.
Yɔ Yeesu gi tuuzig a lɛmb du gi gbɛn saal gbɔlɛ wɔ, hi ha̧a̧sig ya̧a̧r be; hi riitin ma an tam wɔ hi taan nɛɛra. Wɛɛ yɛlsihi hingok kittɔnɔ.
Anyɔ ɔ̧t gi leko, Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi.
Hi
a ɔ̧t leegɔ, lɛl yɛrɛ gi hɛtdɔŋg be; yaam dood wɔ a raat wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b di gedu an hi re hi zebz hinyɔ gɔ hi le.
Yeesu wɛɛ goohi:
a nɛɛ hi zul nɛ, gaanɛhi leesɛ!
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi ɛrige:
a ha̧a̧mɔ an wi re wi zebz kok kiml hi tus gaat tɛmɛrɛ eerɛ an wi zaa wi gaahi hi le ya?
Yeesu wɛɛ ɛrihi:
a nɛ gin kok kiml baari? Rekinɛ nɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧zɔ.
Yɔ hi wɛɛ hi watin hi teesdu, hi wɛɛ hi raasige:
a wi gin kok kiml nɔɔn hi dut eerɛ.
Wɛɛ raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a raan dood hi ɗɔɔt mɔksillɛl gbunu gbunu a hɛtyɛ̧s wɔ ha.
Dood wɔ hi ɗɔɔt mɔksillɛl kittɔnɔ. Mɔksillɛl gbunu dood hi gi du yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ, zaa dumbili nɔɔnɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ loo kok kiml wɔ nɔɔn hi dut eerɛ wɔ, pɛɛ lɔlɔ wɛɛha, baan Bɛto. Ɓɛɛ kok kiml wɔ, gaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧s doodɛ. Wɛɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧sihi dut eerɛ wɔ hi sɛw.
Hi sɛw hi le hi hi̧i̧.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi wɛɛn kok kiml ɓɛɛkil wɔ hi dut wɔ zɛ̧ɛ̧r dɛl koobl daa eerɛ.
Walɛ wɔ hi gi saal bɔ gedu hi le lees bɔ sɛw, hi gi duk nɔɔnɛ.
Ɓɔrbɔ Yeesu fɛ̧ɛ̧ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ an hi kar a lɛmb du, hi dor a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaabɔ ge a Baytizaada gbaŋgi, an gii gi yaak saal wɔ kuudu be.
Yeesu waar ihi, wɛɛ dɔ̀ɔ̀ a ga̧a̧t ha an gi zɔ̧ Bɛto.
Yɔ yɛms bulɔ, lɛmb bɔ gi a mɛmbal tees du. Yeesu gi gi gbun a hɛbt di a ɗundir ha.
Wɛɛ gbɛn walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi nuuk lɛmb bɔ hi mɔɔto, anyɔ zɛk gihi fɛko gi gihi wɛɛnik kuudu kuudu. A bi̧i̧l ɗɔbt du, Yeesu ɛmz a mɛmbal bɔ hage, rek hii ge, zɛ̧hi, gɔ gi daarihi nɛ daarɔ.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi gbɛnig gi ɛmbik a mɛmbal bɔ hage, hi rum a ɗoodyɔ, hi ɓoo kaalɛ. Yɔ hi gbɛnig be, hi sɛw hoob ha̧a̧hiha̧.
Ɓɔrbɔ Yeesu booya̧a̧,
a ɓaasin kpoos nɛ. Beya, bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ!
Wɛɛ kar zɛ̧hi a lɛmb bɔ gedu; zɛk bɔ erɔ. Hin wɛɛs fɔkya wɔ gɛrs gbɔɔltɔnɔ,
anyɔ hí kɛ̄m kok kiml wɔ gɛrsɔ gɛ; kpoosya̧ ɓaaɓa, ya̧a̧nɛ.
Yɔ hi kar mɛmbal bɔ, hi zaa a Gɛnɛzarɛd hɛbt du, hi ha̧b lɛmbya̧ a haŋkya̧.
Yɔ hi bɛɛ tuuk a lɛmb bɔ gedu, dood hi mɛks Yeesu mɛksɔ.
Hi nɔɔ hi wɛɛ a waal bɔ duge sɛw, lɛl yɔ hi kɛm a Yeesu gedu sɛw hi gisig gumtil wɔ kamsig a tɛ̧ɛ̧waak ha.

Lɛlyɔ Yeesu gi rek du sɛw, a raat dɛɛt wɔ du, a waal gbɔlɛ du, hi raat wɔ a hɛt dɔɔ du gedu sɛw, dood hi tudzig gumtil wɔ hi gihi zaanik a luumha hi gig zɔ̧k an gi ɔɔhi hi ki̧i̧ gbandilɔ tɔl wɔ mɔɔti. Dood wɔ hi gig ki̧i̧k sɛw hi za̧a̧kza̧.
Farisaya wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi fu̧u̧z a Urusalima hi mɔks a Yeesu ge.
Hi gbɛn walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi lek kok hi naan ɓi̧i̧limyɔ, raakɔ a hí nɛ̄ɛ̄ naanya̧ anyɔ Farisayaadɛ maak dɔg gɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Farisaya wɔ hi Yahuduya wɔ zaadɛya̧ sɛw hi wa̧a̧k maak yɔ ɗɛntɛya̧ ɔnihi: gid hí nɛ̄ɛ̄ naanya̧ rɔbtɔnɔ gɛ, hí lēhin gɛ.
Gɔ hi fu̧u̧z a luumha, hi zaa hi hot maakhotil kete ɓɔr hi ɔɔ hinleko. Hi wa̧a̧k maak zaadɛ wɔ hi dag kittɔnɔ: an mɛmdak wɔ nɛɛtugɔ, hi zaa hi gedig wɔ hi dɔn tus wɔ nɛɛtugɔ.
Farisaya wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi ɛr Yeesu gɔ:
a nɔ nɛ walɛsɛrɛ mɔ wɔ hí fɔ̄b maak yɔ ɗɛntɛ hi gog gɛ, hi lek kokya̧ hi naan ɓi̧i̧lim nɔ?
Yeesu goohi:
a nɛya, dood mɛlya wɛ, Esaya da dɔgsin rɔbo a Bɛt dɔgl du, anyɔ bi̧i̧: a Bɛt raa: a dood wɛrɛ hi gib ɗɔbsig hi dɔgl tɔsyɔ, wɛɛ kpoosya̧ hɛ̧ml hi beeya.
Ɗɔbsig yɔ hi gib fɔmnuko gi hin tɔsyɔ. Hi gok dɔgl yɔ dood waal du hi woo hi zulya̧ hi wɛɛ hi gogsingo an ginɛ Bɛt dɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧n giya.
Yeesu raa:
a nɛ in dɔgl yɔ Bɛt gaa an nɛ wɛɛ nɛ fɔb hinyɔ dood hi gogsinɛ.
Wɛɛ
a nɛ nɛ mɛɛ dɔgl yɔ Bɛt gaa bisig yɛ̧ltɔnɔ an nɛ wɛɛ nɛ fɔb maak nɛnɛ ma mi?
Ya̧a̧nɛ Muusa gi raa: a ɗɔbsum baa mɔ hi nàà mɔ; wɛɛ: a za̧a̧nyɔ nii baatɔ, zaa lab gɛ nɔɔtɔ, hi gbɔŋge.
Yɛrɛ nɛya, nɛ dɔk a doo gi raa baatɔ, zaabe nɔɔtɔ: a hinyɔ gɔ be kamsum an be ɗansumɔ, be gaa Bɛt gaasɛ, hinɔ gi kɔrbaŋyɔ (raakɔ a gaas yɔ hi gaa Bɛto).
Nɛ́ tā̧ā̧ an za̧a̧n gi ɗaas baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ gɛ.
An bɔrɔ labɔ, nɛ ha̧tirgo Bɛt dɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ a baa nɛ maak bɔ ɔsin nɛ gogsig dood zaadɛ gi dɔŋgo. Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ wook hin zaadɛ anbɔ kittɔnɔ hɛw.
Kuudu Yeesu wɛɛ elz dood saal wɔ
a lagsinbe dɔgl be nɛ sɛw, kɛn hin yɛrɛ:
Hinza ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi gul doo buu du gi wɛɛnig ɓi̧i̧limya gɛ. Hinyɔ gi tuuzig a doo kpoos du be, gii gi wɛɛnik doo ɓi̧i̧limya. [
Za̧a̧ni gin tɔn an gi kɛmɔ, gi kɛmɔ! ]
Yɔ Yeesu ɔɔ dood saal wɔ gi gul a raa du, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi ɛrige an gi wadsihi ya̧a̧daanik bɔ hinɔ.
Yeesu ɛrihi:
a nɛɛ hɛw zul nɛ taa an nɛ kɛm hinza zaŋ ya? Nɛ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ a hinyɔ fu̧u̧ a lakdi gi gul a doo buu du ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi wɛɛnig ɓi̧i̧limya gɛ gɛ ya?
Anyɔ hin bɔ labɔ taa gulk a kpoos du gɛ, gi tiik a ha̧d du wɛɛ gi tuuzig a yaatillɛl du. Hin bɔ lab gi raak a lees wɔ sɛw hi taa ɓi̧i̧limyaadɛ.
Wɛɛ raa ɓɛ:
a hinyɔ gi fu̧u̧zig a doo kpoos du, gii gi wɛɛnik doo ɓi̧i̧limya.
Yɔ anbɔ, a dood kpoos bɔ gedu ro mɔkil ha̧a̧l wɔ hi fu̧u̧zugo: an zɛlko, luurɛ, zulgbɔŋki,
mansi, ɗɔkum ha̧a̧lɛ, ha̧a̧lwooki, maatili, ya̧a̧kɛtili, lɔlha̧a̧lɛ, ya̧a̧ha̧a̧lɛ, zulpɛɛki, hi yooya̧a̧.
Hinha̧a̧l wɔrɔ sɛw hi fu̧u̧zig a doo kpoos du ro hi wɛɛnik doo ɓi̧i̧limya.
Kuudu Yeesu ɗuk hɔdi rek a Tiir hɛbt du, re da sil a raa za du, hā̧a̧g an doo za gi mɛɛ a gi raa bɔ gedu gɛ, wɛɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi yaat gɛ be.
Ànyɔ nis za waaɔsiŋ ya̧a̧m gin loorɛha̧a̧l muul du be, yɔ kɛm hi book Yeesu nuŋggɔ anbɔ, zaa zagl gi dɔŋdi.
(Nis bɔ be, rɔ̀byɔ, taa Yahuduya, hi mɔɔg a Femisi, a Siriya hɛbt du. ) Zɔ̧ Yeesu an gi nin loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ gi a waaɔ siŋg bɔ gi muul du.
Yeesu
a ɔɔm ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ hi hi̧i̧ kɛnɛ, hinɔ bɛ̄r an hi loo ya̧a̧mwaat leesya̧ hi bits kaawaat gɛ.
Nis bɔ googe:
a hɔɔ, mɔ dɔg rɔbo, Ɗɛntyɔ, kaawaat wɔ hi gi a sil ya̧di, hi lek kok rumnt wɔ ya̧a̧mwaat hi zaasil be.
Yeesu
a hin bɔrɔ mɔ goo hage, wɛɛm mɔ lɛlɛ; loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ tuutu ma a waa mɔ muul du.
Nis bɔ wɛɛ wɛɛ gɔ gi lɛlɛ, zɛm waaɔ bɔ gi kusig sil ha. Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ tuu gi muul du ma da̧a̧da̧.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu ɔɔ Tiir hɛbtɔ, tal a Sidɔŋg, wɛɛ daa a lɛlyɔ gɔ hi el a Waal Gbɔlɛ Koobl ge, wɛɛ wɛɛz a mɛmbal bɔ Galile ge.
Hi kamsig wal za lag-su̧u̧ki, hi zɔ̧g an gi gbaasig naan muulɛ.
Yeesu sɔɔnig aakil du gi gbunu; yɔ hi hɛ̧mltin hi saal bɔ, yaa naanwalɔ a wal bɔ tɔn du, tus seto ki̧i̧n wal bɔ mɛlɔ.
Wɛɛ pɛɛ lɔlɔ wɛɛha, holɔ, wɛɛ raa wal bɔ:
a ꞋꞋEfataꞋꞋ,
raakɔ
a kpɛ̧ɛ̧rumɔ!
Ɓɔrbɔ wal bɔ tɔnɔ kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ, mɛlɔ wadɔ, wɛɛ yɛɛl ya̧a̧book rɔbtɔnɔ.
Yeesu ɓaas dood sɛw an bɔhi raas hin bɔ lab za̧a̧n za. Wɛɛ gi hi gbork ɓaasigi, hii be hi gbosig dɔglɔ book be.
Yɔ hin bɔ lab kɔms dood gɛrs gbɔɔltɔnɔ, hi wɛɛ hi raa:
a hinyɔ gi wook sɛw bɛɛrɔ. Gi wook an lagɛ wɔ hi lagtɔnɛ, su̧u̧kɛ wɔ be hi booya̧a̧!
A ɔ̧tɔge saal kit hi mɔks sekto. Yɔ dood wɔ hi taan lees an hi le gɛ, Yeesu el walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a dood wɛrɛ hi ha̧a̧sib ya̧a̧rɛ, anyɔ hi gitin hi bee ɔ̧t taarɛ, wɛɛ hi taan lees be.
Àn be yaahi a hi lɛl a̧a̧kili, yɔ hi maatilo a gbɔnɔ di; wɛɛ dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi hi teesdu hi fu̧u̧z lɛlya̧ hɛmltɔnɔ be.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gòòge:
a yɔ hi zɛm ma kokɔ ay an hi lenihi hɛdi a hɛt dɔŋg du nɔ?
Yeesu ɛrihi:
a nɛ gin kok kiml baari?
Hi ta̧a̧:
a nɔɔn-erɛ.
Wɛɛ raa saal wɔ hi ɗɔɔt hɛbt di. Loo kok kiml wɔ nɔɔn-erɛ baan Bɛto, wɛɛ ɓɛɛlɔ, gaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ kok wɔ an hi gɛ̧ɛ̧s dood wɔ. Fɔkya wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧s dood saal wɔ kok wɔ.
Hi gin nɛ dut dɛɛt kaasi. Yeesu loo dut wɔ baan Bɛto, wɛɛ
Dood wɔ hi le kok bɔ hi hi̧i̧. Hi wɛɛn kok ɓɛɛkil wɔ zɛ̧ɛ̧r dɛl hi̧i̧sil nɔɔn-erɛ.
Dood wɔ hi gi nɛ kitigya̧ sɛ̧ɛ̧b hin duk nasɔ. Kuudu Yeesu wɛɛ yaahi hi lɛlɛ.
Gii wɛɛ kar ɓɔrbɔ a lɛmb du hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rek a Dalmanuta hɛbt du.
Farisaya wɔ hi zaa hi yɛɛl hinfaltingo hi Yeesu an hi tolig hi dɔglɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ hi ɛrig an gi woo hinmɛksingoya gi zuun a tɛŋkɔ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge.
Yeesu hol dubtɔnɔ, wɛɛ raa:
a nɔ dood wɛrɛ hi waak ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ hi gib gɛrs hinmɛksingoya wark nɔ? Be raasin rɔbo: gɛrs za gbun taa an gi zu̧u̧niy a dood wɛrɛ hii.
Wɛɛ ɔɔhi hɔdi, kar lɛmb du rek a mɛmbal kasiŋ za.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi zɛn kokya̧ look zɛnɔ. Hi gin kok kiml gbun a lɛmb du.
Yeesu
a oonɛ, wa̧a̧n zul nɛ hi Farisaya wɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧tya̧ hi Waar Hirudus hɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ bɔ.
Walɛ-sɛrɛ wɔ hi watin hi tees du:
a yɔ wɛ taan kok gɛ giya.
Yeesu yɔ mɛksɔ, wɛɛ ɛrihi:
a nɔ nɛ watingo a yɔ nɛ taan kok gɛ gii nɔ? Nɛ́ wā̧ā̧ hinɔ kpoos du kɛn gɛ, nɛ́ mɛ̄ks hinɔ kɛn gɛ ya? Nɛ gin kpoos ɓaatili ya?
Nɛ gin lɔlɛ, nɛ́ gbɛ̄n gɛ ya? Nɛ gin tɔnɛ, nɛ́ kɛ̄ŋ gɛ ya?
Nɛ́ mɛ̄ks ɔ̧tyɔ be ɓɛls dood duk nɔɔn wɔ kok kiml nɔɔn wɔ gedu gɛ ya? Nɛ wɛɛn kok kiml ɓɛɛkil wɔ dɛl hi̧i̧sil baari nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧ge:
a koobl daa eerɛ.
Wɛɛ
a yɔ be ɓɛls dood duk nas wɔ kok kiml nɔɔn-er wɔ, nɛ wɛɛn kok ɓɛɛkil wɔ dɛl hi̧i̧sil baari nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧:
a nɔɔn-erɛ.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ warihi:
a nɛ́ kɛ̄ms hinɔ gɛ tɛ̧ ya?
Hi zaa a Baytizaada. Dood hi kams Yeesu yɔ̧ɔ̧r za, hi zɔ̧ge an gi ki̧i̧ge.
Yeesu wa̧a̧ yɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ naan muulɛ, kaŋg a raa lako, tutsig set lɔl du, gbaa naan gi muulɛ, ɛrige:
a mɔ gbɛnik hinza ya?
Wal bɔ pɛɛ lɔlɔ raa:
a be gbɛnik dood tii, be gihi gbɛnik an tɛ̧ɛ̧, hi wɛɛ hi ɛmbiko.
Yeesu wɛɛ yaa naan gi lɔl du. Yɔ wal bɔ sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔlɔ gbigi, lɔlɔ kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ, gi gbɛnik hin sɛw gaattɔnɔ.
Yeesu yaag gi lɛlɛ,
a bɔmɔ wɛɛ a raa bɔ gedu.
Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rek a raat zaadɛ du, a hɛbt za yɔ nuŋgɔ a Kaysariya-Filipi gedu. Yɔ hi gi gbɔnɔ di, Yeesu war walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a dood hi raak a bee bɔ?
Hi googe:
a zaadɛ hi raak a mɔɔ Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ, zaadɛ be, hi raak a mɔɔ Eliya;
wɛɛ zaadɛ ɓɛ hi raak a mɔɔ gi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya amntɛ wɔ zaaɔ.
Wɛɛ warihi:
a nɛɛ be, nɛ raak a bee bɔ?
Piyɛr gòòge:
a mɔɔ Masihu bɔ.
Gɔ ma Yeesu wɛɛ magihi gɔ an bɔhi raas doo za a bee gi Masihu bɔ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu yɛls walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hingoko,
a gi an Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi ha̧a̧ya̧a̧r gbɔɔltɔnɔ; ɗɛntɛ Bɛtlukya wɔ hi Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ, hi zaa hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi bisige. Hi gbɔŋge, wɛɛ kuudu ɔ̧t taarɛ gi rɛml a wɔrk du.
Gisihi raak hin bɔrɔ lab gaattɔnɔ. Piyɛr tɔrige yɛɛlig dɔ̧ɔ̧lik a hinyɔ dɔg anbɔ dɔŋgɔ.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ zɛmr sɔ̧ɔ̧ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ zaadɛ wɔ, wɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧l Piyɛr :
a Saydanu, da mɔ rek hɔ, hɛmlum hi beya! Mɔ́ mɔ̄k hin an Bɛt gɛ, mɔ mɔkig an dood her.
Kuudu elz dood saal wɔ hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ, wɛɛ
a za̧a̧n za gi ha̧a̧ge an gi fɔbzibe, gi in zulɔ, gi pɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧rɔ gi wɛɛ gi fɔbzibe.
Ya̧a̧nɛ za̧a̧ni ha̧a̧g an gi za̧a̧s kolɔ, gi wagsige; za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi wags kolɔ a be dɔŋgo hi Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ gi dɔŋgo, gi za̧a̧sige.
À za̧a̧n za dag waal sɛw, gi wɛɛ gi wags kolɔ, bɛn nɔ?
Za̧a̧n za gi an gi gaa nɔ an kolɔ gi za̧a̧ nɔ?

Dood wɔ hi waak ɔ̧ti gi zul hi ɔɔ Bɛt an nis yɔ gi naak mansi gi ɔɔ waltɔ, hi wɛɛ hi gɔk hinha̧a̧lɛ. Za̧a̧n za seem gi ha̧a̧g beya hi dɔgl be a dood wɛrɛ hi teesdu, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ, gɔ gi zaa a Baatɔ gbɔlums du, hi Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ gaatɛ wɔ, gi ha̧a̧nig seem hɛw be.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a be raasin hi rɔbo: dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi ɗɔɔtig dihɛ hi taa wɔrk zaŋ hi gbɛn Bɛt wáát yɔ gɔ gi zaa hi tɛŋkɔ kete.
Yɔ ɔ̧t nɔɔngbun talɔ, Yeesu loo Piyɛr hi Yakuba hi Yohana ka̧hi a ga̧a̧t za hɔɔt ha an hi kɔm hɔ mukya̧. Yɔ hi tuurɔ zɛmr muulɔ hi lɔlgbarɔ.
Gbandilɔ wɔ hi wɛɛ gaattɔnɔ buutɔnɔ fɛr, buutigɔ bɔ, doo za gban buusigya a hɛbt di ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi buus anbɔ gɛ.
Eliya hi Muusa Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔrkɛ amntɛ wɔ hi midsihi, hi bookya̧a̧ hi Yeesu .
Piyɛr raa Yeesu :
a Hingokya , bɛr an wɛ gi dihɛ. Wi ɗuks duul taarɛ gbunu mɔnɛ, gbunu Muusa ɔ̧nɛ, wɛ zaa gbunu Eliya ɔ̧nɛ.
Piyɛr mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinɔ gɔ gi raa gɛ, yɔ hoobha̧a̧ge hi hinyɔ gbɛnɔ a gi lɔlgbar du.
Kuus za zaa wɛɛ yaatinihi zeksɔ, wɛɛ ya̧a̧ fu̧u̧z a kuus du gi raako:
a yɛrɛ gi waa be yɔ ha̧a̧bge hi kpoos be sɛw giya, kɛmsinɛge!
Yaala walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi seek lɔl hi dɔŋdi, wɛɛ hí gbɛ̄n za̧a̧nza gɛ be. Yeesu gi gi gbun a hi tees du.
Anyɔ hi sizig a ga̧a̧t bɔ hage, Yeesu
a hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnɔ, bɔnɛ fɔks doo za. gi tuur an Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ, gi rɛml a wɔrkɛ tees du.
Hi a̧a̧ dɔglɔ hi buudu, hi wɛɛ hi watingo hi teesdu:
a nɔ hinɔ raakɔ a rɛmliki a wɔrk du be?
Hi wɛɛ hi war Yeesu :
a Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi raa nɔ a gi an Eliya gi zaa kɛn nɔ?
Gii wɛɛ goohi:
a gi an Eliya gi zaa kɛn ro an gi gɛms hin sɛw. Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa nɔ a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi ha̧a̧ya̧a̧r gbɔɔltɔnɔ, dood hí sɔ̧ɔ̧g an doo gɛ nɔ?
Yɛrɛ be raasin a Eliya zaaza ma, dood hi gɔsig hin anyɔ ha̧a̧hi, anyɔ hi bi̧i̧ dɔglɔ a gi zulha.
Yɔ hi zaa a walɛsɛrɛ zaadɛ wɔ hi, hi gbɛn saal gbɔɔl gɔ̧ɔ̧hi, wɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya zaadɛ hi hinfaltingo hi hiya.
Yɔ saal wɔ hi bɛɛ Yeesu gbɛŋko, hi sɛw kɔmsihi an hinɔ duhidumɔ, hi nɔɔ hi rek a ge, hi booge.
Yeesu ɛrihi:
a nɛ faltingo nɔ hi hii nɔ?
Doo za a saal bɔ gedu ta̧a̧
a Hingokya , be kamsum waa be wal yɛrɛ gin loorɛha̧a̧l yɔ gig a̧a̧nik ya̧a̧-booki.
Lɛlyɔ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ gɔ yɛɛlig du, gbalig hɛbtdi; set itil tuu gi ya̧a̧gbar duuduk, wɛɛ gi ɓalsig nuŋggɔ, muulɔ gɔ koot ser. Be zɔ̧ walɛsɛrɛ mɔ wɔ an hi nin loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ, wɛɛ hí ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ.
Yeesu
a hey! nɛya, nɛɛ dood wɔ ɓɔryɔ hā̧a̧n ɗɔbsig gɛ. Be kɔm gi tuur bili hi nɛya? Be kɔm gi tuur bili an be mɔnɛ? Kamsin be walà bɔ.
Hi kamsigge. Yɔ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ gbɛnig hɛɛd, bees waa bɔ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, matig a hɛbtdi, gi kiblik hi set itil ya̧a̧ du.
Yeesu war baatɔ:
a hin yɛrɛ yɛɛlig bili?
Baatɔ ta̧a̧:
a yɔ gi yɛ̧sɛ.
Gɔ anbɔ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ gɔ matig laa du, zaabe a mɛm du hɛw an gi wɔrɔ. Gid mɔ ɗɛɛ hinza wooko, mɛɛsibe ya̧a̧rɛ, ɗaasiwi.
Yeesu
a mɔ raa nɔ a gid be ɗɛɛ nɔ? Za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbs Bɛto, hin sɛw ɗɛɛ an gi rekɔ.
Ɓɔrbɔ waa bɔ baatɔ ɓooya̧a̧ raa:
a be ɗɔbsɔ, ɗaasibe anyɔ ɗɔbsig be rı̄ı̄ gɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn saal wɔ hi maŋko, ya̧a̧l loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ
a loorɛha̧a̧l su̧u̧k bɔ hi lag bɔ, be raamɔ, tuum a waa yɛrɛ muul du, bɔmɔ wɛɛ mɔ wɛɛ gul a gi muul du zaŋ!
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ ɓoo kaalɛ, bees waa bɔ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ tuu rekɔ. Wala bɔ kɔm sob an wɔɔrɔ. Yɔ anbɔ wɔ hi gi di kittɔnɔ hi raako:
a wɔɔrɔ, wɔɔrɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ wa̧a̧ naanɔ bɔ ɗuksige, wala bɔ ɗund erɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gul raa du walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi ɛrig yaaklɛlɛ:
a nɔ wí ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔrɔ nink gɛ nɔ?
Wɛɛ ta̧a̧hi:
a hi zɔ̧ki a Bɛt ge kpɔd an hi ɗɛɛ loorɛha̧a̧l wɔrɔ lab ninko.
Yɔ hi ɗuk hɔdi, hi tal a Galile. Yeesu hā̧a̧g an doo za gi mɛɛ lɛlyɔ gi du gɛ,
anyɔ gis walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hingoko,
a hi wa̧a̧ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ a ɗood naan du; hi gbɔ̧nge. Gɔ gi wɔrɔ ɔ̧t taarɛ gi rɛml a wɔrk du gi ɗundɔ.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ be hí kɛ̄m dɔgl bɔrɔ hinɔ gi raak gɛ. Anyɔ gɔ hi wɛɛ hi ɛrig hinɔ be, hoob ha̧a̧hiha̧.
Hi tuur a Kapɛrnayum. Yɔ Yeesu gi raa du, war walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a nɛ wadzingo nɔ hinɔ a gbɔnɔ di nɔ?
Anyɔ hi wadzin nɛ an hi mɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi gbɔɔl gi daarlɛlɛ, yɔ hi kɛm anbɔ hi kɔm hititi.
Yeesu ɗɔɔtɔ, el walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ wɔ
a za̧a̧n za gi ha̧a̧g an gi wɛɛ doosi, gi wɛɛ dood sɛw kuudya̧ hi dood sɛw woosyaya̧.
Wɛɛ loo ya̧a̧mwaa esig hi teesdu, kurig gi naan du
a za̧a̧nyɔ dag waat an yɛrɛ zaaya̧ gbun a be nuŋg du, dag beya hi zul be; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ dag beya, dāg bee gɛ, dag za̧a̧nyɔ yaazib giya.
Yohana
a Hingokya , wi gbɛn doo za gi ninik loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ a hi nuŋg mɔ; anyɔ taa doo wɛnɛ gɛ be, wi ya̧a̧nigya̧a̧nɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧:
a bɔnɛ ya̧a̧nige. Doo za taa an gi woo gɛrs a be nuŋg du, wɛɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi boo ha̧a̧l a be zulha ɓɔrbɔ gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ za̧a̧nyɔ hā̧a̧g gabs hi wɛɛ gɛ, gii gi doo wɛnɛ.
Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi gaan mɛm a dakwaa du nɛ yɔ̧, anyɔ nɛ gi Kristu doo ɔnɛ, be raasin rɔbo, taa lɔɔk dɔɔrɔɔsɔ nɛ zaŋ.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nza gi mat waat wɛrɛ hi gib ɗɔbsig zaaya̧ gbun a hinha̧a̧l du, an hi wɔ̀bs nɛ za̧a̧nɔ naalnɔɔ a durk du, hi wɛɛ hi gbalig a mɛmbal gbɔɔl du gi wɔrɔ yɔ bɛsig gi daarɔ.
Naan mɔ gi gim matig a hinha̧a̧l du, dɛ̧ɛ̧mɔge. An mɔ gul a za̧a̧tig rɔb du hi naan gbunu daarɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ mɔ ɔɔ naan wɔ eerɛ mɔ ren a laazɛŋk du a lɛlyɔ laa gɔ nı̄m gedu gɛ. [
A duhɔ ga̧a̧r wɔ hi tɔk muul hí wɔ̄r gɛ, wɛɛ laa bɔ nı̄m gɛ be. ]
Dɔɔ mɔ gi gim matig a hinha̧a̧l du dɛ̧ɛ̧mɔge. An mɔ gul a za̧a̧tig rɔb du hi dɔɔ gbunu daarɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ mɔ ɔɔ dɔɔ wɔ eerɛ mɔ gbaliy a laazɛŋk du. [
A duhɔ ga̧a̧r wɔ hi tɔk muul hí wɔ̄r gɛ, wɛɛ laa bɔ nı̄m gɛ be. ]
Lɔl mɔ gi gim matig a hinha̧a̧l du, wigumɔge. An mɔ gul a Bɛt wáát du fɛŋki daarɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ mɔ ɔɔ lɔl wɔ eerɛ hi bisum a laazɛŋk du.
A duhɔ ga̧a̧r wɔ hi tɔk muul hí wɔ̄r gɛ, wɛɛ laa bɔ mm gɛ be.
Laa gi gbaay a dood muul sɛw anyɔ gɔ hi yaak manda bis du.
Manda gi hin rɔbo. À manda wags ti̧i̧tigɔ, yɔ hi wɛɛ hi ti̧i̧sig eesimɔ ri nɔ? Ginin manda a nɛ kpoos du. Waan rɔbtɔnɔ, bɔ gbāan gigi nɛ tees du.
Yeesu ɗuk hɔdi hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rek a Yahuduya hɛbt du, hi wɛɛ hi rek a Urdum zɛɛ bɛrk zaabɔ ge. Dood saal hi wɛɛ hi mɔks gi dɔŋdi, Yeesu wɛɛ yɛlsihi hingok gɔ anyɔ gɔ gi waanik nɛ faa.
Farisaya wɔ hi zaa a ge an hi goog dɔgl wa̧a̧nuko. Hi ɛrige:
a maak wɛ gaa gbɔnɔ an doo gi hɛɛtin hi nisɔ ya?
Yeesu ta̧a̧hi:
a Muusa raan a ri?
Hi ta̧a̧
a Muusa gaa gbɔnɔ a doo gi bi̧i̧ ɗɛɛrwol hɛɛtinsya an gi ga̧a̧rin nisɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a Muusa bi̧i̧sin hin bɔrɔ a nɛ kpoos ɓaatil dɔŋ ro.
A waal yɛɛliki, Bɛt yɔ kim hin sɛw hi bi̧i̧: a kim doo, walɔ hi nisɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, wal gi ɔɔ baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ gi ɔks hi nisɔ;
hi eerɛ hi wɛɛ muul gbunu. Yɔ anbɔ hí gɛ̧ɛ̧y gɛ, hi ɔks muul gbun kpɔd.
Bɔ doo gi gɛ̧ɛ̧ hinyɔ Bɛt ɔksɔ.
Yɔ hi gi a raa du, walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi ɛrig dɔglɔ.
Yeesu
a za̧a̧nyɔ nin nisɔ gi wɛɛ gi lootin hi nis za dɔɔmi, gɔ mansi a zaa biitir bɔ gi zulha.
Nis gi hɛɛtin hi walɔ be, gi wɛɛ gi lootin hi wal za dɔɔmi, gɔ mansi hɛw.
Dood hi kams Yeesu ya̧a̧mwaato an gi ki̧i̧hi. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi za̧br dood wɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn anbɔ nɔɔgnɔ,
a ɔɔn ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ hi zaa a beege, bɔnɛ ya̧a̧nihi. Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt wáátɔ gi a dood wɔ hi gi an ya̧a̧mwaat hi.
Be raasin rɔbo: za̧a̧nyɔ tā̧ā̧ Bɛt wáátɔ an waa yɔ gɔ hi zeg gɛ, taa gulik gedu zaŋ.
Wɛɛ kur ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ gi naan du, gbaasihi naan muulɛ rɔbsihi.
Yɔ Yeesu gi wa̧a̧k gbɔnɔ, za̧a̧n za zaa hi nɔɔkili zagl gi muutdu warige:
a Hingokya rɔbo, be woo nɔ an be dag za̧a̧tig faa nɔ?
Yeesu warige:
a mɔ elib nɔ a be rɔbo? Doo za taa rɔbo, gɛ Bɛt gi gbun kpɔd.
Mɔ mɛɛ Bɛt maakdɔgl wɔ gaa: a bɔmɔ gbɔm zulɛ, bɔmɔ naamansi, bɔmɔ looluurɛ, bɔmɔ gɔ̧ɔ̧s doo ya̧a̧, bɔmɔ loo doo za hin hi maato. Ɗɔbsum baa mɔ hi nàà mɔ.
Wal bɔ
a be fɔb maak wɔrɔ lab sɛw yɔ be gi ya̧a̧mi.
Yeesu sɔ̧ɔ̧ge, ha̧a̧g gi muul be, wɛɛ
a zɛ̧rsum hin gbun kpɔd: rekum mɔ zebr hinwɔ mɔ gin sɛw mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gaa ya̧a̧rya wɔ tus bɔ, mɔ dag rɔɔsyɔ gi bɛt ha, kuudu mɔ wɛɛ mɔ fɔbzibe.
Yɔ wal bɔ lag dɔgl wɔrɔ anbɔ miimɔ, yɔ gin rɔɔs gbɔɔltɔnɔ be, wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ, reekɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu see walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi er hi gɔ̧ɔ̧ge raa:
a ɓaaɓa an dood rɔɔsya hi tal a Bɛt wáát du.
Dɔgl wɔrɔ kɔms walɛsɛrɛ wɔ gɛrsɛ. Yeesu wɛɛ
a waat be wɛ, talkɔ a Bɛt wáát du ɓaaɓa.
Ɓaaɓa an gɛloba gi gul zel gɔ̧ɔ̧s du. Ɓaaɓa zaŋ be an doo rɔɔsya gi gul a Bɛt wáát du.
Yɔ dɔgl wɔrɔ wɛɛs walɛsɛrɛ wɔ gɛrs yɛ̧ltɔnɔ ɓɛ, hi wɛɛ hi ɛtinu:
a ɔnɛ bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi za̧a̧ nɔ?
Yeesu seehi, wɛɛ
a hin bɔ lab ɓaas dood ɓaas nɛ zaŋ; Bɛt ɔnɛ ɓāāsig gɛ. Ɔnɛ ɗɛɛ hin sɛw.
Piyɛr wɛɛ
a kɛmɔ, wi ɔɔ hin sɛw, wi fɔbz mɔya.
Yeesu gòòge:
a be raasin rɔbo: za̧a̧nyɔ ɔɔ raaɔ, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧, siŋdɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧, nɔɔtɔ, baatɔ, waatɔ, zaa bakɔ a be dɔŋgo hi a Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ gi dɔŋgo,
