gi dag raato, hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ, hi siŋdɛ, hi nàa, hi waato hi bak yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ nɔɔnɛ gi daarlɛlɛ a waabil yɔ ɓɔryɔ gedu, hi ya̧a̧kɛtil hɛw. A waabil yɔ gɔ gi zaa gedu be, gi dag za̧a̧tig faa.
Wɔ hi dor kittɔnɔ hi wɛɛ kuudɛ. Kuudɛ wɔ be hi wɛɛ doosɛdɛ.

Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gi a gbɔnɔ du an hi dɔɔ a Urusalima. Yeesu gisihi gbɔnɔ dorko. Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ kpoosya̧ naamɔ, dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gihi nɛ fɔko hoobha̧a̧hiha̧ be. Yeesu wɛɛ loo walɛsɛrɛ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ wɛɛ yɛlsihi raak hinyɔ gɔ gi tursige.
Raa:
a yɛrɛ wɛ dɔɔk a Urusalima, hi wa̧a̧ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ ma a Bɛtmaakwookya hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi naan du, an hi gbaasig dɔgl gi wɔrɔ, hi wɛɛ hi gaage dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi naan du.
Hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lige, hi tusil set gi muulɛ, hi lɛge hi wɛɛ hi gbɔ̧ŋge. Gɔ gi kuudu ɔ̧t taarɛ gi rɛml a wɔrk du.
Kuudu Zebede waatɔ Yakuba hi Yohana hi sɔɔ a Yeesu dɔŋdi hi
a Hingokya , ha̧a̧wi an mɔ woosiw hinyɔ gɔ wi ɛrumɔ.
Yeesu warihi:
a ha̧a̧n an be woosin nɔ.
Hi
a gɔ wí gi a mɔ gbɔlums du, mɔ gaaw gbɔnɔ an wi ɗɔɔt a mɔ naanrɔbo, zaa gbun a mɔ naanyɛ̧li.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧ raa:
a nɛ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ nɛ ɛrik gɛ. Nɛ ɗɛɛ an nɛ yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant a dakwaa bɔ gɔ be yɔ̧ gedu ya? Nɛ ɗɛɛ an nɛ dag Bɛtmɛm yɔ gɔ be dag ya?
Hi googe:
a yɔ wi ɗɛɛɗɛ.
Yeesu goohi:
a oo! nɛ gɔ nɛ yɔ̧ ma a dakwaa bɔ gɔ be yɔ̧ gedu, nɛ dag Bɛtmɛm yɔ gɔ be dagɔ.
Ɗɔɔtigɔ a be naanrɔbo, hi a be naanyɛ̧li, taa a be naan du an be gaanɛ; gis wɔ Bɛt gɛmtsihi ya̧a̧nɛ.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ koobl zaadɛ wɔ hi kɛm hin bɔrɔ anbɔ, kpoosya̧ nɔɔhinɔ a Yakuba hi Yohana hi zulha.
Yeesu elzihi wɛɛ
a nɛ mɛɛ a wɔ hi gihi seek a waar ɛ hɛbtyayɔ a dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi teesdu hi wɛɛk gbɔɔl a dood zulha, dood gbɔlɛ wɔ be hi gisihi zuunik tɛŋk be.
Hin bɔ lab bɛ̄r an gi tal a nɛ teesdu gɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g an gi wɛɛ gbɔɔl a nɛ teesdu, gi wɛɛsin woosya nɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g an gi wɛɛ doosi a nɛ teesdu, gi wɛɛ gbaar nɛ nɛ sɛw.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ hi zulɔ, zāā an dood hí wɛɛsig woosyaadɛ gɛ, zaa an gi wɛɛs dood woosyaya̧ an gi gaa kolɔ i̧i̧nisɛ a dood kit dɔŋgo.
Hi tuur a Zeeriko. Yɔ̧ɔ̧r za nuŋggɔ a Bartimɛ, Timɛ waawal giya, gi ɗɔɔtig a gbɔnɔya̧ gi hin zɔ̧kugo. Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ, hi saalzanɔ gbɔɔl hi tuuk a waal bɔ gedu.
Yɔ kɛm a Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ gii gi daako, wɛɛ yɛɛl ya̧a̧ɓoolikyɔ:
a Yeesu Waar Dawda waawalɔ mɛɛsibe ya̧a̧rɛ.
Dood kittɔnɔ hi yɛɛlig ya̧a̧lik
a wagsige!
Gii be wɛɛ ɓoolya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ daarin lɛlɛ:
a Dawda waawalɔ, mɛɛsibe ya̧a̧rɛ!
Yeesu lagɔ erɔ, raa dood a elsinbege. Hi el yɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ hi
a ɓaasum kpoos mɔ, ɗukum ha, Ɗɛnt bɔ gimɔ elko.
Yɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ bis gbandilɔ hɛbtdi ɗuk rek a Yeesu ge.
Yeesu warig gɔ:
a ha̧a̧mɔ an be woosum nɔ?
Yɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ googe:
a Ɗɛntyɔ, gɔmɔ an be gbɛn lɔlɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a rekumɔ, anyɔ mɔ ɗɔbsibe, mɔ za̧a̧za̧!
Wal bɔ lɔlɔ gaa ɓɔrbɔ fɛfɛd. Yeesu yɔ wɛɛ gi reko fɔge.
Yɔ Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik tuurik a Urusalima, a Baytifaaze hi Betani raatya̧, hi tuur a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧tya̧ dɔŋdi. Yeesu yaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ eerɛ hi dorɔ.
a rekinɛ a raa bɔ gi nɛ muutdu bɔ ge. Gɔ nɛ bɛɛ talik gedu, nɛ zɛm pɛɛzum waa za yɔ ha̧ya, doo za kār ɗɔ̄ɔ̄tir a gi yɛl ha kɛn gɛ. Nɛ́ pidige, nɛ́ kamsibege hɛdi.
Za̧a̧n za gi warinɛ: a nɔ nɛ gɔk hin lab nɔ? Raanɛge a ha̧a̧ Ɗɛnt bɔ giya, gi ɔsinge nɛ kamzig hɛdi nɔɔktɔnɔ.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi rek hi zɛm pɛɛzum waa bɔ gɔ lakdi a gbɔnɔya̧, ha̧y a raaya̧ gbarɔ, hi pidige.
Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi ginɛ di hi warihi gɔ:
a nɛ gɔk nɔ? Nɛ pidig pɛɛzum waa yɛrɛ nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧nihi hinyɔ Yeesu raa nɛko, wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ hi ɔɔhi hi rekɔ.
Hi kams Yeesu pɛɛzum waa bɔ, hi ɓuu gbandilya̧ a pɛɛzum bɔ gi yɛl ha, Yeesu kar ɗɔɔt hage.
Dood kittɔnɔ hi ɓuu gbandilya̧ a gbɔnɔ du an hi zuun hatya̧.
Wɔ hi ɛmbik a Yeesu muutdu hi wɔ hi gig fɔk hi ya̧a̧ ɓooluko:
a Hozana, raakɔ a seko gbɔɔltɔnɔ! An Bɛt gi rɔbs Za̧a̧nyɔ zaa a Waar Bɛt nuŋg du.
Bɛt rɔbs baa wɛ Dawda waar umsɔ, waar ums yɔ gi zaako! An bant gi wooy a bɛtha a Bɛt ge!
Yeesu gul a Urusalima wɛɛ rek a Bɛtluk du. Yɔ sɔ̧ɔ̧ hin wɔ gi dɔŋdi gi dā̧ā̧ sɛwi, wɛɛ rek a Betani hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ. Lɛl da ginɛ bulkbul be.
Yoosugɔ, yɔ hi tuuzig a Betani a̧a̧kil ha̧a̧ Yeesu.
Gbɛn yɔmntnɔɔ za hi kpas a lakilɛ, rek see a kɛnsa huml gi hage be. Hɔnɛyɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b a tɛ̧ɛ̧ bɔ dɔŋgɔdi zɛm kpas wɔ hii kpɔd. Sɛɛ bɔ gɔ hum nɛ gedu da rı̄ı̄dir gɛ ya̧a̧nɛ.
Yeesu raa yɔmntnɔɔ bɔ:
a an bɔ̄ doo za gi les nɛ huml mɔ wɔ zaa zaŋ!
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi lag hinɔ be.

Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi zaa a Urusalima. Yeesu gul a Bɛtluk du. Yɔ gulɔ zɛm dood hinriŋsya wɔ hi hinzekya wɔ a duhɔ. Wɛɛ yɛɛlihi niniki. Wɛɛ bisil tus-i̧i̧kya wɔ silya̧ wɔ hi gbaak tus hage, hi gutu zebtigya wɔ ɗɔɔtilya̧ lɛl wɔ.
Wɛɛ ɔ̄ɔ̄ doo za an gi tan wɔdɔ a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu gɛ.
Kuudu wɛɛ gogsihi hin an yɛrɛ lɛ:
a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa a hi el luk be a dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t sɛw Bɛtzɔ̧kluk ma mi? Yɛrɛ nɛya, nɛ wɛɛn an luurɛ wa̧lɔ.
Yɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi kɛmɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ, ha̧a̧hi ka̧a̧syɔ. Hi ɓɛɛ gbɔnɔ an hi gbɔŋge, wɛɛ hoob ha̧a̧hige be, yɔ hingokɔ bɔ kɔms saal wɔ gɛrs giya.
Yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ, Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi tuu hi ɔɔ waal bɔ gɔ.
Bi̧i̧l du yɔ hi daako, hi gbɛn yɔmntnɔɔ bɔ Yeesu boog nɛ koot hi yɛ̧ɛ̧s elo.
Yɔ Piyɛr mɛks hinyɔ daa nɛko, wɛɛ raa Yeesu :
a Hingokya , seem yɔmntnɔɔ bɔ mɔ booge kootɔ.
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a ɗɔbsin Bɛto. Be raasin rɔbo:
za̧a̧nyɔ raa ga̧a̧t yɛrɛ, a ha̧sum hɛdi mɔ re mɔ gi̧i̧ a mɛmbal du, gí fāā a gi kpoos du gɛ, gi ɗɔbs a hinyɔ gi raako gi tuurɔ, hinɔ gi tursige.
Ya̧a̧nɛ be raanɛ: a hinyɔ nɛ ɛrk sɛw hi zɔ̧ki, ɗɔbsin a nɛ dag hinɔ da̧a̧da̧, wɛɛ hinɔ gi tursin be.
Gɔ nɛ gi a erkillɛl ha an nɛ zɔ̧bɔ, doo za gi woosin nɛ hin a̧a̧bi, bitsinɛge an Baa nɛ yɔ bɛtha gi bitsin hinha̧a̧l nɛ hɛw be. [
Gid nɛ́ bı̄ts dood zaadɛ gɛ, Baa nɛ yɔ gi a bɛtha taasin hinha̧a̧l nɛ wɔ bisig be. ]
Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi wɛɛ a Urusalima. Yɔ Yeesu gul a Bɛtluk du gi ɛmbiko, Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi ɗɛntɛ Bɛtlukya wɔ hi zaa a ge,
hi warige:
a mɔ wook hin wɛrɛ hi nɔ tɛŋkɔ nɔ? Bɔ gaam tɛŋkɔ an mɔ woon hin wɛrɛ lɛ nɔ?
Yeesu
a ɔbe warin hin gbunu, nɛ́ gòòsibe, gid nɛ gòòbe, bee be raasin za̧a̧nyɔ gaazib tɛŋk yɔ be woonik hin wɛrɛ be.
Wɛɛ ɛrihi: a nɛ bɔ yaaz Yohana an gi hotin dood Bɛtmɛm nɔ? Bɛt gii ya, dood ya ri? Goosinbe ma!
Wɔrɔ hi watin gɔ hi tees du:
a nɛ an wɛ raa a Bɛt gii yaazig be, yɔ raa a nɛ nɛ ɔɔg ɗɔbsig ma nɔ?
Wɛɛ an wɛ raa a dood be
hoob ha̧a̧wɛ saal bɔ ha̧a̧, à hi lag anbɔ be, anyɔ hi mɔkig sɛw a Yohana gi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya hi rɔbo yɔ hi ɔɔwɛ gɛ.
Hi wɛɛ hi raa Yeesu gɔ:
a wi mɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a nɛ gi lab be, bee be taasin dɔk tɛŋk yɔ be woonik hin wɔrɔ be.
Yeesu wɛɛ yɛlsihi ya̧a̧book hi ya̧a̧daaniki.
A wal za rɛɛ tɛ̧ɛ̧ humlɛ kittɔnɔ wɛɛ gɔ̧ɔ̧n rɔkili. Wɛɛ su̧u̧ suknààli an gɔ gi ɓɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ̧ɛ̧ huml wɔ mɛkɔ du. Wɛɛ rɛɛ ooko waar in balkya wɔ tɛ̧ɛ̧ humlɛ wɔ naan du da rek rɔbsi.
Yɔ huml wɔ hi ɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧kɔ gi rii, yaaz woosya za a bak-ookya wɔ hi an hi ha̧bsig huml wɔ ɔnɛ hi yaasige.
Hɔnɛ balkya wɔ hi wa̧a̧ gbaar bɔ hi lɛge, hi yaag naan ɗɛndilɛ.
Wal bɔ wɛɛ yaasihi gbaar za dɔɔmi; hi lɛge hi gaag nɔk a zulha, hi wɛɛ hi niige hi ɔɔg rekɔ.
Wɛɛ yaaz zaa ɓɛ, bɔrɔ ɔnɛ hi wa̧a̧ hi gbɔŋge. Hi gɔs gbaarɛ zaadɛ kit wɔ hin gbuna bɔ: hi lɛb zaadɛ be, hi gbɔm zaadɛ be.
Zɛ̧rs wal bɔ doo gbun kpɔd: waaɔ gbunsum bɔ ha̧a̧g gi muul giya. Yɔ̧ɔ̧sumɔ, wɛɛ yaa waa wal bɔ a hii, raa: a yɛrɛ hi ɗɔbs waa be yɛrɛ ɔnɛ.
Hɔnɛ balkya wɔ hi gbɛnig zaako hi raatinu: a yɛrɛ gii rɔɔsyɛrkya, zaan wɛ wa̧a̧ge wɛ gbɔŋge, rɔɔs bɔ gi wɛɛ wɛɛnɛ.
Hi wa̧a̧ge hi gbɔŋge, hi wɛɛ hi bisig a bak bɔ lakɔ ge.
Za̧a̧n tɛ̧ɛ̧bakya bɔ yɔ gɔ nɔ? Yɔ zaa yɔ gbɔm balkya wɔ, yɔ wɛɛ yɔ gaa dood zaadɛ tɛ̧ɛ̧ humlɛ wɔ.
Nɛ́ zaŋg dɔgl yɛrɛ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du: a bet yɔ lukwɔŋkya wɔ hi bisige gii wɛɛ bet gbɔɔl tɛŋkya gɛ ya?
Waar Bɛt gii woo hinɔ anbɔ; yɔ wɛ gbɛn lɔl du gisɛ wɛnɛ gɛrsɛ.
Hi tɛ gbɔnɔ an hi wa̧a̧ Yeesu , wɛɛ hoobha̧a̧hi saal wɔ be, anyɔ hi mɛɛ a raan hii ya̧a̧daanik bɔrɔ anbɔ. Hi ɔɔge hi wɛɛ hi rekɔ.
Hi yaaz Farisaya wɔ hi waar Hirudus doodɔ zaadɛ an hi ton Yeesu hi hin-ɛrki a dɔgl yɔ gi book hage.
Hi zaa hi warige:

a Hingokya , wi mɛɛ a mɔ raak hin hi rɔbo, hoob-hā̧ā̧mɔ doo za gɛ, yɔ anbɔ mɔ́ sɔ̧̄ɔ̧̄ dood a muut du kpɔd gɛ, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gok Bɛt gbɔnɔ ɔnɛ hi rɔbo. Gbɔnɔ gi an hi toos waar gbɔɔl Romaya Kaysara toos ya? Taa lab ya? Gi an wi too ya, taa an wi too ya?
Yeesu yɔ mɛɛ ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya̧,
a nɔ nɛ gib tolik hi dɔglɛ? Kamsib tus gaat gbunu be see.
Hi kamsig tus gaat gbun bɔ. Yeesu wɛɛ warihi:
a bɔ muut yɛrɛ hi nuŋg yɛrɛ du nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧ge:
a Kaysara ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a wɛɛnsin Kaysara hinyɔ gin a ge, wɛɛ nɛ wɛɛns Bɛt hinyɔ gin be.
Yɔ anbɔ hinɔ yɔ goo kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Sadukiya wɔ gɔ hi raak a wɔrkɛ hi taa zaa rɛmluko. Zaadɛya̧ hi zaa Yeesu ge,
hi ɛrige:
a Hingokya , Muusa gaawɛ dɔgl za bi̧i̧ki: a doo za gi gin hindaɔ, hindaɔ bɔ gi wɔrɔ gi ɔɔ nisɛ, waa gi taaro, gi an yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ bɔ gi wɛɛ gi loo nis bɔ an gi dag waat elo a hindaɔ wɔrk bɔ ɔnɛ kalɛ.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ walɛ hi gi nɔɔn-erɛ, gbɔɔl bɔ yɛɛl loo nis bɔ, wɔrɔ ɔ̄ɔ̄ waat gɛ.
Eesum bɔ yɛr kuur bɔ, wɛɛ wɔrɔ ɔ̄ɔ̄ waat gɛ. Hin gbun bɔ gii tuur a taasum bɔ ge,
wɛɛ tuur a zaadɛ wɔ hi sɛw, hi nɔɔn-er sɛw hi wɔrɔ, hí ɔ̄ɔ̄ waat gɛ. A hi kuudu sɛw nis bɔ wɔr gɔ be.
Gɔ gi rɛmtig ɔ̧ti, wɔrkɛ wɔ gɔ hí wɛɛz a za̧a̧tig du rɛ, nis bɔ gi gi bɔ ɔnɛ gbun nɔ, anyɔ walɛ nɔɔn-er wɔ hi lootin hi nis gbuna bɔ sɛw?
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa hi Bɛt tɛŋkɔ gɛ, nɛ́ nɛ hɛɛ gbɔnɔ ma mi!
Wɔrkɛ wɔ gɔ hi ɗunz a wɔrk du hi taa lootingo. Hí gi an Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ bɛtha.
Nɛ́ zaŋg wɔrkɛ dɔgl hi rɛmtig dɔgl a ɗɛɛrwol yɔ Muusa bi̧i̧ a dɔgl lɛlyɔ gi book tɛ̧ɛ̧ kuusa kobsya dɔglɔ gedu gɛ ya? Bɛt raa Muusa: a be gi Abraham hi Isaaku hi Yakuba Bɛt ya̧a̧nɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ wɔrkɛ wɔrɔ ya̧nɛ hi taa wɔrkɛ a Bɛt muut du: hi gi za̧a̧tilyɔ. Yɔ anbɔ nɛ matig zul nɛɛn ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ zaŋ.
Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ zaaya̧ gbun yɔ kɛ́m nɛ Yeesu hi watingo hinza hi Sadukiya wɔ, yɔ gbɛ̄n Yeesu gōos Sadukiya wɔ hin bɛttɔnɔ, sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi ɛrige:
a Waar i, a Bɛt maakdɔgl zaadɛ du sɛw, dɔgl gbɔɔl yɔ daarlɛl gɛ́ nɔni?
Yeesu googe:
a maakdɔgl gbɔɔl yɔ daarlɛl gɛrɛ: a kɛnɛ, dood Israhilaya wɛ, Waar wɛ Bɛt gii gi Waar wɛ gbun kpɔd.
Gi an gi ha̧a̧mɔ Waar mɔ Bɛto hi kpoos mɔ sɛw, hi kol mɔ sɛw, hi mɔkil mɔ sɛw, wɛɛ hi tɛŋk mɔ sɛw.
Maakdɔgl eesim bɔ gɛrɛ: a yɛ gi ha̧a̧mɔ namɔza an zul mɔ. Bɛt maakdɔgl gbɔlɛ zaadɛ taaro, gɛ eerɛ wɔrɔ bɔ.
Bɛtmaakdɔkya bɔ
a bɛrdi! Hingokya , hinwɔ mɔ dɔg bɔ rɔbo: Waar gɛ Bɛt gi gbunu, wɛɛ Bɛt za dɔɔm taaro, gɛ giya.

Doo gi ha̧a̧g Bɛt hi kpoosɔ sɛw, hi mɔkilɔ sɛw, hi tɛŋkɔ sɛw, gi wɛɛ gi ha̧a̧g naaza an zulɔ. Hin wɛrɛ gɔkɔ tɔɔ daar namnɔɔmik yɔ sɛŋk ha an gɔ hi gaa Bɛt gaas hi gaas zaadɛ dɔɔmɛ wɔ gɔ hi gaak sɛw daarɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn wal bɔ ta̧a̧ hi gbɔnɔ, wɛɛ
a mɔ́ hɛml hi Bɛt wáátɔ gɛ.
Yɔ kuudu anbɔ doo za mɔ̄k an gi ɛrig hinza ma gɛ, hoobha̧a̧hiha̧.
Yɔ Yeesu gi gokhin a Bɛtluk du, ɛr hinɛ:
a Bɛtmaak-dɔkya wɔ hi ɗɛɛ raakɔ ri a Masihu bɔ gi Waar Dawda waawal gii nɔ?
Dawda hi zulɔ dɔg anyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ
Dawda hi zulɔ gig elik a Waar be, Masihu bɔ gi Dawda waawal ri ma nɔ?
Saal kittɔnɔ hi kɛmsig Yeesu hi hato.
a oon zul nɛ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hā̧ā̧hi gbandil gbɔlɛ zi̧i̧dɛ ɛmbingo, wɔ hā̧ā̧hi an hi boohi a luum lɛlyɔ gi ge.
Ha̧a̧hi ɗɔɔtillɛl yɔ hɔɔ gi daarlɛl a mɔksilluk du, hi lɛl hɔɔt a naab lɛl du.
Hi lek kuurɛ nɛɛd wɔ wɔdya̧, hi wɔɔlik raatya̧, hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧k Bɛt zi̧i̧tɔnɔ an dood zaadɛ hi sɔ̧ɔ̧hi an dood rɔbɛ. Ya̧nɛ hí gbaasihi dɔgl gi daarlɛl gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Yeesu ɗɔɔt a tusyaaklɛl bɔ dɔŋgɔdi a Bɛtluk du, wɛɛ gi sɔ̧ɔ̧k dood wɔ hi yaak ma tusɛ. Dood rɔɔsya kittɔnɔ hi yaak tus gbɔɔltɔnɔ a tusyaaklɛl bɔ gedu.
Kuur za ya̧a̧rya-waa zaa yaa tus dɛɛt eerɛ, fɛŋwaanɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu elz walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ
a be raasin hi rɔbo, kuur ya̧a̧ryawaa yɛrɛ yàà tus bɔ daar dood zaadɛ wɔ daarɔ.
Dood zaadɛ wɔ sɛw hi ɓeg tus kaasi kaasi a hi rɔɔs du hi yaako. Yɛrɛ gii be, hinyɔ gin nɛ an gi len zulɔ, yàà gii a gi ya̧a̧rums kalɛ.
Anyɔ Yeesu gi tuuzig nɛ a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu, walsɛrɔ za gbun
a Hingokya , sɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ, bet wɔ bɛrki! Luk gbɔlɛ wɔ tɔɔkɔ!
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
a mɔ gbɛn luk gbɔlɛ wɔ tɔɔkɔ gɛrɛ, bet gbunu taa kɔŋk goksili, sɛw gí yaar hɛbtdi.
Yeesu ɗɔɔt a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧t ha a Bɛtluk bɔ doosɔ ge. Yɔ Piyɛr hi Yakuba hi Yohana hi Andrɛ hi gi ɔ̧ɔ̧kya̧ hi Yeesu ,
hi ɛrige:
a raasiwi hin wɔrɔ ɔ̧tɔ gɔ hi tuur du, hi hinmɛksin-goya yɔ gɔ gi dɔgsuw ɔ̧tyɔ hin wɔrɔ sɛw gɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b du.
Yeesu yɛlsihi raaki:
a ɓāan bɛttɔnɔ an bɔ dood hi maatinɛ.
Dood kittɔnɔ hí zaa a be nuŋg du hi raa a hii giya! Hí wɛɛ hí maat dood kittɔnɔ.
Gɔ nɛ kɛm a nɔk giro, hí wɛɛ hí book nɔk zaadɛ ramsɛ, bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ; yɔ anbɔ gi an hinɔ gi tuurɔ, wɛɛ hinɔ taa waal da̧a̧k kete.
Waal gi ɗuk gabs a waal za zulha, waar gi ɗuk gabs a waar za zulha, hɛbtnamlik gí gi a lɛl zaadɛ sɔmsɔm. Tɔs gí giro. Hin wɔrɔ sɛw gí gi an waamɔɔk kosgumn yɛɛlikyɔ.

Yɛrɛ nɛya ɓaasin muul nɛ. Gɔ gi anbɔ dood zaadɛ hi ka̧nɛ a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk du, hi ɓaan a mɔksilluk wɔ duge. Hi ka̧nɛ a dood nabl wɔ hi muutdu, hi waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi muutdu a be dɔŋgo an nɛ dɔg hinyɔ tursin hi rɔbo a hi muutdu.
Gi an Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ gi dɔgiy a waal du doosi ɓɔr waal gi ɔɔ da̧a̧ko.

Gɔ hi wa̧a̧n an hi ka̧nɛ a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk du, bɔ kol gi tuunɛ a hinyɔ gɔ nɛ dɔg geha doosi. À lɛlɔdi dɔgin hinyɔ gɔ gí zaasin kpoos ha giya. Gɔ gi anbɔ nɛɛ taa hinɔ dɔk hi zul nɛ, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gii gi dɔko.
Dood zaadɛ hı́ gaa yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛya̧ zaŋ an hi gbɔ̧hi, zaadɛ be hi gaa hindaya̧ zaŋ an hí gbɔ̧hi.
Dood sɛw lɔlya̧ gí bɛtin hi nɛɛ gɛ a be dɔŋgo. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi mɔm ya̧a̧rhant a be dɔŋg gi tuur a waal da̧a̧ki gi za̧a̧.
Nɛ́ gbɛn hinyɔ gɔ hi el a hinha̧a̧l lɛlha̧tirgoya gí ɗɔɔt a lɛlyɔ taa nɛ an gí ɗɔɔt ge gɛ (za̧a̧nyɔ gi zaŋgig hin yɛrɛ gi kɛm bɛttɔnɔ! ) wɔ gɔ hi gi a Yahuduya hɛbt du, nɔ̀ɔ̀hi hí dɔɔ ga̧a̧ti.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi gi a luk zulha, bɔgi siz a luk du an gi loo wɔdɔ gi renɔ.
Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi gi a bako, bɔgi wɛɛz gi lɛlɛ an gi loo gbandilɔ.
Ya̧a̧rhant gi giro a nɛɛd budaa wɔ hi zulha, hi waatnɔɔdɛ wɔ hi gaak waat wa̧a̧l a ɔ̧tɔ ge.
Zɔ̧n Bɛto an bɔ̄ hin wɔrɔ lab hi tuur a zɛrk du.
Ya̧a̧nɛ a ɔ̧tɔ ge ya̧a̧rhantɔ gí tɔɔ gí daar ya̧a̧rhant zaadɛ wɔ wɛ mɛɛhi nɛ sɛw yɔ waal yɛɛlɔ, yɔ Bɛt kim hin sɛw gí tuur a ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ. Wɛɛ ya̧a̧rhant za yɔ riitin an bɔrɔ taa nɛ midig zaŋ.
An Waar Bɛt lɔ̄bs nɛ ɔ̧t wɔrɔ gɛ, doo za ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi za̧a̧ gɛ. Yɛrɛ Bɛt lɔbs ɔ̧t a doodɔ wɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧hi zulɛ.
Za̧a̧n za gi raan a sɔ̧ɔ̧n Masihu bɔ gi hɛdi! Zaabe: a nɔ da gi bɔ! Bɔnɛ ɗɔbs hinɔ.
Masihu ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya wɔ hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya wɔ hi midɔ hi zu̧u̧n hinmɛksingoya hi gɛrs an hi maatin dood wɔ Bɛt sɛ̧ɛ̧hi hɛw, gid hi ɗɛɛ hinɔ wooko.
Nɛya, ɓaanɛ, be raasin hin sɛw door ma.
Yɛrɛ a ɔ̧tɔ ge ɔ̧t ya̧a̧rhantya bɔ gɔ gi talɔ, ɔ̧t gi nimɔ, sɛɛ taa buul gaako,
sɛwaat hí mɛlz a bɛtha, wɛɛ tɛŋk wɔ hi gi bɛtha hí bee.
Gɔ ma hi gbɛn Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaak gɔ a kuus ha hi tɛŋk gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi gbɔlumsɛ.
Gí yaa Bɛtwalɛ-sɛrɛ wɔ a ɔ̧tkazigi, a ɔ̧tleki, hi a ɔ̧tkazig naanrɔbo hi ɔ̧tkazig naanyɛ̧li, hí mɔks wɔ Bɛt sɛ̧ɛ̧hi ma gi da gi bààr a hɛbtlɛl yɔ yɛɛl ge, gi tuur a lɛlyɔ door ge.
Kɛn hinyɔ ya̧a̧daanik bɔ gi book a yɔmntnɔ muulɛ: a gɔ nɛ́ gbɛn tɛ̧ɛ̧ya̧a̧n yɛ̧s wɔ hi bɛɛ kpas yɛ̧s baako, nɛ mɛɛ a zɛrk bɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Gbunɔ, nɛ́ gɔ nɛ́ gbɛn hin wɔrɔ hi tuuruko, mɛɛn a zaakɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ an hinɔ gi tuurɔ.
Be raasin hi rɔbo: hin wɛrɛ sɛw hi tuur kete, ɓɔr dood wɔ hi gi ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ hi ɔɔ wɔrko.
Bɛtha hi hɛbtdi hi talɔ, yɛrɛ dɔgl be taa talko.
Yɛrɛ doo za mɛ̄ɛ̄ ɔ̧t yɔ̧ɔ̧sum bɔ zaakɔ gɛ; Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ bɛtha hɛw hí mɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ. Baa Bɛt gi gbun mɛɛ ɔ̧tyɔ waal gɔ gi da̧a̧ du ɔnɛ.
Ɓaanɛ, oonɛ; anyɔ nɛ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ ɔ̧tɔ zaakɔ gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, gí gi ma an doo za gi rɔbs reko gi gi ɔɔk raatɔ hi hin sɛw a woosyaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ naan du. Gaa woosya wɔ bɔbe hi woosɔ, bɔbe hi woosɔ an gi woo; wɛɛ gaa lɛl-ookya bɔ woosɔ an gi oo lɛl be.
Yɔ anbɔ, kɔmbin nɛ oo anyɔ nɛ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ ɔ̧tyɔ za̧a̧n raatya bɔ gɔ gi zaa du gɛ. Kɛnsa gi zaa a lɛɛsig du, kɛnsa yɛms tees du, kɛnsa bi̧i̧l teeyɔ, kɛnsa bi̧i̧l du.
Gi zaa ɓɔrbɔ be, an bɔgi zɛ̧n yoom du.
Hinyɔ be gisin dɔkyɔ be dɔksig dood sɛw, oonɛ!
Zɛ̧ɛ̧r nɛ yɛms eerɛ an Paska naabo hi kok yɔ gɔ taan hɛ̧ɛ̧t gɛ dood gɔ hi lek gi tuurɔ. Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi ɓɛɛk gbɔnɔ an hi wa̧a̧ Yeesu a luurlɛlɛ hi gbɔŋge.
Hi wɛɛ hi raa be:
a taa an wɛ wa̧a̧g a naab-ɔ̧ti an bɔ dood hi gbaatin hi wɛya.

Yeesu giz a Betani a Simɔŋ ɗobtilya bɔ gi lɛl du; yɔ gi lekhinɛ, nis za gul hi kurum ki̧i̧lhɛmntya tik hi̧i̧sili. Tik bɔ hi wɔmn bet rɔb yɔ gɔ hi el a albaatreyɔ. Kurum bɔ be hi gɔn tɛ̧ɛ̧yɛ̧ɛ̧s mɛko, nuŋggɔ a naaryɔ. Tusɔ gɔ sa̧a̧sa̧. Nis bɔ ɓɛd tik bɔ ya̧a̧-gbarɔ gubs Yeesu kurum bɔ a zulha.
Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi ginɛ di yɔ kpoosya̧ nɔɔhi, hi watin hi tees du:
a hi ha̧tir kurum hɛmnt yɛrɛ a nɔ dɔŋgo?
Yɔ hi zebrig nɛ tusɔ gaat yɔ daar tɛmɛrɛ taar hɛw an hi gaa ya̧a̧rya wɔ.
Hi niis nis bɔ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa:
a ɔɔnɛge, nɛ gig mɔɔsig nɔ? Woowoos rɔb a be gbaŋgi.
Nɛ gin ya̧a̧rya wɔ nɛ teesdu ɔ̧t nuŋgo, nɛ ɗɛɛ an nɛ woosihi hinrɔb a ɔ̧tyɔ ha̧a̧n gedu sɛw. Yɛrɛ beya, be taa waak hi nɛɛ faa.
Nis bɔ woo hinyɔ ɗɛɛ giya. Gub kurum ki̧i̧lhɛmntya yɛrɛ a be muul gaati an gi gɛms loorɛ.
Be raasin rɔbo: lɛlyɔ gɔ hi dɔg Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ du sɛw, a waal du sɛw, hí fɔ̀k hinyɔ nis yɛrɛ woo an hi mɛksinge.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ koobl daa eer zaaya̧ gbun bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yahuda Iskaryudi, rek raas Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ a ha̧a̧g an gi gaahi Yeesu naan du.
Yɔ hi lag anbɔ hi dag hato, hi wɛɛ hi
Yɔ naab-ɔ̧t doos bɔ kokɔ taan hɛ̧ɛ̧t gɛ rii a ɔ̧tyɔ hi gbɛɛtirgo tamwaat gedu an hi len Paska naabo, Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi ɛrige:
a ha̧a̧mɔ an wi rek wi gɔsum Paska lees ay nɔ?
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu her walɛsɛrɛ eerɛ a zaadɛ teesdu yaahi,
a rekin a waal gbɔɔl du nɛ dagtin hi wal za gi pɛɛk mɛmruuk zulha; nɛ́ fɔge.
A lɛlyɔ gɔ gi gul gedu, nɛ raa za̧a̧n raatya bɔ: a Hingokya bɔ gii raa: a luk buu benɛ yɔ gɔ be le Paska naab lees du hi walɛsɛrɛ be wɔ gi ay nɔ?
Gi wɛɛ gi zunsin luk buu gbɔɔl bɔ wɛɛha, a lɛlyɔ hi gɛms bɛttɔnɔ hi wɔd gedu. Nɛ gɛmtsɛ lɛlɔ ge.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi rek hi tuur a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu, hi zɛm hin sɛw anyɔ raasihi. Hi gɛms Paska naab lees bɔ gɔ.
Yɔ ɔ̧t gi leko, Yeesu tuur gɔ hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ.
Yɔ hi ɗɔɔt hi lekhinɛ, Yeesu raa:
a be raasin rɔbo: zaa nɛ gbun yɔ gi lekhin hi beya, gi rɛ̧ɛ̧be.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi kɛm anbɔ kpoosya̧ wiilɔ, hi yɛɛlig hin-ɛrk hi gbunu gbunu:
a nɛ bee ma gɛ mi?
Yeesu goohi:
a zaa gbuni a nɛ tees du. Yɔ nɛ gi nɛ koobl daa eer yɔ, za̧a̧n yɔ gi yaak naan kokdak du lɛlgbun hi bee giya.
Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi reek ma anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa dɔgl be; yɛrɛ ya̧a̧rhant gi gis za̧a̧n yɔ gɔ gi rɛ̧ɛ̧ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ. An za̧a̧nɔ mɔɔy nɛ gɛ, yɔ bɛsig gi ɗaarɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gi lekhin hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ loo koko, baan Bɛto, ɓɛɛlɔ, gaahi, raa:
a loonɛ, yɛrɛ gi muul beenɛ.
Wɛɛ loo dakwaa bɔ bumhob gi du, yɔ baan Bɛto, gaahi, hi wɛɛ hi yɔ̧ lɛlgbun sɛw.
a yɛrɛ gi ga̧a̧m beenɛ, ga̧a̧m yɔ gi zuunik Bɛt ya̧a̧wɔkɔ hi doodɛ; gi gub a dood kit dɔŋgo.
Be raasin rɔbo: be taa bumhob za yɔ̧k zaŋ, gi tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ be yɔ̧k zaa sekt a Bɛt wáát duge.
Hi wɛɛ hi ɛɛhin an hi baan Bɛto; kuudu hi wɛɛ hi re gɔ a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧t ha.
Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a nɛ sɛw, nɛ́ simdɔɔ. Ya̧a̧ gii hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du: a bé gbɔm nɛɛra bɔ, tam wɔ hi hɛksɔ.
Yɛrɛ gɔ bé rɛml wɔrk du, bé dosin a Galile.
Piyɛr
a gid zaadɛ sɛw hi ɔɔmɔ, benɛ be taam ɔɔko.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a be raasum hi rɔbo: nɛɛko a yɛms yɛrɛ gedu, an kɔɔ gi kek dɔɔ eerɛ, mɔɔ mɔ faab ma dɔɔ taarɛ.
Piyɛr wɛɛ dɔg hi ya̧a̧ɓooti:
a gid hinɔ gi nɛ an be wɔr hi mɔɔ si̧, be taam faako.
Hi sɛw hi raa ya̧a̧ gbun bɔ giya.
Hi rek a lɛl za bɔ nuŋgɔ a Gɛsɛmanɛ ge. Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a ɗɔɔtin hɛdi, be da be zɔ̧bz Bɛto.
Wɛɛ kam Piyɛr hi Yakuba hi Yohana; gii be kolɔ yɛɛlig tuukyɔ, wɛɛ hoob ha̧a̧sig ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Wɛɛ
a kpoos be gisib wɔtigi hurko. Kɔmbin hɛdi, za̧a̧n lɔlɛ.
Wɛɛ rek hɛml kaasi, gbuut a hɛbtdi zɔ̧ Bɛto, an ya̧a̧rhant bɔ ɔ̧tɔ gi tasige, hinɔ gi giro.
Raa:
a Aba, hinɔ raakɔ: a Baaba, mɔ ɗɛɛ an mɔ woo hin sɛw; hɛmlinmɔ dakwaa ya̧a̧rhantya yɛrɛ be dɔŋdi. Hinza gɛ, taa anyɔ ha̧a̧be, woom anyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ.
Wɛɛ wɛɛz zɛ̧hi yoom du.
War Piyɛr a Simɔŋ, mɔ yokyo ya? Mɔ́ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an mɔ za̧a̧lɔl kaaka gɛ ya?
Kɔmbin lɔlɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ zɔ̧b Bɛt an bɔnɛ mat a maatil du. Doo bɔ mɔkilɔ ha̧a̧g wook rɔbtɔnɔ, wɛɛ muulɔ hɔnighɔnɔ.
Wɛɛ hɛml ɓɛ, zɔ̧b Bɛt hi dɔgl gbun bɔ.
Wɛɛ wɛɛza ɓɛ, zɛ̧hi yoom du, yoom bɔ ɗɔhiɗɔbɔ ya̧a̧nɛ. Hí wɛɛ hí mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ gɔ hí raasig gɛ be.
Yɔ Yeesu wɛɛz dɔɔ taasumɛ, warihi:
a yɔ nɛ gbork yok rɛ, nɛ holikhol ma ya? Rii! lɛlɔ tuurɔ. Yɛrɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi gaay ma a hinha̧a̧lya wɔ hi naan du.
Ɗukinɛ wɛ rekɔ; za̧a̧n yɔ rɛ̧ɛ̧sib ya̧a̧ sɛ̧ɛ̧b gi gɛdi.

Ɓɔrbɔ, yɔ Yeesu gi bookya̧a̧ tɛ̧, walɛsɛrɛ wɔ koobl daa eer zaaya̧ gbun bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yahuda zaa. Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ, hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hii yaaz dood saal hi zaa hi Yahuda. Hi zaan daŋbɛsim wɔ hi sɔɔlɛ an hi wa̧a̧ Yeesu.
Za̧a̧n rɛ̧ɛ̧kya bɔ goks nɛ dood saal wɔ hinyɔ gɔ gí rek gí gɔ anyɔ lɛ:
a za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ bé zɔm wɛktɔ, gi za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧n wa̧a̧k giya. Wa̧a̧nɛge, nɛ kaŋg rɔbtɔnɔ.
Yɔ Yahuda bɛɛ tuuruko, sɔɔ Yeesu dɔŋdi elige:
a Hingokya ,
wɛɛ zɔm wɛktɔ.
Dood hi yaa naan hi wa̧a̧g gɔ.
Zaaya̧ gbun bɔ gi lɛlɔdi hɔ̧b daŋbɛsim gbob Bɛt-maakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ gbaarɔ tɔnɔ dɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ.
Yeesu
a nɛ zāan daŋbɛsim hi sɔɔl an nɛ wa̧a̧b an luur ha̧a̧l wɔd wɔɔlikya ya?
Ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw be gi hi nɛya, be gi hingok a Bɛtluk du, wɛɛ nɛ́ wā̧ā̧be gɛ. Yɛrɛ gi an hinyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol raa gí tuurɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, walɛsɛrɛ wɔ sɛw hi ɔɔg hi nɔɔnɔ.
Wal za sɛr fɔge, tab gbandil buu ɗɔbti muul kpɔd. Hi goog wa̧a̧ko,
wir hòbrsihi gbandil buu bɔ naan du dur, nɔɔ rek ɔ̧lɛ.
Hi kam Yeesu a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ ge, a lɛlyɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ zaadɛ wɔ sɛw hi mɔks ge hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ ge.
Piyɛr fɔbz Yeesu da hɛmltɔnɔ, zaa tuur a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ gi luk ya̧di. Ɗɔɔt hɔdi hi lɛl-ookya wɔ, gi laa tɛɛko.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi dɔgl-yɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ sɛw hi ɓɛɛk dood segyaadɛ an hi wa̧a̧n Yeesu dɔgl hi gbɔŋge, wɛɛ hí zōl gɛ.
Dood kittɔnɔ hi gisig ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧ko; wɛɛ ya̧a̧ya̧ wɔy gbun gɛ be.
Dood zaadɛ hi ɗuk hi gisig ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧k be:
a be kɛŋg gi raako. a bé ɛ̧br Bɛtluk yɛrɛ yɔ dood hi wɔmn naanɛ, wɛɛ ɔ̧t taarɛ, be wɛɛ be wɔm zaa yɔ dood hí wɔ̄m gɛ.
Wɛɛ a dɔglya̧ bɔ hi dɔktig gedu hɛw, ya̧a̧ya̧ ɔks gbun gɛ be.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ ɗuk er hi teesdu, ɛr Yeesu :
a mɔ taa hinza gook ya? Dood wɛrɛ hi dɔk nɔ mɔ zulha nɔ?
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu gōō hinza gɛ, kɔms sɔsɔg. Bɔrɔ wɛɛ ɛrig ɓɛ:
a mɔɔ gi Masihu bɔ Bɛt bɔ Za̧a̧nɔ wɛ gig baanik waaɔ ya?
Yeesu goo:
a bee giya! Nɛ́ gbɛn Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi ɗɔɔt a Bɛt Tɛŋkya naan rɔbo, gɔ gi sizig bɛtha a kuus ha hɛw nɛ́ gbɛnige.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ taar gbannɔ gɔ tees du kpa̧s, wɛɛ raa:
a yɛrɛ wɛ gin nɔ dɔglɔ ɓɛ!
Nɛ kɛm ha̧a̧l yɔ boo a Bɛt zulha be! Nɛ mɔk nɔ?
Dood sɛw hi yɛ̧ɛ̧ge hi raa:
a rii an hi gbɔŋg-gbɔmɔ.
Dood zaadɛ hi teesdu hi yɛlsig set tusilgo, hi yaat muutɔ hi zɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀ge, hi wɛɛ hi
a taamɔ, bɔ gɔsum hin bɔrɔ nɔ?
Lɛl-ookya wɔ hi loog hi dɛŋge.
Yɔ Piyɛr gi lakdi a luk dɔŋg disɛ, Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ nɛɛdɔ woosya wɔ zaaya̧ gbun tuurɔ;
yɔ gbɛn Piyɛr gi laa tɛɛko, sɔ̧ɔ̧ge raa:
a mɔɔ hɛw, mɔ da mɔ gi nɛ hi Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ elo!
Hɔnɛ Piyɛr yɔ kɛm anbɔ wɛɛ faa raa:
a bé mɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ, bé kɛ̄m hinyɔ ha̧a̧m dɔk gɛ!
Kuudu wɛɛ tuu an gi rek a pɔnt du a gbɔnɔya̧. Kɔba kekɔ.
Yɔ nis woosya bɔ wɛɛ gi gbɛnige, yɛls wɔrɔ hi gi di dɔk ɓɛ:
a wal yɛrɛ gi zaaya̧ gbunyɔ!
Piyɛr wɛɛ faa ɓɛ. Kuudu kaasi, dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi di hi raa ɓɛ:
a rɔbo, mɔ gi zaaya̧ gbunyɔ; mɔɔ hɛw mɔ gi Galileyayɔ!
Hɔnɛ wɛɛ yɛɛl boot dɔk gɔ gi zulha hi hin dɛŋgliki:
a bé mɛ̄ɛ̄ wal yɔ nɛ dɔglɔ book gɛ!
Ɓɔrbɔ kɔba kek gbaŋ eesimɛ. Yɔ Piyɛr mɛks hinyɔ Yeesu da dɔgsig nɛ be:
a kɔba gi kek dɔɔ eerɛ, mɔɔ mɔ faab gi dor dɔɔ taarɛ,
kaa ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ hi mɔks bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ hi Yahu-duya ɗɛntɛ wɔ, hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ, hi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ sɛw hi wɔ̀ kɔlki. Hi wɔb Yeesu hi kaŋg hi gaag waar Pilatu naan du.
Pilatu ɛrig hinɛ:
a mɔɔ gi Yahuduya wɔ waar ya̧ ya?
Yeesu gòòge:
a anyɔ mɔ raa.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig hin kittɔnɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Pilatu wɛɛ ɛrige:
a mɔ taa hinza gook ya? Mɔ kɛŋk hin gɛ̧ɛ̧nik mɔ zulha kittɔnɔ be!
Yeesu wɛɛ gōō hinza ma zaŋ gɛ. Yɔ anbɔ hin wɛɛ wɛɛs Pilatu gɛrsɛ.
Yɔ Paska naab gɔ gi nɛko, waar Pilatu gɔ bis luknɔya zaa gbun yɔ dood gɔ hi ɛr an hi bisige.
Za̧a̧n za giro nuŋggɔ a Barabas gi luknɔ du hi dood zulɓaasigya zaadɛ wɔ hi gbɔm nɛ za̧a̧n za a gabs du be.
Dood saal hi dɔɔ a Pilatu ge hi ɛrig hinyɔ rɔ̧ɔ̧s wook hi hiya.
Pilatu goohi:
a ha̧a̧n an be bitsin Waar Yahuduya bɔ ya?
Gii be mɛɛmɛ a Bɛtmaak-wookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi gaabge naan du hi ka̧a̧syɔ.
Wɛɛ, Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi sɔmb dood an hi ɛr Pilatu gi bitsihi Barabas a Yeesu kalɛ.
Pilatu wɛɛ ɛr dood saal wɔ ɓɛ:
a ha̧a̧n an be gɔs nɔ za̧a̧n bɔ nɛ gig elik a Waar Yahuduya nɔ?
Wɔrɔ hi ta̧a̧ge hi ya̧a̧ɓooki:
a doomɔg a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha!
Pilatu ɛrihi:
a woo nɔ hin ha̧a̧lɔ nɔ?
Hi wɛɛ hi ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ ɓɛ:
a doomɔg a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha!
Yɔ Pilatu ha̧a̧g an gi gɔs saal wɔ kpoosya̧ gi harihi be tutsihi Barabas gɔ luknɔ du. Kuudu wɛɛ raa dooɗɔ hi lɛb Yeesu , wɛɛ gaahige hi kaŋg hi dooge.
Laaya wɔ hi loo Yeesu hi kaŋg gɔ a dɔgl-gbaak luk du a Pilatu raa du. Hi mɔks laaya zaadɛ wɔ hi zɛ̧ɛ̧r nɛ sɛw.
Hi heks Yeesu dimnaan hob muulɛ, hi haŋ kal kobsya hi heksig zulha an waar ums kalɛ.
Kuudu hi yɛɛlig booki ma:
a be boomɔ, seko ya, Waar Yahuduya!
Hi wɛɛ hi gig lɛk zulha hi bɔ̧ɔ̧kkoki, hi tulsig set muulɛ, hi wɛɛ hi zagl hi hu̧u̧r di bɛttɔnɔ a gi muutdu.
Yɔ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧l Yeesu gi da̧a̧, hi hod dimnaan hob bɔ hi wɛɛ hi hegsig gbannɔ wɔ. Kuudu hi tuunig lakdi hi rek hi doog dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha.
Doo za Kirɛnɛya fu̧u̧z hɛt du nuŋgɔ a Simɔŋ, Iskan-darus hi Rufus baaya̧ giya gi daak ma dihɔ. Laaya wɔ hi gbɛnige hi wa̧a̧g hi fɛ̧ɛ̧g an gi pɛɛ Yeesu dɔ̧ɔ̧rɔ bɔ.
Hi kam Yeesu a lɛlyɔ gɔ hi el a Golgota ge, raakɔ a zullɛŋk lɛlɛ.
Ha̧a̧hi an hi yɔ̧n Yeesu bumhob za yɔ hi ɔksin tɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔt zobtil nuŋgɔ a ɗaasɛrɛyɔ. Gii be ta̧a̧ yɔ̧k gɛ.
Kuudu hi wa̧a̧ hi doog gɔ a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha, hi wɛɛ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧tin gbandilɔ wɔ; gbandilɔ wɔ hi len subud an hi sɔ̧ɔ̧ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi le gi dagɔ.
Yɔ hi doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha, ɔ̧t bɔ gi kusaal ɓaati.
Hi bi̧i̧ hinyɔ hi wa̧a̧g dɔŋgɔ ge dɔglɔ anyɔ lɛ: a WAAR YAHUDU-YAYƆ.
Hi doo luurɛ ha̧a̧l eerɛ a dɔ̧ɔ̧r zaadɛ ha a gi dɔŋdi, gbunu a gi naan rɔbo, zaa gbunu a gi naanyɛ̧li. [
Hinyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol bɔ raa dɔglɔ
a hi ɓɛrig a dood ha̧a̧lɛ tees du. ]
Dood wɔ hi daak hɔdi gɔ hi nams zulya̧ hi niige, hi
a ɛ-u̧u̧! Mɔɔ Bɛtluk ɛ̧brikya bɔ, wɔŋkya bɔ ɔ̧t taarɛ,
za̧a̧sum zul mɔ ma, sizum dɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ hage!
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ, hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧l a hi tees du, hi raa an ya̧a̧ gbun bɔ:
a za̧a̧s dood zaadɛ, yɛrɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi za̧a̧s zulɔ ma gɛ!
An Masihu bɔ, Israhilaya waar bɔ gi siz ɓɔri ma a dɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ hage. Wɛ́ gbɛn ma anbɔ wɛ ɗɔbs gɔ ɓɔrɔ.
Wɔ hi doohi a dɔ̧ɔ̧r za wɔ ha be hi gi Yeesu niik lab be.
A lurk teesdu, lɛl wil a waal bɔ gedu sɛw, am tuur a naaba̧a̧n du.
Yɔ ɔ̧t gi a naaba̧a̧n du, Yeesu ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ raa:
a Eloyi, Eloyi, laama sabaktani?
Hinɔ raakɔ:
a Bɛt be, Bɛt be, mɔ ɔɔb nɔ?
Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi ginɛ di hí kɛm anbɔ, hi raa:
a kɛn ma, gi elik Eliya ga!
Zaaya̧ gbunu nɔɔ da looz bɔɔmɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧z mɛm haatil du zaa sa̧a̧ a bɔ̧ɔ̧kkok ha, gaag an gi yɔ̧.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, wɔr gɔ.
Gbanɗil fɛɛt bɔ hi mal a Bɛtluk du taar teesdu der, yɛɛl taarik wɛɛha had wɛɛdisɛ.
Laaya gbɔɔl Romaya bɔ gi nɛ erk a Yeesu muutdu, yɔ gbɛn Yeesu gi wɔr anbɔ, raa:
a hinɔ rɔbo, wal yɛrɛ gi Bɛt waayɔ!
Nɛɛd zaadɛ hi giro, hi seezig lɔl hɛmltɔnɔ be. A hi tees du Mariyama yɔ fu̧u̧z a Magdala, hi Mariyama wala bɔ Yakuba nɔɔtɔ hi Yozɛs hi Salomɛ hi giro.
Hii fɔbz nɛ Yeesu yɔ da gi nɛ a Galile, hii gaag nɛ leesɛ. Nɛɛd zaadɛ kit wɔ hi dɔɔtin nɛ hi Yeesu a Urusalima hi gi nɛ di hɛw.
Yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ, yɔ gi nɛ a naabwɔd gɛbsig ɔ̧ti, raakɔ a yɔ Yahuduya wɔ holum-ɔ̧tya̧ gi sɛ̧ɛ̧biko,
Yusufu a Arimate, doo ɗɛnt rɔb a dɔgl-gbɛɛrikyaadɛ tees du, zaa. Gii ginɛ ook Bɛt wáátɔ be. Ɓaas kpoosɔ rek a Waar Pilatu ge, ɛrig Yeesu muulɔ bɔ an gi re gi i̧i̧ loor du.
Hɔnɛyɔ Pilatu lag a Yeesu wɔɔr be, hin wɛɛsig gɛrsɛ, elz laaya wɔ gbɔɔlya̧ bɔ, ɛrige:
a wɔr aam ya?
Yɔ lag hinyɔ laaya gbɔɔl bɔ raasige, gaa Yusufu Yeesu muulɔ bɔ.
Yusufu zebz gban buu rɔbo, re sis Yeesu wɔrkɔ bɔ a dɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ hage, wɔbtig a gban buu bɔ gedu, kam da i̧i̧g a loor yɔ hi su̧u̧ a hɛɛl du gedu. Wɛɛ kibl bet gbɔɔl fɛɛti mibtin loor bɔ ya̧a̧gbarɔ.
Mariyama a Magdala hi Mariyama Yozɛs nɔɔtɔ hi sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛl yɔ hi i̧i̧k Yeesu wɔrkɔ bɔ.
Yɔ holum-ɔ̧t bɔ da̧a̧, Mariyama a Magdala hi Mari-yama Yakuba nɔɔtɔ, hi Salomɛ hi zeb kurum ki̧i̧l-hɛmntya an hi re hi gubs Yeesu muulɛ.
Yɔ yoosig bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ, a dimaas ɔ̧t biitir bɔ gedu, yɔ ɔ̧t gi kazugo, hi rek a Yeesu loorlɛlɛ,
hi ɛtin gɔ hi tees du:
a bɔ gi kiblsɛ bet bɔ a loorya̧a̧gbar nɔ?
Yɔ hi sɔ̧ɔ̧ anyɔ, hi gbɛn loorbet gbɔɔl fɛɛt bɔ kibl bɛrko.
Nɛɛd wɔ hi gul gɔ loor bɔ gedu, hi gbɛn walsɛr za gi ɗɔɔtig a naanrɔbo hi gban buu fɛr a gi muulɛ. Kol tuuhitu.
Hɔnɛ walsɛr bɔ
a bɔ kol gi tuunɛ. Nɛ tɛk Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ dooy a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha gii ya? Rɛml a wɔrk du ɗuundɔ, taa dihɛ. Sɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, lɛl yɔ hi gbaag nɛ gɛrɛ.
Yɛrɛ rekin nɛ raas walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi Piyɛr hɛw a Yeesu rɛml ɗund gisin dork a Galile. Nɛ rek nɛ gbɛnig hɔ ro anyɔ da raasinɛ.
Nɛɛd wɔ hi tuu hi nɔɔ hi beeto; lɛl wilihi be. Yɔ hoobha̧a̧hi be, hí rāās doo hinza gɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu rɛml gi ɗuk a dimaas ɔ̧t doos bɔ gedu bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ, yɛɛl mits Mariyama a Magdala, a dɔŋgɔ ro gi nin nɛ loorɛha̧a̧l nɔɔn-erɛ.
Mariyama a Magdala re fɔks wɔ hi gitin nɛ hi Yeesu , hi kaak be, hi hekig hi ya̧a̧rhant be.
Hɔnɛyɔ dood wɔ hi lag hinyɔ nis bɔ fɔkɔ: a Yeesu ɗuk gi za̧a̧tilyɔ, be gbɛnige, hí ɗɔ̄bs nis bɔ dɔglɔ gɛ.
Kuudu yɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ eer hi wa̧a̧k gbɔnɔ an hi rek a hɛt du Yeesu zunsihi muulɔ za dɔɔmi.
Walɛsɛrɛ eerɛ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi wɛɛz hi fɔks zaadɛ wɔ hinɔ. Wɔrɔ be hí ɗɔ̄bs dɔglya̧ bɔ hɛw gɛ.

Yɔ̧ɔ̧sumɔ, Yeesu mits walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ koobl daa gbun wɔ yɔ hi lek nɛ hinɛ. Biglihi anyɔ hi ta̧a̧ ɗɔbsig gɛ hi gin kpoos ɓaatil be. Dood wɔ hi gbɛnig nɛ rɛml a wɔrk du gi za̧a̧tili hi gisihi dɔglɔ booko, wɛɛ hii be, hi tā̧ā̧ nɛ gɛ.
Wɛɛ
a rekin a waal du sɛw, nɛ dɔg Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ dɔglɔ a dood teesdu sɛw.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi ɗɔbsɔ gi dag Bɛtmɛmɛ gi za̧a̧; za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gí ɗɔbs gɛ, dɔgl gi matige.
Yɛrɛ gɛrs yɔ ɗɔbsigya wɔ gɔ hi zuun gɛrɛ: hi nin loorɛha̧a̧l a be nuŋg du; hi boo ya̧a̧boon segdɛ;
hi wa̧a̧ beks hi naanɛ; gid hi yɔ̧ ɗɔŋko, hinza taahi gɔk nɛ zaŋ; hi gbaa naanya̧ a gumtil wɔ hi muulɛ, gumtil wɔ hi za̧a̧.
Yɔ Waar Yeesu dɔgsihi hin bɔrɔ anbɔ, ha̧sa dɔɔ bɛtha, wɛɛ da ɗɔɔt a Bɛt naanrɔbo.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi rek Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ dɔglɔ dɔk gɔ lɛl sɛw be. Waar Yeesu gi wook hi hiya, wɛɛ gis dood wɔ zuunik a walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi dɔk dɔgl rɔbo hi gɛrs wɔ gisihi ɗaanuko. ]
Teyofil doo-gbɔɔlɛ, Dood kittɔnɔ hi kɛɛ hinwɔ hi daa nɛ wɛ teesdu dɔglya̧ bi̧i̧ki.
Hi bi̧i̧ dɔgl wɔ wi lag a dood wɔ hi gbɛn hinya̧ hi lɔlya̧ a yɛɛlikɔ gedu a hi ya̧a̧ du. Bɛt gaahi dɔglɔ naan du an hi dɔks doodɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, anyɔ mi tɛb hin wɔrɔ dɔglya̧ bɛttɔnɔ sɛw a lɛl yɔ yɛɛl dige, mi see hinɔ bɛr an mii hɛw mi bi̧i̧ dɔglɔ anyɔ fɔbɔ mi gbaasumɔ
an mɔ mɛks hingok wɔ mɔ dag rɔbɔ lɛlɛ.

A wɛl yɔ Hirudus gi waar gedu a Yahuduya, doo za Bɛtmaakwookya giro nuŋgɔ a Zakariya, yɔ gi a Abiya Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ hi ka̧a̧r du. Nistɔ nuŋgɔ a Elizabɛd, dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ fu̧u̧ a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ nuŋgɔ a Haruna gi dɔ̧ɔ̧t du.
Hi gi dood rɔbɛ hi eer sɛw a Bɛt muutdu. Hi fɔk Bɛtmaakɔ wɔ bɛttɔnɔ hi dɔgl yɔ Waar Bɛt gaa sɛw, hin-a̧a̧b taadu.
Hɔnɛ Elizabɛd da kirkɔ, hi da hi taan nɛ waa. Hi sɛw wɛlya̧ kit be.
Ɔ̧tza ma Zakariya gi wook Bɛtmaakɔ a Bɛt muutdu, yɔ ka̧a̧rɔ bɔ woosɔ ɔ̧t rii,
anyɔ Bɛtmaakwookya hi rɔ̧ɔ̧s woos gɛ̧ɛ̧k a hi teesdu, hi herige anyɔ subud lege an gi gul a Waar Bɛtluk du gi woo Bɛtmaako gi dɔ̧ɔ̧s tɛ̧ɛ̧mɛk okt ki̧i̧lhɛmntya.
Yɔ gi tɛ̧ɛ̧mɛk okt ki̧i̧lhɛmntya bɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧sig laa du, dood saal wɔ sɛw hi gi lakdi hi zɔ̧k Bɛto.
Waar Bɛtwalsɛr za mits Zakariya zaa er a Bɛt-maaksɛŋk yɔ hi dɔ̧ɔ̧sig tɛ̧ɛ̧mɛk okt ki̧i̧lhɛmntya hage a naanrɔbo.
Yɔ Zakariya gbɛnige, zulɔ dɔɔsig saasa, hoobha̧a̧g be.
Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ
a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ, Zakariya, Waar Bɛt kɛm zɔ̧k mɔ kɛmɔ, ya̧a̧nɛ. Nis mɔ Elizabɛd gi mɔɔsum waa, mɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ a Yohana.
Mɔ dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ, dood kittɔnɔ hi dag hat a mɔɔkɔ bɔ dɔŋgɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ gi wɛɛ gbɔɔl a Waar Bɛt muutdu, taa an gi yɔ̧ bumhobo, zaabe bum za dɔɔmi. Kpoosɔ gi hi̧i̧s hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi yɛɛl a nɔɔtɔ buu du.
Gi wɛnz Israhilaya kit wɔ kpoosya̧ a Waar Bɛt ge.

Yohana gi ɛmb a Waar Bɛt muutdu an tɔmsɔya hi ya̧a̧kɛŋkɔya bɔ Eliya mɔkilɔ hi tɛŋkɔ an gi wɛnz baa wɔ kpoosya̧ a waatya̧ hi hi boolɔ, gi wɛɛ gi kamz tɔnzuksya wɔ be a dood hinrɔbwookya wɔ hi hinmɛɛk du, an gi gɛms dood sɛw hi oo Waar bɔ zaakɔ.
Zakariya war Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ:
a nɛ yɛrɛ bee be wɔm da̧a̧, nis be wɔm da̧a̧, be mɛɛ hin bɔrɔ ri a gi rɔb nɔ?
Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ goo:
a bee Gabriyɛl, bee gi erk a Bɛt muut du an be woosigwoosɛ, gii yaazibe an be dɔgsum hinɔ, be kamsum dɔgl hɛmnti.
Yɛrɛ anyɔ mɔ tā̧ā̧ dɔgl be yɔ gɔ gi tuur a ɔ̧tɔ gɔ gi rii gedu gɛ, mɔ wɛɛ su̧u̧ki, gi tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ hin wɔrɔ gɔ hi tuur gedu kɛnɛ, ɓɔr mɔ ɔɔ ya̧a̧booko.
Yɔ anbɔ dood hi ook Zakariya a Bɛtluk bɔ ge, yɔ Zakariya gi amzig ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ be hinɔ kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Yɔ tuuza ɗɛɛ ya̧a̧book hi hii ma gɛ, yɔ anbɔ, dood hi mɛɛmɛ a Bɛt zunsig hin a gɛrs du a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu. Goksihi hin hi naanɛ wɛɛ kɔm su̧u̧ki.
Yɔ Zakariya da̧a̧s woosɔ ɔ̧t wɔ a Bɛtluk du wɛɛ gi raa du;
kuudu ɔ̧t kaasi nistɔ Elizabɛd budɔ, yaata sɛɛ nɔɔnɛ, wɛɛ
a
yɛrɛ hinyɔ Waar Bɛt gɔsibe a ɔ̧tyɔ seesib ya̧a̧r be gedu, ha̧tsib hinyɔ gib nɛ seem gaak a dood muutdu giya.
Yɔ Elizabɛd bud gi tuur sɛɛ nɔɔngbunu, Bɛt yaaz walsɛrɔ Gabriyɛl a waal gbɔɔl za du nuŋgɔ a Nazarɛd, a Galile hɛbt du
a nis za gbaag yɔ mɛɛ walya̧a̧ gɛ, yɔ wal za a Dawda dɔ̧ɔ̧t du gig gbɛ̧ɛ̧tugo nuŋgɔ a Yusufu. Nis bɔ be nuŋgɔ a Mariyama.
Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ tal gi lɛl du
a be boomɔ, mɔɔ yɔ Bɛt rɔbsumɔ, Waar Bɛt gi hi mɔya.
Yɔ dɔgl bɔrɔ yɔɔ Mariyama ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ ɛr zulɔ,
a book bɔrɔ gi raak hinɔ a nɔ?
Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ
a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ Mariyama, anyɔ mɔ dag Bɛt gɛmsilɔ.
Yɛrɛ mɔ́ budaa mɔ mɔɔ waawalɔ, mɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ a Yeesu.
Gi wɛɛ doo gbɔɔlɛ, hi elige a Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl waawalɔ. Wɛɛ Waar Bɛt gi wɛɛnig waar i anyɔ gɔs nɛ baatɔ Dawda be.
Gi wɛɛ waar a Yakuba dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ hi zul faa. Waar umsɔ taa zaa da̧a̧ko.
Mariyama war Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ:
a hin bɔ lab gi wooy hinɔ ri? Be mɛɛ walya̧a̧ gɛ be?
Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ ta̧a̧
a Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi zaasumɔ, wɛɛ Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl tɛŋkɔ gi yaatumɔ hi zeksɔ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, waa bɔ gɔ mɔ mɔɔge, hi elige a Doo Gaati, Bɛt Waawalɔ.
Yɛrɛ nɛs mɔ Elizabɛd be, yɔ gɔ hi gig nɛ elik a kirkilyɔ, bud waawaltɔ, gin sɛɛ nɔɔngbunu.
Ya̧a̧nɛ hinza ɗɛɛ Bɛt gɛ.
Mariyama raa:
a be gi Waar Bɛt nisgbaaryɔ, hinɔ gi wooysib ma anyɔ mɔ
Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ ɔɔge ɗund rekɔ.
Mariyama ɗuk ɔ̧tɔ ge rek hi dikto a waal gbɔɔl za yɔ gol hi gi ge a Yahuduya.
Yɔ tuurɔ gul a Zakariya raa du boo Elizabɛd.
Yɔ Elizabɛd kɛm Mariyama boog anbɔ, waa bɔ buu du namlɔ. Elizabɛd kpoosɔ hi̧i̧s hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ,
ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, raa:
a Bɛt rɔbsumɔ daar nɛɛd zaadɛ sɛw, wɛɛ rɔbs waa yɔ gɔ mɔ mɔɔge!
Nɔ nɛko Waar be nɔɔtɔ gi zaa nɛ bee ro!
Yɛrɛ seemɔ, yɔ mɔ bɛɛb booko be bɛɛ kɔlk mɔ kɛŋko, waa bɔ be buu du naml hi hato.
Mɔ gin hato anyɔ mɔ ɗɔbs hinyɔ Waar Bɛt raasumɔ, hinɔ gi
Wɛɛ Mariyama raa:
a be baan Waar Bɛt gbɔlumsɛ,
kpoos be hi̧i̧s hi hato a Za̧a̧sigya be Bɛt zulha.
Ya̧a̧nɛ gi ha̧a̧ge an gi tiis lɔlɔ gi see bee nisgbaarɔ ya̧a̧rya bɔ. Hi rɔbo, yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ dood sɛw anyɔ zaŋya̧ gɔ hi fɔbɔ hi raa a Bɛt rɔbsibrɔbsɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Bɛt tɛŋkya, gɔsib hin gbɔlɛ, wɛɛ nuŋgɔ gi hin gaatyɔ.
Wɛɛ ya̧a̧rmɛɛkɔ gi a dood wɔ hoob gihige ha̧a̧k hi zulha wɛlɛ hi wɛlɛ.
Woo woos gbɔlɛ hi naanɔ tɛŋkya bɔ, hɛks dood wɔ hi gi zul pɛɛko.
Sisil waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ a hi waar ums ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ, wɛɛ gaa dood tɔs wɔ ɗɔɔtillɛl hɔɔtɛ wɔ.
Gaa dood wɔ a̧a̧kil gihi ha̧a̧k hinrɔbɛ, wɛɛ yaa rɔɔsya wɔ hi rek naan ɗɛndilɛ.
Zaa ɗaas dood Israhilaya wɔ hi gi woosɔyaadɛ, zɛ̄n hinrɔbɔ wook
a Abraham gbaŋgi hi waatɔ faa anyɔ da raas nɛ baa wɛ hii a gi woo hinɔ gɛ.
Mariyama waa hi Elizabɛd sɛ̧ɛ̧b sɛɛ taarɛ kuudu wɛɛ gɔ gi lɛlɛ.
Ɔ̧t yɔ Elizabɛd gɔ gi gul waaɔ du tuurɔ, mɔɔ waawalɔ.
Naaza wɔ hi nɛsɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi lag a waar Bɛt woosig hinrɔbo hi zaa hi dagtin hat lɛlgbunu.
Yɔ hi gul waa bɔ gi gɔ dimaas gbunu gid hi zaa an hi nàge, ha̧a̧hi nɛ an hi dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ a Zakariya an baatɔ nuŋgɔ bɔ be.
Nɔɔtɔ raa:
a ɛ̧-ɛ̧, nuŋgɔ taa anbɔ, nuŋgɔ a Yohana.
Hi
a hɔɔ, nɛ doo za nuŋgɔ taa anbɔ a nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧t du be!
Hi wɛɛ hi yaks baatɔ naanɛ an hi warig nuŋg yɔ gɔ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧s waa bɔ.
Zakariya ɛr tɛ̧ɛ̧hɛɛk bɔ, hi gaage, bi̧i̧ muulɔge: a nuŋgɔ a Yohana. Dood wɔ hi gidi sɛw hinɔ kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Ɓɔrbɔ Zakariya kɔlkɔ kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ, mɛlɔ wɛɛ wadɔ, booya̧a̧ ma raa
a rɔbs gi a Bɛt ge.
Yɔ anbɔ naaza raatɛ wɔ sɛw hoobha̧a̧hiha̧, hi dood zaadɛ wɔ hi waak nɛ a Yahuduya ga̧a̧t wɔ ha sɛw hi book hin wɔrɔ sɛw dɔglɔ giya.
Wɔ hi lagɔ hi wa̧a̧ dɔglɔ hi kpoos du, hi warɔ:
a waa bɔrɔ gɔ gi wɛɛ nɔ?
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Waar Bɛt tɛŋkɔ gi hi gii hi rɔbo.
Yɔ waa bɔ baatɔ Zakariya kpoosɔ hi̧i̧s hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ, wɛɛ dɔg hi Bɛt dɔglɔ an yɛrɛ lɛ:
a bant gi a Israhilaya wɔ Waar ya̧ Bɛt ge! Ya̧a̧nɛ, zaa a doodɔ hi an gi tuus zulya̧ aakil du.
Wɛɛ mɔɔsɛ Za̧a̧sigya Tɛŋkya yɔ fu̧u̧ a gbaar walɔ Dawda dɔ̧ɔ̧t du,
anyɔ dɔg nɛ a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya gaatɛ wɔ hi ya̧a̧ du a lɔɔza bɔ ge:
a gi za̧a̧sɛ a wɔ ha̧a̧hi gabs hi wɛya hi naan du, hi dood wɔ hi giwɛ lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nuko.
Gis baa wɛ hii ya̧a̧rmɛɛkɔ zuunuko, wɛɛ gi mɛksig ya̧a̧wɔkɔ gaat bɔ da gɔ hi hiya.
Ya̧a̧nɛ gi dɛŋgls nɛ baa wɛ Abraham hinɛ:
a gi za̧a̧sɛ a wɔ ha̧a̧hi gabs hi wɛɛ hi naan du, an wɛ woosig hinɛ, hoob gi hā̧ā̧wɛ hinza gɛ.
An wɛ wɛɛ doodɔ gaatɛ, hinrɔbwookyaadɛ a gi muutdu ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw a wɛ waabil du.
Wɛɛ mɔya, waa be, hi elumɔ a Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl ya̧a̧ɔkɛŋkyayɔ. Yɔ anbɔ mɔ ɛmb a Waar bɔ muutdu an mɔ gɛmntsig gbɔnɔɔ wɔ.
An mɔ raas doodɔ dɔglɔ hi mɛɛ a gi za̧a̧sihi a hinha̧a̧lya̧ bɔ geɗu.
Yɔ Bɛt wɛ ya̧a̧rmɛɛkɔ gi gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi hinrɔb-wooki gii gi woosɛ anbɔ. Gisɛ yaazig lɛlgaal a wɛɛha an ɔ̧tyɔ gi kazugo,
an gi gáa a wɔ hi ɗɔɔtig lɛlwil du hi zulha, hi wɔ hi ɗɔɔtig a wɔrk zeks du hi zulha, an gi kam ɛmbil wɛ a bolt gbɔnɔ du.
Waa bɔ tɔɔ gi tɛŋk dako, mɔkilɔ gi dak tɛŋk hɛw. Rek waa a hɛtdɔŋ du tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ mid a dood Israhilaya wɔ hi muutdu gedu.
A ɔ̧tɔge dɔgl ɗuk gɔ a Waar Gbɔɔl Romaya bɔ Agustus ge, raa an hi gɔ nuŋg-bi̧i̧s a waal bɔ gedu sɛw.
Nuŋgbi̧i̧s biitir bɔrɔ mida a wɛl yɔ Kirinus gi doo nabl a Siriya gedu.
Dood sɛw hi re nuŋg-bi̧i̧s bɔ, bɔbe a gi mɔɔklɛlɛ.
Yusufu ɗuk a waal gbɔɔl bɔ Nazarɛd a Galile hɛbt du rek a Baytilaama a Yahuduya hɛbt du, a lɛlyɔ hi mɔɔ nɛ Waar Dawda gedu anyɔ fu̧u̧ a gi dɔ̧ɔ̧t du, an gi bi̧i̧ nuŋgɔ hi gbaagɔ Mariyama yɔ gi buudu.
Yɔ hi gi hɔ, ɔ̧tyɔ Mariyama gɔ gi gul du tuurɔ.
Gul waaɔ biitir bɔ, bibtige hi gbandili, hogige a tamlees dɛl du, anyɔ hi dag lɛl ya̧nɛ a rɔ̀bɛ luk du gɛ.
A hɛbt bɔ gedu tamnɛɛrɛwaat hi waako a hɛt du hi ook tamya̧ a yɛ̧ms du.
Waar Bɛt walsɛrɔ tursihi, wɛɛ Waar Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ lɛlgaal gaa hi dɔŋdi, hoobha̧a̧hi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Bɛt-walsɛr bɔ
a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ, yɛrɛ be gisin kamzig Dɔgl Rɔb yɔ gɔ gi gaa dood sɛw hat gbɔɔl giya.
Nɛɛko a yɛms yɛrɛ gedu, Za̧a̧sigya mɔɔysin a Dawda waal gbɔɔl du, gii gi Waar Kristu.
Wɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ nɛ mɛksinge gɛrɛ: nɛ zɛm hi bibt waayɛ̧s za a gbandil du, hi wɛɛ hi hogig a tamlees dɛl du.
Ɓɔrbɔ Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ saalzanɔ gbɔɔl kittɔnɔ hi fu̧u̧z a bɛtha hi zaa hi ɔks hi Bɛtwalsɛr za bɔ hi baan Bɛt gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi wɛɛ hi raa:
a gbɔlums gi a Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl ge, bolt gi a hɛbtdi a dood wɔ ha̧a̧g hi hi kpoosɔ sɛw.
Yɔ Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi ɔɔhi an hi wɛɛ a bɛtha, tamnɛɛrɛ-waat wɔ hi raatinu:
a yɛwɛ rek wɛ tuur a Baytilaama, wɛ see hinyɔ tuurɔ, hinyɔ Waar Bɛt wɛ yaazɔ an hi raasɛ wɛ mɛɛnɔ.
Hi rek hi dikto hi zɛm Mariyama hi Yusufu hi waayɛ̧s bɔ gi kusig a tamlees dɛl du.
Yɔ hi gbɛnige hi fɔk hinyɔ hi raasihi nɛ a waa bɔ gi zulha.
Wɔ hi kɛŋk hinyɔ tam nɛɛrɛwaat wɔ hi gisihi fɔkig sɛw, kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Mariyama ɔnɛ wa̧a̧ hin wɔrɔ sɛw gi kpoos du gi mɔkig hage.
Tamnɛɛrɛwaat wɔ hi wɛɛ hi wɛɛ hi lɛlɛ, hi ɗɔbsig Bɛto hi wɛɛ hi gig baanik gbɔɔltɔnɔ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, hinyɔ hi gbɛnɔ hi hinyɔ hi lagɔ hi zɛm anyɔ hi dɔksihi nɛko.
Yɔ ɔ̧t gɛ̧ɛ̧s talɔ hi nab waa bɔ hi dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ a Yeesu , an nuŋg bɔ Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ
Wɛɛ yɔ ɓi̧i̧limya̧ hotig bɔ ɔ̧tɔ tuurɔ anyɔ Muusa maakdɔglɔ bɔ raa, Yusufu hi Mariyama hi kam waa bɔ a Urusalima a Waar Bɛt muutdu,
ya̧a̧nɛ Waar Bɛt maak-dɔglɔ raa
a waatwalɛ wɔ hi mɔɔhi biitiri hi elihi a Waar Bɛt ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Wɛɛ an hi gɔ maako, hi gbɛɛr gutu tuul eerɛ, zaabe gutu waat eerɛ anyɔ Waar Bɛt maakdɔglɔ raa.
Wal za gi nɛ a Urusalima nuŋgɔ a Simɛyɔŋ, gi doo rɔbo, gis Bɛt tɔnkɛŋko gi ook nɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi zaa gi za̧a̧s Israhilaya wɔ. Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi hi giya,
a taa wɔrko gi gbɛn Masihu bɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ Waar Bɛt gɔ gi yaazig kete.
Bɛt Mɔkilɔ elige kaŋge a Bɛtluk du. Yɔ Yeesu nɔɔtɔ hi baatɔ hi kamz waa bɔ Yeesu an hi da̧a̧s hinyɔ Bɛtmaakɔ raa a gi zulɛ,
Simɛyɔŋ loo waa bɔ gi naan du wɛɛn rɔbs a Bɛt ge, raa:
a yɛrɛ Waar Bɛto, hinyɔ mɔ da mɔ raa ma tuurɔ, an mɔ ɔɔ woosya mɔ beya, be wɔr ma hi hato, kpoos be kuus ma.
Anyɔ be gbɛn za̧a̧tig mɔ hi lɔl benɛ,
Za̧a̧tig yɔ mɔ gɛms a dood lɔlgbar sɛw.
Lɛlgaalɔ gi gɔ an dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduyaadɛ gɛ hi mɛɛmɔ, an dood mɔ Israhilaya wɔ hi dag gbɔlumsɛ.
Hinyɔ Simɛyɔŋ gi raak a waa bɔ gi zulɛ wɛɛs baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ gɛrsɛ.
Simɛyɔŋ rɔbsihi wɛɛ raa Yeesu nɔɔtɔ Mariyama:
a Bɛt her waa yɛrɛ an gi wɛɛ dood kitɛ matiglɛlɛ gi wɛɛ gi wɛɛ dood kitɛ Za̧a̧sigyaya̧ a Israhila. Gi wɛɛ Bɛt hinɔmɛɛnikya yɔ gɔ dood hi booya̧a̧ ha̧a̧l hage.
Bɛt gí woo anbɔ an dood kit mɔkilya̧ hi walkɔ. Mɔɔ nisyɔ, waa yɛrɛ kosgumnɔ gí bàà kpoos mɔ an goo.
Naadnɔɔ za Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya giro, nuŋgɔ Ana, Fanuwɛl waasiŋgo, fu̧u̧ a Aazɛr dɔ̧ɔ̧t du. Naad bɔ wɔm da̧a̧da̧. Hi waatin wɛl nɔɔn-erɛ hi waltɔ bɔ hi lootin a sɛrums du, waltɔ bɔ wɔr ɔɔg-ɔ.
Kɔm kuuri, wɛlɔ tuur dumbili gɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ daatɔ nasɔ, ɔ̄ɔ̄ rek Bɛtluk gɛ, gis Bɛt wooswook yɛms du hi lurk du sɛw, gi hinlilko, gi Bɛt zɔ̧ko.
Naad bɔ zaa ɓɔrbɔ a lɛl bɔ ge, baan Bɛto, wɛɛ dɔks dood wɔ hi ook sɛw an Bɛt gi za̧a̧s Urusalima waa bɔ Yeesu dɔglɔ.
Yɔ Yusufu hi Mariyama hi da̧a̧s hinyɔ Waar Bɛt maakdɔglɔ raa sɛwi, hi wɛɛ gɔ a waalya̧ gbɔɔl bɔ Nazarɛd gedu a Galile hɛbt du.
Waa bɔ Yeesu gi tɔɔko gi dak tɛŋko, gi dak hinmɛɛk gbɔɔltɔnɔ, wɛɛ Bɛt gɛmsige hi rɔbsɔ.
Hɔnɛ a wɛl nuŋgo, Yeesu nɔɔtɔ hi baatɔ gɔ hi rek Paska naab nak a Urusalima.
Yɔ waa bɔ Yeesu gin wɛl koobl daa eerɛ hi dɔ̀ɔ̀ naab bɔ hi nɔɔtɔ Mariyama hi Yusufu be a Urusalima anyɔ hi rɔ̧ɔ̧sɔ.
Yɔ Paska naab bɔ talɔ, hi wɛɛk gɔ hi lɛlɛ, Yeesu kɔm ɔ̧nɛ kuudu a Urusalima. Nɔɔtɔ Mariyama hi Yusufu hi mɛɛ gɛ be;
yɔ hi gbɛnig gɛ, hi mɔk a gi saal dɔɔ du, hi ɛmb ɔ̧tya̧ gbunu hi tɛge a nɛsɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi teesdu hi a naaza hi tees du.
Yɔ hi midig gɛ, hi wɛɛ hi wɛɛ a Urusalima an hi tɛge.
Hi da hi midig a da ɔ̧t taasim bɔ ge a Bɛtluk du gi ɗɔɔtig a Yahuduyaadɛ hin-mɛɛkya dubtɛ wɔ hi teesdu, gisihi kɛŋk hinyɔ hi dɔko, wɛɛ gihi hin-ɛrko.
Hinmɛɛkɔ bɔ hi hinyɔ gi gook sɛw kɔms dood wɔ hi gisig kɛŋk sɛw gɛrsɛ.
Yɔ nɔɔtɔ hi baatɔ hi gbɛnige, yɔɔhiyɔ. Nɔɔtɔ wɛɛ ɛrige:
a waa be, mɔ woosuw nɔ yɔ? Yɛrɛ bee hi baa mɔ sɛw wi tɛmɔ hi koltuunɛ.
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a nɛ gib nɔ tɛko, nɛ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ a gi an be mɔk Baa be dɔgl gɛ ya?
Wɛɛ wɔrɔ hi kɛm dɔgl yɔ gisihi raak gɛ.
Wɛɛ ɗundɔ tiitin gɔ hi hii a Nazarɛd, waasihi tɔn laki. Nɔɔtɔ gbaa hin wɔrɔ sɛw gi kpoos du.
Yeesu gi tɔɔko, hinmɛɛkɔ tɔɔ gi rek doosɛ doosɛ; gi bɛsig Bɛto, wɛɛ gi bɛsig dood be.

Yɔ Tibɛr gi waar gbɔɔl a Roma, a wɛl koobl daa nɔɔntums bɔ gedu, Pɔntiyu Pilatu gi doo nabl gɔ a Yahuduya hɛbt du, waar Hirudus be gi waar gɔ a Galile hɛbt du. Yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Filib be gi waar gɔ a Itura hɛbt du hi a Tarakoniti hɛbt du; Lisaniyas be gi waar gɔ a Abilɛn hɛbt du.
Anas hi Kayafas hi gi Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ mɔɔtɛ gɔ be. A wɛlɔ gedu Bɛt dɔgl zaas Zakariya waawal Yohana a hɛtdɔŋ du.
Yɔ anbɔ, ɛmb gul gɔ a waal wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b a Urdum dɔŋdi gedu sɛw hi Bɛtmɛm bɔ dɔglɔ an gi
Anyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya
a hi kɛm za̧a̧n za gi ya̧a̧ɓoolik a hɛtdɔŋ du a Bɛt raa: a gɛmntsin Waar Bɛt gbɔnɔ, gɛmnsinge gbɔnɔ wɔ hi er bɛttɔnɔ.
Mark wɔ hi gi lɛl dubt sɛw hi hi̧i̧sɔ. Ga̧a̧t sɛw hi lɛlɗundir wɛ sɛw hi yɔɔlɔ. Gbɔnɔ yɔ niŋktɔ hi esige. Wɛɛ gbɔnɔ ha̧a̧l wɔ hi bɛr daak gɛ, hi gɛmsihi hi bɛrɔ.
Doo yɔ gi sɛw gi gbɛn za̧a̧sig yɔ Bɛt gɔ gi za̧a̧sɛ.
Yɔ dood saal hi zaak a Yohana ge an gi hotinihi Bɛtmɛmɛ, Yohana
a kpolum dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɛ, bɔ goksinɛ a nɛ nɔɔ Bɛt nɔɔtigɔ yɔ gɔ gi zaa nɔ?

Woonwoos rɔb yɔ gɔ gi zuun a nɛ zɛmr kpoos nɛ nɛ ɔɔ woos nɛ amntɛ wɔ. Wɛɛ bɔnɛ yɛɛl zul nɛ raako a Abraham gii baa wɛ ro! Ya̧a̧nɛ be gisin raako: a Bɛt gin tɛŋk an gi loo bet wɛrɛ hi gɔns Àbraham waato.
Yɛrɛ hi gbaa gaal a tɛ̧ɛ̧yɛ̧ɛ̧s wɔ hi muul da̧a̧da̧ ma an gi dɛ̧ɛ̧tiro; tɛ̧ɛ̧ wɔ hi hum rɔbtɔnɔ gɛ sɛw hi gboblihi hi yaahi laa du.
Dood saal wɔ hi warige:
a nɛ yɛrɛ gi an wi woo nɔ ma ɔnɛ?
Gii ta̧a̧hi:
a an za̧a̧nyɔ gin gbandil eerɛ, gi hod zaa gbunu gi gaa naa zayɔ taan gɛ. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gin lees be, gi woo an gbun bɔ.
Wɛɛ tooszekya wɔ hi zaa a Yohana ge an hi dag Bɛtmɛmɛ, hi ɛrige:
a Hingokya , gi an wi woo nɔ?
Gii ta̧a̧hi:
a bɔnɛ ɛr dood toos gi daar toos yɔ hi dɛ̧ɛ̧z an dood hi gaanɛ.
Laaya zaadɛ hɛw hi zaa hi ɛrige:
a wii be, wi woo nɔ?
Gii wɛɛ ta̧a̧hi ɓɛ:
a bɔnɛ wɔɔl dood tus hi tɛŋko, zaabe hi ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, kɔmbin nɛ oo dɔɔrɔɔs nɛ bɔ gii kpɔd.
Dood hi ook hi waaliki, wɛɛ hi sɛw hi mɔkig hin hi kpoos du a Yohana zulha, a kinsa gii Masihu bɔ be.
Yohana wɛɛ

a bee be gin hotig Bɛtmɛmɛ hi mɛm tɔs, yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gin gbɔlums gi daar beya, gi zaako, be tūūr doo rɔb a gi muutdu an be hu̧u̧r be pid taal ba̧a̧nɔ gɛ. Gii gi hotinnɛ Bɛtmɛmɛ hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi laa.
Gin dɛlɔ naan du, gi nuun tot a daŋk du gi gɛ̧ɛ̧ gaato hi kasɛ; gi gaas daŋkɔ, gi tuu tot bɔ gi tɔ̧ɔ̧ gaat bɔ gi bil du, gi wɛɛ gi kpɔɔ kas wɔ a laayɔ gɔ niŋ gɛ gedu.
Yɔ Yohana dɔks dood hin anbɔ, wɛɛ gisihi Dɔgl Rɔb dɔko hi dɔgl zaadɛ du kittɔnɔ kittɔnɔ.
Hɔnɛ Yohana za̧br nɛ Waar bɔ Hirudus a nisɔ bɔ loog nuŋgɔ a Hiruduya yɔ gi yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ nisɔ gi dɔŋgo, hi hin zaadɛ ha̧a̧l wɔ woo nɛko;
Waar Hirudus goks hinza ha̧a̧l a wɔrɔ hage sɛw, wa̧a̧ Yohana gbooge a luknɔ du.
Yɔ dood sɛw hi loo Bɛtmɛmɛ, Yeesu loo Bɛtmɛm gɔ be. Yɔgi Bɛt zɔ̧ko, bɛtha kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ.
Bɛt Mɔkilɔ siz gi zulha, muulɔ riitin an gutu buu. Wɛɛ ya̧a̧ booyz bɛtha raa:
a mɔɔ gi waa be yɔ ha̧a̧be hi kpoos be sɛw. Be gaa hat be sɛw a mɔɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gi yɛɛlik woosɔ gɔ wɛl an dumbili taarɛ. Dood hi mɔkugo: a Yeesu gi Yusufu waayɔ. Yusufu be,
gi Heli waayɔ; Heli be gi Matad waayɔ; Matad be gi Lewi waayɔ; Lewi be gi Mɛlki waayɔ; Mɛlki be gi Yaanay waayɔ; Yaanay be gi Yusufu waayɔ;
Yusufu be gi Matatiya waayɔ; Matatiya be gi Amɔs waayɔ; Amɔs be gi Nahum waayɔ; Nahum be gi Elsi waayɔ; Elsi be gi Nagay waayɔ;
Nagay be gi Mahad waayɔ; Mahad be gi Matatiya waayɔ; Matatiya be gi Semɛyin waayɔ; Semɛyin be gi Yozek waayɔ; Yozek be gi Yoda waayɔ;
Yoda be gi Yowana waayɔ; Yowana be gi Rɛsa waayɔ; Rɛsa be gi Zorobabɛl waayɔ; Zorobabɛl be gi Salatiyɛl waayɔ; Salatiyɛl be gi Nɛɛri waayɔ; Nɛɛri be gi
Mɛlki waayɔ; Mɛlki be gi Àddi waayɔ; Addi be gi Kɔsan waayɔ; Kɔsan be gi Ɛlmadan waayɔ; Ɛlmadan be gi Ɛɛr waayɔ;
Ɛɛr be gi Yosuwa waayɔ; Yosuwa be gi Eliyezɛr waayɔ; Eliyezɛr be gi Yoorim waayɔ; Yoorim be gi Matad waayɔ; Matad be gi Lewi waayɔ; Lewi be gi
Simɛyɔŋ waayɔ; Simɛyɔŋ be gi Yahuda waayɔ; Yahuda be gi Yusufu waayɔ; Yusufu be gi Yonam waayɔ; Yonam be gi Elyakim waayɔ; Elyakim be gi Mɛleya waayɔ;
Mɛleya be gi Mɛna waayɔ; Mɛna be gi Matata waayɔ; Matata be gi Natan waayɔ; Natan be gi Dawda waayɔ;
Dawda be gi Yɛsa waayɔ; Yɛsa be gi Obɛd waayɔ; Obɛd be gi Bowas waayɔ; Bowas be gi Salmuna waayɔ; Salmuna be gi Naasu waayɔ;
Naasu be gi Aminadab waayɔ; Aminadab be gi Admin waayɔ; Admin be gi Arni waayɔ; Arni be gi Hɛsrun waayɔ; Hɛsrun be gi Farɛs waayɔ; Farɛs be gi Yahuda waayɔ;
Yahuda be gi Yakuba waayɔ; Yakuba be gi Isaaku waayɔ; Isaaku be gi Abraham waayɔ; Abraham be gi Tara waayɔ; Tara be gi Nakɔɔr waayɔ;
Nakɔɔr be gi Seeruk waayɔ; Seeruk be gi Raagaw waayɔ; Raagaw be gi Faaleg waayɔ; Faaleg be gi Eebɛr waayɔ; Eebɛr be gi Saala waayɔ; Saala be gi
Kaynam waayɔ; Kaynam be gi Arfaksad waayɔ; Arfaksad be gi Sɛm waayɔ; Sɛm be gi Nɔwe waayɔ; Nɔwe be gi Laamɛk waayɔ;
Laamɛk be gi Matusala waayɔ; Matusala be gi Ɛ̧nɔg waayɔ; Ɛ̧nɔg be gi Zaarɛd waayɔ; Zaarɛd be gi Maleliyɛl waayɔ; Maleliyɛl be gi Kaynam waayɔ; Kaynam be gi Enɔs waayɔ;
Enɔs be gi Sɛd waayɔ; Sɛd be gi Adamu waayɔ; Adamu be gi Bɛt waayɔ; hinɔ anbɔ.
Yɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi̧i̧s a Yeesu kpoos du tuu a Urdum du, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ kaŋge a hɛtdɔŋ du,
a lɛlyɔ da loorɛha̧a̧l maatig ge, gi waa ɔ̧tɔ dumbili nas ge. A ɔ̧t wɔrɔ gedu sɛw lehin gɛ. Wɛɛ yɔ ɔ̧t wɔrɔ hi tal di sɛwi a̧a̧kil ha̧a̧ge.
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ zaa
a mɔd gi Bɛt Waayɔ, raam bet yɛrɛ gi wɛɛ koko.
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a Bɛt dɔgl raa: a doo gɔ za̧a̧n kok kpɔd gɛ.
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ dɔɔnig wɛɛha zunsig hɛbt bɔ wáátɔ sɛw ɓɔrbɔ,
wɛɛ
a be gaam hɛbt bɔ sɛw waar umsɔ hi gbɔlumsɔ; hi gaa nɛ bee gaa be, be gaak za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧b sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ gid mɔ zagl di mɔ ɗɔbsibe, hɛbt bɔ sɛw gigi mɔɔnɛ.
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
a Bɛt dɔgl raa: a mɔ ɗɔbs Waar mɔ Bɛt gii gi gbunu, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ woos gii hin kpɔd.
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ wɛɛ kaŋge a Urusalima, da gbaage a Bɛtluk hɔɔt zulha der,
a gid mɔ gi Bɛt Waayɔ, gi̧i̧m hɛbt di.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Bɛt dɔgl raa a Bɛt gi raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a mɔ zulɛ hi oomɔ,
hi wɛɛ hi kàm naan du an bɔmɔ kubr dɔɔ a bet muulɛ.
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
a hi
Kuudu yɔ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ maatige hi hin wɔrɔ sɛwi, rek ɔɔge. Gi ook ma ɔ̧tza.
Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ tɔɔ Yeesu kpoos du hi tɛŋko. Yeesu wɛɛ a Galile hɛbt du, hi wɛɛ hi yɛɛl nuŋgɔ booki a waal wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b di gedu sɛw.
Gis dood hingoko a mɔksilluk wɔ hi du, hi wɛɛ hi gig baanik lɛl sɛw.
Yeesu rek a Nazarɛd a lɛlyɔ hi kaŋkig nɛ ge. A holum-ɔ̧ti, gul a Yahuduyaadɛ mɔksilluk du anyɔ rɔ̧ɔ̧s nɛ gɔko. Ɗunda an gi zaŋga ɗɛɛrwoli,
hi gaag Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya ɗɛɛrwolɔ. Yɔ pidɔ, zɛm lɛlza yɔ hi bi̧i̧ anyɔ lɛ

a Waar Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi be zulha, anyɔ gɛbsibe an be dɔks ya̧a̧rya wɔ Bɛt dɔglɔ rɔbo. Yaazibe an be dɔks luknɔyaadɛ a hi bisihibisɔ an hi tuu luknɔ du, be dɔks yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ a lɔlya̧ gi kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ, be gbaa dood wɔ hi gihi gɔluko, wɔ hi taan tɛŋk an hi ɓats dood wɔ hi gihi gɔlik zulɛ, a aakil du.
An be dɔks hinha̧a̧lya wɔ a wɛl yɔ Bɛt ya̧a̧rmɛɛkɔ gɔ gi mid gedu tuurɔ.
Wɛɛ ka̧a̧ ɗɛɛrwol bɔ gaa lɛl-ookya bɔ, gii wɛɛ ɗɔɔtɔ. Dood wɔ hi gi nɛ a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu sɛw hi doo lɔlya̧ a gi muulɛ.
Hɔnɛ wɛɛ yɛlsihi raaki:
a nɛɛko, bi̧i̧s yɔ nɛ lagɔ, hinɔ wooy da̧a̧da̧ ma.
Yɔ hi lag dɔgl hɛmnt bɔ tuu gi ya̧a̧ du anbɔ hinɔ kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ. Hi sɛw hi boo dɔglɔ, bɛsihibɛsɔ, hi wɛɛ hi warɔ:
a nɛ wal yɛrɛ Yusufu waawal gii ma mi?
Yeesu
a gi fɔnɛ ri ɓɛ; nɛ dɔgsib ya̧a̧daanik yɛrɛ dɔksɔ: a gɛrɔ, za̧a̧sum zul mɔ ma mi! Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ raa be: a wi lag hinyɔ mɔ woo a Kapɛrnayum, wɛɛm mɔ woo a mɔ waal du ma be mi!
Wɛɛ
a be dɔksin rɔbo: ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi ta̧a̧ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya za an doo rɔb a gi waal du gɛ.
Be gisin dɔk hi rɔbo: yɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Eliya giro, yɔ bɛtha kpɛ̧ɛ̧y wɛl taarɛ hi sɛɛ nɔɔn-gbunu, a̧a̧kil ha̧a̧l gi tuur hɛbt di sɛw, kuurɛ hi gi nɛ gi kittɔnɔ a Israhila.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt yāāz Eliya a kuur nɛɛ za Israhilaya ge gbun gɛ; gɛ yaazig a Saarɛbta a Sidɔŋg hɛbt du, a nis za kuur yɔ gi rɔ̀b ge.
Wɛɛ, yɔ Elisuya giro, ɗobtilya hi kit a Israhila hɛbt du hɛw, wɛɛ yɔ anbɔ, hi zā̧ā̧s zaaya̧ gbun gɛ; gɛ Naaman, Siriyaya bɔ.
Dood wɔ hi gi a mɔksilluk bɔ ge du, hi lag hin wɔrɔ, hi sɛw, kpoosya̧ nɔɔhinɔ.
Wɛɛ hi ɗukɔ hi wa̧a̧ Yeesu hi tuunig waal gbɔɔl bɔ lakɔ ge, hi kaŋge a gol za zulha a lɛlyɔ hi gbaa nɛ waalya̧ gbɔɔl ge an hi yaarig hage gi mat hɛbt di.
Yeesu wɛɛ daa hi teesdu rekɔ.
Wɛɛ, Yeesu rek a Kapɛrnayum waal gbɔɔl du a Galile hɛbt du, gi goksig dood hin a holum-ɔ̧ti.
Ànyɔ gi ya̧a̧book an za̧a̧nyɔ gin tɛŋk an gi gog hinɛ, hingokɔ bɔ kɔms dood gɛrsɛ.
Doo za gi a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu gin loorɛha̧a̧l muul du, ɓooya̧a̧ raa:
a hey, Yeesu Nazarɛdya, dɔgl mɔ nɔ hi wiya? Mɔ zaa an mɔ ha̧tirwiha̧tir ya? Be mɛɛ a mɔɔ bɔ! Mɔɔ Doo Gaat yɔ Bɛt yaazige.
Yeesu ya̧a̧lig
a loorɛha̧a̧lɛ, waksumɔ, tuum a za̧a̧n yɛrɛ gi muul du.
Loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ zikt wal bɔ gbalig hɛbt di a saal bɔ gedu, wɛɛ tuu gi muul du ɔɔge, gāag kosgumn gɛ.
Yɔ dood sɛw hoobha̧a̧hi, hi ɛtinu:
a nɔ dɔglɔ lɛ be?
Gɔ raa loorɛ wɔ hi gbɔlumsɛ hi tɛŋko, loorɛ wɔ hi tuutu!
Nuŋgɔ ɗuk raat wɔ a waal bɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b di gedu sɛw.
Yeesu tuu ɔɔ mɔksilluk bɔ rek gul a Simɔŋ raa du. Zul gi laak Simɔŋ gɔnsiŋ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ. Hi zɔ̧bs nis bɔ Yeesu.
Yeesu rekɔ er a nis bɔ zulɔ lɛl bɔ gi kusig ge. Ya̧a̧l zullaan bɔ hi tɛŋko, zullaan bɔ da̧a̧ gɔ. Ɓɔrbɔ nis bɔ ɗukɔ gaahi leesɛ.
Yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ, hi kams Yeesu dood wɔ hi gin nɛ gums gaŋsɛ gaŋsɛ. Yeesu gbaa naan hi muul gbunu gbunu za̧a̧sihi.
Loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi tuu a dood muul kittɔnɔ, hi kaak nɔɔha hi raako:
a mɔɔ gi Bɛt waaɔ, mɔɔ gi Bɛt waaɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu gihi ya̧a̧lik be, ɔ̄sihi gbɔnɔ an hi booya̧a̧ gɛ. Hii be hi mɛɛmɛ a gii gi Masihu bɔ.
Yɔ lɛl bɛɛ gaako, Yeesu tuu rek a hɛtdɔŋ du, dood saal kittɔnɔ hi mɛɛg tɛkyɔ, yɔ hi tuurɔ hi midige, ha̧a̧hi an hi a̧a̧n Yeesu a bɔgi re gi ɔɔhi.
Hɔnɛ wɛɛ
a gi an be dɔks waal zaadɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ Bɛt wáátɔ dɔgl bɔ hɛw. Hi yaazib nɛ woosɔ giya.
Wɛɛ rek dɔg Bɛt dɔglɔ a mɔksilluk wɔ hi du a Yahuduya be.
Ɔ̧tza Yeesu gi erk a zɛɛ mɛmbal ya̧ a Gɛnɛzarɛd, dood saal hi ɓɔytingo a gi dɔŋdi an hi lag Bɛt dɔglɔ yɔ gɔ gi dɔgsihi.
Yeesu gbɛn lɛmb eerɛ a mɛmbal bɔ hage. Dut-wa̧a̧kya hi siz nɛ a lɛmbɔ gedu an hi dokt zagrya̧ wɔ hi wa̧a̧nik nɛ dutu.
Yeesu re kar a lɛmb zaa gbun bɔ gedu a Simɔŋ lɛmb du. Wɛɛ zɔ̧ Simɔŋ an gi sɔɔsinge lɛmb bɔ a mɛm ha gi hɛml hi hɛbt bɔ kaasi. Yeesu ɗɔɔt a lɛmb bɔ gedu gi gogsig dood hinɛ.
Yɔ da̧a̧s ya̧a̧boonɛ, raa Simɔŋ:
a rekumɔ a mɛm bɔ fɛɛtigɔ hage nɛ gbal zagr nɛ wɔ nɛ wa̧a̧n dutu.
Simɔŋ wɛɛ ta̧a̧ge:
a Hingokya , wi wòos gbalkɔ lɛl gaaw hɛɛd, wi wa̧a̧ hinza gɛ. Yɛrɛ anyɔ mɔ
Yɔ hi bɛɛ gbalko, hi wa̧a̧ dut gbɔɔltɔnɔ, wɛɛ zagrya̧ bɔ gi kaatirgo nɔɔha.

Hi gbaas nahiza zaadɛ wɔ hi gi lɛmb zaa bɔ gedu naanɛ, an hi zaa hi ɗaasihi kasig a lɛmb bɔ gedu. Wɔrɔ hi zaa hi ɗaasihi dut wɔ kasugo, hi̧i̧s a lɛmb wɔ eer gedu dɛ̧ɛ̧d. Wag di kaasi an lɛmb wɔ hi im mɛm du.
Yɔ Simɔŋ Piyɛr gbɛn anbɔ zagl a Yeesu dɔŋdi,
a Waar i, hɛmlum be dɔŋdi, be gi wal hinha̧a̧lyayɔ.
Hinɔ hoobha̧a̧ Piyɛr ha̧a̧ hi dood wɔ hi gi el sɛw a dut yɔ hi wa̧a̧ gbɔɔltɔnɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Zebede waatɔ Yakuba hi Yohana, wɔ hi wootingo woos hi Simɔŋ, hoobha̧a̧hiha̧ hɛw. Yeesu raa Simɔŋ:
a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ, yɛɛl ɓɔryɔ, mɔ wɛɛ doodkamzigya a Bɛt wáát du an dut yɔ mɔ wa̧a̧zig be.
Yɔ hi bɛɛ lɛmbya̧ wɔ kamzig a haŋk dɔŋya̧, hi ɔɔ hin sɛw hi fɔ Yeesu gɔ.
Yeesu gi nɛ waal gbɔlɛ wɔ zaaɔ gedu. Wal za yɔ ɗobtil yɔ̧ɔ̧s muulɔ sɛw, bɛɛg gbɛnko, zaa zagl gi muutdu zɔ̧ge an yɛrɛ lɛ:
a Waar i, gi ha̧a̧mɔ, mɔ ɗɛɛ an mɔ za̧a̧sibe ɗobtil be bɔ gi da̧a̧.
Yeesu yɔd naanɔ ki̧i̧ge raa:
a ha̧a̧be, ɗobtil bɔ da̧a̧ge.
Ɓɔrbɔ ɗobtil bɔ da̧a̧da̧ a wal bɔ gi muulɛ.
Wɛɛ
a bɔmɔ dɔks doo za hin yɛrɛ. Yɛrɛ rekumɔ mɔ zuns Bɛtmaakwookya bɔ muul mɔ. Wɛɛm mɔ gaa gaasɛ anyɔ Muusa bi̧i̧, an mɔ mɛnsihi a mɔ za̧a̧za̧.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu nuŋgɔ ɗuk daarlɛlɛ; wɛɛ yɔ dood saal hi lag dɔglɔ hi zaak a ge an hi lagsig dɔglɔ, wɛɛ an gi za̧a̧sihi hi gumsya̧ bɔ be.
Gii be, tuu rek a hɛtdɔŋ du gi gbunu an gi zɔ̧ Bɛto.
Ɔ̧tza ma Yeesu gi hingoko. Farisayaadɛ hi Bɛtmaak-dɔkyaadɛ hi fu̧u̧z a Galile hi a Yahuduya raat wɔ gedu sɛw, hi a Urusalima hi zaa hi ɗɔɔtugo. Waar Bɛt tɛŋkɔ gi hi Yeesu an gi za̧a̧s doodɛ.
Wɛɛ dood hi pɛɛ wal za zaŋgd a sil du, hi tɛ gbɔnɔ an hi gunige hi gbaage a Yeesu muutdu.
Anyɔ dood saal hi hi̧i̧s deder hi gbɛn lɛlyɔ gɔ hi gunig du gɛ be, hi kanig a luk zulha hi mibr lɛl za tuutiri hi sidz wal bɔ gedu hi silɔ a dood teesdu a Yeesu muutdu.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn dood wɔ ɗɔbsigya̧, raa wal zaŋgd bɔ:
a waa be, be bitsum hinha̧a̧l mɔ bitsɔ.
Yɔ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi Farisaya wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi yɛɛl hinmɔkugo. Hi wɛɛ hi raa:
a bɔ za̧a̧n yɛrɛ gi yɛɛl ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l book a Bɛt zulha wɛ yɔ? Bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi bis hinha̧a̧lɛ, Bɛt gii ɗɛɛ kpɔd!
Yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ mɔkilya̧, warihi:
a nɔ nɛ gin mɔkil bɔrɔ nɛ kpoos du anbɔ?
Nɔ daarlɛl hi raakɔ: a be bitsim hinha̧a̧l mɔ wɔ bitsɔ hi zaa raakɔ: a ɗundumɔ mɔ ɛmb nɔ?
Nɛ yɛrɛ gi an nɛ mɛɛ a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gin tɛŋk hɛbtdi an gi bis hinha̧a̧lɛ.
Wɛɛ raa doo zaŋgd bɔ:
a ɗundumɔ mɔ loo sil mɔ, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ lɛlɛ.
Wɛɛ ɓɔrbɔ wal bɔ ɗundɔ a dood lɔlgbar sɛw, loo silɔ wɛɛ gi lɛlɛ, gi baanik Bɛt nɔɔha.
Hinɔyɔ yɔɔ doodɛ hi baan Bɛto. Yɔ hoobha̧a̧hi be, hi raa:
a hinyɔ wɛ gbɛn nɛɛk yɔɔyɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ kuudu Yeesu tuu gbɛn tooszekya za nuŋgɔ a Lewi, gi ɗɔɔtig a toosluk du,
a fɔbzibe.
Lewi ɗukɔ, ɔɔ hin sɛw, fɔge.
Lewi wɛɛ gɔs Yeesu lees gbɔɔl­tɔnɔ a gi raa du. Tooszekya zaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi dood zaadɛ hi lekhin hi hiya.
Yɔ Farisaya wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi dɔntɔ hi Waar Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a nɔ nɛ hinletingo hi tooszekya wɛrɛ hi zɛnɛ waabil ha̧a̧lya wɛrɛ nɔ?
Yɔ Yeesu lag anbɔ,
a dood wɔ hi gi rɔbtɔnɔ ha̧a̧hi gɛr gɛ, ha̧a̧ gumtil wɔ hiya.
Bé zāā an be el dood rɔbɛ wɔ an hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ gɛ, be zaa an be el hinha̧a̧lya wɔ hiya.
Dood hi war Yeesu :
a Yohana walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi waak hinlilko, hi Bɛt zɔ̧ko, Farisaya wɔ doodya̧ hɛw hi gɔk anbɔ. Wɛɛ walɛsɛrɛ mɔnɛ wɔ hi hinleko, hi yɔ̧ko, ri nɔ?
Yeesu ta̧a̧hi:
a nɛ ɗɛɛ an nɛ fɛ̧ɛ̧ dood wɔ hi elzihi a lottins naab du an hi lil lees anyɔ wal nislookya bɔ gi hi hii ket ya? Taa anbɔ.
Ɔ̧t yɔ gɔ hi ha̧s nislookya bɔ du gi zaako. Gɔ gi anbɔ hi lil gɔ ɔ̧tɔge.
Wɛɛ dɔksihi ya̧a̧daanik za:
a taa an doo za gi taar gbandil sego, gi wɛɛ gi loo taakilɔ bɔ gi haktin gbandil wɔmɔ. À labɔ, yɔ taar gbandil seg bɔ taarɔ, wɛɛ taakilɔ bɔ loo, tɛŋkɔ riitin hi gbandil wɔm bɔ gɛ.
Wɛɛ doo za gɔ tɔ̧ɔ̧ bumhob mukt a tik wɔm du gɛ. À labɔ, bum mukt bɔ yɔ gbɔmr tik wɔm bɔ, bum bɔ yɔ ha̧tir hi tik bɔ sɛw.
Yɛrɛ bɛr an hi tɔ̧ɔ̧ bum mukt a tik seg du.
Wɛɛ doo za be, à yɔ̧ bum nɔɔlɛ, taa an gi ha̧a̧g bum mukto. Yɔ raa a bum nɔɔl bɔ gii hɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ.
Holum-ɔ̧t zayɔ tuurɔ, Yeesu gi talik a totbak du. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi halk tot wɔ bak du hi kɔɔl naan du hi tɔbɔ.
Yɔ Farisaya zaadɛ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi warihi:
a nɛ wook nɔ hinyɔ rii an hi woo a holum-ɔ̧t gɛ nɔ?
Yeesu ta̧a̧hi:
a nɛ zaŋg hinyɔ Dawda woo ɔ̧t zayɔ a̧a̧kil ha̧a̧ge hi doodɔ wɔ hi gitin el gɛ ya?
Dawda gul a Bɛtluk du, loo kok yɔ hi gbaas Bɛto, le, wɛɛ gaa doodɔ wɔ hi gi el ya̧nɛ hi le be. Nɛ mɛɛ a gbɔnɔ giro a Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ hii hi le Bɛt kok bɔ kpɔd.
Wɛɛ
a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gii gi holum-ɔ̧t waar i hɛw.
A holum-ɔ̧tza dɔɔmi, Yeesu gul a mɔksilluk du gi hingoko. Doo za yɔ naanrɔbɔ gi wɔlɛ gi duhɔ.
Bɛtmaak­dɔkya wɔ hi Farisaya wɔ hi gi Yeesu sɔ̧ɔ̧ko a kinsa gi za̧a̧s doo za a holum-ɔ̧t be. Ha̧a̧hi an hi dag hinyɔ gɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig dɔgl gedu.
Hɔnɛ gii be yɔ mɛɛ mɔkilya̧, raa wal naanwɔlya bɔ a ɗukumɔ, erumha a dood teesdu sɛw. Wal bɔ ɗukɔ, erɔ.
Yeesu
a ɔbe ɛrin hinɛ: maakdɔgl wɛ raa a nɔ? A gi an hi woo hinrɔb a holum-ɔ̧t ya, gi an hi woo hinha̧a̧lya, gi an hi za̧a̧s doo ya, zaabe gi an hi gbɔm doo ya ri?
Hɔnɛyɔ zɛ̧brihi hi lɔl sɛwi, wɛɛ raa wal bɔ:
a yɔdum naan mɔ, wal bɔ yɔdɔ.
Naanɔ bɔ wɛɛ dag tɛŋko, wɛɛ bɛrɔ.
Yɔ wɔrɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ kpoosya̧ nɔɔhi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, hi watin hinyɔ gɔ hi woos Yeesu.
A ɔ̧tɔge Yeesu rek a ga̧a̧t ha an gi zɔ̧b Bɛto. Yɛmsbed gāag Bɛt zɔ̧ki.
Yɔ lɛl gaa, el walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ her dood koobl daa eerɛ a hi tees du, gaahi nuŋgya̧ a hi tɔmsyaadɛyɔ.
Tɔmsɔya wɔ herihi nuŋgya̧ gɛrɛ: Simɔŋ (yɔ Yeesu dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ a Piyɛr ), Piyɛr yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Andrɛ, Yakuba, Yohana, Filib, Bartelemi,
Mata, Tumas, Alfe waawal Yakuba, Simɔŋ (yɔ gɔ hi elig a Hɛbtwaa Gàbs bɔ),
Yakuba waawal Yahuda, hi Yahuda Iskaryudi yɔ rɛ̧ɛ̧ge.

Yeesu wɛɛ siz hi tɔmsɔya wɔ a ga̧a̧t bɔ hage, zaa er a lɛl-aakil du. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ kittɔnɔ hi gi lɛlɔge, dood saal zaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi gi di be hi fu̧u̧z a Yahuduya hɛbt du sɛw, hi Urusalima, hi Tirus zɛɛ ya̧ hi a Sidɔŋg hi zaa an hi lag dɔgl wɔ gi dɔko, an gi za̧a̧sihi a gumsya̧ wɔ gedu.
Dood wɔ loorɛha̧a̧l bindihi hi za̧a̧k be.
Wɛɛ dood saal wɔ sɛw hi ɓɛɛk an hi ki̧i̧ge anyɔ tɛŋk za gi tuuzig gi muul du gi za̧a̧sig dood sɛw.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu pɛɛ lɔlɔ a walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi zulha, raa:
a Hat gi a nɛ, ya̧a̧rya wɛ, anyɔ Bɛt wáátɔ gi nɛnɛ.
Hat gi a nɛ, a̧a̧kilya wɛ ɓɔryɔ, nɛ́ hi̧i̧. Hat gi a nɛ, kaalya wɛ ɓɔryɔ, nɛ́ kpɛ̧ɛ̧.
Gid dood hi hɛ̧ɛ̧nin lɔlɛ, hi nininɛ, hi wɛɛ hi wɛɛnin an dood bɔbtini a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi dɔŋgo,
dagin hat a ɔ̧tɔge, kpoos nɛ kpɛ̧ɛ̧ge, yɔ anbɔ nɛ gin dɔɔrɔɔs nɛ gbɔɔl­tɔnɔ a bɛtha; ya̧a̧nɛ, baaya̧ hi da hi gɔs nɛ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ anbɔ be.
Yɛrɛ rɔɔsya wɛ, nɛ gin ya̧a̧rhanto. Ya̧a̧nɛ, nɛ dag dɔɔrɔɔs nɛ dagɔ.
Ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ, nɛɛ dood wɔ nɛ hi̧i̧ ɓɔryɔ, kuudu a̧a̧kil gi ha̧a̧nɛ. Ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ, nɛɛ dood wɔ nɛ kpɛ̧ɛ̧k ɓɔryɔ, kuudu nɛ mimɔ nɛ wɛɛ nɛ kaa!
Ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ, nɛɛ dood wɔ hi gisin hinrɔb raak nɛ zulha sɛw. Baaya̧ hi woo nɛ anbɔ ro a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya wɔ hi zulha.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa:
a yɛrɛ be dɔksinɛ, wɔ nɛ gisib dɔgl be lako: yɛgi ha̧a̧n dood wɔ hi gin lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nuko. Gɔsin dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi dɔgl nɛ gɛ rɔbo.
Rɔbsin dood wɔ hi gisin gɔk booto. Zɔ̧bsin dood wɔ hi gin ya̧a̧rha̧a̧nik Bɛto.
Doo gi dɛmɔ a wɛktya̧, wɛɛm mɔ zɛmrsig zaa bɔ hɛw; doo za gi loo gbandil mɔ gbɔɔl yɔ mɔ gin muulɛ, bɔmɔ yansig gbandil wans bɔmɔ gin buudu lookɔ.
Gaam za̧a̧nyɔ ɛrum hinɛ; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ wɔɔ rɔɔs mɔ, bɔ mɔ fɔbɔ.
Hinyɔ ha̧a̧nɛ an dood hi woosinɛ, woosinɛhi anbɔ be.
À ha̧a̧nɛ a dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi a nɛɛge be, bantɔ nɔni gi ma a nɛɛge nɔ? Dood hinha̧a̧lya wɔ hɛw, ha̧a̧hi dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi hiige be.
Gid nɛ gɔk rɔb a dood wɔ hi gisin rɔb gɔk hi be, bantɔ nɔni gi ma a nɛɛge nɔ? Wɛɛ hinha̧a̧lya̧ wɔ hi wook gɔ anbɔ be.

Gid nɛ gaak belk a za̧a̧nyɔ nɛ mɔkig a ɔ̧tza bé dag belk a ge hɛw, bantɔ nɔni gi ma a nɛɛge ɔnɛ? Dood hinha̧a̧lya wɔ hɛw hi gaak hin belk a dooɗ zaadɛ hinha̧a̧lya hi, an hi wɛɛ hi dag belkya̧ bɔ ɔ̧tza ɓɛ.

Yɛrɛ yɛgi ha̧a̧nɛ a dood wɔ hi gin lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nik hi muulɛ. Woon hinrɔbo, gaan hinɛ, bɔnɛ mɔk a hi wɛɛ hi wɛnsib hinza. Yɔ anbɔ dɔɔrɔɔs nɛ gi tɔɔ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ wɛɛ Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl waatɔ. Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt gɔ wòòs dood wɔ gɔ hi baanig gɛ hi dood bɔbtin wɔ hii rɔbo.
Wɛɛn ya̧a̧rmɛɛk-yaadɛ an Baa nɛ Bɛt yɔ gi ya̧a̧rmɛɛkya be.
Nɛ́ gbāās dood dɔgl gɛ Bɛt taasin dɔgl gbaak be. Bɔnɛ wa̧a̧n dood dɔglɛ, an bɔ Bɛt gi wa̧a̧nin dɔgl be. Bitsin dood hinha̧a̧lya̧, Bɛt gi bitsin hinha̧a̧l nɛ be.

Gaan dood hinɛ Bɛt gi wɛɛ gi gaan be. Hi kpesin hin a gbandil nɛ ziba gbɔɔl bɔ gedu an gi hi̧i̧sɔ, hi nams bɛttɔnɔ hi ziŋgɔ, hi wɛɛ hi kpel zaa ha an gi gubɔ. Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt gi goo hinrɔb nɛ a kɔlwaa yɔ gɔ nɛ gonsig dood zaadɛ hin gedu.
Yeesu wɛɛ dɔksihi ya̧a̧daanik yɛrɛ:
a yɔ̧ɔ̧r ɗɛɛ an gi tɛl naaza yɔ̧ɔ̧r ya? Nɛ yɔ hi mat lɛlgbun a zɛŋk du ma mi?
Hingokigya ɗɛɛ an gi daar hingokɔya gɛ. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gokhin bɛttɔnɔ gi ɗɛɛ gi da̧a̧, gi wɛɛ an hingokɔya bɔ be.
Nɔ mɔ seek betwaa yɔ gi a namɔza lɔl du, mɔd gbɛn gā̧ā̧t yɔ gi mɔ lɔl du gɛ?

Zaa gi an mɔ raa namɔza ri a sa̧a̧ɔ, ɔbe ha̧tsum betwaa gi a mɔ lɔl du, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gbɛn gā̧ā̧t mɔnɛ yɔ gi a mɔ lɔl du gɛ? Mɔɔ mɛlya ha̧a̧lɛ, ha̧sum gā̧ā̧t bɔ gi mɔ lɔl du kete, ɓɔr mɔ ɔɔ gbɛnik lɔl bɛttɔnɔ an mɔ ha̧s betwaa bɔ gi a namɔza lɔl du.
Tɛ̧ɛ̧ rɔb gɔ hum humlɔ ha̧a̧l gɛ; tɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧a̧l be gɔ hum humlɔ rɔb gɛ be.
Tɛ̧ɛ̧ yɔ gi sɛw gɔ hi mɛɛnig humlɔ bɔ giya. Gɔ hi ha̧b yɔmnt huml a kobs muul gɛ, wɛɛ gɔ hi ha̧b inaboohi a tɛ̧ɛ̧ kobs muul gɛ.

Doo rɔbo gɛ gɔ tuus hin rɔbɛ a rɔɔs rɔb yɔ gi fu̧u̧zig a gi kpoos duge; wɛɛ doo ha̧a̧lɛ gɛ gɔ tuus hin bɔbtini a hinha̧a̧l yɔ gin a gi kpoos du gedu be. Ya̧a̧nɛ ya̧a̧ gɔ gi tuusig hinyɔ hi̧i̧s a kpoos du giya.
Nɛ gib elik a Waar i, Waar i, a nɔ dɔŋg nɔ? Wɛɛ nɛ wōō hinyɔ be dɔk gɛ be!
Za̧a̧nyɔ zaa a beege gi kɛŋk dɔgl be gi wa̧a̧k kpoos du, be zunsin za̧a̧nyɔ riitin elo.

Riitin hi za̧a̧nyɔ gi wɔŋk luko, gi zɛɛ sɛŋkɔ bɔ zɛŋkɔ dubtɔnɔ, wɛɛ sɛŋg sɛŋkɔ bɔ hi bet a hɛɛl ha. Mɛm gɔ hi̧i̧s a zɛɛ du, tuu rek luk bɔ muulɔge, mɛm bɔ tɛŋkɔ ɗɛɛ luk bɔ namsig gɛ, anyɔ luk bɔ wɔ̧y bɛttɔnɔ.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ kɛm dɔgl be gi wā̧ā̧ kpoos du gɛ, riitin hi za̧a̧nyɔ wɔm lukɔ a hɛbtdi tɔs gi gboot sɛŋk gɛ; mɛm yɔ hi̧i̧s a zɛɛ du gi bɛɛ rek a luk bɔ muulɔge, luk bɔ ɛ̧btir hɛbtdi ɓɔrbɔ di sɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu bɛɛ dɔglɔ wɔrɔ da̧a̧sig sɛw a dood wɔ hi gisig lak hi muutdu anbɔ, ɗund rek a Kapɛrnayum.
Laaya za gbɔɔl Romaya gin gbaarwal za yɔ ha̧a̧g gi muul gbɔɔltɔnɔ; gbaarwal bɔ gum ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi gig ook kpoos du.
Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl bɔ lag hi book Yeesu dɔglɔ anbɔ, yaas Yeesu Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ hi rek hi zɔ̧ge an gi zaa gi za̧a̧s gbaarwalɔ bɔ.
Wɔrɔ hi tuur gɔ a Yeesu dɔŋdi hi zɔ̧ge hi ya̧a̧hɛmnti hi raa:
a za̧a̧n bɔrɔ gi doo rɔbo, rii an mɔ re mɔ woosig hinyɔ zɔ̧bɔ;
ha̧a̧ge dood Israhilaya wɔ, wɛɛ wɔmsiw mɔksilluk wi be.
Yeesu retin hi hiya, yɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b tuurik a raa bɔ ge, laaya gbɔɔl bɔ yaa sa̧a̧mɔ zaadɛ hi
a bé tuur doo rɔb an mɔ zaa mɔ gul a be raa du gɛ, Waar i, bɔmɔ mɔɔ gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, bé sēē a be ɗɛɛ an be rek a mɔɔge hi zul be gɛ. Yɛrɛ dɔgum hin gbun kpɔd an gbaarwal be bɔ gi za̧a̧.

Beya hi gbààbe a waar ums wɛɛdisɛ, gbɔlɛ wɔ hi dosibe hi giro, be gin laaya zaadɛ benɛ. Gɔ be raa zaa gbunu a rekumɔ, rekɔ. Gɔ be raa zaa bɔ: a zaamɔ, zaa. Gɔ be raa gbaarwal be bɔ: a woom hin yɛrɛ, woo.
Yɔ Yeesu lag anbɔ, see wal bɔ ya̧a̧boonɔ kɔmsig gɛrsɛ. Wɛɛ zɛmr a dood saal wɔ hi fɔbzig hi,
a be raasinɛ: a Israhilaya hɛbt du hɛw, be zɛmdir ɗɔbsil gbɔɔl anyɔ lɛ gɛ.
Dood wɔ laaya gbɔɔl bɔ yaazihi tɔmsɛ hi wɛɛ raa du hi zɛm gbaar wal bɔ ginɛ gumsɛ za̧a̧za̧.
A ɔ̧tza di, Yeesu rek a waal gbɔɔl za du nuŋgɔ a Nayin. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi saalzanɔ gbɔlɛ hi retin elo.
Yɔ Yeesu sɛ̧ɛ̧b a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gbɔnɔya̧ bɔ ge, zɛm dood hi pɛɛk wɔrko. Waawal gbunsimi wɔrɔ, naaɔ bɔ kuuryɔ. Dood kittɔnɔ a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu hi gi hi niskuur bɔ.
Yɔ Waar Yeesu bɛɛ nis bɔ gbɛnko, mɛɛsig ya̧a̧rɛ,
a bɔmɔ kaa!
Wɛɛ sɔɔ ki̧i̧ wɔrk bɔ sílɔ, dood wɔ hi gig nɛ pɛɛko hi erɔ. Raa:
a walsɛrɔ, be raamɔ, ɗukumɔ!
Wɔrk bɔ ɗuk ɗɔɔtɔ, yɛɛl ya̧a̧bookyɔ. Yeesu wɛɛ looge gaag nɔɔtɔ naan du.
Dood wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hoobha̧a̧hi hi sɛw. Hi wɛɛ hi baan Bɛto hi raa:
a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya za gbɔɔl midz gɛrɛ wɛ teesdu,
Bɛt yaazig an gi ɗaas dood ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Dood hi fɔ̀k hinyɔ Yeesu woo a Yahuduya waalɔ du sɛw, hi waal zaadɛ wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b di gedu sɛw.
Yohana walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi dɔgsig dɔgl wɔrɔ sɛw.
Yohana el dood eerɛ yaahi a Waar Yeesu ge, an hi warige:
a mɔɔ gi za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi zaa ya, gi an wi oo zaa dɔɔmi ya ri?
Yɔ wɔrɔ hi tuur a Yeesu ge hi
a Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ gii yaaziwi a mɔɔge an wi ɛrumɔ: a mɔ gi za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi zaa gii ya, zaabe gi an wi oo zaa dɔ̧ɔ̧mi ya?
A ya̧a̧ gbun bɔ gedu Yeesu za̧a̧s gumtil kittɔnɔ, za̧a̧s wɔ hi gin loorɛha̧a̧l muul du hi yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ kittɔnɔ, gatsihi lɔlya̧.
Yeesu wɛɛ

a rekinɛ nɛ goks Yohana hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnɔ hi hinyɔ nɛ kɛmɔ: yɛrɛ yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ hi gbɛnik lɔlɛ, dɔɔɓɛrkilya wɔ be hi ɛmbiko. Ɗobtilya wɔ ɗobtilya̧ da̧a̧sihi. Lagɛ wɔ be hi laktɔnɛ, wɔrkɛ wɔ be hi rɛmluko, ya̧a̧rya wɔ be, hi gisihi Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ dɔko.
Hat gi a za̧a̧nyɔ simdɔɔ a be dɔŋg gɛ ge.
Yɔ Yohana tɔmsɔya wɔ hi bɛɛ wɛɛko, Yeesu yɛɛl dood saal wɔ Yohana dɔglɔ ɛrkyɔ:
a nɛ da nɛ re nɔ seezig a hɛtdɔŋ du nɔ? Nɛ rek an nɛ seez bɔ̧ɔ̧k zayɔ zɛk gig namsig gii ya?
Nɛ re nɔ seezig nɔ? Wal za yɔ heg gbandil hɔnt muul gii ya? Dood wɔ hi hek gbandil bɛtɛ hi wɛɛ hi waak a hɛmntig du hi gi a waar ɛ raa du.
Nɛ́ nɛ da nɛ rek nɔ seezig ɔnɛ? Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya? Hɔɔ, ɔbe raasinɛ, gii daar Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya hɛw.
Gii gi za̧a̧nyɔ hi bi̧i̧ dɔglɔ a be yaak tɔmsyabe gɛrɛ a mɔ muutdu an gi dorɔ gi gɛmtsim gbɔnɔ mɔ.
Be gisin raako: dood wɔ nɛɛd hi mɔɔhi, zaaɔ tɔ̄ɔ̄ dāār Yohana gɛ. Wɛɛ be, za̧a̧n wans yɔ daarlɛl a Bɛt wáát du, tɔɔ daar gii daarɔ.
(Yɔ hi lag dɔgl wɔrɔ anbɔ, dood saal wɔ hi tooszekya wɔ sɛw hi ta̧a̧ a Bɛt gi doo hinrɔbwookyayɔ, hi wɛɛ hi loo Bɛtmɛm a Yohana ge.
Yɛrɛ Farisaya wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi dāg Bɛtmɛm a Yohana naan du gɛ, hi see hinyɔ ha̧a̧ Bɛto an hi woo hin tɔsyɔ. )
Yeesu wɛɛ raa:
a be gòksin dood wɔ ɓɔryɔ hi nɔ hinɔ? Hi riitin nɛ hi nɔ?
Hi riitin hi ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ gɔ hi ɗɔɔt a luum ha hi goktingo hinɛ: a wi usin fɛ̧ɛ̧brɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ nahin gɛ; wi ɛɛsin ya̧a̧rnaabo, nɛ kaa gɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ zāa̍, le kok gɛ, yɔ̧̄ bum hob gɛ. Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ raako: a gin loorɛha̧a̧l gi muul du.
Wɛɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaa gi hinleko, gi yɔ̧ko. Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ raak ɓɛ: a wal yɛrɛ ɔnɛ gi hinlekya ha̧a̧lɛ hi bumyɔ̧kya ha̧a̧lɛ. Gi tooszekya wɔ hi hinha̧a̧lya wɔ sa̧a̧m ya̧a̧nɛ. Nɛ ha̧a̧n ri?
Nɛ yɛrɛ Bɛt hinmɛɛk dubt bɔ gɔ zuun woosɔ bɛttɔnɔ a dood wɔ hi gig fɔk hi.
Farisaya za zaa zɔ̧b Yeesu an gi re gi lɛlɛ gi lehin hi giya. Yeesu re a Farisaya bɔ gi raa du ɗɔɔtɔ gi hinleko.

Nis za waabil ha̧a̧lya yɔ gi a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu, lag a Yeesu rek a Farisaya bɔ gi raa du gi hinleko, kamz ɗaasɛrɛ kurum ki̧i̧lhɛmntya tik hi̧i̧sili. Tik bɔ hi wɔmn bet rɔb yɔ gɔ hi el a albaatre giya.
Er kuudu a Yeesu dɔɔ dɔŋdi gi kaako. Gɔ kaasi bɔ̀ɔ̀r Yeesu dɔɔɔ wɔ hi mɛɛkɔ, wɛɛ pugdɔ hi susugɔ, wɛɛ zɔm dɔɔɔ wɔ hi ya̧a̧, gubsig kurum ki̧i̧lhɛmntya bɔ dɔɔ muulɛ.
Farisaya bɔ elzig nɛ gi gbɛn hin bɔrɔ anbɔ, mɔkɔ:
a à wal yɛrɛ gi nɛ Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkya rɔbo, yɔ mɛɛ nɛ a nis yɛrɛ ɓi̧i̧be gi nis waabil ha̧a̧lyayɔ.
Yeesu
a Simɔŋ, be gin mɔkil za an be dɔksumɔ.
Gii ta̧a̧:
a Hingokya , dɔgumɔ.
A doo za giro gi fɔk dood eerɛ belko. Gi zaabɔ fɔk tus gaat tɛmɛrɛ nɔɔnɛ, zaabɔ be, tus dɛɛt dumbili nɔɔnɛ.
Yɔ wɔrɔ hi eer sɛw hi taan hinza an hi toon gɛ, wal bɔ ɔsihi belk bɔ hi eer sɛw. Dood wɔrɔ hi eerɛ, nɔni gɔ gi ha̧a̧ge a wal bɔ ge gi daarlɛl nɔ?
Simɔŋ ta̧a̧:
a be mɔk a zaabɔ loo belk gbɔɔltɔnɔ giya.
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
a mɔ zol lɛlɔ ge.
Yɔ zɛmr a nis bɔ gi muutdu, ɛr Simɔŋ:
a mɔ gbɛn nis yɛrɛ ya? Be zaa a mɔ raa du, mɔ́ gāābe mɛm be nɛɛn dɔɔ be gɛ. Yɛrɛ giya, bɔ̀ɔ̀rin dɔɔ be hi mɛɛkɔ, wɛɛ pugdin susugɔ.
Mɔɔ be, mɔ́ dagibe mɔ́ kɔ̄tib gɛ. Yɛrɛ giya, yɔ be bɛɛ zaak mɔ raa du, dagibe, wɛɛ gi waak dɔɔ be zɔŋki.
Mɔɔ mɔ ɓeg kurum ki̧i̧lhɛmntya a be zulha gɛ; gii be, ɔnɛ ɓeg kurum ki̧i̧lhɛmntya a be dɔɔ muulɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, be gisim raako: a hinha̧a̧lɔ kit wɔ hi bitsig bitsɔ a hatɔ gbɔɔl bɔ dɔŋgo. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ hi bitsig hinha̧a̧lɔ kaasi, hatɔ gi kaasi be.
Wɛɛ raa
nis bɔ a hinha̧a̧l mɔ wɔ hi bitsimbitsɔ.
Dood wɔ hi gi nɛ hinlek hi yɛɛl mɔkigi hi kpoos du:
a bɔ za̧a̧n yɛrɛ ɔnɛ gi ɗɛɛ hinha̧a̧l bisigi wɛ yɔ?
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ raa nis bɔ:
a ɗɔbsig mɔ za̧a̧sumza̧a̧sɔ, rekum rɔbtɔnɔ.
Kuudu, ɔ̧tyɔ tal kaasi, Yeesu rek a waal gbɔlɛ hi waal gbɔlɛ, raato hi raato an gi dɔg Bɛt wáátɔ Dɔgl Rɔbo. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ hi gi hi giya.
Nɛɛd zaadɛ wɔ za̧a̧sihi nɛ hi loorɛ gumsɛ hi gums zaadɛ sɔmsɔm hi gi hi gii hɛw. Nɛɛdya̧ gɛrɛ: Mariyama yɔ gɔ hi elig a Magdalayayɔ, yɔ Yeesu tuus loorɛ nɔɔn-er a gi muul du,
hi Waar bɔ Hirudus walsɛrɔ bɔ nuŋgɔ a Hudza nistɔ Yowanɛ, hi Suzaan, hi nɛɛd zaadɛ kit wɔ hi gisig ɗaak hi rɔɔsya̧.
Dood kittɔnɔ hi fu̧u̧z a waal gbɔlɛ du sɔmsɔm hi zaa hi mɔks a Yeesu ge. Yeesu dɔgsihi ya̧a̧daanik an yɛrɛ lɛ:
a doo za bakbalkya tuu an gi re gi dɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ a gi bak du. Yɔ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧ko, dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaadɛ hi kpɔm a gbɔnɔ ya̧. Dood hi ɗa̧a̧k dɔɔ du be, nɔɔs hi zaa hi sɛ̧ɛ̧ zaadɛ be.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi kpɔm a betwaat lɛlɛ, yɔ hi pirɔ hi wɛɛ hi koot nɔɔktɔnɔ anyɔ lɛlɔ gɔ hi̧i̧b gɛ.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi pir a tɛ̧ɛ̧ kobsyaadɛ teesdu, kobs wɔ hi tɔɔtin hi hiya, hi yɛ̧gihi.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi kpɔm a hɛbt rɔb lɛlɛ, hi pirɔ, hi hɔɔ, hi kɛ̧ɛ̧lɔl yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ nɔɔnɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu da̧a̧s dɔglɔ bɔ bookɔ anbɔ, wɛɛ dɔg hi kɔlk hɔɔti:
a za̧a̧nyɔ gin tɔn an gi kɛmɔ, gi kɛmɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi warige:
a ya̧a̧daanik bɔrɔ tuus hinɔ a nɔ?
Yeesu
a nɛya, nɛ dag gbɔnɔ an nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ yaat nɛ a Bɛt wáát du. Yɛrɛ dood zaadɛ be, gi an be bonsihi ya̧a̧daanikyɔ, an hi seeko, wɛɛ hi gbɛn gɛ, an hi lako, wɛɛ hi kɛm gɛ.
Hinyɔ ya̧a̧daanik yɛrɛ gi wadig gɛrɛ: a dɔ̧ɔ̧t bɔ hinɔ gi Bɛt dɔglɛ.
Dood zaadɛ hi riitin an gbɔnɔya̧yɔ: gɔ hi kɛm Bɛt dɔglɔ, loorɛha̧a̧l zaa wɔɔ dɔgl bɔ hi kpoos du an bɔ hi ɗɔbsɔ hi za̧a̧.
Dood zaadɛ hi riitin an betwaat lɛlɛ: doodya̧ hii gɔ kɛm Bɛt dɔglɛ hi ta̧a̧ hi hato; wɛɛ hi ɔ̄ɔ̄ dɔgl bɔ an gi yaa yɛ̧ɛ̧sɔ hi kpoos du gɛ, hi ɗɔbs am kaasi, hinza gɔ bɛɛhi maatugo hi ɔɔ dɔgl bɔ ɔɔ.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi kpɔm a kobs teesdu be, doodya̧ hii gɔ kɛm Bɛt dɔglɛ hi wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ hi rekɔ, wɛɛ waalmɔkili, rɔɔsɛ hi waabil hɛmnt yɔ waal du yɛ̧g dɔgl bɔ hi kpoos du, dɔgl bɔ humlɔ wɛɛ hin tɔsi ma.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hi kpɔm a hɛbt rɔb lɛl du, doodya̧ hii gɔ kɛm Bɛt dɔglɛ hi wa̧a̧ hi kpoos du gaati hi bis gɛ. Yɔ hi waa hinmɔŋk hi kpoos rɔbo, dɔgl bɔ gaa humlɔ gɔ hi kpoos du be.
Doo za gɔ kpoo laa a pitila du gi mibt a dak du gɛ, zaabe gɔ mibt a leeso buudu gɛ. Gɔ wii a wiisɔ bɔ gedu an wɔ gɔ hi guzig a luk bɔ geɗu hi gbɛn lɛlgaalɛ.
Hinza yaatilya taa an hi ɔɔg midigɔ. Wɛɛ hinza gɛdya taa an hi ɔɔg mɛksigɔ hi midigɔ a ɔ̧t du.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, oon hinyɔ nɛ kɛŋk yɔ bɛttɔnɔ. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gin hinza, hi gaage zaa ha. Za̧a̧nyɔ taan hinza gɛ be, hi ha̧s hinyɔ mɔk nɛ a be gin hɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu gi a lɛl za du, nɔɔtɔ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi zaa hi zɛŋge, wɛɛ hi dāg gbɔnɔ an hi tuur ge gɛ, dood saal hi kiitɔ.
Hi raasige:
a nàà mɔ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mɔ hi erk lakdi, ha̧a̧hi an hi gbɛnumɔ.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧hi:
a nàà be hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be gɛ dood wɔ hi gi kɛŋk Bɛt dɔglɔ hi wɛɛ hi gi wooko.
Ɔ̧tza ma Yeesu kar a lɛmb du hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ, wɛɛ
a yɛnwɛ tal a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaabɔ ge.
Hi rekɔ.
Yɔ hi rek a lɛmb du, Yeesu yoyo. Zɛk za ha̧a̧l tɛŋkya yɛɛl fɛk a mɛm bɔ hage, mɛm gi ga̧a̧yyik a lɛmb du, lɛmb bɔ gi hi̧i̧sugo, sɛ̧ɛ̧b an gi gubrihi a mɛm bɔ gedu hi wɔrɔ.
Hi sɔɔ hi rɛmsige hi
a Hingokya! Hingokya! Wɛ wɔrɔ!
Yɔ Yeesu rɛmɔ, ya̧a̧l zɛk ha̧a̧l bɔ hi mɛmɗukil wɔ hi erɔ, lɛl kɔm gɔ seseg.
Wɛɛ
a ɗɔbsig nɛ gi ay?
Yɔ hoobha̧a̧ wɔrɔ gi wɛɛ gi kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ hi ɛtinu:
a bɔ za̧a̧n yɛrɛ gɔ gi raa zɛko hi mɛmɛ hi kɛmsig tɔn wɛ yɔ?
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi tuur ma a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaabɔ ge, hi sil gɔ a Gerezanɛ hɛbt du. Galile hɛbt gi nɛ a mɛmbal kasiŋ zaabɔ hi ɔɔg nɛ hi kar lɛmb duge.
Yɔ Yeesu sil a lɛmb du, wal za yɔ gi a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu gin loorɛha̧a̧l kittɔnɔ a gi muul du, zaa ge. Wɛlɔ kittɔnɔ gi waak ɔ̧lɛ, wɛɛ taa waak a luk du, gi waak a loorlɛlɛ.
Yɔ gbɛn Yeesu , zaa zagl gi dɔŋdi ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ dɔg hi tɛŋko:
a dɔgl be nɔ du hi mɔɔya, Yeesu , Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl waa? Be zɔ̧mɔ, bɔmɔ ha̧a̧nib ya̧a̧rɛ!

Yɔ Yeesu raa nɛ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ a gi tuu a wal bɔ gi muul du giigi dɔg anbɔ. Yɛɛl amntɔnɔ, loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ gi waak nɛ wal bɔ wa̧a̧ki. Dood gɔ hi waag hi wɔk dɔɔɔ wɔ hi naanɔ wɔ hi ba̧a̧n tusɛ, hi tus gbɔɔsi, hi gig gbaako. Wɛɛ gɔ anbɔ kaatir gbɔɔs wɔrɔ sɛw. Wɛɛ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ kaŋge a hɛtdɔŋ du.
Yeesu warige:
a nuŋg mɔ a nɔ?
Gii ta̧a̧
a nuŋg be a saalɛ.
Anyɔ loorɛha̧a̧l kittɔnɔ hi gul nɛ a gi muul du.
Hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧b Yeesu hi ya̧a̧hɛmnti:
a bɔgi yaahi a zɛŋk dubt du.
Hɔnɛyɔ hab kittɔnɔ hi gi nɛ ga̧a̧t ha hi tɔk hɛto, loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi zɔ̧b Yeesu
a gi yaahi a hab wɔ hi muul du.
Yeesu gaahi gbɔnɔ.
Loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi bɛɛ tuuk a wal bɔ gi muul du hi tal hi rek a hab wɔ hi muul du. Wɛɛ hab wɔ hi bindɔ hi nɔɔ hi tii a kasiŋ disɛ hi dikto hi rek hi gi̧i̧l a mɛmbal du hi wɔrɔ.
Yɔ hab nɛɛrɛwaat wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ, hi nɔɔ hi rek a waal gbɔlɛ du hi raat dɛɛt wɔ du hi raam ramsɔ.
Yɔ dood hi lag anbɔ hi rek hi see hinyɔ tuurɔ, hi tuur a Yeesu ge, hi zɛm wal bɔ loorɛha̧a̧l tuu gi muul du ɗɔɔt a Yeesu dɔŋdi, heg gbandilɔ hamad gi hi mɔkilɔ rɔbtɔnɔ. Yɔ anbɔ hoobha̧a̧-hiha̧.
Dood wɔ hi gbɛn hinyɔ talɔ, hi fɔks wɔrɔ loorɛya bɔ za̧a̧tigɔ dɔglɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, dood wɔ hi waak a Gerezanɛ hɛbt yɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b di gedu sɛw hoobha̧a̧hi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi zɔ̧b Yeesu an gi tuu gi ɔɔ hɛbtya̧ bɔ. Yeesu wɛɛ kar lɛmb du wɛɛ wɛɛ a lɛl bɔ da giz nɛ ge.
Wal bɔ loorɛha̧a̧l tuu gi muulɛ zɔ̧ Yeesu an gi kɔm hi giya. Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ yaage
a wɛɛmɔ a mɔ lɛlɛ mɔ da mɔ fɔk hinyɔ Bɛt woosum sɛw.
Wal bɔ rekɔ fɔkil hinyɔ Yeesu gɔsig nɛ dɔglɔ sɛw a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu sɛw.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu wɛɛzɔ, dood saal hi dagige; hi sɛw hi gig nɛ ook be.
Yɔ anbɔ, wal za giro nuŋgɔ a Yayirus, gi mɔksillukya gbɔɔlɛ. Zaa zagl a Yeesu dɔŋdi, zɔ̧ge an gi re gi gul a gi raa du,
anyɔ gin waaɔsiŋ yɔ gi waaɔ gbunsimi, gin wɛlɔ koobl daa eerɛ gi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik wɔrkyɔ. Yɔ Yeesu gi reko, dood saal wɔ hi gig ɓɔ̧ɔ̧ko.
Nis za giro, lis gig fɔk wɛl koobl daa eerɛ, waks rɔɔsɔ sɛw a gɛr du, gɛr za ɗɛɛg za̧a̧sig gɛ be.
Nis bɔ sɔɔ a Yeesu kuudu ɓi̧i̧ gbandilɔ tɔl bɔ wɛɛdisɛ, ɓɔrbɔ lisɔ bɔ da̧a̧sig gɔ.
Yeesu yɔ mɛksɔ, warɔ:
a bɔ ɓi̧i̧be?
Anyɔ dood sɛw hi faako, Piyɛr raa:
a Hingokya , dood saal hi gɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔŋg mɔ hi gi mɔ ɓɔ̧ɔ̧k be, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ wark bɔ a bɔ ɓi̧i̧ be nɔ?
Hɔnɛ Yeesu ta̧a̧ raa:
a za̧a̧nza ɓı̧̀ı̧̀be, ya̧a̧nɛ bé mɛɛ a tɛŋk za tuu be muul du.
Yɔ nis bɔ gbɛn an hi midigmidɔ, zaa zagl a Yeesu dɔɔ dɔŋdi gi beek hoobo; wɛɛ fɔk hinyɔ ki̧i̧ Yeesu dɔŋgɔ ge a dood lɔlgbar sɛw, wɛɛ dɔg za̧a̧tigɔ dɔgl ɓɔrbɔ sɛw.
Yeesu
a waa be siŋgo, ɗɔbsig mɔ za̧a̧sumza̧a̧sɔ, rekum rɔbtɔnɔ.
Anyɔ Yeesu gi ya̧a̧book te, doo za fu̧u̧z a mɔksilluk gbɔɔlya bɔ gi lɛlɛ, zaa dɔksig wɔrk ramsɛ:
a waa mɔ siŋg bɔ wɔɔrɔ, bɔmɔ mɔɔs Hingokya bɔ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu bɛɛ hin bɔrɔ lak anbɔ, raa Yayirus:
a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ, ɗɔbsum kpɔd, waa mɔ bɔ gi za̧a̧.
Yɔ Yeesu tuur a raa bɔ gedu, ta̧a̧ an doo za gi gul hi gii gɛ, gɛ Piyɛr , Yohana, Yakuba hi waa bɔ baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ hii gul kpɔd.
Dood sɛw hi kaako, hi hekugo, a wɔrk bɔ gi muulɛ. Yeesu
a bɔnɛ kaa, waa bɔ wɔr gɛ gi yokyo.
Yɔ dood hi lag anbɔ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lig-kpɛ̧ɛ̧lɔ, hi seege a yooyɔ, hi mɛɛ be a waa bɔ wɔɔrɔ.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu sɔɔ waa bɔ gi dɔŋdi wa̧a̧g naan muulɛ, dɔg hi ya̧a̧ɓooti:
a waa, ɗukum ha!
Waa bɔ kolɔ wɛɛzɔ, wɛɛ ɗund ɓɔrbɔ ɗɔɔtɔ. Yeesu wɛɛ raa:
a gaanɛg lees gi le ma.
Wawa bɔ baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ, Yeesu wɛɛ
a bɔnɛ fɔks doo za hinyɔ tuurɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu mɔks walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ koobl daa eer wɔ, gaahi tɛŋko hi ɗɛɛn a loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ gaŋsya̧ sɛw hi zulha, hi wɛɛ hi za̧a̧sil gumtil wɔ be.
Wɛɛ yaahi an hi dɔg Bɛt wáátɔ dɔglɛ, dood wɔ hi gin gumsɛ hi za̧a̧sihi be.
a anyɔ nɛ rek rɔbsi, bɔnɛ loo hinza an sɔɔlɛ, saa, koko, tusɛ; bɔnɛ heg gbandil eerɛ.
Gɔ nɛ gul a raa zaa du, kɔn duge, gi tuur an nɛ ɗund nɛ rekɔ.
Gid dood hi inin dak hi waal du, tuun nɛ ɔɔ waal bɔ nɛ pub luus wɔ nɛ dɔɔ kuuha an gi wɛɛsihi hinmɛɛnikya.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi rek gɔ raato hi raato hi dɔk Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ, hi za̧a̧silgo dood lɛl sɛw.

Anyɔ waar gbɔɔl bɔ Hirudus lag hinyɔ gi daak sɛwi, dood zaadɛ hi raako a Yohana gii rɛmlɔ, zaadɛ be a Eliya Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ gii wɛɛ gi midza, wɛɛ zaadɛ be a Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkya wɔ zaaya̧ gbuni rɛmlɔ, yɔ anbɔ hinɔ yɔɔgyɔ.
Wɛɛ raa:
a à Yohana giya, be wa̧a̧ge be dɛ̧ɛ̧r zulɔ be! Nɛ bɔ za̧a̧nɔ ɔnɛ be kɛm hi gig hin raanik anbɔ?
Wɛɛ ɓɛɛge an gi gbɛn za̧a̧nɔ.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi wɛɛzɔ hi fɔks Yeesu hinyɔ hi woo. Yeesu loohi mukya̧ rek hi hii a waal za gbɔɔl du nuŋgɔ a Baytizaada.
Yɔ dood saal hi mɛɛ a Yeesu gi rek hɔ, hi fɔge, gii be dagihi dɔgsihi Bɛt wáátɔ dɔglɛ. Wɛɛ za̧a̧s dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi za̧a̧k hɛw.
Yɔ ɔ̧t gi leko, walɛsɛrɛ koobl daa eer wɔ hi sɔɔ hi
a anyɔ wɛ gi a hɛtdɔŋ du hɛdi, yaam dood saal wɛrɛ hi rek a raat dɛɛt wɔ du hi raat wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b a hɛt duge an hi rek hi yo hi dag leesɛ.
Yeesu
a nɛɛ hi zul nɛ gaanɛhi hinyɔ gɔ hi le.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi goo:
a gɛ wi gin kok kiml nɔɔnɛ hi dut eerɛ, gi an wi re wi zebz lees za an wi gaa dood wɛrɛ sɛw ya?
Walɛ wɔ sɛw kitigya̧ rek an duk nɔɔnɛ. Yeesu
a raan dood saal wɔ hi ɗɔɔt mɔksil lɛl gbunu gbunu dood du dumbili nɔɔnɛ nɔɔnɛ.
Wɔrɔ hi gɔ anbɔ, hi raa dood saal wɔ hi ɗɔɔt sɛw.
Yeesu loo kok kiml nɔɔn wɔ hi dut eerɛ wɔ, pɛɛ lɔlɔ wɛɛha baan Bɛto. Ɓɛɛl kok wɔ gaa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧s dood saal wɔ.
Dood sɛw hi le kok bɔ hi hi̧i̧. Hi wɛɛ hi mɔgl kok ɓɛɛkil wɔ hi zɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ hi̧i̧s dɛl koobl daa eerɛ.
Ɔ̧tza yɔ Yeesu gi zɔ̧k Bɛt a lɛl-aakil du, ɛr walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gi el an yɛrɛ lɛ:
a dood hi raak a be gi bɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧:
a dood hi raak a mɔ gi Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ giya; zaadɛ be a mɔɔ gi Eliya;
zaadɛ hi raak ɓɛ: a mɔɔ gi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ amntɔnɔ zaaɔ yɔ rɛmlzɔ.
Wɛɛ warihi:
a yɛrɛ nɛya, nɛ raak a bee gi bɔ?
Piyɛr ta̧a̧:
a mɔɔ gi Masihu yɔ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a bɔhi dɔks doo za hinɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ dɔg ɓɛ:
a gi an Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi yɔ̧ ya̧a̧r ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ. Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi bisige, hi gbɔŋge; gi rɛmlɔ gi ɗuk a ɔ̧t taasimɛ.
Kuudu Yeesu wɛɛ raa dood sɛw:
a za̧a̧ni ha̧a̧g zaak a be kuudu, gi ɔs zulɔ hinmɔkigi, gi pɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧rɔ ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw gi fɔbzibe.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧ni ha̧a̧g an gi za̧a̧s kolɔ, gi waksige; wɛɛ za̧a̧ni waks kolɔ be dɔŋg be, gi za̧a̧sige.
À doo za dag waal sɛw ɔnɛ, gi waks kolɔ, zaabe gi waks zulɔ, gi dak nɔ du nɔ?
Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧ni seem ha̧a̧g beya hi dɔgl be, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gɔ gi zaa a gi gbɔlums ɗu, hi Baatɔ gbɔlums du, hi Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ gaatɛ wɔ hi gbɔlums du, seem gi ha̧a̧g za̧a̧nɔ be.
Be gisin raak rɔbo: dood zaadɛ wɔ hi erk hɛdi hi gbɛn Bɛt wáátɔ kete, ɓɔr hi ɔɔ wɔrko.
Yɔ Yeesu dɔg hin wɔrɔ anbɔ ɔ̧t gi tal di gɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ, loo Piyɛr , Yohana hi Yakuba hi dɔɔ a ga̧a̧t ha an hi zɔ̧ Bɛto.
Yɔ Yeesu gi Bɛt zɔ̧ko muutɔ gbar zɛmrɔ, wɛɛ gbandilɔ buu anbɔ fɛr.
Ɓɔrbɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔrkɛ amntɛ eerɛ hi zaa hi booya̧a̧ hi Yeesu : gɛ Muusa hi Eliya.
Hi midz a bɛtha gbɔlums du, hi boo waalɔ ɔɔk dɔgl yɔ gɔ gi woo woosɔ a Urusalima.
Piyɛr hi naaza zaadɛ wɔ yoom gihi daaruko. Yɔ hi za̧a̧lɔlɛ hi gbɛn Yeesu gbɔlumsɔ hi dood eerɛ wɔ hi gi hi Yeesu.
Yɔ dood wɔrɔ hi hɛɛtingo hi Yeesu , Piyɛr raa Yeesu :
a Hingokya , anyɔ wɛ gi hɛdi, bɛɛrɔ. Wi ɗuks duul gbanyaadɛ taarɛ: gbunu mɔɔnɛ, gbunu Muusa ɔnɛ, wɛɛ zaa gbunu Eliya ɔnɛ.
Wɛɛ Piyɛr mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ gi raak gɛ be.
Yɔ gi dɔk anbɔ, kuus za zaa yaatihi. Yɔ kuus bɔ yaatihi anbɔ, walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hoob ha̧a̧hiha̧,
wɛɛ ya̧a̧booyz a kuus bɔ gedu:
a yɛrɛ gi waa be yɔ be herig giya, kɛmsinɛge!
Yɔ ya̧a̧ bɔ booy anbɔ gi da̧a̧, hi gbɛ̄n doo za ma gɛ, gɛ Yeesu gi gbunu. Yɔ anbɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi kɔm be, a ɔ̧t wɔrɔ gedu hi fɔ̄ks doo za hinza gɛ.
