Yoosugɔ, yɔ Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi siz a ga̧a̧t bɔ hage, dood saalzanɔ gbɔɔl hi zaa hi dagtin hi giya.
Wal za kaa a saal bɔ gedu:
a Hingokya! Be zɔ̧mɔ, seem lɔl a waa be wal muulɛ, gii gi waa be gbunsimi.
Loorɛha̧a̧l za wa̧a̧ge gɔ gig kalsugo, gig beesugo hi tɛŋko, gisig set itil tuusig ya̧a̧ du, gig kosgumn gaak ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, wɛɛ gɔ sam ɔɔg gɛ be.
Be zɔ̧b walɛsɛrɛ mɔ wɔ an hi tuus loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ, wɛɛ hi ɗɛɛ gɛ.
Yeesu goo:
a nɛɛ dood wɔ nɛ ta̧a̧ ɗɔbsig gɛ, dood ha̧a̧l wɛ, be ɗɔɔt hi nɛɛ be mɔmsin gi tuur bili? Kamzum waa mɔ wal bɔ hɛdi.
Yɔ loorɛha̧a̧lya bɔ gi sɔɔzugo, loorɛ bɔ mat walà bɔ hɛbt di beesig hi tɛŋko. Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu ya̧a̧l loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ, tuu, wɛɛ za̧a̧s walà bɔ, gaag baatɔ naan du.
Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ kɔms dood sɛw gɛrs gbɔɔltɔnɔ. An hinyɔ Yeesu woo sɛw gi kɔms dood sɛw gɛrsɛ hi book dɔglɔ te, Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a nɛnɛ lagin hin yɛrɛ bɛttɔnɔ: hi gaa Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ a dood naan du ma.
Hɔnɛ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi kɛ̄m dɔgl bɔrɔ hinɔ gɛ. Dɔgl bɔ kɔmsihi dɔgl yaatigyɔ an bɔhi kɛm hinɔ; anyɔ gɔ hi ɛrig dɔglɔ be, hoobha̧a̧hiha̧.
Hɔnɛyɔ anbɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi yɛɛl watingo hi teesdu an hi mɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi gbɔɔl gi daarlɛlɛ a hi tees du.
Yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ mɔkil bɔrɔ hi kpoos du, loo waa za gbaag gi dɔŋg di,
wɛɛ
a za̧a̧nyɔ dag ya̧a̧mwaa yɛrɛ a be nuŋg du, dag bee hi zul be; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ dag bee hi zul be, dag Za̧a̧nyɔ yaazib giya. Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ gi wans a nɛ teesdu gi daarlɛl sɛwi, za̧a̧nɔ gii gi gbɔɔlɛ.
Yohana raa:
a Hingokya , wi gbɛn za̧a̧n za gi ninik loorɛ hi nuŋg mɔ, anyɔ taa doo wɛnɛ gɛ be, wi a̧a̧nig-a̧a̧nɔ.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
a bɔnɛ a̧a̧nige, doo gi ha̧a̧g gabs hi nɛɛ gɛ, gi doo nɛɛnɛ.
Ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi loo Yeesu gi dɔɔnig bɛtha sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ, ha̧a̧g a gi kpoos du an gi rek a Urusalima.
Yaa tɔmsɔya wɔ hi dorɔ hi rek a Samariya raat za du an hi gɛmtsig kusillɛlɔ.
Anyɔ ginɛ rek a Urusalima, dood wɔ hɔ ha̧a̧hi an hi dagig gɛ.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ Yakuba hi Yohana hi gbɛn anbɔ hi warɔ:
a Waar i, ha̧a̧mɔ an wi raa laa gi fu̧u̧z a bɛtha gi dɔ̧ɔ̧hi ya?
Yeesu lag anbɔ zɛmr hiige
a nɛ mɛ̄ɛ̄ mɔkilyɔ gi nɛ kpoos du gɛ.
Yɛrɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zāā an gi waks dood kol gɛ, zaa an gi za̧a̧sihiza̧a̧sɔ.
Hi dɔŋg gɔ a raat za dɔɔm du.
Yɔ hi gi rek a gbɔnɔ du, doo za raa Yeesu :
a Waar i, bé fɔmɔ a lɛlyɔ gɔ mɔ rek ge sɛw.
Gii googe:
a bɛrtɔkgɛ hi gin luko, nɔɔs wɔ bɛtha hi gin zɛko. Yɛrɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ taan lɛlyɔ gɔ gi gbaa zulɔ du gi holɔ.
Wɛɛ raa doo za:
a fɔbzibe.
Za̧a̧n bɔ wɛɛ ta̧a̧:
a Waar i, gaabe gbɔnɔ an be re be i̧i̧z baa be wɔrkɔ kete.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu wɛɛ
a ɔɔm wɔrkɛ wɔ hi i̧i̧ wɔrkɛya̧. Wɛɛ mɔya rekum mɔ dɔg Bɛt wáátɔ dɔglɛ.
Doo za dɔɔm wɛɛ
a Waar i, bé fɔmɔ. Yɛrɛ gaabe gbɔnɔ an be rek be warz dood wɔ hi gi be raa du.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a za̧a̧nyɔ gbaa naan a naafur ha gi wɛɛ gi see lɔl kuudu, gāā a Bɛt wáát du gɛ.
Kuudu yɔ hin wɔrɔ hi talɔ, Waar Yeesu her dood dumbili nɔɔn-er zaadɛ yaahi eerɛ eerɛ hi dor a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ du sɛw hi lɛl zaadɛ wɔ gii gɔ gi rek nɛ ge sɛw,
a tot gi bak du gbɔɔltɔnɔ, ɓɛrkɔ rii be, wɛɛ woosya hi kit gɛ be. Yɛrɛ da nɛ zɔ̧b Totɓɛs Zulya bɔ, gi yaaz woosyaadɛ a totɓɛsɔ bɔ gedu.
Rekinɛ, yɛrɛ be gin yaak an tamwaato a lergum tees du.
Gɔ nɛ reko bɔnɛ loo tusɛ, zaabe lees duko, hi taalɛ; bɔnɛ boo doo gbɔnɔ di.
Gɔ nɛ gulk a raa za du, raan kete: a an boolum gi gi a raa yɛrɛ geɗu.
Wɛɛ doo za boolumya gi gi a raa bɔ gedu, boolum nɛ yɛgi ɗɔɔt gi zulha. Doo za boolumya gi taadu gɛ be, boolum nɛ gi wɛɛz a nɛɛge.
Waan a raa gbun bɔ gedu nɛ gi hinleko, nɛ gi yɔ̧k hinyɔ gɔ hi gaanɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, woosya rii an gi dag dɔɔrɔɔsɔ dagɔ. Bɔnɛ tal raato hi raato.
Gɔ nɛ gul a waal gbɔɔl za du, gid hi daginɛ, len lees yɔ gɔ hi gaanɛ.
Za̧a̧sin gumtil wɔ gɔ nɛ zɛ̧hi a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu, wɛɛn nɛ
Yɛrɛ a waal gbɔɔl za yɔ gɔ nɛ gul gedu a lɛlyɔ gɔ hi dagin gedu gɛ, tuun a gbɔnɔɔ wɔ gedu nɛ
a wi pubik waal gbɔɔl nɛ bɔ luusɔ kɔm wi dɔɔkuu ha nɛ muulɛ. Yɛrɛ mɛɛn ma a Bɛt wáátɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Be raasinɛ: a dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti, waal gbɔɔl yɛrɛ dɔglɔ gɔ hi gbaasige gi daar waal gbɔɔl bɔ Sodɔma ɔnɛ bɔ gɔ hi gbaasige.

Koraziŋ, ya̧a̧rhant gisumɔ! Baytizaada, ya̧a̧rhant gisumɔ! Ya̧a̧nɛ à gɛrs gbɔlɛ wɔ hi wooy nɛko a nɛ teesdu da wooy nɛ a Tiriya hi Sidɔŋg, dood wɔ hi waak nɛ hɔ amntɔnɔ, yɔ hi rumsihi tám muulɛ, hi wɛɛ hi heksihi saa a muul nɔɔktɔnɔ an hi zuun a hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ zɛmrɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, dɔgl yɔ gɔ hi gbaas Tiriya hi Sidɔŋg taa ɗɔk an nɛnɛ bɔ.
Yɛrɛ mɔya, Kapɛrnayum, mɔ mɔkig a Bɛt dɔɔsumdɔɔs a bɛtha ya ri? Hí tidzumɔ an mɔ zaa̍ mɔ gul a wɔrkɛ ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a za̧a̧nyɔ gisin dɔgl nɛ kɛŋko, gis bee kɛŋko. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ bisinɛ, bis beya. Za̧a̧nyɔ bis bee be, bis Za̧a̧nyɔ yaazib giya.
Tɔmsya wɔ dumbili nɔɔn-er hi wɛɛza hi hato hi raa Yeesu :
a Waar i, loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hɛw hi gisiw tɔn lako hi nuŋg mɔ.
Yeesu
a be gbɛn Saydanu gi mɛɛzig bɛtha an bɛlya̧bsɛ.
Yɛrɛ be gaanɛ ɗɛɛti an nɛ ɗa̧a̧ beksɛ hi keli, hi lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya bɔ tɛŋkɔ yɔ gin sɛw, wɛɛ hinza taan nɔk gaak nɛ zaŋ.
Yɔ anbɔ, bɔnɛ dag hat a hinyɔ loorɛ wɔ hi laksin tɔn hage. Yɛrɛ dagin hato anyɔ nuŋg nɛ bi̧i̧y a bɛtha.
A ɔ̧t gbun bɔ gedu, Bɛt Mɔkil hatɔ segl Yeesu raa:
a Baa, mɔɔ gi bɛtha hi hɛbtdi Waar ya̧, be baanumɔ anyɔ mɔ mits waatyɛ̧s wɔ hinyɔ mɔ da mɔ yaats dood hinmɛɛkya wɔ hi dood kɛ̧ɛ̧tɛ wɔ gɔ hi kɛm hinɛ. Hɔɔ! Baa, be baanumɔ a hinyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ geha anbɔ.

Baa be gii gaazib hin sɛw, wɛɛ doo za mɛɛ waawal bɔ za̧a̧nɔ gɛ, gɛ baatɔ mɛɛg kpɔd. Wɛɛ doo za mɛɛ Baa bɔ za̧a̧nɔ gɛ, gɛ waawal bɔ mɛɛg kpɔd hi dood wɔ Waawal bɔ ha̧a̧ge an gi zunsihi za̧a̧nɔ hi mɛɛge.
Wɛɛ yɔ wɛɛ gi zɛmr a walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hii,
a hat gi a za̧a̧nyɔ gbɛn hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnik ge.
Ya̧a̧nɛ be gisin raako: a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ kittɔnɔ hi waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ ha̧a̧hi an hi gbɛn hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnko, wɛɛ hi gbɛn gɛ, an hi kɛm hinyɔ nɛ kɛŋko, wɛɛ hi kɛŋ gɛ.
Bɛtmaakdɔkya za ɗund ɛr Yeesu hin an gi maatinge; ɛrige:
a Hingokya , bé woo nɔ an be dag za̧a̧tig faa nɔ?
Yeesu wɛɛ warige:
a hi bi̧i̧ a nɔ a Bɛtmaakdɔgl du nɔ? Gɔ mɔ zaŋgig nɔ gedu?
Wal bɔ ta̧a̧:
a hi bi̧i̧ a gi ha̧a̧mɔ Waar mɔ Bɛto hi kpoos mɔ sɛw, hi kol mɔ sɛw, hi tɛŋk mɔ sɛw, hi mɔkil mɔ sɛw, hi a namɔza ge an zul mɔ.
Yeesu
a mɔ ta̧a̧ bɛɛrɔ woom anbɔ mɔ́ za̧a̧.
Hɔnɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya bɔ ha̧a̧g an gi wɛɛn zulɔ hinrɔbwookya a Bɛt muutdu, ɛr Yeesu :
a bɔ gi nabeza ma nɔ?
Yeesu ta̧a̧ raa:
a wal za fu̧u̧z a Urusalima gi tiik a Zeeriko, mat a luurɛ ha̧a̧l tees du. Luurɛ ha̧a̧l wɔ hi holk gbandilɔ wɔ, hi lɛbtige, hi ɔɔg gbɛŋgi hi rekɔ.
Hɔnɛ Bɛtmaakwookya za gi tiizig a gbɔnɔ gbun bɔ gedu, bɛɛ wal bɔ kus hɛbtdi gbɛnko, daa bɛrko rekɔ.
Gbunɔ, doo za Lewiya tuur a lɛl bɔ ge, bɛɛ wal bɔ gbɛnik ɓɛ, daa bɛrko rekɔ.
Hɔnɛ doo za Samariyaya gi rɔbsɔ reko, yɔ tuur hɔdi gi gbɛn wal bɔ hɛbtdi mɛɛsig ya̧a̧rɛ.
Sɔɔ gi dɔŋdi loo bumhob gabsi doktin nɔkɔ wɔ, gbaasig kurum gedu, wɔbtil hi gbandili, wɛɛ pɛɛ gbaag a pɛɛzimɔ bɔ gi yɛl ha kaŋge a rɔbɛ luk du, ooge.
Yoosugɔ, loo tus gaat eerɛ gaa rɔbɛ luk-ookya bɔ
Yeesu ɛrige:
a dood taarɛ wɛrɛ teesya̧ bɔ gedu, mɔ mɔk nɔni wɛɛs za̧a̧n bɔ luurɛha̧a̧l hi lɛbtig naaza nɔ?
Bɛtmaakdɔkya bɔ ta̧a̧:
a gɛ za̧a̧n yɔ mɛɛsig ya̧a̧rɛ.
Wɛɛ Yeesu
a hɔɔ, mɔya rekum mɔ woo anbɔ be.
Anyɔ Yeesu gi rek gbɔnɔ du hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧, zɛm raa za gul gedu, wɛɛ nis za nuŋgɔ a Marta dagig a gi raa du.
Gin yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ za nuŋgɔ a Mariyama, ɗɔɔt a Waar Yeesu dɔŋdi gisig dɔglɔ kɛŋko.
Marta be, gi zɛksig zulɔ hi woos gbɔɔltɔnɔ, wɛɛ zaa raa:
a Waar i, dɔgl mɔ taa du anyɔ yɛ̧ɛ̧be ɔsib woos be wook be gbun ya? Raamɔge gi zaa gi ɗaasib ma mi!
Waar Yeesu
a Marta! Marta! Mɔ gi zɛksig zul mɔ hi mɔkil kittɔnɔ.
Yɛrɛ hinyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ hi rɔbo, gi hin gbunu. Mariyama her ɔnɛ rɔb bɔ herɔ; hinɔ be hi taa zaa looko.
Ɔ̧tza ma Yeesu gi Bɛt zɔ̧k a lɛlza du. Yɔ da̧a̧s Bɛt zɔ̧kɔ, walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ zaaɔ gbun
a Waar i, goksiwi Bɛt zɔ̧ki anyɔ Yohana goks walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ be.
Yeesu
a gɔ nɛ gi zɔ̧ko, raanɛ: a Baa, an nuŋg mɔ gi ɗɔbɔ. An waar ums mɔ gi zaa.
Gaawi leesɛ an gi riiwi ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw;
bitsiwi hinha̧a̧l wi an wii yɔ wi bitsig dood wɔ hi gɔsiw be. Bɔmɔ ka̧wi a maatil du.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a zaa nɛ gbun gi gin saami, gi rekɔ gi zɛŋg yɛms teesdu gi
saam be za fu̧u̧z a rɔbs lɛlɛ, zaa gi be raa du. Wɛɛ be taan hinza an be gaage.
Wɛɛ saamɔ bɔ gi ta̧a̧zig luk du: a bɔmɔ mɔɔsibe, luk gbɔnɔ bɔ gbooy da̧a̧da̧, be kusigkus hi waat be. Bé ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an be ɗund be gaam hinza gɛ.
Be dɔgsinɛ: an mɔ̄k nɛ an gi ɗukɔ gi gaa saamɔ hinza gɛ si̧, yɔ sa̧a̧mɔ bɔ gi gbosig gbɔnɔ ɓaaki gi gig mɔɔsugo, wal bɔ yɔ ɗukɔ yɔ gaa saamɔ hinyɔ ha̧a̧g sɛw.
Yɛrɛ bee be gin raako: a ɛrinɛ, hi gaanɛ, ɓɛɛnɛ nɛ zɛmɔ, ɓàànɛ hi gborsinɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ ɛrɔ, gi dagɔ; za̧a̧nyɔ tɛbɔ, gi zɛmɔ; za̧a̧nyɔ ɓaa, hi gborsige.
Bɔ baaɔ a nɛ teesdu waaɔ gi ɛrig koko gi gaag beto? Zaabe waaɔ bɔ gi ɛrig dutu gi gaag beksɛ?
Zaabe gi ɛrig kɔba̧a̧rɛ gi gaag kel nɔ?
Nɛɛ dood bɔbtin wɛ! Nɛ mɛɛ ma waat nɛ hii hinrɔb gaako, gi gis Baa nɛ yɔ bɛtha gii gi ɔs dood wɔ hi ɛrig Mɔkilɔ gaak ya?
Ɔ̧tza ma Yeesu gi ninik loorɛ su̧u̧k a doo za muul du. Yɔ loorɛ bɔ tuu, doo su̧u̧k bɔ booya̧a̧. Wɛɛ yɔ dood saal wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hinɔ kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ dood zaadɛ hi raa:
a loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ waar ya̧ bɔ Belzebil bɔ gii gig tɛŋk gaako an gi ninin loorɛha̧a̧l zaadɛ wɔ.
Wɛɛ yɔ dood zaadɛ wɔ ha̧a̧hi an hi ton Yeesu dɔglɛ, hi warige an gi gɔsihi gɛrs za an hi mɛɛn a Bɛt gii yaazige.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu mɛɛ mɔkilya̧,
a à waar ums za gɛ̧ɛ̧, hi gɔk nɔk a hi teesdu, waar umsɔ yɔ ha̧a̧tir a hɛbt bɔ gedu. Raa gi ɗund gabs a raa zaa zulha.
À Saydanu gɛ̧ɛ̧ zulɔ, waar umsɔ bɔ yɔ er ma ri nɔ? Yɔ nɛ raak a be ninik loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi waar ya̧ bɔ nuŋgɔ a Belzebil yɔ.
Yɛrɛ beya, à bé ninik loorɛ wɔ hi waar ya̧ Belzebil bɔ giya, fɔkya nɛ wɔ hi tuusig loorɛ wɔ hi nɔ be? Nɛ yɔ anbɔ fɔkya nɛ wɔ hii hi gbaasin dɔglɛ.
Yɛrɛ bé ninik loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hi Bɛt tɛŋkɔ fɛŋgi, yɔ anbɔ gi zuunik a Bɛt wáátɔ zaaza a nɛɛge.
À doo za tɛŋkya gin taabɔ hi daŋgɔ naan du, gi oonik raaɔ, wɔdɔ hi kɔm rɔbtɔnɔ.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧n za yɔ daaringe tɛŋk gi zaa a ge gi gɔsig gabs gi ɗɛɛge, yɔ wɔɔl wɔdɔ wɔ da gi gbaak nɛ kpoosɔ hage gi muulɔ oonuko, yɔ wɛɛ yɔ wɔɔl rɔɔsɔ wɔ sɛw hi tɛŋko yɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧s doodɛ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ taa hi bee gɛ, gi lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya beenɛ; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ ɗaasib mɔksig gɛ, gi hɛksighɛksɔ.
Loorɛha̧a̧l za gi tuu a za̧a̧n za ge, daa a lɛlyɔ koot ge an gi tɛk holumlɛlɛ. Yɔ zɛm lɛl gɛ, raa: a be wɛɛ a luk yɔ be da be tuuz nɛ gedu.
Yɔ bɛɛ wɛɛko, zɛm luk bɔ hi hɛdɔ, hi wɛɛ hi gɛmsig rɔbtɔnɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, wɛɛ rek looz loorɛha̧a̧l zaadɛ wɔ hi bɔbtɔ hi daar gii nɔɔn-erɛ hi gul a luk bɔ gedu hi ɗɔɔtɔ. Yɔ anbɔ za̧a̧n bɔ ɗɔɔtilɔ ha̧tir daar doos bɔ lɛl kpɔkkrɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gi dɔk hin anbɔ, nis za ɓooya̧a̧ a saal tees bɔ gedu, raa:
a hat gi a nis yɔ mɔɔmɔ gi wɛɛ gi gaamɔ wa̧a̧l ge!
Yeesu wɛɛ goo:
a hinyɔ daarɔ, hat gi a za̧a̧nyɔ kɛm Bɛt dɔglɔ gi wɛɛ gi fɔb ge!
Anyɔ dood saal hi kitugo a Yeesu dɔŋdi, Yeesu yɛɛl raaki:
a dood wɔ hi gi ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ hi ha̧a̧lɔ; hi ɛrk gɛrs yɔ gi zuunik a Bɛt gi wooko! Taa an hi zunsihi gɛrs za gbun be, gɛ Zonas ɔnɛ bɔ hi zuunɔ.
Anyɔ Zonas wɛɛs Niniiviya wɔ hinmɛɛnikya, gbunɔ gii Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi wɛɛs dood wɔ ɔ̧ti gi zul hinmɛɛnikya anbɔ be.

Nis waar bɔ fu̧u̧z a ɔ̧tkazig naanyɛ̧li gi ɗuk a dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti a dood wɔ ɔ̧tigi zul hi muutdu gi gɛ̧ɛ̧nihi dɔglɛ. Nis bɔ fu̧u̧z a waal doorumlɛlɛ an gi zaa gi kɛm Sulemaanu dɔglɔ hinmɛɛkya bɔ. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ daar Sulemaanu hi gbɔ-lumsɛ gi hɛdi.

Walɛ Niniiviya wɔ hi ɗukɔ a dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti a dood wɔ ɔ̧tigi zul hi muutdu hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nihi dɔglɛ. Gɔ gi anbɔ hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ Bɛt dɔgl yɔ Zonas dɔksihi gi dɔŋgo. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ daarin Zonas gbɔlumsɛ gi hɛdi.
Za̧a̧n za gɔ kpōō laa a pitila du gi gbaa a yaatil lɛl du gɛ; zaa be kūbt a dɔn du gɛ. Gɔ hi wiig a wiisɔ bɔ gedu an dood gɔ hi guzugo hi gbɛn lɛlgaalɛ.
Lɔl gii gi muul pitilayɔ. Lɔl mɔ gigi rɔbtɔnɔ, muul mɔ sɛw gi a lɛlgaal du. Yɛrɛ lɔl mɔ gi yɔ̧ɔ̧, muul mɔ gi lɛlwil du.
Yɔ anbɔ, oom zul mɔ bɛttɔnɔ an bɔhi zɛm lɛlgaal bɔ gi mɔ muul du gi wɛɛ lɛlwilɔ.
Yɛrɛ an muul mɔ sɛw dag lɛlgaalɛ lɛlza gi taa a lɛlwil du gɛ, muul sɛw gi gaa an pitila yɔ gɔ gaa mɔ muulɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu gi ya̧a̧booko, Farisaya za zɔ̧ge an gi re gi lehin a gi raa du. Yeesu re gulɔ gi hinleko.
Farisaya bɔ gbɛnig nɛ̄ɛ̄ naanɔ an gi le lees bɔ gɛ, yɔɔgyɔ.
Waar Yeesu
a nɛya, Farisaya wɛ, nɛ nɛɛtig wɔd hinyɔ̧nikya bɔ hi dak hinlenikya bɔ kuuya̧, wɛɛ nɛ nɛɛt buuya̧ wɔ gɛ; yɛrɛ luurɛ hi bɔbsɛ hi hi̧i̧s nɛ kpoos du.
Nɛya, dood yoo wɛrɛ! Bɛt yɔ kim kuuha, kı̄m buudu hɛw gɛ ya?
Hinyɔ daarɔ, gaan ya̧a̧rya wɔ hinyɔ gi a nɛ mɛmɗak du hi hinyɔ gi a nɛ leesdak du gaasɛ. Gɔ gi anbɔ hin sɛw gi gáásinɛ.

Yɛrɛ ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ, nɛɛ Farisaya wɛ! Anyɔ nɛ ɓek hinyɔ gɔ hi gaa Bɛt dimgaasɛ: an kalde kpas wɛ, hi kpas wɔ hi gi yɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ, hi biskpas wɔ gɔ hi lehi, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ bis hinwook hi gbɔnɔ hi Bɛt ha̧a̧tigɔ be. Hin wɛrɛ hii bɛr nɛ an nɛ woo, wɛɛ bɔnɛ ɔɔ hin zaadɛ wɔ hi zɛ̧ɛ̧r nɛ wookɔ.
Farisaya wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Anyɔ ha̧a̧nɛ ɗɔɔtillɛl rɔbɛ biitir wɔ a mɔk-silluk wɔ hi du. Wɛɛ gin ha̧a̧k an hi zagl di hi boonɛ a luum wɔ ha.
Ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Anyɔ nɛ gi an loor yɔ dood gɔ hi gbɛnig gɛ hi ɛmbik hage hi taa mɛɛko.
Bɛtmaakdɔkya za
a Hingokya , hin wɛrɛ mɔ dɔktugo, mɔ niik wii hɛw.
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧:
a hɔɔ, ya̧a̧rhant gis nɛɛ hɛw, Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ! Nɛ gbaasig dood hinɗɔmn yɔ gɔ gi yɛ̧rihi a zulha. Wɛɛ nɛya, nɛ ɓi̧i̧ hinɗɔmn bɔ hi naanwal nɛ mɔɔt nɛ zaŋ gɛ.
Ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ! Anyɔ nɛ wɔŋk Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ baa nɛ hi gbɔ̧hi nɛ loorya̧. Anyɔ hii hi gbɔm nɛ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ be, nɛɛ be, nɛ gi loorya̧ wɔ wɔŋko,
yɔ anbɔ nɛ zuunik a yɔ nɛ gbɛn baa nɛ wɔ woosya̧ wɛɛ bɛsinbɛs hɛw.
Ya̧a̧ gii Bɛt hinmɛɛkɔ gi raa: a be yààsihi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkyaadɛ; hi gbɔm zaadɛ be, hi zɛksil zaadɛ be.
Yɔ anbɔ hi gbaas dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ ɔ̧ti gi zul dɔglɛ a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ ga̧a̧mya̧ wɔ hi gubr hɛbtdi hi dɔŋg sɛw, ga̧a̧m yɔ baar guk a waalyɛɛliki.

Gi yɛɛl dɔgl-gbaak a Abɛl ga̧a̧m muulɛ gi tuur a Zakariya ɔnɛ bɔ muulɔ. Zakariya yɔ hi gbɔŋge a Bɛtluk lɛl bɔ ge hi Bɛtmaaksɛŋk bɔ teesya̧ bɔ gedu. Hɔɔ, yɔ anbɔ be raasinɛ, dood wɔ ɓɔri hi gbaasihi dɔgl a zulgbɔŋk wɔ dɔŋgɔ sɛw.
Ya̧a̧rhant gisinɛ, nɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɛ hi Farisaya wɛ! Anyɔ nɛ́ ha̧s hinmɛɛk gboorins bɔ, wɛɛ nɛ gūl hi zul nɛ gedu gɛ, wɛɛ nɛ̍ a̧a̧n wɔ ha̧a̧hi nɛ gulk be.
Yɔ Yeesu tuuz a duhɔ, Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi Farisaya wɔ hi yɛɛlig ɓɔ̧ɔ̧k hi dɔglɛ. Hi ɛrig hin kittɔnɔ.
Hi goo an hi tolig hi dɔglɛ an hi lag dɔgl zaadɛ ha̧a̧l a gi ya̧a̧ du an kuudu hi gbaasig dɔgl hi wa̧a̧nige.
Yɔ hin wɔrɔ hi daak sɛwi, saalzanɔ kittɔnɔ kittɔnɔ hi mɔksugo hi wɛɛ hi ɗa̧a̧tingo dɔɔ, Yeesu yɛɛl walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ raaki:
a oon zul nɛ hi Farisaya wɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧tya̧ wɔ gi kpoos mɛlya ha̧a̧lɛ.
Hinza gɛdya taa an hi ɔɔg midigɔ, wɛɛ hinza yaatilya taa an hi ɔɔg mɛksigɔ be.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, hinyɔ nɛ dɔg a lɛlwil du hi lag hinɔ lag a lɛlgaal du. Wɛɛ hinyɔ nɛ raatin tɔn du a luk du, hi wɛɛ hi dɔg hinɔ dɔg a luk zulha.
Yeesu raa a be gisin raako, nɛɛ saam be wɛ:
bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ dood wɔ hi gbɔŋk muulɛ. Wɛɛ gɔ kuudu hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ hinza gɔk gɛ.
Bé zunsin za̧a̧nyɔ hoob gɔ gi ha̧a̧nge. Hoob ha̧a̧nɛg Bɛto, za̧a̧nyɔ gin tɛŋk an gi gbɔmɔ, kuudu gi wɛɛ gi yaa laazɛŋk du. Hɔɔ, be raasinɛ a hoob yɛgi ha̧a̧n za̧a̧nɔ giya.
Wɛ taa zebtig zaw nɔɔnɛ hi tus dɛɛt eer ya? Yɛrɛ nɔɔs wɔrɔ zaaya̧ gbun hi zɛ̄nig a Bɛt muutdu gɛ.
Susug nɛ wɔ zulha hɛw Bɛt ɓɛrihi sɛw. Bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧n ma. Nɛ gis Bɛt hinɗɔbt daar zaw kittɔnɔ daarɔ.
Be wɛɛ be gisin dɔko a za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi dɔg dɔgl be a dood muut du, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gii gi dɔg za̧a̧nɔ dɔglɔ a Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ muutdu be.
Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi faabe a dood muutdu, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gii gi faa za̧a̧nɔ a Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi muutdu be.
Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi zulha, Bɛt gi bitsig ya̧a̧ha̧a̧lɔ bɔ boo dɔglɔ. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Bɛt Mɔkil zulha, Bɛt taasig ya̧a̧ha̧a̧lɔ yɔ boo bisugo.

Gɔ hi wà̧à̧nɛ hi ka̧nɛ a Yahuduyaadɛ mɔksilya̧ luk wɔ gedu hi a waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi muutdu, hi a dood gbɔlɛ wɔ hi muutdu, bɔnɛ zɛks zul nɛ a hinyɔ gɔ nɛ dɔg geha. Bɔnɛ mɔkɔ a bé goo dɔglɔ a ri? Zaabe a be dɔg hinɔ a nɔ?
Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gii gi goksin hinyɔ gɔ nɛ dɔg ɓɔrbɔ.
Za̧a̧n za raa Yeesu a saal tees bɔ gedu:
a Hingokya , raam yɛ̧ɛ̧be gi gɛ̧ɛ̧ rɔɔs bɔ hi ɔsiwi hi beya.
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
a walyɔ, bɔ gbaab dɔgl-gbɛɛrikya nɛ hi rɔɔs nɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧kya nɔ?
Wɛɛ
a oon zul nɛ bɛttɔnɔ hi rɔɔs ɗɔkum yɔ gi sɛw. Rɔɔs ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi oo doo za̧a̧tig gɛ, an dag nɛ rɔɔsɔ an nɔ hɛw.
Wɛɛ dɔksihi ya̧a̧daaniki:
a doo za rɔɔsya giro, gi dak lees a bakɔ wɔ bal gedu gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Wɛɛ mɔk gi kpoos du, raa: a be woo nɔ yɔ? Wɛɛ be taan lɛlɛ an be mɔks lees be wɔ du be!
Raa: a hinyɔ gɔ be gɔ gɛrɛ: ɔbe ɛ̧br bil be wɔ, be wɛɛ be wɔm bil gbɔlɛ kittɔnɔ, be mɔks tot be sɛw hi lees be wɔ sɛw a gedu.
Kuudu be wɛɛ be raa ma kol be: a kol be, mɔ gin rɔɔs gbɔɔltɔnɔ an mɔ za̧a̧n wɛl kittɔnɔ. Holumɔ, lemɔ, yɔ̧mɔ, dagum hato.
Hɔnɛ Bɛt wɛɛ
Gi anbɔ hi za̧a̧nyɔ gi mɔktsig zulɔ rɔɔsɛ, wɛɛ taa rɔɔsya a Bɛt ge.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a ya̧a̧nɛ, be gisin raako: a bɔ kol gi tuunɛ a lees yɔ ha̧a̧n lek an nɛ za̧a̧n gi dɔŋgo, hi gbandil yɔ gɔ nɛ hegɔ nɛ oon muul nɛ gi dɔŋgo.
Kol daar leesɛ, muul be daar gbandili.
Seen ga̧a̧ni-ga̧a̧ni wɔ hi taa hinluko, hi taa ɓɛrko, hi taan hin-gbaak lɛlɛ, hi taan bilɛ, wɛɛ Bɛt gihi kaŋkig be. Nɛɛ nɛ taa hinɗɔbt nɛ daar nɔɔs wɔ gbɔɔltɔnɔ gɛ ya?
Bɔ za̧a̧nɔ a nɛ teesdu ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi zibs za̧a̧tigɔ yɛms kaasi a koltuun dɔŋg nɔ?
Yɛrɛ yɔ nɛ́ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ hinza wook kaasiwaanɔ gɛ, kol gin tuuk nɔ a hin zaadɛ wɔ hi dɔŋgo?
Seenɛ an tɛ̧ɛ̧kɔ̧ɔ̧r gbɔlɛ bɛtɛ wɔ hɛt du gɔ hi kɔ̧ɔ̧ko hi woowoos gɛ, wɛɛ hi ɓoo kunsig an hi gɔ gbandil gɛ. Yɛrɛ be raasinɛ: a Sulemaanu hɛw hi gbɔlumsɔ sɛw, hēg gbandil bɛt an zaaya̧ gɛ.
An nɛɛko, Bɛt heks hɛt wɔ gɔ hi yaahi laa du yoosig gbandil bɛti, Bɛt gii gi ɔs nɛɛ gbandil hek ya? Nɛɛ ɗɔbsil fɛŋya wɛ!
Yɛrɛ nɛya, bɔnɛ ɓɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ nɛ le hi hinyɔ gɔ nɛ yɔ̧, wɛɛ bɔ kol gi tuunɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ hin wɛrɛ sɛw, dood waal du sɛw hii wɛɛ hi gihi ɓɛɛko. Baa nɛ mɛɛ a ha̧a̧n hinɔ hɛw.
Yɛɛlin nɛ woos Bɛt wáátɔ hin kete, kuudu Bɛt gi wɛɛ gi goktsin hin wɛrɛ ha.
Bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧nɛ, tam wɔ nɛ kit gɛ, Baa nɛ yɔ bɛtha harig an gi gaanɛ wáátɔ.

Zebrin hinyɔ nɛ ginɔ, nɛ gaa ya̧a̧rya wɔ tus bɔ nɛ dagɔ an gaasɛ. Tɛɛsin zul nɛ tus duk yɔ gɔ haŋks gɛ. Dagin rɔɔs yɔ bɛtha gɔ yɔ̧ɔ̧s gɛ. Luur gɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b lɛlɔge gɛ, wɛɛ ga̧a̧r ɗɛɛ an gi ha̧tir hin a lɛlɔge gɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, lɛlyɔ rɔɔs nɛ gi ge, kpoos nɛ gi lɛlɔge be.
Wɔn see nɛ hi hi̧i̧lwɛɛlɛ an nɛ woo Bɛt woosɔ hi pitila nɛ kpooki.
Wɛɛn an dood wɔ hi ook an ɗɛntya̧ yɔ gɔ gi wɛɛz a lottins naab lɛlɛ gi bɛɛ gbɔnɔ ɓaako hi gborsige.
Hat gi a gbaarɛ wɔ ɗɛntya̧ gɔ gi tuurɔ gi zɛ̧hi lɔl hi. Be raasin rɔbo: gɔ gi anbɔ gi wɔb seeɔ hi hi̧i̧lwɛɛlɛ an gi woosihi woosɛ, gi wɛɛ gi elihi an hi zaa hi ɗɔɔtɔ gi gaahi lees hi le.
Gi tuur a yɛms teesdu, zaabe a kɔɔkekil eesim bɔ gedu, zaabe a kɔɔkekil taasum bɔ gedu gi zɛm gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gig ooko, hi dag hato.
Mɛɛn bɛttɔnɔ a à ɗɛnt raatya bɔ mɛɛ nɛ ɔ̧tyɔ luur gɔ gi zaa du, yɔ kɔm nɛ lɔlɛ, yɔ ɔ̄ɔ̄nɛ luur an gi gul hi tɛŋk a gi raa du gɛ.
Nɛɛ hɛw, oondi bed, gɔ gi anbɔ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi zaa a ɔ̧tyɔ nɛ mɔk gɛ gedu.
Piyɛr war Yeesu :
a Waar i, ya̧a̧daanik bɔrɔ mɔ dɔksig wii ya, nɛ rɛ mɔ dɔksig dood sɛw ya ri?
Waar Yeesu wɛɛ raa:
a gbaar za lɛl-ookya gi giro, gi gis ɗɛntɔ hin wook rɔbtɔnɔ hi hinmɛɛki, ɗɛntɔ bɔ gi gbaage a doodɔ hi zulha an gi gaahi lees ya̧nɛ a ɔ̧tyɔ rii an hi dag duge sɛw.
Hat gi a gbaar yɔ ɗɛntɔ bɔ gɔ gi zaa gi zɛŋge gi wook anbɔ ge!
Be raasin rɔbo: gi gbaa gbaar bɔ a rɔɔsɔ bɔ zulɔ hage sɛw.
Wɛɛ gbaarɔ bɔ gi raa a gi kpoos du a ɗɛnt be zaakɔ bɔ gi aŋk-amɔ, gi yɛɛl gbaarɛ walɛ wɔ hi nɛɛd wɔ lɛki, gi wɛɛ gi gbosig hinleki hi yɔ̧ki, wɛɛ gi bum wɔnik be.
Gɔ gi anbɔ gbaar bɔrɔ ɗɛntɔ bɔ gi zaak a ɔ̧tyɔ taa ook gɛ gedu hi ɔ̧tyɔ mɛɛ gɛ gedu. Gɔ gi zɛŋg anbɔ gi wa̧a̧ge gi dɛ̧ɛ̧lig du eerɛ, gi gaag lɛl ɔnɛ hi mɛlya wɔ.
Gbaarwal bɔ mɛɛ hinyɔ ɗɛntɔ gɔ ha̧a̧ge, gi gɛms hinza gɛ, gi wɛɛ gi woo hinyɔ ɗɛntɔ ha̧a̧ge gɛ, ɗɛntɔ gi raa dood hi wa̧a̧g hi lɛge dɔɔ kittɔnɔ.

Yɛrɛ gbaarwal yɔ mɛɛ hinyɔ ɗɛntɔ ha̧a̧g gɛ, gi woo hinyɔ rii an gi dag ya̧a̧rhant lɛlɔge, hi lɛg kaasi. Za̧a̧nyɔ hi gaag hin gbɔɔltɔnɔ, hí ɛrig gbɔɔltɔnɔ be; za̧a̧nyɔ hi gaag hin gbɔɔltɔnɔ an gi woo, hi ɛrig hinyɔ tɔɔ gi daarɔ.
Be zaa an be gbaa laa a hɛbtdi. À laa bɔ kab nɛ gaati, yɔ bɛsibe!
Bɛtmɛm yɔ gɔ be loo, giro. Be gin hoobo gi tuur an hinɔ gi da̧a̧.
Nɛ mɔk a be zaa an be kamz boolum hɛbtdi ya? Ɛ̧-ɛ̧, be dɔksinɛ: be zaa an be kamz gɛksilyɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, yɛɛl ɓɔryɔ, dood nɔɔn a raa gbun du hí gɛ̧ɛ̧ya; dood taarɛ hi gbaatin hi dood eerɛ; wɛɛ dood eerɛ wɔ be hi gbaatin hi dood taarɛ wɔ be. Hi gɛ̧ɛ̧ytinu.
Baa gi gbaatin hi waawalɔ, waawal bɔ be gi gbaatin hi baatɔ; nàa gi gbaatin hi waasiŋ, waasiŋ be gi gbaatin hi nɔɔtɔ; wal nàaɔ gi gbaatin hi yaatɔ, yaatɔ be gi gbaatin hi wal nàaɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa dood saal wɔ:
a gɔ nɛ bɛɛ kuus za gbɛnik gi ɗunzig a ɔ̧tleki, nɛ raa a bɛl gi naaŋgɔ; hinɔ gɔ tuur anbɔ be.
Wɛɛ gɔ nɛ gbɛn zɛk bɔ a ɔ̧tkazig-naanyɛ̧l gi fɛko, nɛ raa a lɛl gi sa̧a̧sa̧. Yɔ anbɔ hinɔ gii gi tuuruko.
Nɛɛ dood mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, nɛ mɛɛ hɛbtdi hi bɛtha woosɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧ki, yɛrɛ ɔnɛ nɔ nɛ mɛɛ ɔ̧tyɔ gi ɓɔryɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧kɔ gɛ nɔ?
Wɛɛ a bɔ dɔŋg ɔnɛ nɛ gɛ̧ks hinyɔ rii hi zul nɛ gɛ?

Ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ mɔ gi rek gbɔnɔ du hi za̧a̧nyɔ nɛ gbaatin elo a za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ nɛ yɛ̧ɛ̧ dɔgl ge, tɛm boolum hi gii a gbɔnɔ bɔ gedu an bɔgi ka̧mɔ a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya bɔ ge, gii gi ka̧mɔ gi gaa laaya ɔ̧ɔ̧ naan du gi ka̧m gi yaam luknɔ du.
Be gisum raako: mɔ́ tòò tus fɛŋwaa bɔ gɔ hi dɛ̧ɛ̧sumɔ sɛw, ɓɔr mɔ ɔɔ tuuk a duhɔ.
A ya̧a̧gbun bɔ gedu dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi nɛ dihɔ hi fɔks Yeesu hinyɔ turs Galileya zaadɛ wɔ Pilatu gbɔmɔ gi wɔɔg ga̧a̧mya̧ hi maakya̧ nam wɔ ga̧a̧mya̧.
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧hi:
a nɛ mɔk a yɔ Galileya wɔrɔ hi yɔ̧ ya̧a̧r anbɔ, hinha̧a̧lya̧ daar Galileya zaadɛ wɔ ya̧nɛ daar ya?
Ɛ̧-ɛ̧, yɛrɛ be dɔgsinɛ: nɛ́ zɛmr kpoos nɛ gɛ, nɛ sɛw, nɛ́ wag an Galileya wɔrɔ hi wag be.
Yɛrɛ dood koobl daa gɛ̧ɛ̧s wɔ luk hɔɔt bɔ a Silowe ɛ̧bsihi muulɛ gi gbɔ̧hi, nɛ mɔk a hi daarin dood Urusalimaya zaadɛ wɔ sɛw hinha̧a̧l daarin ya?
Lab gɛ. Be gisin dɔko: gid nɛ zɛmr kpoos nɛ gɛ, nɛ sɛw, nɛ wag an hiya.
Yeesu raa ya̧a̧daanik yɛrɛ hɛw:
a wal za da rɛɛ nɛ yɔmntnɔɔ a gi tɛ̧ɛ̧bak du. Wal bɔ zaa ma an gi hà̧b humlɔ bɔ, wɛɛ zɛm hum gɛ.
Hɔnɛ wɛɛ raa tɛ̧ɛ̧bak-ookya bɔ: a yɛrɛ tuur wɛl taarɛ be zaak yɔmntnɔɔ bɔ humlɔ tɛko be zɛm gɛ, dɛ̧ɛ̧mɔge, gi yɛ̧ktig lɛl bɔ a nɔ tɔsi!
Tɛ̧ɛ̧bak-ookya bɔ
kinsa kuudu gi hum be, gi hum gɛ, mɔ́ dɛ̧ɛ̧ge.
Yeesu gi nɛ hingok a mɔksilluk zaa gbun du a holum-ɔ̧ti.
Hɔnɛ nis za gidu gin loorɛ a muul du wɛɛnig zaŋgd wɛl kooblɛ daa gɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ. Gi waak totigi, ɗɛɛ an gi ɗund gi er ha gɛ zaŋ.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛnige, elig
a nisyɔ, gums yɛrɛ ha̧̍tir mɔ muulɛ, tuutu.
Wɛɛ gbaasig naan muulɛ, ɓɔrbɔ nis bɔ wɛɛ yu̧u̧ er ha zab, baan Bɛto.
Hɔnɛyɔ mɔksillukzulya bɔ gbɛn Yeesu gi za̧a̧s doo a holum-ɔ̧ti, nɔɔgnɔ, wɛɛ raa dood saal wɔ:
a woosyɛms gi ɔ̧t nɔɔngbunu, zaan hi za̧a̧sin a ɔ̧t wɔrɔ lab gedu. Bɔnɛ zaa a holum-ɔ̧ti!
Waar Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
a dood mɛlya ha̧a̧l wɛ, a nɛ teesdu rɛ, an bɔ sɛw gɔ pid naaɔ, zaabe pɛɛzimɔ, kāŋge yɔ̧nig mɛm a holum-ɔ̧t gɛ ya?
Nis yɛrɛ gi a Àbraham zaŋgd du, Saydanu wɔg wɛl koobl daa gɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ a ba̧a̧ntus du. Nɛ taa an hi pidsig ba̧a̧ntus yɛrɛ a holum-ɔ̧t ya?
Yɔ Yeesu dɔg hin bɔrɔ anbɔ, dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi gabs hi gii sɛw, seem ha̧a̧hiha̧. Wɛɛ dood saal sɛw hi dag hat a hin gbɔlɛ wɔ woo sɛw gi dɔŋgo.
Yɔ anbɔ, Yeesu wɛɛ
a Bɛt wáátɔ riitin hi nɔ? Be gòksinge nɔ?
Bɛt wáátɔ riitin hi sitahi lɛŋksyɔ doo za loo gi re gi lug a gi bak du; lɛŋks bɔ pirɔ, hɔɔ wɛɛ tɛ̧ɛ̧. Nɔɔs wɔ a bɛtha hi zaa hi nɛbt zɛko hi waa ya̧a̧nɔ wɔ gedu.
Wɛɛ raa ɓɛ:
a be gòksin Bɛt wáátɔ hi nɔ ɓɛ?
Riitin hi hɛ̧ɛ̧t yɔ nis loo gi goo a goonis du dɔɔ taarɛ gi ya̧a̧g hi zumɛ an gi ɗuksige.
Yeesu daar waal gbɔlɛ wɔ hi raat dɛɛt wɔ gi hingoko yɔ gi rek a Urusalima.
Yɔ anbɔ za̧a̧nza ɛrige:
a Hingokya , dood wɔ gɔ hi za̧a̧ hi gi kaasi ya?
Yeesu ta̧a̧hi:
a tɛn hi tɛŋko an nɛ gul a gbɔnɔ ɓɔ̧ɔ̧yyik bɔrɔ gedu. Ya̧a̧nɛ, be gisin raako: a dood kittɔnɔ hí ɓɛɛ an hi gul gedu, wɛɛ hí ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ.
Za̧a̧n raatya bɔ gɔ gi ɗund gi kpɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɔnɔ bɔ, nɛɛ yɔ nɛ gi lakdi nɛ yɛɛl gbɔnɔ ɓaaki nɛ elɔ: a ɗɛntyɔ, ɗɛntyɔ, kpɛ̧rsiwi gbɔnɔ. Giigi ta̧a̧: a be mɛ̄ɛ̄ lɛlyɔ nɛ fu̧u̧z du gɛ.
Hɔnɛ nɛ wɛɛ nɛ yɛɛl raaki: a wi lehin hi mɔya, wi yɔ̧ hi mɔya, mɔ goks dood hin a wi gbɔnɔ nɔɔ wɔ hi du. Kɔmri mɔ raawi nɛɛk a mɔ mɛɛw gɛ?
Giigi wɛɛ gi ta̧a̧: a be dɔgsinɛ a be mɛɛ lɛlyɔ nɛ fu̧u̧z du gɛ. Sɔɔn du nɛ sɛw, nɛɛ dood hinha̧a̧lwookya wɛ.
A hɔ ro, nɛ gbuu kaalɛ, nɛ ɓals nuŋgo. Gɔ nɛ gbɛn Abraham hi Isaaku hi Yakuba hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ sɛw a Bɛt wáát du, wɛɛ nɛɛ be hi bisin lakdi hɔ ma wɔdɔg.
Dood hí fu̧u̧z a ɔ̧tkazigi, a ɔ̧tleki, a ɔ̧tkazig naanrɔbo hi ɔ̧tkazig naanyɛ̧li hi ɗɔɔt hi hinlek a Bɛt wáát du.
Yɛrɛ kuudɛ wɔ zaadɛya̧ be hi wɛɛ doosɛ, doosɛ wɔ zaadɛya̧ be hi wɛɛ kuudɛ.
A ɔ̧t gbun bɔ gedu Farisaya zaadɛ hi zaa hi raa Yeesu :
a Hirudus gig ha̧a̧k an gi gbɔ̧mɔ; tuum, mɔ rekɔ.
Gii wɛɛ goohi:
a rekin nɛ raas bɛrtɔkgɛ bɔrɔ a yɛrɛ be ninik loorɛha̧a̧lɛ, be wɛɛ be gi za̧a̧sig gumtil wɔ nɛɛko hi yoosugo, be da̧a̧s woos be a ɔ̧t taasum bɔ gedu.
Yɛrɛ gi an be ɛmb nɛɛko, yoosugo hi lɔrɔ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya gi wɔr a Urusalima lak gɛ.
Urusalima, Urusalima! Mɔ gbɔŋk Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ, mɔ gbɔŋk dood wɔ Bɛt gɔ yaasinɛhi hi beto. Be tɛk dood mɔ wɔ dɔɔ kittɔnɔ kittɔnɔ an be mɔksihi an kɔɔnɔɔ gɔ gi buuk waatɔ a pakir du, wɛɛ nɛ iinɔ.
Nɛ yɛrɛ raat nɛ gi kɔm beemɛ. Be gisin dɔk rɔbo: nɛ taab zaa gbɛnko, gi tuur an nɛ
Yɔ Yeesu gul a mɔksillukya zaa yɔ gi Farisaya raa du a holum-ɔ̧ti an gi lehinɛ, Farisaya zaadɛ wɔ hi gig seeko.
Yɔ anbɔ, wal za yɔ gums hubs muulɔ, zaa nɛ gi erk a gi muut du.
Yeesu war Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi Farisaya wɔ:
a maak wɛ raa a ri? Raa a hi za̧a̧s doo a holum-ɔ̧t ya, raa gɛ ya ri?
Wɔrɔ hi kɔm hititi. Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu wɛɛ yaa naan a wal bɔ gi muulɛ, za̧a̧sige, wɛɛ yaage rekɔ.
Kuudu wɛɛ
a bɔ waawalɔ, zaabe naaɔ gi mat a zɛŋk du a holum-ɔ̧ti gi ha̧sig ɓɔrbɔ gɛ?
Wɔrɔ hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ hinza gook a dɔgl bɔrɔ hage gɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn dood wɔ hi elihi nɛ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧k ɗɔɔtillɛl rɔbɛ biitir wɔ, dɔksihi ya̧a̧daaniki,
a za̧a̧n za gi elum a lootinslees lɛlɛ, bɔmɔ ɗɔɔt a doo gbɔɔl ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ. Nɛ kinsa doo za gbɔɔl gi a wɔrɔ hi elihi teesɔ du daar mɔya mɔ mɛɛ gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, an bɔ za̧a̧nyɔ elin nɛ eer sɛw gi zaa gi raamɔ: a ɔsum za̧a̧n yɛrɛ lɛlɛ, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ ha̧a̧seem ɗukugɔ a lɛl bɔ ge an mɔ rek mɔ ɗɔɔt a lɛl yɔ̧ɔ̧sum bɔ ge.

Yɛrɛ gɔ gi elum anbɔ, rekum mɔ ɗɔɔt a ɗɔɔtillɛl kuud bɔ ge. Gɔ gi anbɔ za̧a̧nyɔ elum gɔ gi zaa, gi raamɔ: a sa̧a̧ɔ, zaam hɛdi, mɔ ɗɔɔt a ɗɔɔtillɛl rɔb bɔ ge! Ɓɔr ma mɔ dag gbɔlumsɛ a dood wɔ hi lekhin hi mɔɔ hi muutdu sɛw.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ tɔɔs zulɔ, hi tiisige. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ tiis zulɔ be, hi dɔɔsige.
Yeesu wɛɛ raa za̧a̧n bɔ elzige:

a gɔ mɔ gi gɛmsig lees lurkumi, zaabe lees lɛɛsumgbari, bɔmɔ el saam mɔ hiya; zaabe, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mɔ hiya; zaabe, dood mɔ hiya; zaabe, namɔza wɔ hi gin rɔɔsɛ, an bɔ hii be hi elum ɔ̧tza hi wɛnsum hinyɔ riitin hi mɔnɛ bɔ.
Yɛrɛ gɔ mɔ gɛmsig naablees gbɔɔlɛ, elum ya̧a̧rya wɔ, dood zaŋgdɛ wɔ, dɔɔ-wɔlya wɔ hi yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ wɔ mɔ gaahi.
Yɔ anbɔ anyɔ dood wɔ hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi wɛnsum hinyɔ mɔ gaahi gi riitin gɛ, hat gi a mɔɔ. Yɔ anbɔ, hí toomɔ a hinrɔbɛgɔkya wɔ rɛmtigya̧ bɔ ɔ̧tɔ ge.
Dood wɔ hi ɗɔɔtig hi Yeesu yɔ zaaya̧ gbun kɛm dɔgl bɔrɔ, raa Yeesu :
a hat gi a za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi le kok a Bɛt wáát duge.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu
a doo za gɛms lees gbɔɔltɔnɔ, wɛɛ elz dood kittɔnɔ.
Yɔ lees bɔ lekɔ rii, yaa gbaarwalɔ raa dood wɔ hi elihi nɛ: a zaanɛ, hi gɛms lees sɛw da̧a̧da̧ ma.
Yɔ anbɔ hi sɛw hi yɛɛls zulya̧ hindɔk gbunu gbunu: doos bɔ
Eesum bɔ raa: a be zeb naa kooblɛ, gi an be rek be goohi hinbanuko, bɔgi nɔɔmɔ. Be zɔ̧mɔ, da mɔ raa za̧a̧n leesya bɔ a be ɗɛɛ zaak gɛ.
Taasum bɔ raa: a gɛ be loo nis ɓɔryɔ, yɔ anbɔ be ɗɛɛ zaak ma gɛ.
Gbaarwal bɔ wɛɛ a ɗɛntɔ bɔ ge fɔksig dɔglya̧ sɛw. Hɔnɛyɔ ɗɛntɔ raatya bɔ lag anbɔ kpoosɔ gi nɔɔge, wɛɛ
Gbaar wal bɔ rekɔ, elzihi hi zaa, ɗɔɔtillɛl zɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ. Wɛɛ raa ɗɛntɔ bɔ: a ɗɛntyɔ, hinyɔ mɔ raa, be woo gɔ. Yɛrɛ lɛl zɛ̧ɛ̧r giste.
Ɗɛnt bɔ wɛɛ raa gbaar walɔ bɔ: a rekum a gbɔnɔnɔɔ wɔ hɛt du hi gbɔnɔ waat wɔ hi fɔb a rɔkilya̧ wɔ hi du, dood wɔ gɔ mɔ zɛ̧hi sɛw, fɛ̧ɛ̧mɔhi hi zaa an ráá be gi hi̧i̧sɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ be gisin raako: a dood wɔ be elihi nɛ hi inɔ, zaaya̧ gbun taa lees be dako.
Yɔ dood saal gbɔlɛ hi retingo hi Yeesu , Yeesu wɛɛ zɛmrɔ
a za̧a̧nyɔ zaa beege gi ı̄n baatɔ, hi nɔɔtɔ, hi nistɔ, hi waatɔ, hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧, hi siŋdɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi kolɔ hɛw gɛ, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi wɛɛ fɔkya be gɛ.
Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ pɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧rɔ gi fɔbzibe gɛ, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi wɛɛ fɔkya be gɛ.
Ɔnɛ bɔ za̧a̧nɔ ha̧a̧ge a nɛ teesdu an gi wɔm luk hɔɔti gi ɗɔɔt gi dɛ̧ɛ̧t hinyɔ gɔ gi tuus gi zulha an gi sɔ̧ɔ̧ hinyɔ gɔ gi da̧a̧sin kɛn gɛ!
Ya̧a̧nɛ, kinsa gɔ gi sɛŋg luk sɛŋk bɔ gi ɗɛɛ da̧a̧sig gɛ; dood wɔ gɔ hi gbɛnig sɛw hi yɛɛlig kpɛ̧ɛ̧liki,
hi
Zaabe, bɔ nɛ wáár gbɔɔlɔ gi gin dood duk kooblɛ gí rek nɔk gɔk hi wáár za dɔɔmi, gi ɗɔ̄ɔ̄t gi sēē an kinsa gi ɗɛɛ nɔk bɔ gɔkɔ hi dood duk yɔ̧ɔ̧lgbun wɔ hi zaak an hi dagtin hi gii kɛn gɛ!
Gi táā an gi ɗɛɛ nɔk bɔ gɔk hi waar zaabɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b zaak ket gɛ, yɔ yaasig tɔmsɔyaadɛ an hi re hi ɛrig boolumi.
Gbunɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ ɔɔ hinyɔ gin sɛw gɛ, ɗɛɛ an gi wɛɛ fɔkya be gɛ.
Manda gi hinrɔbo, wɛɛ à ti̧i̧ gɛ, yɔ hi wɛɛ hi ti̧i̧singe nɔ?
Wɛɛ bɛ̄r an gi yɔ̧kt hinza a hɛbtdi gɛ, wɛɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi ɔksin naahutu gi bɛs lees a bak du gɛ. Hí bisig ma di tɔs. An za̧a̧nyɔ gin tɔn an gi kɛmɔ, gi kɛmɔ.
Tooszekya wɔ hi hinha̧a̧l wookya wɔ sɛw hi sɛ̧ɛ̧buko an hi laks Yeesu dɔglɔ bɔ gi booko.
Wɛɛ yɔ Farisaya wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi dɔntɔ hi raa:
a wal yɛrɛ gɔ ta̧a̧ hinha̧a̧lya wɔ wɛɛ lehin hi hiya.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu yɔ mɛɛ anbɔ, wɛɛ dɔgsihi ya̧a̧daanik yɛrɛ:
a bɔ za̧a̧nɔ a nɛ teesdu gi gin tam yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ, zaa gbun gi wagɔ, yɔ ɔ̄ɔ̄ tam dumbili naanza daatɔ naanza wɔ a hɛtdɔŋ du, yɔ tɛbz bɔrɔ wag an gi midzig gɛ ya?
À midzig be, yɔ pɛɛz baŋk ha yɔ kamz hi hato.
Gɔ yɔ wɛɛz raa du, yɔ èl saamɔ wɔ hi naaza hii yɔ
Be gisin raako: hat gi gi anbɔ a bɛtha gid hinha̧a̧lya gbun gi zɛmr kpoosɔ, daar dood dumbili naanza daatɔ naanza wɔ hi gi hinrɔbɛ wookya wɔ hā̧ā̧hi kpoosya̧ zɛmrik gɛ.
Bɔ nisɔ gi gin tus gaat kooblɛ, zaa gbun gi wagɔ, taa an gi kpoo laa a pitila du gi hɛd luk bɔ gi tɛb rɔbtɔnɔ an gi mid ya?
À midige, yɔ el naaza wɔ hi waatingo lɛlgbunu, hi saamɔ hiya yɔ
Be gisin dɔk gbunɔ giya: a hat gi a Bɛtwalɛ-sɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi muutdu anbɔ lab be a hinha̧a̧lya bɔ zɛmr kpoosɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Yeesu wɛɛ dɔg ɓɛ:
a wal za gin waat walɛ eerɛ.
Wans bɔ ɛr baatɔ: a baa, gaabe rɔɔs yɔ gi nɛ zul benɛ. Baaya̧ loo rɔɔs bɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧sihi.
Kuudu yɔ ɔ̧t zaadɛ hi talɔ, waawal wans bɔ mɔks rɔɔsɔ wɔ gin sɛw, tuu rek rɔ̀bs a waal hɛmlɛ, ha̧tirz rɔɔsɔ wɔ a zɛlk du sɛw, a lɛlɔge.
Yɔ daan rɔɔsɔ wɔ gi da̧a̧ sɛwi, tɔs ha̧a̧l tuur gɔ hɛbt bɔ gedu, yaala yɛɛl ya̧a̧rha̧a̧ko.
Rek wooswook gɔ a dood wɔ hi gi a hɛbt bɔ gedu zaaɔ ge. Za̧a̧n bɔ yaag gi bak du a gi re gi oosig habɔ wɔ.
gii be, yɔ rekɔ, a̧a̧kil bɔ gig ha̧a̧k be ha̧a̧ge an gi tɔk hinza kos wɔ hab gɔ hi tɔko an gi hi̧i̧sin buuɔ; wɛɛ doo za mɔ̄k an gi gaag lees gɛ be.
Yɔ mɔkilhin gi mid zulɔ, raa: a yɛrɛ baa be gin woosya kittɔnɔ, hi gin lees gbɔɔltɔnɔ, hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi da̧a̧s gɛ be, bee be a̧a̧kig a hɛdi be!
Ɔbe ɗukɔ be rek a baa be ge be
Be tuur doo rɔb an mɔ elib a be waa mɔɔn ma gɛ; yɛrɛ gbààbè an woosya mɔ zaa.
Wala bɔ ɗukɔ wɛɛ baatɔ ge. Yɔ gi zaak hɛmltɔnɔ baatɔ gi gbɛnige a lakyɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ, mɛɛsig ya̧a̧rɛ, nɔɔ rek dagige, kɔtige wɛɛ zɔŋge ya̧a̧gbarɔ.
Waawal bɔ
Hɔnɛ baatɔ raa woosɔya wɔ: a kamzin dimnaan yɔ bɛr gi daar zaadɛ wɔ sɛw nɔɔko nɛ heksige, hi banawaa nɛ heksig a naan du hi taal a dɔɔ du.
Kamzin naabaa doolɛ, gbɛɛrinɛge an wɛ tɔbɔ wɛ dagin hato.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, waa be wal yɛrɛ da wɔɔrɔ, yɛrɛ wɛɛ rɛmlɔ, da waagɔ, be wɛɛ be zolige. Hi wɛɛ hi mɛ̀ɛ̀s ma naabo hi dagin hat gɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ waawal gbɔɔl bɔ da giz nɛ a bako gi zaak be. Yɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b a raaya̧di gi lag hi ɓaak sumlɛ, hi waŋg ulko, hi hinnako.
El woosya zaa gbunu ɛrig hinyɔ gi daako.
Woosya bɔ
Yɔ waa gbɔɔl bɔ lag anbɔ kpoosɔ nɔɔgnɔ, ha̧a̧g gulik raa du ma gɛ. Yɔ baatɔ lagɔ tuuz zaa zɔ̧ge an gi gul raa du.

Hɔnɛ waawal wɛɛ ta̧a̧ge: a baa, kɛmɔ! Be woosum woos wɛl kittɔnɔ. Hinyɔ mɔ raab sɛw, be wookwo; be tāl ya̧a̧ mɔɔn ɔ̧tza gɛ. Wɛɛ mɔ gaabe nɛ iswaa zaa an be gbɛɛrɔ be tɔb hi nabeza zaadɛ an wi dagn hat gɛ. Nɔ ma nɔ?
Yɛrɛ waa mɔ bɔ ha̧dzir rɔɔs mɔ a zɛlklɛlɛ hi nɛɛd kaatɛ ha̧a̧lɛ wɔ, gi wɛɛ gi wɛɛza, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gbɛrs gii ma naabaa doolɛ!
Baatɔ
Yɛrɛ yɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ yɛrɛ wɔɔrɔ, gi wɛɛ gi rɛmlɔ, waagɔ gi wɛɛ gi midzɔ, yɔ anbɔ ginɛ an wɛ dag hato hi seet lɛlgbun sɛw.
Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a doo za rɔɔsya gin rɔɔs-ookya. Hi zaa hi raas za̧a̧n rɔɔsya bɔ: a rɔɔs mɔ ookya bɔ gi ha̧tirgo rɔɔs mɔ ha̧tiro.
Ɗɛnt rɔɔsya bɔ elige;
Rɔɔs-ookya bɔ mɔk a gi kpoos du: a be woo nɔ? Yɛrɛ ɗɛnt be gib ha̧sig a rɔɔs-ook woos bɔ gedu be. Hinbalki, be dɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ, ɛɛlik a doo dɔŋdi be, seem gi ha̧a̧bha̧.
Hɔɔ, yɛrɛ be mɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ be woo an gɔ hi ha̧sib a woos du, dood hi dagib a hi raa du.
El belkya wɔ a ɗɛntɔ bɔ ge sɛw gbunu gbunu. Ɛr doos bɔ: a ɗɛnt be gim fɔk baari?
Bɔrɔ ta̧a̧: a kurum tik yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ. Rɔɔs-ookya bɔ
Wɛɛ ɛr zaabɔ: a ɗɛnt be gim fɔk baari? Bɔrɔ ta̧a̧ a tot saa wɔbl yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ. Rɔɔs-ookya bɔ
Ɗɛnt bɔ baan rɔɔsɔ-ookya ha̧a̧l bɔ yɔ woo wɔɔsɔ hi kɛ̧ɛ̧tigɔ giya. Ya̧a̧nɛ, dood waalduya hi daarin dood wɔ hi gi a lɛlgaal du wooswook hi kɛ̧ɛ̧tig a hi tees du.
Yɛrɛ bee be gin raako: a dagsin zul nɛ sa̧a̧mɛ hi rɔɔs ha̧a̧l yɔ waal du. Rɔɔs nɛ bɔ gɔ gi da̧a̧, hi loonɛ a waabil lɛlyɔ gɔ hi waa faa gedu.
Za̧a̧nyɔ woo hinrɔbo hi hin fɛŋwaa, gi woo hinrɔb be hi hin gbɔɔlɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ woo ha̧a̧lɛ hi hin fɛŋwaa, gi woo hinha̧a̧l woo hi hin gbɔɔl bɔ be.
Gid nɛ́ wōō rɔbtɔnɔ hi rɔɔs ha̧a̧l yɔ waal du gɛ, bɔ gi gaan rɔɔs rɔb bɔ an nɛ oo nɔ?
Wɛɛ gid nɛ́ wōōs doo za rɔbtɔnɔ hi rɔɔsɔ yɔ gin gɛ, bɔ gi gaan rɔɔs yɔ gɔ gigi nɛnɛ?
Doo za taa an gi woos ɗɛntɛ eer woosɛ. Yɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧n zaa gbun lɔlɛ, yɔ wɛɛ yɔ ha̧a̧g zaabɔ gi muulɛ. Yɔ ɗɔbs zaa gbunu, wɛɛ yɔ bɔ̧ɔ̧ zaa gbunu. Ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an nɛ woos Bɛt woosɛ hi tus woos a ya̧a̧ gbun du gɛ.
Farisaya wɔ hi ɗɔkingo tusɛ yɔ hi kɛm dɔgl wɔrɔ sɛwi, hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧l Yeesu kpɛ̧ɛ̧lɔ.
Yeesu yɔ lag anbɔ
a ha̧a̧n wɛɛk dood rɔbɛ a dood muutdu, wɛɛ Bɛt mɛɛ kpoos nɛ be. Yɔ anbɔ hinyɔ dood hi seek an hin gbɔɔlɛ, hinɔ gi hin bɔbtini a Bɛt muutdu.

Muusa maakɔ yɔ gaahi hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ ɗɛɛrwolya̧ wɔ hi amɔ tuur a Yohana Bɛtmɛm Hotingoya bɔ wɛlɔ yɛɛl woosɔ gedu. A wɛlɔ gedu ro hi yɛɛl Bɛt wáátɔ Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ gi booko. An bɔ ɓɛ gi tɛk hi tɛŋko an gi gul a Bɛt wáát bɔ gedu.
Bɛtha hi hɛbtdi da̧a̧kya̧ gi ɓaa gɛ, hi anyɔ Bɛtmaak dɔglɔ bi̧i̧sɔ za fɛŋ gi ha̧sɔ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ yaa nisɔ gi wɛɛ gi lootin hi zaa dɔɔmi, gɔ mansyɔ; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ lootin hi nis zayɔ waltɔ bisige, gɔ mansyɔ.
Doo za rɔɔsya giro, heg gbandil ɗaktil hob muulɛ. Ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw gi hat dako, wɛɛ gi lees hɛmntɛ leko.
Doo za ya̧a̧rya nuŋgɔ a Laazar, nɔk yɔ̧ɔ̧s muulɔ ɓodgo gi kusig a doo waar bɔ gi luk gbarɔ,
an gi sɛ̧ɛ̧k kok rumnt wɔ doo rɔɔsya bɔ gi mɛlsugo gi le. Kaa wɔ be, hi zaa hi gi nɔkɔ wɔ ɗɛktilgo be.
Yɔ rii, ya̧a̧rya bɔ Laazar wɔrɔ, Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi zaa hi pɛɛge hi kaŋg a Abraham dɔŋdi a bɛtha. Doo waar bɔ be wɔr be, hi pɛɛ hi i̧i̧ge.
Yɔ kolɔ tuur a wɔrkɛ ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ, a lɛlyɔ gi ya̧a̧ryɔ̧k duge, pɛɛ lɔlɔ wɛɛha, gbɛn Abraham hɛmltɔnɔ, Laazar gi ɗɔɔtig gi dɔŋdi.
Ɓooya̧a̧: a baa Abraham, mɛɛsibe ya̧a̧rɛ! Be gi yɔ̧kya̧a̧r gɛrɛ a laazebt yɛrɛ gedu! Yaam Laazar gi bɔɔz naanwalɔ mɛm du gi zaa gi saŋktsinbe mɛl be.

Abraham ta̧a̧: a waa be, mɔkum mɔ mɛɛ a yɔ mɔ giz za̧a̧til a waal du mɔ dag rɔɔs gbɔɔltɔnɔ. Wɛɛ Laazar yɔ giz nɛ za̧a̧til a waal du be, dag ya̧a̧rhant gbɔɔltɔnɔ. Yɛrɛ hi rɔɔgrɔ ma hɛdi. Wɛɛ mɔɔ be, mɔ ya̧a̧ryɔ̧k gɛrɛ be.

A hinɔ gedu sɛw, yɛrɛ hi gbaa zɛŋk gbɔɔl dubt gi a wɛ tees du hi mɔya. Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧ge an gi ɗuk wiige dihɛ gi tal nɛɛge, zaabe za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧ge an gi ɗugz a nɛɛge hɔ gi taz a wiige hɛdi yɔ ɗɛɛ gɛ.
Wal rɔɔsya bɔ
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be hi gi hɔ nɔɔnɛ, gi fɔksihi hin sɛw, an bɔhi zaa a ya̧a̧ryɔ̧klɛl yɛrɛ gedu hɛw.
Abraham wɛɛ ta̧a̧ge: a hi gin Muusa maakdɔglɔ hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ dɔglya̧ wɔ hi bi̧i̧, gi an hi kɛmsihi.
Wal rɔɔsya bɔ goo: a ɛ̧-ɛ̧, baa Àbraham, an doo za wɔrki rek a hi, yɔ hi kɛmsige, hí zɛmr kpoosya̧.
Abraham wɛɛ
Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a hinwɔ gɔ hi mat dood a hinha̧a̧l du hí giro, hinza ɗɛɛ an gi ya̧a̧n gɛ. Yɛrɛ ya̧a̧rhant gis za̧a̧nyɔ mat dood a hinha̧a̧l du.
An hi ha̧bs nɛ za̧a̧nɔ naal gbɔɔl durk du hi bisig a mɛmbal du yɔ bɛsig gi daarɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ gi mat ya̧a̧mwaa zaa gbun a hinha̧a̧l du.
Oon zul nɛ! Yɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ gi gɔ hinha̧a̧lɛ, biglumɔge, gid zɛmr kpoosɔ gi dɛmnaanɛ, bitsumɔg dɔglɔ.
Wɛɛ gid gɔsum hinha̧a̧l dɔɔ nɔɔn-erɛ a ɔ̧t gbun bɔ gedu, gi wɛɛ gi zaak mɔɔge dɔɔ nɔɔn-er be gi naandɛŋko, gi raak a be zɛmr kpoos be, bitsumɔg dɔglɔ.
Tɔmsya wɔ hi wɛɛ hi war Yeesu :
a goksiwi ɗɔbsig bɔ zaaɔ du.
Waar Yeesu raa:
a an nɛ ɗɔbs kaasiwaanɔ an sitahi lɛŋksɛ, à nɛ raa yɔmntnɔɔ yɛrɛ a duyumɔ mɔ rek mɔ rɛɛy a mɛmbal gbɔɔl du, tɛ̧ɛ̧ bɔ yɔ lagsinɛ.
Bɔ za̧a̧nɔ a nɛ teesdu gin woosɔya yɔ gisig hinbalko zaabe gi gisig tamɔ nɛɛko gi fu̧u̧z bako gi
Nɛ taa an gi
Za̧a̧nɔ yɔ baan woosɔya bɔ anyɔ woo hinyɔ raag ya?
Yɔ anbɔ, nɛɛ be, gɔ nɛ woo hinyɔ Bɛt raanɛ sɛw gi da̧a̧, dɔginɛ: a be gi woosya hɛ̧ɛ̧ryɔ, be woo hinyɔ gi nɛ an be woo gii kpɔd.
Yɔ Yeesu gi rek a Urusalima, daa a Samariya teesdu hi Galile.
Anyɔ gi gulik a raat za du, ɗobtilyaadɛ kooblɛ hi zaa hi dagige. Hi er hɛmltɔnɔ,
hi ɓooya̧a̧ hi
a Yeesu , Hingokya , mɛɛsiwi ya̧a̧rɛ!
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛnihi
a rekin nɛ zuun muul nɛ a Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ hi.
Wɛɛ yɔ hi gi reko, ɗobtilya̧ bɔ da̧a̧ gɔ.
Zaaya̧ gbun bɔ bɛɛ gbɛnik ɗobtilɔ bɔ gi da̧a̧, wɛɛ wɛɛz a Yeesu ge gi baanik Bɛt nɔɔha hi ya̧a̧ɓooki.
Zaa zagl a Yeesu dɔŋdi baanige. Walɔ gi doo Samariyayayɔ.
Yeesu warɔ:
a nɛ dood koobl hi za̧a̧ ma mi, yɛrɛ zaadɛ wɔ naanza hi gaay ma nɔ?
Záá mɔ̄kɔ̄ an gi wɛɛz gi baan Bɛt gɛ, gɛ rɔ̀b yɛrɛ kpɔdi?
Kuudu wɛɛ raa wal bɔ:
a ɗukumɔ mɔ rekɔ, ɗɔbsig mɔ za̧a̧sumza̧a̧sɔ.
Farisaya wɔ hi war Yeesu :
a Bɛt wáátɔ gi zaak bil nɔ?
Gii ta̧a̧:
a zaakɔ bɔ taa an hi gbɛnige;
wɛɛ taa an hi
Yeesu wɛɛ raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a ɔ̧t zaadɛ hi tuurɔ, a ɔ̧tya̧ gedu, gi ha̧a̧nɛ an nɛ gbɛn Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ ɔ̧tɔ wɔrɔ zaaɔ, wɛɛ taa an nɛ gbɛn be.
À ɔ̧tɔge hí raanɛ: a gi hɔ, zaabe gi hɛ. Gɔ hi raan anbɔ, bɔnɛ rekɔ, bɔnɛ fɔhi.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, bɛl ya̧bsɔ gɔ gi ya̧ko, gi wɛɛ gi gaak dɔŋdu an ɔ̧ti gi tuur a dɔŋg zaa, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi gi anbɔ be a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ gi zaak gedu.
Yɛrɛ gi an gi ha̧a̧ya̧a̧r gbɔɔltɔnɔ kete, dood wɔ hi gi ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ hi wɛɛ hi inige.
Hinyɔ tuur nɛ a Nɔwe waabilɔ bɔ gedu, hinɔ gii gi tuur a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ ɔ̧tɔge be.
Dood hi hinleko, hi yɔ̧ko, hi wɛɛ hi lootingo, tuur a ɔ̧t yɔ Nɔwe gul a lɛmb duge. Mɛm gbɔɔl tuu hi̧i̧s hɛbto, gbɔm dood sɛw.
Hinyɔ tuur a Ludu waakɔ bɔ gedu, hinɔ gi tuur anbɔ be. Dood hi hinleko, hi yɔ̧ko, hi zek wɔdɛ, hi zebrik wɔdɛ, hi tɛ̧ɛ̧ rɛɛko, hi luk wɔŋko.
Yɛrɛyɔ Ludu tuu a Sodɔma, a ɔ̧t gbun bɔ gedu laa hobbuu naŋg a bɛtha an bɛlɛ gbɔm dood sɛw.
Hinɔ gi tuur anbɔ be a ɔ̧tyɔ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gɔ gi midz gedu.
A ɔ̧tɔge za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi gi a luk zulha, bɔgi siz a luk du an gi loo wɔdɔ gi renɔ. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi gi a bako, bɔgi wɛɛz nɛ raa du zaŋ.
Mɔkin nɛ mɛɛ Ludu nistɔ dɔglɔ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ tɛb an gi za̧a̧s kolɔ, gi waksige. Za̧a̧nyɔ waks kolɔ be, gi za̧a̧sige.
Be gisin dɔko: a gɔ gi gi a yɛmsɔ gedu, dood wɔ hi kusig a sil ha hi eerɛ, hi loo gbunu, hi ɔɔ gbunu.
Gid nɛɛd eerɛ hi tot naŋk a naal ha lɛlgbunu hi eerɛ hi loo gbunu hi ɔɔ gbunu. [
Gid walɛ eerɛ hi hinbalik a bako, hi loo gbunu hi ɔɔ gbunu. ]
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi warige:
a Waar i, hin wɔrɔ hi wooy lɛlɔ ay?
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧hi:
a lɛlyɔ hin wɔl gi ge, dukumnɔɔ hi mɔks lɛlɔge be.
Yeesu dɔksihi ya̧a̧daaniki an gi raasihi a gi an hi waa Bɛt zɔ̧ki, bɔhi mɔɔ.
anyɔ lɛ:
a doo za dɔgl-yɛ̧ɛ̧kya gi a waal za gbɔɔl du, hoobhā̧a̧g Bɛt gɛ, wɛɛ dɔglɔ taadu hi doo.
A waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu hɛw, kuur nɛɛ za gɔ gi waak zaak a ge gig raako: a gbaasiwi dɔglɛ hi za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g gbaatingo hi beya.
Dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya bɔ in dɔglɔ am be; kuudu wɛɛ mɔk a gi kpoos du: a an hoob taab Bɛt ha̧a̧k gɛ, wɛɛ dɔgl be gi taa du hi doo si̧,
yɛrɛ nis yɛrɛ gib waak mɔɔsugo ɔbe yɛ̧ɛ̧sig dɔgl bɔ an bɔgi waab zaak mɔɔsugo.
Waar Yeesu wɛɛ raa:
a kɛn hinyɔ dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya ha̧a̧l-wookya bɔ
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt taa an gi yɛ̧ɛ̧s dood wɔ herihi hi kaak a ge yɛms du hi lurk du sɛw dɔgl ya? Gi ɔɔhi hi am ket ya? Lab gɛ.
Be gisin dɔko: yɔ yɛ̧ɛ̧sihi dɔglya̧ nɔɔktɔnɔ. Yɛrɛ Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gɔ gi zaa, gı̄ zɛŋk dood wɔ hɛbtdi hi gi ɗɔbsig ya?
Yeesu wɛɛ dɔg ya̧a̧daanik zaa ɓɛ: a dood wɔ hi seek muulya̧ an hi doo riiti a Bɛt muutdu hi wɛɛ hi bɔ̧ɔ̧k dood zaadɛ hi zulɛ:
a dood eerɛ hi dɔɔ a Bɛtluk du an hi zɔ̧ Bɛto. Doo za gbunu gi Farisayayɔ, zaa gbun bɔ be gi tooszekyayɔ.
Farisaya bɔ erɔ zɔ̧bs zulɔ an yɛrɛ lɛ: a Bɛto, yɛrɛ be baanumɔ anyɔ be taa an dood zaadɛ. Ya̧nɛ hi gi dood luurɛ ha̧a̧lɛ, rɔɔsɗɔkumyaadɛ, ha̧a̧lgɔkyaadɛ, mansyaadɛ, zaabe an tooszekya yɛrɛ.
Be lilikhin ɔ̧t eerɛ a dimaas nuŋg sɛw, be gim gaas gaak a hinyɔ be dak gedu sɛw.
Hɔnɛ tooszekya bɔ er gi hɛmlɔ, mɔ̄k nɛ an gi pɛɛ lɔlɔ bɛtha hɛw gɛ; dɛm hɔŋgɔ
Be raasinɛ: yɔ wal eesum bɔrɔ gi tiik gi raa du, Bɛt bitsig hinha̧a̧lɔ da̧a̧da̧, taa Farisaya bɔ ɔnɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧ni tɔɔs zulɔ, hi tiisige, wɛɛ za̧a̧ni tiis zulɔ be, hi dɔɔsige.
Hɔnɛ dood hi kams Yeesu waatyɛ̧s wɔ hɛw an gi ki̧i̧hi gi rɔbsihi. Hɔnɛyɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi za̧br dood wɔ hi kamzig waatyɛ̧s wɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu wɛɛ elihi
a ɔɔn ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ hi zaa a beege, bɔnɛ a̧a̧nihi. Bɛt wáátɔ gi a dood wɔ hi gi an ya̧a̧mwaat hi, ya̧a̧nɛ.
Be gisin raak rɔbo: za̧a̧nyɔ ta̧a̧ Bɛt wáátɔ an ya̧a̧mwaa gɛ, taa gulik gedu nɛ zaŋ.
Yahuduya za waar war Yeesu :
a Hingokya rɔbo, be woo nɔ an be dag za̧a̧tig faa nɔ?
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
nɔ mɔ elib a rɔbo? Doo za taa rɔbo, gɛ Bɛt gi gbun kpɔd.
Mɔ mɛɛ Bɛtmaak wɔ hinɔ
Wal bɔ
a yɔ be gi ya̧a̧mi tuur ɓɔryɔ be woo hin wɔrɔ sɛw.
Yɔ Yeesu lag anbɔ labɔ,
a wagsum hin gbun ɓɛ. Rekum mɔ zebtir hinwɔ mɔ gin sɛw. Gɛ̧ɛ̧sum ya̧a̧rya wɔ tus bɔ, mɔ dag rɔɔs yɔ gi a bɛtha, kuudu mɔ zaa mɔ fɔbzibe.
Anyɔ wal bɔ gin rɔɔs gbɔɔltɔnɔ be, yɔ kɛm dɔgl wɔrɔ miimɔ.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛnig gi mimɔ,
a ɓaaɓa an doo rɔɔsya gi gul a Bɛt wáát du.
Ɓaaɓa an gɛloba gi gul a zel gɔ̧ɔ̧s du. Ɓaaɓa zaŋ be an doo rɔɔsya gi gul a Bɛt wáát ɗu.
Dood wɔ hi gisig dɔglɔ kɛŋko hi raa:
a nɛ bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi za̧a̧ ma ɔnɛ nɔ?
Yeesu ta̧a̧:
a hinyɔ ɗɛɛ doodɛ, ɗɛɛ Bɛt ɔnɛ gɛ.
Piyɛr raa:
a yɛrɛ wi ɔɔ hin sɛw wi fɔbz mɔya.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a be gisin raak rɔbo: a za̧a̧nyɔ ɗukɔ gi ɔɔ raaɔ, zaabe nisɔ, hindaɔ wɔ, hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧, baatɔ hi nɔɔtɔ, zaabe waatɔ a Bɛt wáát dɔŋgo,
gi dag hin wɔrɔ ɓɔryɔ gi daar gbɔɔltɔnɔ, gi wɛɛ gi dag za̧a̧tig faa a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ gi zaa kuudu gedu.
Yeesu el walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ koobl daa eerɛ a gi dɔŋdi
a yɛrɛ wɛ dɔɔk a Urusalima. Wɛɛ hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi zulha sɛw gi
Yɔ anbɔ hi looge hi gaage dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduya gɛ naan du hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lige, hi niige, hi wɛɛ hi tulsig set muulɛ.
Hi lɛmnig kpooti, hi gbɔŋge. Wɛɛ kuudu ɔ̧t taarɛ gi rɛmlɔ gi ɗukɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi kɛm hinza gedu gɛ. Hinɔ gisihi dɔgl yaatilya yɔ hi kɛm gbɔnɔɔ lɛl gɛ giya.
Anyɔ Yeesu re gi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik a Zeeriko, yɔ̧ɔ̧r za ɗɔɔt a gbɔnɔya̧ gi hinzɔ̧kugo.
Yɔ kɛm dood saal hi daako, ɛr hinɔ.
Hi raasig
a Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ gii gi daako.
Yɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ ɓooya̧a̧:
a Yeesu Dawda waawalɔ, mɛɛsibe ya̧a̧rɛ!
Wɔ hi gi dork nɛko hi ya̧a̧lig an gi waksɔ, gii wɛɛ ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ ɓɛ:
a Dawda waawalɔ, mɛɛsibe ya̧a̧rɛ!
Yeesu erɔ,
a ha̧a̧m an be woosum nɔ?
Gii wɛɛ ta̧a̧:
a Waar i, ha̧a̧be an be gbɛnlɔlɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a gbɛnumlɔlɛ, ɗɔbsig mɔ za̧a̧sumza̧a̧sɔ.
Ɓɔrbɔ wal bɔ gbɛnlɔlɛ, wɛɛ fɔ Yeesu gi baanik Bɛt nɔɔha. Dood wɔ hi gbɛn hin bɔrɔ sɛw anbɔ, hi baan Bɛt gɔ.
Yeesu gul a Zeeriko, wɛɛ gi talk a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu.
Wal za tooszekya gbɔɔl giro nuŋgɔ a Zakeyus, gi doo rɔɔsya.
Gi ɓɛɛk an gi gbɛn Yeesu , wɛɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi gbɛnig a saal kit bɔ gedu gɛ, gii be, lɔɔbɔ.
Nɔɔ dor doosɛ da kar a yɔmntnɔɔ ha an gi gbɛn Yeesu gɔ gi daako.
Yɔ Yeesu tuur a lɛl bɔ ge
a Zakeyus, sizum nɔɔko. Yɛrɛ be yok a mɔ raa du nɛɛko.
Zakeyus sil nɔɔktɔnɔ dagige hi hato.
Yɔ dood hi gbɛn anbɔ hi dɔnt hi raako:
a Yeesu rek sil a doo hin-ha̧a̧lya lɛl du!
Zakeyus er a Waar Yeesu muutdu
a Waar i, yɛrɛ be gɛ̧ɛ̧k rɔɔs be teesdu hi ya̧a̧rya wɔ; gid be gɔs doo za hin gi bɛr gɛ, gid be loo doo za wɔd hi maato, be wɛnsig du dɔɔ nasɔ.
Yeesu
a za̧a̧tig taazɔ a raa yɛrɛ gedu nɛɛko, anyɔ za̧a̧nɔ gi Abraham waaɔ hɛw.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ zaa an gi ɓɛɛ dood wɔ hi wagɔ gi za̧a̧sihi.
Yɔ dood wɔ hi lag dɔgl wɔrɔ, anyɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik a Urusalima gid hi mɔ̀k a gi an Bɛt wáátɔ gi midz ɓɔrsɛ̧ɛ̧lyɔ, Yeesu wɛɛ dɔgsihi ya̧a̧daaniki,
raa
a doo za nablɛ, rek a hɛbt za hɛmlɛ an gi dag waar umsɛ gi wɛɛ gi wɛɛza.
El gbaarwalɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ kooblɛ a zaadɛ teesdu, gaahi tus gaat yɔ hi gɔn hɛɛlmɔt gbunu gbunu hi sɛw,
Hɔnɛ dood wɔ a waal bɔ gedu hi hɛ̧ɛ̧nig lɔlɛ, hi yaa dood a gi kuudu an hi re hi raa: a hā̧a̧w an wal bɔrɔ gi wɛɛ waar a wi zulha gɛ.
Bɔrɔ yɔ dag waar ums bɔ wɛɛ wɛɛz a gi hɛbtdu, el woosɔya wɔ gaahi nɛ tusɛ an hi zemn wɔd hi riŋnɔ an gi mɛɛ hinyɔ hi dag ha gi daarɔ.
Woosya biitir bɔ zaa
Ɗɛnt bɔ
Eesum bɔ zaa
Ɗɛnt bɔ
Zaabɔ zaa
Beya hoobha̧a̧b mɔɔ ha̧a̧, be mɛɛ a mɔ gi doo kpoos ɓaatilya; mɔ look hinyɔ mɔ gbaa gɛ, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ ɓɛrk tot yɔ mɔ lug gɛ.
Ɗɛnt bɔ
Nɛ nɔ mɔ gbāā tus be bɔ belk a tus luk du an be zaa be loo hi zaa ha gɛ?!
Wɛɛ raa wɔ hi gidi: a loon tus bɔ gi ge, wɛɛn nɛ gaa za̧a̧nyɔ gin tus kooblɛ! [
Hi
Wɛɛ ta̧a̧: a be gisin raako: hi gaa za̧a̧nyɔ ginɔ, wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ da gin nɛ fɛŋ be, hi ha̧s fɛŋgɔwaa bɔ da gin nɛ hɛw.
Yɛrɛ kamzin dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gib lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nuko, dood wɔ hā̧ā̧hi an be wɛɛ waar hi zulha gɛ, nɛ gbɔ̧hi be lɔlgbar hɛ.
Yeesu yɔ dɔg anbɔ wɛɛ dor a saal wɔ hi muutdu dɔɔ a Urusalima.
Yɔ Yeesu gi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik tuurik a Baytifaaze hi a Betani, a ga̧a̧t yɔ gɔ hi el a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧ti ge, yaa walɛsɛrɛ wɔ zaadɛya̧ eerɛ,
a rekin raat bɔ gi nɛ muutdu bɔ ge, gɔ nɛ gulɔ, nɛ zɛm hi ha̧b pɛɛzum waa za yɔ doo za kadir hage gɛ, nɛ pidige nɛ kamzig dihɛ.
Doo za gi warinɛ a nɛ gig pidig nɔ? Nɛ ta̧a̧ge: a ha̧a̧ Ɗɛnt bɔ ga.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi yaahi tɔmsɛ, hi rek hi zɛm anyɔ Yeesu
Yɔ hi rek hi pidig pɛɛzum waa bɔ, pɛɛ-zumya wɔ hi warɔ:
a nɛ gig pidig nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧:
a ha̧a̧ Ɗɛnt bɔ ga.
Hi kamz pɛɛzum waa bɔ hi ɓuu gbandilya̧ gi yɛl ha, hi kas Yeesu ɗɔɔt ha.
Yɔ gi reko, dood hi ɓuu gbandilya̧ a gbɔnɔ du.
Yɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b tuurik a Urusalima, a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧t bɔ tiisɔ ge, fɔkya wɔ saalya̧ sɛw hi dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ. Hi yɛɛl Bɛt baanik hi ya̧a̧ɓolti, hi gɛrs gbɔlɛ wɔ hi gbɛn nɛ sɛw.
Hi dɔko:
a an Waar Bɛt gi rɔbs Waar yɔ gi zaak a gi nuŋg du! Saŋtum gi a bɛtha, gbɔlums gi a Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl ge.
Farisaya zaadɛ wɔ hi gi a saal tees bɔ gedu hi raa Yeesu :
a Hingokya , ya̧a̧lum fɔkya mɔ wɛrɛ!
Gii wɛɛ ta̧a̧:
a be raasinɛ, an fɔkya be wɔ hi waks ya̧a̧boonɛ, bet wɔ yɔ hi kaaka.
Anyɔ Yeesu re gi sɛ̧ɛ̧b a waal gbɔɔl bɔ dɔŋgɔdi gi gbɛnige, kaa gi zulha
a à mɔɔ hɛw, mɔ mɛɛ nɛ hinyɔ gɔ gaam saŋtum mɔ dɔgl a ɔ̧t wɛrɛ gedu nɛɛko, yɔ bɛsibe! Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ, hinɔ yaat a mɔ lɔlgbarɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, ɔ̧tya̧ hi gisum zaako, dood wɔ hi book nɔk hi mɔɔ hi zaa gedu hi gɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ hi nɔk wɔdɛ, hi gɔ̧ɔ̧num wɔmto, hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ, hi ɓɔ̧ɔ̧m lɛl sɛw.
Anyɔ mɔ́ mɛ̄ks ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt zaa du a mɔɔge an gi ɗaasum gɛ, hi nuumɔ hi waat mɔ hii duhɔ, hi taasum bet gòksil ɔɔk gbunu a zaa ha.
Yeesu re gul a Bɛtluk du, yɔ zɛm dood hinriŋsya wɔ duhɔ, yɛɛlihi niŋki.
Raa:
a hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du: a luk be gi wɛɛ zɔ̧k luko. Yɛrɛ nɛɛ nɛ wɛɛn luurɛ wa̧lɔ.
Gi hingok ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw a Bɛtluk du. Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaak-dɔkya wɔ hi dood gbɔlɛ wɔ hi tɛk an hi gbɔm Yeesu.
Wɛɛ hi mɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ hi woo gɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ dood sɛw hi gis Yeesu dɔglɔ waak kɛŋki; hā̧ā̧hi an dɔgl za gbun gi wagihi gɛ.
Ɔ̧tza ma Yeesu gis dood hingok a Bɛtluk du, gi Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ dɔglɔ dɔko. Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi zaa, hi warige:
a raasiwi tɛŋk yɔ mɔ woonik hin wɛrɛ, hi za̧a̧nyɔ gaam gbɔnɔ!
Yeesu ta̧a̧hi:
a bee hɛw, ɔbe warin hin gbunu.
Raasinbe za̧a̧nyɔ yaaz Yohana an gi hotin dood Bɛtmɛmɛ. Bɛt gii yaazig ya, dood yaazig ya ri?
Hi watin hi teesdu anyɔ lɛ:
a à wɛ raa a Bɛt giya, yɔ raa a nɛ ɔɔg nɔ ɗɔbsugo?
Wɛɛ à wɛ raa a dood yaazig be, anyɔ dood sɛw hi ɗɔbsig Yohana a gi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkyayɔ, gɔ hi lag a wɛ ta̧a̧ anbɔ, hi duunɛ beto an wɛ wɔrɔ.
Hi wɛɛ hi ta̧a̧ gɔ ma:
a wi mɛ̄ɛ̄ za̧a̧nyɔ yaazig an gi hotin dood Bɛtmɛm gɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a nɛ gi labɔ, bee be taasin dɔk tɛŋk yɔ be woonik hin wɔrɔ be!
Yeesu yɛls dood wɔ ya̧a̧daanik yɛrɛ dɔki:
a doo za gbaa tɛ̧ɛ̧ humlya bako, waar in tɛ̧ɛ̧-ookya wɔ naan du, rek am a hɛbt za.
Yɔ tɛ̧ɛ̧ huml wɔ hi ɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧kɔ gi rı̄ı̄, yaaz gbaarɔ zaa a tɛ̧ɛ̧-ookya wɔ hi an hi ha̧bsig huml ɔ̧ɔ̧tɛ wɔ hi kamsige. Tɛ̧ɛ̧-ookya wɔ hi wa̧a̧ gbaar bɔ hi lɛge, hi yaag naan ɗɛndilɛ.
Wɛɛ yaa gbaar za dɔɔmi; wɔrɔ hi wa̧a̧ge hi lɛge, hi niige, hi yaag naan ɗɛndil ɓɛ.
Wɛɛ yaa gbaar za taasim ɓɛ. Wɔrɔ hi gaag nɔko, hi wɛɛ hi bisig lakɛ.
Tɛ̧ɛ̧bak zulya bɔ raa: a be gɔ nɔ yɔ? Ɔbe yaa waa be yɔ ha̧a̧b gi muulɛ, kinsa hi ɗɔbsig ɔnɛ be!
Hɔnɛyɔ tɛ̧ɛ̧-ookya wɔ hi gbɛn waaɔ bɔ zaako, hi watin hi tees du: a za̧a̧n bɔ gɔ gi yɛr bak bɔ kuudu gii yɔ, ɗɛn wɛ rek wɛ wa̧a̧ge wɛ gbɔŋge, an tɛ̧ɛ̧ wɔ hi wɛɛ wɛnɛ.
Hi wa̧a̧ge hi tuunig a bak tɔlya̧ hi gbɔŋge. Yɔ anbɔ tɛ̧ɛ̧bak zulya bɔ yɔ gɔsihi nɔ?
Yɔ zaa an gi gbɔm tɛ̧ɛ̧huml-ookya wɔrɔ, an gi wɛɛ gi yɛn tɛ̧ɛ̧-ookya zaadɛ.
Yɔ dood wɔ hi kɛm anbɔ hi raa:
a an Bɛt gi a̧a̧nɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧hi, raa:
a hin yɛrɛ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du rɛ, wadigɔ gi ri: a bet yɔ wɔŋkya wɔ hi bisige, gii wɛɛ bet gbɔɔl tɛŋkya a lɛl yoogil bɔ hi gbaag gedu.
Za̧a̧nyɔ mat a bet bɔ hage muulɔ gi belkɔ. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ bet bɔrɔ mɛɛ gi muulɛ, muulɔ gi hɔnɔ.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi kɛm a Yeesu dɔg ya̧a̧daanik bɔrɔ hi zulha, hi tɛb an hi wa̧a̧g ɓɔrbɔ, wɛɛ hoobha̧a̧hi dood be.
Hi yɛɛl Yeesu ooki; hi yaa dood gɛdyaadɛ an hi kuutige, zɛnɛya̧ hi wɛɛn muutya̧ an hi gi dood hinrɔb wookyaadɛ an hi ton Yeesu dɔglɛ hi wa̧a̧ge hi gaa hɛbtzulya bɔ naan du hi a gi tɛŋk du.
Dood wɔ hi zaa hi warige:
a Hingokya , wi mɛɛ a mɔ dɔk hinɛ, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ hingok hi gbɔnɔ, wɛɛ mɔ taa dood seek a muut du; mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gok Bɛt gbɔnɔ ɔnɛ anyɔ fɔbɔ.
Gbɔnɔ gi an wɛ too toos a Waar Romaya bɔ Kaysara ge ya, taa ya ri?
Yɔ Yeesu mɛɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧tigya̧, ta̧a̧hi:
a zunsibe tus gaat gbunu. Yɔ hi zunsige, warɔ: a bɔ muut yɛrɛ hi hinyɔ hi bi̧i̧ du nɔ?
Hi ta̧a̧:
a Kaysara ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a toosin Kaysara hinyɔ ginɔ; toosin Bɛt hinyɔ gin be.
Yɔ anbɔ hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi raa a dɔg hinza a̧a̧bi a dood lɔlgbar ma gɛ. Hinɔ gook bɔ kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ, hi wɛɛ hi kɔm ma sob.
Sadukiya wɔ gɔ hi raak a wɔrkɛ hi taa zaa rɛmluko, hi sɔɔ hi war Yeesu :
a Hingokya , hinyɔ Muusa bi̧i̧siw gɛrɛ: a doo za gi wɔrɔ gi ɔɔ nisɔ gi taan waa gɛ, yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ yɛgi lootin hi nis bɔ an gi daks hindaɔ wɔrk bɔ waato.
Walɛ zaadɛ hi mɔɔhi buu gbun du hi nɔɔn-erɛ. Gbɔɔl bɔ loo nisɛ, wɔrɔ, ɔ̄ɔ̄ waat gɛ,
eesim bɔ yɛr nis bɔ.
Kuudu taasum bɔ yɛr nis bɔ. Hinɔ tuur anbɔ hi nɔɔn-er sɛw, hi wɔrɔ, hi ɔ̄ɔ̄ waat gɛ.
Gɔ ma nis bɔ wɔr gɔ be.
Anyɔ nis gbun bɔ lootin hi walɛ nɔɔn-er wɔ sɛw, gɔ gi rɛmtig ɔ̧ti, a teesya̧ bɔ gedu rɛ, nis bɔ gi gi bɔ ɔnɛ nɔ?
Yeesu ta̧a̧hi:
a walɛ wɔ hi nɛɛd wɔ ɓɔryɔ hi lootingo.
Yɛrɛ wɔ gɔ hi zɛ̧hi hi rii an hi dag wɔrkɛ rɛmtig a ɔ̧tɔ ge hi wɛɛ hi za̧a̧ a waal bɔ gɔ gi zaa kuudu gedu, hi taa nis looko, hi taa wal looko.
Yɔ anbɔ taa an hi wɔr zaa ma ya̧nɛ. Hi riitin an Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ , hi gi Bɛt waatɔ, anyɔ hi ɗund a wɔrk du.
Muusa raa hinɔ gii gaattɔnɔ a wɔrkɛ hi rɛml hi kolɛ hi ɗundɔ. Dɔgl yɔ Muusa bi̧i̧ a kuusa laazebtya bɔ dɔglɔ gedu gi raa: a Waar Bɛt gi Abraham Bɛto, Isaaku Bɛto hi Yakuba Bɛto.
Bɛt ɔnɛ taa wɔrkɛ Bɛto, gi dood za̧a̧til wɔ Bɛt ya̧a̧nɛ. Yɔ anbɔ dood sɛw hi gisig za̧a̧ko.
Bɛtmaakdɔkya zaadɛ hi ta̧a̧:
a Hingokya , mɔ dɔg hin bɔrɔ rɔbo.
Yɔ anbɔ an gɔ hi wɛɛ hi warig hinza ɓɛ, hi warig ma gɛ, hoobha̧a̧hiha̧.
Hɔnɛ Yeesu warihi:
a ri dood hi dɔk a Masihu bɔ gi Dawda waawal gii nɔ?
Dawda hi zulɔ dɔg a ɗɛɛrwol Zaabura du: a Waar Bɛt raa Waar be: a ɗɔɔtum be naanrɔbo,
gi tuur an be gbàà yɔ̧lhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya mɔ wɔ hi wɛɛ dɔɔ mɔ ɗa̧a̧klɛlɛ.
An Dawda el Masihu bɔ a Waar be, Waar ɔ yɔ wɛɛsig waaɔ ri ma nɔ?
Yɔ dood wɔ hi gis Yeesu dɔglɔ kɛnk sɛwi, Yeesu raa walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:

a oon zul nɛ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ ha̧a̧hi gbandil gbɔɔl hek an hi ɛmbinu, wɔ ha̧a̧hi an dood hi zagl di hi boohi a luumha, gi wɛɛ gi ha̧a̧hi ɗɔɔtillɛl rɔbɛ biitir wɔ a mɔksilluk du, hi ɗɔɔtillɛl rɔbɛ wɔ a leeslɛl du.
Hi lek kuurɛ nɛɛd wɔ raatya̧, hi zɔ̧k Bɛt zi̧i̧tɔnɔ an dood hi gbɛnihi du be. Hí gbaas dood wɔrɔ dɔgl gi daarlɛlɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu gi a Bɛtluk du pɛɛ lɔlɔ gbɛn dood rɔɔsya hi yaak tus gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi gaak Bɛt gaasɛ a tusyaak lɛl bɔ gedu.
Yɔ wɛɛ gi gbɛn kuurnɛɛ ya̧a̧ryawaa za gi yaak tus dɛɛt eerɛ a tusyaak lɛl bɔ gedu,
a be gisin dɔk rɔbo, kuur ya̧a̧ryawaa yɛrɛ gaa gaasɔ daar dood zaadɛ sɛw.
Waar ɛ wɔ ya̧nɛ hi ɓeg tus kaasi a rɔɔsya̧ gbɔlɛ wɔ gedu hi gaa gaasɛ. Yɛrɛ kuur ya̧a̧rya bɔ ɔnɛ gaa hinyɔ gin nɛ sɛw an gi len zulɔ giya.
Anyɔ dood zaadɛ hi book Bɛtluk bɔ dɔglɔ hi raak a bɛrkɔ hi betɔ bɛtɛ wɔ hi wɔmnɔ, hi gaas wɔ hi gaak Bɛto, Yeesu
a ɔ̧t zaadɛ wɔ gɔ hi zaa gedu, hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnik yɔ, bet gbunu taa zɛ̧ɛ̧rik a bet zaa ha. Hi sɛw hí ɛ̧btirɔ.
Dood wɔ hi warige:
a Hingokya , hin wɔrɔ lab hinya̧ hí tuur bili? Hin wɔrɔ gɔ hi tuurɔ, hi mɛɛnik nɔ?
Yeesu ta̧a̧:
a oon zul nɛ an bɔhi maatin hi wagsin gbɔnɔ. Gɔ gi anbɔ dood kittɔnɔ hi zaa a be nuŋg du hi raa: a bee Masihu bɔ! Ɔ̧tɔ gi sɛ̧ɛ̧buko! Gɔ gi anbɔ bɔnɛ fɔhi.
Gɔ nɛ kɛm nɔkdɔgl gi booko, hi ya̧a̧ɓooliki, bɔnɛ bee. Yɔ anbɔ, gi an hin wɔrɔ hii hi tuur biitiri. Yɛrɛ gɔ gi anbɔ hinɔ taa waalda̧a̧k kete.
Wɛɛ dɔksihi:
a hɛbt gi ɗund gabs a hɛbt za zulha; waar gi ɗund gabs a waar za zulha.
Hɛbt gi naml ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ. Tɔsɛ hi gums bɔbtin zaadɛ hi giro a waal zaadɛ sɔmsɔm. Hinwɔ gɔ hi ha̧a̧shoobo hi gɛrs zaadɛ hinmɛksingoya wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a bɛtha hi giro.

Wɛɛ hin wɔrɔ gɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik tuuruko, hi wa̧a̧nɛ hi zɛksinɛ, hi gaan dood gbɔlɛ naan du hi gbaasin dɔglɛ a mɔksilluk wɔ hi du, hi wɛɛ hi yaan a luknɔ du. Hi ka̧n a waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi muut du, hi a hɛbtzulya wɔ hi muutdu a be dɔŋgo.
Hin bɔrɔ lab gii gi gaan gbɔnɔ an nɛ boo dɔgl be a dood muut du.
Mɛɛn nɛ kpoos du, bɔ kol gi tuun gi dor a hinyɔ gɔ nɛ dɔks zul nɛ hin hage.
Gɔ gi anbɔ bé gaan dɔglɛ hi hinmɛɛki an dood wɔ hi gin lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nik sɛw hi ɗɛɛ an hi faanɛ hi wɛɛ hi matinnɛ dɔgl gɛ.
Baa nɛ, hi nàà nɛ, hinda nɛ, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ nɛ, nɛsɛ nɛ wɔ, hi sa̧a̧m nɛ wɔ hɛw, hi loonɛ hi gaan dood naan du. Hi wɛɛ hi gbɔm zaadɛ a nɛ tees du.
Dood sɛw hi hɛ̧ɛ̧ninlɔlɛ a be nuŋg dɔŋgo.
Yɛrɛ susug nɛ gbun zulha taa wako.
Nɛ dag za̧a̧tig nɛnɛ hi hinmɔŋk nɛ.
Gɔ nɛ gbɛn laaya kit wɔ hi gɔ̧ɔ̧k Urusalima, mɛɛnɛ a ha̧tirgo ɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Gɔ gi anbɔ dood wɔ hi gi a Yahuduya nɔɔhi hi dɔɔ ga̧a̧ti; wɔ hi gi a Urusalima du be tuuhi. Wɛɛ dood wɔ hi gi a yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ, bɔhi wɛɛ a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, ɔ̧tɔ gi gi ya̧a̧rhant ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi wɛns dood hinha̧a̧lya̧ dɔɔrɔɔs gedu, bɔ lab gi an hinyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa sɛw gi
A ɔ̧tɔge ya̧a̧rhant gi gi a nɛɛd budaa wɔ hi nɛɛd wɔ hi gaak waat wa̧a̧l hi zulha. Yɔ anbɔ kosgumn gbɔɔl gi gi a hɛbt bɔ gedu, hi Bɛt nɔɔtigɔ a Israhilaya wɔ hi zulha.
Hi gbɔmnihi daŋbɛsim lɔmti, hi wa̧a̧hi an luknɔyaadɛ a dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaadɛ hi teesdu sɛw, wɛɛ dood hɛbtya dɔɔm wɔ hi ɗa̧a̧ Urusalima dɔɔ du gi tuur an ɔ̧tya̧ gi da̧a̧.

Gɛrs hinmɛksingoya hí gi a ɔ̧t du, a sɛɛ du hi a sɛwaat du. A waal du, kosgumn gi giro. Dood hɛbtya wɔ hi gin hoobo anyɔ gɔ hi mɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ hi woo gɛ. Kol gi tuuhi a mɛmbal gbɔɔl namsɔ bɔ hi mɛmɗukil wɔ namsya̧ hi dɔŋgo.
Dood hi wɔrko a hinyɔ hi ook an gɔ gi turs hɛbt hi dɔŋgo. Tɛŋk wɔ bɛtha sɛw hi bee.
Gɔ ma anbɔ hi gbɛn Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ ma zaak gɔ a kuus ha hi tɛŋko hi gbɔlums gbɔɔlɛ.
Hin wɔrɔ gɔ hi yɛɛl tuuruko, ɗukinɛ nɛ ɗuks zul nɛ ha, anyɔ za̧a̧tig nɛ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ dɔgsihi ya̧a̧daanik za:
a seen yɔmntnɔɔ hi tɛ̧ɛ̧ wɔ sɛw.
Gɔ nɛ gbɛn kpas wɔ hi bɛɛ baako, nɛ mɛɛ nɛ kpoos du a ga̧a̧k sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Gbunɔ, gɔ nɛ gbɛn hin wɔrɔ hi tuuruko, nɛ mɛɛ a Bɛt wáátɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Be gisin raak rɔbo: hin wɔrɔ sɛw hi tuur kete, ɓɔr dood wɔ hi gi ɔ̧ti gi zul hi ɔɔ wɔrko.
Bɛtha hi hɛbtdi hi talɔ, yɛrɛ dɔgl be taa talko.
Oon zul nɛ, bɔ hinnak yɛ̧ltɔnɔ hi bumwɔniki hi zul-zɛksig yɔ waal du gi wɛɛn kpoos nɛ ɓaatili, bɔ hinɔ gi dunɛ a ɔ̧tɔ ge.
Ya̧a̧nɛ hinɔ gi zaak an zagri a dood wɔ hi waak a hɛbt fɛɛtigɔ ha hi zulha sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ, oonɛ, zɔ̧n Bɛt ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw an nɛ dag tɛŋko an nɛ wirɔ a hin wɔrɔ gɔ hi tuur gedu sɛw, wɛɛ an nɛ er a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi muutdu.
Gɔ ɔ̧t du Yeesu gi hingok a Bɛtluk ɗu. Gɔ rek gi yok a ga̧a̧t za yɔ gɔ hi el nuŋgɔ a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧ti hage.
Wɛɛ gɔ bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ dood sɛw hi zaa a ge a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu hi gisig dɔglɔ kɛŋko.
Naab yɔ kokɔ gɔ taan hɛ̧ɛ̧t gɛ gɔ hi el a Paskayɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b gɔ.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hoobha̧a̧hi doodɛ. Hinɔ gii hi tɛk gbɔnɔ an hi gbɔm Yeesu a luur lɛlɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Saydanu zaa gul a Yahuda kpoos du, za̧a̧nyɔ nuŋgɔ a Iskaryudi yɔ gi nɛ Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ koobl daa eer wɔ zaaɔ.
Yahuda ɗundɔ rek watin hi Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi laya gbɔlɛ wɔ an gi gaahi Yeesu naan du.
Wɔrɔ be hi dag hato, hi wɛɛ hi raa a hi gaage tusɛ.
Yɔ Yahuda bɛɛ ta̧a̧ko, ɓɛɛ gbɔnɔ an gi rɛ̧ɛ̧ Yeesu gi gaahige naan du a yaatillɛlɛ.
Ɔ̧t yɔ kok gɔ taan hɛ̧ɛ̧t gedu gɛ gɔ hi gbɛɛtir tam wɔ du tuur gɔ.
Yeesu yaa Piyɛr hi Yohana raa:
a rekin nɛ gɛmtsɛ Paska naab leesɛ an wɛ le.
Hi ɛrige:
a ha̧a̧mɔ an wi rek wi gɛms ay?
Gii ta̧a̧hi:
a gɔ nɛ rek nɛ gul a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu, nɛ dagtin hi wal za gi pɛɛk mɛmruuko, nɛ fɔg a raa yɔ gɔ gi gul gedu,
nɛ ɛr za̧a̧n raatya bɔ: a Hingokya bɔ ɛrumɔ: a luk yɔ gɔ be le Paska naab lees du hi walɛsɛrɛ be gi ay?
Gi zunsin luk buu gbɔɔl bɔ gi a wɛɛha yɔ hi gɛms hi wɔd bɛttɔnɔ, nɛ gɛmtsɛ lees bɔ gedu.
Wɔrɔ hi rekɔ hi zɛm hin sɛw anyɔ dɔksihi, hi gɛms Paska lees bɔ gɔ.
Yɔ ɔ̧tɔ tuurɔ Yeesu gi rek gi ɗɔɔt hi tɔmsɔya wɔ an hi lehinɛ,
a gib nɛ ha̧a̧k hi tɛŋko an be le Paska naab lees yɛrɛ hi nɛɛ doosi an kuudu be ɔɔ ya̧a̧rha̧a̧ko.
Ya̧a̧nɛ be gisin dɔko a be taa Paska naab lees za lek ma zaŋ, hinɔ gbɔnɔɔ lɛl gi gáa gi da̧a̧ a Bɛt wáát du kɛnɛ, ɓɔr be ɔɔ leko.
Yɔ loo dakwaa bɔ bumhob gi du, baan Bɛto,
a loonɛ nɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ tees du.
Ya̧a̧nɛ be gisin raako: be taa bumhob za yɔ̧k zaŋ, gi tuur a Bɛt wáátɔ bɔ zaakɔ gedu.
Wɛɛ loo koko, baan Bɛto, ɓɛɛlɔ, gaahi,
a yɛrɛ gi muul benɛ [yɔ gaay a nɛ dɔŋgo. Woon anbɔ an gɔ nɛ mɛksinbe.
Yɔ hi lehin gi da̧a̧, wɛɛ loo dakwaa bɔ bumhob gidu anbɔ be, gaahi
a bumhob bɔ a dakwaa yɛrɛ gidu gi zuunik Bɛt ya̧a̧wɔk seg yɔ ɔks hi ga̧a̧m be yɔ gɔ hi gub a nɛ dɔŋgo. ]
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi rɛ̧ɛ̧be an gi gaa bee a dood naan du, naanɔ gi hi bee lɛlgbun a kokdak du.
Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi wɔɔr ma an hinyɔ Bɛt mɔkɔ. Yɛrɛ ya̧a̧rhant gis za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi rɛ̧ɛ̧sig ya̧a̧.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi yɛɛl ɛtingo hi teesdu an hi mɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi woo hin bɔrɔ.
Hinfaltingo mɛɛ a walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hi teesdu hɛw, an hi see za̧a̧nyɔ gi gbɔɔl gi daar zaadɛ wɔ sɛw.
Yeesu dɔksihi:
a dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ waar ɛya̧ hi wɛɛk waar ɛ a hi zulha. Wɛɛ ɗɛntɛya̧ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi gi zulya̧, hi gihi elik a hi hinrɔbɛ wookyayɔ.
Yɛrɛ hin wɔrɔ lab retin hi nɛɛ gɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ gi gbɔɔl a nɛ tees du gi daarlɛlɛ, wɛɛg wans gi daar zaadɛ wɔ sɛw; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi zulɛ a nɛ teesdu, wɛɛg dood zaadɛ woosyaya̧.
Yɛrɛ bɔ gi gbɔɔl nɔ? Za̧a̧nyɔ gi hinlek gii ya, nɛ rɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ gi lees gaak gii ya? Nɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi hinlek gii ma mi? Bɛrɔ, bee be gi nɛ teesdu an za̧a̧nyɔ gi lees gaako.
Nɛɛ gi dood wɔ nɛ waa hinmɔŋk hi bee a be ya̧a̧rhant du.
Yɔ anbɔ, be gin gaak waar ums an Baa be yɔ gaab waar ums be.
Nɛ lehinɛ, nɛ yɔ̧ a be dak du a be wáát du, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ ɗɔɔt a waar ums ɗɔɔtillɛl nɛ gbaas Israhilaya wɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧tya̧ koobl daa eer wɔ dɔglɛ.
Waar Yeesu raa Piyɛr :
a Simɔŋ, Simɔŋ! Saydanu ɛr tɛŋk a Bɛt ge, Bɛt gaag gbɔnɔ an gi namsin nɛ sɛw, gi gbalin an hi gbalik tot hi gɛ̧ɛ̧k rɔbɔ hi zulɔ.
Yɛrɛ be zɔ̧bsum Bɛt zɔ̧bsɔ an bɔmɔ ɔɔ ɗɔbsugɔ. Wɛɛ mɔya, gɔ mɔ zɛmr kpoos mɔ mɔ wɛɛzɔ, wɛɛm mɔ ɓats yɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ hii kpoosɛ.
Piyɛr wɛɛ
a Waar i, be ta̧a̧ an be rek a luknɔ du, be wɛɛ be wɔr hɛw hi mɔya.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a Piyɛr , be raasumɔ, an kɔba gi kek nɛɛko, mɔɔ mɔ faab gi dor dɔɔ taarɛ mɔ raa a mɔ mɛɛb gɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ ɛr walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ:
a yɔ be yaanɛ tus gi taa ziba du gɛ, lees taa saa du gɛ, taal gi taa dɔɔ du gɛ, nɛ nɛ lɔɔ hinza ya?
Hii hi ta̧a̧:
a wi lɔɔ hinza gɛ.
Wɛɛ
a yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ, za̧a̧ni gin tus a ziba du, gi loo; za̧a̧ni gin lees a saa du, gi loo. Wɛɛ za̧a̧ni taan daŋbɛsim gɛ, gi zebr gbandilɔ gi zemnɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ be gisin raako: a hinyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du a be zulha gi an gi da̧a̧da̧. Hi bi̧i̧ hinɔ: a hi ɓɛrige a dood ha̧a̧lɛ tees du. Yɛrɛ hinyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a be zulha rii an gi da̧a̧da̧ ma.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi
a Waar i, daŋbɛsim gɛrɛ eerɛ.
Gii ta̧a̧ a riiri.
Yeesu yɔ bɛɛ tuuko, rekɔ anyɔ rɔ̧ɔ̧s nɛ rékɔ a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧t ha. Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi fɔge.
Yɔ tuur a lɛlɔge,
a zɔ̧n Bɛto an bɔnɛ mat a maatil du.
Kuudu wɛɛ rek hɛml kaasi, a bet gbalik du, yɔ tuur lɛlɔge zagl zɔ̧bɔ.
Raa:
a Baa, gi ha̧a̧mɔ, hɛmlinmɔ dakwaa ya̧a̧rhantya yɛrɛ an bɔbe yɔ̧ hinɔ! Yɛrɛ taa anyɔ ha̧a̧ beya, gi anyɔ ha̧a̧ mɔya.
Wɛɛ Bɛtwalsɛr za midz bɛtha zaa ɓatsig muulɔ.
Yɔ wɔrk gisig hurko, zɔ̧b Bɛt hi tɛŋko, lɛlsa̧a̧tigɔ wɔ hi wɛɛ an ga̧a̧mɛ hi zelik hɛbt di. ]
Kuudu yɔ zɔ̧bz Bɛto, ɗunda zaa a walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi, zɛ̧hi hi yokyo, kpoosya̧ ɗɔb yɛ̧ltɔnɔ, ya̧a̧ɔ gii yoom gi wa̧a̧hi.
Wɛɛ
a nɛ yok nɔ, ɗundinɛ nɛ zɔ̧b Bɛto an bɔnɛ mat a maatil du.
Anyɔ gi ya̧a̧boosig te, dood saal hi tuurɔ. Wɛɛ za̧a̧n za bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yahuda yɔ gi walɛsɛrɛ koobl daa eer wɔ zaaɔ gi dork a saal wɔ hi muutdu, yɔ tuur Yeesu dɔŋdi an gi zɔŋg a ya̧a̧gbarɔ,
Yeesu warige:
a Yahuda, mɔ rɛ̧ɛ̧k Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gii mɔ zaa mɔ gig kɔtig gɛ ya?
Dood wɔ hi gi nɛ hi Yeesu hi gbɛ̄n hinyɔ gɔ gi tuurɔ hi ɛrige:
a Waar i, wi lɛmnihi daŋbɛsim ya?
Zaaya̧ gbun bɔ hɔ̧b daŋbɛsim hɛɛrin Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ gbaarɔ tɔn bɔ naanrɔbo.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a ɔɔnɛ, erinɛ.
Re ki̧i̧ wal bɔ tɔnɔ, tɔnɔ bɔ fa̧a̧y lɛlɔge.
Kuudu Yeesu raa Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi dood gbɔlɛ Bɛtluk-ookya wɔ, hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi zaa an hi wa̧a̧ge:
a yɔ nɛ zaan daŋbɛsim hi sɔɔl rɛ, be luur ha̧a̧l wɔd wɔɔlikya ya?
Be waak hi nɛɛ a Bɛtluk du ɔ̧t nuŋg be! Wɛɛ nɛ wa̧a̧be gɛ. Yɛrɛ ɔ̧t nɛɛn rii hi lɛlwil tɛŋko.
Yɔ hi bɛɛ Yeesu wa̧a̧ko hi renig a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ gi raa du. Piyɛr gig fɔbzig kuudu hɛmltɔnɔ be.
Hi sɔn laa a raa teesdu hi ɗɔɔt hi tɛɛko. Wɛɛ Piyɛr re ɗɔɔt hi teesdu be.
Gbaarnɛɛ za yɔ gbɛnig gi ɗɔɔt a laa dɔŋdi, dōo lɔl gi muulɛ raa:
a wal yɛrɛ hɛw gi nɛ hi Yeesu ga.
Hɔnɛ Piyɛr yɔ lag anbɔ faa, raa:
a nisyɔ! Be mɛɛg gɛ.
Kuudu kaasi, doo za yɔ gbɛnig ɓɛ,
a mɔ gi dood wɛrɛ zaaɔ ga!
Gii wɛɛ
a ɛ̧-ɛ̧, walyɔ, be taa hi teesdu ro!
Yɔ am kaasi doo za dɔɔm gbɛnig ɓɛ raa:
a hi rɔbo, wal yɛrɛ gi nɛ hi wal bɔ hi wa̧a̧zig giya. Nɛ gi doo Galileya ma mi!
Piyɛr wɛɛ goo:
a walyɔ, be mɛɛ hinyɔ mɔ dɔk ma gɛ.
Ɓɔrbɔ yɔ gi ya̧a̧boosig te, kɔba kekɔ.
Yeesu zɛmrɔ, see Piyɛr. Yɔ Piyɛr mɔk gi mɛɛ hinyɔ Waar Yeesu da raag nɛko:
a kɔba gɔ gi kekɔ, mɔɔ mɔ faab gi dor dɔɔ taarɛ, mɔ raa a mɔ mɛɛb gɛ,
Piyɛr tuu kaa ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Dood wɔ hi wa̧a̧k nɛ Yeesu naan du hi gig kpɛ̧ɛ̧luko hi wɛɛ hi gig lɛko.
Hi wɔb muutɔ hi gbandili, hi dɛŋge, hi ɛrige:
a bɔ ɗɛmɔ? Taamɔ!
Hi niig hi dɔgl zaadɛ kittɔnɔ.
Yɔ lɛl gaa, Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaak-dɔkya wɔ hi gi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi mɔksɔ hi kaŋg a dɔglya̧yɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi muutdu.
Hi ɛrɔ:
a gid mɔ gi Masihu bɔ giya, dɔgsiwi.
Yeesu goo:
a an be dɔgsin si̧, yɔ nɛ ɗɔbs gɛ.
Wɛɛ an be ɛrin hinɛ, yɔ nɛ ta̧a̧ gɛ.
Yɛrɛ yɛɛl ɓɔryɔ, Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi ɗɔɔt a Bɛt tɛŋkya naanrɔbo.
Hi sɛw hi warige:
a yɛrɛ ma mɔ gi Bɛt waa ya?
Gii ta̧a̧hi:
a anyɔ nɛ raa: be gi giya.
Hi ɛr gɔ:
a yɛrɛ ha̧a̧wɛ segyaadɛ nɔ ma ɓɛ? Wɛ lag hinyɔ tuu gi ya̧a̧ du gɔrɔ be.
Dood wɔ hí mɔks a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk bɔ gedu sɛw hi ɗukɔ hi kam Yeesu a Pilatu ge,
yɔ hi tuurɔ hi yɛɛlig dɔgl gɛ̧ɛ̧niki:
a wi zɛ̧m wal yɛrɛ gi ɗunsig dood wɛ Yahuduya wɔ zulɛ an hi ɗunds gabsɛ. Wɛɛ gihi a̧a̧nuko a bɔ hi too toos a Kaysara Waar Romaya bɔ ge. Gi raak zulɔ a gii Masihu bɔ, gii Waar gbɔɔlɛ.
Waar Pilatu warig hin an yɛrɛ lɛ:
a mɔɔ gi Yahuduya wɔ waar ya̧ ya?
Gii ta̧a̧:
a anyɔ mɔ raa.
Pilatu wɛɛ raa Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi dood saal wɔ:
a bé zɛ̄m dɔgl a̧a̧b yɔ gɔ gi mat wal yɛrɛ gɛ.
Hi wɛɛ hi ɗuns ya̧a̧ya̧ lɛlgbunu:
a gi sɔmbik doodɛ hi hingokɔ bɔ a Yahuduya hɛbt du sɛw, yɛɛl a Galile wɛɛ zaa tuurin a hɛdi.
Yɔ Pilatu kɛm hi boo Galile dɔglɛ, warɔ
a wal yɛrɛ gi Galileya ya?
Yɔ bɛɛ lak a gi Hirudus hɛbt du, yaag a Hirudus ge; a ɔ̧tɔ ge be, Hirudus gi nɛ a Urusalima hɛw.
Yɔ Hirudus bɛɛ Yeesu gbɛnko, dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ, gii da amntɔnɔ ha̧a̧g nɛ an gi gbɛn za̧a̧nɔ a hinyɔ hi book gi zulha dɔŋgɔ, gi mɔkig nɛ an gi gbɛnig gɛrs za hinmɛksingoya wookɔ.
Wɛɛ ɛtig hin kittɔnɔ, Yeesu be ta̧a̧g nɛ hinza gbun mɔɔt gɛ.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi gi di hi gig hingɛ̧ɛ̧nik hi tɛŋko.
Hirudus hi laaya ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi wɛɛnig hintɔs, hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lige, hi loo gbandil bɛti hi heksige hi wɛɛnig a Pilatu ge.
A ɔ̧tɔ ge Pilatu hi Hirudus hi wɛɛtin saam gɔ. Doosɛ da boolumya̧ taaro.
Pilatu mɔks Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ, hi waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ, hi doodɛ,
a yɛrɛ nɛ kamsib wal yɛrɛ a gi ɗunsig dood zulɛ an hi ɗunds gabsɛ. Yɛrɛ be watig hin a nɛ muutdu, wɛɛ be zol hinyɔ nɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧nig gbun gɛ;
Hirudus be, zōl hinza a̧a̧b gɛ be, ya̧a̧nɛ gi wɛnzig wɛɛge. Yɛrɛya, wal yɛrɛ gɔ̄ hinza a̧a̧b an gi rii wɔrk gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, gɔ be bɛɛg lɛk hɛ be bisig gi reekɔ.
Hɔnɛ, gɔ gi nɛ an Pilatu gi tutsihi luknɔya za gbun a Paska naab-ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw. ]
Yɔ anbɔ dood wɔ hi ɓoolya̧a̧ lɛlgbun sɛw:
a gbɔm wal yɛrɛ, tutsiwi Barabas.
(Wal bɔ hi yaag nɛ a luknɔ du a gabs zaayɔ ɗund a waal gbɔɔl du a dood teesdu hi a zulgbɔŋk dɔŋgo. )
Anyɔ Pilatu ha̧a̧g an gi bis Yeesu , wɛɛ boosihi bisigɔ dɔgl ɓɛ.
Yɔ wɔrɔ hi lag anbɔ hi wɛɛ hi ɓooya̧a̧:
a doomɔg a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha! Doomɔg a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha!
Pilatu wɛɛ ɛrihi dɔɔ taasimɛ:
a wal yɛrɛ gɔ nɔ hin-a̧a̧bɔ nɔ? Nɛ benɛ be zōl dɔgl-a̧a̧b a ge an gi rii wɔrk gɛ. Gɔ bé lɛge be bisigbisɔ.
Hɔnɛ hi wɛɛ hi ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi raag an gi doog dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha. Yɔ ya̧a̧ya̧ ɓoolik bɔ daar
Pilatu ta̧a̧ ma an gi woo hinyɔ dood hi gig ɛrk gɔ si̧.
Pilatu bis za̧a̧nyɔ ɗunds nɛ gabs gi gbɔm nɛ zulɛ hi wɛɛ hi yaag nɛ luknɔ du, za̧a̧nyɔ hi ɛrig nɛ giya. Wɛɛ gɔs Yeesu hinyɔ ha̧a̧hi kpir, gaage doodɔ naan du an hi gbɔŋge.
Yɔ hi gi kaŋk Yeesu an hi doog dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha, doo za giro nuŋgɔ a Simɔŋ, fu̧u̧ a Kirɛnɛ. Re nɛ bako gi wɛɛzugo, hi wa̧a̧ge hi pɛɛsig dɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ an gi fɔmn Yeesu kuudu.
Dood saal kittɔnɔ hi fɔge, nɛɛd kittɔnɔ hi dɛmtig hɔŋya̧, hi gig kaako, hi gisig hekugo.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu gbɛn anbɔ zɛmr hiige
a waat siŋdɛ Urusalimaya wɛ, bɔnɛ kaasibe, kaasin zul nɛ hi waat nɛ wɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ ɔ̧t zaadɛ hi tuuruko, hi raa gedu: a hat gi a kirkilya wɔ hi, hi wɔ hi mɔɔ nɛ waa gɛ zaŋ hi, hi wɔ hi gaa nɛ waa wa̧a̧l gɛ zaŋ hi.
Hi wɛɛ hi yɛɛl gol wɔ raaki: a ɛ̧bzin wi zulha! Hi yɛɛl gol waat wɔ raaki: a yaatinwi!
Ya̧a̧nɛ hi gɔsig tɛ̧ɛ̧ sekt za̧a̧til bɔ hin wɔrɔ, nɔ gɔ gi turs tɛ̧ɛ̧ koot ɔnɛ?
Hi wa̧a̧ hinbɔbtin wookya eerɛ wɔ gɔ hi gbɔ̧hi hi Yeesu lɛlgbunu hi ka̧hi.
Yɔ hi tuur a lɛlyɔ hi el nuŋgɔ a zullɛŋk lɛl ge, hi doo Yeesu gɔ a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha hi hinbɔbtin wookya wɔ eerɛ; zaa gbunu a naanrɔbo, zaa bɔ be a naanyɛ̧li.
Yeesu zɔ̧b Bɛto, raa
a Baaba, bitsumɔhi anyɔ hi mɛɛ hinyɔ hi wook gɛ.
Laaya wɔ hi loo gbandilɔ wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧ hi len subudyɔ.
Dood hi er hɔdi hi gig seeko; dood gbɔlɛ wɔ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lik Yeesu ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi dɔko:
a za̧a̧s nɛ dood zaadɛ be, yɛrɛ gi gi Masihu bɔ Bɛt herig giya, za̧a̧sig zulɔ ma!
Laaya wɔ hɛw hi gig kpɛ̧ɛ̧lik be. Hi sɔɔ hi gbuusig bumhob haatil a ya̧a̧gbarɔ.
Hi
a gid mɔ gi Yahuduya waar i be, za̧a̧sum zul mɔ ma!
Hi bi̧i̧ hinza a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha a gi zullɛl ha an yɛrɛ lɛ: a ZA̧A̧N YƐRƐ GI YAHUDUYA WAAR YƆ.
Hinbɔbtin wookya wɔ hi doohi a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha hi giya zaa gbun niige:
a nɛ mɔɔ gi Masihu bɔ ma mi? Za̧a̧sum zul mɔ, wɛɛm mɔ za̧a̧s wii be!
Hɔnɛ naaza zaabɔ lag anbɔ za̧brig
a nɛ hi gbaas mɔɔ dɔgl an gii ma be mi, hoobha̧a̧mɔ Bɛt gɛ ya?
Wɛnɛ hi gbaasɛ dɔgl hi gbɔnɔ, wɛ dak hinha̧a̧lyɔ wɛ woo dɔɔrɔɔsɔ giya. Gii ɔnɛ wōō hinza a̧a̧b gɛ. Hin bɔrɔ mɔ dɔg bɛr gɛ.
Wɛɛ raa Yeesu :
a mɔkibe a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ mɔ zaa a mɔ wáát du gedu.
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge:
a be raasum rɔbo, nɛɛko mɔ gi hi bee a Bɛt dɔŋdi a waabil hɛmnt lɛl du.
Yɔ ɔ̧t tuur lurk tee, lɛl wil a waal bɔ gedu sɛw, am tuur a naaba̧a̧n du.
Ɔ̧t nimɔ, gbandil fɛɛt bɔ hi mal a Bɛtluk du taar tees du.
Yeesu ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ raa:
a Baaba, be wɛɛnik kol be a mɔ naan du.
Yɔ dɔg anbɔ wɔr gɔ.
Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl Romaya bɔ gbɛn hinyɔ tuurɔ, baan Bɛto, raa:
a hi rɔbo, wal yɛrɛ gi nɛ doo rɔbo.
Wɛɛ dood saal wɔ hi mɔks nɛ an hi see hinyɔ gi daako, yɔ hi gbɛn hinyɔ tuurɔ, hi ɓɛdɔ hi wɛɛ hi lɛlɛ hi dɛmtig hɔŋya̧ nɔɔha.
Dood zaadɛ kit wɔ hi mɛɛ Yeesu hi nɛɛd wɔ hi fɔbzig nɛ a da Galile hi er a lakyɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ hi seek hinyɔ gi daako.
Doo za giro nuŋgɔ a Yusufu, fu̧u̧z a Yahuduya waal za gbɔɔl bɔ nuŋgɔ a Arimate gedu, gi Yahuduya dood gbɔlɛ dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ zaaya̧ gbunyɔ.
Gi ook ɔnɛ Bɛt wáátɔ yɔ gɔ gi zaa giya, ɔ̄ks nɛ hinɔ a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya zaadɛ wɔ mɔkilya̧ hi hinya̧ yɔ hi woo gedu gɛ.
Rek a Waar Pilatu ge, ɛrig Yeesu muulɔ bɔ gi a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha. Yɔ Pilatu gaag gbɔnɔ, rekɔ,
da sis Yeesu muulɔ bɔ a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha wɔbtinge hi̧i̧lɛ, kam i̧i̧ge a loor yɔ su̧u̧ a hɛɛl du gedu, a lɛlyɔ hí ı̧̄ı̧̄dir nɛ za̧a̧n za ge ket gɛ.
Hinɔ daa a lees gɛmsig ɔ̧ti, holum-ɔ̧t bɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b nɛ be.
Nɛɛd wɔ hi fu̧u̧z nɛ hi Yeesu a Galile hi fɔb Yusufu, hi gbɛn loor bɔ lɛlɔ hi Yeesu wɔrkɔ bɔ gbaakɔ bɔ hi gbaag a loor bɔ gedu.
Yɔ nɛɛd wɔ hi wɛɛ raa du hi gɛms kurum ki̧i̧lhɛmntya hi kurum sɔɔki. Kuudu yɔ holum-ɔ̧t tuurɔ hi hol gɔ anyɔ Bɛtmaak
A dimaas ɔ̧t biitir bɔ gedu nɛɛd wɔ hi tuu hi rek a Yeesu loor lɛl bɔ ge bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ. Hi kam kurum ki̧i̧l-hɛmntya wɔ hi gɛms nɛko.
Yɔ hi tuurɔ hi zɛm loorbet bɔ kibl bɛrko.
Hi gulɔ hí zɛ̄m Waar Yeesu wɔrkɔ bɔ gɛ.
Yɔ hinɔ yɔɔhi, yaala walɛ eerɛ hi midsihi, hi gbandil buudɛ gaatɛ fɛr a muulɛ.
Yɔ hi gbɛn walɛ wɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧hi, hi tiis muutya̧ hɛbtdi. Walɛ wɔ hi warihi:
a nɛ ɓɛɛk za̧a̧nyɔ gi za̧a̧til a wɔrkɛ tees du nɔ? Taa nɛ dihɛ zaŋ, yɛrɛ rɛml ɗuukɔ.
Mɔkin nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ da dɔksinɛ, yɔ da gi nɛ a Galile:
a gi an Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi gaay ma a dood hinha̧a̧lya naan du, hi dooge a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha gi wɔrɔ, gi wɛɛ gi rɛml gi ɗukɔ a ɔ̧t taasimɛ.
Nɛɛd wɔ hi wɛɛ hi mɔk hi mɛks hinyɔ Yeesu da dɔksihi nɛko.
Yɔ hi ɔɔ loor bɔ, hi wɛɛ hi dɔks Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ koobl daa gbun wɔ hi dood zaadɛ hin wɔrɔ sɛw.
Nɛɛd wɔ hi fɔks Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hin wɔrɔ nuŋgya̧ gɛrɛ: Mariyama yɔ fu̧u̧ a Magdala, hi Yowana, hi Yakuba nɔɔtɔ Mariyama, hi nɛɛd zaadɛ wɔ hi gi nɛ hi hiya.
Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ be hi see dɔgl wɔrɔ hi fɔksihi an hinyorkyɔ, hi ɗɔ̄bs nɛɛd wɔ dɔglya̧ gɛ.
Hɔnɛyɔ anbɔ Piyɛr ɗundɔ nɔɔ rek a loorlɛl bɔ ge. Yɔ tuurɔ, hu̧u̧r sèè loor bɔ, gbɛn hi̧i̧l wɔ hii loor du kpɔd, wɛɛ wɛɛ gi lɛlɛ. Hin wɔrɔ sɛw kɔmsig gɛrsɛ.
A ɔ̧tɔge anbɔ yɔ walɛsɛrɛ wɔ eer hi rék a raa za bɔ nuŋgɔ a Emayus ge, hɛmlikɔ hi Urusalima gi kilomɛɛtre koobl daa gbunu,
hi watingo hinyɔ daa a Yeesu zulha sɛw.
Yɔ hi bookya̧a̧ hi watingo hin anbɔ lɛlgbunu, Yeesu hi zulɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ, retin hi hiya.
Hi gbɛnige, wɛɛ hi mɛɛg gɛ, lɔlya̧ ruhirub gi muulɛ.
Yeesu warihi:
a nɛ ɛmb nɛ boozig nɔ a gbɔnɔ du hɛ nɔ?
Wɔrɔ hi er hi mimto.
Zaaya̧ gbun bɔ nuŋgɔ a Kiliyopas ta̧a̧ warige:
a rɔ̀bɛ wɔ hi zaa a Urusalima sɛw hi mɛɛ hinyɔ daa hɔ lelbɔ, mɔɔ mɔ gbunu, mɔ mɛɛ gɛ ya?
Wɛɛ ɛrihi:
a nɔ nɛ daa?
Hi wɛɛ hi googe:
a hinyɔ daa a Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ gi zulha, za̧a̧nyɔ gi nɛ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya, woosɔ wɔ woo hi dɔglɔ wɔ boo hi gin tɛŋk gbɔɔltɔnɔ a Bɛt muut du hi dood sɛw.
Wɛɛ Bɛtmaakwookya wi gbɔlɛ wɔ hi waar ɛ wi wɔ hi wa̧a̧ge, hi gaag dood gbɔlɛ naan du an hi yɛ̧ɛ̧ dɔglɔ hi gbɔŋge, hi doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha.
Winɛ wi ook nɛ a gii gi tuus Israhilaya wɔ zulya̧ aakil du. Hɔɔ, nɛɛko anyɔ ginɛ anbɔ sɛw, ɔ̧t taasum yɔ hin wɔrɔ hi daa du gii bɔ.
Wɛɛ ɓɛ nɛɛd zaadɛ a wi teesdu hi wɛɛsiw gɛrsɛ. Hi rek loorlɛlɛ a bi̧i̧l ɗɔbt du.
Yɔ hi rekɔ hi rɛŋks Yeesu wɔrkɔ bɔ rɛŋksɔ, hi wɛɛz hi dɔg a be gbɛn Bɛtwalɛ-sɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi midsib hɛw hi raasib a gi za̧a̧tilyɔ.
Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi hi wii hɛw hi rek a loorlɛl bɔ ge hi zɛm hin daa anyɔ nɛɛd wɔ hi
Yeesu
a hey! Nɛɛ dood wɔ nɛ taan zulɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gin kpoos ɓaatili nɛ ta̧a̧ ɗɔbsig hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya hi dɔg sɛw gɛ!
Taa nɛ an Masihu gi ha̧a̧ya̧a̧r a hin wɔrɔ gedu sɛw an kuudu gi gul a gi gbɔlums du ya?
Yɔ anbɔ, Yeesu wadsihi hinyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a gi zulha a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du sɛw, yɛɛl a Muusa ɗɛɛrwol du, wɛɛ tuur a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ ɗɛɛrwolya̧ wɔ hi bi̧i̧ sɛw gedu.
Yɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b a raaya̧di a lɛlyɔ hi rek nɛ ge, gɔ an gɔ gi taalɔ.
Hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧ge hi ya̧a̧hɛmnti a kɔmmɔ hi wiya, ɔ̧t leegɔ, yɛms gi bulk be. Yeesu ta̧a̧ ya̧a̧ya̧ gulɔ, kɔm hi hiya an gi lehinɛ.
Yɔ gi yɛɛlik hinlek hi hiya, loo koko, baan Bɛto, ɓɛɛdɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧sihi.
Yɔ anbɔ lɔlya̧ kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ hi wɛɛ hi mɛɛg gɔ ma ɓɔrɔ. Wɛɛ waglɛl a hi lɔlgbar tɛgrɛg.
Hi wɛɛ hi watinu:
a yɔ gi wɛ ya̧a̧book a gbɔnɔ du gi wɛɛ gi gisɛ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ dɔgl wadugo, kpoos wɛ ɗuk hi hat gɛ ya?
Hi ɗund ɓɔrbɔ hi wɛɛ hi wɛɛ a Urusalima, hi zɛm Yeesu walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ koobl daa gbun wɔ hi dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi hi hiya hi mɔksɔ;
zaadɛ wɔ hi
a hi rɔbo, Waar Yeesu rɛml ɗundɔ. Zuns Simɔŋ muutɔ.
Eerɛ wɔ be hi fɔ̀k hinyɔ tursihi a gbɔnɔ du hi Yeesu mɛksigɔ bɔ hi mɛksige yɔ gi ɓɛɛdik koko an gi gɛ̧ɛ̧sihi.
Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi dɔgl bɔrɔ booko, Yeesu hi zulɔ mid er hi teesdu
a an boolum gi gi hi nɛya!
Hɔnɛyɔ anbɔ kol tuuhi, hoob wɛɛ ha̧a̧hi, hi rum a hi gbɛnik loorɛyɔ.
Yeesu wɛɛ warihi:
a zul nɛ dɔɔsin saasa nɔ? Nɔ nɛ faakhin nɛ kpoos du?
Seen naan be hi dɔɔ be wɔ. Bee ma yɔ. Ki̧i̧nbe nɛ see. Loorɛ taan yɔ̧kti, taan lɛŋko anyɔ nɛ gbɛn be ginɔ.
Yɔ raa anbɔ, zunsihi naanɔ wɔ hi dɔɔɔ wɔ.
Hɔnɛ an gɔ hi ɗɔbsɔ, hi dag hat daarinhi lɛl be, hi ɗɛɛ gɛ; hin wɛɛ wɛɛsihi gɛrs yɛ̧ltɔnɔ be. Yɔ anbɔ, Yeesu warihi:
a nɛ gin lees hɛdi ya?
Hi loo dut nɔɔmiki hi gaage.
Gii wɛɛ loo tɔb a hi lɔlgbarɔ.
Kuudu wɛɛ
a hinyɔ be da be raasin nɛ gɛrɛ, yɔ be da be gi hi nɛya: gi nɛ an hinyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Muusa maakdɔgl du hi a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi ɗɛɛrwol du a be zulha hi a Zaabura du sɛw gi
Yɔ anbɔ wɛɛ kpɛ̧rsihi zulya̧ an hi kɛm hinyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du.
Wɛɛ
a hi bi̧i̧ an yɛrɛ lɛ: a Masihu gi ha̧a̧ya̧a̧rɛ, gi wɔrɔ, gi wɛɛ gi rɛml gi ɗund ɔ̧t taasimɛ a wɔrkɛ tees du.
Gi an hi dɔks dood hɛbtdi sɛw kpoos zɛmriki hi hinha̧a̧l bisig dɔgl hi Bɛt dɔgl a gi nuŋg du, gi yɛɛl a Urusalima.
Nɛɛ gi hin wɔrɔ segyaadɛya̧.
Yɛrɛ be gisin yaazig hinyɔ Baa be raa nɛ a bé gaazɔ; yɛrɛ nɛya, kɔmbin a waal bɔrɔ gedu gi tuur an tɛŋkyɔ gi wɛɛha a bɛtha gi siz nɛ muulɛ.
Yeesu tuun walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu renihi a Betani gbaŋgi. Yɔ hi tuur lɛlɔge pɛɛ naanɛ rɔbsihi.
Yɔ gihi rɔbsig anbɔ hɛɛtin gɔ hi hiya, ɗund dɔɔ a bɛtha.
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi zagl di hi ɗɔbsige, hi wɛɛ a Urusalima hi hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Gɔ ma anbɔ hi waak rek a Bɛtluk du ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw hi baanik Bɛto. Anbɔ.
Anyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi kim nɛ waalɛ, Dɔgl bɔ ginɛ gi ma doosɛ. Dɔgl bɔ gi hi Bɛto, Dɔglɔ gii Bɛto.
Dɔgl bɔ gi nɛ gi ma hi Bɛto a waalyɛɛliki.
Bɛt gɔn hin sɛw hi Dɔgl bɔ giya; hinza taa gi wooy hi Dɔgl bɔ gɛ gɛ.
Za̧a̧tig bɔ fu̧u̧ nɛ a Dɔgl bɔ gedu, Za̧a̧tigɔ gii gaa dood lɛlgaalɛ.
Lɛlgaal bɔ gi gaak a lɛlwil du, wɛɛ lɛlwil bɔ nimsig gɛ be.
Doo za giro, nuŋgɔ a Yohana, Bɛt yaazig
an segya an gi boo lɛlgaal bɔ dɔglɔ. Zaa an dood sɛw hi ɗɔbs Dɔgl bɔ a gi dɔŋgo.
Gii hi zulɔ taa lɛlgaal bɔ, gi segya yɔ zaa an gi boo lɛlgaal bɔ dɔglɔ giya.
Lɛlgaal rɔb mɔɔt yɔ gi gaasig dood sɛw gii gi zaak nɛ a waal du.
Dɔgl bɔ da gi nɛ gi ma a waal du. Bɛt kimn waal bɔ hi Dɔgl bɔ giya; yɔ anbɔ dood waal du hi mɛɛg gɛ hɛw.
Dɔgl bɔ zaa a gi waal du a doodɔ hi, wɛɛ doodɔ wɔ hi ta̧a̧g gɛ.
Yɛrɛ, dood zaadɛ wɔ hi dagig sɛw, wɔ hi ɗɔbsige, gaahi tɛŋko an hi wɛɛ Bɛt waato.
Hí wɛ̄ɛ̄ Bɛt waatɔ an doo yɔ hɛbtdi ha̧a̧g gɛ, zaabe, anyɔ gɔ hi wɛɛsig baa waal du waaɔ gɛ. Bɛt gii mɔɔhi hi zulɔ, gii wɛɛ baaya̧.
Dɔgl bɔ wɛɛ doo, waa wɛ teesdu, rɔbo hi rɔbgɔki tɔɔ gi kpoos du. Wɛ gbɛn gbɔlumsɔ, gbɔlums yɔ Bɛt waaɔ gbunsum yɔ dag a Baatɔ ge giya.
Yohana boo dɔglɔ gii gi ɓooya̧a̧ gi raa:
a nɛ be boo nɛ za̧a̧nɔ dɔglɔ gii, be raa nɛ a Za̧a̧nyɔ gi zaak be kuudu daarinbe gbɔlums daarinu; yɔ be taa nɛ gɛ, ɔnɛ da gi nɛ gi ma.
Wɛɛ sɛw wɛ dag gɛmsilɔ bɔ rɔɔsɔ wɛnɛ daarlɛl gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Bɛt gaazɛ maakdɔgl a Muusa ge; rɔbtig hi rɔbo hi fu̧u̧z a Yeesu Kristu ge be.
Doo za gbɛndir Bɛt gɛ nɛ zaŋ. Waa gbunsum bɔ gi Bɛto, gi waak a Baa dɔŋdi zaa raasɛ Bɛt bɔ za̧a̧nɔ dɔglɔ an wɛ mɛɛge.
Yohana dɔglɔ bɔ boo gɛrɛ. Yɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi yàà Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ hi Lewiya wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Urusalima hi zaa hi war Yohana
a mɔɔ bɔ?
Gii be fāā gɛ, ta̧a̧ hi muut du:
a be taa Masihu bɔ.
Hi wɛɛ hi warige
a nɛ mɔɔ bɔ? Mɔɔ gi Eliya ya?
Yohana goo
a ɛ̧-ɛ̧!
Gii gɛ.
A mɔɔ gi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ wɛ oog ya?
Yohana wɛɛ goo
a ɛ̧-ɛ̧!
Gii gɛ.
Hi wɛɛ hi warige
a nɛ mɔɔ bɔ ɔnɛ ma nɔ? An wi mɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ wi re wi raas dood wɔ hi yaaziwi, mɔ raa zul mɔ a mɔɔ bɔ?
Dɔg ma gɔ a beya, anyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya
bee gi za̧a̧nza yɔ gi ya̧a̧ɓoolik a hɛtdɔŋdu: a gɛbtsin Waar Bɛt gbɔnɔ gi er bɛttɔnɔ.
Dood wɔ hi yaazihi nɛko hi fu̧u̧z a Farisaya wɔ hi teesdu
hi warige hi
a nɛ à mɔ taa Masihu bɔ gii gɛ, mɔ taa Eliya gii gɛ, mɔ taa Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ gii gɛ be, mɔ hotingo dood hi Bɛtmɛm bɔ ɔnɛ nɔ?
Yohana goohi
a beya, be hotingo dood hi Bɛtmɛm hi mɛm tɔs. Yɛrɛ doo za giro a nɛ teesɗu, nɛ mɛɛg gɛ, gi zaak be kuudu;
bé tūūr doo rɔb a gi muutdu an be hu̧u̧r be pid taal ba̧a̧nɔ gɛ.
Dɔgl yɛrɛ daa a Betani, a Urdum zɛ̧ɛ̧rnɔ kasiŋ za, a lɛlyɔ Yohana gi hotingo dood hi Bɛtmɛm ge.
Yoosugɔ Yohana gbɛn Yeesu gi zaak a ge, raa
a Bɛt Tamwaa bɔ gi ha̧sig hinha̧a̧l a waal du gɛrɛ!
Be boo dɔglɔ gii be raa a doo za gi zaak be kuudu, gbɔlumsɔ daaribdaarɔ. Yɔ be taa nɛ gɛ, ɔnɛ da gi nɛ gi ma.
Bee bé mɛ̄ɛ̄ nɛ za̧a̧nɔ gɛ, yɛrɛ be zaa dood hotingo hi Bɛtmɛmɛ an be zuns Israhilaya wɔ hi mɛɛge.
Yohana wɛɛ boo dɔglɔ raa
a be gbɛn Bɛt Mɔkilɔ siz bɛtha an gutu buu, ɗɔɔt a zaan bɔ gi muulɛ.
Bee be mɛɛg nɛ gɛ, gɛ Bɛt yɔ yaazib an be hotin dood hi Bɛtmɛm hi mɛmɛ raasibe a Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ mɔ gbɛn Mɔkil be gi siz gi ɗɔɔt gi muulɛ, Za̧a̧nɔ gii gi hotin dood Bɛtmɛmɛ hi Mɔkil be.
Be gbɛn hinɔ giya be
Hɔnɛ yoosugɔ ma Yohana gi erk gɔ a lɛl bɔ ge hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ eerɛ.
Yɔ Yohana gbɛn Yeesu gi daako, raa
a Bɛt Tamwaa bɔ gɛrɛ.
Walɛsɛrɛ wɔ eer hi bɛɛ lako hi fɔ Yeesu.
Yɔ Yeesu zɛmr gi gbɛnihi hi gig fɔko warihi
a nɛ ɓɛɛk nɔ?
Hi warige:
a Rabi,
raakɔ a Hingokya ,
mɔ gi waak ay?
Gii wɛɛ
a zaan nɛ see lɛlyɔ be waako.
Hi rekɔ hi see lɛlyɔ gi waako; hi ɗɔɔt hi naa hi gii nɛɛk bɔ. Yɔ anbɔ ɔ̧t gi isba̧a̧n du.
Zaaɔ gbun yɔ kɛm Yohana ya̧a̧boonɔ bɔ gi fɔ Yeesu , nuŋgɔ a Andrɛ, Simɔŋ Piyɛr hindaɔ giya.
Gii yɛɛl gi zɛm yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ Simɔŋ; yɔ zɛŋg
a wi zɛm Masihu bɔ zɛmɔ,
raakɔ a Kristu.
Kamzig Yeesu ge; yɔ Yeesu gbɛnig
a mɔɔ gi Simɔŋ, Yohana waawalɔ, yɛrɛ hi elimɔ a Kefas,
elkɔ a Piyɛr.
Yoosugɔ yɔ Yeesu ha̧a̧g rek a Galile, zɛm Filib
a fɔbzibe.
Filib fu̧u̧z a waal gbɔɔl bɔ Baytizaada gedu a Andrɛ hi Piyɛr lɛldu.
Dagtin hi Nataniyɛl
a wi zɛm Yusufu waawal Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ, Za̧a̧nyɔ Muusa bi̧i̧ dɔglɔ a Bɛtmaak ɗɛɛrwol du; Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi boo nɛ dɔglɔ hɛw.
Nataniyɛl warige:
a hinza rɔb ɗɛɛ an gi fu̧u̧z a Nazarɛd ya?
Filib googe
a nɛ zaam mɔ see.
Yɔ Yeesu gbɛn Nataniyɛl gi zaak ge, raa:
a hɔnɛ Israhilaya rɔb gɛrɛ, taan mɛlɛ.
Nataniyɛl warige
a mɔ mɛɛb ay?
Gii googe
a yɔ mɔ gi a yɔmntnɔ bɔ dɔŋgɔ du, yɔ Filib gɔ gi elumɔ, be gbɛnumɔ.
Nataniyɛl ta̧a̧
a Hingokya , mɔɔ gi Bɛt waa, mɔɔ gi Israhilaya Waar i.
Yeesu ta̧a̧
a yɔ be raa a be gbɛnum a yɔmnt dɔŋdu gii mɔ ɗɔbs ya? Mɔ́ gbɛn hin zaadɛ gɛrsya gbɔlɛ hi daar yɛrɛ hɛw.
Be raasin hi rɔbo,
nɛ gbɛn bɛtha gi kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ, Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi karko hi wɛɛ hi sizig a Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi muulɛ a hɛbtdi.
Yɛms yɔ tal eerɛ lottins gi a Kana a Galile. Yeesu nɔɔtɔ re gi lɛlɔge be.
Hi el Yeesu hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi rek a lottins lɛl bɔ ge be.
Dood wɔ hi lekhinɛ hi yɔ̧k bumhob be. Yɔ bumhob bɔ da̧a̧, Yeesu nɔɔtɔ
a hi taan bumɛ, bum hob bɔ da̧a̧da̧.
Yeesu ta̧a̧ge
a naadyɔ, dɔgl mɔ nɔ du hi beya? Ɔ̧t be riidir gɛ.
Nɔɔtɔ re raa
woosya wɔ a hinyɔ Yeesu gɔ gi raan sɛw woon hinɔ.
Hɔnɛ Yahuduya maakdɔn gbɔlɛ wɔ hi wɔmn bet hi gi di nɔɔn-gbun be, maakdɔn wɔ Yahuduya wɔ gɔ hi hotingo mɛm du an ɓi̧i̧limya̧ gi da̧a̧. Dɔn wɔ sɛw buuya̧ yɔ loo an liitre yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu ɗun raa
woosya wɔ a hı̧̀ı̧̀sin dɔn wɛrɛ hi mɛmɛ.
Wɔrɔ hi hı̧̀ı̧̀sil dɔn gbɔlɛ wɔ hi mɛm rasras.
Wɛɛ
a kɔn mɛm bɔ nɛ kams lottinsnaab zulya bɔ gi yɔ̧.
Hi kɔ̀bɔ̀ hi kamsige. Yɔ naabzulya bɔ dag mɛm bɔ hi zɛmr gi wɛɛ bumhobo, mɛ̄ɛ̄ lɛlɔ fu̧u̧z du gɛ. Woosya wɔ hi kɔbz nɛ mɛm bɔ ya̧nɛ hi mɛɛmɛ. Lottins naabzulya bɔ el wal nislookya bɔ
a dood sɛw, gɔ hi kamz nɛ bumhob rɔb yɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧m gii hi gaa dood doosi; gɔ hi yɔ̧ riihi, kuudu wɛɛ kamz ma yɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧m kaasi. Yɛrɛ mɔɔ mɔ gbaa bum yɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧m gis te ya?
Gɛrs biitir yɔ Yeesu yɛɛl gi gɔ a Kana a Galile giibɔ an gi zuun gbɔlumsɔ. Yɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi ɗɔbsig gɔ.
Yɔ hin wɔrɔ hi daa sɛwi Yeesu wɛɛ ɗund rek a Kapɛrnayum hi nɔɔtɔ, hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ be. Hi waa hɔ ɔ̧t kaasi.
Yɔ Yahuduya Paska naab bɔ gi sɛ̧ɛ̧biko, Yeesu dɔɔ a Urusalima, da gul Bɛtluk du.
Yɔ gulɔ zɛm dood hi zebtig naa wɔ, hi tam wɔ hi gutu wɔ hi tus-i̧i̧kya wɔ a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu hi ɗɔɔtugo.
Loo ba̧a̧ni haŋ kpooti nininihi a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu hi sɛw hi tamya̧ wɔ hi naaya̧ wɔ, wɛɛ yɛlk tus-i̧i̧kya wɔ tusya̧, yaatir tɛ̧ɛ̧hɛɛk wɔ gɔ hi ɓɛrk tus hage.
Wɛɛ raa wɔ hi zebtig gutu:
a ha̧sin hin wɛrɛ hɛdi ma mi! Bɔnɛ wɛɛn Baa be lukɔ an hinriŋsluko!
Walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi mɔk dɔgl yɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa nɛko
a Bɛto, luk mɔ bɔ hatɔ gi kak be kpoos du an laa!
Yahuduya wɔ hi warige
a mɔ gisiw nɔ gɛrsɔ zuunik an wi mɛɛn a mɔ gin tɛŋk an mɔ woo hin wɛrɛ lɛ nɔ?
Yeesu goohi
