Simɔŋ Piyɛr kar a lɛmb bɔ gedu diz zagr bɔ dut gbɔlɛ hi hi̧i̧s gedu yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ daatɔ dumbili nɔɔnɛ daa taarɛ. Hi mɔkɔ a dut bɔ tɔɔ gi daarlɛl gi taar zagr bɔ taarɔ, wɛɛ taar gɛ be.
Yeesu elihi
a zaan nɛ lehinɛ.
Walsɛrɔ zaa gbun mɔk an gi warig a mɔɔ bɔ gɛ, anyɔ hi mɛɛmɛ a Waar bɔ giya.
Yeesu sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ loo kok bɔ gaahi, wɛɛ gaahi dut bɔ anbɔ be.
Tuur dɔɔ taasimɛ Yeesu gi gis walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ muutɔ zuunik anyɔ bɛɛ ɗundig a wɔrkɛ teesdu a loor du.
Yɔ Yeesu lehin gi da̧a̧, war Simɔŋ Piyɛr
a Simɔŋ, Zonas waawalɔ, ha̧a̧m a be muul daar ha̧a̧tig ya̧nɛ bɔ ya?
Simɔŋ goo
a hɔɔ, Waar i, mɔ mɛɛ a harib hi mɔya.
Yeesu raa
a ɛ̧ɛ̧num tam be waat wɔ.
Wɛɛ warig dɔɔ eesimɛ
a Simɔŋ Zonas waawalɔ, ha̧a̧m a be muul ya?
Piyɛr googe
a hɔɔ, Waar i, mɔ mɛɛ a haribe hi mɔya.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a oom tam be wɔ.
Yeesu warig dɔɔ taasumɛ,
a Simɔŋ Zonas waawalɔ, harim be muul ya?
Yɔ Yeesu warig hin dɔɔ taasim bɔ anbɔ, a harim be muul ya? Piyɛr miimɔ. Wɛɛ googe
a Waar i, mɔ mɛɛ hin sɛw, mɔ mɛɛ a harib a mɔ muulɛ.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a ɛ̧ɛ̧num tam be wɔ.
Be raasum rɔbo yɔ mɔ gi sɛrɔ mɔ heg hi̧i̧l mɔ see du mɔ naanɛ, mɔ rekɔ a lɛlyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ ge. Yɛrɛ gɔ mɔ wɔmɔ, mɔ́ yɔd naan mɔ, za̧a̧nza gi yɛ̧ɛ̧ naan mɔ wɔ, gi wɛɛ gi ka̧m a lɛl yɔ ha̧a̧m ge gɛ.
Yeesu
a fɔbzibe.
Yɔ Piyɛr zɛmr lɛ, gbɛn walsɛrɔ Yeesu ha̧a̧g gi muul gi zaak hi kuudu, walsɛr bɔ da yees nɛ a Yeesu kpoos du yɔ hi gi hinleko gi warige a Waar i, za̧a̧n bɔ gɔ gi rɛ̧ɛ̧m gɛ bɔ?
Yɔ Piyɛr gbɛnige war Yeesu
a Waar i, yɛrɛ gii be nɔ gi tursige?
Yeesu
a an ha̧a̧be an gi waa gi tuur an be wɛɛz be zɛŋge, dɔgl mɔ gi du ya? Mɔnɛ fɔbzibe sa!
Hinɔ anbɔ ro dɔgl bɔrɔ gi hɛks a naaza hi teesdu a walsɛr bɔrɔ taa wɔrko. Bɔ lab Yeesu rāā Piyɛr gii a ɔnɛ taa wɔrk gɛ, raa a an ha̧a̧be gi waa gi tuur an be wɛɛza be zɛŋge, dɔglɔ taa du.
Yeesu walsɛr bɔrɔ gii gi book hin wɔrɔ dɔglɔ labɔ gii wɛɛ gi bi̧i̧ hinya̧, wɛ wɛɛ wɛ mɛɛ a dɔglɔ gi rɔbo.
Yeesu wɛɛ woo hinza kittɔnɔ ɓɛ. À hi bi̧i̧ nɛ hin wɔrɔ gbunu gbunu sɛw, dɔglɔ yɔ hi̧i̧s nɛ ɗɛɛrwol kittɔnɔ; mi mɔk a ɗɛɛrwolya̧ yɔ hi hi̧i̧s waal yɛ̧ltɔnɔ, waal yɔ riihi gɛ hɛw. Aanbɔ.
Teyofili, A ɗɛɛrwol mi biitir bɔ gedu, mi fɔ̀k hinyɔ Yeesu yɛɛl gi woo sɛw gi wɛɛ gi goks doodɛ,
tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt ha̧sig gi dɔɔnig a bɛtha gedu. Yeesu goks dood wɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧hi an tɔms-yaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hinɛ hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ tɛŋkɔ, ɓɔr gi ɔɔ dɔɔk a bɛtha.

Yɔ yɔ̧ nɛ ya̧a̧r gi wɔrɔ, wɛɛz nɛ za̧a̧til zunsihi muutɔ hi hinmɛksingoya kittɔnɔ. Midil dɔɔ kittɔnɔ hi teesdu, waa ɔ̧tɔ dumbili nasɔ an gi zunsihi bɛttɔnɔ a gi za̧a̧tilyɔ, wɛɛ gisihi book Bɛt wáát dɔglɔ nɔɔha.
Yɔ Yeesu gi lekhin hi hiya,
a bɔnɛ hɛml hi Urusalima, oon hinyɔ Baa be raa a gi gaazinɛ anyɔ be raasin nɛko.
Wɛɛ raa a Yohana da hotin dood Bɛtmɛm hi mɛmɛ, yɛrɛ nɛya, gɔ gi am kaasi, nɛ́ dag Bɛtmɛm hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ. Anbɔ.
Hɔnɛyɔ tɔmsya wɔ hi mɔksɔ hi ɛr Yeesu
a Waar i, ɔ̧tɔ tuur ma an mɔ wɛnz Israhila hɛbtɔ waar ums a dood Israhilaya wɔ hi naan du ya?
Yeesu wɛɛ ta̧a̧hi
a taa an nɛɛ nɛ mɛɛ hin wɔrɔ sɛw ɔ̧tya̧, zaabe, lɛlya̧ riikɔ. Baa be gii dɛ̧ɛ̧ ɔ̧tya̧ hi zulɔ.
Yɛrɛ nɛya, nɛ dag tɛŋko, a ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gɔ gi zaa nɛ zulha duge, nɛ wɛɛ segyaadɛ benɛ dihɛ a Urusalima, a Yahuduya hi Samariya hɛbt du sɛw, gi da gi tuur a waal doorum lɛlɛ.
Yɔ Yeesu dɔg nɛ hin bɔrɔ anbɔ ɗund dɔɔ bɛtha, hi gig seeko, kuus za wɛɛ yaatig hi lɔlgbar hí gbɛ̄nig zaa ma gɛ.
Yɔ hi gbork lɔlseek a bɛtha, yɔ Yeesu gi reko, walɛ gban buudɛya eerɛ hi midz hi er hi dɔŋdi
hi warihi
a walɛ Galileya wɛ, nɛ er nɛ seek nɔ a bɛtha hɛ? Yeesu gii ha̧s a nɛ teesdu gi dɔɔk a bɛtha, gɔgi wɛɛzugo, gi siz a bɛtha anyɔ nɛ gbɛnig rekɔ her.
Tɔmsya wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Kɔ̧ɔ̧b Ga̧a̧t ha, hi wɛɛz a Urusalima. Ga̧a̧t bɔ sɛ̧btin hi Urusalima, kaasi.

Yɔ hi wɛɛzɔ hi dɔɔ a luk hɔɔt bɔ gɔ hi waak du a buuɔ bɔ wɛɛha gedu. Doodya̧ gɛrɛ: Piyɛr , Yohana, Yakuba, Andrɛ, Filib, Tumas, Bartelemi, Mata, Halfa waawal Yakuba, Simɔŋ Hɛbtwaa Gabs bɔ, hi Yakuba waawal Yahuda.
Wɔrɔ sɛw hi waak Bɛt zɔ̧k lɛlgbun hi kpoosya̧ gbunu, hi nɛɛd wɔ, hi Yeesu nɔɔtɔ Mariyama, hi Yeesu yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧.
A ɔ̧tɔge yɔ dood Yeesu ɗɔbsigya wɔ hi mɔksɔ, kitigya̧ sɛ̧ɛ̧b yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔn-gbunu, Piyɛr ɗuk hi teesdu
a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, rii an hinyɔ Bɛtdɔglɔ
Yahuda gi nɛ gbun wiinɛ a ɛmbil wi bɔ gedu. Wɛɛ dag nɛ Bɛtwoos bɔ ɔnɛ an wi wootin elo.
Wɛɛ zeb bak za hi hinbɔbtin yɔ woo nɛ tusɔ. Mat gedu wɔrɔ, muulɔ foo teesdu ha̧dɔ wɔ sɛw hi gubr lakɛ.
Dood Urusalimaya wɔ sɛw hi kɛm dɔglɔ hɛw. Ya̧a̧nɛ hi el bak bɔ a hi ya̧a̧boon du a Hakeldama, raakɔ a ga̧a̧mbako.
Ya̧a̧nɛ hi bi̧i̧ nɛ a Zaabura du a an raaɔ gi wɛɛ beemɛ, bɔ doo gi waa du. Hi wɛɛ hi bi̧i̧ ɓɛ a an za̧a̧n za gi yɛr woosɔ bɔ.
Piyɛr wɛɛ raa

a yɔ anbɔ, wɛ woo anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa. Gi an wi dag dood wɔ hi sɔkiw ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw a Yeesu waabilɔ bɔ gedu zaaɔ. Yɔ gi za̧a̧nyɔ baariw sɔkig a ɔ̧t yɔ Yeesu dag Bɛtmɛm a Yohana naan duge, gi tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt ha̧sig a wɛ teesdu gedu. Gi an za̧a̧nɔ gi ɔks hi wiya a Yahuda kalɛ an gi wɛɛ Yeesu rɛmtigɔ segya.
Yɔ anbɔ hi zuun dood eerɛ: Yusufu yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Barsabas, zaa a Yustus, hi Matiyas du hɛw.
Hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧b Bɛt hi zulha:
a Waar i, mɔɔ yɔ mɔ mɛɛ dood kpoos sɛw, zuunum zaa gbun yɔ mɔ herig a dood eerɛ wɛrɛ hi teesdu,
an gi yɛr tɔmsya wooslɛl bɔ Yahuda ɔɔ gi rek a lɛl ɔnɛ yɔ riisig ge.
Hi her doo gbunu. Herkɔ bɔ hi woo hinɔ an subudyɔ. Subud bɔ le Matiyas giya. Matiyas ɔks gɔ ma hi tɔmsya zaadɛ koobl daa gbun wɔ.
Yɔ Paŋtekosta naab bɔ ɔ̧tɔ tuurɔ, Yeesu ɗɔbsigya wɔ sɛw hi mɔks lɛlgbunu.
Yaala nams za fu̧u̧z bɛtha an zɛk tɛŋkya gi fɛko hi̧i̧s luk bɔ hi ɗɔɔtig gedu sɛw.
Hinza an laamɛlɛ mid a hi teesdu gɛ̧ɛ̧y ɗɔɔt hi zulha gbunu gbunu hi sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi̧i̧s hi kpoos du sɛw hi wɛɛ hi yɛɛl ya̧a̧book sɔmsɔm anyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gihi boonuko.
Yahuduya zaadɛ wɔ hi fɔk Bɛt hi rɔbo hi gi di be. Hi fu̧u̧z a hɛbt wɔ hi gi a waal du sɔmsɔm gedu sɛw, hi zaa hi waak a Urusalima.
Yɔ hi kɛm nams bɔrɔ anbɔ dood saal hi mɔks lɛlgbun mad. Bɔbe yɔ kɛ̄m hi book ya̧a̧boon ɔnɛ, hinɔ yɔɔhiyɔɔ.
Yɔ hinɔ duhi gi kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ, hi watinu
a nɛ dood wɛrɛ hi booya̧a̧ hi gi Galileyaadɛ ma sɛw mi?
Ri wɛ kɛŋk a hi bootig ya̧a̧boon zaadɛ wɛ sɔmsɔm wɔ hi mɔɔwɛ gedu hii nɔ?

Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi wɛ teesdu hi fu̧u̧z a Partiya, Mɛdiya, Elamiya; zaadɛ hi waak a Mɛzopotami, Yahuda, Kapadokiya, Pɔntus, Aaziya, Pirza, Pamfila, hi a Misra, a Libiya hɛbt du a Sirɛŋ dɔŋdi; zaadɛ hi fu̧u̧z a Roma hi waak hɛdi be, wɛɛ zaadɛ hi gi Yahuduyaadɛ, zaadɛ be hi gul Yahuduya maakya̧ be, Keretayaadɛ hi Araab wɔ, wɛ sɛw, wɛ lag Galileya wɔrɔ hi fɔkig woos gbɔɔl yɔ Bɛt woo hi ya̧a̧boon wɛnɛ sɔmsɔm.
Anyɔ hin kɔmsihi gɛrs hi sɛw gi wɛɛ gi yɔɔhi be, hi wɛɛ hi watin gɔ hi teesdu
a hinɔ raakɔ a nɔ?
Hɔnɛ zaadɛ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧l be hi raa
a dood wɛrɛ hi yɔ̧z bumɛ.
Hɔnɛ Piyɛr wɛɛ ɗuk hi tɔmsya zaadɛ koobl daa gbun wɔ, dɔghin gaattɔnɔ hi ya̧a̧ɓoot anyɔ lɛ
a kɛnɛ, Yahuduya walɛ wɛ hi Urusalimaya wɛ sɛw, mɛɛn hin yɛrɛ; ɓaan tɔn nɛ an nɛ kɛm ya̧a̧ yɔ be booko!
Bɔnɛ mɔk a dood wɛrɛ hi wɔn bumɛ, anyɔ nɛ mɔkugo. Ɔ̧t da gi kusaal ɓaat be!
Nɛ yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ gi hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Zowɛl dɔg giya:

a Bɛt raa a bé gɛ̧ɛ̧ Mɔkil be a ɔ̧t yɔ̧ɔ̧sum bɔ gedu a dood zulha sɛw. Waat nɛ walɛ wɔ hi waat nɛ siŋdɛ wɔ hí kɛm ya̧a̧ be, hi wɛɛ hi dɔks doodɛ. Walɛ nɛ sɛrɛ wɔ hi gbɛn hinza a gɛrs du, ɗɛntɛ nɛ wɔ hi yorhin hɛw.
Hɔɔ, bé gɛ̧ɛ̧ Mɔkil be a ɔ̧tɔge a gbaarɛ walɛ be wɔ hi gbaarɛ nɛɛd be wɔ hi zulha hɛw. Hi kɛm ya̧a̧ be hi wɛɛ hi dɔgs doodɛ.
Bé woowoos gɛrsyaadɛ a wɛɛha a bɛtha hi gɛrs zaadɛ a wɛɛdisɛ a hɛbtdi: ga̧a̧mɛ, laa, hi uusɛ hi midɔ.
Ɔ̧t gi nimɔ, sɛɛ gi hob an ga̧a̧m kete, ɓɔr bee Waar Bɛto ɔ̧t be gbɔɔl yɔ daar ɔ̧t zaadɛ wɔ sɛw gi ɔɔ tuuruko.
Hɔnɛ gɔ gi anbɔ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi el nuŋg be gi zɔ̧be an be za̧a̧sige, gí za̧a̧ gɔ.

Nɛɛ Israhilaya walɛ wɛ, lagin hinyɔ gɔ be dɔgsinɛ! Nɛ mɛɛ hi zul nɛ a Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ gi nɛ za̧a̧nyɔ Bɛt zunsin nɛ gaattɔnɔ a bee yaazige, Bɛt zunsin nɛ hin bɔ lab hi woos tɛŋkyaadɛ hi gɛrsɛ hi gɛrs zaadɛ hinmɛksingoyaadɛ yɔ woo nɛ a gi naan du a nɛ tees du.
Wal bɔrɔ gaay a nɛ naan du anyɔ Bɛt mɔkɔ gi mɛɛ nɛ doosɛ. Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gɔ hin-a̧a̧bi nɛ looge nɛ gaag dood wɔ hí fɔb Bɛt maak gɛ hi naan du, hi doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧r muulɛ, wɔrɔ.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt rɛmsigrɛms be, ha̧sig a wɔrk ya̧a̧rhantya bɔ gedu, yɔ hinɔ ka̧d nɛ an wɔrk gi wa̧a̧g gi waa nɛ a gi tɛŋk du hɛw gɛ.
Dawda raa dɔglɔ be
a be gbɛn Waar bɔ a be muutdu faa, anyɔ gi a be dɔŋdi a naanrɔbo, ya̧a̧nɛ muul be gi bēē gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ kpoos be kpɛ̧ɛ̧ gɔ, mɛl be tuus dɔgl hi hat gbɔɔlɛ. Beya, be doo wɔlɛ, be waa mɔkil be gbaak a hinyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi woosib gedu.
Mɔ taa kol be ɔɔk a wɔrkɛ ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ, ya̧a̧nɛ. Wɛɛ mɔ́ tā̧ā̧ an Za̧a̧n Gaat mɔnɛ bɔ muulɔ gi dog gɛ.
Mɔ gogsib gbɔnɔ wɔ hi tuur a za̧a̧tig lɛl bɔ ge. Gɔ mɔ gi hi beya mɔ hi̧i̧s kpoos be hi hato.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, gbɔnɔ gi an be boosin baa wɛ Dawda dɔglɔ gaattɔnɔ. Yɔ Dawda wɔrɔ, hi i̧i̧ge, wɛɛ loorɔ gis a wɛ tees du nɛɛko àgiyɔ te.
Dawda yɔ gi nɛ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya be, gii mɛ̄ɛ̄ a Bɛt
Dawda gbɛn nɛ doosɛ a Masihu gí rɛmlɔ, wɛɛ boo rɛmtig dɔglɔ a hi taag ɔɔk a wɔrkɛ ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ, muulɔ be, taa doko.
Yeesu gii gi za̧a̧nyɔ Bɛt rɛmsig a wɔrk du. Wii sɛw wi gbɛnige, ya̧a̧nɛ wi ɗɛɛk dɔglɔ raak hi rɔbo.
Yɛrɛyɔ, Bɛt dɔɔnig a gi naanrɔbo, wɛɛ dag Bɛt Mɔkilɔ anyɔ Baatɔ raa nɛ a gi gaage. Wɛɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧ ma hinyɔ nɛ gbɛnik yɔ gɛrɛ hi hinyɔ nɛ kɛŋk yɔ sɛw gɛrɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ Dawda kār a bɛtha ɔnɛ gɛ Dawda wɛɛ raa hi zulɔ a Waar Bɛt raa Waar be a ɗɔɔtum be naanrɔbo,
gi tuur an be gbàà yɔ̧lhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya mɔ wɔ, hi wɛɛ dɔɔ mɔ ɗa̧a̧klɛlɛ.
Dood Israhilaya wɔ sɛw, mɛɛhi rɔbtɔnɔ a Yeesu bɔrɔ Za̧a̧nɔ nɛ doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧r muulɛ, Bɛt wɛɛnig Waar i hi Masihu be. Anbɔ labɔ.
Yɔ dood hi kɛm dɔgl bɔrɔ anbɔ kol tuuhitu. Hi war Piyɛr hi tɔmsya zaadɛ wɔ
a saanɛ, wi woo nɔ?
Piyɛr wɛɛ goohi:
a zɛmrin kpoos nɛ, bɔbe gi loo Bɛtmɛmɛ a Yeesu Kristu nuŋg du an Bɛt gi bitsin hinha̧a̧l nɛ. Gɔ gi anbɔ ma Bɛt gi gaan Mɔkilɔ bɔ an gaas ɔnɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ hinyɔ Bɛt raa a bé gaazɔ gi nɛɛnɛ hi waat nɛ ya̧nɛ, hi wɔ hi hɛml ya̧nɛ, hi wɔ Waar Bɛt gɔ gi elihi sɛw an hi zaa a ge ya̧nɛ.
Wɛɛ boosihi dɔgl zaadɛ kittɔnɔ, wɛɛ ɓaasinihi muulɛ, zɔ̧hi,
a za̧a̧sin kol nɛ hi dood wɔ hi waak ɔ̧tigi zulɛ bɔbsya̧.
Wɔ hi ta̧a̧ Piyɛr dɔglɔ be hi dag Bɛtmɛmɛ. Wɛɛ a ɔ̧tɔ ge dood wɔ hi dak Bɛtmɛm kpoosya̧ ɔks gɔ hi ɗɔbsigya zaadɛ wɔ. Kitigya̧ tuur an duk taarɛ.
Hi fi̧i̧y hi kpoosya̧ gbunu a hinyɔ tɔmsya wɔ hi gok gedu, hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dums waabil-ɔ̄ks du, hi Bɛtkokɔ leki, hi Bɛt zɔ̧ki.
Yɔ hi gbɛn gɛrs wɔ Bɛt woo kittɔnɔ sɔmsɔm a tɔmsya wɔ hi naan du, hoobha̧a̧ dood sɛw gbunu gbunu.
Dood Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi waak ɔksig lɛlgbunu, hi wɛɛ hi gbaak hinwálk lɛlgbun sɛw.
Hi zebtig hɛbtya̧ wɔ hi rɔɔs wɔ, hi gɛ̧ɛ̧k tusɔ a hi teesdu sɛw, bɔbe anyɔ ha̧a̧ge.
Ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw hi waak mɔksig a Bɛtluk du hi kpoosya̧ gbunu, hi wɛɛ hi lek Bɛt kokɔ bɔ lɛlgbunu a raa wɔ hi du, hi lekhin lɛlgbun hi hato, hi kpoos saŋtimi.
Hi baanik Bɛto, dood sɛw hi wɛɛn Yeesu fɔkya wɔ dood rɔ́bɛ. Wɛɛ Waar Bɛt gi tɔŋsig dood wɔ za̧a̧sihi ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw a ɔksilya̧ bɔ gedu.
Ɔ̧tza ma yɔ Bɛtzɔ̧k bɔ ɔ̧tɔ rii a naaba̧a̧n du, Piyɛr hi Yohana hi dɔ̀ɔ̀ lɛlgbun a Bɛtluk du.
Doo za giro mɔɔy dɔɔgumtilyayɔ. Gɔ hi waa hi gig pɛɛko hi gig kaŋk ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw a Bɛtluk ya̧a̧gbar bɔ nuŋgɔ a ꞋꞋBɛtiꞋꞋ ge an gi zɔ̧̀k tus a wɔ hi gulik a Bɛtluk du hi.
Yɔ wal dɔɔgumtilya bɔ gbɛn Piyɛr hi Yohana hi gulko, zɔ̧hi tusɛ.
Wɔrɔ hi seesig gbig, Piyɛr wɛɛ
a seeziwi be.
Dɔɔgumtilya bɔ seehi, gi ook ma an wɔrɔ hi gaag hinza.
Hɔnɛ Piyɛr wɛɛ
a be taan tusɛ, be taan hɛɛlmɔt an be gààmɔ. Yɛrɛ hinyɔ be gin be gàam giya, be raam a Yeesu Kristu Nazarɛdya bɔ gi nuŋg du: ɗukumha mɔ wɛɛ mɔ ɛmbɔ.
Wa̧a̧g a naanrɔbo ɗunsige. Ɓɔrbɔ dɔɔɔ wɔ hi dɔɔ-hiŋsɔ wɔ hi ɓaaɓa.
Yɔ rɔnd anyɔ er ha yɛɛl ɛmbikyɔ. Wɛɛ gul a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu lɛlgbun hi hiya. Gi ɛmbiko, gi gi̧i̧liko, wɛɛ gi baanik Bɛto.
Dood sɛw hi gbɛnig gi ɛmbiko, wɛɛ gi Bɛt baanuko.

Hi mɛksigmɛks a gii tuszɔ̧kigya bɔ ɗɔɔt nɛ a gbɔnɔya̧ bɔ nuŋgɔ a ꞋꞋBɛtiꞋꞋ ge an gi zɔ̧k hinɛ. Anyɔ hi gbɛn wal dɔɔgumtilya bɔ gi za̧a̧ anbɔ hoobha̧a̧hiha̧, hin wɛɛ kɔmsihi gɛrs gbɔɔltɔnɔ, wɛɛ yɔɔhi be.
Anyɔ wal dɔɔgumtilya bɔ ɔ̄ɔ̄ Piyɛr hi Yohana dɔŋya̧ gɛ, dood sɛw kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ; hi nɔ̀ɔz hi zaa a hii, a gbag yɔ gɔ hi el a Sulemaanu zekslɛl gedu.
Yɔ Piyɛr gbɛn dood wɔ anbɔ,
a walɛ Israhilaya wɛ, hin yɛrɛ wɛɛsin nɔ gɛrsɛ? Lɔl nɛ gi inik nɔ wi muulɛ? Nɛ mɔkig a wi woos wal yɛrɛ hinɔ an gi ɛmb hi tɛŋk wiin ger ya? Zaabe hi fɔk yɔ wi fɔk Bɛt hi gbɔnɔ giya? Lab gɛ!

Baa wɛ Abraham hi Isaaku hi Yakuba Bɛt ya̧a̧n gaa woosɔya Yeesu gbɔlumsɛ. Nɛ loo nɛ za̧a̧nɔ gii nɛ gaag dood gbɔlɛ naan du, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ faage a taa waar nɛnɛ a Pilatu muutdu be. Pilatu ɔnɛ ha̧a̧g nɛ an gi bisige, wɛɛ nɛɛ be ha̧a̧n gɛ.
Nɛ faa doo gaat bɔ gi doo riiti. Nɛ zɔ̧b Pilatu bitsin doogbɔŋkya bɔ gii wɛ food a Yeesu kalɛ, nɛ ɔɔ nɛ doo gaat riit bɔ bisugo,
nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gbɔm za̧a̧nyɔ su̧u̧ za̧a̧tig gbɔnɔ. Bɛt wɛɛ rɛmsig a wɔrkɛ teesdu, wii wi gi segyaadɛyɔ wí ɗɛɛk dɔglɔ dɔko.
Wal yɛrɛ nɛ gig gbɛnik nɛ mɛɛg yɔ, ɗɔbs Yeesu , Yeesu nuŋg ɔ̧ɔ̧n gaag tɛŋko. Ɗɔbsig bɔ a Yeesu nuŋg du gaag ma za̧a̧tig gɛrɛ a nɛ lɔlgbar sɛw.
Yɛrɛ saam be wɛ, be mɛɛ a yɔ nɛ gbɔm Yeesu anbɔ, nɛ woo hinyɔ nɛ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ gii hi waar ɛ nɛ wɔ sɛw.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt woo hinyɔ dɔg nɛ amntɔnɔ a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ sɛw hi ya̧a̧ du a Masihu gi ha̧a̧ya̧a̧rɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, dɛnnaanɛ, zɛmr kpoos nɛ an Waar Bɛt gi pugd hinha̧a̧l nɛ sɛw,
an Waar Bɛt gi gaazin holum-ɔ̧ti, gi wɛɛ gi yaasin Yeesu , za̧a̧nyɔ hesinge gaati an gi wɛɛ Masihu nɛnɛ.
Gi an Yeesu gi kɔm bɛtha hɔ kete ɓɔr ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi gɛms hin du sɛw gi rii, gi ɔɔ zaako. Bɛt dɔg nɛ ɔ̧t bɔrɔ dɔglɔ da amntɔnɔ a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya gaatɛ wɔ hi ya̧a̧ du.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Muusa gi raa nɛ a Waar nɛ Bɛt gi her za̧a̧n za a dood nɛ hi teesdu gi yaasinge an Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya an beya. Nɛ́ kɛmsig hinyɔ gɔ gi dɔgsin sɛw.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi kɛ̄ms Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔrɔ lab tɔn gɛ Bɛt gi ha̧sig tɔlɛ a doodɔ tees du.
Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ sɛw hi dɔg ɔ̧t bɔrɔ dɔglɔ
Nɛɛ nɛ yɛr hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi raa a Bɛt gi gaazɔ, wɛɛ ya̧a̧wɔk yɔ Bɛt wɔb nɛ hi baa nɛ hii be nɛ gidu, anyɔ Bɛt raa Abraham a bé rɔbs dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ a waal du sɛw, a dɔ̧ɔ̧t mɔ bɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt hes nɛɛ waaɔ Yeesu gɔ biitiri wɛɛ yaazig an gi rɔbsinɛ, gi zɛmr kpoos nɛ sɛw gbunu gbunu an nɛ ɔɔ hinha̧a̧l nɛ.

Yɔ Piyɛr hi Yohana hi dɔksig dood hin anbɔ, yaala Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ hi Bɛtluk-ookya gbɔɔl bɔ hi Sadu-kiya wɔ hi zaa a hi hi nɔɔtig a hinyɔ hi goksig dood wɔ hi wɛɛ hi dɔgnik Yeesu rɛmtigɔ dɔgl a wɔrkɛ wɔ hi rɛml gi dɔŋgo.
Yɔ anbɔ hi wà̧à̧hi hi ka̧hi a luknɔ du, hi yaahi hi yo duhɔ tuur yoosugɔ, lɛl da gi nɛ bulkbul be ya̧a̧nɛ.
Hɔnɛ dood wɔ hí lāg nɛ dɔgl bɔrɔ anbɔ zaadɛya̧ kittɔnɔ hi ɗɔbs Yeesu be. Walɛ wɔ kitigya̧ tuur an duk nɔɔnɛ.
Yoosugɔ, Yahuduya waar ɛ wɔ hi Ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi Bɛt-maakdɔkya wɔ hi mɔks a Urusalima.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ Hanas hi Kayafas, Yohana hi Iskandarus hi Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ nɛsɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ zaadɛ wɔ hi zaa hi mɔks lɛlɔdi sɛw.
Hi loo Piyɛr hi Yohana hi gbaahi teesdu hi warihi hinɛ:
a nɛ za̧a̧s wal bɔrɔ hi nɔ tɛŋkɔ, hi a bɔ nuŋg du ɔnɛ?
Hɔnɛyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ wɛɛ gi hi̧i̧s a Piyɛr kpoos du
a nɛɛ Israhilaya waar ɛ wɛ hi ɗɛntɛ wɛ,
anyɔ nɛ giw hin warik a woos rɔ́b yɔ wi woos wal bɔ hage nɛɛko, an wi raa za̧a̧k yɔ za̧a̧ ya!

Mɛɛn nɛ sɛw, wɛɛ, an dood Israhilaya wɛrɛ sɛw ya̧nɛ hí mɛɛ a Yeesu Kristu Nazarɛdya bɔ nɛ doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha, hí wɛɛ hí i̧i̧g a loor du, Bɛt wɛɛ rɛmsigrɛms a wɔrkɛ teesdu, a gi tɛŋk du ro wal yɛrɛ gi erk a nɛ muutdu sɛw hi muulɔ rɔbtɔnɔ yɔ.
Yeesu gi bet gbɔɔl yɔ nɛɛ lukwɔŋkya wɔ nɛ bisig giya. Gii wɛɛ ma bet gbɔɔl tɛŋkya.
Doo za dɔɔm ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi za̧a̧sɛ gɛ nɛ zaŋ; ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt gāāzɛ nuŋg za dɔɔm a dood teesdu a waal du an gi za̧a̧sɛ gɛ, gɛ nuŋg bɔ Yeesu kpɔd.
Yɔ dɔgl-gbɛɛrikya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi gbɛn Piyɛr hi Yohana walumsya̧ anbɔ, hi mɛɛhimɛ a hi gi doo tɔsyɔ, hí zaŋg gɛ be, walumsya̧ kɔmsihi gɛrs ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ. Hi wɛɛ hi mɛɛhimɛɛki,
a hi da hi gi nɛ hi Yeesu ɔnɛ.
Hɔnɛyɔ hi gbɛnik wal bɔ hi za̧a̧sig gi erk hi dɔŋdi rɔbtɔnɔ be, hí mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ gɔ hi goo ma gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, hi wɛɛ hi raa Piyɛr hi Yohana a hi tuu a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk bɔ gedu an hii be hi watin dɔglɔ hi kuudu be.
Yɔ wɔrɔ hi tuu lakdi, hi watin gɔ
a wɛ́ wòòs nɔ dood wɛrɛ nɔ?
Urusalimaya wɔ sɛw hi gbɛn gɛrs gbɔɔl yɔ gi wooyyik a hi naan du bɛttɔnɔ be. Wɛɛ wɛ́ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an wɛ faa gɛ be. Yɛrɛ wɛ woo ri?
Yɛrɛ an bɔ̄ dɔgl bɔrɔ gi hɛks gi re doos a dood tees du, ɗɛwɛ biglihi an bɔ̄ hi wɛɛ hi boos doo za hinza hi Yeesu nuŋgɔ bɔrɔ nɛ zaŋ.
Kuudu anbɔ hi wɛɛ hi elihi, hi naahi
a bɔhi rek hi boos nɛ doo za hinza hi Yeesu nuŋgɔ nɛ zaŋ!
Piyɛr hi Yohana hi goohi
a nɛɛ dɛ̧ɛ̧tin nɛ kpoos du be, hinɔ gi rii a Bɛt muutdu an hi kɛms nɛya hi ɔs Bɛt kɛŋko!
Winɛ wí ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an wi ɔɔ hinyɔ wi gbɛnɔ hi hinyɔ wi lag bookɔ gɛ ɔnɛ.

Yɔ dood sɛw hi baanik Bɛt a hinyɔ turs wal bɔ geha, dɔgl-gbɛɛrikya wɔ hí mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ gɔ hi gaa tɔmsya wɔ ya̧a̧rhant dɔŋgɔ ma gɛ; hi wɛɛ hi naahi hi tɛŋko a bɔnɛ wɛɛ nɛ boo Yeesu dɔglɔ zaa. Hi wɛɛ hi bisihi hi rekɔ.
Wal bɔ za̧a̧tig gɛrsya wooy gi muul wɛlɔ daar dumbili nas daarɔ.
Yɔ hi bis Piyɛr hi Yohana anbɔ, hi rek a doodya̧ Yeesu ɗɔbsigya wɔ hi, hi fɔksihi hinyɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi ɗɛntɛya̧ wɔ hi
Yɔ Yeesu ɗɔbsigya wɔ hi lag fɔkil bɔrɔ anbɔ, hi zɔ̧b Bɛt hi kpoosya̧ gbunu, hi sɛw hi raa
a Waar Bɛto, mɔɔ yɔ mɔ kim bɛtha hi hɛbtdi, hi mɛmbalɛ hi hin wɔ hi gi du sɛw.
Mɔɔ yɔ mɔ raa hi Mɔkil mɔ bɔ a woosya mɔ baa wi Dawda ya̧a̧ du: a dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi pɛ̀ɛ̀ zulya̧ nɔ wɛɛha? Nɔ dood wɛrɛ hi book hintɔs nɔ?
Waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hɛbtdi hi ɗund an hi gɔ nɔko. Waar ɛ dɛɛt wɔ hi ɔks hi hiya an hi gɔ nɔk hi Waar Bɛto, hi Masihu Za̧a̧nyɔ Bɛt sɔɔsig kurum an gi wɛɛ Waar i.
Hɔɔ, hi rɔbo, Hirudus hi Pɔntiyu Pilatu hi mɔks lɛlgbun a waal yɛrɛ gedu hi dood rɔ̀bɛ wɔ hi, hi Israhila dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ an hi boo gabs hi woosya mɔ gaat bɔ Yeesu , yɔ mɔ sɔɔsig kurum mɔ herige.
Hi wòò hinyɔ mɔ mɔk nɛ hi tɛŋk mɔ hi ha̧a̧tig mɔ doos sɛw.
Ɓɔryɔ, Waar Bɛto, seem biglik yɔ hi giw bigliko. Wɛɛm mɔ gaa gbaarɛ mɔ wɔ wii tɛŋko an wi boon dɔgl mɔ hi kpoos ɓaasigi.
Zuunum gbɔlums mɔ an dood hi za̧a̧, hi gɛrs hinmɛksingoya wɔ hi gɛrs zaadɛ wɔ gɔ hi wooy a woosya mɔ gaat bɔ Yeesu nuŋg du. Aanbɔ.
Yɔ hi da̧a̧s Bɛt bɔ zɔ̧kɔ, lɛl bɔ hi mɔks ge namɔ, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi̧i̧s hi kpoos du hi sɛw, hi wɛɛ hi dɔg Bɛt dɔglɔ hi kpoosya̧ ɓaasigi, hoobha̧a̧hi hinza gɛ.
Ɗɔbsigya wɔ hi gin mɔkilya̧ gbunu hi kpoosya̧ gbunu. Doo za rāā a hinyɔ be ginɔ gi been be gbun gɛ. Hin sɛw gi walko a hi tees du.
Tɔmsya wɔ hi boo Waar Yeesu rɛmtigɔ dɔgl hi tɛŋk gbɔɔltɔnɔ. Wɛɛ Bɛt rɔbsɔ gbɔɔl ɗɔɔt hi zulha sɛw.
Doo za lɔ̄ɔ̄ hinza hi teesdu ma gɛ. Wɔ hi gin bako hi wɔ hi gin raat sɛw hi zebtirgo hi wɛɛ hi kamzig hinyɔ hi zebtir tusɔ
hi zaa hi gaak tɔmsya wɔ naan du. Tɔmsya wɔ hii wɛ̄ɛ̄ hi gaak tus bɔ a za̧a̧nɔ ge anyɔ ha̧a̧ge.
Doo za giro, nuŋgɔ a Yusufu, hi dɔ̧ɔ̧sig nuŋgɔ za a Barnabas: hinɔ raakɔ a wal doo muulɓaasig-yayɔ, doo Lewiya yɔ hi mɔɔg a Kiprus,
zebr bakɔ, kamz tusɔ gaa tɔmsya wɔ naan du.
Wal za giro, nuŋgɔ a Ananiyas. Nisɔ be nuŋgɔ a Saafira, hi zebr bakya̧ za. Wal bɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧ tus bɔ tee du, ɓeg zaa gbaa be, kamz zaa a tɔmsya wɔ hi be. Nisɔ mɛɛ dɔglɔ be.
Hɔnɛ Piyɛr warige
a Ananiyas, nɔ Saydanu gi guz mɔ kpoos du an mɔ gɔ̧ɔ̧s Bɛt Mɔkilɔ ya̧a̧ mɔ ɓez bak tus bɔ zaaɔ mɔ gbaaz nɔ?
An bak bɔ zey nɛ gɛ rɛ, yɔ kɔ̄m mɔnɛ gɛ ya? Yɔ zey be, nɛ tusɔ gi mɔɔn ma mi? Kɔmri kpoos mɔ gi ta̧a̧ hingɔk anbɔ? Yɛrɛ mɔ́ gɔ̧̄ɔ̧̄s dood ya̧a̧ gɛ, mɔ gɔ̧ɔ̧s Bɛt gii ya̧a̧.
Yɔ Ananiyas lag dɔgl wɔrɔ anbɔ, mat hɛbtdi wɔrɔ. Walɛ-sɛrɛ hi zaa hi loog hi wɔbtige, hi pɛɛg hi re hi i̧i̧ge. Hoobha̧a̧ dood wɔ hi lak nɛ dɔgl bɔrɔ sɛw ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Gɔ am kaasi nisɔ zaa guzɔ, mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ tal nɛ gɛ be.
Piyɛr warige
a dɔgsibe, nɛ zebr bak bɔ tusɔ anyɔ lɛ ya?
Nis bɔ ta̧a̧
a hɔɔ, wi zebr bak bɔ tusɔ anbɔ labɔ.
Hɔnɛ wɛɛ warige
a nɛ mɔk ri lɛlgbunu hi wal mɔ an nɛ gɔ̧ɔ̧s Waar Bɛt Mɔkilɔ ya̧a̧ nɔ? Yɛrɛ dood wɔ hi i̧i̧ wal mɔ wɔrkɔ hi erk gɛrɛ a lukgbarɔ. Hí pɛɛm hí kam a lakɛ hí re hí i̧i̧m be.
A ya̧a̧ gbun bɔ duge nis bɔ mat wɔrko, hi pɛɛg hi wɔbtige hi kam hi i̧i̧g a waltɔ dɔŋdi.
Yɔ anbɔ hoobha̧a̧s Yeesu fɔkya wɔ ɔksilya̧ bɔ sɛw ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, hi dood zaadɛ wɔ hi lag dɔglɔ sɛw.
Tɔmsya wɔ hi wook gɛrs hinmɛksingoya wɔ hi gɛrs zaadɛ kittɔnɔ a dood tees du. Hi er lɛlgbun hi kpoosya̧ ɔksi a Sulemaanu zekslɛl yɔ wɔm a Bɛtlukya̧ gedu.
Hoobha̧a̧ dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi Yeesu ɗɔ̄bsig gɛ ɔksugɔ hi hiya. Wɛɛ dood hi gihi baanik gbɔɔltɔnɔ be.
Wɔ hi ɗɔbsig Waar Yeesu hi hɔŋko hɔŋko, walɛ hi nɛɛd hi kit be hi ɔksig hi ɗɔbsigya zaadɛ wɔ.
Wɛɛ dood hi kamzig gumtil wɔ a leeso ha hi a tɛ̧ɛ̧waak ha hi gihi gbaak a gbɔnɔ du an Piyɛr gɔ gi daak lɛlɔge zeksɔ gi zɛm zaadɛya̧ mɔɔti hi za̧a̧.
Dood saal kittɔnɔ hi fu̧u̧z a waal gbɔlɛ zaadɛ wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b a Urusalima dɔŋdi gedu, hi kamzig gumtil wɔ hi dood zaadɛ wɔ loorɛha̧a̧l gihi muul du, hi sɛw hi za̧a̧ko.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ hi dood wɔ gɔ hi ɔksig elo, hi zaadɛ wɔ gɔ hi ɔksig hi Sadukiya wɔ hi ɗuns ka̧a̧si a tɔmsya wɔ hi zulha. Hi mɔk a yɛrɛ ɔnɛ gi an wɛ woosihi hinbɔbtini ma.
Hi wa̧a̧ tɔmsya wɔ hi yaahi a luknɔ gbɔɔl du.
Wɛɛ Waar Bɛtwalsɛr za zaa a yɛms du gboor luknɔ gbɔnɔ wɔ tudzihi, wɛɛ
a rekin nɛ da nɛ tal a Bɛtluk du nɛ erɔ, nɛ́ dɔks dood za̧a̧tig dɔgl wɛrɛ sɛw.

Tɔmsya wɔ hí lāg anbɔ hi re hi gul a Bɛtluk du bi̧i̧ltɔnɔ hi yɛɛl hingoki. Yɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ hi wɔ gɔ hi mɔksig el hi tuurɔ, hi mɔks Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi Israhilaya ɗɛntɛ wɔ sɛw, hi yaa doodɛ hi rek hi ɓɛɛz tɔmsya wɔ a luknɔ bɔ gedu an hi kamzihi.
Yɔ lɛl-ookya wɔ hi rekɔ hí zɛ̧hi ma duhɔ gɛ. Hi wɛɛz hi
a wi zɛm hi gboo luknɔ gbɔnɔ wɔ rɔbtɔnɔ hi ookya wɔ a gbarya̧ bɔ ge. Hɔnɛyɔ wi gboor wí zɛ̄m doo gedu gɛ.
Yɔ Bɛtluk-ookya gbɔɔl bɔ hi Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi lag dɔgl bɔrɔ anbɔ a tɔmsya wɔ hi waglɛlɛ, yɔɔhi sɔsɔg, hi wɛɛ hi ɛr zulya̧ hin
a nɔ gi tuurik ma anbɔ ɔnɛ?
Kaasi doo za zaa dɔgsihi
a kɛnɛ! Yɛrɛ walɛ wɔ nɛ yaahi luknɔ du hi gi a Bɛtluk du hi wɛɛ hi gogsig dood hinɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, laaya gbɔɔl bɔ retin hi lɛl-ookya wɔ hi loozihi, hí kāmzihi hi tɛŋk gɛ ɔnɛ. Hoobha̧a̧hi dood saal wɔ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ an bɔhi duunihi bet hi wɔrɔ!
Yɔ hi kamzihi hi gbaahi a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi muutdu. Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ warihi
a yɔ wi ansin hi gabsɛ a bɔnɛ goghin hi nuŋg bɔrɔ zaŋ nɛ́ kɛ̄ŋ gɛ ya? Yɛrɛ nɛ hi̧i̧sin Urusalima gɔ hi hingok nɛ wɔrɔ; nɛ́ ha̧a̧n ma an nɛ wɛns wii wal bɔrɔ ga̧a̧mɔ wi zulha ma mi!
Piyɛr hi tɔmsya zaadɛ wɔ hi goo:
a gi an wi kɛms Bɛt gii ya̧a̧ hi anyɔ gɔ wi kɛms doodɛ.
Nɛ doo Yeesu a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha nɛ gbɔŋge; yɛrɛ baa wɛ Bɛtya̧ wɛɛ rɛmsige,
dɔɔnig a gi naanrɔb an Waar i hi Za̧a̧sigya an gi ɗaas dood Israhilaya wɔ hi zɛmr kpoosya̧, Bɛt gi wɛɛ gi bitsihi hinha̧a̧lya̧.
Wi gi Bɛt segya ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ an wi raasin hin wɛrɛ dɔglya̧; gbunɔ, Bɛt yɔ gaaz dood wɔ Mɔkilɔ hi gisig tɔnkɛŋk zuun dɔglɔ be.
Yɔ dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi lag anbɔ hin nɔɔsihi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, ha̧a̧hi an hi wa̧a̧hi hi gbɔ̧higbɔmɔ.
Hɔnɛ doo za Farisaya gi hi teesdu nuŋgɔ a Gamaliyɛl, gi Bɛtmaakdɔkyayɔ. Dood sɛw hi wɛɛnig an doo gbɔɔl a hi muutdu. Ɗund a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi teesdu,
Kuudu wɛɛ
a walɛ Israhilaya wɛ, mɔkin hinyɔ gɔ nɛ woo a dood wɛrɛ hi gbaŋgi.
Ām gɛ, doo za da giro nuŋgɔ a Tɛwdas, ɗuk raa zulɔ a be doo gbɔɔlɛ, dood tɛmɛrɛ nasɔ hi ɔks hi giya hi gig nɛ fɔko. Yɔ hi gbɔŋge, wɔ hi gig nɛ fɔk sɛw hi wag gbɔnɔ, dɔglɔ bɔ wɛɛ hintɔsyayɔ.
A gi kuudu be, Galileya bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yahuda mid a dood nuŋgbi̧i̧s ɔ̧ti, maat dood kittɔnɔ an hi fɔge, hi gbɔŋg hɛw. Fɔkɔya wɔ hi hɛksɔ.
Yɛrɛ be raasinɛ, ɔɔn dood wɛrɛ dɔglya̧ nɛ zaŋ, ɔɔnɛhi hi rekɔ. Mɔkil bɔrɔ hi woos wɔrɔ lab doo tɔsi gi gihi nɛ wooko, gi ha̧tiro.
Yɛrɛ woosɔ gi gi nɛ fu̧u̧zig a Bɛt ge be, taa an nɛ ɗɛɛg ha̧tirgo. Oon zul nɛ an bɔnɛ gbaatin hi Bɛt dey!
Dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi ze Gamaliyɛl dɔglɔ. Hi wɛɛ hi el tɔmsya wɔ hi lɛhi. Hi wɛɛ hi
Yɔ tɔmsya wɔ hi hɛɛtin hi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ, hi dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ anyɔ hi mɛɛ a Bɛt mɔk a hi rii an hi yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant hi Yeesu nuŋgɔ.
Wɛɛ ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw, hi waak hingok a Bɛtluk du hi raat wɔ duge. Hi dɔg Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ a Yeesu gi Masihu yɔ Bɛt wɛɛnig Waar giya.

A ɔ̧tɔge yɔ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ mɔglikya̧ hi hɔŋko, Yahu- duya wɔ hi book Yonaniŋko ya̧a̧boonɛ hi kaa hin a Yahuduya zaadɛ wɔ hi zulha. Hi booko a lees yɔ gɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧k ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw hí gāā kuurɛ nɛɛdya̧ wɔ gɛ.
Tɔmsya wɔ koobl daa eer hi mɔks Yeesu fɔkya wɔ sɛw hi raa
a rı̄ı̄ an wi ɔɔ Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔki an wi wɛɛ kokgɛ̧ɛ̧kyaadɛ gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, herin walɛ nɔɔn-erɛ a nɛ tees ɗu, walɛ hinmɛɛkya wɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi̧i̧s hi kpoos du, wɔ dood hi gihi seek an dood rɔ́bɛ, an wɛ gbaahi hi woowoos yɛrɛ.
Wii be wi gbor Bɛt zɔ̧k hi dɔglɔ dɔki. Anbɔ.
Yɔ dɔgl bɔrɔ bɛs dood saal wɔ sɛw hi her Estafanus yɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi̧i̧s gi kpoos du, hi Filib, Porokɔr, Nikanɔr, Tiimɔŋ, Parmɛnas hi Nikola yɔ fu̧u̧ a Aŋtakiya gi gul Yahuɗuya maako.
Hi esihi a tɔmsya wɔ hi muutdu. Yɔ hi zɔ̧ Bɛto hi gbaasihi naan zulha.
Bɛt dɔgl bɔ gi yɛdugo, Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi hɔŋk a Urusalima, hi kitig gi daariklɛlɛ. Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ saalya̧ kittɔnɔ hi ta̧a̧k Yeesu dɔglɔ.
Estafanus yɔ kpoosɔ hi̧i̧s hi gɛmsili hi tɛŋko woo gɛrs gbɔlɛ hi gɛrs hinmɛksingoyaadɛ a dood tees du.

Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a mɔksilluk za yɔ gɔ hi el a Gbaarɛ Bisilyaadɛ Mɔksilluko, wɔ hi lag Kirɛnɛ ya̧a̧boon hi Iskandariya wɔ ya̧a̧boonya̧, hi Yahuduya wɔ a Silisi hi wɔ hi gi a Aaziya ya̧a̧boonya̧ hi yɛɛl hinfaltingo hi Estafanus.
Anyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gaa Estafanus hinmɛɛki, hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi daaringe hinmɛɛk zaa gɛ.
Hɔnɛ wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ hi sɔmb walɛ zaadɛ
a luurlɛlɛ hi gɔ̧ɔ̧sihi ya̧a̧ a wi lagig gi book ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Muusa zulha hi Bɛt zulha.
Hi sɔmb dood wɔ hi ɗɛntɛya̧ wɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔkya wɔ hi zaa hi wa̧a̧ge hi kaŋg a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi muutdu.
Hi wɛɛ hi tɔmz dood hi zaa hi gɔ̧ɔ̧sigya̧a̧ hi raa
a wal yɛrɛ gɔ gi waak ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l book a Bɛtluk gaat yɛrɛ gi zulha hi Muusa maakdɔglɔ zulha.
Wi lagig gi book a Yeesu Naza-rɛdya bɔrɔ gii gi ɛ̧btir Bɛtluk bɔ gi wɛɛ gi zɛmtir maak wɔ Muusa da goksɛ nɛko.
Dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hí ɗɔ̄ɔ̄t a luk bɔ gedu sɛw yɔ̧lya̧ gi a Estafanus muulɛ, hi gbɛnk muutɔ an Bɛtwalsɛr muuto.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ war Estafanus
a hin gi anbɔ ya?
Estafanus goo
a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Israhilaya wɛ hi baa be wɛ, laginɛ! Bɛt yɔ gin gbɔlums gbɔɔltɔnɔ míts baa wɛ Abraham yɔ gi nɛ a Mɛzo-potami anyɔ gɔ gi re gi ɗɔɔt a Haran,
Bɛt
Abraham ɗund ɔɔ Kalde waalɔ rek da ɗɔɔt a Haran. Yɔ baatɔ wɔr a hɔ Bɛt wɛɛ kamzig a waal yɛrɛ nɛɛ nɛ waak gedu yɔ.
Wɛɛ gāag hɛbt lɛl za zulumsɔ a waal yɛrɛ gedu gɛ, lɛlza fɛŋ nɛ an gi gbaa dɔɔtansɔ gedu gɛ; yɛrɛ Bɛt wɛɛ
Bɛt dɔgsig anyɔ lɛ a waat mɔ hi waa a waal za rɔ̀bi, dood hi wɛɛnihi gbaarɛ hi wɛɛ hi ha̧a̧nihiya̧a̧r lɛlɔge wɛl tɛmɛrɛ nasɔ.
Wɛɛ raa a bé gbaas dood Misraya wɔ gɔ hi gbaa nɛ Israhilaya wɔ a gbaarums du dɔglɛ. Hin wɔrɔ gɔ hi talɔ hi tuu hi gɔsib maak a lɛl yɛrɛ ge.
Bɛt wɛɛ wɔbya̧a̧ hi Abraham a dɔms dɔgl ha. Yɔ Abraham bɛɛ Isaaku mɔɔko, nage a ɔ̧t gɛ̧ɛ̧sims bɔ ge. Isaaku wɛɛ mɔɔ Yakuba nage. Yakuba wɛɛ mɔɔ yaawɛsɛɛ hii koobl daa eerɛ, wɛɛ nàhi be.
Yaawɛsɛɛ wɔ hi hɛ̧ɛ̧n yɛ̧ɛ̧ya̧ Yusufu lɔlɛ hi zebrig a Misra. Hɔnɛyɔ Bɛt gi hi Yusufu be,
gig ook a ya̧a̧rhant du sɛw, gaag hinmɛɛk dubt hi gɛmsil bɛr a Waar Misraya bɔ Firawna muutdu be; Firawna wɛɛ wɛɛnig doo nabl gɔ an Misra hɛbtzulya hi raatɔ zulya sɛw.
A wɛlɔ gedu tɔs tuu a Misra hɛbt du hi Kanaana hɛbt du sɛw, ya̧a̧rhant gi gbɔɔltɔnɔ be. Baa wɛ hí dāg hinyɔ gɔ hi le gɛ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yakuba lag a tot gi Misra, yaa yaawɛsɛɛ hii biitiri an hi rek hi zebzɔ.
Yɔ hi wɛɛ hi wɛɛ eesimɛ, Yusufu mid zulɔ a hindaɔ hi muut du hi mɛɛge. Wɛɛ Waar Firawna mɛɛhi a hi gi Yusufu nɛsɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Kuudu Yusufu yaa dood hi ɓɛɛz baatɔ Yakuba hi kamzig hi nɛsɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ dumbili nɔɔn-erɛ daa nɔɔn wɔ sɛw.
Yakuba tii waa gɔ a Misra; wɔr lɛlɔge hi baa wɛ zaadɛ wɔ sɛw.
Hi pɛɛ wɔrkya̧ hi kam hi i̧i̧ a Sikɛm, a loor lɛlyɔ da Abraham ze nɛ hi tus a Hemɔr waatɔ naan duge.
Ɔ̧t yɔ Bɛt gɔ gi da̧a̧s hinyɔ raas nɛ Abraham gaati a be woo gi sɛ̧ɛ̧buko, dood Israhilaya wɔ hi kitig a Misra hɛbt du hi daarik zul be.
Kuudu waar za yɛr ɗɔɔt a Misra hɛbt bɔ gedu, mɛ̄ɛ̄ Yusufu yɔ ɗɔɔt nɛ waar a hɛbt bɔ gedu gɛ be.
Waar bɔrɔ maat dood wɛ hiya, ha̧a̧n ɗɛntɛ wɛ wɔ ya̧a̧rɛ, wɛɛ fɛ̧ɛ̧hi hi bis waatya̧ hi wɔrɔ, an bɔhi za̧a̧ hi hɔŋg a Misra hɛbt du.
A ɔ̧tɔ ge hi mɔɔ Muusa, bɛr waa a Bɛt muutdu be. Hi kaŋkig sɛɛ taarɛ a baatɔ raa du.
Hi tuusig gɔ. Yɔ hi tuusige, Waar Misraya bɔ Firawna waasiŋ rek zolige loog kaŋkig an waaɔ buudumi.
Yɔ anbɔ hi gogs Muusa hinyɔ Misraya wɔ hi mɛɛ sɛw, wɛɛ dag tɛŋk daarlɛl hi dɔgldɔki hi wooswooki.
Yɔ gin wɛl dumbili nasɔ mɔkil zāa gi kpoos du an gi re gi zɛ̧btir doodɔ Israhilaya wɔ.
Yɔ rek an gi zɛ̧brihi, zɛm doo za Misraya gi lɛk Israhilaya za gbunu. Gul nɔkɔ ɗaas wal bɔ hi gig gɔluko, tuus nɔɔtigɔ lɛb wal Misraya bɔ wɔrɔ.
Ɔnɛ rum a dood be Israhilaya wɔ hi mɔk hi kpoos du a Bɛt gi za̧a̧sihi be naan du. Hii be, hí mɔ̄k anbɔ gɛ.
Yoosugɔ rek zɛm Israhilaya eerɛ hi gbaatingo, tal hi tees du an gi zeehi; wɛɛ
Hɔnɛ za̧a̧n bɔ gi nɛ naaza lɛk yaar Muusa ɛrige a bɔ wɛɛnum waar hi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wi teesdu nɔ?
Ha̧a̧m an mɔ gbɔ̧be anyɔ mɔ gbɔm nɛ Misraya zaabɔ lel ɓɛ ya?
Yɔ Muusa lag dɔgl bɔrɔ anbɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧ge nɔɔ ɔɔ Misra hɛbtɔ rek waa an rɔ̀bi a Madiyaŋ, da mɔɔ waatwalɛ hɔ eerɛ.
Yɔ wɛl dumbili nas daa, Bɛtwalsɛr za mits Muusa a kuusa laazebtya du a hɛtdɔŋ du a Sinay ga̧a̧t dɔŋdi.
Yɔ Muusa gbɛn anbɔ hin wɛɛsig gɛrsɛ, sɔɔ a tɛ̧ɛ̧kuusà laazebtya bɔ dɔŋgɔdi an gi see hinɔ, kɛm Waar Bɛt raazig laazebt bɔ gedu:
a bee gi baa mɔ Abraham hi Isaaku hi Yakuba Bɛtya̧. Yɔ hoobha̧a̧ Muusa gi beeko hā̧a̧g an gi sɔ̧ɔ̧ hinɔ ma gɛ.
Waar Bɛt
Be sɔ̧ɔ̧ be gbɛn dood be Israhilaya wɔ hi gi a Misra hi gihi ya̧a̧rha̧a̧nik gbɔɔltɔnɔ, be lag hekilya̧. Be siz an be za̧a̧sihi. Zaamɔ be yaam a Misra an mɔ rek mɔ tuusihi hi ɔɔ hɛbt bɔ.

Muusa bɔ za̧a̧nɔ baa wɛ Israhilaya wɔ hi da hi tā̧a̧g nɛ gɛ. Hi warig nɛ a bɔ wɛɛnum waar hi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya a wi tees du nɔ? Bɛt yaazig an gi wɛɛ waar i, hi za̧a̧sigya. Bɛt gɔ anbɔ hi walsɛrɔ yɔ midsig a tɛ̧ɛ̧kuusà laazebtya bɔ gedu gi wɛɛ gi boogya̧a̧.
Muusa bɔ gii tuus dood Israhilaya wɔ a Misra gi gɔ gɛrs hinzuunikyaadɛ hi gɛrs zaadɛ a Misra, a Maaliya mɛmbal gbɔɔl du, hi a hɛtdɔŋ du wɛl dumbili nasɔ.
Muusa bɔ za̧a̧nɔ gii raa Israhilaya wɔ a Bɛt gi her ya̧a̧kɛŋkɔya za a dood nɛ teesdu an beya, gi yaasinge.
Yɔ baa wɛ hi mɔ́ks a hɛtdɔŋ du, Muusa gii er hi tees du hi Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ gig ya̧a̧book a Sinay ga̧a̧t ha. Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ gaag dɔgl za̧a̧tigya an gi wɛɛ gi goksɛ.
Yɔ baa wɛ hā̧ā̧hi an hi wɛɛn kpoosya̧ a Misra, hi kɛ̄msig tɔn gɛ be hi inige.
Yɔ anbɔ hi raa Haruna a wɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ zɛm Muusa bɔ tudzɛ a Misra ma gɛ. Yɛrɛ gɔsɛ bɛt zaadɛ wɔ gɔ wɛ gbɛn hi lɔl wɛ an hi dosɛ a gbɔnɔ du.
A ɔ̧tɔge ro hi wɔm nawaa an bɛtya̧ hi gɔsig maako. Hi ɛ̧bs naab gbɔɔlɛ an hi dag hat a hinyɔ hi woon naanya̧ gedu.

Hɔnɛ Bɛt wɛɛ zɛmrsihi kuu, ɔɔhi hi gɔs sɛwaat wɔ bɛtha maako anyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi ɗɛɛrwol du a dood Israhilaya wɛ, nɛ mɔk a nɛ gaa bee namb wɔ hi gbɛɛtiro hi gaas zaadɛ wɔ a hɛtdɔŋ du a wɛl dumbili nas wɔ gedu ya?
Nɛ́ nɛ pɛɛ Mɔlokos maakluk bɔ hi gɔn gbandili hi maak nɛ Ramfa bɔ sɛwaatya̧, hi maak nɛ zaadɛ wɔ nɛ gɔ an nɛ zagl di nɛ ɗɔbsihi hii ma mi?! Ya̧a̧nɛ bé pɛɛ bé ka̧n a Baabila doos hɛmltɔnɔ.

Yɔ baa wɛ hi gi nɛ a hɛtdɔŋ du hi gin ya̧a̧wɔk bɔ lukgbandilɔ an hi dagtin gedu hi Bɛto hi booya̧a̧, hi gbaa bethɛɛk wɔ hi bi̧i̧ Bɛt maakɔ ha gedu; Bɛt gii raa Muusa a gi gɔ luk gbanya gi riitin anyɔ gbɛnɔ a ga̧a̧t ha.

Kuudu yɔ baa wɛ hi yɛr luk gbandil bɔ a yaa wɛ hi naan du hi kam ɔksi yɔ hi rek hi Yosuwa an hi wɔɔz hɛbt hi gabsɛ a dood hɛbtya zaadɛ naan du. Bɛt ninsihi dood wɔ hi muutdu hi ɗɔɔt hi waa lɛlɔge tuur a Dawda waabilɔ bɔ gedu.
Anyɔ Dawda dag gɛmsil a Yakuba Bɛtɔ muutdu, re zɔ̧ge an gi gaag gbɔnɔ gi tɛbsig lɛlza yɔ gɔ gi waa du.
Yɛrɛ Sulemaanu gii wɔmsig luko.
Hɔnɛ taa an Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛl gi waa a luk yɔ dood hi wɔmn naan gedu anyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya
a Bɛt raa a waar ums be ɗɔɔtillɛl gi a bɛtha, hɛbt gi dɔɔ be ɗa̧a̧tillɛlɛ. Nɛ ɗɛɛ an nɛ wɔmsib nɔ lukɔ? Holum be lɛl gedo?
Nɛ naan been woo ma hin wɔrɔ sɛw mi!
Zulɓaatilya wɛ! Nɛ gi an kpaaryɔ, kpoos nɛ hi tɔn nɛ hi ɓaaɓa, nɛɛ hā̧a̧n Bɛt dɔgl lak gɛ! Nɛ gi waak zul nɛ ɓaasig a Bɛt Mɔkil gbaŋgi. Hinyɔ baa nɛ hi gi wooko, nɛ wook hinɔ gii be!
Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya nɔni gid baa nɛ hi kɛtinge ya̧a̧ gɛ? Hi wɛɛ hi gbɔm dood wɔ Bɛt yaazihi biitir hi dɔg nɛ Za̧a̧n riit bɔ Yeesu Kristu bɛtha zaakɔ, Za̧a̧nyɔ nɛ rɛ̧ɛ̧sig ya̧a̧ nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gbɔŋge.
Nɛ dag Bɛtmaakdɔgl a Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi naan du, nɛ́ wɛ̄ɛ̄ nɛ́ wā̧ā̧ dɔglɔ a nɛ kpoos du gɛ be!
Yɔ Yahuduya dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi kɛm hinyɔ Estafanus dɔg anbɔ hinɔ nɔɔhi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ lɔlya̧ hob nɔɔtigi.
Hɔnɛyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi̧i̧s Estafanus kpoos du be, see yɔ̧l bɛtha gbɛn Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ, wɛɛ gbɛn Yeesu be gi erk a Bɛt naanrɔbo.
Wɛɛ
a yɛrɛ be gbɛnik bɛtha gi aasilyɔ, be gbɛnik Za̧a̧n Waa bɔ gi erk a Bɛt naanrɔbo.
Wɔrɔ be, hi ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi zukt tɔnya̧ hi ɔks gi muulɛ hi wa̧a̧ge.
Hi dirige hi tuunig a waal gbɔɔl bɔ saŋgbatɔ gedu hi duutinge beto. (Segya wɔ be, hi hodil gbandilya̧ hi mɔksil a walza sɛr nuŋgɔ a Sawulu dɔŋdi. )
Hi rek hi duutin Estafanus beto. Estafanus be gi zɔ̧k Bɛt anyɔ lɛ
a Waar Yeesu , zem kol be.
Wɛɛ zagldi ɓooya̧a̧ raa
a Waar Bɛto, bitsumɔhi hinha̧a̧l yɛrɛ hi woosibe.
Yɔ dɔg anbɔ wɔr gɔ.

Sawulu be ta̧a̧ nɛ dɔglɔ an hi gbɔŋg hɛw. A ɔ̧tɔge dood hi yɛɛl Yeesu fɔkya wɔ zɛksig ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ a Urusalima. Hi nɔɔ hi hɛks hi rek a Yahuduya hɛbt du, zaadɛ be a Samariya hɛbt du. Tɔmsya wɔ hii kɔm kpɔd.
Yeesu -ɗɔbsigya rɔ́bɛ wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi loo Estafanus wɔrkɔ hi rek hi i̧i̧ge. Hi wɛɛ hi kaag ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Sawulu be zɛks Yeesu fɔkya wɔ, gut raato hi raato, gi wa̧a̧lik walɛ hi nɛɛdɛ gihi yaak luknɔ du.
Yeesu fɔkya zaadɛ wɔ hi hɛks hi rek hi dɔg Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ a lɛlyɔ hi re ge sɛw.
Filib be rek a Samariya waal gbɔɔl du dɔg Masihu bɔ dɔglɔ be.
Anyɔ dood saal wɔ hi kɛm hinyɔ Filib gi dɔk hi wɛɛ hi gbɛn gɛrs hintuusingoya yɔ gi wook be, hi zaa hi sɛw hi ta̧a̧ dɔglɔ rɔbtɔnɔ.
Loorɛha̧a̧l hi tuu a dood kittɔnɔ hi muul du hi kaal ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ. Dood zaŋdɛ wɔ, hi dɔɔwɔlya wɔ hi za̧a̧k be.
Yɔ anbɔ ma Samariyaya wɔ hi dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Doo za da gi a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu nuŋgɔ a Simɔŋ, raa zulɔ a be doo gbɔɔlɛ, gɔ gis nɛ Samariyaya wɔ gɛrs gɔko; hii be, hinɔ yɔɔhiyɔɔ.
Dooɗ gbɔlɛ hi waat sɛw gɔ hi gisig kɛŋk dɔglɔ bɛttɔnɔ. Dood wɔ hi wɛɛ hi dɔk be
a gii gi Bɛt Tɛŋk yɔ gɔ hi el a Tɛŋk Gbɔɔlɛ.
Yɔ Simɔŋ gisihi waak nɛ gɛrsɔ bɔ gɔk be, hii be duhidumɔ hi wɛɛ hi ta̧a̧k dɔglɔ gɔ be.
Hɔnɛyɔ Filib dɔgsihi Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ yɔ gi Bɛt wáátɔ dɔgl hi Yeesu Kristu nuŋgɔ hi ɗɔbs dɔglɔ; walɛ hi nɛɛd sɛw hi look Bɛtmɛmɛ.
Simɔŋ hi zulɔ ɗɔbs Bɛt dɔgl bɔ hɛw, wɛɛ dag Bɛtmɛmɛ. Yɔ anbɔ wɛɛ ɔ̄ɔ̄ Filib dɔŋgɔ zaa ma gɛ. Yɔ gbɛn hinmɛksingoyaadɛ hi gɛrs gbɔlɛ zaadɛ wɔ Bɛt zuun a Filib naan du, yɔɔgyɔ.
Yɔ tɔmsya wɔ hi gi a Urusalima hi lag a dood wɔ hi waak a Samariya hi ta̧a̧ Bɛt dɔglɔ, hi yaa Piyɛr hi Yohana a hiige a Samariya.
Yɔ Piyɛr hi Yohana hi tuur a Samariya hi zɔ̧bs ɗɔbsigya wɔ hi gi hɔ Bɛt an hi dag Mɔkilɔ.
Bɛt Mɔkilɔ da sidir nɛ a Samariyaya wɔ zaaya̧ gbun zulha ket gɛ be, hi dag Bɛtmɛm gii kpɔd a Yeesu nuŋg du.
Hɔnɛyɔ Piyɛr hi Yohana hi tuur hi gbaas wɔrɔ naan zulha hi dag Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gɔ hi kpoos du.
Anyɔ Simɔŋ gbɛn tɔmsya wɔ hi gbaas ɗɔbsigya wɔ naan zulha Bɛt gi wɛɛ gi gaahi Mɔkilɔ anbɔ, ha̧a̧g an gi gaa tɔmsya wɔ tusɛ,
a gaanbe tɛŋk bɔrɔ an za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ be gbaasig naan zulha gi dag Bɛt Mɔkilɔ be.
Hɔnɛ Piyɛr wɛɛ
a an Bɛt gi ha̧tirmɔ hi tus mɔ bɔ sɛw anyɔ mɔ mɔk a be zeb Bɛt gaasɔ hi tusɛ!
Anyɔ kpoos mɔ gāā a Bɛt muutdu gɛ, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an mɔ ɔks hi wii a woos yɛrɛ gedu zaŋ gɛ.
Ɔɔm mɔkil mɔ ha̧a̧l bɔrɔ mɔ wɛɛ mɔ dɛms Waar Bɛt naan an mɔ zɔ̧g kinsa gi bitsum mɔkil mɔ bɔ mɔ kpoos du.
Be gbɛn an kpoos mɔ zoobɔ, yɔ anbɔ hinha̧a̧l daarumdaarɔ.
Simɔŋ wɛɛ raa Piyɛr hi Yohana
a saanɛ, zɔ̧bsinbe Waar Bɛto hi zul nɛ an bɔ hinwɔ nɛ raa zaaya̧ gbun gi zɛ̧be.
Kuudu yɔ Piyɛr hi Yohana hi raas dood hinyɔ Yeesu woo hi wɛɛ hi dɔksihi Bɛt dɔgl gi da̧a̧ hi wɛɛ a Urusalima. Yɔ hi gi wɛɛko hi dɔg Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ nɔɔha a raat kitɛ du a Samariya hɛbt du sɛw.
Bɛtwalsɛrɔ za zaa a Filib ge
a ɗukumha, mɔ rek a ɔ̧tkazig naanyɛ̧li, a gbɔnɔ yɔ fu̧u̧ a Urusalima gi tii a Gaaza ge, gbɔnɔ yɔ fɔb a hɛtdɔŋ du.
Filib ɗuk rek a gbɔnɔ bɔ gedu, dagtin hi wal za Etiyobya gi zaako, giz nɛ a Urusalima an gi ɗɔbs Bɛto. (Hi sɔɔg nɛ an gi oo nɛɛwaar Etiyobya bɔ rɔɔsɔ sɛw. )
Gi wɛɛk ma gi lɛlɛ, ɗɔɔt a mɔɔta yɔ dɔy gi dirk hage, gi zaŋgig Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya ɗɛɛrwolɔ.
Wɛɛ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ raa Filib
a rekum mɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b a mɔɔta bɔrɔ gi dɔŋdi.
Yɔ Filib nɔɔ gi reko lag wal Etiyobya bɔ gi zaŋgig hin a Esaya ɗɛɛrwol du. Ɛrige
a mɔ kɛŋk hinyɔ mɔ zaŋgig ya?
Gii goo
a doo za gogsib hinɔ gɛ be, be ɗɛɛ hinɔ kɛŋk ri?
Wɛɛ el Filib a kazum hɛdi mɔ ɗɔɔt hi bee ɔksi an mɔ wadsibe hinɔ.
Lɛl bɔ gi nɛ zaŋgig

a ɗɛɛrwol bɔ gedu gi an yɛrɛ lɛ a hi kaŋg an tamɔ a gbɛɛrik lɛlɛ. Wɛɛ kɔ̀m an tamwaa yɔ gɔ ɓōō a za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi dɛ̧ɛ̧lik sɛɛsɔ gi muutdu gɛ. Āā ya̧a̧ an gi inɔ gi raa doodɛ a ha̧a̧be an hi huur sɛɛs be gɛ zaŋ.
Yɔ hi wa̧a̧ge, hi mātinge dɔgl rɔb gɛ. Bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi dɔg zaŋgɔ dɔglɛ? Ya̧a̧nɛ, hi da̧a̧s kolɔ a hɛbtdi.
Etiyobya bɔ ɛr Filib
a raasibe, Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ gi book dɔgl yɛrɛ a bɔ zulha nɔ? Gi book gi zulha ya, zaa gi book doo za zulha ya ri?
Filib yɛɛl ya̧a̧book dɔgsig Yeesu dɔglɔ bɔ baar a lɛl yɔ hi zaŋg nɛ a tamwaa bɔ gbɛɛrikɔ dɔglɔ ge.
Anyɔ hi gi rek gbɔnɔ du hi tuur a mɛmlɛlɛ, wɛɛ Etiyobya bɔ raa
a mɛm gɛrɛ, à be dag Bɛtmɛm hɛdi yɔ gɔ nɔ?
Filib raa
a gɔ hinza gɛ, gid mɔ ɗɔbsig Yeesu hi kpoos mɔ sɛw, mɔ ɗɛɛ an mɔ dag Bɛtmɛmɛ.
Woosya bɔ goo
a yɛrɛ be ɗɔbs a Yeesu Kristu gi Bɛt waayɔ. ]
Wɛɛ es mɔɔta ɔ̧ɔ̧ bɔ. Wɛɛ Filib hi Etiyobya bɔ hi sil mɛm bɔ gedu hi eer sɛw. Filib hotinge Bɛtmɛm gɔ.
Yɔ hi tuuz a mɛm bɔ gedu, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ ha̧s Filib. Etiyobya bɔ gbɛnig zaa ma gɛ, yɔ anbɔ gii wɛɛ fɔ gbɔnɔɔ hi hato.
Hi wɛɛ hi da hi gbɛn Filib a Azota, dɔŋgɔ rek a Kaysariya hɛbt du, gi Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔk nɔɔha a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ du a lɛlyɔ gi daak ge sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ Sawulu ɔ̄ɔ̄ Waar Yeesu fɔkɔya wɔ zɛksig hi naati an gi wa̧a̧hi gi gbɔ̧hi gɛ.

Rek ɛr ɗɛɛrwol doowa̧a̧-nikya a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ ge an gi ren a dood mɔksillukya wɔ a Dimaska hi, hi gaag gbɔnɔ gi zɛm dood hi fɔk Yeesu gbɔnɔɔ an walɛ hi nɛɛdɛ gi wa̧a̧hi, gi wɔblihi gi kamzihi a Urusalima.
Yɔ gi rek gbɔnɔ du gí sɛ̧ɛ̧bik a Dimaska, ɓɔrbɔ lɛlgaal za fu̧u̧z bɛtha gāa gi dɔŋdi kpay,
Sawulu mat hɛbtdi wɛɛ lag ya̧a̧ booyz bɛtha
a Sawulu, Sawulu, mɔ gib ya̧a̧ kɛtingo nɔ?
Gii wɛɛ war
a mɔɔ bɔ, Waar i?
Waar Yeesu googe
a bee Yeesu , Za̧a̧nyɔ mɔ gig ya̧a̧kɛtingo,
yɛrɛ ɗukum ha, mɔ rek a waal gbɔɔl du, hi raasum hinyɔ gɔ mɔ woo.
Walɛ wɔ hi gi Sawulu kaŋk hi kɔm hititi. Hi kɛŋk ya̧a̧ bɔ gi booyzig wɛɛha bɛttɔnɔ, wɛɛ hi gbɛn doo gɛ be.
Sawulu ɗukɔ, yɔ gaas lɔlɔ anyɔ gbɛn lɔl gɛ; hi wa̧a̧g a naan muul ro hi tɛlig hi kaŋg a Dimaska.
Kɔm ɔ̧t taarɛ gbɛn lɔl gɛ, lehin gɛ, yɔ̧ mɛm gɛ be.
Hɔnɛ wal za Yeesu fɔkya gi a Dimaska nuŋgɔ a Ana-niyas. Gbɛn Waar Yeesu raag
a gɛrs du a Ananiyas!
Gii ta̧a̧
a nɔ be giyɔ, Waar i.
Wɛɛ Waar Yeesu
a ɗukum mɔ rek a gbɔnɔ yɔ gɔ hi el a gbɔnɔ Eti gedu, mɔ ɛr za̧a̧n za Tarseya nuŋgɔ a Sawulu a Yahuda raa du. Yɛrɛ gi Bɛt zɔ̧ko,
yɔ gi Bɛt zɔ̧ko gbɛn za̧a̧nza a gɛrs du gi guzugo nuŋgɔ a Ananiyas. Yɔ guzɔ gbaasig naan zulha an gi wɛɛ gi gbɛn lɔlɛ.
Ananiyas googe
a Waar i, dood kittɔnɔ hi raasib wal bɔrɔ dɔglɔ, hi wɛɛ hi dɔgsib hinbɔbtinɔ yɔ gɔs dood mɔ gaatɛ wɔ gi daarinlɛl a Urusalima.
Yɛrɛ yɔ zaa a hɛdi, Bɛtmaak-wookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hii gaazig tɛŋk gbɔɔltɔnɔ an gi zaa gi wa̧a̧ dood wɔ hi gim ɗɔbsugo.
Wɛɛ Waar Yeesu
a rekumɔ, be herig an gi woosibwoosɛ an gi kam nuŋg be a dood waal du hi teesdu, a waar ɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi teesdu hi a Israhilaya wɔ hi tees du.
Yɔ anbɔ bé wɛɛ bé zunsig hinyɔ gɔ gi ha̧a̧nya̧a̧r sɛw a be nuŋg dɔŋgo.
Ananiyas tuu re da gul raa bɔ gedu gbaas Sawulu naan zulha
a Sawulu, yɛ̧ɛ̧be, Waar Yeesu yɔ mitsum a gbɔnɔ yɔ mɔ zaak gedu, gii yaazibe an be gbaasum naan zulha mɔ wɛɛ mɔ gbɛnlɔlɛ, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi tɔɔ mɔ kpoos du.
Ɓɔrbɔ hinza tuuz gi lɔl du an dut fɛbti, wɛɛ gbɛnlɔl gɔ. Ɗukɔ dag Bɛtmɛmɛ.
Kuudu le lees dag tɛŋko. Sawulu waa yɛmsɔ tɔŋ kaasi hi Yeesu fɔkya wɔ a Dimaska.
Ɓɔrbɔ Sawulu wɛɛ rek Yeesu dɔglɔ dɔk a mɔksilluk wɔ hi du a Yeesu gi Bɛt waayɔ.
Dood wɔ hi gisig dɔglɔ lak sɛw kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ;
hi wɛɛ hi raako a nɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi gbɔmntig nɛ dood wɔ hi ɗɔbsig Yeesu a Urusalima gii ma mi? Zaa dihɛ an gi wɔbl dood wɔ hi Yeesu ɗɔbsig gi ka̧hi a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi muutdu wɛ gɛ?
Yɔ anbɔ Sawulu Bɛt dɔglɔ bɔ gi dɔko gi rek hi tɛŋk doosɛ, doosɛ. Yahuduya wɔ a Dimaska hí mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ gɔ hi woo gɛ, anyɔ hi lag Sawulu gi zunsihi a Yeesu gii gi Masihu.
Kuudu ɔ̧tyɔ daa kittɔnɔ, Yahuduya wɔ hi wɔya̧a̧ an hi wa̧a̧ Sawulu hi gbɔŋge.
Yɛms du hi lurk du sɛw hi ooge a waal gbɔɔl bɔ ya̧a̧gbarɔ ge an hi wa̧a̧ hi gbɔŋge. Ya̧a̧wɔkya̧ bɔ hi gɔ, Sawulu lag ya̧a̧wɔkya̧ bɔ dɔglɔ be.
Yɔ a yɛms za du anbɔ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi loog hi sisig ba̧a̧n muul a wɔmnt hɔɔt kuu a dɛl gbɔɔl du.
Yɔ Sawulu rek a Urusalima ha̧a̧g an gi ɔks hi Yeesu -fɔkya wɔ, hii be hoob ha̧a̧higeha̧ hi sɛw hi mɔk a zaab wa̧a̧kyɔ, hí ɗɔ̄bs a gii wɛɛ Yeesu fɔkya ma hɛw gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ Barnabas loog kaŋg a tɔmsya wɔ hi, raasihi Sawulu Waar Yeesu gbɛnkɔ bɔ gbɛnig bɛttɔnɔ yɔ gi rek
a gbɔnɔ du hi Waar Yeesu bookɔ bɔ booge. Wɛɛ raasihi Sawulu Bɛt dɔglɔ bɔ dɔg hi kpoos ɓaasigi a Dimaska hi Yeesu nuŋgɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Sawulu gi waak reki, gi waak wɛɛzig a hii a Urusalima gi gbosig Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔk hi Waar Yeesu nuŋgɔ, hoobha̧a̧g hinza gɛ be.
Gi bookya̧a̧ wɛɛ gi hin faltingo hi Yahuduya wɔ hi book Yonaniŋkoya ya̧a̧boonɛ. Wɔrɔ be hi tɛk an hi wa̧a̧ hi gbɔŋge.
Yɔ yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi lag dɔglɔ anbɔ hi rek hi looge hi kaŋg a waal gbɔɔl Kaysariya gedu hi da hi rek hi yaag rek a Tarse.
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ a Yahuduya, a Galile hi a Samariya sɛw hi dag saŋtum gɔ ɓɔrɔ, zɛksil taaro, hi wɛɛ hi dag tɛŋko; Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gisihi ɗaako, hoob gihi ha̧a̧k Waar Bɛto, hi wɛɛ hi kitugo kitugo.
Anyɔ Piyɛr gi zɛ̧btirgo waal sɛwi, ɔ̧tza ɗund tii a Bɛt doodɔ zaadɛ wɔ hi waak a Lida hɛbt du hi.
Zɛm wal za zaŋgd hɔ nuŋgɔ a Aynɛyas kus gums sil ha wɛlɔ gɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ.
Piyɛr raag
a Aynɛyas, Yeesu Kristu za̧a̧sumza̧a̧sɔ, ɗukum ha, wɛɛm mɔ ka̧a̧ sil mɔ.
Ɓɔrbɔ wal bɔ ɗukɔ ka̧a̧ silɔ.
Dood wɔ hi waak a Lida hi wɔ hi waak a Sarɔŋ sɛw hi gbɛn wal bɔ gbɛnɔ. Yɔ anbɔ hi ɔɔ hinha̧a̧lya̧ hi ɗɔbs Waar Yeesu gɔ.
Nis za Yeesu fɔkya gi a Zope nuŋgɔ a Tabita. Tabita elkɔ zaa a Dɔrkas hinɔ raakɔ a nam kpaarɛ a Yonaniŋko ya̧a̧boon du. Gɔ gi gaak gaas bɛttɔnɔ, gi hinrɔb wook gbɔɔltɔnɔ be.
A ɔ̧tɔge mat gums wɔrɔ. Yɔ hi hotige hi gbaag a luk hɔɔt za buu du a wɛɛha.
Anyɔ Lida sɛ̧ɛ̧b hi Zope be, Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi lag a Piyɛr gi a Lida, hi yaa dood eerɛ hi wɔrk bɔ ramsɔ hi rek hi zɔ̧ge
a gi zaa nɔɔktɔnɔ bɔgi amzɔ.

Piyɛr ɗuk retin hi hiya. Yɔ bɛɛ tuuruko hi kaŋg a luk búú bɔ wɛɛha gedu. Kuurɛ nɛɛd wɔ sɛw hi rek hi er gi dɔŋdi hi kaako. Hi zuns Piyɛr gban hek wɔ Dɔrkas gi nɛ baako hi gban zaadɛ wɔ gɔ nɛ yɔ gi nɛ hi hii za̧a̧tili.
Piyɛr tuus dood sɛw zagl gi dɔŋdi zɔ̧ Bɛto. Wɛɛ zɛmr a wɔrk bɔ ge
a Tabita, ɗundum ha!
Wɔrk bɔ gaas lɔlɔ, yɔ gbɛn Piyɛr ɗukha ɗɔɔtɔ.
Piyɛr wa̧a̧ naanɔ ɗuksig ha. Wɛɛ el Bɛt doodɔ gaatɛ wɔ hi kuurɛ nɛɛd wɔ gaahige naan du za̧a̧tili.
Dood a Zope du sɛw hi mɛɛ hin bɔ labɔ, wɛɛ dood kittɔnɔ hi ɗɔbs Waar Yeesu be.
Piyɛr waa am a Zope a walza zoolnukya lɛl du nuŋgɔ a Simɔŋ.
Walza laaya gbɔɔl giro, nuŋgɔ a Kɔrnɛliyus gi waak a Kaysariya, gin laaya dɛɛt yɔ̧ɔ̧lɔ nɔɔnɛ. Gɔ hi elik a Itali layaadɛyɔ.
Walɔ gi fɔk Bɛt rɔbtɔnɔ hi hoobo hi raatɔ sɛw, gɔ gi gaak Yahuduya ya̧a̧rya wɔ gaas gbɔɔltɔnɔ, wɛɛ gi waak Bɛt zɔ̧ki.
Ɔ̧tyɔ gi a naaba̧a̧n du gbɛn Bɛtwalsɛr za raasig hinza a gɛrs du bɛttɔnɔ gul gi lɛl du, elige
a Kɔrnɛliyus!
Yɔ lag anbɔ wɛɛ see Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ hi hooblɔlɛ warige
a Ɗɛntyɔ, kɔm ri?
Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ wɛɛ
a zɔ̧k mɔ hi gaas mɔ sɛw tuur a Bɛt muutdu, Bɛt ta̧a̧ta̧.
Yɛrɛ yaam dood a Zope hi elz Simɔŋ yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Piyɛr gi zaa a mɔɔge.
Gi waak a Simɔŋ za zoolnukya bɔ gi raa du, raaɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b gi a mɛmbal gbɔɔl ya̧di.
Yɔ Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ bɛɛsig raak anbɔ rekɔ, gii wɛɛ elz woosyaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ eerɛ hi laaya za gbun yɔ gi fɔk Bɛt hi gbɔnɔ yɔ gi woos wootingo elo, fɔksihi hin sɛw.
Yɔ fɔksihi hinyɔ daa sɛw gi da̧a̧, yaahi hi rek gɔ a Zope.
Yoosugɔ yɔ hi gi gbɔnɔ di hi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik tuurik a Zope waal gbɔɔl bɔ dɔŋgɔdi, Piyɛr kar lukzul ha a lurk teesdu gi zɔ̧k Bɛto.
Yɔ a̧a̧kil gig ha̧a̧k an gi le leesɛ, hi gisig hindɔɔko an gi le be, Bɛt zunsig hinza gbɛn a gɛrs du.
Gbɛn bɛtha kpɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ, gbɛn hinza an gban gbɔɔl fɛɛti ha̧y lɛl nasɔ gi sizig an gi tuur hɛbtdi.
Namb wɔ hi naŋkar wɔ hi gi a hɛbtdi dɔ̧ɔ̧tya̧ sɔmsɔm hi nɔɔs bɛtha sɛw dɔ̧ɔ̧tya̧ hi gi a gban fɛɛt gbɔɔl bɔ muulɔge.
Wɛɛ ya̧a̧ za raazig bɛtha
a Piyɛr , ɗukum mɔ wa̧a̧ mɔ gbɛɛrihi mɔ tɔbɔ.
Piyɛr wɛɛ
a ewwee! Waar Bɛto, be tɔbdir hin libtya, zaabe hin ɓi̧i̧limya ket gɛ nɛ zaŋ.
Wɛɛ kɛm Bɛt ya̧a̧ɔ dɔɔ eesimɛ, gig raak
a hinyɔ be gaasige bɔmɔ see hinɔ an hin ɓi̧i̧limyayɔ.
Hinɔ tuur anbɔ dɔɔ taarɛ, yaala hinɔ wɛɛ kɔl dɔɔ a bɛtha.
Piyɛr war zulɔ
a hinyɔ be gbɛnz gɛrs du hinɔ raakɔ a nɔ?
Hɔnɛyɔ gi zulɔ hin wark anbɔ te dood wɔ Kɔrnɛliyus yaazihi hi ɛrkig Simɔŋ raaɔ bɔ lɛlɔ be. Yaala hi tuur gɔ, hi er gi tutin gbɔnɔya̧, hi mɛɛ gɛ be.
Hi el dood zaadɛ hi warihi
a Simɔŋ yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Piyɛr gi waak dihɛ ya?
Yɔ Piyɛr gi mɔkig hin a hinyɔ Bɛt zunsig a gɛrs du geha te be, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ
a kɛmɔ, dood taarɛ hi gim tɛk gɛrɛ.
Ɗukum mɔ silɔ mɔ retin hi hii a Kaysariya, bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ, bee yaazihi a mɔɔge an hi elumɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Piyɛr silɔ, raa dood wɔ
a be gi gɛrɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ nɛ gig tɛk gii beeya. Nɛ zaa nɔ?
Wɔrɔ hi ta̧a̧
a laaya gbɔɔl zulya bɔ Kɔrnɛliyus gii yaaziwi. Gi doo riit yɔ hoob gig ha̧a̧k Bɛto, Yahuduya wɔ sɛw hi mɛɛ dɔglɔ hi gig sɔ̧ɔ̧k an doo rɔbo. Bɛtwalsɛr za zaa
Piyɛr dɛ̧ɛ̧hi hi yo; yoosugɔ ɗuk retin gɔ hi hii a Kaysariya.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya zaadɛ hi fu̧u̧ a Zope hi sɔkig be.
Yoosugɔ anyɔ gɔ hi tuur a Kaysariya anbɔ, Kɔrnɛliyus mɔks nɛsɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi saamɔ rɔ́bɛ wɔ hi oohi.
Yɔ Piyɛr sɛ̧ɛ̧b gulk Kɔrnɛliyus raa du, Kɔrnɛliyus tuu dagige zagl gi dɔɔ dɔŋdi ɗɔbsige.
Hɔnɛ Piyɛr wɛɛ ɗunsig
a ɗundum ha, bee be gi doo an mɔɔ hɛw.
Yɔ Piyɛr gul raa du gi bookya̧a̧ hi Kɔrnɛliyus zɛm dood hi mɔks kittɔnɔ.
Piyɛr
a nɛ mɛɛ bɛttɔnɔ a maak wi gāā gbɔnɔ an Yahuduya gi ɔks hi rɔ̀bi, zaabe an gi tal gi lɛl du gɛ. Yɛrɛ Bɛt gogsib a bɔbe see doo za gbun mɔɔt an gi hin libtyayɔ, zaabe an hin ɓi̧i̧limyayɔ.
Ànyɔ nɛ elzib an be zaa hɛdi, bé ı̄n zaakɔ gɛ be. Yɛrɛ ha̧a̧b an be mɛɛ hinyɔ nɛ elinbe.
Kɔrnɛliyus gòò
a tuur ɔ̧t nas nɛɛko, ɔ̧t gi a naaba̧a̧n du an yɛrɛ lɛ an be zɔ̧b Bɛto. Yɔ be zɔ̧k Bɛt a be lɛl du doo za zaa be muutdu gin gban gaat buu fɛr a gi muulɛ,
raabe a Kɔrnɛliyus, Bɛt kɛmsum zɔ̧k mɔ kɛmsɔ, wɛɛ mɛɛ gaas yɔ mɔ ɗansig ya̧a̧rya wɔ.
Yaam doo za a Zope gi elz Simɔŋ yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Piyɛr gi zaa. Gi waak a Simɔŋ zoolnukya bɔ gi raa du a mɛmbal gbɔɔl ya̧gbarɔ.
Be wɛɛ be yaa doo gɛrɛ nɔɔktɔnɔ a mɔɔge an gi elzumɔ. Mɔɔ be bɛsum mɔ zaa gɔ be. Yɛrɛ wɛ gi ma Bɛt muutdu sɛw an wɛ lag ma hinyɔ Bɛt raasum sɛw an mɔ dɔgsɛ.
Piyɛr yɛɛl ya̧a̧book
a yɛrɛ be mɛɛ gɔ bɛttɔnɔ a Bɛt gɛ̧̄ks dood gɛ.
Dood hɛbtdi sɛw, za̧a̧nyɔ hoob gig ha̧a̧k Bɛto gi wɛɛ gi wook hinrɔb a gi muutdu, bɛs Bɛt bɛsɔ.
Nɛ mɛɛ dɔgl yɔ Bɛt yaas dood Israhilaya wɔ. Dɔgl bɔ kamz saŋtum dɔglɛ a Yeesu Kristu yɔ gi dood sɛw waar ya̧ nuŋg du.
Nɛ mɛɛ hingbɔɔlyɔ tuur a Yahuduya waal du sɛw. Hinɔ yɛɛl a Galile hi Yohana Bɛtmɛmɔ bɔ gi Bɛt dɔgl dɔgnik sɛw.
Nɛ mɛɛ Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ dɔglɔ yɔ Bɛt yaaz Mɔkilɔ gi zulha gi gaag tɛŋko. Yeesu ɛmb waal du sɛw woo hinrɔbo, za̧a̧s dood wɔ hi gi a loorɛha̧a̧l tɛŋk du sɛw anyɔ Bɛt gi hi giya.
Wii wi gi segyaadɛ ɔɔnɛ; wi gbɛn hinyɔ woo sɛw a Yahuduya hɛbt du hi a Urusalima, hi wa̧a̧ge hi doog a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha wɔrɔ.
Bɛt wɛɛ rɛmsig wɔrk du ɗunsige a ɔ̧t taasimɛ, wɛɛ midige.
Yɔ mida, Israhilaya dood sɛw hí gbɛnig gɛ, gɛ mits wii segyaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ Bɛt heriw biitiri. Yɔ Bɛt rɛmsig a wɔrk du gi wɛnzig a za̧a̧tig du, wi lehin hi giya, wi yɔ̧ hi giya.
Raawi a wi dɔgs dood Bɛtdɔglɛ, a wi wɛɛ wi dɔg a Bɛt gbaa gii dɔgl-gbaakya a wɔrkɛ wɔ hi dood za̧a̧til wɔ hi zulha.
Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ sɛw hi raa dɔglɔ a za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbsige Bɛt gi bitsig hinha̧a̧lɔ a Yeesu nuŋgɔ tɛŋk du.
Anyɔ Piyɛr gi dɔgl wɔrɔ dɔk te, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ siz a dood wɔ hi lak nɛ Piyɛr dɔglɔ sɛw hi zulha.
Yɔ Yahuduya Yeesu ɗɔbsigya wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Zope hi Piyɛr hi gi di hi gbɛn Bɛt yaas dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ wɔ Mɔkilɔ hi zulha hɛw, kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Ànyɔ hi lag hi book ya̧a̧boon segdɛ be hi ɗɔbsig Bɛto, Piyɛr warɔ
a dood wɛrɛ hi dag Bɛt Mɔkilɔ an wɛɛ her be, bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi ansihi Bɛtmɛm bɔ dakɔ nɔ?
Yɔ anbɔ Piyɛr wɛɛ raa dood a hi hotinihi Bɛtmɛm a Yeesu Kristu nuŋg du. Dood wɔ hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧ge an gi kɔm hi hii ɔ̧t kaasi.
Tɔmsya wɔ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi gi a Yahuduya hi lag a dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi ta̧a̧ Bɛt dɔglɔ ta̧a̧ hɛw.
Yɔ Piyɛr wɛɛ gi dɔɔ a Urusalima, Yahuduya Yeesu -fɔkya wɔ gɔ hi raa a gi an dood sɛw hi nabɔ hi faltin hin hi
a kɔm ri mɔ gul a kpaarɛ wɔ hi lɛl du mɔ letingo kok hi hii nɔ?
Piyɛr wɛɛ fɔksihi hinyɔ daa gbunu gbunu sɛw
a yɔ be gi a Zope waal gbɔɔl du be gi Bɛt zɔ̧ko, kol be zɛmrɔ, be gbɛn hinza gɛrs du, hinɔ riitin an gban gbɔɔl fɛɛti, hi ha̧b tɔlɔya̧ wɔ hi lɛl nasɔ siz bɛtha tuur be dɔŋdi.
Yɔ be see lɔl be muulɔ ge gbigi be gbɛn namb dɔɔ nasya wɔ hɛbtdi sɛw hi zaa hi nam hɛtum wɔ hi naŋkar wɔ, hi nɔɔs wɔ bɛtha sɛw gedu.
Be wɛɛ be lag Bɛt kɔlkɔ raabe a Piyɛr , ɗukum mɔ wa̧a̧ hin wɛrɛ mɔ gbɛɛrihi mɔ tɔbɔ.
Hɔnɛ be wɛɛ be in be raa a ewwee! Waar Bɛto, hinza ɓi̧i̧limya tadir be ya̧a̧ du ket gɛ nɛ zaŋ!
Be wɛɛ be kɛm za̧a̧n bɔ kɔlkɔ dɔɔ eesimɛ a bɛtha a hinyɔ Bɛt gaasige bɔmɔ sɔ̧ɔ̧ hinɔ an ɓi̧i̧limyayɔ.
Hinɔ tuur anbɔ dɔɔ taarɛ wɛɛ kɔl dɔɔ bɛtha sɛw.
Wɛɛ ɓɔrbɔ hi loo dood taarɛ hi yaazihi beege a Kaysariya waal gbɔɔl du hi tuur a be lukgbarɔ a lɛlyɔ be sil be waak gedu.
Bɛt Mɔkilɔ raabe a bɔ kol gi tuum rekɔ hi hiya. Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be Yeesu fɔkya wɛrɛ nɔɔngbun hi ka̧be, wi re wi gul a laaya gbɔɔl bɔ Kɔrnɛliyus raa du a Kaysariya.
Wal bɔ fɔksiw Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ gbɛŋkɔ gbɛnig erkɔ a gi lɛl du. Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ tursig
gi raasum dɔgl yɔ gɔ gi za̧a̧sumɔ hi raat mɔ sɛw.
Yɔ be yɛɛl nɛ ya̧a̧booko, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ siz hi zulha anyɔ da siz nɛ wɛ zulha biitir be.
Kuudu be wɛɛ be mɔk be mɛks hinyɔ Waar Yeesu dɔg nɛko a Yohana hotin dood Bɛtmɛm hi mɛm tɔs, yɛrɛ nɛya nɛ dag Bɛtmɛm hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ.
Bɛt gi gàà dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduya gɛ Mɔkilɔ anyɔ gaa nɛ wɛɛ be, yɔ wɛ ɗɔbs Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu, bee be ginɛ bɔ an be a̧a̧n Bɛto? Bɛt woos ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Yɔ hi lag dɔgl bɔrɔ anbɔ hi kɔm tɛrɛrɛ hi baan Bɛt hi raa
a Kak! Hinɔ gi rɔb ma a Bɛt gaa dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduya gɛ gbɔnɔ an hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi wɛɛ hi dag za̧a̧tig ma be mi!
Yɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gbɔm Estafanus, ya̧a̧kɛtil hɛks Yeesu ɗɔbsigya wɔ; zaa hi rek a Finikiya, a Kiprus, a Aŋtakiya, hi gi Yeesu dɔglɔ gii dɔk a Yahuduya wɔ hi teesdu kpɔd.
Yɔ anbɔ ɗɔbsigya zaadɛ walɛ hi fu̧u̧ a Kiprus, zaadɛya̧ a Kirɛnɛ, hi rek a Aŋtakiya hi dɔgsig dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduyaadɛ Waar Yeesu dɔglɔ.
Waar Yeesu tɛŋkɔ gi hi hiya, wɛɛ dood kittɔnɔ hi ɗɔbs dɔglya̧ hi ɔɔ hinha̧a̧lya̧ hi ta̧a̧ Waar Yeesu.
Dɔglya̧ tuur a Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi mɔksig a Urusalima hi tɔn du, hi yaa Barnabas tuur a Aŋtakiya.

Barnabas gi doo hinwookya rɔbo. Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi̧i̧s gi kpoos du gi ɗɔbsig Bɛt hi tɛŋko. Yɔ Barnabas tuur hɔ gi gbɛn Bɛt gi rɔbsig dood wɔ hɔ, dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ, wɛɛ ɓaasihi a hi kɔm hi fɔb Waar Yeesu hi kpoosya̧ sɛw, bɔhi wɛɛ kuudu. Dood saalnɔ gbɔɔl hi ɗɔbs ma Waar Yeesu gɔ.
Barnabas wɛɛ dɔŋg a Tarse an gi ɓɛɛ Sawulu;
yɔ zɛŋge kamzig a Aŋtakiya. Hi waa mɔksig hi Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hɔ lɛlgbun tuur wɛl gbunu hi goksig dood kit hinɛ. Hi yɛɛl dood Yeesu fɔkya wɔ elik a Kristufɔkyaadɛyɔ. Hi yɛɛl elikɔ a anbɔ a Aŋtakiya.
A ɔ̧tɔge Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya zaadɛ hi fu̧u̧ a Urusalima hi tii a Aŋtakiya.
Zaaya̧ gbun bɔ nuŋgɔ a Agabus ɗuk a hi teesdu dɔg hinyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gisig raak gaati a tɔs gi tuu a waal du sɛw. Kuudu tɔsɔ tuu ma gɔ a Waar Kalawdiya wɛlɔ yɔ gɔ gi ɗɔɔt waar gbɔɔl gedu.
Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi wɔbya̧a̧ hi teesdu hi raa a bɔbe gi kamz tusɔ anyɔ dagɔ an hi mɔks hi yaas nayza zaadɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi waak a Yahuduya hɛbt du.
Hi mɔks tus bɔ hi gaa Sawulu hi Barnabas hi kams ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkigya wɔ gɔ a Yahuduya.
A ɔ̧tya̧ gedu, Waar Hirudus yɛɛl Yeesu fɔkya wɔ zaadɛya̧ ya̧a̧r ha̧a̧nuko.
Wɛɛ raa dood hi gbɛɛr Yohana hindaɔ Yakuba hi daŋbɛsimi.
Yɔ gbɛn hin gi har Yahuduya wɔ anbɔ, wɛɛ wa̧a̧ Piyɛr hɛw a naab-ɔ̧t yɔ gɔ hi lil hɛ̧ɛ̧t gedu.
Yɔ bɛɛ Piyɛr wa̧a̧ko gbalig luknɔ du, gbaa layaadɛ koobl daa nɔɔn-gbunu lɛl nasɔ an hi ooge; wɛɛ mɔk a Paska naab gɔ gi daa hi kaŋg a dood muutdu an gi gbaasig dɔglɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ Piyɛr ɗɔɔt a luknɔ du, Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi mɔks lɛlgbun be hi waa hi gisig Bɛt zɔ̧k hi tɛŋko.
Yɛms yɔ an Hirudus gɔ gi kamnig a dood muutdu yoosugɔ, Piyɛr gi yok a layaadɛ eer tees du; hi wɔg hi ba̧a̧ntus eerɛ. Laya zaadɛ hi gi luknɔ gbar bɔ ooko.
Yaala Bɛtwalsɛr za zaa, lɛl gaa a luknɔ bɔ gedu. Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ kpòò Piyɛr dɛŋge a yɛ̧brya̧
a ɗukum nɔɔko.
Ba̧a̧ntus wɔ hi kpɔm gi naan du gbis.
Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ wɛɛ
a wɔm hi̧i̧lwɛɛl mɔ see du, hegum taal mɔ dɔɔ du.
Piyɛr wɔb hi̧i̧lwɛɛl bɔ wɛɛ heg taalɔ bɔ. Wɛɛ
a hegum gban mɔ gbɔɔl bɔ muulɛ mɔ fɔbzibe.
Piyɛr hegɔ tuu fɔge, mɛ̄ɛ̄ a hinyɔ Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ gi gɔk gi rɔb gɛ, wɛɛ mɔk a be gi gbɛnik hinza a gɛrs du.

Yɔ hi tuuz hi daar laaya biitir bɔ hi eesim bɔ, hi tuur gɔ a gbɔnɔ kpɛnis tusya bɔ ge an hi ren a waal gbɔɔl du, gbɔnɔ bɔ gboor gi naanɛ, hi tuu hi rek a bɔrignɔɔ zaa du, yaala Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ rek ɔɔ Piyɛr dihɔ.
Piyɛr wɛɛ mɔkhin gi zulha
a yɛrɛ be mɛɛmɛ ma a Waar Bɛt yaaz walsɛrɔ za̧a̧sib a Hirudus naan du hi hinyɔ dood Yahuduya wɔ hi ook nɛ sɛw an hi woo be zulha.
Yɔ mɛks anbɔ wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ rek a Yohana yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Markus nɔɔtɔ Mariyama raa du, a lɛlyɔ dood kittɔnɔ hi mɔks hi zɔ̧k Bɛt ge.
Piyɛr yɔ tuurɔ ɓaa tutin-gbɔnɔ. Yɔ nisgbaar za nuŋgɔ a Rogda kɛmz zaa an gi lag hinɔ.
Yɔ mɛks Piyɛr ya̧a̧ɔ, hin harige, an gɔ gi gboor gbɔnɔ bɔ, gboor gɛ, nɔɔ rek raas dood zaadɛ wɔ a Piyɛr zaa gi a tutin-gbɔnɔya̧.
Wɔrɔ hi
a mɔ yooyɔ.
Hɔnɛ gii wɛɛ raa
a be raak rɔb ro!
Hi wɛɛ hi ɗɔgɔ
a Piyɛr Bɛtwalsɛr ɔ̧ɔ̧n zaa.
Yɔ anbɔ Piyɛr gi gbosig tutin-gbɔnɔ bɔ ɓaaki. Hi zaa hi gboor lukgbɔnɔ bɔ, yɔ hi gbɛnige, hinɔ kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ.
Yɔ Piyɛr pɛɛ naan wɛɛha an dood hi kɔm sob hi kɛm dɔglɔ, hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧ ya̧a̧ya̧ gɔ. Fɔksihi hinyɔ Waar Bɛt tuusinge a luknɔ bɔ gedu. Wɛɛ raa
a dɔgsin Yakuba hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu -fɔkya zaaɗɛ wɔ dɔglɔ.
Kuudu wɛɛ tuu rek a lɛl za dɔɔmi.
Yɔ lɛl gaa, laaya wɔ hi watin hi teesdu hi tɛŋko an hi mɛɛ lɛlyɔ Piyɛr wɛɛ du.
Yɔ Hirudus raa dood hi ɓɛɛ Piyɛr hi gbɛnig gɛ, wɛ gbaas laya wɔ dɔglɛ, an gi raa dood hi rek hi gbɔ̧hi. Ɗuk a Yahuduya rek a Kaysariya waal gbɔɔl du an gi ɗɔɔt hɔ ɔ̧t kaasi.

Waar Hirudus kpoosɔ nɔɔg daarlɛl a Tirusya wɔ hi zulha, hi Sidɔŋgya wɔ hi zulha, yɔ anbɔ wɔrɔ hi ɔks an hi rek hi sɔ̧ɔ̧ge. Hi yɛɛl hi sɔmb waar bɔ Hirudus raaɔ-ookya bɔ nuŋgɔ a Balaste an gi ta̧a̧ dɔglya̧. Yɔ hi dak lees gi fu̧u̧z a waar bɔ gi hɛbt du, gii hi rek a Hirudus ge an hi ɛrig saŋtum a hi hɛbt bɔ gedu.
A ɔ̧tyɔ hi dɛ̧ɛ̧ gedu, Hirudus heg waar ums gbannɔ, ɗɔɔt a waar ums ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ dɔgsihi dɔglɛ.
Dood saal wɔ hi ɓooya̧a̧
a bɛt gii gi ya̧a̧booko, doo tɔs ya̧a̧boon gɛ!
Anyɔ ɗɔbs Bɛt gɛ, ɓɔrbɔ Bɛtwalsɛr za lɛge. Ga̧a̧r hi mid gi buu du hi tɔ̀g wɔrɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt dɔglɔ tɔɔ re gɔ doosɛ doosɛ.
Yɔ Barnabas hi Sawulu hi da̧a̧s woosya̧ a Urusalima hi wɛɛzugo, hi kamz Yohana yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Markus naanɛ.

Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi hingokya wɔ hi gi a Aŋtakiya nuŋgya̧ gɛrɛ: Barnabas, Simɛyɔŋ yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Doowilɔ, Lusiyus yɔ fu̧u̧z a Kirɛnɛ, Manayɛn yɔ hi kaŋkig nɛ hi waar bɔ Hirudus, hi Sawulu, hi sɛw hi giro a Yeesu fɔkya wɔ ɔksilya̧ bɔ gi teesdu.
Ɔ̧tza yɔ hi ɗɔbsig Waar Bɛto, hi wɛɛ hi hinlilko, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ
a hesinbe Barnabas hi Sawulu aakil du an hi woo woos yɔ be elinihi.
Yɔ hi lilhinɛ, hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧ Bɛto, kuudu hi gbaas Barnabas hi Sawulu naan zulha hi yaahi hi rekɔ an hi baar woosɛ.
Yɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ yaa Barnabas hi Sawulu anbɔ labɔ, hi tii a Silisi, hi fu̧u̧ hɔdi hi kar a lɛmb du hi rek a hɛbt za yɔ mɛm rɔg nuŋgɔ a Kiprus ge.
Yɔ hi rek hi tuur a Salamin hi yɛɛl Bɛt dɔglɔ dɔk a Yahuduya wɔ mɔksillukya̧ wɔ hi du. Yohana-Markus gi di an gi ɗaasihi.

Yɔ hi tal hɛbt bɔ mɛm rɔg di sɛw gi tuur a Pafos, hi zɛm doo Yahuduya gɛrsya za, Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya rɔb gɛ, nuŋgɔ a Bar-Yeesu. (Nuŋg bɔ Bar-Yeesu zɛmrikɔ a grɛg du a Elimas. ) Gɔ gi waatingo hi waar bɔ Serguyus Bums, doo dɔglmɛɛkya. Yɔ waar bɔ ha̧a̧g an gi lag Bɛt dɔglɔ, el Barnabas hi Sawulu hi zaa a ge. Hɔnɛ wal gɛrsya bɔ nuŋgɔ a Elimas ha̧a̧g an gi a̧a̧nihi-a̧a̧nɔ, gi sɔmbik doo gbɔɔl bɔ a bɔgi ɗɔbsɔ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ tɔɔ a Sawulu bɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Pol kpoos du, see gɛrsya bɔ lɔl du der

a mɔɔ loorɛha̧a̧l waa, mɔɔ hinrɔb sɛw lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya, mɔɔ yɔ mɛlɛ hi bɔbs yɔ gi sɛw hi̧i̧s mɔ kpoos du, mɔ gi waak Waar Bɛt hinrɔbɔ wɛɛnik an ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya, mɔ ɔ̄ɔ̄ Waar Bɛt gbɔnɔɔ wɔ hi er bɛttɔnɔ ha̧tirgo gɛ ya mi?!
Yɛrɛ Waar Bɛt nɔɔtigɔ gi lɛmɔ, mɔ yɔ̧ɔ̧, gi am kaasi mɔ taa ɔ̧t gbɛnik ma.
Ɓɔrbɔ lɔlɔ wilɔ, gbɛn hinza gɛ, gi mɔkig dood hi naan an hi tɛlige.
Hɔnɛyɔ doo gbɔɔl bɔ gbɛn hinyɔ turs Elimas, ɗɔbs dɔglɔ anyɔ Pol hingokɔ bɔ a Waar Bɛt zulha wɛɛsig gɛrsɛ.
Pol hi naaza hii hi kar a lɛmb du hi ɔɔ Pafos, hi tal hi tuur a Pɛrze a Pamfila hɛbt du. Yohana-Markus ɔɔhi dihɔ wɛɛ wɛɛ a Urusalima.
Yɔ hi fu̧u̧ a Pɛrze, hi fɔ gbɔnɔ hi tuur a Aŋtakiya a Pisidiya hɛbt du, hi gul a Yahuduya wɔ hi mɔksilluk du a holum-ɔ̧ti hi ɗɔɔtɔ.
Kuudu yɔ dood hi zaŋg Bɛtmaak ɗɛɛrwol wɔ hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ ya̧nɛ wɔ gi da̧a̧, mɔksillukya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi yaasihi doo hi
a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, gid nɛ gin dɔgl an nɛ dɔks dood nɛ gaahi tɛŋko, dɔginɛ.
Pol ɗukɔ, gbaasihi naanɛ an hi kɔm sob hi lag dɔglɔ. Wɛɛ
a nɛɛ dood Israhilaya wɛ hi dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaadɛ wɔ hoob gihi ha̧a̧k Bɛto, laginɛ!
Dood Israhilaya wɔ Bɛtya̧ her baa wɛ hiya, tɔɔsihi a dood muut du, yɔ hi gi rɔ̀bɛ a Misra hɛbt du. Wɛɛ tuusihi a hɛbt bɔ gedu hi tɛŋk gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Mɔm kaŋkihi wɛl dumbili nas a hɛtdɔŋ du.
Wɛɛ gbɔm dood hɛbtlɛl nɔɔn-erɛ a Kanaana hɛbt du, gaa Israhilaya wɔ hɛbt bɔ ya̧nɛ zulumsya̧ ya̧a̧rɛ,
wɛl an tɛmɛrɛ nasɔ daatɔ dumbili nɔɔnɛ hi talɔ. Kuudu Bɛt gaahi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kyaadɛ tuur a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Samyɛl waabilɔ bɔ gedu.
Kuudu hi wɛɛ hi ɛr Bɛt an gi gaahi waar i, Bɛt gaahi Sawulu yɔ gi Kis waawal yɔ fu̧u̧ a Bɛnzamɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧t du; ɗɔɔt waar hi zulha wɛl dumbili nasɔ.
Kuudu yɔ Bɛt bis Sawulu, wɛɛ her Dawda yaasihige an waar i, wɛɛ raa dɔglɔ a be see Yɛsa waawal Dawda riisib­riisɔ, gi woosib hinyɔ ha̧a̧b sɛw.
Yeesu bɔ Za̧a̧nɔ fu̧u̧ a Dawda dɔ̧ɔ̧t du ro gi loog gi wɛɛnig dood Israhilaya wɔ Za̧a̧sigyaya̧ anyɔ da raa nɛko.
Anyɔ Yeesu gɔ gi zaa a dood teesdu, Yohana dɔg Bɛtmɛm dɔglɔ kete an dood Israhilaya wɔ sɛw hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi loo Bɛtmɛmɛ.
Yɔ Yohana gi da̧a̧sig woosɔ wɛɛ
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, nɛɛ Abraham dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ; nɛɛ dood zaadɛ wɔ hoob gin ha̧a̧k Bɛto, yɛrɛ Bɛt yaas wɛɛ ma za̧a̧tig dɔgl yɛrɛ.
Urusalimaya wɔ hi waar ya̧ wɔ sɛw hí mɛ̄ks a Yeesu gi Za̧a̧sigya gɛ, wɛɛ hí kɛ̄m Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ dɔglya̧ wɔ hi zaŋgig a holum-ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw gɛ be. Hi da̧a̧s dɔgl wɔrɔ yɔ hi wa̧a̧nig dɔglɛ.
Anyɔ hí gbɛ̄n hinza yɔ gɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig gi wɔr dɔŋgɔ gɛ si̧, hi zɔ̧ Pilatu an gi gbɔŋge.
Kuudu yɔ hi woosig hinyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa gi zulha gi da̧a̧ sɛw gi wɔrɔ, hi sidzig a dɔ̧ɔ̧r bɔ hage hi i̧i̧ge.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt wɛɛ rɛmsig a wɔrkɛ teesdu ɗundsige.
Yeesu mits dood wɔ ɔ̧t kittɔnɔ, wɔ hi fu̧u̧tin nɛ hi gii a Galile hi dɔɔtin a Urusalima. Yɛrɛ hi gi ma segyaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ a dood Israhilaya wɔ hi tees du.
Wii wi zaa hɛdi an wi dɔgsin Dɔgl Rɔb yɛrɛ: a hinyɔ Bɛt raa nɛ a gí gaa baa wɛ hiya,
Bɛt woo hinɔ da̧ts baa wɛ waatya̧ wɛya gi rɛmsin Yeesu a wɔrk du anyɔ bi̧i̧ nɛ a Zaabura eesums bɔ gedu a mɔ gi waa beenɛ, nɛɛko bee mɔɔmɔ.
Yɔ Bɛt wɛnz Yeesu a za̧a̧tig du an bɔgi wɔr zaa, bɔ muulɔ gi dogɔ, wɛɛ dɔg an yɛrɛ lɛ: a be gaan rɔbs gaatɛ rɔ́bɛ wɔ be da be raa nɛ a be gaa nɛ Dawda.
Wɛɛ raa a lɛl za du ɓɛ: a mɔ́ tā̧ā̧ an Za̧a̧n mɔ Gaat bɔ muulɔ gi dog gɛ.
Hɔnɛ Dawda yɔ woos Bɛt hinyɔ mɔk nɛ an gi gɔ a waabilɔ bɔ gedu, wɔɔr be, hi wɛɛ hi i̧i̧g a baatɔ hi dɔŋdi, muulɔ dog be.
Yɛrɛ Yeesu za̧a̧nyɔ Bɛt ɗunsig a wɔrk du muulɔ dog gɛ.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, mɛɛn a be gisin dɔk hinha̧a̧l bisig dɔgl a Yeesu nuŋg du.
Wɛɛn nɛ mɛɛ be a Yeesu bits za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbsig sɛw hinyɔ Muusa maakɔ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi bitsig gɛ sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ oon zul nɛ, an bɔ̄ hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi dɔg gi tursinɛ. Hi dɔg nɛ:
a nɛɛ dood wɔ nɛ wɛɛn Bɛt dɔglɔ hin tɔs hin kɔmsinɛg gɛrsɛ, waginɛ. Bé woo hinza a waabil nɛ bɔ gedu. An doo fɔksin woosɔ rɔbtɔnɔ si̧, wɛɛ taa an nɛ ɗɔbs woosɔ be.
Yɔ Pol hi Barnabas hi tuuzig a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu dood wɔ hi zɔ̧hi an hi wɛɛz a holum-ɔ̧t zaabɔ gedu hi wɛɛ hi dɔgsihi hin wɛrɛ dɔglya̧ ɓɛ.
Yɔ hi hɛksugo, Yahuduya zaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gul nɛ Yahuduya maakya̧ hi sɔk Pol hi Barnabas, hi ya̧a̧book hi hiya, hi gihi tɛŋk gaak an hi kɔm hi kpoosya̧ gbun a Bɛt gɛmsil du.
A holum-ɔ̧t zaabɔ gedu wag kaasi an dood waalya wɔ hi zaa sɛw hi lag Bɛt dɔglɔ.
Yɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gbɛn dood saal hi mɔksɔ, hi gɔ ka̧a̧s yɛ̧ltɔnɔ hi faak hinyɔ Pol gi raak be, hi wɛɛ hi gig niik be.
Pol hi Barnabas hoobha̧a̧hi hinza gɛ. Hi raa

a gi nɛ an wi dɔks nɛ nɛɛ Bɛt dɔgl doosi, yɛrɛ nɛ gi inik Bɛt dɔglɔ nɛ wɛɛ nɛ zul nɛ raak a nɛ rı̄ı̄ an nɛ dag za̧a̧tig faa bɔ gɛ. Yɛrɛ ya! wí rek a dood dɔɔmɛ zaadɛ wɔ hi, wi re wi dɔgsihi Bɛt dɔgl bɔ.
Hinɔ Waar Bɛt raaw nɛ gɛrɛ: a be gbaam an lɛlgaalɛ a dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi teesdu, an mɔ kam za̧a̧tig dɔgl bɔ mɔ tuurin a waaldoorum lɛlɛ.
Yɔ dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi lag anbɔ hinharihi, hi tɔɔs Waar Bɛt dɔglɔ gɔ. Dood wɔ Bɛt sɛ̧ɛ̧hi nɛ an hi dag za̧a̧tig faa hi ɗɔbs Bɛt dɔglɔ be.
Waar Bɛt dɔglɔ ɛmb a waal bɔ gedu yɔ̧ɔ̧s lɛl sɛw.
Hɔnɛyɔ anbɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi sɔmb nɛɛd Bɛtɗɔbsigya wɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧tya̧ hi ɗɔbɔ, hi dood nabl wɔ hi gi a waal bɔ gedu, hi ɗuns ya̧a̧ɗantig a Pol hi Barnabas hi zulha, hi wɛɛ hi ninihi hi ɔɔ hɛbt bɔ.
Pol hi Barnabas hi tuuza hi pub luus wɔ hi dɔɔkuu ha a wɔrɔ hi muulɛ, hi wɛɛ hi rek a Ikoniya.
Yeesu fɔkya wɔ a Aŋtakiya hi dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ wɛɛ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ tɔɔ hi kpoos du.
Hin gbun bɔ turs Pol hi Barnabas a Ikoniya. Yɔ hi rek hi da hi gul a Yahuduya wɔ hi mɔksilluk du hi dɔg Bɛt dɔglɔ, dood Yahuduyaadɛ hi dood dɔɔmɛ zaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi ɗɔbs Yeesu.
Hɔnɛ Yahuduya zaadɛ wɔ hi tā̧ā̧ Bɛt dɔgl bɔ gɛ hi sɔmb dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ an hi see yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi lɔlha̧a̧lɛ.

Pol hi Barnabas hi kɔm hi am hɔ a Ikoniya, hi book Waar Bɛt dɔglɔ hi tɛŋko, hoobha̧a̧hi hinza gɛ. Waar Yeesu gaahi tɛŋko hi wook gɛrs sɔmsɔm hi naanya̧, wɛɛ Yeesu gi zu̧u̧nik a dɔglɔ bɔ hi dɔk hi wɛɛ hi gognik Bɛt gɛmsilɔ gi dɔgl rɔbo.
Hɔnɛ dood waalya wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧y du eerɛ a dɔgl bɔrɔ gi dɔŋgo: zaadɛ hi ɔks hi Yahuduya wɔ be, zaadɛ hi ɔks hi tɔmsya wɔ be.
Hɔnɛ dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduya gɛ hi wɔb ya̧a̧ya̧ hi Yahuduya wɔ lɛlgbunu hi ɔks hi waar ɛya̧ wɔ sɛw an hi ha̧a̧n tɔmsya wɔ ya̧a̧rɛ hi wɛɛ hi duutinihi bet an hi wɔrɔ.
Pol hi Barnabas hi bɛɛ dɔglɔ lako, hi nɔɔ hi rek a Listira hi a Dɛrbe, a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ hi gi a Likoniya hɛbt du gedu, hi a waal zaadɛ wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b di gedu.
Hi da hi dɔg ma Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ a lɛlya̧ hi.
Hi zɛm walza yɔ hi mɔɔg dɔɔwɔlya a Listira, ɛmb nɛ gɛ zaŋ, gi waak a ɗɔɔtillɛl di,
lag Pol gi dɔk Bɛt dɔglɔ. Pol wɛɛ seeg gbɛnig gi ɗɔbsig gi kpoos du an hi za̧a̧sige.
Pol ɓooya̧a̧
a ɗukum ha mɔ er bɛttɔnɔ zab!
Wal bɔ rɔndɔ yɛɛl ɛmbiki.
Hinyɔ saal wɔ hi gbɛn Pol woo nɛ be, hi ɓooya̧a̧ hi raa hi Likoniya ya̧a̧boonɛ:
a hi wɛɛn bɛt wɔ muulya̧ riitin an doodɛ, hi siz gɛdi wɛ tees du.
Hi dɔ̧ɔ̧s Barnabas nuŋgɔ a Zewus, Pol be a Hɛrmɛs anyɔ gii gi ya̧a̧boonya.

Maak-wookya bɔ gɔ gi ɗɔbsig maakwɔd bɔ nuŋgɔ a Zewus, maaklukɔ bɔ gi a waal gbɔɔl bɔ guzugɔ ge, kamz naabaadɛ hi ba̧a̧ntus fɛɛtɛ wɔ hi tɛɛn hɛtkɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ, zaan a waal gbɔɔl bɔ ya̧a̧gbarɔ ge, ha̧a̧g an gi gɔns Pol hi Barnabas maak hi dood saal wɔ lɛlgbunu.
Yɔ tɔmsya wɔ Barnabas hi Pol hi lag anbɔ lab hi taar gbanya̧ an hi zuns dood a hinyɔ hi gisihi wook rɛ bɛ̄sihi gɛ, hi nɔɔ hi tal a saal tees bɔ gedu hi ɓooya̧a̧ hi raa:

a hey, walɛ wɛ, nɛ gɔtig nɔ hinɔ? Wii wi gi dood hɛw an nɛɛ her, wi zaa hɛdi an wi dɔgsin Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ an nɛ ɔɔ hintɔs wɔrɔ nɛ zaa a Bɛt Za̧a̧til bɔ ge, Za̧a̧nyɔ kim bɛtha hi hɛbtdi hi mɛmbal gbɔlɛ wɔ hi hinwɔ hi gi du sɛw.
Da doosɛ Bɛt gaa dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t sɛw gbɔnɔ an hi fɔb gbɔnɔ yɔ ha̧a̧hi hi zulya̧.
Hɔnɛyɔ anbɔ Bɛt ɔ̄ɔ̄ zulɔ zu̧u̧nik anyɔ gi gɛ, gi hinrɔb wooko, gi bɛl naŋsig a bɛtha. Hi̧i̧tig lɛl gɔ rii gin lees gaako hi hin zaadɛ za̧a̧to, wɛɛ kpoos nɛ gi hi̧i̧sig hi hat be.
An dɔgl bɔrɔ tɔmsya wɔ hi book si̧, hi ya̧ns dood saal wɔ hi tɛŋk kɔkɔr an bɔhi gbɛrsihi maaknaa wɔ an gaasɛ.

Yahuduya zaadɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Aŋtakiya hi a Ikoniya hi zaa hi sɔmb dood saal wɔ hi ɔks hi hii hi duutin Pol bet an gi wɔrɔ; hi wɛɛ hi wa̧a̧g hi dirkig hi tuunig a waal gbɔɔl saŋgbati hi bidzige, ya̧nɛ hi mɔk a wɔɔr ma, hi mɛɛ a hi ɔɔg gbɛŋgi gɛ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi zaa gi dɔŋdi hi rɔge, Pol ɗukɔ wɛɛ wɛɛ a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu. Yoosugɔ wɛɛ ɗukɔ hi retin hi Barnabas a Dɛrbe.
Yɔ Pol hi Barnabas hi dɔg Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ a waal gbɔɔl bɔrɔ gedu a Dɛrbe, hi dag dood kittɔnɔ hi wɛɛ Yeesu fɔk-yaadɛ. Kuudu hi ɗun hi wɛɛ a Listira hi tuur a Ikoniya hi a Aŋtakiya a Pisidiya hɛbt du.
Hi gaa Yeesu fɔkya wɔ tɛŋko an muulya̧ gi ɓaa hi waa Bɛt ɗɔbsigi hi kpoos gbunu, bɔhi hɛɛ Bɛt gbɔnɔ. Hi wɛɛ hi
a gulkɔ a Bɛt wáát du gɔ mɔ yɔ̧ya̧a̧r ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ kete.
Yɔ hi hesihi ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkig-yaadɛ hi gbaahi a lɛlyɔ Yeesu fɔkya hi gi mɔksig ge sɛwi, hi zɔ̧b Bɛto, hi lilhinɛ. Hi gaahi Waar Yeesu yɔ hi gig ɗɔbsig gɔ naan du.
Pol hi Barnabas hi tal a Pisidiya hi tuur a Pamfila.
Yɔ hi dɔg Bɛtdɔgl bɔ a Pɛrze hi wɛɛ hi tii a Ataliya.
Hi kar lɛmb bɔ hɔdi hi wɛɛ a Aŋtakiya a lɛlyɔ hi gaahi nɛ Bɛt naan du an Bɛt gɛmsilɔ gi gaahi tɛŋk an hi woon woosya̧, anyɔ hi da̧dz woos bɔ.
Yɔ hi tuur a Aŋtakiya hi mɔks dood Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi dɔksihi hinyɔ Bɛt woo hi hiya hi hinyɔ Bɛt kpɛrs dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ gbɔnɔ an hi ɗɔbs dɔglɔ.
Hi waa ma hɔ am kaasi hi Yeesu fɔkya wɔ.
Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Yahuduya hi zaa a Aŋtakiya hi yɛls yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛya̧ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hingok anyɔ lɛ:
a à nɛ nāb an Muusa maakɔdɔgl yɔ raa gɛ, nɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an nɛ za̧a̧ gɛ.

Pol hi Barnabas hi tā̧ā̧ wɔrɔ dɔglya̧ bɔ gɛ zaŋ, hi gbaatin ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ a dɔgl bɔrɔ hage. Yɔ anbɔ yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi wɛɛ hi her Pol hi Barnabas hi dood zaadɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧ a Aŋtakiya hi yaanihi dɔglɔ a Urusalima a tɔmsya wɔ hi ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkigya wɔ hi an hi gbɛrsihi dɔglɔ.

Yɔ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ Aŋtakiya hi yaa wɔrɔ a Urusalima, hi talk a Finikiya hi a Samariya, hi fɔks Yeesu ɗɔbsigya zaadɛ wɔ a dood wɔ hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ nɛ Bɛt gɛ hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ zɛmr a Bɛt ge. Yɔ dood wɔ hi lag anbɔ, harihi hi sɛw.
Yɔ hi tuur a Urusalima, Yeesu fɔkya ɔksilya̧ wɔ hi tɔmsya wɔ, hi ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkigya wɔ hi zehi rɔbtɔnɔ. Wɔrɔ hi fɔksihi hinyɔ Bɛt woo hi hii sɛw.
Hɔnɛ dood zaadɛ Bɛtɗɔbsigya wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Farisaya wɔ hi tees du hi ɗuk hi
a gi an hi nab dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ nabɔ, hí wɛɛ hí
Yeesu tɔmsya wɔ hi ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkigya wɔ hi wɛɛ hi ɔks lɛlgbun an hi see dɔglɔ.
Yɔ hi faltinhin gi amɔ Piyɛr ɗund dɔgsihi:
a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, nɛ mɛɛ a Bɛt herib nɛ teesdu a biitirnaan du an Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ gi tuu be ya̧a̧ du a dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi teesdu an hi kɛm hi ɗɔbsɔ.
Wɛɛ yɔ Bɛt mɛɛ dood kpoos sɛw, zuun a ta̧a̧ dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ wɔ anyɔ gaahi Mɔkilɔ an wɛɛ be.
Gɔ̄ hinza dɔɔm hi teesdu an gi gɛ̧ksihi hi wɛɛ gɛ, gaas kpoosya̧ anyɔ hi ɗɔbs Yeesu.
Yɛrɛ nɔ nɛ maatig Bɛto nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gbaasig fɔkɔya wɔ hinɗɔmnyɔ daarlɛl nɔ? An baa wɛ hiya, hi wɛya hi zul wɛ, hinɔ yɛ̧rɛyɛ̧rɔ.
Yɛrɛ wɛ ɗɔbsig a wɛ za̧a̧ a Waar Yeesu gɛmsilɔ bɔ gi dɔŋgo an hii be.
Dood wɔ hi mɔks nɛ sɛw hi kɔm sob hi kɛmsig Barnabas hi Pol gɛrs dɔgl wɔ hi fɔkugo hi woos zaadɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ Bɛt woo nɛ hi hii a dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi tees du.
Yɔ hi da̧a̧s ya̧a̧boonɛ Yakuba goo
a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, lagsinbe! Simɔŋ fɔk hinyɔ Bɛt yɛɛl gi woo nɛ a dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi zulha an gi zaa gi her zaadɛ wɔ gɔ hi wɛɛsig doodɔ.
Dɔgl yɛrɛ riitin hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ dɔgl ya̧nɛ wɔ hi bi̧i̧
a Bɛt raa: a gɔ gi kuudu anbɔ bé wɛɛza bé wɛɛ bé wɔm Dawda lukɔ bɔ ɛ̧br nɛko, be wɛɛ be gɛmsɔ, be esige.
Yɔ anbɔ dood zaadɛ wɔ sɛw hí tɛb Waar Bɛto, hi dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ be gihi elik sɛw an hi wɛɛ dood benɛ.
Waar Bɛt raa anbɔ. Dɔg dɔglɔ lɔɔlɔɔ an hi mɛɛ.
Yakuba wɛɛ raa: a ya̧a̧n gii be mɔk a bɔwɛ zɛks dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduya gɛ hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi ta̧a̧ Bɛto hi gig fɔko.
Yɛrɛ yɛwɛ bi̧i̧sihi ɗɛɛrwoli a bɔhi tɔb namb ɓi̧i̧limya wɔ hi gɔnik maako hi wɛɛ hi kpɔɔnik loorɛ, bɔhi naamansi, bɔhi tɔb nambyɔ hi ɓɔ̧rɔ, bɔhi tɔb namb ga̧a̧mɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, yɛɛl amntɔnɔ dood hi dɔk Muusa maakdɔglɔ a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ hi du sɛw, dood hi gi dɔglɔ zaŋgig a mɔksilluk wɔ du a holum-ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw be.

Yɔ anbɔ tɔmsya wɔ hi ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkigya wɔ hi Yeesu fɔkya Urusalimaya zaadɛ wɔ sɛw hi see hinɔ bɛr an hi her dood hi teesdu hi yaahi a Aŋtakiya hi Pol , hi Barnabas, hi wɛɛ hi her Yahuda yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Barsabas hi Silas, hi eer sɛw hi gi dood gbɔlɛ a hi tees du.
Hi wɛɛ hi bi̧i̧ ɗɛɛrwol anyɔ lɛ hi yaanihi:
a Wii tɔmsya wɔ hi ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkigya wɔ wi boo yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ wi Yeesu fɔkya dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ wɔ nɛ gi a Aŋtakiya, a Siriya hi a Kilikiya.
Wi lag a dood zaadɛ hi fu̧u̧ wi teesdu dihɛ hi rek hi zɛksinɛ, hi luutin hi ya̧a̧boonɛ. Wii wí rāāhi an hi rek hi gɔ hin dɔɔm anbɔ gɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ wi mɔks wi wɔya̧a̧ lɛlgbunu an wi her walɛ zaadɛ wi teesdu wi yaahi a nɛɛge an hi kam Barnabas hi Pol , wɔ ha̧a̧wi a hii gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Ya̧nɛ hi gaa kolya̧ an hi wɔr a Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu nuŋgɔ dɔŋgo.
Wi yaa Yahuda hi Silas an hi dɔgsin hin gbun bɔ gii hi zulya̧ anyɔ wi bi̧i̧sin a ɗɛɛrwol du.
Bɛt Mɔkilɔ hi wii sɛw, wi mɔk an bɔwi gbosin hinɗɔmn gbaak a zulha, gɛ gɔ wi gaan dɔgl yɛrɛ yɔ gi an hi ta̧a̧g kpɔd:

Dɔglɔ gɛ an bɔnɛ tɔb namb wɔ hi gɔn maako, bɔnɛ tɔb namb ga̧a̧mɛ, bɔnɛ tɔb namb yɔ hi ɓɔ̧rɔ, bɔnɛ naamansi. Nɛ oo muul nɛ an bɔnɛ gɔ hin-a̧a̧bɛ wɔrɔ. Gid nɛ oo zul nɛ hi hin wɔrɔ gɔkɔ, nɛ woo rɔbo. An Bɛt gi oonɛ, wɛ ɔɔ naako!
Yɔ dood hi waar ihi, hi loo ɗɛɛrwol bɔ hi kam gɔ a Aŋtakiya. Yɔ hi tuur a hɔ hi mɔks dood Yeesu fɔkya wɔ kittɔnɔ hi gaahi ɗɛɛrwol bɔ.
Yɔ wɔrɔ hi zaŋgin ɗɛɛrwol bɔ gi da̧a̧ hi dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi dɔgl yɔ hi bi̧i̧sihi hi ɓaasinihi muulɛ.
Anyɔ Yahuda hi Silas hi gi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkyaadɛ hi zulya̧ be, hi dɔks wɔrɔ dɔgl kittɔnɔ hi ɓaasinihi muulɛ hi wɛɛ hi gaahi tɛŋko.
Yɔ tɔmsya wɔ hi am hɔ kaasi, wɔrɔ hi waar ihi hi yaahi rɔbtɔnɔ hi wɛɛ a dood wɔ hi yaazihi nɛ hi. [
Silas be ɔnɛ wɛɛ gɛ; see hinɔ bɛr an gi kɔm dihɔ. ]
Pol hi Barnabas be, hi am a Aŋtakiya hi gi Waar Yeesu Dɔglɔ Rɔb bɔ dɔko hi wɛɛ hi hingok geha be, hi dood zaadɛ kittɔnɔ lɛlgbunu.

Yɔ hi am dihɔ kaasi, Pol raa Barnabas a yɛnɛ wɛ wɛɛ a waal gbɔlɛ wɔ hi du sɔmsɔm an wɛ zɛ̧btir yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ wɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ a lɛl yɔ wɛ daa nɛ ge sɛw wɛ dɔg nɛ Waar Yeesu dɔglɔ amntɔnɔ an wɛ seehi hi gi rɔbtɔnɔ.
Barnabas ha̧a̧g an gi kam nɛ Yohana yɔ nuŋgɔ zaa a Markus hi hii hɛw.
Hɔnɛ Pol be hā̧a̧g an Yohana-Markus gi retin hi hii gɛ, anyɔ da ɔzihi nɛ a Pamfila, gi fɔ̄hi woos du gɛ.
Gabs ɗund gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi teesdu wɛɛ gaahi ma hɛɛtingo. Barnabas loo Markus hi kar lɛmb du hi rek a Kiprus, wɛɛ Pol her Silas hi rek lɛlya̧ gɔ sɔm be.
Yɔ yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi gaa Pol hi Silas Waar Yeesu naan du an Bɛt gɛmsilɔ gi gi hi hiya, hi rek gɔ.
Hi daa a Siriya hi a Silisi hɛbt du sɛw hi gaak Yeesu fɔkya wɔ lɛl sɔmsɔm tɛŋko hi Bɛt dɔglɛ.
Pol wɛɛ rek a Dɛrbe hi a Listira. Doo za Yeesu fɔkya gi hɔ nuŋgɔ a Timɔte, nɔɔtɔ gi Yahuduya Yeesu ɗɔbsigya, baatɔ be gi Yonaniŋkoyayɔ.
Yeesu fɔkya zaadɛ wɔ a Listira hi a Ikoniya ha̧a̧hi Timɔte dɔglɔ be.
Yɔ Pol ha̧a̧g an gi retin hi gii be, loog nage a Yahuduya wɔ hi gi hɔ hi dɔŋgo anyɔ dood hi mɛɛ sɛw a baatɔ gi Yonaniŋkoyayɔ.
Yɔ hi daak a waal gbɔlɛ zaadɛ ɗu sɔmsɔm hi dɔksig Yeesu fɔkya wɔ dɔgl wɔ tɔmsya wɔ hi ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋ-kigya wɔ a Urusalima hi bi̧i̧ nɛko. Hi wɛɛ hi
Yɔ anbɔ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ ɔksilya̧ wɔ ɗɔbsigya̧ gi rek hi tɛŋk doosɛ doosɛ, wɛɛ kitigya̧ gi hɔŋk ɔ̧t nuŋg be.
Yɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ ya̧a̧nihi rek a Aaziya an bɔhi dɔg Bɛt dɔglɔ hɔ, Pol hi Timɔte hi daa a Firiziya hi a Galatiya hɛbt du.
Yɔ hi tuur a Misiya hɛbt wel du hi tɛb an hi rek a Bitiniya, wɛɛ Yeesu Mɔkilɔ gāāhi gbɔnɔ gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ hi wɛɛ hi daar Misiya hi tal hi tii a Torowas.
À yɛms du Pol gbɛn Bɛt zunsig hinza a gɛrs du:
walzayɔ fu̧u̧z a Makeduniya zɔ̧g a zaam hɛdi a Makeduniya mɔ ɗaasiwi.
Yɔ Pol bɛɛ hin bɔ lab gbɛnuko wi mɛɛn gɔ a Bɛt gii giw elik an wi dɔks dood Makeduniyaya wɔ Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ, wi ɓɛɛ ma gbɔnɔ gɔ an wi rek a hɔ.
Wi kar lɛmb du a Torowas wi rek der a Samɔtaras, yoosugɔ wi tuur a Nɛyapolis.
Yɔ wi ɗuk a Nɛyapolis wi rek a Filipi. (Filipi gii gi waal gbɔɔl biitir a Makeduniya hɛbtɔ du. Dood Romaya wɔ hii wɔmɔ. ) Wi waa ɔ̧t kaasi a waal gbɔɔl bɔrɔ gedu.

A Yahuduyaadɛ holum-ɔ̧ti wi tuu a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gbɔnɔ bɔ gedu wi rek a zɛɛya̧, wi mɔ̀k nɛ a wi zɛm Yahuduya wɔ a Bɛtzɔ̧kya̧ lɛl bɔ ge hɔ. Wi re wi zɛm nɛɛd zaadɛ hi mɔks lɛlɔdi, wi ɗɔɔt wi booya̧a̧ hi hiya.

Nɛɛd wɔ zaaya̧ gbun nuŋgɔ a Lidiya gi gbandil hob rɔbɛ riŋnikya, fu̧u̧ a Tiyatira, táā Yahuduya, wɛɛ gi Bɛtɗɔb-sigyayɔ, gis Pol dɔglɔ kɛŋko. Waar Bɛt kpɛrsig kpoosɔ an gi kɔm sob gi kɛm hinyɔ Pol gi dɔko.
Dag Bɛtmɛm hi doodɔ raa du sɛw. Wɛɛ wariw hin anyɔ lɛ:
a gid nɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧b an be gi ɗɔbsig Bɛt hi rɔbo, zaan nɛ gul be raa du nɛ ɗɔɔtɔ.
Wɛɛ dɛmsiw naan gbɔɔltɔnɔ, wi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ inik gɛ.

Ɔ̧tza yɔ wi gi rek a Bɛtzɔ̧k lɛlɛ, wi dagtin hi nisgbaar za yɔ gin loorɛha̧a̧l gi muul du, gɔ gi raasig dood hinyɔ gɔ gi tuur hi gɛrsɛ. Gi daksig ɗɛntɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ tus gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi hinyɔ gɔ gis dood walkugo.
Gi Pol hi wii fɔbzig kuudu hi ya̧a̧ɓolt gi raako a dood wɛrɛ hi gi Bɛt Yɔ Gi Gbɔɔl Gi Daarlɛlɛ woosyaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ. Hi zaak an hi dɔgsin za̧a̧tig gbɔnɔyɔ.
Nis bɔ gɔ anbɔ ɔ̧t kittɔnɔ. Yɔ dɔglɔ rii Pol anbɔ nɔɔgnɔ, zɛmr
a be raam a Yeesu Kristu nuŋg du, loorɛha̧a̧lɛ, tuum a za̧a̧n yɛrɛ gi muul du.
Ɓɔrbɔ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ tuutu.
Yɔ nisgbaar bɔ ɗɛntɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi gbɛn a taa an hi dag tus zaa be, hi wa̧a̧ Pol hi Silas hi dirihi a luum ha a dood gbɔlɛ dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi muutdu.
Yɔ hi ka̧hi a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi muutdu anbɔ hi dɔg
a dood wɛrɛ hi gi Yahuduyaadɛyɔ hi wɛɛ hi lɛl wɛ zɛksugo.
Hi gók maak zaadɛ dɔɔmɛ wɔ maakdɔgl wɛ yansɛ fɔkɔ, zaabe ta̧a̧kɔ, zaabe wookɔ. Wɛ́ɛ́ yɔ wɛ gi dood Romayaadɛ be, wɛ ɗɛɛ an wɛ fɔb maak ya̧nɛ bɔ gɛ.
Dood saal sɛw hi ɗuk hi zulha hi niihi; waar ɛ wɔ hi taatir gbandilya̧, hi wɛɛ hi raa dood hi lɛhi hi sɔɔlɛ.
Yɔ hi lɛhi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi sɔɔlɛ, hi yaahi luknɔ du, dood gbɔlɛ wɔ hi wɛɛ hi raa luknɔ-ookya bɔ a gi oohi bɛttɔnɔ.
Yɔ luknɔ-ookya bɔ lag anbɔ loohi gbalihi a luknɔ du, a da lɛlyoogil du, wɛɛ dōo̍ ɗɔɔya̧ wɔ a tɛ̧ɛ̧-i̧i̧kil du.
A yɛms teesdu Pol hi Silas hi ɗɔbsig Bɛto hi hin-ɛɛko, hi gig baanuko. Luknɔya zaadɛ hi gisihi kɛŋko.
Yaala hɛbt nam ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, luknɔ bɔ sɛŋkɔ wɔ hi bee, ɓɔrbɔ gbɔnɔ wɔ sɛw hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧tiro. Ba̧a̧ntus wɔ hi wɔmn nɛ luknɔya wɔ sɛw dɔɔya̧ hi dudil wɔmnt muulɛ hi kpɔm hɛbtdi.
Yɔ luknɔ-ookya bɔ rɛm gi gbɛn luknɔ bɔ gbɔnɔ wɔ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧tiro mɔk a luknɔya wɔ hi tuu hi nɔɔ da̧a̧da̧. Hɔ̧b daŋbɛsimɔ an gi gbɔmn zulɔ.
Hɔnɛ Pol ɓooya̧a̧ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ
a bɔmɔ gaa zul mɔ nɔko, wi sɛw wi gi dihɛ.
Luknɔ-ookya bɔ ɛr laa, gul nɔɔktɔnɔ hi beeto a luknɔ bɔ gedu re zagl a Pol hi Silas dɔŋdi,
tudzihi
a baa, be woo nɔ an be za̧a̧ nɔ?
Pol hi Silas hi goo:
a ɗɔbsum Waar Yeesu , mɔ za̧a̧ hi zul mɔ hi dood mɔ sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ hi wɛɛ hi dɔgsig Waar Yeesu dɔglɔ, hi dood wɔ hi gi gi raa du sɛw.
Wɛɛ tudzihi nɛɛsihi nɔkya̧ wɔ a yɛms bɔ gedu. Wɛɛ ɓɔrbɔ wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ hi hotinge Bɛtmɛmɛ hi doodɔ wɔ gi raa du sɛw.
Wɛɛ kam Pol hi Silas gi raa du gaahi lees hi le, wɛɛ dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ anyɔ ɗɔbs Bɛt hi doodɔ wɔ raa du hi sɛw.
Yɔ lɛl gaa, dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi yaa laya wɔ hi raas luknɔ-ookya bɔ a gi bis Pol hi Silas hi rekɔ.
Luknɔ-ookya bɔ raas Pol hinyɔ hi
a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi yaaz dood a hi bisinɛ. Nɛ yɛrɛ, tuuzinɛ, nɛ́ rek bɛttɔnɔ.
Hɔnɛ Pol wɛɛ raa laaya wɔ
a wii yɔ wi gi Romayaadɛ, hi lɛwi saal du, hí wɛɛ hí yɛ̧ɛ̧ dɔgl wi gɛ be, hi gbaliw a luknɔ du be, yɛrɛ hi bisiw ri luurlɛl nɔ? Lab gɛ, hii hi zaa hi zulya̧ hi tuusiw wi rekɔ.
Laaya wɔ hi rek hi fɔks dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya gbɔlɛ wɔ hinyɔ Pol hi Silas hi
Yɔ anbɔ, hi zaa hi dɛmsihi naanɛ, hi tudzihi luknɔ bɔ gedu, hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧hi an hi rek hi ɔsihi waalya̧ bɔ.
Yɔ Pol hi Silas hi tuuz a luknɔ bɔ gedu hi tal a nis bɔ Lidiya lɛl du hi zɛm yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ duhɔ, hi ɓaasihi muulɛ, hi tuu hi rekɔ.
Pol hi Silas hi daa a Amfipolis hi a Apolɔni hi tuur a Tesaloniki a lɛlyɔ Yahuduya mɔksilluk gi ge.
Pol gi gulk a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu a holum-ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw anyɔ rɔ̧ɔ̧sɔ, a holum-ɔ̧t taar du gi hinwatingo hi dood wɔ hɔ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du.
Gisihi dɔgl wɔ hi bi̧i̧ ɗɛɛrwol bɔ gedu walkugo a gi nɛ an Masihu gi yɔ̧ ya̧a̧r gi wɛɛ gi rɛml a wɔrk du. Pol gi zuunik hinɔ gaattɔnɔ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol bɔ gedu. Raa
a Yeesu yɔ be gisin dɔglɔ dɔko gii gi Masihu bɔ.
Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi ta̧a̧ dɔglya̧ hi teesdu hi ɔks gɔ hi Pol hi Silas. Gbunɔ, dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ Bɛtɗɔbsigyaadɛ saalya̧nɔɔ gbɔɔl hi zaa hi nɛɛd gbɔlɛ kittɔnɔ hi ɔks hi hiya.

Hɔnɛyɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gbɛn anbɔ hi gɔ ka̧a̧s gbɔɔl-tɔnɔ, hi mɔks dood lɛɛlikya wɔ gɔ hi waak gbɔnɔ du hi gɔ saalɛ, hi ɗuks ya̧a̧bolt gɔ a waal gbɔɔl bɔ geɗu hi re hi yɛɛl Yasɔn lukɔ bɔ ha̧tirgo an hi zɛm Pol hi Silas hi wa̧a̧zihi hi kamzihi a dood muutdu.
Yɔ hi zɛ̧hi gɛ hi wa̧a̧ Yasɔn hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya zaadɛ hi dirkihi a dood gbɔlɛ waalya wɔ hi muutdu hi ɓoolinihi ya̧a̧
a zɛnɛ wɛrɛ hi gɔ ya̧a̧ a waal du sɛw hi zaa dihɛ.
Yɔ hi zaa lab Yasɔn gii zehi gi lɛl du. Hi sɛw, hi ɗa̧a̧k Waar gbɔɔl bɔ Kaysara maak ɔ̧ɔ̧n hi gi raak a waar za dɔɔm giro, nuŋgɔ a Yeesu.
Yɔ dɔgl bɔrɔ nams dood gbɔlɛ hɛbtya wɔ hi dood saal wɔ zulya̧,
hi fɛ̧ɛ̧ Yasɔn hi dood zaadɛ wɔ an hi gbaa tusya̧ hi wɛɛ hi bisihi.
Yɔ ɔ̧t bɛɛ lek yɛms gi bulɔ, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi yaa Pol hi Silas hi rek a Bereya. Yɔ hi tuurɔ hi rek hi gul a Yahuduya wɔ hi mɔksilluk du.

Yahuduya wɔrɔ ya̧nɛ hi gin kpoos rɔb daar Tesalonikiya wɔ mɔkilya̧ daarɔ. Ya̧nɛ hi ta̧a̧ Bɛt dɔglɔ hi kpoosya̧ sɛw. Hi wɛɛ hi sɔ̧ɔ̧k hinyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw an hi see hinyɔ Pol gisihi dɔk kinsa riitin be.
Yɔ anbɔ doodya̧ kittɔnɔ hi ɗɔbsɔ, Yonaniŋko-yaadɛ kittɔnɔ, an nɛɛd zaadɛ wɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧tya̧ hi ɗɔbɔ hi walɛ sɛw, hi ɗɔbs hɛw.
Hɔnɛyɔ Yahuduya Tesalonikiya wɔ hi lag a Pol gi dɔk Bɛt dɔglɔ a Bereya hɛwi, hi rek hi yɛɛl dood saal wɔ zɛksig hi sɔmbili.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi bɛɛ gbɛnik anbɔ hi loo Pol hi yaag rek a mɛmbal gbɔɔlya̧. Silas hi Timɔte hi kɔm ya̧nɛ a Bereya.
Dood wɔ hi kam Pol hi tuuringe a Atena hi yaazig gɔ. Yɔ wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ hi wɛɛk a Bereya, Pol wɛɛ yaahi tɔms a hi raas Silas hi Timɔte hi zaa nɔɔktɔnɔ hi zɛ̧be. Hi rek gɔ.
Yɔ Pol gi ook Silas hi Timɔte a Atena kpoosɔ ɗɔb ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ anyɔ gbɛn maakwɔd sɔmsɔm wɔ hi kit yɛ̧ltɔnɔ a waal gbɔɔl bɔrɔ gedu.
Yɔ anbɔ hi ɗɔɔt hi watin dɔgl hi Yahuduya wɔ hi dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi gi Bɛt ɗɔbsig a Yahuduyaadɛ mɔksilluk du be hi a luumha ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw hi dood wɔ gɔ hi dagtinu.
Dood hinmɛɛktɛkya wɔ gɔ hi elihi a Epikuriyaadɛ hi Sitoykoyaadɛ zaadɛya̧ hi watin hin hi gii hɛw. Dood zaadɛ be, hi raa
a ya̧a̧zɔ̧ɔ̧tya bɔdi ha̧a̧g nɔ dɔk nɔ?
Dood zaadɛ wɔ hi lagig Yeesu nuŋgɔ book hi rɛmtigɔ dɔgl a wɔrkɛ teesdu, hi raa
a riitin an gi dɔk waal za loorɛ dɔglɛ.
Dood hi dɔg hin bɔ lab yɔ Pol gi Yeesu dɔglɔ dɔk hi rɛmtigɔ giya.
Hɔnɛ wɔrɔ hi loo Pol hi renig a dɔglmɛɛkyaadɛ muutdu, a gol za bɔ nuŋgɔ a Areyopagus ge, hi warige:
a ha̧a̧wi an wi mɛɛ hingok mɔ seg bɔ dɔglɔ.
Wi kɛmdir hinza yɔ riitin hi hingok mɔ seg bɔrɔ ket gɛ, ha̧a̧w an wi mɛɛ hin bɔrɔ welɔ lɛlɛ.
Atenaya wɔ sɛw hi rɔ̀bɛ wɔ hi waak a Atena sɛw gɔ hi lɛl daasig an hi dɔkt hinɛ, zaabe an hi kɛmt hin sego.
Pol ɗuk gɔ a Areyopasya wɔ hi muutdu
a dood Atenaya wɛ, be gbɛn nɛ ɗɔbs maak wɔd nɛ wɔ hi tɛŋko a waabil nɛ bɔ gedu sɛw.
Yɔ be daak lɛ be seek maakwɔd wɔ nɛ gihi ɗɔbsugo; be mid sɛŋk za yɔ hi wɔmɔ hi bi̧i̧ muulɔ ge a gis bɛtyɔ hi mɛɛg gɛ. Bɛrɔ! Hinyɔ nɛ gig ɗɔbsig nɛ mɛɛ hinɔ gɛ, be gisin hinɔ gii dɔko.
Bɛt yɔ kim waalɛ hi hinyɔ gi gedu sɛw gi gi Waar a bɛtha hi hɛbtdi sɛw, taa waak a luk yɔ dood hi wɔmn naan gedu.
Taa an doo za gi woosig hin an nɔ, an gii yɔ gi gaak dood sɛw za̧a̧tigi hi holumi hi hin sɛw, wɛɛ hinza taag ha̧a̧k be.
Bɛt yɛɛl a doo gbun muul ro gi kim dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t sɛw, gbaahi hi waa a waal du sɛw. Dɛ̧ɛ̧ ɔ̧tya̧ gaati, hi ɗɔɔtillɛlya̧ welɔ.
Ha̧a̧ Waar Bɛt an dood hi tɛge, hi mɔkilge, kin hi zɛŋge. Hi rɔbo, Bɛt hɛ̄ml hi zaa gbun a wɛ teesdu gɛ.
Za̧a̧tig wɛ hi naŋk wɛ hi gik yɔ wɛ giro gi a Bɛt naan du. Hin-ɛɛnbi̧i̧kya zaadɛ nɛ teesdu hi raa hinɔ anyɔ lɛ hɛw: a wɛɛ hɛw wɛ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧t ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ gid wɛ gi Bɛt dɔ̧ɔ̧t ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, bɔwɛ mɔk a Bɛt riitin an hɛɛlmɔto, zaabe an tusɛ hi bet yɔ doo gɔ loog gi wɛɛ gi gɛmsinge hinbɛt anyɔ mɔkilɔ ha̧a̧ge.
Bɛt taa ɓɛrk hinha̧a̧l wɔ doo hi woo nɛ a ɔ̧t wɔrɔ gedu zaa ma. Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ gi elik doo a lɛl sɛw, gihi raak a hi zɛmr kpoosya̧.
Wɛɛ dɛ̧ɛ̧ ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ gi gbaas waal sɛw dɔgl du hi gbɔnɔ. Gi gbaa dɔglɔ hi wal bɔ herig gi gbaag an dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya. Rɛmsig a wɔrk du an gi zuns dooɗ sɛw gaattɔnɔ a be her giya.
Yɔ dood hi lag Pol gi dɔg rɛmtig dɔglɛ, zaadɛ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧lig be. Zaadɛ hi dɔg be
a wi ɔsum hinɔ kɛŋk ɔ̧tza ma.
Yɔ anbɔ Pol hed hi teesdu rek ɔɔhi.
Hɔnɛ dood zaadɛ hi hed hi ɔks hi Pol be hi ɗɔbs Bɛt dɔglɔ. A hi teesdu, Areyopasya bɔ Denis hi nis za nuŋgɔ a Damaris hi dood zaadɛ du ya̧nɛ hi ɗɔbsɔ.
Kuudu yɔ Pol ɗuk a Atena gi rek a Kɔrɛŋgtu,

zɛm Yahuduya za hɔ nuŋgɔ a Akilas, doo Pɔntusya, zaatin Kɔrɛŋgtu hi nistɔ Piriskila am gɛ. Yɔ Waar Romaya bɔ Kalawdiya raa nɛ a Yahuduya wɔ sɛw hi tuu hi ɔɔ Roma hɛbtɔ gii Akilas hi nisɔ hi ɔɔ Itali hi zaa a Kɔrɛŋgtu. Pol be re hii booko.
Anyɔ woosɔ gi gbun bɔ gii hi wɔrɔ ya̧nɛ bɔ, ɗɔɔt hi hii hi wootinwoos lɛlgbunu. Woosya̧ gɛ luk gbandil baaki.
