A holum-ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw gi watingo hin hi Yahuduya wɔ hi dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ a mɔksilluk du. Doodya̧ zaadɛ hi ta̧a̧ dɔglɔ hi ɗɔbs be.
Yɔ Silas hi Timɔte hi fu̧u̧z a Makeduniya hi bɛɛ tuurik a Kɔrɛŋgtu, Pol gaa zulɔ an gi woo Bɛtdɔgldɔk woosɔ gii tigid; gi raasig Yahuduya wɔ a Yeesu gii gi Masihu.
Anyɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi insig dɔglɔ wɔ lak hi wɛɛ hi gig niiko, Pol be hod gbannɔ pubsihi luusɔ muulɛ
a an ga̧a̧m nɛ gi wɛɛ gi zesin nɛ zulha! Dɔgl be taa du. Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ be rek a dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi an be dɔgsihi Bɛt dɔglɛ.
Tuuz gɔ a hɔ rek gul a wal za Bɛtɗɔbsigya yɔ taa Yahuduya gɛ gi lɛl du, wal bɔ nuŋgɔ a Titiyus Yustus, yɔ raaɔ gi a mɔksilluk dɔŋdi.
Kirispus, mɔksillukya gbɔɔl bɔ lag Pol Bɛt dɔgl bɔ
A yɛms za du Pol gbɛn Waar Yeesu
a gɛrs du raag a bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ, fɔm dɔgl be dɔkɔ, bɔmɔ ɔɔ;
yɛrɛ be gi hi mɔya. Doo za ɗɛɛ an gi yaasum naan muul an gi gaamɔ kosgumn gɛ. Dood be hi kit a waal gbɔɔl yɛrɛ gedu be.
Yɔ anbɔ Pol waa a waal bɔ gedu wɛl gbunu hi sɛɛ nɔɔngbunu gi Bɛt dɔgl gok a Kɔrɛŋgtuya wɔ hi tees du.
Hɔnɛyɔ waar Romaya bɔ gus Galiyɔŋ an hɛbt zulya a Akaya, Yahuduya wɔ hi ɔks ya̧a̧ya̧ hi wa̧a̧ Pol hi kaŋge a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk du.
Hi raa
a wal yɛrɛ gi sɔmbik dood an hi ɗɔbs Bɛt hi gbɔnɔ zaa yɔ fɔ maak wi dɔgl gɛ.
Pol bɛ̄ɛ̄ ya̧a̧ɔ aako an gi dɔg hinɛ, Galiyɔŋ raa
Yahuduya wɔ a nɛɛ Yahuduya wɛ, à hinɔ gi nɛ an wal yɛrɛ woo hin-a̧a̧bi, zaabe gi woo hinbɔbtini ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ be, yɔ rii an be mɔnɛ.
Yɛrɛyɔ nɛ watingo dɔgl tɔs hi nuŋg tɔs hi maak nɛ dɔglɛ, nɛɛ hi zul nɛ nɛ́ see hinɔ, hā̧ā̧be an be wɛɛ dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya a hin wɔrɔ hi dɔŋg gɛ.
Wɛɛ ninzihi a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk bɔ gedu hi tuu lakɛ.

Hɔnɛyɔ dood wɔrɔ sɛw hi tuuz lakdi kpoosya̧ gi nɔɔhi be hi wa̧a̧ mɔksillukya bɔ Sostenɛs hi lɛge a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧klɛl bɔ dige. Hɔnɛ Galiyɔŋ be dɔglɔ taadu hi hinya̧ bɔ hi book nɛ lakdi fɛŋ mɔɔti, mɔ̄k hinza a hi doo lɛk hɔ gɛ.
Kuudu yɔ Pol wɛɛ gi waa a Kɔrɛŋgtu ɔ̧t kittɔnɔ, wa̍a̍r yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ. Anyɔ dɛŋgls nɛ Bɛt hin a Kɛŋkeriya, hu̧u̧r zulɔ kete, ɓɔr gi ɔɔ kark a lɛmb za yɔ gi rek a Siriya hɛbt du gedu.
Yɔ hi tuur a Efesu, Pol ɔɔ Piriskila hi Akilas dihɔ re gul a mɔksilluk du hi watin dɔgl hi Yahuduya wɔ.
Yahu-duya wɔ hi zɔ̧ge an gi waatin hi hii dihɔ gi am kaasi, gii Pol be ta̧a̧ gɛ.
Yɔ wɛɛ gi ɗund gi gihi waar uko
a an Bɛt ha̧a̧ge, be wɛɛza a nɛɛge.
Wɛɛ kar lɛmb du ɔɔ waal gbɔɔl bɔ Efesu rek a Kaysara.
Yɔ siz lɛmb du a Kaysariya dɔɔ a Urusalima an gi boo dood Yeesu fɔkya wɔ. Yɔ boozihi, wɛɛ tii a Aŋtakiya.
Kuudu yɔ am hɔ kaasi, wɛɛ ɗuk da daa a Galatiya hi Firiziya hɛbt du, gi Yeesu fɔkya wɔ sɛw tɛŋk gaak nɔɔha a lɛlyɔ gi daak ge sɛw.
Doo za Yahuduya giro nuŋgɔ a Apolos, hi mɔɔg a Iskandariya, zaa a Efesu. Za̧a̧nɔ ɗɛɛ ya̧a̧book bɛttɔnɔ wɛɛ mɛɛ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol bɛttɔnɔ hɛw.
An mɛɛ Yohana Bɛtmɛm dɔgl gii kpɔd si̧, gi dɔk Yeesu dɔglɔ hi gbɔnɔ bɛttɔnɔ hi kpoosɔ sɛw, wɛɛ gis dood dɔglɔ gok hi gbɔnɔ be.
Yɛɛl Bɛtdɔglɔ book gɔ a mɔksilluk du, hoobha̧a̧g hinza gɛ be. Hɔnɛyɔ Piriskila hi Akilas hi kɛmsige, hi elig hi retin raa du hi da hi goksig Bɛt gbɔnɔ gaattɔnɔ.

Anyɔ Apolos ha̧a̧g rek a Akaya be, Yeesu ɗɔbsigya wɔ a Efesu hi ɗaasige, hi bi̧i̧s nahiza Yeesu fɔkya wɔ a Àkaya ɗɛɛrwol an hi dagig rɔbtɔnɔ. Yɔ Apolos re gi tuur hɔ ɗaas dood wɔ Bɛt gɛmsilɔ gaahi nɛ tɛŋk an hi ɗɔbs gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Apolos ɗɛɛ Yahuduya wɔ a dood muutdu hi tɛŋk ɔ̧ɔ̧n a hinfaltingo du. Wɛɛ zunsihi a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du a Yeesu gii gi Masihu.
Yɔ Apolos gi a Kɔrɛŋgtu, Pol fɔ gbɔnɔ a ga̧a̧tya̧ rek tuur a Efesu. Yɔ ɗagtin hi Bɛtfɔkya zaadɛ wɔ
warihi
a yɔ nɛ ɗɔbs Bɛt dɔglɔ nɛ dag Bɛt Mɔkilɔ dag ya?
Hi goo
a wi dag gɛ wí kɛ̄mdir nɛ hinyɔ mɔ raa a Bɛt Mɔkili kɛn gɛ hɛw.
Gii wɛɛ ɛrihi
a nɛ dag Bɛtmɛm nɔni?
Hii hi goo
a wi dag Bɛtmɛm anyɔ Yohana gɔ da hotinu.
Hɔnɛ Pol
a Yohana hotin dood wɔ hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ Bɛtmɛmɛ, wɛɛ raa dood Israhilaya wɔ hí ɗɔbs za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi zaa gi kuudu, nuŋgɔ a Yeesu.
Yɔ hi bɛɛ dɔgl wɔrɔ lako, hi loo Bɛtmɛm gɔ a Waar Yeesu nuŋg du.
Pol gbaasihi naan zulha, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ zaa gɔ hi muulɛ, hi wɛɛ hi booya̧a̧ segdɛ sɔmsɔm hi wɛɛ hi kɛŋk Bɛt ya̧a̧ɔ hi dɔko.
Kitigya̧ gi an walɛ koobl daa eerɛ.

Sɛɛ taarɛ Pol gi waak rek a Yahuduyaadɛ mɔksilluk du gi boosig dood dɔglɛ hoobha̧a̧g hinza gɛ, gi dɔk hinyɔ gi seek Bɛt wáátɔ giya. Gi hin faltingo hi hiya wɛɛ gi kɛɛk an gi wadsihi Bɛt wáátɔ dɔglɛ an hi ta̧a̧.

Anyɔ dood zaadɛ hi gin kpoos ɓaatil be hi tā̧ā̧ Bɛt ɗɔbsig gɛ, hi book ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l gii a Waar Yeesu Gbɔnɔ bɔ Pol gi book dɔglɔ hage a dood muutdu sɛw, Pol wɛɛ ɔɔhi dihɔ, kam fɔkɔya wɔ. Wɛɛ ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw gi hinwatingo hi doodɛ a Tiranus hingok luk du.
Pol woo anbɔ wɛl eerɛ. Yɔ anbɔ, dood Aaziyaya wɔ sɛw, Yahuduya wɔ hi Yonaniŋkoya wɔ sɛw, hi kɛm Waar Yeesu dɔglɔ.
Bɛt woo gɛrs gbɔlɛ wɔ hi wɛɛs dood gɛrsɛ a Pol naan du.
Hi loo Pol gbandilɔ wɔ heg nɛko, zaabe muswaar ɔ wɔ hi re hi fiikin gumtil wɔ hi loorɛha̧a̧lya wɔ muulya̧. Gumsya̧ wɔ hi loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ sɛw hi tuu gɔ.
Dood Yahuduya zaadɛ, loorɛha̧a̧l ninikya wɔ gɔ hi ɛmbik lɛl sɛw hi goo Waar Yeesu nuŋgɔ elik an dood wɔ hi gin loorɛha̧a̧l hi muul du hi za̧a̧. Hi raa loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ
a wi raanɛ hi tɛŋko a tuunɛ a Yeesu Za̧a̧nyɔ Pol gɔ gi dɔglɔ dɔk gi nuŋg du.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl Yahuduya bɔ nuŋgɔ a Sekewas waatɔ walɛ wɔ nɔɔn-erɛ hii woo anbɔ.
Hɔnɛ loorɛha̧a̧l bɔ lag anbɔ watihi
a be mɛɛ Yeesu , be mɛɛ Pol bɔ za̧a̧nɔ hɛw, yɛrɛ nɛya, nɛɛ bɔ?
Za̧a̧n bɔ gin loorɛha̧a̧l muul du ɗun gabs hi hiya, hi dɛɛtinu, ɗɛɛnihi tɛŋk sɛw, taatir gbanya̧, wɛɛ gaahi nɔko, wɔrɔ hi nɔ̀ɔ̀ hi tuuz ɔ̧l a lukɔ gedu hi rekɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, dood Yahuduya hi Yonaniŋkoya wɔ hi waak a Efesu hɛbt du sɛw hi kɛm dɔglɔ, hi sɛw hoobha̧a̧hi ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, hi wɛɛ hi ɗɔbs Waar Yeesu nuŋgɔ gɔ.
Dood wɔ hi ɗɔbs nɛ Yeesu zaadɛya̧ kittɔnɔ hi walk hinha̧a̧lya̧ wɔ hi woo nɛko a dood muutdu an Bɛt gi bitsihi.
Dood wɔ hi gɔk nɛ gɛrsɛ zaadɛya̧ hi tuus ɗɛɛrwol wɔ gɔ hi woonik gɛrsɛ hi kamz hi kpɔɔ laa du a dood muutdu sɛw. Ɗɛɛrwol wɔ riŋsya̧ hi dɛ̧ɛ̧ tusɔ sɛw tuur tus gaat duk dumbili nɔɔnɛ (50.000).
Hinɔ anbɔ ro Waar Yeesu dɔglɔ gi tɔɔ gi rek doos hi tɛŋko.
Yɔ hin wɔrɔ hi daa lab sɛw, Pol wɔb gi kpoos du an gi daa a Makeduniya hi a Akaya an gi tuur a Uru-salima. Raa
a gɔ be tuur hɔ, gi an be rek be see waal gbɔɔl bɔ Roma hɛw.
Yaa woosɔyaadɛ eerɛ, Timɔte hi Erastus hi rek a Makeduniya. Gii kɔm waa am kaasi gi gbunu a Aaziya hɛbt du.
A wɛlɔ gedu, dɔgl gbɔɔl ɗuk a Efesu a Waar Yeesu Gbɔnɔ bɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Nám za giro nuŋgɔ a Demɛtɛryus gɔ gi tulik hin zaadɛ hi tus buu, hi riitin an bɛtya̧nɔɔ Àrtimɛs bɔ lukɔ. Hinɔ gii gi gaak námɔ dɛɛt wɔ rɔɔsɛ.
Wɛɛ mɔks námɔ dɛɛt wɔ hi nám zaadɛ wɔ hi wook nɛ woos gbun bɔ
a walɛ wɛ, nɛ mɛɛ a woos wɛ yɛrɛ gii gisɛ rɔɔs kamzugo.
Yɛrɛ nɛ gbɛn hinyɔ wal bɔ nuŋgɔ a Pol gi wooko, gi dɔksig dood a bɛt wɔ dood hi gɔnik naanɛ hi taa nɛ bɛt zaŋ. Wɛɛ maat dood kittɔnɔ an hi ɔɔwɛ, a Efesu hɛdi kpɔd gɛ, a Aaziya hɛbt du sɛw daarlɛlɛ.

Wɛ ōō zul wɛ gɛ, gɔ gi kaasi dood hi boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a woos wɛ bɔ gi zulha. Anbɔ kpɔd gɛ, yɛrɛ dood hi sɔ̧ɔ̧ bɛt wɛ nɔɔ gbɔɔl Artimɛs bɔ lukɔ bɔ an hin tɔsyɔ. Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ mɛɛ a dood wɔ a Aaziya hi dood waal du sɛw hi gi gii ɗɔbsugo. Yɛrɛ gbɔlumsɔ gi da̧a̧da̧.
Yɔ dɔgl bɔrɔ pɛɛ kpoosya̧ hi yɛɛl ya̧a̧ɓooliki:
a hin gbɔɔl gɛ Efesuya wɔ Artimɛsya̧ bɔ!
Dɔglɔ hɛks a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu sɛw. Yɔ dood hi lag anbɔ hi nɔɔz hi zaa hi wa̧a̧ dood eerɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Makeduniya, hi ɛmbik hi Pol : Gayus hi Aristarkus hi kamnihi gabs a naab lɛl du.
Pol ha̧a̧g an gi tal a dood saal teesdu, wɛɛ Yeesu fɔkya zaadɛ wɔ hi a̧a̧nig-a̧a̧nɔ.
Woosya gbɔlɛ wɔ a Aaziya hɛbt du hi gi Pol saamɔ hi yaasigya̧a̧ hi zɔ̧ge an bɔgi gul a naab lɛl bɔ gedu.
Dood zaadɛ hi ya̧a̧ɓoolik lɛ, zaadɛ be hi da hi ya̧a̧ɓoolik hɔ sɔmsɔm. Hi sɛw hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ zulya̧ lɛl gɛ be. Wɔ hi mɛɛ hinyɔ dood hi mɔks gi dɔŋg be hi kit gɛ.

Hɔnɛ dood zaadɛ a saal bɔ gedu hi raas Iskandarus yɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gig yaatirgo doosɛ doosɛ dɔglɔ an gi er hi muutdu gi dɔgs Yahuduya wɔ zulya̧, gi raa a dɔglya̧ taadu. Iskandarus wɛɛ gba̍a̍ naanɛ an dood hi kɔm sob gi dɔg hin an gi zees Yahuduya wɔ zulya̧.
Hɔnɛyɔ hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ a Iskandarus gi Yahuduyayɔ hi sɛw hi ɓoolya̧a̧ hi sam hi da̧a̧s gɛ:
a hin gbɔɔl gɛ Efesuya bɛtya̧ Artimɛs bɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ doo gbɔɔl hinbi̧i̧kya bɔ zaa raa dood hi kɔm sob. Gii wɛɛ
a walɛ Efesuya wɛ, dood hi mɛɛ sɛw a Efesuya wɔ waal gbɔɔlya̧ bɔ gii gi bɛt gbɔɔl bɔ Artimɛs lukɔ-ookya, wɛɛ gi bet yɔ kɔm an muutɔrɛsɛ yɔ mɛɛz a bɛtha wɛ gig ɗɔbsig an ookɔya hɛw.
Doo za ɗɛɛ an gi faa hin wɔrɔ lab dɔglya̧ gɛ. Yɔ anbɔ yɛwɛ kɔm sob, bɔwɛ gɔ hinza hi dikto.
Dood wɛrɛ nɛ kamzihi dihɛ hí lōōluur a bɛt wɛ luk bɔ gedu gɛ be, wɛɛ hí bōō ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a bɛt wɛ nɔɔ bɔ gi zulha gɛ be.
Gid Demɛtɛryus hi woosɔya wɔ hi gin kaal a doo za zulha, ɔ̧t yɔ gɔ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧ dɔgl du giro, wɛɛ dood gbɔlɛ dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya hi giro, hi ɗɛɛ an hi kamz dɔglɔ a ɔ̧tɔ ge hi gbɛrsihi.
Yɛrɛ gi ha̧a̧n hinza dɔɔm be, nɛ kam dɔglɔ a mɔksillɛl bɔ dood gbɔlɛ gɔ hi es dɔgl ge hi gbɛrsinɛ.
Hi dɔgl nɛ yɛrɛ nɛɛko, gid wɛ wa̧a̧ zul wɛ gɛ, dood hi ɗɛɛ an hi raa a wɛ bindɔ, anyɔ dɔgl nɛ bɔ yaa yɛ̧ɛ̧s gɛ. An dood hi warɛ nams yɛrɛ dɔglɔ be, wɛɛ yɔ wɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ wɛ dɔg gɛ.
Yɔ doo gbɔɔl hinbi̧i̧kya bɔ dɔg anbɔ wɛɛ hɛks dood hi wɛɛ hi lɛlɛ.
Kuudu yɔ hi ɓoltin ya̧a̧ gi da̧a̧ anbɔ Pol wɛɛ el Yeesu fɔkya wɔ mɔksihi ɓaasihi muulɛ, wɛɛ waar ihi ɗuk rek a Makeduniya.
Wɛɛ daa a hɛbt bɔ gedu dɔks dood Yeesu fɔkya wɔ dɔglɔ kittɔnɔ ɓaasihi muulɛ, wɛɛ ɗuk hɔ rek da tuur a Àkaya hɛbto,
waa lɛlɔge sɛɛ taarɛ. Yɔ gɔ gi kar lɛmb du gi rek a Siriya, lag a Yahuduya wɔ hi wɔ ya̧a̧ an hi gbɔŋge, ya̧a̧nɛ gi mɔk wɛɛk kuudu an gi tal a Makeduniya ɓɛ.
Dood wɔ hi sɔkig gɛrɛ: Pirus waawal Bereyaya bɔ nuŋgɔ a Sopatɛr hi Aristarkus hi Sukundus wɔ hi fu̧u̧ a Tesaloniki, hi Gayus Dɛrbeya bɔ, hi Timɔte, hi Aaziyaya wɔ Tikikus hi Torofemus.
Hi dor hi oow doosɛ a Torowas.
Yɔ naab-ɔ̧t yɔ kokɔ gɔ taan hɛ̧ɛ̧t gɛ talɔ, winɛ wi kar a lɛmb du a Filipi, wi rek ɔ̧t nɔɔnɛ wi da wi zɛ̧hi gɔ a Torowas, wi waa hɔ yɛms nɔɔn-erɛ.
A samɛdi yɔ ɔ̧t legɔ, wi mɔks an wi loo kok gaat bɔ lɛlgbunu. Anyɔ Pol gɔ gi ɗuk yoosugɔ, ɗɔɔt gis Yeesu fɔkya wɔ dɔgl dɔko, dɔg zi̧i̧bikɔ tuur yɛms teesdu keleg.
Hi kpoo nɛ laa hi gi kittɔnɔ a luk buu bɔ wɛɛha wi ɔks nɛ gedu.

Yɔ anbɔ walsɛr za giro nuŋgɔ a Ewtikus ɗɔɔt a lɛltuutirya̧, yɔ Pol gi gbork dɔglɔ bɔ dɔko, yo ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ. Yɔ yoom bɔ daarig be yɛɛl madzig a luk buu taasum bɔ wɛɛha ge tuur hɛbtdi. Dood hi sizɔ hi zɛŋge hi pɛɛg wɔrko.
Hɔnɛyɔ Pol sizɔ zaa kus a gi muul kɔtig durk du, wɛɛ raa doodɛ
a bɔ kol gi tuunɛ, wɔr gɛ, kolɔ gi kete.
Yɔ Pol wɛɛ gi kar a luk buu taasum bɔ da giz nɛ gedu a wɛɛha, loo koko ɓɛɛda le, wɛɛ dɔg hin zi̧i̧tɔnɔ, lɛl gaanige, wɛɛ tuu rekɔ.
Yɔ hi wɛɛ hi kamz wal bɔ za̧a̧til a raa du, dood kpoosya̧ wɛɛ sil gɔ rɔbtɔnɔ ma ɓɔrɔ.
Wi dor wi kar lɛmb du wi rek a Asos, a lɛlyɔ gɔ wi rek wi loo nɛ Pol ge anyɔ da raaw nɛ a ha̧a̧b an be fɔ gbɔnɔ a hɛbt di.
Yɔ Pol zɛ̧wi a Asos wi loog lɛmb du wi retin a Mitilɛn.
Wi ɗund hɔdi wi gbor rek a mɛm ha wi tuur yoosugɔ a Kiyos muutdu. A ɔ̧tɔ zaa di wi rek wi tuur gɔ a Samɔs. Yoosugɔ ɓɛ wi rek wi tuur gɔ a Miletus,
anyɔ Pol mɔk nɛ a bɔwi er a Efesu an bɔ lɛl gi daaw dihɔ a Aaziya. Ɔnɛ gi dik an Paŋtekosta naab-ɔ̧t gi tuur gi zɛŋg a Urusa-lima an bɛrɔ.
Yɔ Pol gi a Miletus te, yaa ya̧a̧ a ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkigya wɔ a Efesu hi elzihi.
Hi zaa hi tuur a ge
a nɛ mɛɛ waak yɔ be waa hi nɛɛ ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw gi baar a ɔ̧t doos yɔ be zaa a Aaziya gedu.
Be waas Waar Bɛt woosɔ wook hi zul tiisigi, hi kaalɛ hi hinmɔŋk gooki a Yahuduya wɔ hi gbork nɛ ya̧a̧wɔk an hi gɔsib ha̧a̧lɛ hi naan du.
Nɛ mɛɛ a Bɛt dɔgl yɔ be gisin dɔk gedu be a̧a̧ hinza yɔ gɔ gi ɗaasin gbun gɛ. Be raasin hin sɛw, hoobha̧a̧b hinza gɛ, be wɛɛ be goksin hin a dood muutdu hi a raa nɛ wɔ hi du.
Be boos Yahuduya wɔ hi Yonaniŋkoya wɔ sɛw dɔgl hi tɛŋko, an hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi wɛɛ hi ɗɔbs Waar wɛ Yeesu.
Yɛrɛyɔ, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gib fɛ̧ɛ̧k an be rek a Urusalima, be mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ gɔ gi tursib hɔ gɛ.
Yɛrɛ be mɛɛ hin gbunu: a waal gbɔlɛ du sɔmsɔm Bɛt Mɔkilɔ da gisib raako a luknɔ hi ya̧a̧rhanto hi gib ooko.

Yɛrɛ benɛ bé sēē kol be an hinɗɔbti gɛ. Hinyɔ gɔ gi riisibe, gɛ an be da̧a̧s tɔms be hi woos yɔ Waar Yeesu gaab an be woosige gi tuur a lɛlyɔ gɔ gi lɔɔ ge, an be wɛɛsig segya be dɔg Dɔgl Rɔb yɔ raasɛ Bɛt gɛmsilɔ.
Be ɛmb be dɔg Bɛt wáátɔ dɔgl a nɛ teesdu sɛw, yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ be mɛɛ nɛ taa muut be zaa gbɛnuko.
Hinɔ giya be gisin dɔk nɛɛko, gi doo za gbun a nɛ tees du gi waks zulɔ, dɔgl be taa du!
Nɛ be a̧a̧sin hinza gɛ be, be dɔgsin hinyɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧g an wɛ woo sɛw da̧a̧da̧.
Oon zul nɛ, oon Yeesu fɔkya wɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gbaan ooraaya̧ sɛw, oonɛhi an nɛɛrɛwaat gɔ hi tamya̧ ooko. Kaŋkum Waar Bɛt fɔkɔya wɔ ɔksilya̧ bɔ zeb hi waawal Yeesu ga̧a̧mɔ sɛw.
Be mɛɛ a gɔ be rekɔ, lergum ha̧a̧l hi zaa hi tal nɛ tees du, hi wɛɛ hí ɔ̄ɔ̄ tam wɔ gɛ.
Dood zaadɛ hí ɗuk a nɛ teesdu hɛw, hí dɔg hin hi ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ an hi wɛɛ hi sɔmb ɗɔbsigya wɔ hi fɔhi.
Oonɛ, nɛ mɛks a wɛl taarɛ, yɛms du hi lurk du sɛw, be ɔsin raak an nɛ oo zul nɛ gbunu gbunu gɛ, be gisin hinɔ gbork raak hi mɛɛk lɔl du.
Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ be gin ɔɔk a Bɛt naan du, an Bɛtdɔglɔ gɛmsilya bɔ gi ɗaasinɛ. Bɛt gin tɛŋk an gi tɔɔsinɛ, gi gaan rɔbsɔ an rɔɔs yɔ gbaas dood wɔ hi gi ɔnɛ sɛw.
Bé ɗɔ̄kin doo tus gɛ. Bé ɗɔ̄kin doo za hɛɛlmɔtɔ gɛ. Bé ɗɔ̄kin gbandilɔ gɛ hɛw.
Nɛɛ hi zul nɛ nɛ mɛɛ a naan be wɛrɛ hii woosib hinyɔ ha̧a̧be hi hinyɔ ha̧a̧ dood wɔ hi gi hi beya.
Be zunsin a hinyɔ be woo gedu sɛw a gi an hi woo anbɔ ro an hi ɗaas dood hɔntil wɔ, hi wɛɛ hi mɔk dɔgl yɔ Waar Yeesu raa hi zulɔ a hingaakya hatɔ daar zekya daarɔ.
Yɔ dɔg anbɔ, zagl zɔ̧ Bɛt hi hii sɛw.
Hi sɛw hi kaa Pol ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, hi kɔtig durk du, hi zɔm wɛktɔ, hi wɛɛ hi wartinu.
Hinyɔ ha̧a̧hi kaal gi daarlɛlɛ yɔ Pol
Yɔwi kpáár wi ɔɔhi wi wɛɛ wi kar lɛmb du wi rek der wi tuur a Kos. Yoosugɔ wi tal a Roodi. Wi wɛɛ wi ɗund hɔdi wi rek a Patara.
Wi re wi zɛm lɛmb yɔ gɔ gí rek nɛ a Finikiya, wi kar gedu wi rekɔ,
wi tuur a Kiprus dɔŋdi, wi gbɛn Kiprus a naanyɛ̧li. Wi wɛɛ wi daa wi rek a Siriya. Wi er a Tirus an hi sisil wɔdɛ.
Wi re wi zɛm Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hɔ wi waa hi hii ɔ̧t nɔɔn-erɛ. Hi raa Pol hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ tɛŋkɔ a bɔgi dɔɔ a Urusalima.

Hɔnɛyɔ wi waa dimaas gbun gi da̧a̧ wi ɗuk wi wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ wi rekɔ; yɔ wi ɗuk wi reko, dood wɔ hɔ sɛw hi nɛɛdya̧ hi waatya̧ hi ka̧wi hi tuuniw a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu hi yaazuw da hɔ hɛmltɔnɔ a mɛmbal gbɔɔl ya̧. Wi zagl a mɛmbal gbɔɔl ya̧ bɔ ge wi zɔ̧ Bɛto.
Wi wartin wi kar a lɛmb du, hii be hi wɛɛ hi lɛl be.
Yɔ wi kar lɛmb du a Tirus, wi rek rɔbs wi, wi da wi tuur a Potolemayis wi zɛm yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ wi boohi, wi naa hi hii ɔ̧t gbunu.
Yoosugɔ ɓɛ wi ɗukɔ wi rek a Kaysariya wi sil a Filib Bɛtdɔgl ɛmbingoya bɔ gi raa du. Gi dood nɔɔn-er wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧hi nɛ a Urusalima zaaya̧ gbunyɔ.
Gin waatsiŋdɛ nasɔ hí lōō wal gɛ, hi gi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkyaadɛ.
Yɔ wi waa gi am hɔdi ɔ̧t kaasi, Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya zaayɔ nuŋgɔ a Agabus fu̧u̧z a Yahuduya,
zaa wiige zɛ̧wi, pid Pol hi̧i̧lɔ see du yɛ̧ɛ̧n dɔɔɔ hi naanɔ,
a hinyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ raa gɛrɛ: a Yahuduya wɔ hi wɔb za̧a̧n hi̧i̧lya yɛrɛ anyɔ lɛ a Urusalima hi wɛɛ hi gaag dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi naan du.
Yɔ wi lag anbɔ wii hi dood wɔ hi gi hɔ sɛw wi zɔ̧b Pol an bɔgi dɔɔ a Urusalima.
Hɔnɛ Pol warihi
a nɛ kaak nɔ, ha̧a̧n an nɛ kaar kpoos be ya? Yɛrɛ be gi gɛrɛ. Wɔk dɔglɔ gii kpɔd gɛ, bé ta̧a̧ wɔrk a Urusalima hɛw a Waar Yeesu nuŋg dɔŋgo.
Yɔ wi ɗɛɛ an wi ya̧a̧nig gɛ, wi ɔɔg wi raa
an Waar Bɛt gi woo hinyɔ ha̧a̧ge.
Yɔ wi waa hɔ gi am kaasi wi gɛms wɔd wi, wi dɔɔ gɔ a Urusalima.
Yeesu ɗɔbsigya zaadɛ wɔ hi gi a Kaysariya hi retin hi wiya hi da hi ka̧w a Manasɔn Yeesu ɗɔbsigya amnt yɔ fu̧u̧z a Kiprus, za̧a̧nyɔ dagiw a gi raa du.
Yɔ wi tuur a Urusalima, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ wɔ hɔ hi dagiw hi hato.
Yoosugɔ Pol retin hi wii a Yakuba ge. Ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos kaŋkigya wɔ hi zaa hi mɔks lɛlɔge sɛw.
Pol boohi, fɔk hinyɔ Bɛt woo hi gii gbunu gbunu sɛw a dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi tees du.
Yɔ dood wɔ hi kɛm hinyɔ Pol fɔk sɛwi hi baan Bɛt gɔ. Hi wɛɛ hi raag
a yɛ̧ɛ̧ wi, mɔ gbɛnɔ, a Yahuduya wɔ hi tees du, Yahuduyaadɛ duko duko, kittɔnɔ hi ɗɔbs Waar Yeesu , hi sɛw hi fɔ́k Bɛtmaakdɔgl hi tɛŋko.
Hi lag dɔgl mɔ a mɔ gogsig Yahuduya zaadɛ wɔ hi ɗɔɔt a dood dɔɔmɛ teesdu sɛw a hi bis Muusa maakɔyɔ gogɔ; mɔ wɛɛ mɔ raak be a bɔhi nab waatya̧, wɛɛ bɔhi fɔb Yahuduya maak wɔ hɛw.
Yɛrɛ wɛ́ gɔk ri? Ya̧nɛ hí ɔɔ dɔgl mɔ kɛŋkɔ a mɔ zaaza gɛ.
Yɛrɛya, wi gin walɛ nasɔ hi dɛŋgls Bɛt hinɛ.

Loomɔhi nɛ retinu a maak muulgaasig lɛl bɔ ge nɛ gaas muul nɛ. Toom tusyɔ gɔ hi hu̧u̧rin zulya̧. Gid mɔ woo hin anbɔ, dood sɛw hí mɛɛ gɔ a hinyɔ hi lag nɛ mɔ zulha sɛw gi mɛlɛ, hinɔ rɔb gɛ, wɛɛ mɔɔ hi zul mɔ mɔ fɔ́k Muusa maakɔ bɔ bi̧i̧ giya.

Yɛrɛ dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi ɗɔbs Waar Yeesu , ya̧nɛ, wi yaasihi ɗɛɛrwol wi dɔksihi hinyɔ wi wɔya̧a̧ hage a bɔhi tɔb nambyɔ hi gbɛrs maakwɔd wɔ hi gɔn maako, bɔhi tɔb namga̧a̧mɛ, bɔhi tɔb nambyɔ hi ɓɔ̧rɔ, wɛɛ bɔhi naa mansi.

Yɔ anbɔ Pol retin gɔ hi dood nas wɔ. Yoosugɔ hi rek hi gɔ muulgaasig maak bɔ gɔ. Wɛɛ da gul a Bɛtluk du an gi raas Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ muulgaasig maak bɔ ɔ̧tɔ gɔ gi da̧a̧ du, hi ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ gi tòò dooɗ nas wɔ muul-gaasigya̧ maak bɔ tusɔ du sɛw.
Yɔ muulgaasig ɔ̧t nɔɔn-er bɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧b da̧a̧ko, Yahuduya wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Aaziya hɛbt du hi gbɛn nɛ Pol a Bɛtluk du be, hi rek hi sɔmb dood saal wɔ sɛw hi zaa hi gɔ̧ɔ̧ge hi wa̧a̧ge,
hi ɓoolya̧a̧ hi dɔko

a walɛ Israhilaya wɛ, ɗaasinwi! Wal yɛrɛ gii gi goksig dood lɛl sɛw hin an hi ɓaas zulya̧ a dood Israhilaya wɔ hi maak wɛ wɔ, hi Bɛtluk yɛrɛ hi gbaŋgi. Wɛɛ kamz dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu hɛw, ɓi̧i̧l lɛl gaat bɔ da̧a̧da̧!
Yɔ hi gbɛn nɛ Efesuya bɔ Torofemus gihi Pol a waal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu gii hi rum a Pol tasigtas a Bɛtluk bɔ gedu.
Yɔ ɗɔglɔ hɛks gi nɔɔ ɗood wɔ a waal bɔ gedu sɛwi, dood hi nɔɔz hi zaa hi wa̧a̧ Pol hi dirig hi tuunig a Bɛtluk lako, hi wɛɛ hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɔnɔ bɔ ha nɔɔktɔnɔ.
Yɔ dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi an hi gbɔŋge, yaala rams tuur gɔ a laya gbɔɔl zulya Romaya bɔ ge hi raasige a dood Urusalimaya wɔ sɛw hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ zulya̧ lɛl gɛ.
Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl bɔ lag anbɔ rek el laaya dɛɛt wɔ hi laaya gbɔlɛ wɔ nɔɔktɔnɔ nɔɔ retin hi hii a dood saal lɛl bɔ ge. Yɔ dood wɔ hi gbɛn laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ hi laaya zaadɛ wɔ hi zaa, hi ɔɔ Pol lɛkɔ gɔ.
Laaya gbɔɔl bɔ tuur wa̧a̧ Pol , raa hí wɔg hi ba̧a̧ntus eerɛ. Wɛɛ warɔ a yɛrɛ bɔ? Woo nɔ?
Dood zaadɛ a saal bɔ gedu hi ya̧a̧ɓoolik lɛ, zaadɛ be hi ya̧a̧ɓoolik hɔ sɔmsɔm. Laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi kɛm dɔgl rɔb gbun gɛ anyɔ ya̧a̧ɓolt giro, raa hi kam Pol a laya wɔ hi woosluk du.
Yɔ Pol sɛ̧ɛ̧b a woosluk bɔ ya̧di dood saal hi gɔk gabs yɛ̧ltɔnɔ, laya wɔ hi pɛɛg wɛɛha.
Dood saal wɔ hi gig fɔk hi ya̧a̧ɓolt be:
a gbɔ̧nɛge! Gbɔ̧nɛge!
Anyɔ laaya wɔ gɔ hi gus Pol a wooslukya̧ du, Pol war laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ:
a gbɔnɔ gi an be dɔgsum hinza ya?
Laaya gbɔɔl bɔ warige:
a kɔmri, mɔɔ mɔ mɛɛ Yona-niŋkoya ya̧a̧boon ya?
Mɔɔ taa Misraya bɔ ɗuks gabs gi ām gɛ gi wɛɛ gi kam zulgbɔŋkyaadɛ duk nas wɔ a hɛt dɔŋg du gɛ ya?
Pol goo:
a ewwee, bee be gi Yahudu-yayɔ, hi mɔɔb a Tarse a Silikiya hɛbt du. Be gi waal gbɔɔlya waayɔ. Be zɔ̧mɔ, gaabe gbɔnɔ an be dɔks dood saal hinɛ.
Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl bɔ gaa Pol gbɔnɔ, Pol er a kɔntil lɛl bɔ gɔ hi kar geha hi tal luk ɗu, gbaas dood naanɛ, hi kɔm tɛrɛrɛ. Dɔg gɔ hi Ibraniŋko ya̧a̧boonɛ:
a baa be wɛ hi nabeza wɛ, laginɛ, hinyɔ be dɔk yɔ be taan a̧a̧bi!
Yɔ dood hi lagig gi book hi Ibraniŋko ya̧a̧boonɛ, hi wɛɛ hi see bɛttɔnɔ, an hi kɛmɔ.
A bee be Yahuduyayɔ, hi mɔɔb a Tarse a Silikiya hɛbtdu. Hi kaŋkib a Urusalima dihɛ. Gamaliyɛl gii goksib hin be mɛɛ baa wɛ maakdɔgl bɔ rɔbtɔnɔ. Be fɔk nɛ Bɛt hi tɛŋko anyɔ nɛɛ nɛ gig fɔk nɛɛk be.
Be ha̧a̧n nɛ dood wɔ hi fɔk Yeesu Gbɔnɔ yɛrɛ ya̧a̧rɛ be gbɔ̧hi. Be wa̧a̧l walɛ hi nɛɛd sɛw be wɔhi be yaahi luknɔ du.

Bɛtmaak-wookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ hi ɗɛntɛ Yahuduya dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ sɛw hi ɗɛɛ an hi ta̧a̧ a hɔɔ! be dɔk rɔbo. Hi gaab ɗɛɛrwol yɔ hi bi̧i̧s nawɛza Yahuduya wɔ a Dimaska an be kamsihi hi gaab gbɔnɔ be wa̧a̧l Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi gi a hɔ hɛw, be wɔblihi be kamzihi a Urusalima an hi ha̧a̧nihi ya̧a̧rɛ.
Anyɔ be rek a gbɔnɔ du be sɛ̧ɛ̧bik Dimaska dɔŋdi a lurk tees du, yaala lɛlgaal za fu̧u̧z a bɛtha kpay gaa yɔ̧ɔ̧s dɔŋg be.
Be mat hɛbtdi be wɛɛ be lag ya̧a̧ za gib elzugo: a Sawulu! Sawulu! Mɔ gib ya̧a̧ kɛtingo nɔ?
Be warige: a mɔɔ bɔ, Waar i? Za̧a̧nɔ wɛɛ goo: a bee Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ mɔ gig ya̧a̧ kɛtingo!
Dood wɔ hi gi nɛ hi bee hi gbɛn lɛlgaal bɔ bɛttɔnɔ, ɔnɛ hí lāg za̧a̧n bɔ gib boozig ya̧a̧boonɔ gɛ. Hɔnɛ be wɛɛ be warige a nɛ be woo nɔ, Waar i?
Wɛɛ Waar Yeesu raabe a ɗukum ha mɔ rek mɔ gul a Dimaska, a hɔ, hí raasum hinyɔ gi an mɔ woo sɛw.
Anyɔ lɛlgaal bɔ yɔ̧ɔ̧s lɔl be be gbɛnlɔl gɛ, dood wɔ hi gi hi bee hi wa̧a̧be naan muul hi tɛlib be tuur gɔ a Dimaska.
Hɔnɛ wal za gi hɔ nuŋgɔ a Ananiyas, gi Bɛtmaakdɔgl fɔk hi gbɔnɔ. Yahuduya wɔ hi ɗɔɔtig a Dimaska sɛw hi ta̧a̧g an doo rɔbo.
Gii zaa gi er be dɔŋdi gi raabe: a yɛ̧ɛ̧ be Sawulu, gaasum lɔl mɔ, ɓɔrbɔ lɔl be gaa be wɛɛ be gbɛnig-gbɛnɔ.
Wɛɛ raa a baa wɛ Bɛtya̧ bɔ gii herumɔ an mɔ mɛɛ hinyɔ ha̧a̧ge, an mɔ gbɛn Doo Riit bɔ, an mɔ lag dɔgl yɔ gi a gi ya̧a̧ du.
Gbaam an segya ɔ̧ɔ̧ an mɔ dɔks dood sɛw hinyɔ mɔ gbɛnɔ hi hinyɔ mɔ lagɔ.
Yɛrɛ mɔ ook nɔ? Ɗundum mɔ loo Bɛtmɛm a Waar Yeesu nuŋg du, mɔ el a Waar Yeesu za̧a̧sibe an Bɛt gi doktsum hinha̧a̧l mɔ.
Yɔ be wɛɛ a Urusalima be gul a Bɛtluk du an be zɔ̧ Bɛto, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ zunsib hinza gɛrs du.
Be gbɛn Waar Yeesu gib raako: a sam du, tuum a Urusalima hɛbt du nɔɔko, dood wɛrɛ hi tā̧ā̧ hinyɔ gɔ mɔ dɔgsihi be zulha gɛ.
Be wɛɛ be ta̧a̧ a Waar i, hi mɛɛ bɛttɔnɔ hi zulya̧ a gɔ be rek nɛ a mɔksilluk wɔ du sɛw, be wa̧a̧lik dood wɔ hi gim ɗɔbsugo be gihi yaak a luknɔ du, be gihi lɛko.
Yɔ hi wa̧a̧ Estafanus, za̧a̧nyɔ dɔks dood dɔgl mɔ hi gig gbɔŋko, be gidi hɛw be ta̧a̧ an hi gbɔŋge, be oo gbɔŋkɔya wɔ gbandilya̧ wɔ hi mɔks be dɔŋdi.
Hɔnɛ wɛɛ Waar Yeesu raabe a ɗukumɔ, bé yaam a dɔ̧ɔ̧t dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ Bɛt gɛ hi teesdu a hɛbt zaadɛ hɛml wɔ hi an mɔ ɛmbin dɔgl be.
Dood saal wɔ hi mɔm Pol hi kɛmsig tuur a dɔgl yɛrɛ raa gedu, wɛɛ hi ɓooya̧a̧
a wa̧a̧n wal yɛrɛ nɛ gbɔŋg nɛ zaŋ, rı̄ı̄ an hi ɔɔg za̧a̧til gɛ!
Hi wɛɛ hi ɓoolya̧a̧ hi hodil gbandilya̧ hi namsɔ, hi yaa luus a bɛtha.
Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ gbɛn anbɔ raa doodɔ hi loo Pol hi gunig a lukya̧ du hi lɛge an gi dɔg hinyɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gig ya̧a̧ wɔ̧ɔ̧nuko gi mɛɛ.
Yɔ hi wɔg an hi lɛge, Pol ɛr laaya gbɔɔl bɔ gi dɔŋgdi:
a nɛ gin gbɔnɔ an nɛ ɓaa doo Romaya yɔ dɔgl matig ket gɛ ya?
Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl bɔ lag dɔgl bɔrɔ, rek a laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ ge warige
a mɔ gɔk nɔ? Wal bɔrɔ gi Romayayɔ!
Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ lag anbɔ zaa war Pol
a raasibe, mɔ gi Romaya ya?
Gii ta̧a̧
a hɔɔ, be gi Romayayɔ.
Laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ raa
a bee be too tus gbɔɔltɔnɔ an be wɛɛ Romaya hɛw.
Pol wɛɛ raa:
a benɛ be rɛm be zɛm be gi Romaya waayɔ.
Yɔ laaya wɔ hi sɔɔ nɛ gi dɔŋdi an hi lɛg gi dɔg hinɛ hi kɛm anbɔ, hi sɔɔ tɔlɛ. Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ see Pol an gi Romaya waayɔ, hoob wɛɛ ha̧a̧gha̧ yɔ wɔge.

Hɔnɛ yoosugɔ yɔ laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ ha̧a̧g an gi mɛɛ Pol dɔglɔ hi rɔb a hinyɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig dɔŋgɔ ge, pidige, wɛɛ raa Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ sɛw hi mɔks lɛlɔdi, wɛɛ kamz Pol esig hi muutdu.
Pol see dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ lɔl du gbig,
a Bɛt muutdu, yɛɛl amntɔnɔ tuur nɛɛko, be wāā hi kpoos-zɛksig gɛ.
Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ raa dood wɔ hi erik Pol dɔŋdi a hi dɛm Pol ya̧a̧gbarɔ.
Pol yɔ lag anbɔ wɛɛ niige
a wɔmnt buu an Bɛt gi dɛm mɔɔ be! Mɔ ɗɔɔt hɔ an mɔ gbaasib dɔgl anyɔ maakdɔgl gi dɔko. Yɛrɛ yɔ mɔ raa a hi dɛ̧be, nɛ mɔ hatirgo maakdɔgl ma mi!
Wɔ hi er gi dɔŋdi hi
a e-e! Mɔ niik Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ Bɛt esig giya?
Pol wɛɛ goo
a hinda be wɛ, be mɛɛ a gi Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔti gɛ. Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol raa nɛ bē a bɔmɔ boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a dood mɔ waar ya̧ zulha.
Hɔnɛyɔ Pol gbɛn dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ zaadɛya̧ hi gi Saduki-yaadɛ be, zaadɛ be hi gi Farisayaadɛ be, ɓooya̧a̧ raa
a hinda be wɛ, bee be Farisayayɔ, bee be Farisaya waayɔ; be gbaak mɔkil be a Bɛt gi rɛms wɔrkɛ wɔ hi kol ro, ya̧a̧nɛ hi gisib dɔgl-gbaako.
Yɔ dɔg anbɔ, hinfaltingo ɗuk a Farisaya wɔ hi Sadukiya wɔ hi tees du.
Sadukiya wɔ gɔ hi raak be a wɔrkɛ rɛmtig taaro, Bɛtwalsɛr taaro, loorɛ taaro. Wɛɛ Farisaya wɔ gɔ hi raak a hin wɔrɔ sɛw giiro. Saal wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧y gɔ du eerɛ.
Dood hi yɛɛl ya̧a̧ɓoolik gɔ sɔmsɔm. Bɛtmaak­dɔkya zaadɛ a Farisaya wɔ hi gbaŋgi hi ɗuk hi gab hi
a wi zɛ̄m hin-a̧a̧b a wal yɛrɛ ge nɛ gɛ zaŋ! Kinsa Bɛtwalsɛr boozigya̧a̧, zaabe mɔkili boozigya̧a̧ be?

Hinfaltingo wɛɛ ɗuk gɔ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi tɛŋko, yɔ anbɔ laya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ kol tuugtu an bɔhi hɛbl Pol gi wɔrɔ. Wɛɛ raa laaya dɛɛt wɔ hi rek hi ha̧dz Pol a saal tees bɔ gedu hi tɛŋko hi dɔɔnig a hi woosluk du.
A yɛmsɔ gedu Waar Yeesu mits Pol
a ɓaasum kpoos mɔ, bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧mɔ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, anyɔ mɔ boos dood dɔgl be a Urusalima, gi an mɔ rek a Roma mɔ boo dɔgl be be.
Yoosugɔ yɔ lɛl gaa, Yahuduya wɔ hi mɔksɔ hi wɔ ya̧a̧ gbunu, hi dɛŋgl hinɛ a hi taa hin leko, hi taa yɔ̧ko, hi gbɔm Pol ketgba̧.
Dood wɔ hi mɔ́ks hi wɔ ya̧a̧ anbɔ hi daar dumbili nas hɛw.
Hi rek a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hii hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi fɔkɔ a wi dɛŋgl hin ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ wi raa
a wi taa hinza leko, wi gbɔm Pol ketgba̧.
Yɛrɛ nɛya hi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ sɛw nɛ yaa doo a laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt Romaya bɔ ge gi kamz Pol a nɛɛge an ha̧a̧ nɛɛ dɔglɔ gaasig rɔbtɔnɔ, wii be gɔ gi anbɔ wi sɛ̧bz di bed an wi wa̧a̧ wi gbɔŋge.
Hɔnɛyɔ Pol fabtɔ lag hi wɔ ya̧a̧ anbɔ a luurlɛl an hi gbɔŋge, wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ rek a laaya wooslukya̧ da gul a Pol ge dɔgsige.
Pol wɛɛ elz laaya za gbɔɔl
a kam wala yɛrɛ a gbɔɔl nɛ mɔɔt bɔ ge, gin dɔgl za an gi fɔksige.
Laaya gbɔɔl bɔ loo wala bɔ kaŋg a gbɔɔlya̧ mɔɔt bɔ ge
a Pol luknɔya bɔ gii elibe gi zɔ̧be a be kamsum wala yɛrɛ gin hinza an gi dɔgsumɔ.
Laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ loo wala bɔ naanmuulɛ hi sɔɔ aakil du. Yɔ hi gi ɔ̧ɔ̧kya̧ warige
a ha̧a̧m an mɔ raasib nɔ?
A be zaasum raak
a Yahuduya wɔ hi wɔ ya̧a̧ an hi raam mɔ kamz Pol a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ hi yoosugo, an ha̧a̧hi dɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧n gaasig rɔbtɔnɔ ɓɛ.

Bɔmɔ kɛmsihi. Dood wɔrɔ zaadɛya̧ hi gig kɛtig an hi gbɔŋge hi daar dumbili nas hɛw. Hi dɛŋgl hinɛ a hi taa leko hi taa yɔ̧ko, hi gbɔm Pol ketgba̧. Hi gɛbs hin sɛw da̧a̧da̧, yɛrɛ hi ook hinyɔ gɔ mɔ ta̧a̧hi gii ma.
Laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ raa wala bɔ:
a bɔmɔ rek mɔ dɔks doo za a mɔ walksib hin anbɔ. Yaage rekɔ.
Kuudu wɛɛ el laaya za gbɔlɛ eerɛ
a yɛms gɔ gi bulɔ, lɛl a bisza̧k du gɔ gi talɔ, loon layaadɛ tɛmɛrɛ eerɛ hi dɔyyaadɛ dumbili nɔɔn-erɛ, hi gooyaadɛ tɛmɛrɛ eer be, nɛ rek nɛ tuur a Kaysariya.
Nɛ tɛbs Pol dɔy ɔnɛ an gi kar ha nɛ kaŋg rɔbtɔnɔ a za̧a̧n hɛbtzulya bɔ Felikus ge.
Wɛɛ bi̧i̧ ɗɛɛrwol anyɔ lɛ:
a bee Kalawdiya Liiziyas, be boo mɔɔ Za̧a̧n Gbɔɔl Hɛbtzulya bɔ Felikus.
Baa, wal yɛrɛ be yaazige, Yahuduya wɔ hii wa̧a̧ge ha̧a̧hi nɛ an hi gbɔŋg-gbɔmɔ. Anyɔ gɔ hi gbɔŋge, yɔ be lag a gi Romaya be, be rek hi layaadɛ, be zeezige, be loozig gɔ.
Yɔ ha̧a̧b an be mɛɛ hinyɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gig gɛ̧ɛ̧nuko, be kamzig a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kyaya̧ wɔ hi.
Be zɛm hi gig gɛ̧ɛ̧nik hinza yɔ see maakya̧ dɔgl giya. Wal yɛrɛ wōō hinza ha̧a̧l gbunu an gi rii gbɔŋki, zaabe an hi yaag luknɔ du dɔŋgɔ gɛ.
Yɔ hi bɛɛsib raak a Yahuduya wɔ hi wɔb ya̧a̧ an hi gbɔŋgbɔm kpɔdi, be loog be yaazig gɛrɛ a mɔɔge. Be raa dɔglɔgɛ̧ɛ̧nikya wɔ a hi kam dɔglɔ a mɔɔge. Anbɔ.
Hɔnɛyɔ laaya wɔ hi loo Pol anyɔ gbɔɔlya̧ mɔɔt bɔ
Yoosugɔ laaya wɔ hi ren nɛ dɔɔ hi wɛɛz gɔ a birgal be. Wɔ hi ren nɛ dɔy hi kam Pol be.
Yɔ hi tuuringe a waal gbɔɔl bɔ nuŋgɔ a Kaysariya, hi gaa hɛbtzulya bɔ ɗɛɛrwol bɔ hi bi̧i̧, hi wɛɛ hi kam Pol hi esig gi muutdu.
Hɛbtzulya bɔ zaŋga ɗɛɛrwol bɔ. Wɛɛ war Pol
a mɔ fu̧u̧ a hɛbtɔ ay?
Yɔ hi raasig
a gi Silikiyayɔ,
wɛɛ
a bé oo dɔglɔgɛ̧ɛ̧nikya wɔ gɔ hi zaa ro be ɔɔ dɔgl mɔ lako.
Wɛɛ raa laaya wɔ hi kam Pol a waar raa yɔ Hirudus wɔm nɛ gedu hi ooge.

Yɔ ɔ̧t tal nɔɔn-gbunu Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ Ananiyas tuur gɔ a Kaysariya. Zaatin hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ zaadɛ hi Tɛrtulus doo ya̧a̧mɛɛkya bɔ. Yɔ hi tuur a hɛbtzulya bɔ Felikus ge hi dɔg hinyɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧n nɛ Pol gɔ.
Yɔ hi el Pol i, Tɛrtulus yɛɛl hinɔ gɔ gi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig gɔ anyɔ lɛ:
a Baa Felikus Doo gbɔɔlɛ, wi ɗɔɔtig rɔbtɔnɔ a mɔ gbɔlums dɔŋgo. Hinyɔ rēk a hɛbtyɔ gedu gɛ, hi gɛbsig a mɔ dɔŋgo.
Hin wɔrɔ lab sɛw wi dak a mɔɔge a lɛl sɛw, wi wɛɛ wi gim baanik gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Taa an be mɔɔsum hi dɔgl kito, yɛrɛ baa, be zɔ̧mɔ, anyɔ mɔ gisiw ya̧a̧rmɛɛko, laksiwi dɔgl yɛrɛ kaasi.
Wi zɛm wal yɛrɛ gi doo bɔbtin lɛlha̧tirgoyayɔ, gi sɔmbik Yahuduya wɔ waal du sɛw. Gii gi dood Nazarɛdya wɔ hi gɛ̧ksig gbɔnɔ zulya̧.
Tɛb nɛ an gi ɓi̧i̧l Bɛtluk bɔ, wi wa̧a̧ge. [Ha̧a̧w nɛ an wi gbaasig dɔgl anyɔ maakdɔgl wi gi raako,
wɛɛ laaya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ Liiziyas zaa loog wi naan du hi tɛŋko,
raa dɔglɔgɛ̧ɛ̧nikya wɔ hi zaa a mɔɔge. ] Gɔ mɔ watig hin hi zul mɔ, mɔ ɗɛɛ an mɔ mɛɛ dɔgl yɔ wi gig gɛ̧ɛ̧nik sɛw rɔbɔ lɛl a hinyɔ gɔ gi dɔgsum gedu.
Yahuduya wɔ hi ɔks ya̧a̧ya̧ hi Tɛrtulus hɛw, hi raa a hɔɔ, hinyɔ dɔg sɛw gi rɔbo.
Hɛbtzulya bɔ Felikus yaas Pol naanɛ a gi booya̧a̧. Pol
a be mɛɛ a wɛl kittɔnɔ mɔ gi ɗɔɔtig dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya a hɛbt yɛrɛ gedu. Yɛrɛ be dag hato an be dɔks zul be hin hi kpoos esigi a mɔ muutdu.
Yɔ be dɔɔ a Urusalima an be ɗɔbs Bɛto, dāār yɛms koobl daa eer gɛ. An mɔ tɛb dɔglɔ rɔbtɔnɔ mɔ zɛŋk anbɔ.
Hí zɛ̧be a Bɛtluk du, zaabe a mɔksilluk du, zaa a waal gbɔɔl du, be ya̧a̧ gɔtingo hi doo za gɛ, zaabe a be sɔmbik dood saal gɛ.
Wɛɛ hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi zuun hinyɔ hi gib gɛ̧ɛ̧nik hi rɔb ɓɔri gɛ.

Yɛrɛ hinyɔ gɔ be zunsum gɛrɛ: be gi woosig baa wi Bɛtya̧ hin hi gbɔnɔ za segyɔ hii gɔ hi el a gbɔnɔ gɛ̧ksilyɔ. Be ɗɔbsig maakdɔglyɔ Muusa bi̧i̧ a ɗɛɛrwol du hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ ya̧nɛ wɔ hi bi̧i̧ sɛw be.
Mɔkil benɛ a Bɛt ge riitin hi mɔkil ya̧nɛ yɔ hi ta̧a̧ her. Bɛt gí rɛms dood rɔ́bɛ hi dood ha̧a̧lɛ wɔ gi wɛɛ gi ɗunsihi a wɔrk du.
Yɔ anbɔ be kɛɛko an kpoos be gi er a Bɛt muut du, hi a dood muutdu sɛw.
Yɔ be tuu be ɔɔ Urusalima hɛbtɔ wɛl kittɔnɔ, be wɛɛ be rek hɔ ma an be kams dood be hii tusɛ, be gaa gaasɛ be wɛɛ be woos Bɛt maako.
Yɔ be wook maak bɔ a Bɛtluk du anbɔ hi gul hi zɛ̧be, yɔ be da̧a̧s muul be gaasugɔ. Bé ɔ́ks nɛ hi dood saal gɛ, be taa nɛ nams gɔk gɛ.
Yahuduya zaadɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧ a Àaziya hi gidi be. Gi nɛ an hii hi zaa nɛ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nib hin a mɔ muutdu gid hi gin hinza an hi dɔg be zulha.
Zaabe, an dood wɔ hi gi dihɛ hi dɔgsum hin-a̧a̧b yɔ hi zɛm a be woo a ɔ̧tyɔ be erk nɛ a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kyaya̧ wɔ hi muutdu gedu.
Hi zɛm hin gbun yɛrɛ gii kpɔd: yɔ be erk hi muutdu be ɓooya̧a̧ be raa a yɔ be ɗɔbsig a Bɛt gi ɗuns wɔrkɛ gii ro, nɛ gisib dɔgl gbaak nɛɛko! Anbɔ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Felikus mɛɛ Yeesu gbɔnɔ dɔgl rɔbtɔnɔ, raa
a laya wɔ gbɔɔlya̧ mɔɔt bɔ Liiziyas gɔ gi zaa ro, be ɔɔ dɔgl mɔ gbɛɛruko. Wɛɛ hɛks dood sɛw.
Wɛɛ raa laaya gbɔɔl bɔ a gi ooge, gi ɔsig lɛlfɛɛtil kaasi, bɔgi ans naaza wɔ ha̧a̧hi zaak a ge gbɔnɔ an hi ɗansig hinyɔ ha̧a̧ge.
Kuudu yɔ ɔ̧t kaasi talɔ, Felikus zaatin hi nistɔ Yahu-duya bɔ Durusila. Wɛɛ yaa doo elz Pol zaa. Wɛɛ lagsig ɗɔbsig dɔgl yɔ dɔg a Yeesu Kristu zulha.
Hɔnɛyɔ Pol gi book hinwook riit dɔglɛ hi zul-ook dɔglɛ, hi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k yɔ gɔ gi zaa kuudu dɔglɔ, Felikus bɛɛ lak anbɔ kolɔ tuugtu, wɛɛ raa Pol
a rekum kete, lɛl gɔ gi fɛɛb be elzum mɔ zaa ɓɛ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Felikus gi gɔk anbɔ be, rum a Pol gi gaag tus an gi bisige, wɛɛ Pol be gaag gɛ be. Hinɔ gii gɔ gi gig waak elzig an hi bootinya̧a̧.
Yɔ wɛl eer talɔ, Pɔrkiyus Fɛstus yɛr hɛbtzulya bɔ Felikus ɗɔɔtillɛlɔ an hɛbtzulya be. Yɔ Felikus ha̧a̧g an gi gɔ Yahuduya wɔ kpoosya̧ gi harihi, wɛɛ ɔɔ Pol a luknɔ du.
Yɔ Waar seg bɔ Fɛstus tuur a hɛbt bɔ gedu, kuudu ɔ̧t taarɛ wɛɛ ɗuk a Kaysariya rek a Urusalima.
Yɔ gi hɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya ɗɛntɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧n Pol hinɛ.
Hi zɔ̧b Fɛstus an gi gɔ an kpoosya̧ gi harihi gi raa doodɔ hi kam Pol a Urusalima, hii be, hi rek hi kɛtig gbɔnɔ di hi gbɔŋge.
Fɛstus goo:
a laaya hi ook Pol a Kaysariya, gɔ gi kaasi bee be wɛɛk hɔ hɛw.
An dood nɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi retin hi bee a hɔ, gid wal bɔ gɔ hinza a̧a̧bi hi re hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig hinɔ hɔ ma.
Fɛstus ɗɔɔt am hɔ an ɔ̧t gɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ zaabe kooblɛ wɛɛ wɛɛ gɔ a Kaysariya. Yoosugɔ re gul ɗɔɔt a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk du raa hí looz Pol hi kamzige.
Yɔ hi kamzige, Yahuduya wɔ hi tiiz a Urusalima hi rɔge, hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig hin-a̧a̧bɛ gbɔlɛ kittɔnɔ, wɛɛ hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi zuun hinyɔ hi gig gɛ̧ɛ̧nik hi rɔb gɛ.
Pol wɛɛ dɔks zulɔ hinɛ raa
a bé gɔ hinza a̧a̧bi a Yahuduya maak ha gɛ, zaabe a Bɛtluk muul gɛ, zaabe a Waar gbɔɔl Romaya bɔ Kaysara gi zulha gɛ.
Yɔ Waar Fɛstus ha̧a̧g an gi gɔ Yahuduya wɔ kpoosya̧ gi harihi be, war Pol
a ha̧a̧m an mɔ dɔɔ a Urusalima be da be gbɛrsum dɔgl mɔ hɔ a hinyɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧num geha ya?
Pol goo
a yɛrɛ be erk a Waar gbɔɔl Romaya bɔ Kaysara dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk du, rii an nɛ gbɛrsib dɔgl be bɛttɔnɔ. Bé wōō hin-a̧a̧bi a Yahuduya wɔ hi zulha gɛ. Mɔɔ hi zul mɔ mɔ mɛɛ hinɔ bɛttɔnɔ hɛw.

An be ɗa̧a̧ maakdɔglɛ, zaabe be gɔ hin-a̧a̧b yɔ rı̄ı̄ wɔrko, bé ı̄n wɔrk gɛ. Yɛrɛ hinyɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nib gi taa rɔb gɛ, doo za ɗɛɛ an gi gaabe hi naan du gɛ. Yɛrɛ be ɛrk an Waar gbɔɔl bɔ Kaysara a Roma gi gbɛɛr dɔgl be.
Waar Fɛstus be watin hi dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kya wɔ, wɛɛ raa
a nɛ yɔ mɔ war an Kaysara gi gbɛrsum dɔgl mɔ, mɔ rek ma hɔ ro an gi gbɛrsumɔ.
Kuudu yɔ ɔ̧t zaadɛ hi talɔ, waar Agaripa hi nistɔ Bɛrnike hi zaa a Kaysariya an hi boo Fɛstus.
Yɔ hi ɗɔɔt hɔ ɔ̧t kaasi, Fɛstus fɔks waar bɔ Agaripa Pol dɔglɔ raa
a Felikus ɔɔ doo za a luknɔ du dihɛ.
Yɔ be rek a Urusalima Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi Yahuduya wɔ ɗɛntɛya̧ wɔ hi zaa hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig dɔglɔ a beege hi zɔ̧be an be matinge dɔglɛ.

Bee be goo be raa a a Romayaadɛ dɔgl-gbaak du ɔ̧nɛ hi rɔ̧ɔ̧s anbɔ gɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig dɔgl gi bootin dɔgl hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nikɔya wɔ an gi ta̧a̧s zulɔ hin a hinyɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig geha. Gi taa anbɔ gɛ, hi gāā za̧a̧nyɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig hin a gɛ̧ɛ̧nikɔya wɔ hi naan du gɛ.
Yɔ wɔrɔ hi zaatin dihɛ ma hi bee sɛwi, be ɔɔ lɛl daa gɛ be, yoosugɔ be re be gul be ɗɔɔt gɔ a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧k luk bɔ gedu be raa a hi kamz za̧a̧nɔ ma.
Dood wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig hinɛ hi zaa hi er hi dɔg hinɔ gɔ, hɔnɛ hi kāmz dɔgl ha̧a̧l anyɔ be mɔkig nɛ gɛ be.
Hi faltin dɔgl zaadɛ a maakya̧ bɔ gi dɔŋgo, hi wɔrk za bɔ nuŋgɔ a Yeesu yɔ Pol gi raak a gi za̧a̧tilyɔ. Hinɔ gii ma bɔ kpɔd.
Be mɛ̄ɛ̄ dɔgl bɔrɔ gaasugɔ rɔbtɔnɔ gɛ, hinɔ gii be ɛr Pol a kinsa ha̧a̧g rek a Urusalima an hi gbɛrsig dɔglɔ hɔ be.
Hɔnɛyɔ Pol wɛɛ gi raa a hi gbaab an luknɔya be rek a waar gbɔɔl bɔ Kaysara ge an hi gbɛrsib dɔglɔ, hinɔ gii be raa a hi ooge, lɛl gɔ gi fɛɛbe be yaag a waar gbɔɔl bɔ ge gi gbɛrsige.
Waar Agaripa wɛɛ raa Fɛstus
a bee hi zul be ha̧a̧b an be kɛms wal bɔrɔ dɔglɔ.
A nɛ yoosig mɔ kɛmɔ.

Yoosugɔ Agaripa hi nistɔ Bɛrnike hi zaa gɔ. Dood kittɔnɔ hi kamzige, hi gig ɗɔbsugo, hi gi daŋko hi hinnak hi hin-ɛɛnɛ. Hi gul mɔksilluk gbɔɔl bɔ gedu hi laaya gbɔlɛ wɔ, hi dood gbɔlɛ waal gbɔɔlya wɔ. Fɛstus raa hí kamz Pol gɔ.
Fɛstus wɛɛ raa waar bɔ Agaripa:

a waar Agaripa, mɔya hi dood wɔ nɛ mɔks duhɛ sɛw hi wiya, nɛ gbɛn wal yɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gi dihɛ sɛw hi Urusalimaya wɔ sɛw hi kamzig be muutdu hi zɔ̧be an be matinge dɔglɛ, hi wɛɛ hi ɓooya̧a̧ a rı̄ı̄ an gi kɔm za̧a̧til gɛ. Walɔ gii gi erk yɔ.
Wɛɛ be tɛb dɔglɔ hi zul be, bé zɛ̄m hin-a̧a̧b yɔ gɔ an gi rii wɔrk gɛ. Yɔ gii hi zulɔ raa a Waar gbɔɔl bɔ gii gi gbɛrsib dɔglɛ, be mɔk an be yaag hɔ ro an gi gbɛrsig ma.
Wɛɛ be dāg dɔgl rɔb a gi zulha an be bi̧i̧s waar wɛ bɔ ɗɛɛrwol gɛ be. Hinɔ gii be kamzig a nɛ muutdu, hi a mɔ muut du, mɔɔ Waar Agaripa, wɛ watig hinɛ an be mɛɛ hinyɔ gɔ be bi̧i̧ a ɗɛɛrwol du.
Be gbɛn à hi yaa luknɔya ya̧a̧rtɔs, hi gog hin-a̧a̧b yɔ woo hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nig gɛ, yɔ ka̧d gɛ.
Waar Agaripa raa Pol
a gbɔnɔ gi an mɔ booya̧a̧ mɔ dɔks zul mɔ hinɛ.
Yɔ Pol lag anbɔ pɛɛ naanɔ dɔks zulɔ hin anyɔ lɛ:
a baa waar Agaripa, be dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ an be zee zul be a mɔ muutdu nɛɛko a hinyɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi gib gɛ̧ɛ̧nik geha sɛw.
Mɔɔ mɔ mɛɛ Yahuduya wɔ maakya̧ hi dɔglya̧ zaadɛ sɛw bɛttɔnɔ. Yɔ anbɔ be zɔ̧mɔ an mɔ mɔm mɔ kɛmsib dɔgl be.
Yahuduya wɔ sɛw hi mɛɛ waak yɔ be waa yɛɛl amntɔnɔ yɔ be gi walsɛrɔ. Hi mɛɛ ɗɔɔtil be yɔ be ɗɔɔt a be hɛbt du hi a Urusalima sɛw yɛɛl a biitirnaan du.
Hi mɛɛb da amntɔnɔ hɛw gi ha̧a̧hi hi ɗɛɛ an hi ta̧a̧ a ɗɔɔtil be yɔ be ɗɔɔt an Farisaya, hi ɓɛrib nɛ a dood Farisaya wɔ hi kaŋk maak wi hi tɛŋk yɔ daar zaadɛ wɔ sɛw hi tees du.
Yɛrɛ be gi a dɔgl-gbaak ha a mɔkil be yɔ be gin a ya̧a̧ yɔ Bɛt wɔb hage hi baa wɛ hiya a ɔ̧t-yɔ̧ɔ̧sum bɔ gedu be rɛms dood wɔrk du gi dɔŋgo.

Yahuduya dɔ̧ɔ̧t koobl daa eer wɔ be, hi gbaa mɔkilya̧ a wɔrkɛ rɛmtig dɔgl ha hɛw, yɔ hi tɛk hinɔ gii ma hi woosig Bɛt hin hi tɛŋko yɛms du hi lurk du sɛw. Waar i, a mɔkil bɔrɔ gi dɔŋg ro, Yahuduya wɔ hi gɛ̧ɛ̧nib hinɛ!
Ɔnɛ nɔ nɛɛ Yahuduya wɔ nɛ ɗɛɛ ɗɔbsig a Bɛt gɔ ɗuns wɔrkɛ a wɔrk du gɛ?
Bee hi zul be, be mɔk nɛ a be woo hinyɔ be ɗɛɛ sɛw an be ha̧tir Yeesu Nazarɛdya bɔ nuŋgɔ.
Be woo hinɔ gii a Urusalima. Be dag tɛŋk a Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hii an be yaa dood gaatɛ wɔ hi fɔk Yeesu a luknɔ du. Yɔ hi gbaasihi dɔgl an hi gbɔ̧hi, be ɔks ya̧a̧ hi hiya.

Dɔɔ kittɔnɔ, be gi hi wa̧a̧lik a mɔksilluk wɔ hi du sɔmsɔm. Be tɛk an be fɛ̧ɛ̧hi hi faa Yeesu nuŋgɔ, hi boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a gi zulha. Yɔ nɔɔtig be dɔ̧ɔ̧ hi zulha ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, be tɛhi a hi lɛlɛ hi lɛlɛ tuur a hɛbt zaadɛ sɔmsɔm an be wa̧a̧lihi.
Hinɔ anbɔ ro be wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ an be rek a Dimaska hi ɗɛɛrwol doowa̧a̧nikya yɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ wɔ hi yaanibe, gid hi gaab tɛŋk a ɗɔbsigya wɔ hi zulha.
Be ɗund be wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ. A lurk teesdu, waar i, yɔ be gi gbɔnɔ du, be gbɛn lɛlgaal yɔ daar ɔ̧t ɔ̧nɛ ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ gaaz bɛtha tuur be dɔŋdi hi dood wɔ be gi elo hi dɔŋdi be.

Wi sɛw wi mat gɔ hɛbtdi. Be wɛɛ be lag ya̧a̧ za booy a bɛtha raabe hi Ibraniŋko ya̧a̧boonɛ: a Sawulu, Sawulu! Mɔ gib ya̧a̧kɛtingo a be gɔ nɔ? Nɔ mɔ gi zul mɔ nɔk gaak an pɛɛzum gi dɔk baatɔ sɔɔl yɔ hi gɔn kobs a muulɔ ge ma nɔ?
Be wɛɛ be warɔ a mɔɔ bɔ, Waar i? Waar bɔ ta̧a̧ a bee Yeesu yɔ mɔ gig ya̧a̧ kɛtingo.
Yɛrɛ ɗundum mɔ er ha. Be herumɔ an mɔ wɛɛ woosya beenɛ mɔ wɛɛsib segya, ya̧a̧nɛ be zunsum zul be an mɔ dɔks dood gbɛnik yɔ mɔ gbɛnib nɛɛko, mɔ wɛɛ mɔ raasihi hinyɔ gɔ be goksumɔ.
Bé oomɔ a Israhilaya wɔ hi teesdu hi dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ be gim yaak hi teesdu,

an mɔ kpɛ̧rsihi yɔ̧lya̧ an kpoosya̧ gi zɛmrɔ mɔ tudzihi a lɛlwil du hi tal a lɛlgaal du, hi a Saydanu tɛŋk du hi tuur a Bɛt ge. Gɔ anbɔ, be bitsihi hin ha̧a̧lya̧ hi wɛɛ hi dag ɗɔɔtil rɔb a dood gaatɛ wɔ hi gaa mɔkilya̧ a beege hi tees du.
Hinɔ giya, baa waar Agaripa, be ı̄n hinyɔ zaasib gɛrs du a bɛtha gɛ.

Be dɔgsihi Bɛt dɔglɛ, be yɛɛl a Dimaska, be renɔ be tuurin a Urusalima hi a Yahuduya hɛbt du sɛw, be wɛɛ be tuurin a dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi tees du. Be dɔgsihi an hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi wɛɛ hi zaa a ge hi zuun woos yɔ gɔ hi mɛɛn naandɛmsya̧ be.
Hinɔ gii Yahuduya wɔ hi wa̧a̧be, a Bɛtluk du hi wɛɛ hi kɛɛ an hi gbɔ̧be.
Tuur ɔ̧ti gi zulɛ Bɛt gii gisib ɗaako, be erk hɛdi be boosig dood gbɔlɛ hi dood zaadɛ sɛw Waar Yeesu dɔglɔ. Hinyɔ be dɔkyɔ riitin hi hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi Muusa hɛw, hi dɔg nɛ a hinɔ gi
Hi
Yɔ Pol gi zeek zulɔ anbɔ Fɛstus ɓooya̧a̧
a Pol , mɔ yooyɔ, hinyɔ mɔ zaŋ mɔ daarin zul mɔ wɛɛnum yoo nɛ zaŋ!
Pol wɛɛ goo
a ɗɛnti, Fɛstus, be taa yoo. Dɔgl be yɛrɛ dɔgl rɔbo hi dɔgl mɔkilya.
Yɔ Waar bɔ Agaripa mɛɛ dɔgl yɛrɛ, hoobha̧a̧b ya̧a̧book hi gii gɛ. Be mɛɛ rɔbtɔnɔ a mɔ mɛɛ hinyɔ tal sɛw. Hinɔ daa luurlɛl gɛ be!
Baa, waar Agaripa, mɔ gi ɗɔbsig Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hinyɔ hi raak ya? Be mɛɛ a mɔ ɗɔbs hinyɔ hi dɔko.
Agaripa war Pol
a gɔ gi kaasi mɔ mɔkig an mɔ wɛɛnib Yeesu Kristu ɗɔbsigya hɛw ya?
Pol goo:

a gi samɔ, zaabe gi sam gɛ, be zɔ̧k Bɛt a mɔ zulha, mɔɔ gbun kpɔd gɛ, ha̧a̧be an dood zaadɛ wɔ hi zɛ̧ɛ̧r sɛw hi gisib dɔgl be kɛŋk nɛɛko, nɛ wɛɛ Yeesu doodɔ an beya, nɛ wɛɛ an bee her, ɔnɛ an bɔhi wɔmnin ba̧a̧ntus an yɛrɛ be naan du lɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ waar bɔ hi hɛbtzulya bɔ Fɛstus hi nis bɔ Bɛrnike hi dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi ɗɔɔtig di hi ɗund hi tuuza lakdi.
Yɔ hi tuuza hi watinu:
a wal yɛrɛ gɔ hinyɔ rı̄ı̄ an gi gul luknɔ zaabe an gi wɔr gɛ.
Agaripa wɛɛ raa hɛbt zulya bɔ Fɛstus
a à wal yɛrɛ raa nɛ a Kaysara gi gbɛrsib dɔgl be gɛ, yɔ wɛ ɗɛɛ nɛ an wɛ bisig gi rekɔ.
Yɔ hi raa a wi rek a Itali hɛbto a lɛmb du, hi loo Pol hi luknɔya zaadɛ hi gaahi Waar Romaya layaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ zul gbun gbɔɔlya̧ bɔ nuŋgɔ a Zuliyus naan du, an gi ka̧hi.
Wi tal a lɛmb zayɔ fu̧u̧z a Adaramitiya gedu. Lɛmb yɔ gi rek a waal sɔmsɔm ge a Aaziya, wi ɗund wi re gɔ. Wal za Makeduniyaya fu̧u̧ a Tesaloniki gi hi wiya nuŋgɔ a Aristarkus.
Yoosugɔ wi rek wi tuur a Sidɔŋg. Laaya gbɔɔl bɔ Zuliyus yɔ gi kaŋkig Pol rɔbtɔnɔ gaag gbɔnɔ an gi rek gi boo saamɔ hii an gi dag hinyɔ ha̧a̧ge.
Yɔ wi ɗund hɔdi a Sidɔŋg wi daa a lɛlyɔ zɛk taa ge a Kiprus hɛbt yɔ mɛm rɔg ge, a ɔ̧tkazigi, anyɔ zɛk giw a̧a̧nik rek a ɔ̧tleki.
Wi tal mɛmbal gbɔɔl lɛl bɔ sɛbtin hi Kilikiya hi Pamfila wi tuur a Mira a Likiya hɛbt du.
Laaya gbɔɔl bɔ zɛm lɛmb za hɔ yɔ fu̧u̧z a Iskandariya gi rek a Itali, kasiw gedu wi re gɔ.

Ɔ̧t kittɔnɔ wi rek di sɔ̧ɔ̧sɔ̧ɔ̧ a lɛmb du hi mɔɔt gbɔɔltɔnɔ wi tuur a Kinidis lɛlyɔ mɛm rɔg gi dɔŋdi. Anyɔ zɛk a̧a̧niw daakɔ lɛlɔ ge wi zɛmr wi daa a Kereta lɛlyɔ mɛm rɔg a bɛrk zaabɔ zɛk taa ge gɛ, a Salmuna dɔŋdi.
Wi fɔb a mɛmbal gbɔɔl ya̧, wi tuur a lɛlyɔ gɔ hi elik a holumrɔb lɛl ge hi mɔɔt gbɔɔltɔnɔ a Lasaya waal gbɔɔlya̧ di.
Anyɔ wi daas lɛl ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ, lɛl bɛr rekɔ hi lɛmb ma gɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ hinha̧a̧l ha̧sig naab bɔ ɔ̧tɔ da taalɔ. Yɔ anbɔ Pol
a dood wɛ, be gbɛn rɔbs yɔ wɛ rek gi bɛr gɛ. Lɛmb bɔ gi ha̧tir hi wɔd wɔ hi gi gedu sɛw; anbɔ kpɔd gɛ, wɛɛ wɛ wɔr be.
Laaya gbɔɔl bɔ kɛms lɛmbnuukya bɔ hi za̧a̧n lɛmbya bɔ dɔglya̧, kɛ̄ms Pol ɔnɛ bɔ rɔbtɔnɔ gɛ.

Yɔ lɛlɔ bɛr an zɛrk tee gi zɛ̧wi hɔ gɛ, dood lɛmbya kit wɔ hi raa a daar an wi rek doosɛ an wi goo tuurik a Finika, kinsa wi ɗɛɛ be. Finika bɔ lɛmb erk lɛlɔ gi a Kereta a ɔ̧tleki, wi ɗɛɛ an wi daa ga̧a̧k wi hɔ hɛw.
Yɔ zɛk yɛɛl fɛk kaasikaasi a ɔ̧tkazig naanyɛ̧li, dood lɛmbya wɔ hi mɔk a gbɔnɔ gi an hi rekɔ anyɔ ha̧a̧hi, hinɔ gii hi ha̧s lɛmb doonis bɔ hi wɛɛ hi fɔb a Kereta hɛbt mɛmbal gbɔɔl ya̧.
Hɔnɛ kuudu kaasi, zɛkzanɔ ha̧a̧l ɗun nɔɔktɔnɔ, zɛk ha̧a̧lɔ gɔ hi elig a ɔ̧tkazig naanrɔbo. Zɛkɔ yɛɛl fɛbzig a hɛbt lɛl yɔ mɛm rɔg tɔlya̧ sɛw ge.
Zɛk bɔ zaa lɛb lɛmb bɔ be, wi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an wi zɛmr lɛmb bɔ wi wɛɛnig a zɛk lɛl bɔ gi fɛbzig ge gɛ. Wi ɔɔge an gi wɛɛnig a lɛl yɔ ha̧a̧g ge sɛw.
Yɔ wi daa a hɛbtlɛl wans yɔ mɛm rɔg nuŋgɔ a Kakawda bɛrkɔ zaa bɔ zɛk taa fɛk ge gɛ, wi wɛɛ wi kɛɛ lɛmb wans bɔ dirk wɔkɔ a lɛmb gbɔɔl bɔ hage hi mɔɔt gbɔɔltɔnɔ.

Hi diz lɛmb wans bɔ wɛɛha hi wɛɛ hi wɔb lɛmb gbɔɔl hi ba̧a̧ni. Yɔ hoobha̧a̧hi a kinsa lɛmb bɔ gi zu̧u̧y a hɔ̧ɔ̧l muul a Libiya dɔŋdi, hi sis lɛmb gbandil bɔ hi hā̧b wɛɛha an zɛk gi fɛb a lɛmb bɔ muulɔ ge kpɔd, gi kaŋg gi naan a mɛm bɔ hage.
Bɛlzɛkya ha̧a̧l bɔ zɛksiw hi tɛŋko, yoosugɔ hi yɛɛl wɔd wɔ bilsigi a mɛm du.
Yoosugɔ ɓɛ hi yɛɛl lɛmb wɔd wɔ bilsig hi naan ya̧a̧n ma.
Ɔ̧t kittɔnɔ wi gbɛn ɔ̧t gɛ be, wi gbɛn sɛwaat gɛ be. Zɛk yɔ giw fɛk hi tɛŋko ɓɔr wi ɔɔ mɔkig ma a za̧a̧tig taa nɛ zaŋ.
Yɔ dood hi gɔ nɛ ɔ̧t kittɔnɔ hi lehin gɛ, Pol er hi muut du
a sà̧à̧nɛ, gi nɛ an nɛ kɛmsibe yɔ be raa nɛ a bɔwɛ ɔɔ Kereta, nɛ faa ya̧a̧ be faa. An wɛ èr nɛko yɔ wɛ dāg ya̧a̧rhant an yɛrɛ lɛ gɛ.
Yɛrɛ be zɔ̧nɛ, ɓaasin kpoos nɛ, doo za gbun taa wɔrko, lɛmb bɔ gii gi ha̧tir kpɔd.
Lel yɛms du Bɛt yɔ heribe an dooɔ, Bɛt yɔ be gi doo ɔ̧nɛ, bé wɛɛ bé gisig wooswooko yaaz walsɛrɔ zaa èr be dɔŋdi, raabe
a Pol , bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧m hinza, gi an mɔ rek mɔ er a waar Romaya bɔ Kaysara gi muutdu mɔ booya̧a̧ hi giya. Bɛt yɔ gi wook hinrɔbo, gààmɔ dood wɔ hi gi a lɛmb du kolya̧ naan du.
Yɔ anbɔ, walɛ wɛ, bɔ kol gi tuunɛ, ɓaasin kpoos nɛ, be ɗɔbs a Bɛt gi woo anyɔ raasib sɛw.
Yɛrɛ zɛk gi ka̧wɛ wɛ leg a hɛbtlɛl zayɔ mɛm rɔg tɔlya̧ sɛw ya̧a̧ɔ ge. Be dɔksin giya.
A yɛms koobl daa nasums bɔ yɛmsɔ gedu, zɛk ha̧a̧l ka̧wi a Mɛmbal Gbɔɔl Teesum bɔ hage doosɛdoosɛ. À yɛms tees du dood lɛmbya wɔ hi mɔk a wi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik hɛbt zɛŋkyɔ.
Hi goo mɛm bɔ hi zɛm dukɔ a dood erkil yɔ̧ɔ̧lgbun du, gɔ hi rek doos kaasi hi wɛɛ hi goo hi zɛm dukɔ a dood erkil du koobl daa nɔɔnɛ.
Yɔ hoobha̧a̧hi a kinsa lɛmb bɔ gi zu̧u̧y a bet muul be, hi gbalk lɛmb doonis nasɔ a lɛmb kuu an hi esin lɛmb bɔ mɛm ha, hi wɛɛ hi zɔ̧b Bɛt an lɛl gi gaa nɔɔko.
Yɔ dood lɛmbya wɔ ha̧a̧hi lɛmb bɔ ɔɔko, hi sis lɛmb wans bɔ, hi wɛɛ hi gɔ an hi gbalk doonis za a lɛmb muutdu hi wa̧a̧n lɛmb gbɔɔl bɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ Pol raa laaya gbɔɔl bɔ hi laaya zaadɛ wɔ
a an dood wɛrɛ hi kɔ̄m a lɛmb bɔ gedu gɛ, nɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an nɛ za̧a̧ gɛ.
Yɔ hi kɛm anbɔ laaya wɔ hi dɛ̧ɛ̧ lɛmb wans bɔ ba̧a̧nɔ wɔ hi ɔɔg mɛɛ mɛm du.
Yɔ lɛl gɔ gi gaa, Pol zɔ̧hi an hi lehin hi sɛw,
a yɛms tal koobl daa nasɔ nɛ lehin gɛ be nɛ gi ooko.
Hinɔ gii be zɔ̧nɛ an nɛ lehin nɛ dagn tɛŋko nɛ za̧a̧sin zul nɛ. Susug nɛ gbun a zulha taa wak nɛ zaŋ.
Yɔ Pol dɔg anbɔ wɛɛ loo kok kimlɛ baan Bɛto a hi lɔlgbar sɛw, ɓɛɛdɔ yɛɛl leki.
Yɔ anbɔ tɛŋkya̧ wɛɛz hi sɛw hi lehin gɔ.
Kitig wi tuur dood yɔ̧ɔ̧l kooblɛ hi dumbili nɔɔn-erɛ daa nɔɔngbunu a lɛmb bɔ gedu.
Yɔ dood sɛw hi hi̧i̧ buudu hi loo tot saa wɔ hi bisil mɛm du an lɛmb bɔ gi ɗagl du.

Yɔ lɛl gaa lɛmbnuukya wɔ hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ hɛbtyɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b dɔŋgɔ di nuŋgɔ gɛ. Gɔ hi see yɔ̧l doosɛ hi gbɛn hɛbt za yɔ mɛm rɔg tɔlya̧ sɛw hɔ̧ɔ̧l gi lɛlɔge be, hi mɔk a kinsa hi ɗɛɛ an hi ren lɛmb bɔ gi ɗɔɔt a hɔ̧ɔ̧l bɔ hage.

Hi dɛ̧ɛ̧ lɛmb tus ɗɔbtɛ wɔ ba̧a̧nya̧ hi ɔɔhi a mɛm du, hi pid tɛ̧ɛ̧ wɔ gɔ hi nuun lɛmb bɔ ba̧a̧nya̧, hi wɛɛ hi kas zɛk gban bɔ hi gbaa a lɛmb gɔ̧ɔ̧s ha an zɛk gi kam lɛmb bɔ gi tuuringe a hɛbt tɔlya̧;
wɛɛ lɛmb bɔ ki̧i̧ hɔ̧ɔ̧l bɔ be, wɛɛ gɔ̧ɔ̧sɔ i̧i̧y a hɔ̧ɔ̧l du ta̧a̧ naŋk zaa ma gɛ. Mɛmɗukil wɔ hi gi lɛbtig lɛmb bɔ sa̧a̧nɔ hi tɛŋko, hi gig ha̧tirgo.
Laaya wɔ hi mɔk a hi gbɔm luknɔya wɔ an bɔhi gi̧i̧l mɛm du hi wirɔ.
Yɔ laaya gbɔɔl bɔ ha̧a̧g an gi za̧a̧s Pol be iinɔ, gāāhi gbɔnɔ an hi woo anyɔ ha̧a̧hi gɛ. Wɛɛ raa dood wɔ hi mɛɛ mɛmfuk hi yɛɛl gi̧i̧lik mɛm bɔ gedu hi fubɔ hi kar a kasiŋ zaa.
Wɔ hi zɛ̧ɛ̧r be hi gi̧i̧l hi wa̧a̧ tɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɔlɛ, zaa hi fub a lɛmb tɛ̧ɛ̧hɛɛk ɓɛrkil wɔ muulɔge hi kanɔ. Hinɔ anbɔ ro wi kar rɔbtɔnɔ sɛw a mɛmbal gbɔɔl kasiŋ za.
Yɔ wi tuur hɛbt lɛl bɔ mɛm rɔg rɔbtɔnɔ ge hinza gi gɔw gɛ, wi kɛm a hɛbt bɔ nuŋgɔ a Malita.
Dood Malitiya wɔ hi dagiw rɔbtɔnɔ wi sɛw. Bɛl gi naŋk be, saŋks gi saŋk ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ be, yɔ anbɔ hi tɔnsuw laa wi tɛɛ.
Pol za̧bz ma rɛnthas gi yaak laa du. Kpolum gi du be. Yaala laa sa̧a̧ kpolum bɔ tuuz rɛnthas bɔ gedu karig naanmuulɛ torige.
Yɔ dood Malitiya wɔ hi gbɛn kpolum bɔ gi wiiy a Pol naanmuulɛ, hi watinu:
a wal yɛrɛ zulgbɔŋkyayɔ, an za̧a̧z nɛ mɛm du si̧, zɔr dɔgl-gbaak a bɛtha an gi za̧a̧ gɛ.
Hɔnɛ Pol waat beks bɔ mɛɛ laa du kɛm kosgumn gɛ.
Hi ook ma an naanɔ gi holɔ, zaabe an gi mat gi wɔr ɓɔrbɔ. Hɔnɛ yɔ hi oo lɛl gi am hi gbɛn hinza gɔg gɛ be, hi wɛɛ hi zɛmr mɔkilya̧ hi dɔg
a gi bɛt hɛbtumyɔ.
A lɛlza bɔ dɔŋgɔ di hɛbt bɔ mɛm rɔge zulɔya bɔ nuŋgɔ a Publiyus gin bakɔ zaadɛ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧b a lɛlyɔ wi gi nɛ dige. Publiyus sisuw rɔbtɔnɔ wi naa ɔ̧t wi taarɛ.
Baatɔ zullaan gig gɔk be, hin gig guŋk buudu ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ be gi kusig gi leeso ha. Yɔ Pol lag anbɔ rek sɔ̧ɔ̧ge zɔ̧bsig Bɛto, wɛɛ gbaasig naan muulɛ za̧a̧sige.
Yɔ anbɔ gumtil zaadɛ wɔ hi waak a hɛbt lɛl bɔ mɛm rɔg ge hi lagɔ hi zaa a ge hɛw hi za̧a̧ be.
Hi gaaw gaas kittɔnɔ hi wɛɛ hi baaniw gbɔɔltɔnɔ, hi gbɔnɔ sɔmsɔm, yɔ wi kazig a lɛmb du, hi gaaw hinyɔ ha̧a̧w sɛw hi gbaasiw a lɛmb du.
Wi waaz nɛ sɛɛ taarɛ a Malita wi ɔɔ kazig a lɛmb du. Lɛmb bɔ wi kar gedu nuŋgɔ a Bɛt-Hɛbtum-Kumbilyɔ, fu̧u̧z a Iskandariya, zɛrk dubt daag a hɛbtlɛl bɔ mɛm rɔg ge.
Yɔ wi tuur a Sirakus wi sil wi gɔ ɔ̧t taarɛ a hɔ.
Yɔ wi ɗun dihɔ wi rek doos wi tuur a Regiyus. Yoosugɔ zɛk yɛɛl fɛk a ɔ̧tkazig-naanyɛ̧li. Wi wɛɛ wi gɔ ɔ̧t eerɛ wi tuur gɔ a Potiyoli.
Wi zɛm Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hɔ hi zɔ̧wi an wi gɔ ɔ̧t nɔɔn-er hi hiya, kuudu wi wa̧a̧ gbɔnɔ gɔ ma an wi rek a Roma.
Yɔ yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Bɛtfɔkya wɔ a Roma hi lag rams wi, hi ɔɔ Roma hi zaa hi tuur a Apiyus Luumha hi a Rɔbɛ Luk Lɛl Taarɛ wɔ hi an hi dagiwi. Yɔ Pol gbɛnihi anbɔ baan Bɛto wɛɛ dag hato muulɔ ɓaa gɔ ma ɓɔrɔ.
Yɔ wi gul a Roma hi gaa Pol gbɔnɔ an gi ɗɔɔt gi gbunu laya gbun gi ooge an bɔgi wirɔ.
Kuudu yɔ ɔ̧t taar talɔ, Pol elz Yahuduya wɔ gbɔlɛya̧ wɔ hi mɔksɔ. Yɔ hi mɔksɔ
a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be wɛ, an be gɔ̄ hin-a̧a̧b a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ wɛ hi zulha gɛ, hi a baa wɛ hi maakya̧ ha gɛ si̧, hi yaab luknɔ du a Urusalima, hi ka̧be hi gaab a Romaya wɔ hi naan du.
Yɔ hi watib hin gi da̧a̧ hi zɛm hin-a̧a̧b a beege an hi gbɔ̧b gɛ, ha̧a̧hi an hi bisibe.
Nɛ anyɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi ta̧a̧ gɛ, be woo nɔ? Gɛ be war an waar gbɔɔl Romaya bɔ Kaysara gii gi gbɛɛrsib dɔgl be. Wɛɛ be taan nɛ dɔgl yɔ an gɔ be gɛ̧ɛ̧n dood be hii be.
Ya̧a̧nɛ be elzinɛ nɛ zaa an be gbɛntin hi nɛɛ wɛ watin hinɛ. Ba̧a̧ntus yɛrɛ gi be muulɛ a Za̧a̧nyɔ Isra-hilaya wɔ hi mɔk dɔglɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Wɔrɔ hi ta̧a̧ hi
a wi dāg ɗɛɛrwol za yɔ fu̧u̧z a Yahuduya an wi lag hinyɔ gi daak mɔ zulha gɛ. Wɛɛ yɛ̧ɛ̧ wi za zāā an gi dɔgsuw dɔgl mɔ gɛ, zaabe an gi dɔg ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a mɔ zulha gɛ.
Yɛrɛ ha̧a̧wi an wi kɛmsim mɔkil mɔ wɔ. Wi mɛɛ a gbɔnɔ gɛ̧ksil bɔrɔ, dood waal du sɛw hi dɔk a gbɔnɔ a̧a̧byɔ.

Yɔ anbɔ hi dɛ̧ɛ̧tin ɔ̧t gɔ hi Pol an hi dagtinu. Yɔ ɔ̧tɔ rii, dood kittɔnɔ hi zaa hi mɔks gɔ a lɛlyɔ Pol gi waak ge. Yɛɛl bi̧i̧l du tuur lɛɛsig du, Pol gisihi dɔglɔ goko gisihi Bɛt wáát dɔglɔ dɔko. Wɛɛ gi tɛk gbɔnɔ an hi ta̧a̧ Yeesu dɔglɔ be. Zaŋgin lɛl zaadɛ sɔmsɔm a Muusa ɗɛɛrwolyɔ bi̧i̧ gi ɔɔ duge, wɛɛ zaŋgin lɛl zaadɛ a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ɗɛɛrwol wɔ hi bi̧i̧ gedu sɛw an gi zunsinihi Yeesu dɔglɔ.
Dood zaadɛ hi ta̧a̧ hinyɔ gi raak be, zaadɛ be hi ɗɔbs gɛ be.
Yɔ dood wɔ hi wɛɛko hi hin faltingo nɔɔha a hinyɔ Pol gi dɔk geha, Pol raa
a Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gin rɔbo yɔ booya̧a̧ hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Esaya ya̧a̧ du a baa nɛ hi dɔŋgo:
a rekum mɔ dɔgs dood wɛrɛ a nɛ lako wɛɛ nɛ kɛŋ gɛ, nɛ seeko wɛɛ nɛ gbɛn gɛ.

Ya̧a̧nɛ dood wɛrɛ kpoosya̧ ɓaaɓa. Hi zug tɔnya̧ be, hi ims yɔ̧lya̧ be, an bɔ yɔ̧lya̧ gi gbɛn hinɛ, an bɔ tɔnya̧ gi lag hinɛ an bɔ mɔkilya̧ gi mɛɛ hinɛ, an bɔhi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi zaa beege an be za̧a̧sihi.
Pol wɛɛ dɔgsihi
a yɛrɛ mɛɛn ma a Bɛt za̧a̧tigɔ yɔ yaazɔ tuur ma a dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ hi teesdu, ya̧nɛ hí kɛmɔ.
Yɔ dɔg anbɔ Yahuduya wɔ hi ɗund hi reko hi hin faltingo hi teesdu hi tɛŋko. ]
Pol waa a luk bɔ loo gi took gedu wɛl eerɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ zaa ge an gi booge gig dak hi hato.
Gis dood Bɛt wáátɔ dɔgl dɔko wɛɛ gisihi Waar Yeesu Kristu dɔglɔ gok be, hoobha̧a̧g hinza gɛ, gi book hinyɔ ha̧a̧g sɛw, doo za a̧a̧nig gɛ. Anbɔ.
Mii Pol , Yeesu Kristu woosɔya, mi bi̧i̧sig Yeesu fɔkya wɔ a Roma hii ɗɛɛrwol yɛrɛ. Bɛt elim an mi wɛɛ tɔmsɔya, herim an mi dɔgs dood Dɔglɔ Rɔb bɔ.
Bɛt raa da amntɔnɔ a ya̧a̧ɔkɛŋkya wɔ hi ya̧a̧ du, a bé gaa Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ, hii wɛɛ hi bi̧i̧ a ɗɛɛrwolɔ gaatɛ wɔ gedu.
Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ gi book Bɛt waa dɔglɛ. Hinyɔ gi seek Bɛt waa bɔ midzigɔ an doo, fu̧u̧ a Dawda dɔ̧ɔ̧t du.
Hinyɔ gi seek Bɛt Mɔkilɔ be, rɛmtigɔ a wɔrkɛ teesdu wɛɛ gɛrs gbɔɔl yɔ zunsɛ a gi Bɛt Waayɔ, gii Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu.
Bɛt gɛmsim a gi dɔŋgo wɛɛnim tɔmsɔya an mi elz dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t sɛw, an hi ɗɔbsige hi wa̧a̧ dɔglɔ, nuŋgɔ gi dag gbɔlumsɛ.
Nɛɛ hɛw, Bɛt elin an nɛ wɛɛ Yeesu Kristu doodɔ.
Mi gi book nɛɛ dood Romaya wɔ sɛw. Bɛt ha̧a̧g a nɛ muul nɛ sɛw, wɛɛ elin an nɛ wɛɛ doodɔ gaatɛ. An Baa wɛ Bɛto hi Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu hi gaanɛ gɛmsili hi gaan boolumi!
Biitirɔ, anyɔ mi lag a hi book ɗɔbsig nɛ dɔgl a waal du sɛw, mi baanik Bɛt mi a Yeesu Kristu nuŋg du a nɛ zul nɛ sɛw.
Bɛt yɔ mi gisig waaɔ Dɔgl Rɔb wook hi kpoos mi sɛw, mɛɛ a mi gi dɔk rɔbo: yɛms du hi lurk du sɛw mi gin waak mɔkig a zɔ̧kyɔ gɔ mi zɔ̧k duge.
Mi gig zɔ̧k a gi ha̧a̧ge, kinsa gi gaam gbɔnɔ an mi rek mi tuur a nɛɛge ma ɓɔrɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, ha̧a̧m gbɔɔltɔnɔ an mi gbɛninɛ, mi gɛ̧ɛ̧sin hinyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gaam zaaɔ, an nɛ dag tɛŋko,
raakɔ: zaabe an wɛ dag tɛŋk lɛlgbunu, mii be mi dag a nɛ ɗɔbsig dɔŋgo, nɛɛ be a minɛ bɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, ha̧a̧m an nɛ mɛɛ rɔbtɔnɔ a gim nɛ ha̧a̧k dɔɔ kittɔnɔ an mi rek a nɛɛge mi dag woos mi huml zaadɛ a nɛ teesdu anyɔ gɔ mi dak a dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduya gɛ zaadɛya̧ wɔ hi tees du.
Rek mi a dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ sɛw hi dɔŋdi gi woos miinɛ -a dood wɔ hi kɛ̧ɛ̧, hi wɔ hi kɛ̧ɛ̧ gɛ, a dood wɔ hi gin hinmɛɛk dubti hi wɔ hi taan hinmɛɛk dubt gɛ.
Ya̧a̧ gii gi gim ha̧a̧sig gbɔɔltɔnɔ an mi rek mi dɔgsin Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ hɛw, nɛɛ dood wɔ nɛ gi a Roma.
Yɔ anbɔ seemhā̧a̧m Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ gɛ, gi Bɛt tɛŋkɔyɔ gɔ za̧a̧sin za̧a̧nyɔ gig ɗɔbsig sɛw, yɛɛl a Yahuduya wɔ hi, tuur a dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduyaadɛ gɛ hi sɛw.
Bɛt zuns dood hi Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ a gi wɛɛnik za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbsig sɛw doo rɔb a gi muut du a ɗɔbsigɔ bɔ gi dɔŋg kpɔd. Hinza dɔɔm taaro, anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa
a doo riiti gi za̧a̧ a ɗɔbsig bɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Bɛt yɔ gi bɛtha nɔɔtigɔ miid ma ɓɔryɔ a hinha̧a̧l yɔ gi sɛw, hi hinyɔ dood hi gɔ gi bɛr gɛ sɛw a woosya̧ ha̧a̧l wɔ gi a̧a̧nik rɔb bɔ wookɔ hi zulha.

Yɔ Bɛt yɛɛl waal kiŋko, dood hi gbɛnik hinyɔ hí ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi gbɛn a Bɛt ge gɛ, hi gbɛnik a woosɔ wɔ kim gedu. Raakɔ a hi gbɛnik a Bɛt tɛŋkɔ waa faa, Bɛt gi Bɛt hi rɔbo. Yɔ anbɔ hinyɔ dood hi ɗɛɛ an hi mɛɛ a Bɛt zulha hinɔ hi mɛɛmɛ ma, Bɛt zunsihi hinɔ zunsɔ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, hi taa an hi bitsihi dɔglya̧,
an hii yɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt si̧, hi ɗɔ̄bsige hi sēeg an Bɛt gɛ, hi wɛɛ hi bāānig gɛ. Wɛɛ hi wag gbɔnɔ a hi mɔkil ha̧a̧l du hi kpoosya̧ yɔ gi yoo be, mɛɛhin gɛ be, wag a lɛlwil du.
Yɔ hi pɛɛk zulya̧ a hi mɛɛhinɛ, hi wɛɛ yooyɔ,
hi ɔɔ Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ yɔ taa wɔrkya gɛ fɔko, hi fɔk dood wɔrkɛ fɔtɔ wɔ, nɔɔs fɔtɔ wɔ, hinza̧a̧til wɔ hi ɛmbingo dɔɔ nas fɔtɔya̧ hi hinza̧a̧til wɔ hi ɛmbingo buu.
Hinɔ lab ro Bɛt gi ɔɔhi an hi fɔb hinyɔ kpoosya̧ gi ɗɔkingo hi ɓi̧i̧l muulya̧ a seem du.
Sa̧a̧nɛ, Bɛt gii Kiŋkya yɔ gin rɔbs taa. Hii be, hi wɛɛn rɔbyɔ gi Bɛt ɔnɛ wɛɛ ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ. Hi ɗɔbsig hinyɔ Bɛt kim giya, hi wɛɛ hi woosig hinyɔ kim gii woosɛ, hi ɔɔ Kiŋkya bɔ fɔko.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt gi bisihi a ɗɔkum seemya ha̧a̧l du anyɔ nɛɛdya̧ hi zɛmr kusil hi nɛɛdɛ. Bɛt woosɔ rı̄ı̄tin anbɔ gɛ.
Gbunɔ, walɛ be hi ɔɔ kusig hi nɛɛdɛ, hi re kusig hi nayzaya̧ walɛyɔ, hi wootingo hin seem ha̧a̧lyaadɛ. Yɔ anbɔ hi dak gbɔnɔya̧ wak bɔrɔ dɔɔrɔɔsɔ hi zulya̧ a hi muul du.
Anyɔ hā̧ā̧hi Bɛt mɛɛk gɛ, Bɛt bisihi a mɔkilya̧ tɔs bɔ gedu an hi woo hinyɔ rii an hi woo gɛ.
Kpoosya̧ hi̧i̧s hi ha̧a̧lyɔ gi sɛw: an ha̧a̧lwooki, ka̧a̧si, ha̧a̧lɛ, kpoosya̧ hi̧i̧s hi lɔlha̧a̧lɛ, zulgbɔŋki, gabsɛ, maatili hi dooleki. Hi gi mɛl-yaadɛ,
hi gi dood niiko, hi hɛ̧ɛ̧nik Bɛt lɔlɛ, hi gi ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l bookyaadɛ, zulpɛɛkyaadɛ, zultɔɔsigyaadɛ hi midilgo ha̧a̧l-gbɔnɔ zaadɛ an hi gɔ ha̧a̧lɛ, hi wɛɛ hi zuks baaya̧ hi naaya̧ hi tɔnɛ.
Hi taan hinmɛɛki, hi gin ya̧a̧luurɛ, hi taan hato, hi taan ya̧a̧rmɛɛki.
Anyɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt dɔglɔgbaak bɔ gi raak a dood wɔ hi gi wook hin wɔrɔ lab sɛw hi rii wɔrk nɛ si̧, taa an hi wook hinya̧ gii kpɔd, hi wɛɛ hi ɔksig ya̧a̧ hi dood wɔ hi wook hin wɔrɔ anbɔ.

Mɔya, doo, an mɔ gi bɔ, mɔɔ yɔ mɔ gbaasig dood zaadɛ dɔglɛ, taa an mɔ raa a be taan hinha̧a̧lɛ. Mɔɔ yɔ mɔ gis dood zaadɛ dɔgl gbaako, mɔ daanik zul mɔɔn anyɔ mɔ gbaasig dood dɔgl an hii be, mɔ wook hin gbun bɔ giya.
Wɛ mɛɛ a Bɛt dɔgl-gbaakɔ bɔ gi hi gbɔnɔ a wɔ hi wook hin anbɔ hi zulha.
Mɔ mɔkig an mɔ wir Bɛt dɔgl-gbaak bɔ wir ya, mɔɔ yɔ mɔ gbaasig dood wɔ hi wook hin anbɔ dɔglɛ? Mɔɔ mɔ wɛɛ mɔ wook hin gbun bɔ an hii be!
Zaabe mɔ wɛɛnik Bɛt rɔbɔgɔk gbɔɔl bɔ, hi hinmɔŋkɔ bɔ hi ya̧a̧rmɛɛkɔ bɔ gii hintɔs ya? Mɔ mɛ̄ɛ̄ a Bɛt rɔbɔgɔk bɔ gi an gi goksum gbɔnɔ mɔ zɛmr kpoos mɔ gɛ ya?

Yɛrɛ kpoos mɔ ɓaaɓa, mɔ mɔ̄k an mɔ zɛmr kpoos mɔ gɛ: yɔ anbɔ, mɔ mɔktsig zul mɔ dɔgl gbɔɔl yɔ daarlɛl giya. Mɔ gbaasig zul mɔ ya̧a̧rhant gbɔɔl yɔ ɗaarlɛlɛ a ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi tuus nɔɔtigɔ hi dɔglɔgbaak riit bɔ gedu sɛw.
Bɛt gi too za̧a̧nyɔ gi sɛw anyɔ woosɔ fɔbɔ a ɔ̧tɔ gedu.
Gi gaa za̧a̧tig faa bɔ a dood wɔ hi waak rɔbgɔko, hi tɛk an Bɛt gi gaahi gbɔlumsɛ, ɗɔbsigi, hi waabil faa bɔ.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt nɔɔtigɔ hi gabsɔ hi zɛm dood wɔ hi gisig zul ɓaasugo, wɔ hi rɔb inuko, wɔ hi fɔk ha̧a̧lɛ.
Dood wɔ hi wook ha̧a̧l sɛw hi dag ya̧a̧rhanto hi zɛksili, gi yɛɛl a Yahu­duya wɔ hi, gi tuur a dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaadɛ wɔ hi.
Yɛrɛ dood wɔ hi wook rɔb sɛw hi dag gbɔlumsɛ, ɗɔbsigi hi boolumi, gi yɛɛl a Yahuduya wɔ hi, gi tuur a dood dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaadɛ wɔ hi.
Ya̧a̧nɛ a Bɛt ge doo gɛ̧ɛ̧k taaro.
Dood wɔ hi gɔk hinha̧a̧l sɛw hí mɛ̄ɛ̄ Muusa maak-dɔglɔ bɔ gɛ, hi wagɔ, wɛɛ maakdɔgl gi taaro. Dood wɔ hi gɔ hinha̧a̧lɛ hi maakdɔgl yɔ hi gaa, hi gbaasihi dɔgl hi maakdɔgl bɔ giya.
Wɔ hi lak maakdɔglɔ, hi taa dood riitɛ a Bɛt muutdu. Wɔ hi wook hinyɔ gi dɔko, hii gi dood riitɛ a gi muutdu.
Gid dood wɔ hi taa Yahuduyaadɛ hi taan maakdɔgl bɔ gɛ hi fɔk hinyɔ maakdɔgl gi raak hi zulya̧, hii yɔ hi taan maakdɔgl bɔ gɛ hii gi maakdɔglya hi zulya̧.

Ɛmbilya̧ zuun a Bɛt bi̧i̧ maakdɔgl a hi kpoos du, wɛɛ kpoosya̧ zuun hin gbun bɔ hɛw: ɔ̧tza mɔkilya̧ a hi kpoos du gihi hin gɛ̧ɛ̧niko, ɔ̧tza gisihi dɔgl ɔɔko, yɔ anbɔ ɛmbilya̧ zuun a Bɛt bi̧i̧ maakɔdɔgl a hi kpoos du.
Yɔ anbɔ, a ɔ̧t yɔ̧ɔ̧sum bɔ gedu, hinwɔ hi yaat a dood waabil du sɛw Bɛt gi gbaasihi dɔgl hi Yeesu Kristu anyɔ mi dɔk a Dɔgl Rɔb yɔ mi tuusig hinɔ gedu.
Yɛrɛ nɛya, nɛ seek nuŋg nɛ bɔ a Yahuduya an hinɗɔbtyɔ, nɛ gi fi̧i̧yik a maak nɛ bɔ gedu, muul nɛ gi ɓaak a Bɛt nɛ bɔ ge,
nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ ha̧a̧ge. Bɛtmaakdɔgl goksin hinyɔ gi rɔbo, nɛ mɛɛ an nɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧ hinyɔ gi sɔmsɔm.
Nɛ mɔkig hi zul nɛ a nɛ gi yɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ tɛlikyaadɛyɔ, a nɛ gi lɛlgaal a dood wɔ hi ɛmbik lɛlwil du hi zulɛ,
nɛ gi wɔ hi mɛɛhin gɛ kaŋkugo, nɛ gis ya̧a̧mwaat wɔ hingoko, nɛ mɛɛ bɛttɔnɔ a nɛ dag rɔbo hi hinmɛɛki a Bɛtmaakdɔgl bɔ gedu.
Nɛya, nɛ goksig dood zaadɛ hinɛ, nɔ ɔnɛ nɛ goks zul nɛ hin gɛ? Nɛɛ wɔ nɛ dɔk hi Bɛtdɔglɛ a bɔhi looluurɛ, nɛ nɛ lookluurloo ma mi?
Nɛya nɛ dɔk a bɔhi naamansi, nɛ nɛ naakmansnaa ma mi? Nɛɛ wɔ nɛ bɔ̧ɔ̧k maakwɔdɛ, nɛ nɛ luurlooklo a maakwɔdluk du ma mi?
Nɛ nɛ gi gɔsig zul nɛ maakdɔgl gbɔlumsɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gi zuksig Bɛtmaakɔ tɔn nɛ, nɛ yɔ anbɔ, nɛ gi ha̧tirgo Bɛt gbɔlums ɔ̧ɔ̧n ma mi?
Hi bi̧i̧ hinɔ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du:
a hi book ha̧a̧l a Bɛt nuŋgɔ bɔ geha a nɛ dɔŋgo a dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi tees du.
Mɔd fɔk hinyɔ Bɛtmaak gi dɔko, dɔms mɔ gi hinrɔbo; mɔd ɗa̧a̧k Bɛtmaakdɔgl be, dɔms mɔ gi hintɔsyɔ.
Kpaar gi fɔk Bɛtmaako, Bɛt sēeg an dɔmb gɛ ya?
Kpaaryɔ doo gɔg gɛ gi fɔk Bɛtmaakdɔglɛ, gi mat nɛ́ɛ́ dɔmbɛ wɔ nɛ inik Bɛtmaakɔ fɔko, nɛɛ wɔ nɛ gin Bɛtmaakdɔgl bɔ hi bi̧i̧.
Yahuduya gikɔ, taa za̧a̧nyɔ hi mɛɛg a gi Yahuduyayɔ; dɔms be, taa hinyɔ hi gbɛnik a lɔl du.

Yahuduya rɔb gɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi Yahuduya a gi kpoos du. Dɔms gɛ za̧a̧nyɔ nab a kpoos du, anyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi wooko, taa a muul du anyɔ Bɛtmaakdɔgl yɔ hi bi̧i̧ gi raako. Yɔ anbɔ, bantɔ gɔ fu̧u̧ a dood gɛ, gɔ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge.
Hinyɔ Yahuduya hi daarin doo gedo? Hinyɔ dɔms gi ɗaak be gedo be?
Daarik bɔ gi hin gbɔɔl hi gbɔnɔ sɛw. Yɛɛl hi dɔgl yɔ Bɛt gaa Yahuduya wɔ naan du an hi kaŋkɔ.
An zaadɛ hi iin Bɛt dɔgl gɔ nɔ? Inikya̧ bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi ya̧a̧n hinyɔ Bɛt raa a be woo ya?
Yā̧a̧n gɛ nɛ zaŋ! Yɛ dood hi mɛɛ Bɛto a gi rɔbo, anyɔ hi sɛw hi wɛɛ nɛ ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya gii hɛw anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa
a yɛhi mɛɛ a mɔ gi hinrɔbdɔkyayɔ, wɛɛ gɔ hi gbaasum dɔglɛ, mɔ ɗɛɛhi.
Yɛrɛ hin-a̧a̧byɔ wɛ gɔko gi gi zuunik Bɛt hinrɔbɔ, gi an wɛ raa a nɔ? Bɛt gi hin-a̧a̧b wookya gi giwɛ ya̧a̧rhant gaak ya? (Mi book anyɔ doo gɔ hi booko. )
Yɛrɛ lab gɛ! À Bɛt gi nɛ hin-a̧a̧bwookya hi zulɔ, gi an gi gbaas nɛ waal dɔgl ri!
Dood zaadɛ hi raak be: a gid Bɛt rɔbɔ gi tuuk gaattɔnɔ gi daarlɛl a be ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧n dɔŋgo, gi wɛɛ gi gɔk an dood hi gaa Bɛt gbɔlumsɛ, Bɛt gi gbaasib dɔgl ri an bee be gi hinha̧a̧lya?
Hinɔ riitin hi raakɔ a yɛwɛ woo hinha̧a̧l an rɔb gi tuu gɛ ya? Anyɔ dood zaadɛ wɔ hi gi wi niiko, hi gɛ̧ɛ̧niw a wi dɔg hin wɔrɔ anbɔ. Dood wɔrɔ lab dɔgl gi matihi, a hin-a̧a̧bya̧ yɔ hi woo lɛlɔ ge.
Yɛrɛ ri? Wii Yahuduya wɔ, wi gi dood nabl wi daar dood zaadɛ daar ya? Lab gɛ! Mii mi zu̧u̧n da̧a̧da̧ a wi Yahuduya wɔ hi dood zaadɛ hi riitin sɛw, wɛ gi a hinha̧a̧l tɛŋk du,
anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa:
a doo za riit taaro, taas nɛ gbun mɔɔti.
Doo za mɔkilya taa an gi mɔk Bɛto, wɛɛ doo za yɔ gi ɓɛɛk Bɛt hi rɔb taaro.
Hi sɛw hi hɛɛ Bɛt gbɔnɔ hɛɛ, doo za hinrɔb wookya gbun mɔɔt taaro, hi sɛw hi wɛɛ hintɔsi a Bɛt muutdu, taas nɛ gbun mɔɔti.
Kɔlkya̧ wal gi loor aasilyɔ, hi gin mɛl an hi maatin doodɛ. Ya̧a̧boonya̧ bɔ gi tuuzig a hi ya̧a̧kos muulɛ gi waŋga̧a̧b ɗɔŋko.
Booto hi dɔgl zobtili hi̧i̧s a hi ya̧a̧ du.
Hi nɔɔk digttɔnɔ an hi rek hi gubr doo ga̧a̧mɛ.
Lɛlyɔ hi daa ge hi ha̧tirgo doodɛ hi ɔɔk ya̧a̧rhant a hi kuudu.
Hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ boolum gbɔnɔ gɛ.
Hí mɔ̄k an hi ɗɔbs Bɛto hoob gi ha̧a̧hi a gi muutdu gɛ.
Yɛrɛ wɛ mɛɛ a hinyɔ Bɛtmaakɔ gi dɔk sɛw gi dɔgsig dood wɔ hi gi maakdɔgl tɛŋk du hiya, an ya̧a̧ sɛw hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧yɔ, wɛɛ an dood waal du sɛw hi rii an Bɛt gi gbaasihi dɔglɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ doo za ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi wɛɛ doo riit a Bɛt muut du a Bɛtmaakdɔgl yɔ gig fɔk gi dɔŋg gɛ. Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛtmaakdɔgl bɔ woosɔ gɛ an doo gi mɛɛn a yɛrɛ be woo hinha̧a̧lɛ.

Yɛrɛ Bɛt zunsɛ gɛrsɔ yɔ wɛɛnɛ dood riitɛ a gi muutdu. Gɛrsɔ bɔ mı̄d hi maakdɔglɔ gɛ. Gɛrsɔ gɛ: kpoos gbaaki a Yeesu Kristu ge. Za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbs Kristu, Bɛt ta̧a̧ge, anbɔ sɛw, gɛ̧ksil taaro. Hin bɔ lab ro, Bɛtmaakdɔgl hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya amntɛ wɔ hii boo dɔglɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, dood sɛw hi gɔ hinha̧a̧lɛ hi lɔɔ Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ.
Bɛt gɔsihi rɔbo, za̧a̧sihi ya̧a̧rtɔs a Yeesu Kristu dɔŋgo, tutsihi zulya̧ aakil du.

Bɛt gaaz giya an hinnaandɛmsya an gi wɔrɔ gi za̧a̧s dood hi ga̧a̧mɔ bɔ an wɔ gɔ hi ɗɔbsige hi za̧a̧. Wɛɛ zuun hinrɔbɔwook anbɔ. Hinha̧a̧l yɔ doo hi woo nɛ doosɛ Bɛt ɔsihi nɛ dɔglɔ a hinɔ mɔŋk bɔ gedu.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt gi zuunik hinrɔbɔgɔk a ɔ̧tigi zul an gi gi hinrɔbgɔkya an gii be gi wɛɛn dood wɔ hi ɗɔbsig Yeesu Kristu hinrɔbwookyaadɛ a gi muutdu be.
Yɛrɛ hinyɔ dood gɔ hi tɔɔsin zulya̧ zɛ̧ɛ̧r ya? Ɛ̧-ɛ̧, zɛ̧ɛ̧r nɛ gɛ zaŋ! Bɛt wɛɛnihi dood riitɛ a nɔ dɔŋgo? Ger a Bɛtmaak fɔk dɔŋg ya? Ɛ̧-ɛ̧, taa anbɔ! Yɔ hi gbaa kpoosya̧ a Yeesu ge kpɔd ro, ya̧a̧nɛ.
Wɛ mɔkig a Bɛt gɔ ta̧a̧ doo anyɔ gbaa kpoosɔ a Yeesu ge, taa a maakdɔgl woosɔ yɔ woo gi dɔŋgo.
Bɛt gi Yahuduyaadɛ Bɛt kpɔd ya? Ɛ̧-ɛ̧, Bɛt gi dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ Bɛtya̧ hɛw.
Bɛt gi Bɛt gbunu, ya̧a̧nɛ, gi ta̧a̧ Yahuduyaadɛ hi dood dɔɔmɛ wɔ eer sɛw a ɗɔbsigya̧ bɔ gi dɔŋg kpɔd.
Anyɔ wɛ Yeesu ɗɔbsugo, wɛ gi ha̧tirgo maakdɔgl ha̧tir ya? Taa anbɔ, wɛ gig ta̧a̧kta̧ ro!
Gi an wɛ dɔg nɔ a yaa wɛ Abraham zulha nɔ? Dag nɔ hinɔ?
Gid Bɛt ta̧a̧ Abraham a woosɔ wɔ gi dɔŋgo, gi anbɔ ɗɛɛ an gi tɔɔs zulɔ, taa a Bɛt muutdu ɔnɛ.
Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa a nɔ? Raa
a Abraham gbaa kpoosɔ a Bɛt ge, Bɛt wɛɛ seeg an doo riiti anyɔ ɗɔbsɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ be, za̧a̧nyɔ gi wookwoosɛ, hi toog tusɔ, tusɔ bɔ tookɔ taa an gaasɛ, gi an hinyɔ rii an gi dag giya.
Wɛɛ an za̧a̧nyɔ taa wooswook gɛ, gi gi kpoosɔ gbaak a Bɛt yɔ gig ɗɔbsig ge, a Bɛtyɔ gɔ gi ta̧a̧k dood ha̧a̧l ge, Bɛt taasig hinha̧a̧lɔ ɓɛrko, gi an doo riityɔ a gi muut du a ɗɔbsigɔ bɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Ya̧a̧ɔ gii Dawda gi boo doo za hatɔ dɔglɛ, Bɛt gi ta̧a̧g an doo riiti, sēē woosɔ dɔgl gɛ, gi raa:
a hat gi a dood wɔ Bɛt bitsihi hin-a̧a̧bya̧ hi, gi wɛɛ gi yaat hinha̧a̧lya̧.
Hat gi a za̧a̧nyɔ Waar Bɛt ɓɛr hinha̧a̧lɔ gɛ ge!
Hat bɔrɔ gis dɔmbɛ wɔ hii kpɔd ya, zaabe kpaarɛ wɔ hɛw ya? Wɛ raa a Abraham yɔ ɗɔbs Bɛto, Bɛt see gii an doo riit a gi muutdu.
Bɛt seeg ri an doo riit nɔ? Seege yɔ nab ket ya, zaabe yɔ gi kpaar ket ya ri? Da nabdir nɛ gɛ, da gi kpaari kete.

Abraham dag dɔms bɔ an hinmɛɛnikya, an ɗɛntɛ sɔɔlɛ. Dɔmsɔ gi zuunik a Bɛt seeg an doo riiti anyɔ ɗɔbsige yɔ gi nɛ kpaari. Yɔ anbɔ, Abraham wɛɛ kpaarɛ wɔ hi ɗɔbs Bɛto baaya̧ giya, Bɛt wɛɛ seehi be an dood riitɛ a gi muutdu.
Abraham gi dɔmbɛ wɔ baaya̧ gii hɛw, raakɔ a dood wɔ hi dag dɔms hii kpɔd gɛ, gɛ wɔ hi fɔk Baa wɛ Abraham ɗɔbsugɔ bɔ yɔ ginɛ kpaari.
Bɛt raa Abraham a gii hi waatɔ bé gaahi waalɛ. Rāā anbɔ a maakdɔgl yɔ gi fɔk gi dɔŋg gɛ, raa a gi gaag anyɔ ɗɔbsɔ gi wɛɛ doo riit a gi muutdu.
Yɛrɛ à ginɛ an Bɛtmaakdɔgl fɔkya wɔ hi dag hinyɔ Bɛt raa a bé gaa, yɔ anbɔ ɗɔbsig wɛ yɔ gi hintɔsyɔ, hinyɔ Bɛt raa nɛ a gi gaa ma yɔ ha̧a̧tir ma.
Anyɔ dood gɔ hi Bɛtmaakdɔglɔ ɗa̧a̧ko Bɛtmaakdɔgl gɔ kamz Bɛt gabsɛ. Wɛɛ lɛlyɔ maakɗɔgl taa ge gɛ, maakdɔgl-inik taa lɛlɔge be.

Ya̧a̧nɛ, Bɛt gi raa a gi gaa dood waal bɔ a hi ɗɔbsig dɔŋgo an hinɔ gi wɛɛ gaas ya̧a̧rtɔs, an hinyɔ Bɛt raa a bé woos Abraham waatɔ sɛw gi er a Bɛt kpoosɔ rɔb ha. Taa an hinɔ gi gis dood wɔ hi fɔk Bɛtmaak gii kpɔdi, gi gis dood wɔ hi ɗɔbs an Abraham hɛw. Abraham gi baa wɛ gii sɛw
anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa
a be wɛɛnum dood hɛbt kittɔnɔ baa ya̧nɛ.
Gi baa wɛ a Bɛt yɔ ɗɔbsig gi muut du, Za̧a̧nyɔ gi wɛnsig wɔrkɛ kolya̧, wɛɛ gi elik hinyɔ taa nɛ gɛ an hinɔ gi giro.
Abraham ɗɔbs Bɛto gbaa mɔkilɔ a ge, yɔ da mɔkilgbaak taa nɛ gɛ, ya̧a̧nɛ gi wɛɛ dood hɛbt kittɔnɔ baaya̧ anyɔ Bɛt da
a dɔ̧ɔ̧t mɔ gi gi anbɔ.
Abraham da gin nɛ wɛl sɛ̧ɛ̧b tuurik tɛmɛrɛ gbunu, sēē an muulɔ ɔ̧ɔ̧sɔ, nistɔ Saratu be, wɔm da̧a̧da̧, taa an gi wɛɛ gi dag waa be. An gbɛn anbɔ si̧, mɔ̄ɔ̄ ɗɔbsugɔ gɛ,
Ɔ̄ɔ̄ Bɛt ɗɔbsig gɛ, fāā hinyɔ Bɛt raa a gi gaag gɛ. Ɗɔbsugɔ bɔ gaag tɛŋko, gi baanik Bɛto.
Ta̧a̧ hi kpoosɔ sɛw a Bɛt gin tɛŋko an gi woo hinyɔ da raa nɛko.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt gi see hinɔ an gi doo riiti a gi muutdu.
Yɛrɛ raak bɔ a Bɛt seeg an doo riityɔ, hi bı̧̄ı̧̄s gii hinɔ kpɔd gɛ.
Bi̧i̧ys wɛɛ yɔ Bɛt gɔ gi seewɛ an dood riitɛ a gi muutdu hɛw, wɛɛ yɔ wɛ ɗɔbsig za̧a̧nyɔ rɛms Waar wɛ Yeesu a wɔrkɛ tees du.
Bɛt gaag wɔrk naan du a wɛ hinha̧a̧l dɔŋgo, wɛɛ rɛmsig a wɔrkɛ tees du an gi wɛɛnɛ dood riitɛ ro a gi muutdu.
Nɛ yɔ Bɛt seewɛ an dood riitɛ a gi muutdu a wɛ ɗɔbsig dɔŋgo, wɛ gin boolum gɔ hi gii a Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu dɔŋgo.
A Yeesu dɔŋgo, hi ɗɔbsig wɛ, wɛ ɗɛɛ an wɛ dag gbɔnɔ talk a gɛmsillɛl yɔ wɛ erk gedu a Bɛt dɔŋdi yɔ za̧a̧sɛ ya̧a̧r tɔs. Hinyɔ giwɛ hat gaako, yɔ wɛ gin mɔkil a wɛ́ dag Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ bɔ wɛnɛ giya.
Gii kpɔd gɛ, wɛ gi dak hat hɛw a wɛ zɛksil du, yɔ anbɔ wɛ mɛɛ be a zɛksil gi kamz hinmɔŋki,
hinmɔŋk be gi kamz ɗɛɛti, ɗɛɛt be gi kamz mɔkil-gbaaki.
Mɔkil-gbaak bɔ gɔ maat doo gɛ, anyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gaawɛ Bɛt ha̧a̧tigɔ tal giwɛ kpoos du.
Yɔ tɛŋk wɛ rı̄ı̄ nɛ an wɛ woo hinza ket gɛ an wɛ ɔɔ hinha̧a̧lɛ, Kristu wɔr a dood bɔbtin zulɛ a ɔ̧tyɔ hi dɛ̧ɛ̧ gedu.
Ɓaaɓa an doo gi wɔr a doo yɔ rii gi zulɛ. Kinsa doo za kɔ̀t yɔ wɔr a doo rɔb za dɔŋg be.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt gisɛ ha̧a̧tig ɔ̧ɔ̧n zuunik anyɔ Kristu wɔr wɛ zulɛ yɔ wɛ gi nɛ hinha̧a̧lyaadɛ gii kete.
Yɛrɛ gid wɛ gi dood riitɛ a Bɛt muutdu a Kristu ga̧a̧mɔ bɔ gubr gi dɔŋgo, yɔ anbɔ, hinyɔ daarlɛl gbɔɔltɔnɔ gii gi za̧a̧sɛ a Bɛt nɔɔtigɔ bɔ gedu.

Nɛyɔ wɛ da wɛ gi nɛ Bɛt lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikyaadɛ kete, nɛ wɛ wɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ a waaɔ bɔ wɔr a wɛ kal gi dɔŋg ma mi? Nɛ yɔ anbɔ, hinyɔ daar bɔrɔ lɛl gbɔɔltɔnɔ, yɔ wɛ gi sa̧a̧mɔ ɓɔri ma giya waaɔ bɔ za̧a̧tigɔ gii gi za̧a̧sɛ.
Wɛ́ dāg hat a hin bɔrɔ gedu kpɔd gɛ, wɛ dag a ɔksig wɛ bɔ gedu hi Bɛto a Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu yɔ wɛɛnɛ Bɛt saamɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, anyɔ hinha̧a̧l gul a waal du a doo gbun bɔ nuŋgɔ a Àdamu gi dɔŋgo, wɔrk taz gɔ a hinha̧a̧l dɔŋgo, yɔ anbɔ wɔrk bɛbr naanɔ gɔ dood zulha sɛw anyɔ dood sɛw hi gɔ hinha̧a̧lɛ.
Hinha̧a̧l tal a waaldu yɔ maakdɔgl da taa ket giya. Yɛrɛ, yɔ maakdɔgl da taa nɛ kete, Bɛt da ɓɛ̄r hinha̧a̧l gɛ.
Hɔnɛyɔ Adamu ginɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi zaa rittinsɔ, ha̧tir Bɛt ya̧a̧ɔ, woo hinha̧a̧lɛ, wɔrk dag tɛŋk gɔ a dood wɔ hí hā̧tir Bɛt ya̧a̧ɔ an Adamu gɛ hɛw hi zulha sɛw, tuur a Muusa ge.

Yɛrɛ Adamu hin-a̧a̧bɔ rı̄ı̄ an hi goksin gaasyɔ Bɛt gaawɛ gii gɛ. Dood kittɔnɔ hi wɔr a hinha̧a̧l yɔ doo gbun da gɔ gi dɔŋgo. Bɛt gɛmsilɔ tɛŋk daar hinha̧a̧l tɛŋkɔ daar gbɔɔltɔnɔ, an gaas yɔ Bɛt gaa a dood kittɔnɔ, a doo gbun ge, gɛ a Yeesu Kristu gɛmsilɔ bɔ gi dɔŋgo.

Bɛt gaasɔ bɔ daarin doo gbun hinha̧a̧lɔ tɛŋko. Bɛtdɔglɔgbaak bɔ a hin-a̧a̧b yɔ doo gbun da woo hage, hin-a̧a̧b bɔ mat dood sɛw. Yɛrɛ dood kittɔnɔ hi woo hin-a̧a̧bi, wɛɛ Bɛt gáásɔ ya̧a̧rtɔs rɔb bɔ wɛɛnihi hinrɔb wookyaadɛ.

Hi rɔbo, doo gbun hin-a̧a̧bɔ gɔy an wɔrk gi dag tɛŋko a doo gbun bɔrɔ gi dɔŋgo. Yɛrɛ a doo za gbun dɔŋg ro, gɛ Yeesu Kristu, dood wɔ hi dag Bɛt gɛmsilɔ gbɔɔlɛ hi Bɛt gaasɔ yɔ wɛɛnihi dood riitɛ gi muutdu ya̧a̧rtɔs hi dag wááto hi za̧a̧tigi. Hinɔ daar hinha̧a̧l tɛŋkɔ daarɔ.
Mi dɔg a dood sɛw hi wɛɛ hin-a̧a̧bwookyaadɛ a doo gbun yɔ gɔ hin-a̧a̧b gi dɔŋgo. Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gii wɛɛ gi tuts dood zulya̧ aakil du sɛw gi wɛɛ gi gaahi za̧a̧tig a doo gbun yɔ woo hinyɔ rii gi dɔŋgo.
Dood kittɔnɔ hi wɛɛ hinha̧a̧l-yaadɛ anyɔ doo gbun ha̧tir hinyɔ Bɛt raa. Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gi ta̧a̧ dood kittɔnɔ anyɔ doo gbun kɛms Bɛt tɔnɛ.
Maakdɔgl wɛɛ midɔ an hi tɔɔs hinha̧a̧lɛ. Yɛrɛ hinha̧a̧l hi hɔŋgɔ, Bɛt gɛmsilɔ gi wɛɛ gi hɔŋgɔ gi daarlɛl be.
Anyɔ hinha̧a̧l gin nɛ tɛŋk dood zulha a wɔrk dɔŋgo, yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gɛmsilɔ tɛŋkɔ gi waak hinrɔb wooki gi midig za̧a̧tig faa yɔ wɛ dag a Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu dɔŋgo.
Yɛrɛ wɛ dɔg a nɔ? A wɛ waa a hinha̧a̧l du an Bɛt gɛmsilɔ gi tɔɔ gi daar ya?
Taa anbɔ nɛ zaŋ! Wɛɛ yɔ wɛ wɔr a hinha̧a̧l gbaŋgi, gi an wɛ wɛɛ wɛ waak ri a hinha̧a̧l du nɔ?
Nɛ mɛ̄ɛ̄ a wɛɛ sɛw yɔ wɛ loo Bɛtmɛm wɛ ɔks gbunu hi Yeesu Kristu, wɛ ɔks gbunu hi gii a wɔrkɔ bɔ wɔr gedu gɛ ya?

Hi i̧i̧wɛ lɛlgbunu hi gii a Bɛtmɛm bɔ wɛ loo gedu, wɛ wɔr hi giya. Yɔ anbɔ anyɔ gii da rɛml gi ɗund a wɔrk du hi Baa wɛ Bɛt tɛŋkɔ gɛrsya bɔ, wɛɛ hɛw wɛ dag gbɔnɔ gɔ an wɛ ɛmb a za̧a̧tig ɛmbil seg rɔb bɔ gedu hi Bɛt tɛŋkɔ gɛrsya bɔ be.
Gid wɛ ɔks wɛ pirk gbunu an tɛ̧ɛ̧ hi giya a wɔrk yɔ riitin hi ɔnɛ bɔ gedu, wɛ́ wɛɛ wɛ́ ɔks gɔ hi gii an gbuna bɔ a rɛmtig yɔ riitin an ɔnɛ bɔ gedu.
Yɛwɛ mɛɛ a doo amnt bɔ gi wɛ muul du, da dooy a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha hi giya an hinha̧a̧l muul bɔ tɛŋkɔ gi wagɔ, an bɔwɛ kɔm hinha̧a̧l gbaari.
Ya̧a̧nɛ doo gi wɔrɔ, hinha̧a̧l tɛŋkɔ taa gi zulha ma, da̧a̧da̧.
Yɛrɛ gid wɛ wɔr hi Kristu, wɛ gi ɗɔbsig a wɛ́ waa hi gii hɛw.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, wɛ mɛɛ a Kristu yɔ rɛml a wɔrkɛ teesdu gi wɛɛz a za̧a̧tig du, taa zaa wɔrk nɛ zaŋ, wɔrk taan tɛŋk gi zulha ma.
Yɔ wɔrɔ, wɔr gaatɔ gii dɔɔ gbunu a wɛ hinha̧a̧l dɔŋgo, hɔnɛyɔ wɛɛz a za̧a̧tig du be, gi za̧a̧k a Bɛt zulɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ nɛɛ hi zul nɛ hɛw, seen zul nɛ an nɛ wɔr a hinha̧a̧l gbaŋg sa̧a̧nɛ, wɛɛ nɛ gi za̧a̧tili a Bɛt zulɛ a Yeesu Kristu dɔŋgo.
Bɔ hinha̧a̧l gi wɛɛsin waar a muul nɛ wɔrkil bɔ gedu an bɔnɛ fɔb ɗɔkumɔ wɔ.
Bɔnɛ yaa naan a hinha̧a̧l du an wɔdyɔ gɔ hi woon ha̧a̧lɛ; yɛrɛ gaan zul nɛ a Bɛt ge an dood wɔ hi wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ hi wɛɛzɔ. Gaan muul nɛ sɛw a Bɛt woos du an wɔd hinrɔb woonikya.
Àgiyɔ nɛ taa ma a maakdɔgl waabil du, nɛ waak a Bɛt gɛmsil du. Nɛ yɔ anbɔ, bɔnɛ ɔɔ hinha̧a̧l gi dag tɛŋk nɛ zulha.
Nɛ anyɔ Bɛt maakdɔglɔ taan tɛŋk wɛ zulha, wɛ́ wɛɛ wɛ́ waak a Bɛt gɛmsil du, yɔ anbɔ gi an wɛ fɔb hinha̧a̧l gɔki ya? Taa nɛ anbɔ zaŋ!

Nɛ mɛɛ a nɛ́ gaa doo za zul nɛ an gbaari an nɛ kɛmsig tɔnɛ, nɛ gi za̧a̧n bɔ gbaar ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ. Zaabe nɛ gi hinha̧a̧lyɔ gi kaŋk doo a wɔrk du gbaar ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, zaabe nɛ fɔk Bɛto, nɛ gi dood riitɛ a Bɛt muutdu a tɔn nɛ kɛŋk bɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Yɛrɛ wɛ baan Bɛto; anyɔ nɛ da nɛ ginɛ hinha̧a̧l gbaar gii si̧, yɛrɛ nɛ ta̧a̧ hinyɔ wi gogsin gbɔnɔɔ wɔ hi kpoos nɛ sɛw.
Bɛt tuusin a hinha̧a̧l bɔ tɛŋkɔ gedu, yɛrɛ nɛ wɛɛ Bɛt woosyaadɛ an nɛ woo hinriiti.

Mi bookya̧a̧ an doo gi booko a kpoos nɛ hɔntil bɔ gi dɔŋgo. Nɛ da nɛ gaak nɛ muul nɛ a libt du hi a hinha̧a̧l du an nɛ woo hinyɔ bɔbtɔ. Gbunɔ, ɓɔri ma gaan muul nɛ dɛɛt wɔ a Bɛt ge an hinrɔbwook gbaarɛ an nɛ wɛɛ dood gaatɛ a Bɛt muutdu.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, yɔ nɛ da nɛ gi hinha̧a̧l gbaarɛ, nɛ da nɛ́ mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinriit wook hinɔ gɛ.
Woos nɛ wɔ nɛ da nɛ woo anbɔ nɛ dagn nɔ? Nɛ nɛ see nɛ dagnik seem ɓɔri ma mi? Hin wɔrɔ da̧a̧kya̧ sɛw gɛ wɔrko.
Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ, yɔ nɛ tuu a hinha̧a̧l du a aakil du nɛ wɛɛs Bɛt gbaarɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧, woos nɛ rɔb bɔ gin gaak gaatigi a Bɛt muutdu, wɛɛ yɔ̧ɔ̧sumɔ be gɛ za̧a̧tig faa.
Ya̧a̧nɛ hinha̧a̧l dɔɔrɔɔsɔ gɛ: wɔrko; Bɛt gaasɔ tɔs be gɛ: za̧a̧tig faa bɔ a Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu ge.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ ha̧a̧mi an mi dɔgsin bɛttɔnɔ. Mi book dood wɔ hi mɛɛ maakdɔgl hiya, nɛ maakdɔgl gi waak a doo zulha yɔ doo gɔ gi za̧a̧tili kpɔd ma mi? Lab gɛ ya?
Yɔ anbɔ nis lool wɔy hi maakdɔgl bɔ gii a waltɔ ge yɔ gi za̧a̧tili; waltɔ gi wɔrɔ, nis bɔ zulɔ tuutu a maakdɔgl bɔ wɔg nɛ a waltɔ ge gedu.
Yɔ anbɔ lab, gi lootin hi walza, yɔ waltɔ gi za̧a̧tili, hi elig a nis mansyayɔ; wɛɛ wal bɔ gi wɔrɔ, zulɔ tuu gɔ ma a lottins maakdɔgl bɔ gedu, yɔ anbɔ gi lootin hi wal za, taa a mans du ma.
Gbunɔ giya, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, anyɔ nɛ ɔks hi Kristu muulɔ, nɛɛ hɛw nɛ wɔr a maakdɔgl gbaŋgi an nɛ wɛɛs doo za dood ɔnɛ, Za̧a̧nyɔ rɛml a wɔrkɛ tees du, an wɛ woos Bɛt woos rɔbɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, yɔ wɛ ginɛ waak an doo hɛbtdi, ɗɔkum ha̧a̧l wɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧ a maakdɔgl du, hi woohin a wɛ muul du an hi ka̧wɛ a wɔrk du.

Yɛrɛ ɓɔri wɛ wɔr a maakdɔgl bɔ wɔ̀wɛ nɛ gi gbaŋgi, zul wɛ tuu gɔ ma aakil du. Yɔ anbɔ wɛ woosig Bɛt woosɔ hi gbɔnɔ sego an hinyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ giwɛ raako, wɛ taa wook hi gbɔnɔ amnt bɔ an hinyɔ maakdɔgl bɔ bi̧i̧ nɛko.

Gi an wɛ raa a nɔ? Maakdɔgl gi hinha̧a̧l ya? Taa nɛ anbɔ zaŋ! Yɛrɛ à maakdɔgl taa nɛ gɛ yɔ mi mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinha̧a̧l hinɔ gɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, à maakdɔgl dɔ̄g nɛ a bɔmɔ ɗɔkin hin gɛ gɛ, yɔ mi mɛɛ nɛ lɔlɗɔkum hinɔ gɛ.
Hinha̧a̧l dag gbɔnɔ a hinyɔ maakdɔgl bɔ raa gedu an gi woo lɔlɗɔkum yɔ gi sɛw a mi kpoos du; maakdɔgl gi taa gɛ, hinha̧a̧l yɔ wɔɔrɔ, yɔ taan tɛŋko.
Amntɔnɔ yɔ mi mɛɛ maakdɔgl kɛn gɛ mi waakwa; hɔnɛyɔ hinraak midɔ, hinha̧a̧l dag gbɔnɔ waak gɔ be. Mii mi wɔr be.
Yɔ anbɔ mi zɛm hinraak bɔ ginɛ an gi gaa za̧a̧tigi, ka̧mi a wɔrk du.
Ya̧a̧nɛ anyɔ hinha̧a̧l dag gbɔnɔ, maatim hi hinraak bɔ giya, wɛɛ gbɔmnimi.
Maakdɔgl ɔnɛ gi hin gaatyɔ, hinraak hɛw gi hin gaatyɔ hi hin riiti, hi hinrɔbo.
Hinyɔ bɛrɔ wɛɛsim minɛ wɔrkdak lɛl ya? Taa nɛ anbɔ zaŋ! Gi hinha̧a̧lɛ an hinɔ gi tuu an hinha̧a̧lɛ an gi gbɔ̧mi a hinyɔ bɛr gi dɔŋgo an hinha̧a̧l gi wɛɛ hinha̧a̧lɛ gi daarlɛl hi hinraaki.
Ya̧a̧nɛ wɛ mɛɛ maakdɔgl gi hin mɔkilyayɔ. Wɛɛ mii be mi gi doo hɛbtdi yɔ hi zebrig a hinha̧a̧l du giya.
Yɛrɛ mi mɛ̄ɛ̄ hinyɔ mi wook gɛ: wɛɛ hinyɔ ha̧a̧mi mi wōō hinɔ gɛ, wɛɛ hinyɔ ha̧a̧m nɛ gɛ zaŋ, mi wook hinɔ giya.
Nɛ, an mi mɛɛ a mi gɔk hinyɔ ha̧a̧m gɔk gɛ, mi mɛks a gedu a mi ta̧a̧k maakdɔgl dɔglɔ a bɛɛrɔ.
Nɛ yɔ anbɔ, mi taa gɔk hinɔ hi zul mi, hinha̧a̧l yɔ gi waak mi kpoos du gii gi hinɔ gɔko.
Hinyɔ gi rɔbo, mi mɛɛ a taa waak a mi kpoos du, raakɔ a mi muul du, an doo hɛbtdi. Ha̧a̧m wook ɔnɛ, wɛɛ an gɔ mi woo hinrɔbo, mi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, mi taa gɔk hin rɔb yɔ ha̧a̧mi, mi wɛɛ mi gɔk ha̧a̧l yɔ ha̧a̧mi gɛ.
Wɛɛ gid mi gɔk hinyɔ ha̧a̧mi gɛ, mii taa gɔko, hinha̧a̧l yɔ gi waak mi kpoos du gii gi gɔko!
Yɛrɛ mi zɛm a ri ya, a gɔ ha̧a̧mi rɔbgɔki, wɛɛ ha̧a̧lgɔk bɔ ɓaŋgimɓaŋgɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ mi dak hat hi Bɛtmaakdɔgl bɔ an doo hi kpoosɔ gi mɔkugo.
Wɛɛ mi gbɛnik ꞋꞋmaakdɔglꞋꞋ za a mi muul du, gi book nɔk hi kpoos mi ꞋꞋmaakdɔglyɔꞋꞋ, gim wɔk a ꞋꞋhinha̧a̧l maakdɔglꞋꞋ yɔ gi a mi muul du gedu.
Yɛrɛ kay, mii doo ya̧a̧rhantya! Bɔ gi pidim a wɔrk muul yɛrɛ gedu?
Mi baan Bɛto a Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu nuŋg du! Gii gi pidimi! Hɔnɛ yɛrɛ mii be hi zul mi, mi gi woosig Bɛtmaakdɔglɔ woos hi kpoos mi, mɔkil doohɛbtya mi be gi ꞋꞋhinha̧a̧l maakdɔglꞋꞋ gbaaryɔ.
Yɛrɛ dɔgl-gbaak taa dood wɔ hi ɔks hi Yeesu Kristu matugo.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, ꞋꞋMɔkil za̧a̧tigya maakdɔglꞋꞋ bɔ gi wook hin a ɔksil wɛ bɔ hi Yeesu Kristu gedu tuus zul mi tuus a ꞋꞋhinha̧a̧l hi wɔrk maakdɔglꞋꞋ du.

Bɛt hi zulɔ woo hinyɔ Muusa maakdɔgl ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ wook gɛ anyɔ doo hɛbtdi taan tɛŋko. Bɛt yaaz waaɔ mɔɔt bɔ a waal du. Yɔ waaɔ zaa, muulɔ riitin an doo hinha̧a̧lya hɛbtdi, an gi ha̧s hinha̧a̧lɛ. Wɛɛ Bɛt mat hinha̧a̧l hi dɔgl-gbaakɔ bɔ a waaɔ bɔ Yeesu muul du yɔ wɔrɔ.
Bɛt woo hin bɔ lab an wɛ dag gbɔnɔ wɛ woowoos rɔbɛ wɔ maakdɔglɔ bɔ ɛrɔ, wɛɛ yɔ wɛ ɛmbik an Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gig ha̧a̧ko, taa anyɔ doo hɛbtdi ha̧a̧ge.
Wɔ hi gi waak an doo hɛbtdi, hi mɔkig hinyɔ doo hɛbtdi gig ha̧a̧ko, wɛɛ wɔ hi waak anyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ ha̧a̧ge, hi mɔkig hinyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gig ha̧a̧k giya.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi mɔkig hinyɔ doo hɛbtdi gig ha̧a̧ko, gi wɔrɔ. Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi mɔkig hinyɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gig ha̧a̧ko, dag za̧a̧tigi hi boolumi.
Wɔ hi mɔkig hinyɔ doo hɛbtdi ha̧a̧ge, hi gi Bɛt lɔlɔhɛ̧ɛ̧nikyaadɛ, taa an hi fɔk hinyɔ Bɛt maakdɔglɔ raa, wɛɛ taa an hi ɗɛɛ fɔk be.
Yɔ anbɔ dood wɔ hi waak an doo hɛbtdi gi waako hí dɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi bɛs Bɛt gɛ.
Yɛrɛ nɛya, nɛ taa waak an doo hɛbtdi gi waako, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi gi waak a nɛ kpoos du hi rɔbo, nɛ waak an hinyɔ ha̧a̧g giya. Za̧a̧nɔ gi taan Yeesu Kristu Mɔkilɔ gi kpoos du gɛ, taa Yeesu doo ɔnɛ.
Kristu gi gi nɛ kpoos du, muul nɛ wɛɛ wɔrko a hinha̧a̧l dɔŋgo, wɛɛ mɔkil nɛ gi za̧a̧tili be a hinrɔbwook dɔŋgo.
Wɛɛ gid Za̧a̧nyɔ rɛms Yeesu a wɔrkɛ teesdu Mɔkilɔ gi waak a nɛ kpoos du, Za̧a̧nyɔ rɛms Yeesu Kristu a wɔrkɛ teesdu gi wɛɛ gi gaa muul nɛ wɔrkil bɔ za̧a̧tigi hi Mɔkil yɔ gi waak a nɛ kpoos du tɛŋkɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, hinza ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi fɛ̧ɛ̧wɛ wɛ fɔ̀b hinyɔ doo hɛbtdi ha̧a̧g gɛ.
Gid nɛ waak an hinyɔ doo hɛbtdi ha̧a̧ge, nɛ wɔrɔ. Wɛɛ gid nɛ gbɔŋk muul ɗɔkum wɔ hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ, nɛ́ za̧a̧.
Dood wɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gihi kaŋk a gbɔnɔ rɔb du hi gi Bɛt waat sɛw.
Wɛɛ nɛ́ dāg gbaar mɔkil an nɛ wɛɛ nɛ waa a hoob du gɛ. Nɛ dag Bɛt Mɔkilɔ yɔ gisɛ gok an wɛ el Bɛt a Aba, raakɔ a Baaba!
Hɔɔ, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ ta̧a̧ mɔkil wɛ hi zulɔ: a wɛ gi Bɛt waato.
Nɛ gid wɛ gi Bɛt waato, wɛ gi Bɛt rɔɔsɔ dakya ma, wɛ gi dakya ɔksi hi Yeesu Kristu; wɛɛ gid wɛ ya̧a̧ryɔ̧k hi giya, wɛ waa hi gii a gi gbɔlums du hɛw.
Mi mɔk ya̧a̧rhant wɔ wɛ gi yɔ̧ko a ɔ̧tigi zulɛ rı̄ı̄ an hi gogsin gbɔlums yɔ gɔ gi zaa gi wɛɛ gi mitsɛ gɛ.
Hinwɔ Bɛt kim sɛw hi kɔm hi ook Bɛt wāātɔ wɔ midigya̧ hi gbɔlumsɛ hi ha̧a̧tig gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ waal gi a hintɔs tɛŋkɔ wɛɛdisɛ. Taa an ha̧a̧ gii hi zulɔ, Bɛt gii gbaage a hinɔ gedu.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gaa mɔkil-gbaaki: ɔ̧tza hinyɔ Bɛt kimɔ gi pidɔ, hi tuus zulɔ a tɛŋk ha̧tirgoya bɔ gig wa̧a̧k gbaarums du gedu, yɔ gɔ gi wɛɛ gi dag Bɛt wāātɔ wɔ zulya̧ tuusig gbɔlums bɔ ɔ̧nɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ wɛ mɛɛ a yɛɛl amntɔnɔ tuur ɓɔryɔ, waal du sɛw gi hekugo, gi kosgumn kɛŋko an nis gi kɛŋk waagulik kosgumnɛ.
Waal du gii kpɔd gɛ, wɛɛ hɛw, wɛɛ yɔ wɛ gin Bɛt Mɔkilɔ wɛ yɛɛl wɛ dag a Bɛt gaasɔ bɔ gedu; wɛɛ hɛw wɛ gi hekig wɛ kpoos du, wɛ gi oonik an Bɛt gi pidɛ gi za̧a̧s muul wɛ, gi wɛɛnɛ waatɔ ɛns hi rɔbo.
Yɔ wɛ gbaak mɔkil wɛ a wɛ́ za̧a̧ ro wɛ́ za̧a̧. An wɛ gbaak mɔkil wɛ a hinyɔ gɔ wɛ gbɛn geha, hinɔ taa mɔkilgbaak ma; hinyɔ wɛ gbɛnko, gi an wɛ wɛɛ wɛ wāal ɓɛ ya?
Yɛrɛ gid wɛ gbaak mɔkil wɛ a hinyɔ wɛ gbɛn gɛ hage, yɔ anbɔ, wɛ oog hi hinmɔŋki.

Gbunɔ yɔ wɛ gi dood hɔntil gii Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi gisɛ zaak ɗaako a wɛ hɔntil bɔ gedu; yɔ wɛ mɛ̄ɛ̄ Bɛt zɔ̧k anyɔ rii gɛ ya̧a̧nɛ. Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt Mɔkil hi zulɔ gisɛ Bɛt zɔ̧ko hi hekil yɔ hi ɗɛɛ an gɔ hi dɔg gɛ.
Bɛt yɔ gi seek a kpoos wɛɛdisɛ, mɛɛ hinyɔ Mɔkilɔ ha̧a̧g ɛrko. Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gi zɔ̧bsig dood wɔ hi gi Bɛt ɔnɛ anyɔ Bɛt gig ha̧a̧ko.
Wɛ mɛɛ ɔ̧nɛ a Bɛt gi woonik hin sɛw anyɔ gi woosig dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi a ge hinrɔbo, dood wɔ elihi an hinyɔ da mɔkɔ an gi woo.
Ya̧a̧nɛ da yɛɛl sɛ̧ɛ̧hi, da gbaahi nɛ dordi an hi fɔ waawal muutɔ hi wɛɛ an giya, an kuudu waawal gi wɛɛ hinda gbɔɔl a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ kitɛ tees du.
Wɛɛ dood wɔ Bɛt gbaahi nɛ biitir anbɔ be, wɛɛ el hii hɛw. Wɛɛ dood wɔ elihi be, ta̧a̧hi an dood riitɛ a gi muutdu, gaahi gbɔlumsɔ bɔ ya̧nɛ.
Gi an wɛ dɔg nɔ ma a hin wɔrɔ hi gbaŋgi? Bɛt gisɛ ɗaako, bɔ gi ɓaas zulɔ a wɛ gbaŋg nɔ?
Bɛt ā̧a̧n waaɔ mɔɔt bɔ gɛ, gaaz an gi wɔr a wɛ kal sɛw. Ri gi taa nɛ an gi gaawɛ hin sɛw hi gii gɛ?
Bɔ gi gɛ̧ɛ̧n dood wɔ Bɛt sɛ̧ɛ̧hi dɔglɛ? Bɛt gii ta̧a̧hi an dood rɔbɛ!
Bɔ gi matinihi dɔglɛ? Yeesu Kristu wɔrɔ. Wɔr kpɔd gɛ, wɛɛ rɛml dɔɔ a bɛtha da ɗɔɔt a Bɛt naanrɔbo, wɛɛ gisɛ Bɛt zɔ̧ko!
Bɔ gi gɛ̧ɛ̧nɛ Kristu ha̧a̧tigɔ? Gi gi ya̧a̧rhant ya, zɛksili ya, ya̧a̧kɛtili ya, tɔs ya, ya̧a̧rums ya, hoobha̧nt lɛl ya, wɔrk ya ri?
Hɔɔ, Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa:
a Waar i, hi giwi gbɔŋk ɔ̧t bed a mɔ dɔŋgo. Hi giwi seek an tam wɔ gɔ hi ka̧hi a gbɛɛriklɛlɛ.
Yɛrɛ a hin wɔrɔ lab duge sɛw, wɛ ɗɛɛ hin wɔrɔ wɛ daarihilɛl da̧a̧da̧, hi za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g hi wɛɛ tɛŋkɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, mi mɛɛ rɔbtɔnɔ: a wɔrko, zaabe za̧a̧tigi, zaabe Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ , zaabe tɛŋk gbɔlɛ zaadɛ, zaabe hinwɔ hi gi ɓɔryɔ, zaabe hinyɔ gi zaako,
zaabe tɛŋk zaadɛ, zaabe hɔɔtigi, zaabe duki, zaabe hinza wɔ Bɛt ki̧hi sɛw, hí ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi gɛ̧ɛ̧wɛ hi Bɛt ha̧a̧tigɔ yɔ fu̧u̧ a Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu ge gɛ.
Mi dɔk rɔbo. Mi gi Kristu doo ɔ̧nɛ. Kpoos mi gisim raak hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ: mi taa ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧ko.
Kpoos mi luutɔ, gi waak ɗɔki.
Ya̧a̧nɛ gi ha̧a̧mi an mi wɛɛ bootya a Bɛt muutdu, mi hɛɛtin hi Kristu a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɔ hi gi dɔ̧ɔ̧t mi rɔb kalɛ.
Hi gi Israhilaya waato, Bɛt wɛɛn hii an waatɔ ɛnsɛ, gaahi gbɔ-lumsɔ, ya̧a̧wɔkɔ wɔ, maakdɔglɛ, maakyɔ gɔ hi ɗɔbsinge, hi hinyɔ raa a gi woosihi.
Hii gi yaasɛ̀ɛ wāātɔ. Kristu yɔ wɛɛ doo, fu̧u̧ a hi dɔ̧ɔ̧t du; gi gbɔɔl a hin sɛw zulha, anyɔ gi Bɛt yɔ wɛ baan faa. Aanbɔ!
Hā̧ā̧mi an mi
Wɛɛ dood wɔ hi fu̧u̧ a Abraham dɔ̧ɔ̧t du hi taa Abraham wāātɔ sɛw; Bɛt raa Abraham:
a dɔ̧ɔ̧t gɔ gi tuu a Isaaku ge ro gi wɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧t mɔnɛ.
Raakɔ a wɔ hi mɔɔhi an doo hɛbtdi hi taa wɛɛk Bɛt wāāto; wāāt wɔ hi mɔɔhi an hinyɔ Bɛt da raa a be woos Abraham hi seek hii an Abraham dɔ̧ɔ̧to.
Yɛrɛ hinyɔ Bɛt raa gɛrɛ:
a yoolɛ bé wɛɛzig lɛl anyɔ, Saratu gi dag waawalɔ.
Hinɔ taa anbɔ kpɔd. Rebeka waatɔ wɔ eerɛ hi gin baaya̧ gbunu: gɛ baa wɛ Isaaku;
anyɔ waat wɔ gɔ hi da hi mɔɔy kete, an hi woo hinrɔbo, zaabe ha̧a̧lɛ, hi wōōdir gɛ, Bɛt raa Rebeka:
a waa fu̧u̧s bɔ giigi woos waa wans bɔ woosɛ. Hinyɔ Bɛt see gi her an gi woo an hinɔ gi waa, hinɔ mid hi eltyɔ, mı̄d hi woos gɛ; hinɔ mid hi za̧a̧nyɔ gi elikhin hi ha̧a̧tig ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ,
anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa
a ha̧a̧b a Yakuba muulɛ, wɛɛ hā̧ab Esawu dɔglɔ gɛ.
Gi an wɛ raa a nɔ? A Bɛt gi wook hinyɔ rı̄ı̄ gɛ gii ya ri? Taa nɛ anbɔ zaŋ!
Yɔ anbɔ, wɛɛ raa Muusa:
a bé mɛɛya̧a̧r a za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧b an be mɛɛsigya̧a̧r ge; be gɔ rɔb a za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧b an be gɔsig rɔb ge.
Yɔ anbɔ hinɔ ōō a doo yɔ gig ha̧a̧k ge gɛ, ōō a doo yɔ gi nɔɔk ge gɛ, gi a Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g ya̧a̧rmɛɛk ge ro.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol gi raa Waar bɔ Firawna:
a hinyɔ be gim ɗunsugo, be gim ɗunsig an be zuun tɛŋk be a mɔ muulɛ an nuŋg be gi ɗuk gi yɔ̧ɔ̧s waal sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt gi ya̧a̧rmɛɛk a za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g an gi mɛɛsigya̧a̧r ge sɛw; wɛɛ gi zulɓaasig a za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g an gi ɓatsig ge sɛw.
Mɔ warimi: a nɛ à hinɔ gi anbɔ labɔ, Bɛt gib biglik nɔ a be gɔ hin-a̧a̧bi ma ɓɛ nɔ? Ya̧a̧nɛ, Bɛt gi ha̧a̧g hinza, bɔ gi ɗɛɛ an gi ɓaas zulɔ a gi gbaŋgi?
Mɔɔ, doo tɔs, mɔ gi bɔ an mɔ faltinhin hi Bɛto? Gi an dɔnwɔŋk gi raa namnɛɛ bɔ wɔŋge: a nɔ mɔ wɔ̧b anbɔ ya?
Namnɛɛ bɔ taan tɛŋk an gi woo hinyɔ ha̧a̧g sɛw hi wɔŋk hi̧i̧t bɔ kim gbunu an gi loo gi wɔm dɔn eer ya? Zaa gbun yɔ gi dɔn rɔbo, zaabɔ be, yɔ gi dɔn ha̧a̧lɛ. Nɛ dɔgl ɔɔn ma mi?
