Dood wɔ hi gbɛn nɛ lɛlgaal yɔ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge, wɔ hi dag bɛtha gaasɔ, wɔ hi dag Bɛt Mɔkilɔ ya̧nɛ,
wɔ hi dag Bɛtdɔglɔ rɔb bɔ hɛmntigɔ hi tɛŋk wɔ bɛtha gɔ hi zaa,

gid dood wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ kuudu hi ɔɔ Bɛto hi bis dɔglɔ hi wɛɛ hi matig a hi waabil ha̧a̧l du, ri hi wɛɛz hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ ɓɛ? Dood wɔrɔ lab hi do̍o̍ Bɛt waa bɔ gii dɔɔ eesim a dɔ̧ɔ̧rha hi zulya̧ hi gbaag niit ha a dood lɔlgbar sɛw.
Bɛt gi rɔbsig hɛbt yɔ gɔ gi waak bɛl naŋsig lɛlɔge, yɛm tuur disɛ, gi pisig lees wɔ an gi ɗaas dood wɔ hi balko.
Nɛ an hɛbt bɔ gi pisig kobsɛ hi hɛt ha̧a̧l wɔ, taa an gi ɗaa hinza. Taa aŋko, Bɛt gi booge, kuudu hi wɛɛ hi gbaasig laa an kobs bɔ hi hɛt ha̧a̧l wɔ hi dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Nɛ yɛrɛ anyɔ wɛ book nɛ anbɔ gii si̧, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, wi gi ooko, wi mɛɛ a hinyɔ gi nɛnɛ, gɛ hin rɔbɛ wɔ gɔ hi ka̧nɛ a za̧a̧tig du.
Bɛt taa hindɔɔmwookya an gi zɛn woos nɛ hi ha̧a̧tig yɔ nɛ zuun hi nuŋgɔ, nɛ woos doodɔ woosɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gisihi wooko.
Ha̧a̧w an nɛ gbunu gbunu nɛ zuun tɛŋk gbun bɔ gii a nɛ woos du nɛ gbaa kpoos nɛ gi tuur a hinyɔ nɛ mɔkig geha.
Bɔnɛ nambrɔ, fɔn dood wɔ hi ɗɔbsig Bɛt hi hinmɔŋki gid hi dak hinyɔ Bɛt raa nɛ a bé gaawɛ.
Yɔ Bɛt raa a bé gɔs Abraham hinza, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi dɛŋglhin a doo za gbɔɔl yɔ daarig gi nuŋg du gɛ, dɛŋgl hi nuŋg ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ,
a hɔɔ, bé rɔbsumɔ, bé wɛɛ bé tɔŋks dɔ̧ɔ̧t mɔ.
Àbraham fɔb anbɔ hi hinmɔŋki gi dag hinyɔ Bɛt raa a bé woosige.
Ya̧a̧nɛ dood hi dɛŋglikhin hi za̧a̧nyɔ daarihi nuŋgɔ. Hindɛŋglik gi raak rɔb gaatyɔ, gi kaarik hinwatingoya yɔ gi sɔmsɔm hi teesdu sɛw.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt yɔ ha̧a̧g an gi zuns dood wɔ gɔ hi dag hinyɔ raa a gi woosihi gaattɔnɔ gi daarɔ, gi wɛɛ gi zunsihi a mɔkilɔ taa zɛmrik zaŋ, gaa hinɔ tɛŋk hi hindɛŋglikyɔ.
Hin eerɛ hi gi faa, raakɔ a ya̧a̧wɔki hi hindɛŋgliki, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi gɔ̧ɔ̧ya̧a̧ gedu gɛ. Yɔ anbɔ wɛ zɛm yaatillɛl a gedu, wɛ zɛm tɛŋkdaklɛl a gedu an wɛ gbaa mɔkil wɛ a hinyɔ Bɛt gbaasɛ gedu.
Mɔkilgbaak bɔrɔ gisɛ wɛnɛ kol wɛ doonis bɔ an tus yɔ gɔ hi doon lɛmb a zɛɛdu ɓaattɔnɔ bɛttɔnɔ giya; doonis bɔ tal tuur a Bɛtluk bɔ bɛtha gbandilɔ bɔ kuuɔ ge a lɛlgaat bɔ gedu,
a lɛlyɔ Yeesu gul ge a wɛ zulɛ an gbɔnɔdorkya. Ya̧a̧nɛ, anyɔ fu̧u̧ a Mɛlsisedɛk dɔ̧ɔ̧t du, Bɛt wɛɛnig maakɔ-wookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt faa.
Mɛlsisedɛk bɔ za̧a̧nɔ gi nɛ Waar i a Salim waal gbɔɔl du, gi Bɛt a wɛɛha maakɔwookya rek a Abraham ge yɔ wɛɛz a waar ɛ wɔ gbɔŋkya̧ bɔ gedu, rɔbsige,
Abraham ɓesig hinyɔ dag nɛ sɛw du kooblɛ an gaasɛ. Nuŋg bɔ a Mɛlsisedɛk hinɔ raakɔ a Rɔbgɔk Waar yɔ. Wɛɛ gi Salim Waar i, raakɔ a Boolum Waar yɔ.
Taan baa, taan nàa, taan yaasɛɛ. Hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ mɔɔkɔ dɔgl gɛ, hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ wɔrkɔ dɔgl gɛ. Mɛlsisedɛk gi waak Bɛtmaak-wookya faa, riitin an Bɛt waa.
Nɛ gbɛn Mɛlsisedɛk gbɔ-lumsɔ daar nɛ lɛl zaŋ yaa wɛ Abraham gi gaag gaas gbɔɔl yɔ wɔɔz a gabs du du kooblɛ.
Dood wɔ hi fu̧u̧ a Lewi dɔ̧ɔ̧t du, hi gaahi Bɛtmaakwookya woosɛ, maakdɔgl raa an hi loo dim gaas a dood wɔ hi du kooblɛ, raakɔ a hi loo a nahiza Ibraniŋkoya wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Abraham dɔ̧ɔ̧t du hi.
Wɛɛ Mɛlsisedɛk dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ fu̧u̧ a Lewi dɔ̧ɔ̧t du gɛ, loo Abraham gaasɔ gbun a koobl du, rɔbs za̧a̧nyɔ Bɛt raag nɛ a bé woosig hinza.
Hi rɔbo, hinza faak taaɗu: za̧a̧nyɔ gi rɔbsugo gbɔ-lumsɔ daar za̧a̧nyɔ hi rɔbsig daarɔ.

Yɛrɛ hɛdi a Lewi dɔ̧ɔ̧t du, wɔ hi look gaas yɔ dood gɔ hi gaa, hii gi dood wɔ hi wɔrko; hɔnɛ a Mɛlsisedɛk dɔ̧ɔ̧t du be, za̧a̧nyɔ gi look gaas yɔ dood gɔ hi gaa, gɛ doo za̧a̧tili. Hinyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol raa giibɔ.

Lewi gi nɛ a yaaɔsɛɛ Abraham buudu kete a ɔ̧tyɔ Abraham dagtin hi Mɛlsisedɛk gedu. Hɔnɛyɔ Abraham gaa Mɛlsisedɛk gaas anbɔ, wɛ ɗɛɛ an wɛ raa dɔglɔ a Lewi za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi zek hinyɔ dood hi gaako gii gaa Mɛlsisedɛk gaas hɛw a Abraham naan du.

Bɛt gaa Israhilaya wɔ maakdɔglɛ, es a Lewiya wɔ Bɛtmaakwoosya̧ wɔ hage. À woosya̧ bɔ ɗɛɛ nɛ an gi wɛɛn dood rɔbwookyaadɛ gi da̧a̧, yɔ taa nɛ an Bɛt gi her maakɔ-wookya za dɔɔm yɔ fu̧u̧ a Mɛlsisedɛk dɔ̧ɔ̧t du. Yɔ lòò nɛ doo za yɔ fu̧u̧ a Haruna dɔ̧ɔ̧t du giya. Yɛrɛ ɔnɛ, Bɛt her za̧a̧nɔ a Mɛlsisedɛk dɔ̧ɔ̧t du.
Bɛtmaakwookya gi bɛɛ zɛmruko, maakdɔglɔ gi zɛmr gɔ be.
Yɔ anbɔ Mɛlsisedɛk za̧a̧nyɔ hi dɔg hin wɔrɔ gi zulha, gi dɔ̧ɔ̧t zaayɔ. A dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔrɔ hi teesdu, doo za wōō nɛ woos a Bɛtmaaksɛŋk bɔ hage zaŋ gɛ;
ya̧a̧nɛ hi mɛɛ sɛw a Waar Yeesu fu̧u̧ a Yahuda dɔ̧ɔ̧t du, yɛrɛ Muusa dɔ̄g hinza a gi an Bɛtmaakwookya za gi fu̧u̧ a dɔ̧ɔ̧t bɔrɔ gedu gɛ.
Hin bɔ lab dɔglɔ wɛɛ gaaga anyɔ Bɛtmaakwookya za dɔɔm mid gi riitin hi Mɛlsisedɛk.
Hí gbāag Bɛtmaak-wookya a dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ dɔŋg an hinyɔ hi wɔya̧a̧ hage gɛ, gii wɛɛ Bɛtmaakwookya hi za̧a̧tigɔ yɔ gɔ da̧a̧ gɛ tɛŋkɔ.
Bɛt ɗɛɛr-wolɔ dɔg dɔgl segya
a gi zulha be a mɔ gi Bɛtmaakwookya faa yɔ fu̧u̧ a Mɛlsisedɛk dɔ̧ɔ̧t du.
Yɔ anbɔ hi bis dɔgl amnt bɔ anyɔ da taan tɛŋko, wɛɛ gi hintɔsyɔ.
Muusa maakdɔglɔ bɔ dā̧ā̧s hinza gɛ - yɛrɛ wɛ dag mɔkilgbaak rɔb yɔ tɔɔ gi daarlɛlɛ, wɛ dagn gii gbɔnɔ sɔɔk a Bɛt dɔŋdi.
A gedu be, Bɛt hindɛŋglikɔ giiro. Ya̧a̧nɛ anyɔ Lewiya wɔ hi wɛɛ Bɛtmaakwookya amntɔnɔ hindɛŋglik gi taa du gɛ,
Yeesu wɛɛ Bɛtmaakwookya hi hindɛŋglikyɔ, a Bɛt raag hi hindɛŋglikɔ bɔ:
a Waar Bɛt dɛŋglɔ, taa an gi wɛɛ gi zɛmr mɔkilɔ: mɔ gi Bɛtmaakwookya faa.
wɛ mɛɛ gɔ rɔbtɔnɔ a Yeesu kamz ya̧a̧wɔk yɔ daar zaa amnt bɔ.
Yɔ daarɔ, Bɛtmaakwookya hi da hi gi kittɔnɔ yɔ wɔrk taahi nɛ ɔɔk aŋko.
Gii ɔ̧nɛ yɔ gi waak faa, gin Bɛtmaak wooswook yɔ taa an gi gaa doo za be.
Hinɔ anbɔ ro gi ɗɛɛ an gi za̧a̧s dood wɔ hi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik hi gii ɓɔryɔ hi faa a Bɛt dɔŋdi gaattɔnɔ anyɔ gi za̧a̧til faa an gi zɔ̧bsihi Bɛto.
Rii nɛ an wɛ dag Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt an giya, gi gi doo gaat a Bɛt muut du yɔ taan hinha̧a̧lɛ. Doo yɔ taan hin-a̧a̧b nɛ zaŋ, yɔ hɛɛtin hi hinha̧a̧lyaadɛ, yɔ hi dɔɔnig a Bɛt dɔŋgdi,

rı̄ı̄tin an Bɛtmaakwookya zaadɛ gɛ; hā̧a̧g namb gbɛɛrik ɔ̧t nuŋgo an gi gɔs Bɛt maak an Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ amntɛ wɔrɔ gɔ hi wook gɛ - an gi yɛls zul ɔ̧nɛ wooko, kuudu gi woos dood ya̧nɛ gɛ. Gaa zulɔ an Bɛt gaas dɔɔ gbunu gaatɔ giya.
Muusa maakdɔglɔ gbaa dood hɔntil wɔ an Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔlɛ; yɛrɛ hindɛŋglik dɔgl bɔ zaa kuudu a Bɛtmaakdɔgl bɔ gi kalɛ, gbaa Bɛt waa bɔ an Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔlɛ an gi gáa a Bɛt muutdu faa.
Dɔgl bɔ zulɔ wɛ dɔko: gɛ a wɛ gin Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt yɔ gaa a Bɛt muutdu faa, ɗɔɔt a bɛtha gbɔɔlɔyɔ gi a Bɛt tɛŋkya waar ums ɗɔɔtillɛlɛ a naanrɔbo,
an Bɛtmaakwookya a lɛl gaat bɔ ge hi luk gbandilya̧ rɔb bɔ yɔ Waar Bɛt gɔ hi zulɔ gedu, doo naan gɔ gɛ.
Hi gbaa Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt yɔ gi sɛw an gi gaa Bɛt gaasɛ hi namb gbɛɛriki an gi woon Bɛtmaako. A gedu, gi an Bɛtmaakwookya yɛrɛ Yeesu gi dag hinza an gi woos Bɛt be.
An ginɛ doo hɛbtdi, taa an gi wɛɛ nɛ Bɛtmaak-wookya hɛw, anyɔ Bɛtmaakwookya zaadɛ hi giro hi gi Bɛt gaas gaanik hi Muusa maakdɔglɛ.
Bɛtluk bɔ doodya̧ hi wookwoos gedu gi lɛlgaat bɔ bɛtha fɔtɔ ɔ̧ɔ̧ hi zeksɔ anyɔ Bɛt raas Muusa yɔ yɛɛl luk gbandilya bɔ gɔko: Bɛt raage:
a dagum mɔkil mɔ rɔbtɔnɔ an mɔ woo lukgbandilya bɔ hinɔ wɔ sɛw anyɔ be da be zunsum a ga̧a̧tha.

Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ Yeesu dag woos gbɔɔl yɔ daar Bɛt-maakwookya woos amnt bɔ lɛl gbɔɔltɔnɔ. Yɔ anbɔ be, ya̧a̧wɔk yɔ wɔb Bɛt teesdu hi doodɛ daarin amnt bɔ rɔbs daarinu, anyɔ hin rɔbɛ wɔ Bɛt raa a bé gaawɛ hi bɛr hi daar hin wɔ raa nɛ a ya̧a̧wɔk amnt bɔ gedu.
Yɔ anbɔ à ya̧a̧-ɔksig doos bɔ taan nɛ hin-a̧a̧bi, yɔ taa nɛ an hi loo zaa eesumɛ hi yɛn lɛlɔge.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Waar Bɛt gi za̧br Israhilaya wɔ gi raa:
a bee Waar Bɛto be raa: a yɛrɛ ɔ̧t wɔ hi zaako, be wɛɛ be wɔya̧a̧ sego hi Israhila doodɔ hi Yahuda doodɔ.
Ya̧a̧wɔkɔ taa anyɔ be gɔ nɛ hi baaya̧ hii a ɔ̧tyɔ be wa̧a̧zihi naan du an be tudzihi a Misra hɛbt du, hi fɔ̄b ya̧a̧wɔk be bɔ gɛ, ya̧a̧nɛ Waar Bɛt gi raa: a bee hɛw be ɔɔhi gɔ be.

Waar Bɛt wɛɛ raa: a yɛrɛ ya̧a̧wɔk zaa yɔ gɔ be wɛɛ be wɔb hi Israhila doodɔ a ɔ̧t wɔrɔ hi kuudu gɛrɛ: be gudsihi maakdɔgl be a hi mɔkil du be bi̧i̧hi a hi kpoos du, be wɛɛsihi Bɛtya̧, hii be hi wɛɛsib dood benɛ.
Taa an doo za gi ha̧a̧g an gi goks naaza yɔ hi waak el a hɛbt bɔ gedu hinɛ, zaabe dooɔ za hinɛ: a mɛɛm Waar Bɛto! Yɔ anbɔ dood sɛw hi mɛ̍ɛ̍be, gi yɛɛl a ya̧a̧mwaato gi tuur a dood gbɔlɛ.
Bé mɛɛsihi ya̧a̧rɛ be bitsihi woos ha̧a̧lya̧ wɔ dɔglɔ, be wɛɛ be taa hinha̧a̧lya̧ zaa mɔkugo.
Anyɔ Waar Bɛt boo ya̧a̧wɔk za seg bɔ dɔglɔ, wɛɛ wɛɛn ya̧a̧wɔk biitir bɔ hin amnti ma. Yɔ anbɔ hinyɔ a̧mɔ, hi hinyɔ wɔmɔ, hi sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ an hi wagɔ.
Ya̧a̧wɔk amnt bɔ da ginnɛ Bɛtbaanikwoos dɔgl-gaak sɔmsɔm hi Bɛtluk yɔ gi waal du.
Lukgbandil yɔ rɛɛyyɔ gi lukgbandil doosyɔ. À buuɔ gedu, lɛlbɔ gɔ hi el a lɛlgaatyɔ, laa gbaaklɛl giro, kɔntil hɔɔt giro hi kok wɔ hi gbaas Bɛto.
Lɛl za bɔ gi nɛ a gbandil fɛɛt eesum bɔ kuuɔ ge, hi el gii a lɛlgaatɛ wɔ lɛlya̧ gaatyɔ.

Gin sɛŋk yɔ hi wɔm hi hɛɛlmɔt an gɔ hi gbaa kurum ki̧i̧lhɛmntya hage, hi akɔti gbɔɔl yɔ hi wɔya̧a̧ muulɔge hi sɔɔrin muulɔ sɛw hi hɛɛlmɔto. A akɔti gbɔɔl bɔ gedu hɛb yɔ hi wɔ̧mn hɛɛlmɔt hi yaa kok za nuŋgɔ a maani gedu, hi Haruna sɔɔlɔ gɛrsya bɔ kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ, hi bet hɛɛgil wɔ Bɛt bi̧i̧ hin geha hi wɔya̧a̧ muulɔge.

Hi wɔm hin zaadɛ eerɛ hi riitin an Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ , hi er an hi zuun Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ a akɔti gbɔɔl bɔ hi wɔmn hɛɛlmɔt hage, hi yaat hinha̧a̧l bisig lɛl bɔ hi zeksya̧. Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ wí ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ wɔd wɔrɔ dɔglya̧ gok sɛw gɛ.
Hi gɛms hin wɔrɔ sɛw anbɔ, Bɛtmaakwookya wɔ hi woosig Bɛt maakɔ hi gulik duhɔ lurkbed a lukgbandil buu doos bɔ gedu.
Wɛɛ a buu eesim bɔ gedu, Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt bɔ gii gɔ gul gedu dɔɔ gbun kpɔd a wɛl nuŋgo. Gul hinɔ duhɔ gi ɔɔ namga̧a̧m kaŋk an gi wa̍a̍tɔ gi gaasin zulɔ hi dood hin-a̧a̧b ya̧nɛ gɛ.
Bɛt Mɔkilɔ zuun nɛ hin anbɔ a lɛlgaat rɔb bɔ gbɔnɔɔ kpɛ̧ɛ̧r nɛ ket gɛ anyɔ lukgbandilya doos bɔ ginɛ kete.

Lukgbandilya doos bɔ gisɛ ya̧a̧daanikyɔ gi zuunik a ɔ̧t yɛrɛ gi zulɛ. A ɔ̧tigi zulɛ hi gaak Bɛt gaasɛ, hi wɛɛ hi gbɛɛrik nambo, hi gɔnsig Bɛt maakɔ a gedu a hinha̧a̧l dɔŋgo, wɛɛ hin wɔrɔ sɛw hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi gaas doo yɔ gi baanik Bɛto kpoosɔ gi er gɛ.
Hi seek lees wɔ hi hinyɔ̧k wɔ hi maakwɔd doktig wɔ gɔ hi gɔk naabɔ sɔmsɔm. Hin wɔrɔ sɛw gi muulgaasig dɔgl wɔ hii kpɔd gi tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi gɛms hin sɛw gedu.
Yɛrɛ yɔ Kristu zaa an Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt a hinrɔbɛ wɔ gɔ hi záásɛ geha, tal a lukgbandilya gbɔɔl rɔb yɔ daarlɛl gedu. Hi gɔ̄n lukgbandil bɔrɔ hi doo naan gɛ, raakɔ a fu̧u̧ a waal yɛrɛ gedu gɛ.

Kristu gul gedu dɔɔ gbun gaatɔ gii a lɛlgaat mɔɔt bɔ gedu, tāl hi is kpaar ga̧a̧mɛ hi nawaat gbɛɛrik ga̧a̧m a gedu gɛ, yɛrɛ tan hi ga̧a̧m ɔ̧nɛ bɔ gii zaŋ gi tuusin zul wɛ a hinha̧a̧l du a aakil du faa.
Ya̧a̧nɛ gɔ hi loo nawalɛ wɔ hi isɛ kpaar wɔ ga̧a̧mya̧ hi naakimlɛ hi gbɛɛrige hi dɔ̧ɔ̧sig a laadu tamɔ hi waas dood wɔ hi ɓi̧i̧l a muulɛ an gi gaasihi, muulya̧ gi kɔm gaattɔnɔ.
Nɛ Kristu yɔ gaa zulɔ hi Mɔkil faa a Bɛt muutdu gaattɔnɔ, ga̧a̧mɔ bɔ gi tɛŋkya gbɔɔltɔnɔ daarlɛlɛ, gi gaas mɔkil nɛ wɔ hi gi a woos wɔrkil du an nɛ woos Bɛt za̧a̧til bɔ woosɛ.

Hinɔ giya gi a ya̧a̧wɔk seg bɔ teesɔ gedu hi Bɛto, an dood wɔ Bɛt elihi hi dag rɔɔs faa bɔ hi wɔb ya̧a̧ hage, yɔ Bɛt raa nɛ a bé gaahi. Hi ɗɛɛ an hi dagige anyɔ wɔrk za giro. Kristu gii wɔr ga̧a̧mɔ bɔ gi za̧a̧s dood a hi hinha̧a̧l du, anyɔ hi da hi fɔk nɛ ya̧a̧wɔk amnt bɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ lɛlyɔ ya̧a̧ rɔb ɗɛɛrwol dɔgl gige, gi an dood wɔ hi mɔkig fɔkɔ hi zuun a za̧a̧nyɔ gbaa hin bɔrɔ, wɔɔrɔ.
Yɛrɛ à za̧a̧n bɔ bi̧i̧ ɗɛɛrwol bɔ wɔr nɛ ket gɛ, ɗɛɛrwol bɔ dɔglɔ yɔ ɗɔb gɛ. Ɗɛɛrwol bi̧i̧k bɔ dɔglɔ tɛŋkɔ gɔ giro, gɛ za̧a̧nyɔ bi̧i̧ge gɔ wɔrɔ.
Hinɔ gii hi gɔn ya̧a̧wɔk biitir bɔ hɛw hi namga̧a̧mɛ.
Bààrɔ, yɔ Muusa boos dood saal wɔ sɛw hinyɔ maakdɔgl raa sɛw, lòò naa kpaar ga̧a̧mɛ hi iskpaar ga̧a̧mɛ, hi mɛmɛ, hi tam sɛɛs hobo, hi kaldekpasɛ ɔksɔ, waat a ɗɛɛrwol bɔ hage, hi a dood muul sɛw
a yɛrɛ gi ya̧a̧wɔkyɔ Bɛt raa a nɛ fɔbɔ ga̧a̧mɔ bɔ giya.
Wa̍a̍t namga̧a̧m bɔ anbɔ a lukgbandilya bɔ hage hi a wɔdɔ wɔ gɔ hi woonik woosɔ hage.
Wag kaasi an hinyɔ gi sɛw gi gaa hi namga̧a̧mɛ a maakdɔgl du. Namga̧a̧m gubrig gi taa gɛ, hinha̧a̧l bisig taaro.
Bɛr nɛko an hi gaas hin wɔ hi gi bɛtha fɔtɔya̧ anbɔ; yɛrɛ hinwɔ hi gi bɛtha zaŋ gi an hi gaasihi hi hinyɔ ga̧a̧mɔ tɛŋk daar wɔrɔ bɛrkɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Kristu gi gul a lɛlgaat yɔ doo hi gɔn naan gedu gɛ, an hinyɔ hi goksin lɛlgaat mɔɔt bɔ fɔtɔ ɔ̧ɔ̧: yɛrɛ gul a bɛtha zaŋ an gi tursɛ a Bɛt muutdu.
Wɛɛ gul a bɛtha an gi gaa zulɔ dɔɔ kittɔnɔ anyɔ Bɛtmaakwookya gbɔɔl gɔgi gulik a lɛlgaat bɔ gedu wɛl nuŋgo gi kām ga̧a̧m za dɔɔm gɛ.

An ginɛ anbɔ, ginɛ an gi ha̧a̧nɛ ya̧a̧r dɔɔ kittɔnɔ yɔ waal yɛɛl nɛ gi ki̧yɔ. Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ mid dɔɔ gbun gaatɔ giya yɔ waal sɛ̧ɛ̧b da̧a̧ko an gi ha̧s hinha̧a̧l hi zulɔ yɔ gaa an namb yɔ gɔ hi gbɛɛrig hi gɔn maako.
Anyɔ gis nɛ ɗoo a gi wɔr dɔɔ gbunu kuudu dɔgl-gbaak gi zaa,
gbunɔ gii Kristu gi gaa zulɔ dɔɔ gbunu an gi ha̧s dood kittɔnɔ hinha̧a̧lya̧; gi midzig dɔɔ eesimɛ a dood wɔ hi gig nɛ ook an gi za̧a̧sihi hi. Midzigɔ bɔ gi taa a hinha̧a̧l dɔŋgo.

Yahuduya wɔ maakya̧ hi taan hinrɔbɛ wɔ gɔ hi zaa kuudu riitinsya̧ rɔbo, hi kɔm an fɔtɔyɔ. Yɔ anbɔ, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi gaas dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi sɛ̧ɛ̧bik hi Bɛto hi maaknamb ga̧a̧m wɔ hi waa hi gi gbɛɛrik wɛl nuŋg gɛ.
À taa anbɔ gɛ, yɔ hi ɔ̄ɔ̄ maaknamb wɔ gbɛɛ-rikɔ gɛ ya? Ya̧a̧nɛ dood wɔ hi woosig Bɛt hin wɔrɔ anbɔ, muulya̧ bɛɛ nɛ gaak dɔɔ gbunu, yɔ hi wɛɛ hi mɔ̄k nɛ hi kpoos du a hi gin hinha̧a̧l ma gɛ.
Yɛrɛ maaknamb wɔ hi gbɛɛtirgo hi wɛɛs dood hinmɛk-singoya an hi mɛksin hinha̧a̧lya̧ wɛl nuŋg sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ, nawal ga̧a̧mɛ hi iskpaar ga̧a̧mɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi ha̧s hinha̧a̧l nɛ gɛ zaŋ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ yɔ Kristu gi guzig a waal du, raa Bɛto:
a hā̧ā̧mɔ maaknamb wɔ gɔ hi gbɛrsum gɛ, ha̧a̧mɔ gaas gɛ, wɛɛ mɔ kimsib muulɛ.
Namnɔɔmik wɔ hi namb-gbɛɛrik wɔ hi gɔs hinha̧a̧lya̧ hi hāsum kpoos gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ be wɛɛ be raa: a yɛrɛ be zaaza ma, Baaba Bɛto. (Ɗɛɛrwol bɔ a ɗɛɛrwolka̧a̧k du hinɔ gi dɔgl beenɛ. ) Bé woo hinyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ.
Yɔ rāā kete
a mɔ ta̧a̧ namb-gbɛɛrik gɛ, mɔ ta̧a̧ gaas gɛ, zaabe namnɔɔmik gɛ, zaabe gaas yɔ gɔ an hinha̧a̧l gi ha̧sin gɛ, wɛɛ hinwɔ lab hi harum gɛ, hi gaak maakhin wɔrɔ anyɔ maakdɔgl raa.
Yeesu wɛɛ
a yɛrɛ be zaaza ma an be woo hinyɔ ha̧a̧mɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt ha̧s maakwoos amntɛ wɔ sɛw an gi yɛn Kristu zul ɔnɛ bɔ gaa an hinha̧a̧l gi bisɔ.
Hi Bɛt ha̧a̧tigɔ yɔ Yeesu Kristu woo gi gaa muulɔ gii wɛ gaa a Bɛt muutdu dɔɔ gbun gaati.
Bɛtmaakwookya yɔ gi sɛw gi wookwoos ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw, gɔ gi gbɛɛrik naa wɔ hi maak gbuna bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi ha̧s hinha̧a̧l nɛ gɛ zaŋ giya.
Gii Kristu yɔ gaa gaas gbun gaati a hinha̧a̧l dɔŋgo, ɗundɔ dɔɔ bɛtha, ɗɔɔt gaati a Bɛt naanrɔbo,
gi ook ma an lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikɔya wɔ hi wɛɛ ma dɔɔɗa̧a̧k lɛlɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, hí gáás gbun kpɔd ro gi wɛɛn dood wɔ gaasihi a hinha̧a̧l du dood rɔbɛ mɔɔtɛ faa.
Hinɔ Bɛt Mɔkilɔ boosɛ dɔglɔ giibɔ hɛw. Ya̧a̧nɛ Waar Bɛt gi raa:
a kuudu, ɔ̧t wɔrɔ gɔ hi talɔ ya̧a̧wɔk yɔ gɔ be wɔb hi hii gɛrɛ: a bé gbaa maakdɔgl be wɔ a hi kpoos du, bé wɛɛ be bi̧i̧hi a hi mɔkil du.
Wɛɛ
a bé wɛɛ be taa mɔkig hinha̧a̧lya̧, zaabe woos ha̧a̧lya.
Yɛrɛ Bɛt gi bɛɛ hinha̧a̧l bisugo, gaas za taa ma an hi ha̧sin hinha̧a̧lɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, wɛ dag gbɔnɔ yɔ gulkɔ ɓaa gɛ a lɛlgaat bɔ gedu a Yeesu ga̧a̧mɔ bɔ gi dɔŋgo,
a gbɔnɔ seg bɔ su̧u̧sɛ gi giwɛ kaŋk a za̧a̧tig bɔ geɗu. Yɔ gaa muulɔ an gi wɔrɔ, muulɔgaak bɔ anbɔ riitin an gbandil fɛɛt bɔ taarukɔ yɔ gaawɛ gbɔnɔ talk a lɛlgaat bɔ lɛlɔ gedu a Bɛt ge giya.
Hɔnɛyɔ wɛ dag gbɔnɔ anbɔ wɛ wɛɛ wɛ gin Bɛtmaak-wookya gbɔɔl yɔ hi gbaag an Bɛt raatɔ zulya,
bɔwɛ sɛ̧ɛ̧b a Bɛt dɔŋdi hi kpoos ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya, yɛwɛ sɛ̧ɛ̧b hi ɗɔbsig tɛŋkya. Ya̧a̧nɛ, Yeesu ga̧a̧mɔ yɔ wāāt a wɛ kpoos du wɛ mɛɛ a kpoos wɛ gaaga, wɛɛ dokt muul wɛ bɔ hi mɛm gaat bɔ be.
Anyɔ wɛ mɛɛ a Za̧a̧nyɔ raa a bé woosɛ hinza gi Doo rɔb yɔ gɔ woo hinyɔ raa sɛwi, yɛwɛ waa mɔkil wɛ gbaak a hinyɔ raasɛ hage a hinyɔ gɔ wɛ dɔk gedu sɛw, bɔwɛ faa.
Yɛwɛ ootin rɔbtɔnɔ an kpoos wɛ gi dag tɛŋk a hat du hi a woos rɔbɛ du.
Bɔwɛ ɔɔ mɔksig wɛ bɔ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ wɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ anyɔ dood zaadɛ hi rɔ̧ɔ̧s wooko, yɛwɛ gaatin tɛŋk hi hato. Wɛ gɔ anbɔ, bálà anyɔ wɛ mɛɛ Waar Yeesu ɔ̧tɔ bɔ zaakɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ anyɔ wɛ mɛɛ rɔbo, gid wɛ gɔk hinha̧a̧l hi ka̧a̧s degi, namb za gbɛɛrik ga̧a̧mɔ an gi ha̧s hinha̧a̧l wɛ taaro,
gɛ dɔgl-gbaak bɔbtin bɔ giwɛ ooko, hi laa ha̧a̧l bɔ gɔ gi tɔbr zulɓaasigya wɔ ma.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ɗaa Muusa maakdɔglɔ, hi taasig ya̧a̧rmɛɛko hi gbɔŋge, gid segya eerɛ, zaabe taarɛ hi ta̧a̧ dɔglɔ a woo hin-a̧a̧b woo.
Nɛ mɔk nɔ hi za̧a̧nyɔ ɗa̧a̧ Bɛt waaɔ bɔ dɔɔdu, za̧a̧nyɔ see ga̧a̧m ya̧a̧wɔkya bɔ Bɛt woo gi gaasige an hin tɔsi, hi yɔ gɔ nii Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gɛmsilya bɔ! Gi dags dɔgl-gbaak ha̧a̧lyɔ daarlɛl gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ wɛ mɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ
a béé bé wɛɛn hin-a̧a̧b yɔ hi gɔsibe, bee be gbaasihi dɔglɛ.
Wɛɛ
a Waar Bɛt gi gbaas doodɔ dɔglɛ.
An mɔ mat a Bɛt za̧a̧til bɔ gi naan du hinɔ ha̧a̧hoob ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ.
Yɛrɛ mɔkin waak yɔ nɛ da nɛ waak amntɔnɔ. A ɔ̧tɔge yɔ nɛ dag Bɛt lɛlgaalɔ, nɛ er rɔbtɔnɔ a woosɔ bɔ gedu a ya̧a̧rhant teesdu.
Gɔ hi niinɛ, hi gɔlinɛ a dood lɔlgbarɔ, zaabe nɛ ɔks hi dood wɔ hi gisihi gɔk hin gbun bɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ nɛ mɛɛs luknɔya wɔ ya̧a̧rɛ, nɛ mɔm hi hat nɛ sɛw, hi loot rɔɔs nɛ luurɛ anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ rɔɔs rɔb zɛ̧rsin daarlɛlɛ, rɔɔs yɔ gɔ gi waa faa.
Yɔ anbɔ bɔnɛ ɔɔ hinyɔ kpoos nɛ ɓaay hage dɔglɔ, hi gbaasin dɔɔrɔɔs gbɔɔl gi dɔŋgɔ ge.
Ha̧a̧n hinmɔŋki an kuudu gɔ nɛ woo hinyɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧g gi da̧a̧ nɛ dag hinyɔ Bɛt raa a bé gaanɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa:
a wag kaasiwaanɔ, an za̧a̧nɔ gi zaa, gi zaakza, taa amzugo.
Yɛrɛ doo riit yɔ ɗɔbsɔ gi za̧a̧; gi wɛɛ kuudu ɔnɛ taab hark a gi muulɛ.
Wɛɛ wɛ taa dood wɔ gɔ hi wɛɛ kuudu an hi wagɔ. Wɛnɛ wɛ gin ɗɔbsigi an wɛ za̧a̧sin kol wɛ.
Nɔ hinɔ raakɔ a ɗɔbsigi nɔ? Raakɔ a mɔ mɛɛ a hinyɔ mɔ gbaa mɔkil mɔ hage gi tuurɔ, mɔ mɛɛ bɛttɔnɔ a hinyɔ hi gbɛ̄nig kɛn gɛ gi midɔ.
Bɛt yɛɛl ta̧a̧ dood amntɛ wɔ hi ɗɔbsigya̧ bɔ giya.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya wɛ mɛɛ a Bɛt kim waal hi dɔglɛ. Yɔ anbɔ, hinyɔ wɛ gbɛnko fu̧u̧ a hinyɔ wɛ gbɛn gɛ gedu.

Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Abɛl gi gbɛɛr tamɔ gi gaa Bɛt gaas yɔ bɛr gi daar Kaynu ɔ̧nɛ bɔ, Bɛt wɛɛnig doo riit a ɗɔbsig bɔ gi dɔŋgo, ta̧a̧ gaasɔ bɔ gii gi zuun a riisige. Abɛl gi book ɗɔbsigɔ bɔ dɔglɔ tɛ̧, anyɔ wɔr hɛw.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Bɛt gi loo Ɛ̧nɔg gi dɔɔnig bɛtha an bɔgi gbɛn wɔrko, dood hi ɓɛɛge hi zɛŋg gɛ anyɔ Bɛt ha̧sig gi dɔɔnig gi dɔŋdi. Yɔ dɔɔ nɛ bɛtha ket gɛ, hi dɔg nɛ gi zulha a Ɛ̧nɔg has Bɛt kpoosɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ ɗɔbsig gi taa gɛ, mɔ́ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an mɔ hasig kpoos nɛ gɛ zaŋ, ya̧a̧nɛ gi an za̧a̧nyɔ gi sɔɔk a Bɛt dɔŋdi gi ɗɔbs Bɛto a Bɛt gi gaak dood wɔ hi gig tɛk dɔɔrɔɔsɛ.

Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Nɔwe gi kɛm tɔnɛ yɔ Bɛt raasig hin wɔ gbɛndir nɛ ket gɛ daakya̧ dɔglɛ, doot lɛmb an gi za̧a̧sin zulɔ hi raatɔ. Yɔ woo anbɔ matin waal dɔglɛ, wɛɛ dag gbɔnɔ an gi riis Bɛt hi ɗɔbsig bɔ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya yɔ Bɛt el Abraham kɛmsige, rek waal za yɔ Bɛt gaag an gi yɛr gi waa gedu; yɔ rekɔ mɛ̄ɛ̄ lɛlyɔ gi rek du gɛ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya gi rek gi ɗɔɔt a hɛbt za dɔɔm yɔ Bɛt raa a gi gaag gedu an rɔ̀bi. Waa a luk gbandilya du, Isaaku hi Yakuba hɛw, wɔ gɔ hi yɛr waal gbuna bɔ Bɛt raa a bé gaa nɛ baaya̧.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Abraham ginɛ ook waal gbɔɔl yɔ gin sɛŋk ɓaatili, waal gbɔɔl yɔ Bɛt dɛ̧ɛ̧ welɔ gi wɛɛ gi wɔmɔ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Saratu hi zulɔ gi dag waamɔɔk anyɔ wɔm nɛ gii hɛw, anyɔ ɗɔbs za̧a̧nyɔ ɔɔ hinyɔ raa wook gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ yɛɛl a doo gbun bɔ Abraham yɔ muulɔ ɔ̧ɔ̧s gi da̧a̧ ge, wɛɛ dood kittɔnɔ baaya̧ an sɛwaat kit a bɛtha, an hɔ̧ɔ̧l a mɛmbal gbɔɔl du gɔ hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ ɓɛrk gɛ.
Dood wɛrɛ sɛw hi wɔr a ɗɔbsig du. Hí dāg hinwɔ Bɛt raa a gi gaahi gɛ. Hi gbɛn hinya̧ ɔnɛ hi boohi lakilɛ, hi zuun a hi gi hɛbtza doodɛ, hi rɔ̀bɛ a waaldu.
Wɔ hi book hin anbɔ hi zuunik a hi gi tɛk hɛbt ya̧a̧nɛ.
À hi mɔkilgo nɛ hɛbt lɛlyɔ hi fu̧u̧z nɛ duge dɔglɔ, yɔ hi dag gbɔnɔ hi wɛɛwɛ a lɛlɔge.
Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ ha̧a̧hi lɛlyɔ bɛr gi daarɔ, raakɔ a waalza yɔ gi bɛtha giya. Bɛt gɛmtsihi waal gbɔɔl rɔb a bɛtha, yɔ anbɔ, gii be seem hā̧a̧g an hi elig a Bɛt ya̧a̧n gɛ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Abraham gi gaa Isaaku an gaas a Bɛt ge yɔ Bɛt googe; Bɛt raag nɛ a gi wɛɛnig dɔ̧ɔ̧t gbɔɔl gi rɔbsin dood waal du sɛw, gaa Bɛt waaɔ gbunsum bɔ an gaasɛ.
Wɛɛ Bɛt da
a zaŋg mɔ gi tuu a Isaaku ge.
Abraham mɔkɔ a anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛ an gi rɛms dood a wɔrkɛ teesdu hɛw, ya̧a̧nɛ gi wɛɛ gi zeb Isaaku an fu̧u̧z nɛ a wɔrk du.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Isaaku gi rɔbs Yakuba hi Esawu a hinwɔ gɔ hi záásihi gi dɔŋgo.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya yɔ Yakuba gi wɔ́rko, gi rɔ̀bs Yusufu waatɔ wɔ gbunu gbunu, ɓa̧a̧ ya̧a̧ɔ a gi gbargas ha gi ɗɔbs Bɛto.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya yɔ Yusufu gi wɔrko gi dɔg Israhilaya waat wɔ tuukya̧ a Misra, gog hinyɔ gɔ hi woon hi lɛŋkɔ wɔ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Muusa nɔɔtɔ hi baatɔ hi yaatig sɛɛ taarɛ a haŋkdɔŋdu. Hi gbɛn waa bɔ bɛɛrɔ, wɛɛ hoob-hā̧ā̧hi hinyɔ waar bɔ dɔg gɛ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya yɔ Muusa tɔɔ gi in an bɔhi elig a Firawna waasiŋ waa ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Ha̧a̧g an hi ha̧a̧nigya̧a̧rɛ hi Bɛt doodɔ gii daarɔ, hi anyɔ gɔ gi dag hinha̧a̧l hɛmtigɔ, wɛɛ ɔ̧tɔ gɔ aŋ gɛ be.
See bɛr an seemhant yɔ gɔ gi yɔ̧ an Kristu gii hinɗɔbti, daar rɔɔs yɔ gi a Misra an hi gaage, anyɔ ɔ̄ɔ̄ lɔlɔ seek a dɔɔrɔɔs yɔ gɔ gi zaa kuudu hage gɛ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Muusa gi tuu a Misra hɛbt du hoobhā̧a̧g waar Firawna nɔ̧ɔ̧tigɔ gɛ anyɔ zuun kpoosɔ gbunu an gi gbɛnik za̧a̧nyɔ hi ɗɛɛg gbɛnik gɛ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya gi gɔ Paska, raa dood Israhilaya wɔ a hi huut tamwaa ga̧a̧m a lukgbar wɔ hi, an bɔ̄ Bɛtwalsɛr bɔ gin wɔrk naan du gi zaa gi ki̧i̧ Israhila waat fu̧u̧s wɔ.

Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Israhilaya wɔ hi tuu a Misra hɛbt du hi kar a Maaliya mɛmbal gbɔɔl bɔ gedu a mɛm tees du an ginɛ lɛl kootyɔ, wɛɛ Misraya wɔ hi goohi nɛ fɔk a mɛmbal bɔ gedu an hi wa̧a̧zihi, mɛm bɔ daksa gbɔ̧hi.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya Israhilaya wɔ hi gbɛ̧ɛ̧ Zeeriko waalɔ bɔ ɔ̧t nɔɔn-erɛ, wɔmtɔ bɔ hi gɔ̧ɔ̧nig gi ɛ̧brɔ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya hi gbɔ̄m nis kaat ha̧a̧l bɔ Rahab hi zulɓaatilya wɔ gɛ, anyɔ zeb nɛ Israhilaya lɛlkɛtigya wɔ gi oohi rɔbtɔnɔ.
Nɛ yɛrɛ gi an mi dɔg a nɔ ɓɛ? Ya̧a̧nɛ lɛl ɗɛɛ an gi fɛ̄ɛ̄mi mi boo Gedeyɔŋ, Baarak, Samsɔn, Zefte, Dawda, Samyɛl, hi Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ dɔglya̧ gɛ.
Hi ɗɔbsig bɔ giya hi ɗɛɛ hɛbt kittɔnɔ, hi gaa dɔgl an dood hi woohin hi gbɔnɔ a hɛbt bɔ gedu, hi dag hinyɔ Bɛt raa a gi gaahi, hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧ namnɔɔdɛ ya̧a̧gbarɔ,
hi nims laazebt tɛŋko, hi zɔr daŋbɛsim wɔrko, muulya̧ hɔ̧nɔ hi wɛɛ hi dag tɛŋk gi daarɔ, hi wɛɛ tɛŋkyaadɛ a gabs du, hi nin laaya rɔ̀bɛ a gabs du hi nɔɔ.
Nɛɛd hi gbɛn wɔrkɛya̧ wɔ hi rɛmlɔ hi wɛɛ hi dagihi, zaadɛ be hi wɔr a ya̧a̧rhant du, hí tā̧ā̧ an hi bisihi zaŋ gɛ an kuudu hi dag rɛmtig rɔb gi daarɔ,
kpɛ̧lt rii zaadɛ, kar riihi, ba̧a̧ntus wɔ wɔmnukɔ hi yaak a luknɔ du hɛw riihi.
Hi duutinihi bet hi wɔrɔ, hi dɛ̧ɛ̧linihi gaalɛ, hi ha̧a̧nihiya̧a̧r hi wɔrɔ, hi gbɔmnihi daŋbɛsimi, hi heg tamzoolɛ hi iszool wɛ, hi rek hɛ hi hɛ, hi gi ya̧a̧ryaadɛ hi zɛksihi, hi ha̧a̧nihiya̧a̧rɛ,
hi lɛɛlik a hɛtdɔŋ wɔ du hi a ga̧a̧t wɔ hahi, a wa̧l wɔ hi du, hi a zɛŋk wɔ hi du. Waal yɛrɛ tuur rɔb an hi waa gedu gɛ.
Yɛrɛ dood wɛrɛ sɛw, Bɛt zuun dɔglya̧ hi ɗɔbsigya̧, wɛɛ hi dāg hinyɔ Bɛt raa a gi woo gɛ be.
Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt yɛɛl gbaasɛ hinwɔ hi bɛr hi daarɔ gaati. Bɛt ha̧a̧g an bɔ̄ dood wɔrɔ hi wɛɛ wɔ hi taan a̧a̧bi, gid taa hi wɛɛ gɛ.
Yɛrɛ wɛɛ hɛw, anyɔ segyaadɛ wɔrɔ saalya̧zanɔ gbɔɔl hi gɔ̧ɔ̧wɛ, yɛwɛ bis hinyɔ gi a̧a̧nik ɛmbil wɛ sɛw, hi hinha̧a̧lyɔ giwɛ bik hi tɛŋko; yɛwɛ nɔɔ nɔɔkil yɔ gi wɛ muutdu hi hinmɔŋki wɛ tuur a da̧a̧ki,

wɛ́ gin lɔl wɛ a Yeesu ge yɔ gi wɛ gaak ɗɔbsigi wɛɛ gi ɗɔbsig wɛ gɛmsigo. Anyɔ gbɛn hatyɔ gɔ gi dag a bɛtha, ha̧a̧ya̧a̧r a dɔ̧ɔ̧r ha, mɔ̄k seem a wɔrkɔ bɔ muulɔge gɛ, ɗuk dɔɔ bɛtha, ɗɔɔt a Bɛt waar ums ɗɔɔtillɛl bɔ gi naanrɔbo.
Mɔkin za̧a̧nyɔ mɔm hinha̧a̧lya wɔ zulɓaasigya̧ bɔ yɛ̧ltɔnɔ a gi gbaŋgi an bɔnɛ ɔɔ kol nɛ gi mɔɔ, bɔ muul nɛ gi hɔninɛ.
A gabs nɛ bɔ nɛ wook a hinha̧a̧l gbaŋ gedu, nɛ́ ēr bɛttɔnɔ an gi tuur a wɔrk du ket gɛ,
nɛ wɛɛ nɛ zɛn dɔgl wɔ gaanin tɛŋk zɛnɔ anyɔ gɔ hi raak waatwalɛ:
a waa be, bɔmɔ see Waar Bɛt ya̧a̧rɔ bɔ gim ha̧a̧nik an hintɔs. Wɛɛ Bɛt gɔ gi gim book an mɔ lag tɔnɛ bɔ muul mɔ gi hɔnimɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Waar Bɛt gɔ boo za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧gge giya, wɛɛ gi dood wɔ mɛɛhi sɛw a waat beenɛ lɛk hi sɔɔlɛ.
Mɔn ya̧a̧rhant bɔ hi walumsɛ: Bɛt gin gbaak an waato, nɛ wāa nɔni baatɔ gi boog gɛ?
Wɛɛ Bɛt gi bōōnɛ anyɔ gɔ gi book waatɔ sɛw gɛ, nɛ gigi anbɔ nɛ taa waatɔ ma, nɛ gi mans waato, nɛ waat rɔbɛ gɛ!

Yɔ ginɛ anbɔ be, anyɔ baa wɛ hi gi doo a hɛbtdi hi giwɛ ya̧a̧rhant gaako a hin-a̧a̧b yɔ gɔ wɛ gɔk gi dɔŋgo, wɛ gihi ɗɔbsugo. Wɛɛ be, dāār an wɛ tiis zul wɛ a dood mɔkil wɔ Baaya̧ Bɛt ge an wɛ dag za̧a̧tig wɛ a ge gɛ ya?
Baa wɛ gɔ hi giwɛ ya̧a̧rhant gaak ɔ̧t kaasi anyɔ riisihi; nɛ Bɛt ɔ̧nɛ giwɛ gaak ya̧a̧rhant an gi gɛmsɛgɛmsɔ an kuudu wɛ ɔks hi gii a gi gaatig du.
Hi rɔb ɔ̧nɛ, gɔ wɛ ya̧a̧ryɔ̧ko, kpoos wɛ kpɛ̧ɛ̧ gɛ, wɛ gi dak kosgumnɛ. Yɔ anbɔ ya̧a̧rhant bɔ gisɛ kamzig waabil riit boolumya yɔ gi dood wɔ ya̧a̧rhant gɛmsihi anbɔ lab ya̧a̧nɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, ɓaasin naan nɛ wɔ hi mɔɔ hi dɔɔɗuk nɛ hɔntil wɔ.
Fɔn gbɔnɔ et wɔ hi dɔɔ nɛ wɔ, an bɔ dɔɔ gumtilya gi hɛɛ gbɔnɔ, dɔɔɔ gi ɓɛdɔ, ɔɔn gi za̧a̧ gi ɓaa.
Tɛn ɗɔɔtig rɔbtɔnɔ hi dood sɛw, hi gaatigi a Bɛt muutdu, gaatig bɔ gi taa gɛ, doo za taa an gi gbɛn Waar Yeesu .
Oonɛ an bɔ doo za gi wɛɛ kuudu gi lɔɔ Bɛt gɛmsili; an bɔ doo za yɔ gi an tɛ̧ɛ̧kpas zobtil yɔ ruuz a tɛ̧ɛ̧duul muulɛ gi ha̧a̧nik dood kittɔnɔ ya̧a̧r hi ɗɔŋkɔ bɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ bɔ doo gigi mansnaakya, zaabe lɛlgaat seekya an hintɔs an Esawu yɔ faa Bɛto gi zebrs yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ waa gbɔlumsɔ hi lees dak gbunu.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ, kuudu a ha̧a̧kyɔ ha̧a̧ Esawu an gi dag baatɔ rɔbsɛ, hi wɛɛnig kuudu anyɔ gi kaak nɛ hi mɛɛk gii hɛw; dāg gbɔnɔ an gi dɛmnaan gi zɛmr hinyɔ woo nɛ gɛ.
Nɛɛ nɛ sɔ̄ɔ̄ an Israhilaya wɔ hi sɔɔ a Sinay gol dɔŋdi an hi ɗɛɛ ki̧i̧k gɛ be: laazebt dagsige, kuus kpɛ̧ɛ̧ge, lɛlbutili, hi lɛlwilɔ, hi bɛlwitili,
pɔ̧r ya̧a̧boon wɔ, hi dɔgl wɔ namsya̧; wɔ gɔ hi kɛm hi ɛrɔ an bɔhi wɛɛ hi dɔgsihi nɛ dɔgl za gi daarɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ hii be hi ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an hi mɔm dɔgl yɛrɛ hi rāā gɛ. Hi raa dɔglɔ:
a namb za gi ki̧i̧ nɛ gol yɛrɛ hɛw hi duunig bet gi wɔrɔ.
Hin bɔrɔ gbɛnkɔ ha̧a̧hoob yɛ̧ltɔnɔ. Muusa yɔ gbɛn anbɔ raa:
a hoobha̧a̧b be beek nɔɔha.
Yɛrɛ nɛya nɛ sɔɔsɔ a Siyona gol bɔ ge a Bɛt za̧a̧til bɔ gi waal gbɔɔl du, a Urusalima yɔ gi a bɛtha gedu, a lɛlyɔ Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ kittɔnɔ hi mɔks ge hi nak hin hi hato.
Nɛ sɔɔ a Bɛt waat saal wɔ hi mɔɔhi doos hi bi̧i̧ nuŋgya̧ a bɛtha hi, a dɔgl-gbaakyayɔ gi dood sɛw Bɛtya̧ ge, a dood riitɛ wɔ hi gaa mɔkilya̧ hi,
a Yeesu yɔ gi ya̧a̧wɔk seg bɔ teesɔ gedu hi Bɛt ge, a ga̧a̧mwaatig bɔ gɔgi booya̧a̧ gi za̧a̧s doo gi daar Abɛl ga̧a̧m ɔ̧nɛ duge.

Oon zul nɛ an bɔnɛ in za̧a̧nyɔ gi ya̧a̧book dɔglɔ lako; ya̧a̧nɛ gid dood wɔrɔ hi in za̧a̧nyɔ gisihi Bɛt dɔgl book a waal du hi zɔ̄r dɔgl-gbaak an hi za̧a̧ gɛ, wɛɛ hɛw gi an wɛ za̧a̧ ri? Wɛɛ yɔ wɛ inik za̧a̧nyɔ giwɛ ya̧a̧boonik a bɛtha?
Amntɔnɔ ya̧a̧boonɔ nams hɛbto, yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ gii wɛɛ gi dɔg a be woo hin yɛrɛ:
a lɔɔsumɔ ge ɓɛ, bé taa hɛbt gii namsig kpɔdi, be nams bɛtha hɛw.
Dɔgl yɛrɛ, lɔɔsumɔ ɓɛ gi zuunik hinwɔ hi namlɔ zɛmrikya̧ anyɔ da wooy nɛ ɔ̧tza, an hinwɔ hi taa an hi naml gɛ hi zɛ̧ɛ̧rɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ wɛɛ yɔ gɔ wɛ dag wáát yɔ gɔ gi naml gɛ, yɛwɛ baanɔ, yɛwɛ woos Bɛt hin anyɔ rii, wɛ ta̧a̧ge hi hoob a kpoos du.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt wɛ gi laa yɔ gɔ muks hin sɛw giya.
Fɔn waak a yɛ̧ɛ̧dums hat du.
Bɔnɛ zɛ̧n rɔ̀bɛ zek a nɛ lɛldu, ya̧a̧nɛ rɔbɛzek bɔ anbɔ, hi zek Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ du hi mɛɛ gɛ.
Mɔkin luknɔya wɔ an nɛɛnɛ gi nɛ luknɔyaadɛ be; mɔkin wɔ hi gihi gɔluko an hi gi muul nɛɛn gɔlik lɛlgbunu hi hii be.
Lootins wɛɛsig dood sɛw hinɗɔbti. Bɔ doo za kusillɛlɔ gi ɓi̧i̧lɔ, raakɔ a bɔ dood hi lootin hi gɔ mansi; Bɛt gi gbaas doo hatilgɔkya wɔ hi mansnaakya wɔ dɔglɛ.
Bɔnɛ ɗɔkin tusɛ; kpoos nɛ kpɛ̧ɛ̧g a hinyɔ nɛ gin hage; ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt hi zulɔ gi raa:
a bé taam ɔɔko, bé taam bisig nɛ zaŋ.
Yɔ anbɔ, gi an wɛ dɔghin hi kpoos ɓaasigi
a Waar Bɛt gi ɗaakya beenɛ, hoob taab hinza ha̧a̧ko. Gi an doo gi gɔsib nɔ?
Mɔkin nɛ mɛɛ dood wɔ hi gisin dork nɛ amnti hi Bɛtdɔgl yɔ hi dɔgsinɛ; seen waabilya̧ bɔ da̧a̧kɔda̧a̧, wɛɛn nɛ fɔb ɗɔbsigya̧ bɔ.
Yeesu Kristu gi gbun bɔ gii lelɔ, hi nɛɛko hi faa.
Bɔnɛ ɔɔ hi maatin hi hingokza rɔ̀bɛ sɔmsɔm wɔ an hi hɛɛsin gbɔnɔ; ya̧a̧nɛ bɛr an kpoos wɛ gi dag tɛŋk a Bɛt gɛmsil du, taa a leesdɔgl yɔ gɔ ɗāā hinza gɛ duge.
Wɛ gin Bɛtmaaksɛŋk za, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an wɔ hi gi wook maak a Yahuda lukgbandilya du hí lē hinza a hage gɛ.
Bɛtmaak wookya gbɔɔl mɔɔt gɔ kamz namb wɔ hi gbɛɛr ga̧a̧mya̧ a lɛlgaatɛ wɔ lɛlgaatya̧ bɔ gedu an hinha̧a̧l gi bisɔ, hi wɛɛ hi dɔ̧ɔ̧s namb wɔ a pɔnti.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Yeesu be, yɔ̧ya̧a̧r a waal gbɔɔl lakɛ, an gi gaas dood hi ga̧a̧m ɔ̧nɛ bɔ.
Yɛwɛ tuu an wɛ rek a ge, a waal gbɔɔl lakɛ wɛ ɔks hi gii wɛ mɔm seemhantɔ bɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ wɛ taan waal gbɔɔl yɔ gɔ gi waa gi am a hɛbtdi hɛdi anyɔ wɛ tɛk waal gbɔɔl za yɔ gɔ gi zaa.
Hi Yeesu gɛmsilɔ, yɛwɛ waa Bɛt baaniki, bant wɛ yɔ gigi an gaas rɔb yɔ wɛ gaak a Bɛt ge, raakɔ a ya̧a̧ wɛ bɔ gi waak nuŋgɔ baaniki.
Bɔnɛ zɛn rɔbgɔk hi ɗaatingo hi gaasɛ, ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt gɔ harig hi gaas wɔrɔ anbɔ.

Kɛmsin wɔ hi gisin gbɔnɔ dorko, fɔn hinyɔ gɔ hi raanɛ anyɔ hi gi kol nɛ ooko, anyɔ gi an hii hi fɔks Bɛt hin wɔrɔ woosɔ. Kɛmsinɛhi an hi woo woosya̧ hi hato, bɔgi gi hi kpoos ɗɔbti. Hin bɔ lab yɔ ɗaasin hinza gɛ.
Zɔ̧bsinwi Bɛto, wi mɛɛ bɛttɔnɔ a kpoos wi gaaga, giw ha̧a̧k an wi ɛmb rɔbtɔnɔ a hinyɔ gi gedu sɛw.
Mi gin ɛrk hi tɛŋk an nɛ zɔ̧bsib Bɛto an gi wɛɛnim nɔɔktɔnɔ a nɛɛge.
Hɔnɛ, an Bɛt yɔ gi gaak boolumi, za̧a̧nyɔ wɛnz Waar wɛ Yeesu a wɔrkɛ teesdu yɔ gi tam wɔ nɛɛraya̧ gbɔɔl hi ya̧a̧wɔk ga̧a̧m yɔ gɔ gi waa faa,
gi gaan tɛŋk a woos rɔb yɔ ha̧a̧g geɗu sɛw, gi wɛɛ gi woo hinyɔ riisige a wɛ kpoos du hi Yeesu Kristu, za̧a̧nyɔ gbɔlums gi ge wɛlɛ hi wɛlɛ. Aanbɔ!
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, mi zɔ̧nɛ an nɛ mɔm nɛ ta̧a̧ dɔgl mi yɛrɛ mi gin tɛŋk gaanuko, ya̧a̧nɛ mi bi̧i̧sin dɔglɔ kaasi.
Mɛɛn a yɛ̧ɛ̧ wɛ Timɔte hi tùùsigtuus a luknɔdu. Gi zaa hɛdi nɔɔk-tɔnɔ, wi retin hi gii an mi seezinɛ.
Boon dood wɔ hi gisin gbɔnɔ dork sɛw, hi Bɛt doodɔ wɔ sɛw. Bɛt doodɔ zaadɛ wɔ hi fu̧u̧z a Itali hi boozinɛ.
An Bɛt gɛmsilɔ gigi hi nɛɛ sɛw! Aanbɔ!
Mii Yakuba, Bɛto hi Waar Yeesu Kristu woosyaya̧. Mii gi bi̧i̧sig Israhila dɔ̧ɔ̧t koobl daa eer wɔ hi hɛks a waal du sɛw ɗɛɛrwol yɛrɛ. Seko!
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, gid ya̧a̧rhant zaadɛ sɔmsɔm hi zɛnɛ, mɔkin an nɛ dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Nɛ mɛɛ a ya̧a̧rhant wɔ hi gook ɗɔbsig nɛ hi gɔk an nɛ dag tɛŋk nɛ mɔmhinɛ.
Ɔɔn hinmɔŋk bɔ gi woowoosɔ rɔbtɔnɔ gi da̧a̧ an nɛ wɛɛ dood rɔbɛ tib, bɔnɛ lɔɔ hinza rɔb gbun mɔɔti.
Yɛrɛ doo za gi taan hinmɛɛk gɛ, gi ɛr a Bɛt ge gi gaage, anyɔ gi doo gaasya rɔb gi gaak dood hin sɛw, wɛɛ nɔɔg gɛ be.
Za̧a̧nɔ zɔ̧g hi ɗɔbsigi a kpoos du, bɔgi faa. Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ faa riitin hi mɛmɗukil wɔ mɛmbal gbɔɔl du hiya, zɛk ɗunsilihi, yaakihi hɛ hi hɛ.
Doo anbɔ bɔgi mɔk hinza gi zul du a gi dag hinza a Waar Bɛt ge.
Doo yɔ gin kpoos eerɛ taa an gi er hi tɛŋk a woosɔ yɔ gi duge sɛw.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧ za ya̧a̧rya yɔ gi dag hat a pɛɛkɔ bɔ Bɛt pɛɛg wɛɛha gi dɔŋgo,
wɛɛ yɛ̧ɛ̧ rɔɔsya be, gi dag hat a tiisigɔ yɔ Bɛt tiisig gi dɔŋg be. Dood rɔɔsya wɔ hí wag an tɛ̧ɛ̧kɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ.
Kudɔɔl gɔ midɔ, tɛ̧ɛ̧ wɔ hi yɔ̧ɔ̧, kɔ̧ɔ̧rya̧ wɔ hi kpɔmɔ, bɛtigya̧ wɔ hi wag be. Doo rɔɔsya bɔ gi wag anbɔ be a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ gi wookwoosɔ gedu.
Hat gi a za̧a̧nyɔ gi mɔŋk ya̧a̧rhant ge. Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi er hi tɛŋk gi zuun maatil wɔ hi gig goonik mɔŋkɔ bɔ gi da̧a̧, gi dag za̧a̧tig yɔ gi ɗɛɛt dɔɔrɔɔs yɔ Bɛt raa a bé gaa dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi a beege.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ya̧a̧rhant zɛŋge gi gig maatig an gi gɔ ha̧a̧lɛ, bɔgi raa: a Bɛt gii maatibe. Ya̧a̧nɛ, taa an hi maatin Bɛt hi ha̧a̧lgɔki, wɛɛ gii hi zulɔ gɔ maat doo hinɔ gɛ zaŋ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ hinza maatige: ɗɔkum ɔ̧ɔ̧n maatige gi wa̧a̧ge hi mɔkilɔ.
Wɛɛ ɗɔkum ha̧a̧l gɔ budɔ mɔɔ waaɔ gɛ: hinha̧a̧lɛ; hinha̧a̧l gɔ tɔɔ be, mɔɔ waaɔ gɛ wɔrko.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧ mi rɔbɛ wɛ, bɔnɛ maat zul nɛ!
Gaas rɔbɛ sɛw hi dɔɔrɔɔs gaatɛ wɔ sɛw hi fu̧u̧zig wɛɛha a Baa Bɛt ge, za̧a̧nyɔ kim lɛlgaal wɔ bɛtha, wɛɛ hɛ̄ml ɔɔwɛ lɛlwil du an ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ leg gɛ be.
Dɔgsɛ rɔb dɔgl bɔ gii gi gaawɛ za̧a̧tigi anyɔ ha̧a̧ge hi zulɔ, an wɛɛ wɛ wɛɛsig hin rɔb yɔ daar hinwɔ kim sɛw.
Nɛɛ yɛ̧ɛ̧ mi rɔbɛ wɛ, mɛɛnɛ: An bɔ sɛw lagig dɔgl nɔɔko, mɔŋg ya̧a̧booki, mɔŋg nɔɔtigi.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, doo nɔɔtigɔ taa wook hinyɔ rii a Bɛt muut du.
Yɔ anbɔ bisin hinyɔ gi gaak ɗibto hi hinbɔbtin yɔ gɔ hi̧i̧s kpoosɛ. Zen dɔgl yɔ hi rɛɛ a nɛ kpoos du saŋtumtɔnɔ, dɔglɔ ɗɛɛ kol nɛ za̧a̧sig ɗɛɛ.
Yɛrɛ bɔnɛ mɔk Bɛt dɔgl bɔ gii lakɔ kpɔd, bɔ lab rii gɛ; woon hi woosɔ du be. À lab gɛ, yɔ nɛ maat zul nɛɛnɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ gbor Bɛt dɔgl laki gi woo du gɛ, riitin hi za̧a̧nyɔ loo daarugal gi seen muutɔ bɔ gikɔ bɔ.
Yɔ see muutɔ gi da̧a̧ anbɔ rekɔ, wɛɛ ɓɔrbɔ zɛn muutɔ bɔ gikɔ zɛnɔ.

Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gi seek hinyɔ Bɛtmaakdɔgl gaat yɔ tuus zul wɛ a hinha̧a̧l du gi gok bɛttɔnɔ, wɛɛ gi waa dɔglɔ wa̧a̧ki, gi taa an dood wɔ gɔ hi lag dɔgl bɔ hi gbor zɛnik gɛ ɔnɛ gi woosɔwoonik du, Bɛt gi rɔbs za̧a̧nɔ a woosɔ bɔ gedu.
Za̧a̧nyɔ mɔk a be gi Bɛtɗɔbsigya rɔbo gi wɛɛ gi wā̧ā̧ mɛlɔ bɛttɔnɔ gɛ, gi maatig zul ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ. Bɛtɗɔbsigɔ bɔ gi hintɔsyɔ.
Hinyɔ Baa Bɛt see an ɗɔbsig gaat rɔb gi muut du: gɛ an hi see wɔraawaat wɔ hi kuurɛ nɛɛd wɔ a hi ya̧a̧rhant du, hi oo zulya̧ an kpoosya̧ gi gaa, bɔ hinha̧a̧l yɔ gi waal du gi gul duge.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, nɛɛ yɔ nɛ ɗɔbsig Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu doo gbɔlumsya bɔ, taa an nɛ see doo a muutdu.

Mɔkin ta̧: an doo za rɔɔsya gul a nɛ mɔksilluk du hi banawaa yɔ hi tun hɛɛlmɔt gi heg naan du, hi gbandil bɛt muulɛ; wɛɛ gid ya̧a̧ryawaa za zaa gul a mɔksilluk bɔ gedu hi gbandil haŋsil be, yɔ nɛ woo ri?
An nɛ see za̧a̧n rɔɔsya bɔ heg gbandil rɔb muul gii nɛ
yɔ anbɔ, nɛ gbàà gɛ̧ksili a nɛ teesdu, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧k dɔgl bɔ hi mɔkil ha̧a̧lɛ.
Kɛnɛ, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi rɔbɛ wɛ, nɛ Bɛt her ya̧a̧ryaadɛ a waal lɔlgbarɔ an gi wɛɛnihi dood rɔɔsyaadɛ hi ɗɔbsigi an hi dag Bɛt wáátɔyɔ raa a be gaa dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi ge ma mi?
Wɛɛ nɛya nɛ bɔ̧ɔ̧k ya̧a̧rya wɔ be! Nɛ rɔɔsya wɔ hi taan ya̧a̧kɛtingo hi taan dirk kaŋk a dɔglyɛ̧ɛ̧kluk wɔ hi du ya?
Hii taa ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l book a nuŋg rɔb yɔ Bɛt gaan hage ya?
Gid nɛ waak wook Bɛt wáát maakdɔgl yɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du hi rɔbo:
a gi ha̧a̧mɔ namɔza an mɔya,
nɛ wook rɔbo.
Yɛrɛ gid nɛ seek dood a muutdu nɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧k dood be, nɛ wook hinha̧a̧lɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ wɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔgl ha̧tirgoyaadɛyɔ.
Za̧a̧ni fɔ Bɛtmaak wɔ sɛw gi wɛɛ gi ha̧tir zaaɔ gbunu, gɔ hin-a̧a̧bi a Bɛtmaak wɔ gedu sɛw.
Ya̧a̧nɛ za̧a̧nyɔ raa:
a bɔmɔ naamansi,
wɛɛ raa ɓɛ,
a bɔmɔ gbɔm zulɛ;
yɔ anbɔ gid mɔ́ nāāmans gɛ, mɔ́ gbɔ̍m zul be, mɔ wɛɛ Bɛtmaakdɔgl ha̧tirgoyayɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, boonya̧a̧, woon an dood wɔ gɔ hi gbaasihi dɔglɛ hi Bɛtmaakdɔgl rɔb tib yɔ gɔ tuus zul wɛ aakil du giya.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ mɛɛs naaza hii ya̧a̧r gɛ, Bɛt gi gbaasig dɔglɛ, taasig ya̧a̧rɔ mɛɛk be. Ya̧a̧rmɛɛki gɔ ɗɛɛ dɔgl-gbaak ɗɛɛ.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧mi wɛ, doo gi raa a be ɗɔbsig Bɛto, gi wōōn-woosɔ du gɛ, gi an gi dag nɔ gedu, ɗɔbsigɔ bɔ gi za̧a̧sig ya?
Gid yɛ̧ɛ̧mɔza zaa, zaabe siŋg mɔ gi taan gbandili, gi taan leesɛ,
doo za a nɛ teesdu gi
Za̧a̧nɔ gi gi ɗɔbsig Bɛto, ɗɔbsigɔ bɔ gi kɔm ɔ̧ɔ̧kɔ gi ɔ̄ks hi woos du gɛ, wɛɛ hintɔsyɔ.
Wɛɛ doo za gi raami: a mɔɔ mɔ gin ɗɔbsigi, bee be gin woosɛ; yɔ mi ta̧a̧g a zunsimi ɗɔbsig yɔ taan woosɔ du gɛ, mii mi zunsum ɗɔbsig mi hi woos mi.
Mɔ ɗɔbsɔ a Bɛt gi gi gbun ya? Mɔ gɔ rɔbo! Yɛrɛ loorɛha̧a̧l wɔ hɛw hi gig ɗɔbsugo, wɛɛ hi beek hoob be.
Mɔɔ doo tɔs, hā̧ā̧mɔ an mɔ mɛɛ a ɗɔbsig yɔ taan woosɔ du gɛ gi hintɔsi gɛ ya?
Nɛ Bɛt mɛks baa wɛ Abraham ri gi seeg an doo riiti ɔnɛ? Nɛ yɔ woo hinyɔ rii gii gi gaag ma waawal Isaaku an gaas ma a gi maaksɛŋk ha mi?
Mɔ gbɛn yɔ ɗɔbsigɔ ɔks hi woosɔ, ɗɔbsigɔ bɔ gaaga hi woosɔ bɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt da̧a̧s hinyɔ ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa:
a Abraham ɗɔbs Bɛto, ya̧a̧ gii Bɛt gi seeg an doo riiti,
hi wɛɛ hi elig a Bɛt sa̧a̧mɔ ga.
Yɛrɛ nɛ gbɛnɔ, doo gɔ rii a Bɛt muutdu a woosɔ rɔbɛ wɔ hi dɔŋgo, taa hi ɗɔbsigɔ bɔ gii kpɔd.
Hinɔ anbɔ ro hinɔ gi turs nis bɔ Rahab, nis kaat ha̧a̧l bɔ. Rahab wɛɛ doo riit a Bɛt muutdu a gi woos dɔŋgo. Gii zeb nɛ Israhila wɔ tɔmsyaya̧ wɔ gi goksihi gbɔnɔ za dɔɔm hi fɔb hi rekɔ.
Anyɔ muul gɔ taan kol gɛ gi wɔrɔ, gbunɔ giya ɗɔbsigi gi ɔks hi woos gɛ wɔɔr be.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, bɔ̄ dood kit a nɛ teesdu hi wɛɛ hingok- yaadɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ nɛ mɛɛ a wɛ́ɛ́ hingokya wɔ hi gbààsɛ dɔgl gi daar dood zaadɛ ya̧nɛ daarɔ.
Wɛ sɛw wɛ wook hin-a̧a̧bi hi gbɔnɔ sɔmsɔm. Za̧a̧n za gi gɔ hin-a̧a̧b a hinyɔ gi dɔk gedu gɛ, gi doo gaatyɔ, tɛŋkɔ ɗɛɛ an gi oo muulɔ sɛw.
Gid wɛ yaa tus a dɔy ya̧a̧ du an gi lagsɛ tɔnɛ, wɛ gi kaŋk dɔy bɔ muulɔ a lɛlyɔ ha̧a̧wɛ ge sɛw.
Yɛrɛ lɛmb gbɔlɛ wɔ mɛmbal gbɔɔl du: mɔkin tɔɔkya̧, zɛk gɔ fɛge gig renuko, nuukɔya bɔ gi nuunsɔ fɛŋwaa bɔ nuunuko gig renik a lɛlyɔ ha̧a̧g ge sɛw.
Gbunɔ, mɛlyɔ ya̧a̧ du gi muul wansɔ zaayɔ, gi pɛɛk zulɔ, gi hin gbɔlɛ booko. Seen laa fɛŋwaayɔ gɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛs za gbɔɔlɛ.
Mɛl yɔ ya̧a̧ du gi an laayɔ. Gin ha̧a̧l yɔ gi sɛw, mɛlyɔ ya̧a̧ du gi a muul du gi gaak muul ha̧a̧lɛ, gi ha̧tirgo muul wɛ sɛw gig kpɔɔk hi laa yɔ fu̧u̧z a ya̧a̧rhant lɛl du.
Doo ɗɛɛ an gi ɛ̧ɛ̧n namb dɔ̧ɔ̧t wɔ hɛt du sɛw hi nɔɔs wɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧tya̧ sɛw, hi hinza̧a̧til wɔ hi ɛmbingo buu hi hinza̧a̧til wɔ mɛm du sɛw.
Mɛl ɔnɛ doo za ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi ɛ̧ɛ̧nig gɛ. Mɛl gi hinha̧a̧l yɔ gɔ tā̧ā̧ kɔmbik gɛ. Hi̧i̧s ɗɔŋk yɔ gɔ gbɔm doo giya.
Wɛ gi baanik Baa wɛ Waar Bɛto hi mɛl yɔ ya̧a̧ du, wɛ wɛɛ wɛ gi boonik gii doo yɔ ki̧y an Bɛt ritinsɔ an boot gi wa̧a̧ge.
Rɔbsɛ hi booto hi tuuk a ya̧a̧ gbuna bɔ gedu. Yɛ̧ɛ̧ mi wɛ! Bɔgi gi anbɔ a nɛ teesdu, bɛr gɛ!
Mɛm gburklɛl ɗɛɛ an gi gbur mɛm hɛmnti hi mɛm zobtil ya̧a̧gbun du ya? Lab gɛ.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧ mi wɛ, yɔmntnɔɔ dɛɛ̄ an gi hum kɔ̧ɔ̧b gɛ, wɛɛ namleesɛ ɗɛɛ an gi hum yɔmntnɔɔ gɛ. Gi anbɔ be, mɛmgburklɛl ti̧i̧til ɗɛɛ an gi gbur mɛmhɛmnt gɛ.
Bɔ gi hinmɛɛkya dubti hi hinkɛŋkya zul du a nɛ teesdu nɔ? Za̧a̧nɔ zuun hinɔ hi ɛmbilɔ rɔbo hi woosɔ wɔ gi wook hi zultiisigi an hinyɔ hinmɛɛkɔ dubt bɔ kpoos du gisig goko.
Yɛrɛ nɛ gin kubl ha̧a̧l hi gabs a nɛ kpoos du, nɛ mɔkig hinyɔ gɔ nɛ daks zul nɛ gii kpɔdi, bɔnɛ pɛɛ zul nɛ, bɔnɛ gɔ̧ɔ̧ya̧a̧ a rɔb muulɛ.
Hinmɛɛk bɔrɔ taa hinmɛɛk yɔ gi fu̧u̧zig bɛtha a Bɛt Mɔkil ge; gi hinmɛɛk yɔ gi fu̧u̧zig a waali du, hi a loorɛha̧a̧l ge giya.
Ya̧a̧nɛ lɛlyɔ lɔlha̧a̧l gi ge hi ka̧a̧si, lɛl-ha̧tirgo hi woos ha̧a̧l zaadɛ sɔmsɔm hi gi ge be.
Yɛrɛ hinmɛɛk yɔ gi fu̧u̧zig a bɛtha gii gaa gi ɗaarlɛlɛ, wɛɛ gin boolumi, saŋtimi, ɗɔɔtil rɔbo, ya̧a̧rmɛɛk gbɔɔlɛ, gi waak hinrɔb wooki, gɔ zɛmr gɛ, taa mɛlya ha̧a̧lɛ.
Dood wɔ hi kamzig boolum a dood tees di, dɔ̧ɔ̧t yɔ hi dɔ̧ɔ̧k hi boolumi, gɔ bɛɛ pirko, tɔɔ gaa humlɔ gɛ hinriiti.
Gbaato hi gabsɛ hi fu̧u̧ hi nɛ teesdu nɔ? Nɛ hi fu̧u̧ a ɗɔkum nɛ wɔ hi wook gabs nɛ kpoos du hi ma mi?
Gin ha̧a̧k hin zaadɛ, nɛ dagihi gɛ, nɛ gbork zulgbɔŋki; nɛ ɗɔkingo hin zaadɛ wɛ nɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄hi dak gɛ, nɛ gbaatingo nɛ gɔk gabsɛ. Yɔ nɛ ɛr hin a Bɛt ge gɛ gii nɛ taanɔ.
Gɔ nɛ ɛr be, nɛ ɛrk hi ɗɔkum ha̧a̧lɛ, an gɔ nɛ dagɔ nɛ woos zul nɛɛn kpɔd. Ya̧a̧ gi nɛ dag gɛ.
Nɛɛ dood mansnaakya wɛ a Bɛt muutdu, nɛ mɛ̄ɛ̄ a waal sa̧a̧m wɛɛkɔ, mɔ wɛɛ Bɛt lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya gɛ ya? Yɔ anbɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g an gi wɛɛ waal sa̧a̧mi wɛɛn zulɔ Bɛt lɔlɔhɛ̧ɛ̧nikyayɔ.
Bɔnɛ mɔk a hinyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa:
a Bɛt gin kubl a Mɔkil bɔ yaaz wɛ kpoos du gi zulɛ, gi hin tɔsyɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt wɛɛ giwɛ gaak gɛmsil gi daariklɛlɛ. Ya̧a̧nɛ hi bi̧i̧:
a Bɛt gi inik zultɔɔsigya wɔ, wɛɛ gi zultiisigya wɔ gɛmsil gaako.
Yɔ anbɔ, tiisin zul nɛ a Bɛt dɔŋdi nɛ lagsig tɔnɛ, inin loorɛha̧a̧lɛ, gi nɔ̀ɔ̀ gi ɔɔnɛ.
Sɛ̧ɛ̧bin Bɛto; gii be gi sɛ̧ɛ̧b nɛɛ be. Hinha̧a̧lya wɛ, gaasin naan nɛ hi kpoos nɛ, nɛɛ dood mɔkil eerya wɛ.
Mı̄nɛ, lilinhinɛ, kaanɛ, zɛmrin kpɛ̧ɛ̧t nɛ gi wɛɛ kaalɛ, wɛɛ hat nɛ gi zɛmr mimto.
Tiisin zul nɛ a Waar Bɛt dɔŋdi gi pɛɛnɛ.

Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, bɔnɛ raatin ya̧a̧ha̧a̧lɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a naaza zulha, zaa lab gɛ gi gbaas naaza dɔglɛ, boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a Bɛtmaakdɔgl zulha, gbaas Bɛtmaakɔ dɔglɛ. Yɔ anbɔ gid mɔ gbaas Bɛtmaak dɔglɛ, mɔ wɛ̄ɛ̄ Bɛtmaakfɔkya gɛ, mɔ gi dɔgl gbaakya ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.
Bɛt gi gbunu gi maakdɔgl gaakya hi dɔgl gbaakya, gii gin tɛŋk an gi za̧a̧s doo, zaabe an gi ha̧tirge. Mɔɔ yɔ mɔ gbaasig namɔza dɔglɛ, mɔ seek zul mɔ an mɔɔ bɔ?
Yɛrɛ lagsinmi, dood wɔ nɛ raak: a nɛɛko, zaabe yoosugo wɛ́ rek a waal gbɔɔl bɔrɔ lab gedu wɛ́ waa hɔ wɛl gbunu, wɛ gɔ hinriŋsi wɛ dag tusɛ.
Nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ kol nɛ gɔ gi wɛɛ yoosig ya? Yɔ anbɔ nɛ gi an kuzɛɛ yɔ gɔ midza ɓɔryɔ wɛɛ kuudu kaasi gbaarɔ.
Hinyɔ bɛr an gɔ nɛ dɔg nɛ gɛrɛ: a Bɛt gi ha̧a̧ge, Bɛt gi kaŋkig kol be, be woo hin yɛrɛ hi yɛrɛ.
Yɛrɛ nɛ gi tɔɔsig zul nɛ, nɛ book hin gbɔlɛ. Zultɔɔsig wɔ an bɔrɔ sɛw bɛr gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, za̧a̧ni mɛɛ hinrɔb gɔk gi gɔ gɛ, gɔ hinha̧a̧lɛ.
Nɛɛ dood rɔɔsya wɛ, zaan nɛ kaa, nɛ ɓoolya̧a̧ a ya̧a̧rhant nɛ bɔ gi zaak nɛ zulha gi dɔŋgo.
Rɔɔs nɛ wɔ hi dogɔ, sol hi muu gbandil nɛ wɔ.
Hɛɛlmɔt nɛ wɔ hi tus nɛ wɔ hi kɔɔ. Gɔ hi kɔɔ anbɔ, hí mɛɛn gii hinha̧a̧l nɛ, wɛɛ hinɔ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧ muul nɛ an laa. Nɛ mɔkts zul nɛ rɔɔs a ɔ̧t yɔ̧ɔ̧sum wɛrɛ gedu!
Dood woosya wɔ hi woo totɓɛs nɛ bak du nɛ maahi nɛ́ gāāhi dɔɔrɔɔsya̧ gɛ. Lagin kaalya̧ ta̧! Kaalya̧ zaa tuur a Waar Bɛt Tɛŋkya Sɛw tɔn du.
Nɛ waa a waal du a lɛl bɛt du hi a hɛmntig du. Nɛ len zul nɛ daarlɛlɛ nɛ tɔɔ an naabaa dool a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ hi gbɛɛr duge gi dɔŋgo.
Nɛ gbaas dood wɔ hi taan a̧a̧b gɛ dɔglɛ, nɛ gbɔ̧hi, hii be hi in gɛ.

Yɔ anbɔ, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, mɔnɛ gi tuur a Waar Yeesu Kristu zaakɔ bɔ gedu. Seen hinbalikya wɔ hinmɔŋkya̧ hi oo sɛɛ nɔɔn-gbunu an lees wɔ bak du hi ram rɔbtɔnɔ. Hi mɔmɔ an hi dag bɛl yɔ yɛɛl naŋko gi tuur a bɛlreki.
Nɛɛ hɛw, mɔnɛ, ɓaasin kpoos nɛ anyɔ Waar Yeesu zaakɔ sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, bɔ̄ hin gi nɔɔtinnɛ nɛ niitin an bɔ̄ Bɛt gi gbaasin dɔglɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi gbaas dood dɔgl sɛ̧ɛ̧bɔ, gi erk a luk gbɔnɔya̧, ha̧a̧g an gi guuzɔ.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, mɔkin Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi boohin hi Waar Bɛt nuŋgɔ. Hi dag ya̧a̧rhant gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi mɔmhin an hi wɛɛsɛ gbɔnɔdorkyaadɛ.

Nɛ mɛɛ a za̧a̧nyɔ er bɛttɔnɔ gi mɔm ya̧a̧rhanto, wɛ raak gii a gin hat ma mi? Nɛ lag Ayoba hinmɔŋkɔ bɔ dɔglɔ. Nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ Waar Bɛt gaag kuudu. Ya̧a̧nɛ ya̧a̧rmɛɛk tɔɔtɔ a Waar Bɛt kpoos du hi hinrɔbgɔki.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, hinyɔ daarlɛl sɛw, bɔnɛ dɛŋglhinɛ hi bɛtha nuŋgɔ, hi hɛbt nuŋgɔ, an hi nɔ nɛ hɛw bɔnɛ dɛŋglinu. Raakɔ: a hɔɔ, zaabe a ɛ̧-ɛ̧, rii anbɔ; bɔgi daar bɔrɔ an bɔ̄ Bɛt gi gbaasin dɔglɛ.
Doo za nɛ teesdu gi ya̧a̧ryɔ̧kyɔ̧ ya? Zɔ̧g Bɛto. Doo za gi hat dak ya? Ɛɛg hin-ɛɛn Bɛt-baanikya.
Doo za gumtil gigi nɛ teesdu ya? Gi el ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwoos-kaŋkigya wɔ hi zaa hi zɔ̧bsig Bɛto, hi wɛɛ hi gɛbsig hi kurumi a Waar Yeesu nuŋg du.
Zɔ̧k bɔ gi ɔks hi ɗɔbsigi gi za̧a̧s gumtil bɔ. Waar Yeesu gi za̧a̧sige gi ɗunsig ha, gi wɛɛ gi bitsig hinha̧a̧l wɔ da woo nɛ sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ, walkin hinha̧a̧l nɛ a nɛ teesdu, zɔ̧btinnɛ Bɛto an nɛ za̧a̧. Doo hinrɔbwookya Bɛtzɔ̧kɔ gin tɛŋk gbɔɔltɔnɔ.
Eliya gi doo an wɛya. Zɔ̧b Bɛt hi kpoosɔ sɛw an bɔ bɛl gi naŋgɔ. Loo wɛl taarɛ hi sɛɛ nɔɔn-gbunu bɛl naŋg gɛ.
Wɛɛ zɔ̧g ɓɛ, bɛl naŋgɔ, hɛbt wɛɛ yɛɛl lees gaaki.
Yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, doo za gbun a nɛ teesdu gi hɛɛ gbɔnɔ rɔb bɔ, doo za gi wɛnzig a gedu,
mɛɛnɛ a za̧a̧nyɔ zɛmz doo hinha̧a̧lya bɔ gi fɔk gbɔnɔ a̧a̧bi gi wɛnzig a gbɔnɔ rɔb bɔ gedu, za̧a̧s za̧a̧n bɔ kol ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, wɛɛ yaat hinha̧a̧l kittɔnɔ. Anbɔ.
Mii Piyɛr Yeesu Kristu tɔmsɔya, mii bi̧i̧ ɗɛɛrwol yɛrɛ. Mi yaasig dood wɔ hi gi rɔ̀bɛ hi hɛks hi gi a Pɔntus, a Galatiya, a Kapadokiya, a Aaziya, hi a Bitiniya waal du.
Baa Bɛt yɔ mɛɛhin sɛw gi dorɔ, herin hi Mɔkilɔ yɔ wɛɛnin dood ɔnɛ an nɛ kɛms Yeesu Kristu tɔnɛ, gii be gi wɛɛ gi gaas kpoos nɛ hi ga̧a̧mɔ. An Bɛt gɛmsilɔ hi boolumi hi gisin tɔɔko tɔɔko.
Yɛwɛ baan Bɛt yɔ gi Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu Bɛtɔ hi Baatɔ! Anyɔ mɛɛsɛ ya̧a̧r gbɔɔltɔnɔ gi gaawɛ za̧a̧tig sego hi Yeesu Kristu rɛmtigɔ bɔ a wɔrkɛ teesdu an wɛ gbaak mɔkil wɛ a wɛ dag za̧a̧tig faa.
Wɛ wɛɛ wɛ mɛɛ a wɛ dag hinrɔb yɔ Bɛt gbaas doodɔ hiya. Bɛt gbaasɛ rɔɔsɔ gi a bɛtha. Rɔɔsɔ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi dog gɛ, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi ha̧tir gɛ, wɛɛ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi ɓɛ̧ɛ̧r gɛ be.
Anyɔ nɛ ɗɔbsig Bɛto, Bɛt gin ook hi tɛŋkɔ a za̧a̧tig nɛ yɔ gɛms gi da̧a̧ an gi zuunig a ɔ̧t yɔ̧ɔ̧sum bɔ gedu gi dɔŋgo.
Dagin hat a rɔɔs bɔrɔ gi dɔŋgo, gi gi nɛ an ɓɔri hɛw ya̧a̧rhant zaadɛ sɔmsɔm hi zɛ̧nɛ, hi kɔm ɔ̧t kaasi du hɛw.

Bɛt gi gook ɗɔbsig nɛ bɔ hi ya̧a̧rhant an gi zuun a gi hinrɔbo. Hɛɛlmɔt yɔ gɔ wāā faa gɛ, gɔ hi yaag laa du gi ya̧a̧ an hi googe. Yɔ anbɔ, ɗɔbsig nɛ taa hin gbɔɔl dāār hɛɛlmɔt bɔ gɛ ya? Gi an hi googe an hɛɛlmɔt bɔ be. Yɛrɛ nɛ́ waak ɗɔbsigi anyɔ ya̧a̧rhant gi nɛ si̧, banti, ɗɔbsigi hi gbɔlumsɛ hi giro a ɔ̧tyɔ Yeesu Kristu gɔ gi mits dood gedu.

Anyɔ nɛ gbɛn Yeesu Kristu gɛ nɛ si̧, gin ha̧a̧k a ge. Anyɔ nɛ gbɛnig nɛ gɛ ɓɛ, nɛ ɗɔbsige wɛɛ kpoos nɛ gi kpɛ̧ɛ̧ gi daarlɛlɛ, nɛ dag hat yɔ doo ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi raa hinɔ gɛ. Hat bɔrɔ hatɔ be, tɔɔ hi Bɛt gbɔlumsɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ nɛ dag ɗɔbsig nɛ dɔɔrɔɔs yɔ gi kol nɛ za̧a̧tigɔ giya.
Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ hi tɛb nɛ za̧a̧tig yɛrɛ dɔglɔ ha̧a̧l-tɔnɔ, hi wɛɛ hi dɔg nɛ Bɛt gɛmsil yɔ gɔ nɛ dag dɔglɔ.
Anyɔ Kristu Mɔkilɔ gi nɛ hi kpoos du be, Mɔkilɔ bɔ dɔg dorɔ a Kristu gi ha̧a̧ya̧a̧r kete ɓɔr gi ɔɔ gbɔlumsɔ dako. Bɛtya̧a̧-kɛŋkya wɔ hi tɛb nɛ za̧a̧tig dɔgl bɔ an hi mɛɛ ɔ̧tyɔ hin wɔrɔ gɔ hi tal du.

Bɛt zunsihi ɗɔglɔ a hin wɔrɔ hi ɓɛɛk anbɔ labɔ, hi taas zulya̧ ɓɛɛko, hi ɓɛɛsig nɛya. Yɛrɛ dood hi dɔgsin Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ, hi dɔgsin hin wɔrɔ dɔgsɔ hi Bɛt dɔglɔ hi Bɛt Mɔkilɔ tɛŋkɔyɔ fu̧u̧z a bɛtha. Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ hɛw ha̧a̧hi an hi gbɛn hin wɔrɔ hinya̧.
Yɔ anbɔ, mɔkin woosɛ hi lɛl-ook dɔgl rɔbtɔnɔ. Wa̧a̧n zul nɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gbaa mɔkil nɛ hi kpoos nɛ sɛw a Bɛt gɛmsilɔ yɔ gɔ gi gàan hage. A ɔ̧tyɔ Yeesu Kristu gɔ gi midza gedu.
Bɔnɛ fɔb ɗɔkum ha̧a̧l wɔ nɛ gihi nɛ fɔk amntɔnɔ yɔ nɛ mɛɛdir nɛ hin gɛ. Yɛrɛ wɛɛn an waat wɔ gɔ hi kɛmsig baaya̧ tɔnɛ.
Wɛɛn dood gaatɛ an Za̧a̧nyɔ elinɛ gi Doo gaat be. Nɛ gi wook nɛ hinɔ an nɔ, woosin Bɛt gii hi kpoos nɛ esigi.
Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa
a wɛɛn dood gaatɛ an bee yɔ be gi Doo gaat be, ya̧a̧nɛ.

Gɔ nɛ gi Bɛt zɔ̧ko nɛ gig elik a Baa Bɛto. Gii be, gɔ gis dood dɔgl-gbaak gbunu gbunu sɛw an bɔ be hi woosɔyɔ woo. Wɛɛ sɔ̧̄ɔ̧̄ doo za muutɔ gɛ. Hoob-ha̧a̧nɛg Bɛto a ɔ̧t nɛ yɔ zɛ̧rsin an nɛ waa gedu a hɛbtdi.
Nɛ mɛɛ a yɔ Bɛt ginɛ zek nɛ an gi tudzin a baa nɛ maakya̧ tɔs wɔ hi ɔɔnin nɛ gedu, tōō hinza an tusɛ, zaabe hi hɛɛlmɔt yɔ gɔ wāā faa gɛ an gi zemn za̧a̧tig nɛ bɔ gɛ.
Too Kristu ga̧a̧mɔ yɔ gi hin gbɔɔl yɔ daarlɛl giya. Kristu gi an tamwaa yɔ hi gbɛɛrige hi woons Bɛt maako, wɛɛ Bɛt zɛm bɛɛrɔ, hinza a̧a̧b taa a ge nɛ zaŋ.
Yɔ Bɛt kimdir nɛ waal kɛn gɛ, her Yeesu gaati. Yɛrɛ midzig gɔ ma a ɔ̧t yɔ̧ɔ̧sum du a nɛ dɔŋgo.
Nɛɛ be, nɛ ɗɔbsig Bɛt a Yeesu yɔ Bɛt ɗunsig a wɔrkɛ tees du gi wɛɛ gi gaag gbɔlums gi dɔŋgo. Yɔ anbɔ nɛ ɗɔbsig Bɛt giya nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gbaak mɔkil nɛ a hinyɔ gii gɔ gi woosin gedu.
Yɔ nɛ fɔk rɔb-gbɔnɔ, nɛ gaas zul nɛ gaas ma, wɛɛ ha̧a̧n yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi rɔbo. Yɔ anbɔ, ha̧a̧tinnɛ gbɔɔltɔnɔ hi kpoos nɛ sɛw.
Nɛ mɔɔy seg hi dɔ̧ɔ̧t za yɔ gɔ ha̧tir gɛ, nɛ mɔɔy hi dɔ̧ɔ̧t yɔ gi kɔmbik faa: gɛ Bɛtdɔglɔ za̧a̧tigya bɔ gɔ waa faa giya.
Gi anyɔ Bɛt ɗɛɛrwolɔ raa
a dood sɛw hi gi an hɛto, gbɔlumsya̧ sɛw riitin an hɛtkɔ̧ɔ̧rɛ. Hɛt gɔ kootɔ, kɔ̧ɔ̧rɔ bɔ mɛɛ hɛbtdi.
Yɛrɛ Waar Bɛt dɔglɔ gi waak faa.
Dɔgl bɔrɔ gi Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ hi dɔgsin giya.
Yɛrɛ, bisin hinyɔ gɔ hi el a bɔbs yɔ gi sɛw, ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, mɛlɛ, ka̧a̧si, hi ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l yɔ gi sɛw.
Yɔ nɛ gi an waat burko, yɛgi ha̧a̧n wa̧a̧l gaat mɔkilya bɔ an waayɛ̧s yɔ gɔ ha̧a̧g nɔɔtɔ wa̧a̧l be, an nɛ tɔɔn nɛ za̧a̧nɔ.
Nɛ́ dag Waar Yeesu dɔglɔ hɛmntigɔ dag be, nɛ́ mɛɛ gɔ a Waar bɔ gi Doo rɔbo.
Zaan a Waar Yeesu ge. Gii gi bet za̧a̧til yɔ dood hi bisige. Anyɔ Bɛt herig nɛko, wɛɛsig hin rɔb yɔ daarlɛlɛ.
Nɛɛ hɛw, ɔɔn Bɛt gi loon an bet za̧a̧tili gi wɔmnin lukɔ yɔ Mɔkilɔ gɔ gi waa gedu. Nɛ wɛɛsig maakwookɔya gaatɛ an nɛ gɔsig maak rɔb mɔkilyaadɛ wɔ hi bɛsig a Yeesu Kristu dɔŋgo.
Hinɔ gii hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du:
a sɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, be gbaak bet za a Siyona, bet gbɔɔl tɛŋkya yɔ be herige gi wɛɛ hin rɔb yɔ daarlɛlɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbsige seem taag wa̧a̧k nɛ zaŋ.
Nɛɛ yɔ nɛ gig ɗɔbsig be, wɛɛsin hin rɔb yɔ daarlɛlɛ. Wɔ hi ɗɔbs gɛ be, hi bi̧i̧ dɔglya̧
a bet yɔ lukwɔŋkya wɔ hi bisige, gii wɛɛ bet gbɔɔl tɛŋkya.
Hi wɛɛ hi bi̧i̧ ɓɛ:
a bet dɔɔsiŋkya, hɛɛl doodmatigya.
Yɔ hi ta̧a̧ Bɛt dɔgl kɛŋk gɛ gii hi siŋk dɔɔ. Bɛt nagsihi anbɔ.

Yɛrɛ nɛya, nɛ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧t yɔ Bɛt herig giya, nɛ gi. Waar bɔ Bɛt maakwookyaadɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧, nɛ gi dood gaatɛ, nɛ gi Bɛt dood ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ an nɛ dɔg woosɔ gbɔlɛ wɔ. Gii elzinɛ gi tudzin a lɛlwil du, wɛɛ gbaan a lɛlgaalɔ gɛrsya bɔ gedu.
Yɔ da doosɛ, nɛ taa nɛ Bɛt doodɔ, yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ, nɛ wɛɛ dood ɔ̧ɔ̧n ma. Da doosɛ, Bɛt mɛ̄ɛ̄sirnɛ ya̧a̧r kɛn gɛ, yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ, mɛɛsin ya̧a̧r mɛɛsɔ.
Saam mi rɔbɛ wɛ, nɛ gi an rɔ̀bɛ gbɔnɔdaakyaadɛ a waal yɛrɛ gedu. Ya̧a̧nɛ mi zɔ̧nɛ, bɔnɛ ɔs muulɗɔkum wɔ gbɔnɔ an hi gaa kol nɛ nɔko hi ha̧tirge.
Waan rɔbtɔnɔ a dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ hi tees du. An hi gin seek an hinha̧a̧lwookyaadɛ, hi gi book ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l nɛ zul ha si̧, ɔɔnɛhi hi gbɛn woos nɛ rɔbɛ wɔ, hi ɗɔbs Bɛt a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ gi zaa gedu.
Tiitsin dood nabl wɔ sɛw zul nɛ, a Waar Yeesu dɔŋgo. Tiitsin waar gbɔɔl hɛbtzulya Kaysara yɔ gi waar ɛ zaadɛ waar ya̧ zulɛ.
Tiitsin waar ɛ dɛɛt wɔ zulɛ. Waar gbɔɔl bɔ herihi gbaahi an hi gaa hinha̧a̧l wookya wɔ ya̧a̧rhanto, hi wɛɛ hi baan hinrɔb wookya wɔ be.
Hinyɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧g gɛ: a rɔbnɛwook bɔ gii gi gɔ an dood yoo wɔ hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ hin gɛ hi book ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l nɛ zulha hi waksɔ.
Waan an dood wɔ hi dag zulya̧ aakil du. Nɛ yɔ anbɔ, bɔnɛ oo zul nɛ gik bɔ aakil du an gbandili nɛ yaatin hinha̧a̧l nɛ. Lab gɛ! Woonhin an Bɛt woosyaadɛ.
Ɗɔbsin dood sɛw. Gi ha̧a̧nɛ yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ sɛw, hoob ha̧a̧nɛg Bɛto, ɗɔbsin waar gbɔɔl hɛbtya bɔ.
Woosya wɛ, tiisin zul nɛ a baa nɛ dɔŋdi hi hoob gbɔɔltɔnɔ. Gid hi gi dood rɔbɛ zulhɔnikyaadɛ, zaabe, dood gabsɛ, gborin zul nɛ tiisigi.
Za̧a̧nyɔ wōō nɛ hinza ha̧a̧l yɔ rı̄ı̄ an hi gaag ya̧a̧rhant dɔŋgɔ ge gɛ, wɛɛ hi gig gaak kosgumn be, gid mɔm kosgumn bɔ a Bɛt zulɛ bɛɛrɔ.
Wɛɛ hí gin lɛk a hinha̧a̧l nɛ yɔ nɛ woo gi dɔŋgo nɛ wɛɛ nɛ mɔŋk kosgumn bɔ, bɔ gi bāānin nɔ? Yɛrɛ hi gin gaak ya̧a̧rhant a hinrɔb yɔ nɛ wook gi dɔŋgo, nɛ́ wɛɛ nɛ́ mɔŋk kosgumnɛ, hinɔ gii bɛs Bɛto.
Bɛt elzin an nɛ woo anbɔ. Kristu yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant a nɛ dɔŋ be, wɛɛsin gbɔnɔdorkya an nɛ fɔb tɛ̧ɛ̧sɔ nɛ woo an giya.
Gii ɔ̧nɛ wōō hinha̧a̧l gɛ, gɔ̧ɔ̧s doo za ya̧a̧ gɛ be.
Yɔ hi niige, wɛɛn gɛ; yɔ gi ya̧a̧ryɔ̧ko, gɔ̄ gabs gɛ. Gaa kolɔ a Za̧a̧nyɔ gi yɛ̧ɛ̧k dɔgl hi gbɔnɔ gi naan du.

Gii hi zulɔ yɛr hinha̧a̧l wɛ, pɛɛnihi muul ɔnɛ a tɛ̧ɛ̧gbeet ha yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant a wɛ kalɛ an wɛ wɛɛ wɔrkɛ a hinha̧a̧l gbaŋgi, wɛ wɛɛ wɛ za̧a̧ a waabil riit gbaŋgi. Nɔk diilɔ wɔ dagɔ hi za̧a̧sin muul nɛ.
Da amntɔnɔ, nɛ gi nɛ ɛmbik di tɔs an tamɔ. Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ nɛ wɛɛz ma a Nɛɛra nɛ kol nɛ Ookya bɔ gi dɔŋdi.

Gbunɔ, nɛɛd wɛ, tiisin zul nɛ a wal nɛ hi dɔŋdi. An zaadɛya̧ hi ɗɔbs Bɛt dɔgl gɛ, gɔ hi gbɛn waabil nɛ rɔb bɔ, gi gaahi ɗɔbsigi, an nɛ boo nɛ dɔgl gbun mɔɔt gɛ si̧, hi zɛmr kpoosya̧, hi ta̧a̧ Waar Yeesu.
Yɔ hi gbɛn hoob gin ha̧a̧k Bɛto hi waabil nɛ gaati gii hí zɛmr mɔkilya̧.
Bɔnɛ mɔk an nɛ wɛɛn hinyɔ gi kuuha gii bɛti hi zul haŋki, hi wɔd za wɔ hi gɔn hɛɛlmɔto nɛ hek a muulɛ an kɔ̧ɔ̧tigi hi gbandil bɛti.
Yɛrɛ bɛtig nɛ yɛgi fu̧u̧z a nɛ kpoos du. Gig bɛtig rɔb yɔ gɔ ha̧tir gɛ. Raakɔ a nɛ wɛɛ dood zulhɔnikyaadɛ hi kpoos saŋktyaadɛ. Hinbɔ lab gii gi hinɗɔbt yɔ daarlɛl a Bɛt muutdu.
Amntɔnɔ, nɛɛd gaatɛ wɔ hi gbaa mɔkilya̧ a Bɛt ge, hi gbaa kɔ̧ɔ̧tig a kpoos du anbɔ be, hi wɛɛ hi tiis zulya̧ a walya̧ dɔŋdi be.
Mɔkin Saratu dɔglɔ yɔ kɛms Abraham tɔnɛ wɛɛ elig a ɗɛntyɔ. Nɛ gi wook rɔb kol gi tuun hinza gɛ, nɛ wɛɛ Saratu wāāt ma.

Gbunɔ, nɛɛ walɛ wɛ, ɗɔɔtin rɔbtɔnɔ hi nɛɛd nɛ. Mɛɛn a nɛɛd tɛŋkya̧ rı̄ı̄tin hi tɛŋk nɛnɛ gɛ, ɗɔbsinɛhi. Ya̧a̧nɛ, hii be, Bɛt rɔ̀bsihi gaahi za̧a̧tig hi nɛɛ lɛlgbunu, ɗɔbsinɛhi an bɔ hinza gi ans zɔ̧k nɛ gbɔnɔ tuurikɔ a Bɛt ge.
Yɔ̧ɔ̧sumɔ, nɛɛ sɛw, ɔksin kpoos nɛ lɛlgbunu, mɛɛtinnɛ ya̧a̧rɛ, gi ha̧a̧tinnɛ an yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkyaadɛ, ginin kpoos rɔbo, tiisin zul nɛ.
Bɔnɛ wɛɛn ha̧a̧l a za̧a̧nyɔ gɔsin ha̧a̧l ge, bɔnɛ nii za̧a̧nyɔ niinɛ. Yɛrɛ rɔbsin dood sɛw. Bɛt elin an nɛ rɔbsihi, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ dag rɔbs a Bɛt naan du be.
Yɔ anbɔ, hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du:
a za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g an gi dag hat a gi waabil du, gi ha̧a̧g an hin sɛw gi resig bɛttɔnɔ, ɔɔg ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l booki, ɔɔg mɛl-eer bookɔ be;
ɔɔg ha̧a̧lɛ, woog hinrɔbo, tɛg boolumi, i̧i̧yig tɛŋk an gi zɛmɔ.
Waar Bɛt gaas lɔlɔ an gi seez dood riitɛ wɔ hiya. Gbaa tɔnɔ an gi kɛm zɔ̧kya̧. Wɛɛ gi seek ha̧a̧lwookya wɔ hi nɔɔtig lɔlɛ, gi zulɔ ɓaasig a hi gbaŋgi.
Gid nɛ fɔk hinrɔb hi kpoos nɛ sɛw, bɔ ɗɛɛ an gi gɔsin hinza nɔ?
An nɛ yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant a hinriit dɔŋg si̧, nɛ dag hato. Bɔ hoob gi ha̧a̧n hiya, bɔ zul nɛ gi namɔ.
Yɛrɛ gaan Kristu waar ums ɗɔɔtillɛlɔ nɛ kpoos du nɛ tiis zul nɛ gi dɔŋdi. Waan nɛ kɔm lɔlɛ. Gɔ gi anbɔ, za̧a̧nza gi ɛrin mɔkil nɛ yɔ nɛ gbaa Yeesu ge dɔglɔ, nɛ ɗɛ́ɛ an nɛ dɔks zul nɛ hin rɔbtɔnɔ.

Yɛrɛ gɔ nɛ gihi gooko, nɛ goohi hi zulhɔniki hi ɗɔbsigi, an kpoos nɛ gi er bɛttɔnɔ. Gid lab dood wɔ hi niik waabil nɛ rɔb bɔ ɔks hi Kristu, seem gi wa̧a̧hi a ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ hi boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l nɛ zulha gedu.
À Bɛt ha̧a̧g an nɛ yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant a hinrɔbwook dɔŋgo, hin bɔ lab daarɔ hi anyɔ gɔ nɛ yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant a hinha̧a̧l wook dɔŋgo.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, Kristu Doo Rɔbgɔkya bɔ wɔr a dood ha̧a̧l-gɔkya hinha̧a̧l dɔŋgo dɔɔ gbun gaati an gi ka̧wɛ a Bɛt ge. Wɔr yɔ̧ɔ̧sumyɔ, taa zaa wɔrk nɛ zaŋ. Dood hi gbɔm muulɔ, wɛɛ Bɛt wɛnz kolɔ a za̧a̧tig du.
Yɔ kolɔ wɛɛz a za̧a̧tig du anbɔ, re dɔks mɔkil wɔ hi gi luknɔ du Bɛt dɔglɔ.
Amntɔnɔ, yɔ Bɛt oo lɛl gi am a ɔ̧tyɔ Nɔwe gi dootig lɛmb gbɔɔl bɔ gedu, mɔkil wɔrɔ hí kɛ̄msigtɔn gɛ. Hinɔ gii dood kaasi, raakɔ, a dood gɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ hi za̧a̧ a mɛm ha.

Hin bɔ lab gi hintuusingoya yɔ gi zuunik Bɛtmɛm yɔ gɔ za̧a̧sinɛ. Gɔ nɛ dag Bɛtmɛmɛ nɛ taa muul nɛ hotig an nɛ ha̧s libto. Yɛrɛ nɛ ɛrk Bɛt an gi gaas kpoos nɛ gi er bɛttɔnɔ. Yɔ Yeesu Kristu rɛml a wɔrkɛ teesdu gii Bɛtmɛm bɔ gi za̧a̧sinɛ.
Yeesu dɔɔ a bɛtha, wɛɛ gi ɗɔɔtig a Bɛt naanrɔbo, wɛɛ wɛɛ doo gbɔɔl a Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi mɔkil tɛŋkyaadɛ wɔ hi zul ha sɛw.
Anyɔ Kristu yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant hi muulɔ, mɔkin an nɛ woo hin gbun bɔ gii sɛw: nɛ yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant an giya. Mɔkil bɔ lab gi gaan tɛŋko. Za̧a̧nyɔ yɔ̧ ya̧a̧rhant a muul du, ɔɔ hinha̧a̧l da̧a̧da̧ be.
Yɔ yɛɛl ɓɔryɔ gi tuur a ɔ̧t nɛ wɔ hi zɛ̧rsin waal du gedu, waan gedu anyɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧ge, bɔnɛ waa anyɔ ɗɔkum nɛ ha̧a̧l wɔ ha̧a̧hi.

Àmntɔnɔ nɛ fɔk nɛ dood wɔ hi mɛɛ Bɛt gɛ waabil ya̧a̧nɛ nɛ wook nɛ hinha̧a̧l yɔ daarlɛl yɛltɔnɔ, nɛ gaak nɛ muul nɛ an nɛ fɔb ɗɔkum wɔ nɛ kpoos du, nɛ wɔnik nɛ bumɛ, nɛ nak nɛ hin yɛmsbed, nɛ yɔ̧tingo nɛ bum lɛl gāanɛ, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ ɗɔbsig maak ha̧a̧l wɔ hi gi hintɔs. Hin wɔrɔ lab sɛw, nɛ woo riiri ma.
Yɛrɛ yɔ hi gbɛn a nɛ taa ɔksig hi hii an nɛ gaa zul nɛ a hinya̧ ha̧a̧l yɔ daarlɛl yɛ̧ltɔnɔ gedu gɛ, kɔmsihi gɛrsɛ, hi wɛɛ hi gin niiko.
Yɛrɛ ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi gbaas dood za̧a̧til wɔ hi wɔrkɛ wɔ dɔgl gedu gi riikri ma. Hii hɛw, hí wad woosya̧ yɔ hi woo a Bɛt muutdu dɔglɔ.
Hinɔ gii Kristu gi dɔgs wɔrkɛ wɔ Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ hɛw, an Bɛt gbaas muulya̧ dɔgl an dɔgl yɔ gɔ gi gbaas dood sɛw ɗa, mɔkilya̧ gi za̧a̧ an Bɛt Mɔkil yɔ gi za̧a̧til be.
Yɔ hin sɛw sɛ̧ɛ̧b da̧a̧ki, wa̧a̧n zul nɛ, kɔm lɔlɛ, an nɛ ɗɛɛ Bɛt zɔ̧ko.
Hin gbɔɔlyɔ daar hin zaadɛ wɔ gɛrɛ: waan gi hatinnɛ hi kpoos nɛ sɛw. Bɛt hatɔ gɔ yaat hinha̧a̧l kittɔnɔ.
Zebtinnɛ, a nɛ raa du hi hato; bɔnɛ mɔɔ.
An bɔ sɛw a nɛ teesdu kaŋkig gaas yɔ Bɛt gaage an nɛ ɗans yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu -fɔkya wɔ, ɗaatinnɛ an zɛnɛ wɔ hi ɗɛɛ Bɛt rɔbsɔ sɔmsɔm yɔ gɛmsinihi gbaak bɛttɔnɔ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi dɔk hinɛ, dɔgig anyɔ kɛm Bɛt ya̧a̧ɔ gi dɔko;
za̧a̧nyɔ gi woosig doodɛ wooge hi tɛŋk yɔ Bɛt gaage, an dood hi baan Bɛt a hinyɔ nɛ wook hi Yeesu Kristu nuŋgɔ sɛw gi dɔŋgo. Gbɔlumsɛ hi tɛŋko hi gi ge wɛlɛ hi wɛlɛ. Àanbɔ.
Saam mi rɔbɛ wɛ, ya̧a̧rhant gbɔɔl yɔ tursin an gi goo ɗɔbsig nɛ an laayɔ gɔ hi goon hɛɛlmɔto, bɔgi kɔmsin gɛrsɛ; bɔ hinyɔ gisin tuurik anbɔ gi yɔɔnɛ.
Yɛrɛ dagin hat anyɔ nɛ dak Kristu ya̧a̧rhantɔ bɔ nɛnɛ an nɛ wɛɛ nɛ dag hat ɓɛ, wɛɛ kpoos nɛ gi kpɛ̧ɛ̧ a ɔ̧tyɔ Kristu gbɔlumsɔ gɔ gi midza gedu.
Hi gin niik a Kristu nuŋg dɔŋgo, Bɛt Mɔkilɔ yɔ gbɔlumsɔ daarlɛl gi hi nɛya. Yɔ anbɔ nɛ́ dag hato.
Bɔ za̧a̧nza a nɛ teesdu gi yɔ̧ya̧a̧r an zulgbɔŋkya, zaabe an luuri, zaabe an hinha̧a̧lwookya, zaabe an doo ya̧a̧gutigya hɛw.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nza gi gi ya̧a̧ryɔ̧k an Yeesu fɔkya be, bɔ seem gi ha̧a̧ge, baanig Bɛt a Yeesu nuŋg dɔŋgo.
Ya̧a̧nɛ dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧t bɔ riiri, Bɛt gi yɛɛlik dɔglɔ gbaak bɔ a doodɔ tees du. Gi gi yɛɛlik a wɛ teesdu anbɔ, nɛ dood wɔ hi taas Bɛt Dɔgl Rɔb bɔ kɛŋk gɛ hi wɛɛ ay ma be?
Anyɔ hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du a an doo riit bɔ dag za̧a̧tigi hi mɔɔt gbɔɔltɔnɔ, za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbs Bɛt gɛ be, hi hinha̧a̧lwookya wɔ, hi kɔm ay be?
Yɔ anbɔ, an dood wɔ hi ya̧a̧ryɔ̧k an hinyɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧ge hi ɔɔ kolya̧ a Za̧a̧nyɔ ki̧hi, Za̧a̧nyɔ rii an hi gbaa kpoosya̧ a ge, gi naan du, hi wɛɛ hi waa hinrɔb wooki.
Mi ɓaasig ɗɛntɛ Bɛtwooskaŋkigya wɔ a nɛ teesdu muulɛ. Mii yɔ mi gi ɗɛnt Bɛtwooszulya an nɛɛ be, mi gbɛn Kristu ya̧a̧rhantɔ bɔ yɔ̧, mí wɛɛ mí dag gbɔlums yɔ gɔ gi mida minɛ be.
Oon tam wɔ Bɛt gaan naan du an nɛ kaŋkihi; oonɛhi hi kpoos nɛ sɛw an hinyɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧ge, hi taan fɛ̧ɛ̧ko. Oonɛhi hi hato, taa hi rɔɔsɗɔkum ha̧a̧l a kpoos du.
Bɔnɛ wɛɛ waar ɛ a dood wɔ Bɛt gaanɛ hi zulha. Lab gɛ, yɛrɛ wɛɛsin tam wɔ gbɔnɔdorkya rɔbɛ.
Gɔ gi anbɔ, Nɛɛra Gbɔɔl bɔ gɔ gi midza, nɛ dag waar umskal gbɔɔl yɔ gɔ haŋs gɛ an dɔɔrɔɔs nɛ.
Gbunɔ, nɛɛ walɛsɛrɛ wɛ, tiisin zul nɛ a ɗɛntɛ wɔ hi dɔŋdi. Nɛɛ sɛw wɛɛtinnɛ zulhɔnikyaadɛ. Hi bi̧i̧ a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol du a Bɛt gɔ kpɛ̧ɛ̧ zulpɛɛkya wɔ gbɔnɔya̧,
Bɛt gɔ ɓaas zulɔ a zulpɛɛkya wɔ hi gbaŋgi, wɛɛ gi zultiisigya wɔ rɔbtig gaako.
Yɔ anbɔ, tiisin zul nɛ a Bɛt Tɛŋkya bɔ gi dɔŋdi, an ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi ha̧a̧ge gi wɛɛnin gbɔlɛ.
Bɔnɛ mɔk hinza, gaan mɔkil nɛ sɛw a Bɛt ge, anyɔ gin ooko, gi gin kaŋkugo.
Kɔmbin lɔlɛ, oonɛ. Loorɛha̧a̧lɛ, lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧niknɛya bɔ gi gbɛ̧ɛ̧kig lɛl sɛw gi tɛk dood an naamnɔɔ yɔ gi tɛk nambo an gi tɔbrige gi hirk nɔɔha.
Yansinɛg gbɔnɔ hi ɗɔbsil nɛ yɔ er bɛttɔnɔ a nɛ kpoos du hi tɛŋko. Nɛ mɛɛ a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ waal du sɛw hi yɔ̧k ya̧a̧rhant gbun bɔ gii an nɛya.

Yɛrɛ gɔ nɛ yɔ̧ya̧a̧r gi am kaasi, Bɛt hi zulɔ, gi gɛmsinɛ, gi esinɛ, gi gaan tɛŋko, an nɛ er bɛttɔnɔ an hɛɛlkpari a zɛɛ du. Bɛt yɔ gi waasig dood sɛw rɔbtig gɔk hi gbɔnɔ sɔmsɔm, elin an nɛ ɔks hi gii a gbɔlumsɔ yɔ gi faa gedu a Kristu naan du.
Tɛŋk gi ge faa. Aanbɔ!

Mii Piyɛr , Silas yɔ mi ta̧a̧ge an yɛ̧ɛ̧ mi rɔb Yeesu fɔkya gii ɗaasum ɗɛɛrwolwaa yɛrɛ bi̧i̧ko. Ha̧a̧m an mi ɓatsin muulɛ mi dɔgsin hin bɛttɔnɔ: a hinyɔ nɛ zaŋgik yɔ gi Bɛt gɛmsilɔ rɔb dɔglɛ. Waan hi kpoos nɛ sɛw a Bɛt gɛmsilɔ bɔ gedu.
Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi gi a Baabila, dood wɔ Bɛt sɛ̧ɛ̧hi an nɛya hi boon du hi waa mi Markus hɛw.
Bootinnɛ hi yɛ̧ɛ̧dums hato. Wɔ nɛ gi Kristu doodɔ, an boolum gigi hi nɛɛ sɛw. Aanbɔ!
Mii Simɔŋ Piyɛr , Yeesu Kristu woosɔya hi tɔmsɔya. Mi bi̧i̧sig dood wɔ hi dag ɗɔbsig yɔ gi hinɗɔbt an winɛ bɔ a Yeesu Kristu yɔ gi Bɛt wɛ hi Za̧a̧sigya wɛ woos riitɔ bɔ gedu.
An gɛmsili hi boolumi hi waak tɔɔk a nɛ kpoos du anyɔ nɛ tɔɔk a mɛɛk yɔ nɛ mɛɛ Bɛt gedu hi Waar wɛ Yeesu be.
Anyɔ wɛ mɛɛ Bɛt yɔ elɛ an wɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɔlumsɔ hi rɔbgɔkɔ wɔ hi gi ɔ̧nɛ, gii woohin wɛ kpoos du hi tɛŋkɔ gbɔɔlɛ gi gaawɛ hinyɔ ha̧a̧wɛ sɛw an wɛ za̧a̧ wɛ wɛɛ wɛ fɔg hi gbɔnɔ.
Bɛt gbɔlumsɔ bɔ hi woos rɔbɔ bɔ hii gaawɛ hin gbɔɔl yɔ tɔɔ gi daarlɛlɛ hi hinɗɔbt yɔ Bɛt raa a gi gaawɛ, an nɛ ɔks anbɔ a ɗɔɔtilɔ bɔ gedu, an nɛ nɔɔ lɛlha̧tirgo yɔ gi a waal du a ɗɔkum ha̧a̧l dɔŋgo.
I̧i̧n tɛŋk nɛ sɛw an nɛ wɛɛ nɛ gòks woos rɔb nɛ a ɗɔbsig bɔ geha; a woos rɔbɛ wɔ geha, gòòn hinmɛɛki;
a hinmɛɛk bɔ geha gòòn zulhɔniki, a zulhɔnik bɔ geha, gòòn hinmɔŋk rɔbo; a hinmɔŋk rɔb bɔ geha, gòòn Bɛt fɔk hi gbɔnɔ.
A Bɛt fɔk hi gbɔnɔ geha, gòòn yɛ̧ɛ̧dums hato; a yɛ̧ɛ̧dums hat bɔ geha, gòòn hat a dood muul sɛw.
Yɔ anbɔ gid hin wɔrɔ hi gi a nɛɛge, hi wɛɛ hi tɔɔk nɛ kpoos du, yɔ ansin hɛ̧ɛ̧rwɛɛki, yɔ a̧a̧n an bɔ̄ ɛmbil nɛ gi kɔm tɔs an tɛ̧ɛ̧yɔ kirkɔ, yɔ tɔɔsin nɛ re doosɛ hi Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu mɛɛkɔ,
yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ taan hin wɔrɔ gi kpoos du gɛ, kɔm an yɔ̧ɔ̧ryɔ, gbɛ̄n hɛmltɔnɔ gɛ, wɛɛ zɛn hinha̧a̧lɔ amntɛ wɔ da gaas nɛ dɔglya̧.
Yɔ anbɔ, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ mi wɛ, i̧i̧n tɛŋk nɛ du gi daarɔ an waakyɔ nɛ waako gi zuun gaattɔnɔ a Bɛt elinɛ wɛɛ herinɛ; ya̧a̧nɛ, gɔ nɛ gɔk anbɔ nɛ taa dɔɔ za siŋk ma.
Hi rɔbo, hi wookɔ anbɔ ro Bɛt gi gaan gbɔnɔ talk rɔbtɔnɔ a Waar wɛ hi Za̧a̧sigya wɛ Yeesu Kristu wáátɔ yɔ gi faa gedu.
Ya̧a̧nɛ mi wɛɛ mi look woosɔ an mi waasin hin wɔrɔ dɔglya̧ dɔk an nɛ mɛksɔ; anyɔ nɛ mɛks nɛ dɔglɔ gii hɛw, hi anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ nɛ rɔb yɔ nɛ i̧i̧yyik hi tɛŋk nɛ a gedu gii hɛw.
Yɛrɛ yɔ anyɔ mi waak a muul dokil yɛrɛ gedu da amntɔnɔ gi an mi kpòònɛ mi raasin hin nɛ mɛksɔ anyɔ kol mi gi kete.
Ya̧a̧nɛ mi mɛɛ a kuudu kaasi mi hod muul dokil yɛrɛ nɔɔktɔnɔ mi ɔɔ-ɔ an hinyɔ Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu raasim an mi mɛɛ.
Yɛrɛ mí kɛɛ woosɔ an gɔ nɛ mɔkɔ nɛ waak hin wɔrɔ mɛɛki kuudu gɔ mi wɔrɔ.
Yɔ wi raasin Waar wɛ Yeesu Kristu tɛŋkɔ hi zaakɔ, wí rāan hi bid wɔ dood hi midil hi kɛ̧ɛ̧tig gii gɛ, yɛrɛ wi gbɛn waar umsɔ gbɔlums hi lɔl winɛ.
Yeesu Kristu dag ɗɔbsigi hi gbɔlumsɛ a Baaba Bɛt ge yɔ ya̧a̧ za booyz hi ɗɔbsigzanɔ gbɔɔl a bɛtha a gi zulha: a yɛrɛ gi waa be yɔ ha̧a̧b ge hi kpoos be sɛw giya.
Wii hi zul wi yɔ wi gi nɛ hi gii a ga̧a̧t gaat bɔ geha ro wi lag ya̧a̧ bɔrɔ gi booyz a bɛtha.

Hin bɔ lab gii wa̧a̧ kpoos wi a Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya wɔ dɔglya̧ gi rɔbo; nɛ wook rɔbtɔnɔ nɛd gig ook rɔbtɔnɔ; gi an pitila yɔ gi gaak a lɛlwil du gi gaa gi tuur a lɛlgaakilya̧, gi tuur a ɔ̧tyɔ lɛlgaal gɔ gi tɔɔ nɛ kpoos du gedu an sɛwal bi̧i̧lum yɔ yɛɛl gaaki.
Yɛɛlin nɛ mɛɛ hinyɛrɛ: a Bɛt ya̧a̧ɔ yɔ hi bi̧i̧ a ɗɛɛrwol du doo za ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi wad hi hinmɛɛkɔ gɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ hinyɔ Bɛt boo gi ya̧a̧ du fu̧u̧z nɛ hinɔ a hinyɔ doo ha̧a̧g gedu gɛ zaŋ. Bɛt Mɔkil ɔ̧ɔ̧n gɔ kamz hinyɔ Bɛt gɔ raa, za̧a̧n bɔ gi yɛr gi boosig hinɔ.

Hɔnɛyɔ gi anbɔ, Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyaadɛ hi tuu a dood tees du hɛw. Hingokya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyaadɛ hí tuu a nɛ teesdu anbɔ be hí tal hi kɛ̧ɛ̧tig hí gbaa gɛ̧ksili, hí gokthin hi ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ an hi waksil doodɛ; hí wɛɛ hí faa Ɗɛnt wɛ Gbɔɔl bɔ Yeesu , Za̧a̧nyɔ za̧a̧sihi a hi hinha̧a̧l du hɛw. Yɔ anbɔ hi zul ya̧a̧n waksig ma nɔɔktɔnɔ bɔ.
Dood kittɔnɔ hí fɔb gbɔnɔya̧ zɛlkya waksilya bɔ, wɛɛ dood hi boo ya̧a̧ha̧a̧l a rɔb gbɔnɔ bɔ muulɔ a hi dɔŋgo.
Hi gɔ ɗɔkum an hi lehin wɔ nɛ ginɔ hi mɛl hɛmnti. Ya̧nɛ da amntɔnɔ dɔglya̧-gbaakya bɔ da giz dibed an gi gbaasihi dɔglɛ, wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gɔ gi ha̧tirihi taa yoko.
Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt gi ɔ̄ɔ̄ nɛ walɛsɛrɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ wɔ hi gɔ nɛ hinha̧a̧l gɛ, yɛrɛ yaahi a laazɛŋk du hi a zɛŋk lɛlwil dubtɛ du gihi oonik dɔgl-gbaak bɔ giya;
ɔ̄ɔ̄ hin amntɛ wɔ kim gɛ. Za̧a̧s Nɔwe, za̧a̧nyɔ gi dɔksig dood rɔbgɔk dɔglɛ hi doodɔ wɔ nɔɔn-erɛ. Tuus mɛm hi̧i̧s waal yɔ dood ha̧a̧l hi waak gedu.
Wɛɛ ɓɛ, Bɛt ɔ̄ɔ̄ waal gbɔlɛ wɔ Sodɔma hi Gɔmɔra gɛ, yaaz laa dɔ̧ɔ̧sihi wɛɛnihi an tam yɔ sɛn du hi ips gaati an gi zuns dood wɔ gɔ hi ta̧a̧ Bɛt ɗɔbsig gɛ hinyɔ gɔ gi tursihi ɔ̧tza;
wɛɛ za̧a̧s rɔbwookya bɔ Ludu yɔ gig fɔko yɔ kpoosɔ nɔɔsig ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ hi dood ha̧a̧l wɔ ɛmbilya̧ a zɛlkya̧ bɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Yɔ doo hinriitwookya bɔrɔ da ginɛ waak hi teesdu, kpoosɔ riit bɔ vimr ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ ɔ̧t nuŋg sɛw a hinyɔ gi gbɛŋko gi kɛŋk a Bɛtmaakɗa̧a̧kya̧ bɔ gi dɔŋgo.
Nɛ hin bɔ lab zunsɛ a Waar Bɛt mɛɛ za̧a̧sig yɔ gɔ gi za̧a̧s za̧a̧nyɔ gig fɔk hi gbɔnɔ a gi maatil du, wɛɛ mɛɛ ya̧a̧r yɔ gɔ gi ha̧a̧n dood ha̧a̧lwookya wɔ ya̧a̧rɛ gi gihi oonik a dɔgl-gbaak ɔ̧ti.

Dood wɔ gɔ gi ha̧a̧nihi ya̧a̧r gi daarɔ, gɛ dood wɔ hi yaak zulya̧ a muulɗɔkum du ha̧a̧ltɔnɔ an hi gɔ hatil ha̧a̧lɛ hi wɛɛ hi ɗa̧a̧k tɛŋk gbɔlumsya wɔ a bɛtha an bɔhi tiis zulya̧ a hi dɔŋdi. Hi gi kpoos ɓaatilyaadɛ, zulpɛɛkyaadɛ, hoobhā̧ā̧hi Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ wɔ a bɛtha niik gɛ.
Wɛɛ Bɛt walɛsɛrɛ zaadɛ gbɔlɛ wɔ hi daarin wɔrɔ tɛŋko, hi taasihi niit dɔgl kaŋk a Waar Bɛt muutdu.

Doodya̧ hi gi an nambhɛtim wɔ hi mɛɛhin gɛ, hi mɔɔhi an hinza̧a̧til wɔ hi taan mɔkili, wɔ dood gɔ hi wa̧a̧lihi hi gbɔ̧hi an nambo. Hi niik niit a hinwɔ hi mɛɛ dɔglya̧ gɛ hi zulha, yɔ anbɔ Bɛt gi waksihi an namb wɔ hi wak be,
hi dag ha̧a̧lya̧ bɔ dɔɔrɔɔsɔ ɔ̧nɛ. Hi dak hɛmntigya̧, hi gɔk zɛlk a lurk du hɛw; hi gi dood libtɛ hi ɓi̧i̧limyaadɛ. Gɔ hi lekhin hi nɛya hi dak hat a kɛ̧ɛ̧tigya̧ bɔ gedu.

Hi seenik nɛ̄ɛyɔ gi sɛw hi manslɔlɛ, hi hı̧̄ı̧̄ ha̧a̧l hinɔ gɛ. Hi maatig dood wɔ kpoosya̧ er bɛttɔnɔ gɛ hi dɔglya̧ fɔko, ɗɔkumya̧ gi rek a tus muulɛ, kpoosya̧ rɔ̧ɔ̧s anbɔ yɛɛl a̧a̧mɔ, hi gi Bɛt bootɔ waato.
Hi wag hi ɔɔ gbɔnɔ yɔ erɔ, hi fɔk Boosɔr waawal Baalam gbɔnɔ ɔnɛ bɔ giya, walɔ ha̧a̧g woos ha̧a̧l rɔɔs daki.
Anyɔ gin tɔnzuksɛ Bɛt dɔ̧ɔ̧lig hi pɛɛzum su̧u̧k ya̧a̧boon yɔ boonig an doo gi booko, kpɛ̧ɛ̧ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya bɔ Baalam yooɔya̧a̧ bɔ gɔ.
Dood wɔrɔ lab hi gi an mɛmkɔk yɔ ɔ̧ɔ̧sɔ, hi gi an kuus yɔ kùur gig niŋk a bɛtha. Bɛt gɔsihi lɛlwil dubt bibir gihi ooko.
Hi boosig dɔgl pɛɛkilya tɔs: hi maatingo dood hi zɛlk dɔglɛ hi muulɗɔkum dɔglɛ, dood wɔrɔ hi tuuz am gɛ a dood wɔ hi wag Bɛt gbɔnɔ hi teesdu hi dag za̧a̧tigi.
Hi wɛɛ hi gihi raak be, a hi dag zulya̧ aakil du, wɛɛ hii be hi zulya̧, hi gi lɛlha̧tirgo gbaaryɔ. Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ gi sɛw gi hinyɔ ɗɛɛg gbaar ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ.

Dood wɔrɔ hi da hi yɛɛl hi nɔɔ ɓi̧i̧lum yɔ waal du Waar wɛ Za̧a̧sigya Yeesu Kristu yɔ hi mɛɛg nɛ gi dɔŋgo, yɛrɛ hi wɛɛ hi gul a ɓi̧i̧lumɔ gedu ɓɛ, wɛɛ ɗɛɛhi, yɔ anbɔ, waabilya̧ bɔ̀bt daar doos bɔ ɗaarɔ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, ya̧nɛ ginɛ an bɔhi dag hinriit gbɔnɔ mɛɛk nɛ gii zaŋ, hi anyɔ hi mɛɛ gbɔnɔɔ lɛlɛ hi zɛmrɔ hi ɔɔ dɔglɔ gaat yɔ hi raa hi fɔkɔ.
Hinyɔ ya̧a̧daanik za rɔb gi dɔk tursihi:
a kaa wɛɛ gi lek wɛmtɔ, zaabe, a hab hotilyɔ.
Saammi wɛ, ɗɛɛrwol mi eesim bɔ mi bi̧i̧sin gɛrɛ ma. A ɗɛɛrwol yɛrɛ gedu hi zaabɔ mi da mi bi̧i̧sin nɛ gedu, mi tɛb an mi rɛms kpoos nɛ rɔb bɔ gii ha
an nɛ mɔkɔ nɛ mɛɛ hinyɔ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya gaatɛ wɔ hi da hi dɔg nɛ doosɛ hi Waar wɛ za̧a̧sigya bɔ dɔglɔ bɔ gaa tɔmsya nɛ wɔ hi dɔks doodɛ.
Mɛɛn gi dorɔ a ɔ̧t yɔ̧ɔ̧sum bɔ gedu, kpɛ̧ɛ̧likya zaadɛ wɔ hi waak anyɔ muulɗɔkumya̧ ha̧a̧hi hi midza hi kpɛ̧ɛ̧l hi raa:
a nɛ Yeesu raa a be zaak be, gaay ma nɔ? Nɛ baa wɛ hi wɔr amntɔnɔ, wɛɛ hin sɛw gi kɔŋk lɛlɔge anyɔ da ginɛ a waal yɛɛliki, yɔ waal ki̧yɔ, hinza zɛmr gɛ.
Ha̧a̧hi zɛnik a Bɛt da kim bɛtha amntɔnɔ hi dɔgl ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, hɛbt be tuu a mɛm du, Bɛt wɔmnig mɛm bɔ gii gi erɔ.
Da ha̧tir waal amnt bɔ hi mɛm hɛw, mɛm bɔ gi tuu gi hi̧i̧s hɛbto, hɛbt gi ha̧tiro.
Yɛrɛ bɛtha hi hɛbt yɔ ɓɔryɔ, Bɛt dɔglɔ gbun bɔ gii gig gbaako an kuudu gi wɛɛ gi ha̧tir hi laa. Hi gbaahi an ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi gbaas dood wɔ hi ɗɔ̄bsig gɛ dɔgl gedu gi tuurɔ gi ha̧tirihi.
Yɛrɛ saam mi rɔbɛ wɛ, hin gi gbunu bɔwɛ zɛnɔ. Waar Bɛt gi seek ɔ̧t gbunu an gi wɛl duko, gi seek wɛl duk be an gi ɔ̧t gbunu.
Dood zaadɛ hi raako: a Bɛt gi aŋk gbɔɔltɔnɔ, taa wook hinyɔ raa nɛ a gi woo. Taa anbɔ ro! Waar Bɛt gisin mɔŋko. Hā̧a̧g an doo za gi wag gɛ, ha̧a̧g an dood sɛw hi zɛmr kpoosya̧ hi zaa a ge.
Yɛrɛ Waar Yeesu ɔ̧tɔ be gi zaak an luuri; a ɔ̧tɔge bɛtha gi wagɔ hi nams hoobhantya gbɔlɛ wɔ. Ɔ̧ti, sɛɛ hi sɛwaato hi ya̧a̧ laa du, hɛbto hi hinwɔ hi gidu sɛw hi mug laa du.
Nɛ yɔ gi an hin wɔrɔ sɛw hi mug laa du anbɔ, nɛɛ be, ɛmbil nɛ gi an gi gaa, nɛ Bɛt fɔk hi gbɔnɔ,
nɛ oonik ɔ̧tɔ bɔ zaakɔ, nɛ i̧i̧k tɛŋk nɛ an gi zaa nɔɔko, a ɔ̧tɔge bɛtha gi kab laa gi ya̧a̧. Laazebt gi zɛm hinwɔ hi ki̧y sɛw gi muksihi!
Yɛrɛ Bɛt raa a gi gaawɛ bɛtha sego hi hɛbtdi sego, a lɛlyɔ rɔbwook gɔ gi waa gedu. Hinyɔ wɛ ook giibɔ.
Yɔ anbɔ saammi rɔbɛ wɛ, a hin wɔrɔ ookya̧ gedu, i̧i̧n tɛŋk nɛ an bɔ ɔ̧t bɔrɔ gi zaa gi zɛnɛ hi libt a kpoos du, an bɔnɛ gin a̧a̧bi a Bɛt muutdu, nɛ ɗɔɔtig rɔbtɔnɔ hi giya.
Mɛɛn a Waar wɛ hinmɔŋkɔ bɔ gis dood za̧a̧tig ya̧a̧nɛ anyɔ yɛ̧ɛ̧ wɛ rɔb bɔ Pol da bi̧i̧sin dɔglɔ an hinmɛɛk yɔ Bɛt gaag gi kpoos du.

Boosin hin bɔrɔ dɔglɔ anyɔ gɔ gi book a ɗɛɛrwol wɔ gi bi̧i̧k gedu sɛw. A lɛlyɔ gi book hin wɔrɔ dɔglya̧ gedu, lɛl za hi giro kɛŋkya̧ ɓaaɓa. Dood wɔ hi mɛɛhin gɛ hi wɔ kpoosya̧ hɔglɔ hi zɛmrik hin wɔrɔ gbɔnɔya̧ lɛlɛ anyɔ gɔ hi gɔk a Bɛt ɗɛɛrwol zaadɛ du. Yɔ anbɔ hi ha̧tirgo zul ya̧a̧nɛ.
Yɛrɛ nɛya, saammi rɔbɛ wɛ, mi dɔgsin hin wɛrɛ doorɔ, oon ma, bɔnɛ ɔɔ dood Bɛtmaakɗa̧a̧kya wɔ hi maatin hi hin-a̧a̧bya̧ an nɛ simdɔɔ nɛ mat a hinyɔ nɛ erk geha hi tɛŋko.
Yɛrɛ tɔɔn a Waar wɛ Za̧a̧sigya wɛ Yeesu Kristu gɛmsilɔ bɔ gedu hi hinmɛɛkɔ bɔ. Gbɔlums gi a ge ɓɔryɔ wɛlɛ hi wɛlɛ. Aanbɔ!

Mii Yohana, hi saam mi hiya, wi boonɛ. Hinyɔ wi gisin dɔglɔ dɔko ginɛ gi amntɔnɔ, yɛɛl a biitirnaandu yɔ Bɛt kimdir nɛ waal kɛn gɛ. Wi kɛŋge yɔ gi ya̧a̧booko, wi gbɛnig hi lɔl winɛ hɛw. Hɔɔ hi rɔbo, wi seege, wi ki̧i̧ge hi naan winɛ. Hinɔ gi ma za̧a̧tig dɔglɛ.
Yɔ za̧a̧tig bɔ midz wi gbɛnige, wi gisin dɔglɔ gii dɔko. Wi gisin dɔglɔ gii raako a wi gbɛn za̧a̧tig faa bɔ gi nɛ hi Baa wɛ Bɛto, gii wɛɛ gi midz a wɛ tees du.
Hinyɔ wi gbɛnɔ wi wɛɛ wi kɛmɔ wi gisin gii dɔk hɛw an nɛ ɔks hi wiya. Winɛ wi ɔɔksɔ hi Baa wɛ Bɛto, hi waaɔ Yeesu Kristu.
Wi wɛɛ wi gisin bi̧i̧k hin yɛrɛ an hat gi hi̧i̧s a wɛ kpoos du.
Dɔgl yɔ wi lag a Yeesu Kristu ya̧a̧ du wi gisin dɔk gɛrɛ a Bɛt gi lɛlgaalɛ, lɛlwil taa a ge zaŋ.
Gid wɛ raa a wɛ ɔɔksɔ hi Bɛto, wɛ wɛɛ wɛ ɛmbik a lɛlwil du be, wɛ ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧ko, wɛ́ wōō rɔb gɛ.
Yɛrɛ gid wɛ ɛmbik a lɛlgaal du anyɔ Bɛt gi lɛlgaal du hi zulɔ, wɛ ɔks lɛlgbunu, wɛɛ waaɔ Yeesu ga̧a̧mɔ giwɛ gaasig a hinha̧a̧l du sɛw.
Gid wɛ raa a wɛ taan hinha̧a̧lɛ, wɛ maatig zul wɛɛnɛ, wɛɛ wɛ taan rɔb a wɛ kpoos du.
Yɛrɛ gid wɛ walk hinha̧a̧l wɛ, gí bitsɛ hinha̧a̧l wɛ, gí gaasɛ a hin-a̧a̧b du sɛw. Yɔ anbɔ, Bɛt gii doo riiti, hinyɔ dɔg sɛw gi wooko, ya̧a̧luur hinɔ taa a ge.
Gid wɛ raa a wɛ́ wōō hinha̧a̧l gɛ, wɛ wɛɛnik Bɛt ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyayɔ, wɛɛ dɔglɔ taa a wɛ kpoos du.
Waat mi hatil wɛ, mi gisin hin yɛrɛ bi̧i̧k an bɔnɛ woo hinha̧a̧lɛ. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧n za gi woo hinha̧a̧l be, wɛ gin zeesya wɛ Yeesu Kristu doo riit bɔ a Baa wɛ Bɛt dɔŋdi.
Gii hi zulɔ wɔrɔ an gi wɛɛ hinha̧a̧l wɛ naandɛmsɛ a Bɛt ge, taa naandɛms wɛnɛ kpɔdi, yɛrɛ gi dood wɔ waal du sɛw hinha̧a̧lya̧ naandɛmsɛ.
Gid wɛ wa̧a̧k Bɛt dɔglɔ wɛ kpoos du, anbɔ, wɛ mɛɛ a wɛ mɛɛ Bɛto.
Za̧a̧nyɔ raa a be mɛɛ Bɛto gi wɛɛ gi wā̧ā̧ dɔglɔ wɔ raa gɛ, gi ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyayɔ, rɔb taa gi kpoos du.
Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ wa̧a̧ ɗɔglɔ, ɛmbilɔ zuun a Bɛt hatɔ tɔɔ da̧a̧da̧ hi giya. Hinyɔ gɔ wɛ mɛɛn a wɛ ɔɔksɔ hi Bɛt gɛrɛ:
za̧a̧nyɔ raa a be waak ɔksig gbun hi Bɛto, gi an gi waa an Yeesu yɔ waa be.
Saam mi rɔbɛ wɛ, dɔgl yɔ mi gisin bi̧i̧kyɔ taa dɔgl sego, gi dɔgl lɔ̀ɔyɔ, hi raasin hinɔ a biitirnaandu hɛw. Dɔgl lɔ̀ɔ̀ bɔrɔ gi dɔgl yɔ nɛ kɛm nɛ giya.
Yɛrɛ dɔgl yɔ mi gisin bi̧i̧kyɔ gi dɔgl seg hɛw. Yeesu ɛmbilɔ zuun a dɔgl bɔ gi rɔbo, wɛɛ ɛmbil nɛ gig zuunik hɛw. Yɔ anbɔ, lɛlwil gi wako, wɛɛ lɛlgaal rɔb bɔ yɛɛl gaakɔ da̧a̧da̧ ma.
Za̧a̧nyɔ raa a be waak lɛlgaal du, gi wɛɛ gi hɛ̧ɛ̧nik yɛ̧ɛ̧za Yeesu fɔkya lɔlɛ, gis a lɛlwil du tɛ̧.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧ge a yɛ̧ɛ̧za muulɛ, gi waak a lɛlgaal du. Hinza yɔ gɔ mat doo a hinha̧a̧l du taa a ge.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi hɛ̧ɛ̧nik yɛ̧ɛ̧za lɔlɛ gis a lɛlwil du. Gi ɛmbik a lɛlwil du hɛw. Yɔ lɛlwil bɔ wɛɛnig yɔ̧ɔ̧r be, mɛ̄ɛ̄ lɛlyɔ gi rek du gɛ.
Waat mi hatil wɛ, mi gisin hin wɛrɛ bi̧i̧k anyɔ Bɛt bis hinha̧a̧l nɛ a Yeesu dɔŋgo.
Baa mi wɛ, mi gisin hin wɛrɛ bi̧i̧k anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ Bɛt yɔ gi nɛ doosɛ, yɛɛl a biitirnaandu. Walɛsɛrɛ dɛ, mi gisin bi̧i̧k hin wɛrɛ, anyɔ nɛ ɗɛɛ Saydanu yɔ gi doo bɔbtini.

Ya̧a̧mwaat wɛ, mi bi̧i̧sin hin wɛrɛ anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ Baa wɛ Bɛto. Baa mi wɛ, mi bi̧i̧sin hin wɛrɛ anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ Za̧a̧nyɔ gi nɛ doosɛ, yɛɛl a biitir-naandu. Walɛsɛrɛ dɛ, mi bi̧i̧sin hin wɛrɛ anyɔ nɛ gi tɛŋk-yaadɛ, Bɛt dɔglɔ gi waak a nɛ kpoos du, nɛ wɛɛ nɛ ɗɛɛ Saydanu yɔ gi doo bɔbtini.
Bɔnɛ gbaa kpoos nɛ a waal du, bɔgi ha̧a̧nɛ hinwɔ hi gi a waal du. Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g waalɛ, hā̧a̧g Baa wɛ Bɛt gɛ.
Yɔ anbɔ, hinwɔ hi gi waal du sɛw, hinyɔ kpoos gi ɗɔkingo, hinyɔ lɔl gi ɗɔkingo, hi rɔɔs yɔ gi wɛɛnik dood an hi pɛɛ zulɛ, hin wɔrɔ sɛw hi fu̧u̧ a Baa wɛ Bɛt ge gɛ, hi fu̧u̧ a waal du.
Waal gi da̧a̧ko hi ɗɔkumɔ sɛw. Yɛrɛ za̧a̧nyɔ woo hinyɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧ge gi waak faa.

Ya̧a̧mwaat wɛ, wag kaasi waal gi da̧a̧! Nɛ kɛm a waal gɔ gi da̧a̧ko, Yeesu Kristu lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikya bɔ gi zaako. Yɛrɛ ɓɔryɔ, dood wɔ hi hɛ̧ɛ̧nik Kristu lɔl hi tuur ma, hi gis kittɔnɔ. Yɔ anbɔ wɛ mɛɛmɛ a waal sɛ̧ɛ̧b da̧a̧kyɔ.
Dood wɔrɔ hi tuu a wɛ tees du; yɔ hi taa wɛnɛ gɛ gii hi tùùwɛ. À hi ginɛ wɛnɛ, yɔ hi kɔmb nɛ hi wɛya. Yɛrɛ tuukya̧ bɔ zunsɛ a hi taa dood wɛnɛ hi sɛw.
Nɛnɛ nɛ dag Bɛt Mɔkil dagɔ a Doo Gaat bɔ gi naan du, nɛ sɛw nɛ mɛks hin mɛks ma.
Anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ rɔb gii mi bi̧i̧sin hin wɛrɛ, taa anyɔ nɛ mɛɛ gɛ, lab gɛ. Nɛ wɛɛ nɛ mɛ̄ɛ̄ a ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧n gɔ tuu a rɔb du gɛ.
Nɛ bɔ gi ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya? Gɛ za̧a̧nyɔ faa a Yeesu taa Kristu. Za̧a̧nyɔ gi hɛ̧ɛ̧nik Kristu lɔl gii faa Baa wɛ Bɛt hi waaɔ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ faa waa bɔ, taan Baa wɛ Bɛto; za̧a̧nyɔ
Nɛnɛ ɔnɛ, ɔɔn hinyɔ nɛ kɛm a biitirnaandu gi waa nɛ kpoos du. Gid hinyɔ nɛ kɛm a biitirnaandu gi waak nɛ kpoos du, nɛɛ hɛw nɛ́ waa ɔksig gbun hi waawal bɔ hi Baa wɛ Bɛt du.
Wɛɛ gaas yɔ raa a bé gaawɛ: gɛ za̧a̧tig faa bɔ.
Mi bi̧i̧sin hin wɛrɛ a dood wɔ ha̧a̧hi an hi wagsin gbɔnɔ hi zulɛ.

Yɛrɛ nɛya, Kristu gaan Mɔkilɔ gi waak nɛ kpoos du. Anyɔ Mɔkilɔ gi waak nɛ kpoos du hā̧ā̧n an doo za gi goksin hin ma gɛ. Mɔkilɔ gisin hingok a nɔ hinɔ ha sɛw, wɛɛ hinyɔ gi goko gi rɔbo, ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧n taa du. Waan ɔksig gbun hi Yeesu Kristu, anyɔ gogsinɛ.
Hɔɔ! Waat mi hatil wɛ, waan ɔksig gbun hi Yeesu Kristu, an ɔ̧tyɔ gɔ gi midza gedu wɛ dag kpoos saŋtimi, an bɔ seem gi wa̧a̧wɛ wɛ yaat a zaakɔ bɔ ɔ̧tɔge.
Nɛ mɛɛ a Kristu gi doo riityɔ, gi an nɛ mɛɛ hɛw a za̧a̧nyɔ woo hinyɔ rii mɔɔy a Bɛt ge gi Bɛt waayɔ.
Sɔ̧ɔ̧n ha̧a̧tig gbɔɔl yɔ Baa wɛ Bɛt ha̧a̧g hi wɛya, giwɛ elik a wɛ gi waat ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ; hi rɔbo, wɛ gi Bɛt waato. Ya̧a̧ gi dood waal du hi mɛ̄ɛ̄wɛ gɛ. Hi mɛ̄ɛ̄ Yeesu gɛ, gi nɛ an hi mɛɛwɛ ri nɔ?
Saam mi rɔbɛ wɛ, ɓɔri wɛ gi Bɛt waat ma. Yɛrɛ hinyɔ gɔ wɛ wɛɛ hinɔ midir kɛn gɛ. Yɛrɛ wɛ mɛɛmɛ a Kristu, Masihu bɔ gɔ gi midza, wɛ gbɛnige anyɔ giro, anbɔ, wɛ́ riitin hi giya.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi ook hinyɔ Kristu gɔ gi woosig anbɔ, gi wɛɛnik kpoosɔ gaati an Kristu yɔ gi Doo gaat be.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi wook hinha̧a̧lɛ gi ɗa̧a̧k Bɛt maakdɔglɔ gig wɛɛnik tɔsyɔ. Hinha̧a̧l bɔ wookɔ gi Bɛt maakɗa̧a̧kyɔ.
Yɛrɛ nɛ mɛɛ a Kristu midz an gi ha̧s hinha̧a̧lɛ; gii ɔnɛ hinha̧a̧l taa a ge.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi waak ɔks hi giya, taa hinha̧a̧l wooko. Za̧a̧nyɔ gi wook hinha̧a̧l be gbɛndir Yeesu kɛn gɛ, wɛɛ mɛ̄ɛg gɛ hɛw.
Waat mi hatil wɛ, bɔnɛ ɔɔ doo za gi maatinɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ gi wook hinyɔ rii gi doo riityɔ anyɔ Kristu gi doo riit be.

Za̧a̧nyɔ gi wook hinha̧a̧lɛ gi loorɛha̧a̧l doo ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ. Loorɛ-ha̧a̧l gi gbosig hinha̧a̧l wooki, yɛɛl a waalyɛɛliki tuur ɓɔryɔ. Yɔ gi nɛ an Bɛt waa bɔ gi ha̧tir loorɛha̧a̧l woosɔ wɔ gii gi midza wɛ tees du.
Za̧a̧nyɔ mɔɔy a Bɛt ge gi Bɛt waayɔ, taa hinha̧a̧l wooko, ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt dɔ̧ɔ̧tɔ za̧a̧tig seg bɔ Bɛt gaage, gi waak a gi kpoos du. Anyɔ mɔɔy a Bɛt ge, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi waa hinha̧a̧l wook ma gɛ.
Hinyɔ gi gɛ̧ɛ̧k Bɛt waatɔ hi loorɛha̧a̧l waatɔ gɛrɛ: Za̧a̧nyɔ taa hin riit wooko, zaabe gɔ gi hā̧ā̧ge a naaza Yeesu fɔkya muul gɛ, taa Bɛt waaɔ.
Dɔgl yɔ nɛ kɛm gi yɛɛl a biitirnaandu gɛrɛ a yɛnɛ gi ha̧a̧tin wɛ.

Bɔwɛ riitin an za̧a̧n bɔ nuŋgɔ a Kaynu, yɔ gi Saydanu za̧a̧n bɔbtin bɔ doo ɔnɛ gi lɛbr yɛ̧ɛ̧tɔ yɔ hi mɔɔtinihi buu gbun du. Gbɔŋg a nɔ dɔŋg nɔ? Gbɔŋg a hinriit yɔ gi wook gi dɔŋgo, anyɔ hinwɔ gii gi wook ha̧a̧lɔ.
Nɛya, yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ be, waal gi gin lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nuko, bɔ hinɔ gi kɔmsin gɛrsɛ.
Wɛnɛ wɛ mɛɛ a wɛ tuuz wɔrk du, wɛ wɛɛ wɛ gul a za̧a̧tig waal du da̧a̧da̧, wɛ mɛɛ anyɔ ha̧a̧wɛ a yɛ̧ɛ̧dɛ wɛ Yeesu fɔkya wɔ hi muulɛ, ya̧a̧nɛ. Za̧a̧nyɔ hā̧a̧g Yeesu fɔkya zaadɛ gɛ, gis a wɔrk du tɛ̧.
Za̧a̧nyɔ gi hɛ̧ɛ̧nik naaza lɔlɛ gi zul gbɔŋkyayɔ. Nɛɛ mɛɛ a zulgbɔŋkya taan za̧a̧tig faa; za̧a̧tig bɔ ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi waa gi kpoos du gɛ.
Hinyɔ wɛ mɛɛn Bɛt ha̧a̧kɔ ha̧a̧g gɛrɛ: anyɔ Kristu ta̧a̧ an gi wɔr a wɛ dɔŋgo, gi an wɛ ta̧a̧ an wɛ wɔr a nawɛza zaadɛ wɔ hi gi a Bɛt gbɔnɔ du hi dɔŋg be.
Yɛrɛ doo za gi gin rɔɔsɛ, wɛɛ gi gbɛn naaza gi ha̧a̧k ya̧a̧rɛ, gi tā̧ā̧ an gi mɛɛsigya̧a̧r gɛ, yɔ raa ri a ha̧a̧be Bɛt nɔ?
Waat mi hatil wɛ, bɔgi ha̧a̧wɛ a nawɛza zaadɛ hi ya̧a̧kosɛ, ɗɛwɛ zuun hat wɛ hi woosɛ hi rɔbo.
Gid ha̧a̧-tinwɛ, wɛ mɛɛ gɔ a wɛ gi Bɛt rɔb bɔ waat ɔ̧ɔ̧nɛ, kpoos wɛ gi saŋ gɔ ma a Bɛt muutdu.
Kpoos wɛ gi mɔksɛ a wɛ woo hinha̧a̧lɛ, Bɛt tɔɔ daar kpoos wɛ daarɔ, wɛɛ mɛɛ hin sɛw.
Sa̧a̧m mi rɔbɛ wɛ, kpoos wɛ gi mɔ̄ksɛ a wɛ woo hinha̧a̧l gɛ, wɛ gin kpoos saŋtum a Bɛt muutdu.
Yɔ anbɔ, anyɔ wɛ gi dɔglɔ wɔ raa wa̧a̧ko, wɛ wɛɛ wɛ wook hinyɔ harig be, wɛ dak hinyɔ wɛ gig ɛrk sɛw a gi naan du.
Dɔglɔ yɔ raawɛ: gɛ a wɛ ɗɔbs waaɔ Yeesu Kristu nuŋgɔ, gi wɛɛ gi ha̧a̧tinwɛ anyɔ Bɛt raawɛ be.
Dood wɔ hi wa̧a̧k dɔglɔ wɔ, hi waak ɔksig gbun hi Bɛto, Bɛt gi waak ɔksig gbun hi hii be. Hinyɔ wɛ mɛɛn a Bɛt gi waak ɔksig gbun hi wɛɛ gɛ Mɔkil yɔ gaazɛ gisɛ raako.
Sa̧a̧m mi rɔbɛ wɛ, bɔnɛ ɗɔbs mɔkil wɔ sɛw. Goonɛhi kɛnɛ an nɛ mɛɛhi hi rɔbo a kinsa hi fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge. Ya̧a̧nɛ Bɛt ya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyaadɛ kittɔnɔ hi ɛmbik a waali du.
Hinyɔ gɔ nɛ mɛɛn Bɛt Mɔkilɔ gɛrɛ: za̧a̧nyɔ
Wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ
Waat mi hatil wɛ, nɛnɛ nɛ fu̧u̧ a Bɛt ge, nɛ ɗɛɛ Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyaadɛ ɗɛɛ, ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ gi a nɛ kpoos du gin tɛŋk daar Saydanu yɔ gi a waal du daarɔ.
Bɛtya̧a̧kɛŋkya ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya wɔrɔ labɔ hi fu̧u̧z a waal du. Yɔ anbɔ hi book waal dɔglɛ, wɛɛ waal gisihi kɛŋk be.
Wɛnɛ wɛ gi Bɛt waato, wɛ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge. Za̧a̧nyɔ mɛɛ Bɛto gisɛ kɛŋko; wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ taa Bɛt waaɔ gɛ, fū̧ū̧ a Bɛt ge gɛ, taasɛ kɛŋko. Hinɔ anbɔ ro wɛ mɛɛn mɔkil rɔbo hi mɔkil a̧a̧bi.
Saam mi rɔbɛ, yɛnɛ gi ha̧a̧tinwɛ. Yɔ anbɔ, ha̧a̧tig fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge, wɛɛ za̧a̧nyɔ gin hat gi kpoos du gi Bɛt waayɔ, hi mɔɔg a Bɛt ge, wɛɛ mɛɛ Bɛt hɛw.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g Bɛto hi dooɗ gɛ ɔnɛ mɛ̄ɛ̄ Bɛt gɛ; anyɔ Bɛt gi hato.
Hinyɔ Bɛt zunsin wɛ gaattɔnɔ a ha̧a̧be wɛya: gɛ a yaaz waaɔ gbunsim a waal du an wɛ za̧a̧ gi dɔŋgo.
Hinyɔ wɛ mɛɛn a Bɛt ha̧a̧g wɛɛ gɛrɛ: taa an ha̧a̧ wɛɛ Bɛto, yɛrɛ ha̧a̧ gii a wɛɛge gi yaaz waaɔ an gi wɛɛ hinha̧a̧l wɛ naandɛmsɛ.
Saam mi rɔbɛ, Bɛt gi ha̧a̧g wɛɛ labɔ, wɛɛ hɛw yɛgi ha̧a̧tinwɛ.
Doo za gbɛ̄ndir Bɛt gɛ, yɛrɛ gi giwɛ ha̧a̧tingo, Bɛt gi waak ɔksig gbun hi wɛya, wɛɛ waabil wɛ zuun a Bɛt ha̧a̧tig tɔɔ da̧a̧da̧ wɛ kpoos du.
Anyɔ Bɛt gɛ̧ɛ̧sɛ Mɔkil ɔnɛ, wɛ mɛɛn gɔ a wɛ waak ɔksig gbun hi giya, gii be gi waak ɔksig gbun hi wɛya.
Winɛ wi gbɛɛnɔ a Baa wɛ Bɛt yaaz waaɔ an za̧a̧sigya a waal du, wi wɛɛ wi gi dɔglɔ gii raako.
Za̧a̧nyɔ
Wɛnɛ wɛ mɛɛmɛ, wɛ ɗɔbs a Bɛt ha̧a̧g hi wɛya, Bɛt gii gi hato. Za̧a̧nɔ gi ha̧a̧g Bɛt hi doodɛ, gi waak ɔksig gbun hi Bɛto, Bɛt be gi waak ɔksig gbun hi giya.
Hinyɔ gi zuunik a Bɛt ha̧a̧tigɔ tɔɔ da̧a̧da̧ a wɛ kpoos du gɛ: a anyɔ ɛmbil wɛ gi a waali du an Yeesu ɔnɛ be, wɛ mɛɛ a wɛ gin kpoos saŋtum a ɔ̧tyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi gbaas dood dɔgl gedu.
Hat ɔks hi hoob gɛ. Bɛt ha̧a̧tigɔ yɔ tɔɔ gi da̧a̧ a wɛ kpoos du nin hoob ninɔ, an yɔ hoob fu̧u̧ a ya̧a̧rhantyɔ Bɛt gɔ gi gaa dood gedu. Za̧a̧nyɔ hoobha̧a̧ge, Bɛt ha̧a̧tigɔ tɔ̄ɔ̄ dā̧ā̧ gi kpoos du gɛ.
Bɛt ha̧a̧ge a wɛɛge doos ro, ya̧a̧nɛ gi ha̧a̧wɛ a ge hi doodɛ.
Za̧a̧n za gi dɔg a ha̧a̧b Bɛto, gi wɛɛ gigi naazaza lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nuko, gi ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyayɔ. Za̧a̧nyɔ hā̧a̧g naaza yɔ gi gbɛnik gɛ rɛ, ɗɛɛ an gi ha̧a̧ge Bɛt yɔ gbɛnig gɛ ri ma nɔ?
Dɔgl yɔ Yeesu raawɛ: gɛ a za̧a̧nɔ gi ha̧a̧g Bɛto gi ha̧a̧g naaza hɛw.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbsɔ a Yeesu gii Masihu bɔ gi Bɛt waayɔ. Za̧a̧nyɔ ha̧a̧g a Baa wɛ Bɛt ge, ha̧a̧g waaɔ hɛw.
Gi ha̧a̧wɛ Bɛto, wɛ wɛɛ wɛ gi wook hinyɔ giwɛ raako, anbɔ, wɛ mɛɛ gɔ a ha̧a̧wɛ Bɛt waatɔ wɔ sɛw.
Hinyɔ raakɔ a ha̧a̧wɛ Bɛto: gɛ an wɛ wa̧a̧ dɔglɔ wɔ raawɛ an wɛ fɔbɔ. Dɔglɔ wɔ hi ɓāā gɛ.
Ya̧a̧nɛ, za̧a̧nyɔ mɔɔy a Bɛt ge sɛw gi ɗɛɛk waal ɗɛɛ. Wɛɛ hinyɔ wɛ ɗɛɛnik waal: gɛ ɗɔbsig wɛnɛ.
Bɔ gi ɗɛɛk waal nɔ? Doo za ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ gɛ, gɛ za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbs a Yeesu gi Bɛt waa kpɔd.
Gɛ Yeesu Kristu, zaan mɛmɛ hi ga̧a̧mɛ; zāā hi mɛm bɔ gii kpɔd gɛ, zaan mɛm bɔ hi ga̧a̧m bɔ eer sɛw. Segya yɔ gisɛ hin bɔrɔ zuunuko gɛ: Bɛt Mɔkil bɔ. Mɔkil bɔ be gi rɔbo, ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧n taa a ge.
Segyaadɛ taarɛ hi giro:
gɛ Bɛt Mɔkil bɔ, hi mɛm bɔ hi ga̧a̧m bɔ, hin taarɛ wɔrɔ sɛw hi ɔks ya̧a̧ya̧ gbunu.
Yɔ dood segya wɔ gɔ hi dɔk hinyɔ hi gbɛnɔ, nɛ wɛ ɗɔbs dɔglya̧ ɗɔbs ma mi? Mɛɛn a hinyɔ Bɛt gi dɔko tɔɔ daar hinyɔ dood gɔ hi dɔk daarɔ. Bɛt wɛɛ dɔg hin wɔrɔ lab sɛw hi zulɔ a waaɔ zulha.
Za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔ̄bs Bɛt waa bɔ mɛɛ du a hinyɔ Bɛt gi dɔko gi rɔbo. Za̧a̧nyɔ ɗɔbs hinyɔ Bɛt gi dɔk gɛ, wɛɛnig ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧n-yayɔ, anyɔ ɗɔ̄bs hinyɔ Bɛt gi dɔk a waaɔ zulha gɛ.
Hinyɔ Bɛt dɔgsɛ gɛrɛ: Bɛt gaazɛ za̧a̧tig faa, wɛɛ za̧a̧tig bɔrɔ gi a waaɔ naan du. Za̧a̧nyɔ kpoosɔ ɔks hi waa bɔ gin za̧a̧tig faa bɔ.
Za̧a̧nyɔ taan Bɛt waa bɔ gɛ be, taan za̧a̧tig faa bɔ hɛw.
Nɛɛ dood wɔ nɛ ɗɔbsig Bɛt waa bɔ, mi bi̧i̧sin hin wɛrɛ sɛw an nɛ mɛɛ a nɛ gin za̧a̧tig faa.
Wɛ gin kpoos saŋtum a zɔ̧k wɛ bɔ gedu a Bɛt muut du an yɛrɛ lɛ: wɛ mɛɛ a wɛ ɛrig hinza yɔ ha̧a̧ge, gisɛ kɛŋko.
Wɛɛ, gid wɛ mɛɛ a gisɛ kɛŋk hinyɔ wɛ gig zɔ̧k sɛwi, yɔ anbɔ gɔ wɛ bɛɛg hinzɔ̧ko, wɛ mɛɛ a wɛ dag hinɔ da̧a̧da̧ ma.

Za̧a̧nza gi gbɛn naaza gi wook hinha̧a̧l yɔ taa kaŋk a wɔrk du gɛ, zɔ̧bsigge Bɛto; Bɛt gi za̧a̧sige. Bɛt gi za̧a̧s wɔ hi wook hinha̧a̧l yɔ taa kaŋk a wɔrk du gɛ. Yɛrɛ hinha̧a̧l za giro, gi kaŋk a wɔrk du; mi rāā a nɛ zɔ̧b Bɛt a dood wɔ hi wook hinha̧a̧l bɔrɔ lab hi zulha gɛ.
Hin-a̧a̧b yɔ gɔ hi wook sɛw gi hinha̧a̧lɛ; yɛrɛ hinha̧a̧l za giro, gɔ kām doo a wɔrk du gɛ.
Wɛ mɛɛ a za̧a̧nyɔ mɔɔy a Bɛt ge taa hinha̧a̧l wooko. Ya̧a̧nɛ, Bɛt waa fu̧u̧s bɔ Yeesu , gig ooko. Yɔ anbɔ, loorɛ­ha̧a̧lɛ yɔ gi za̧a̧n bɔbtini, ɗɛ̄ɛ̄ an gi zɛŋg ma gɛ.
Wɛnɛ wɛ mɛɛ a wɛ gi Bɛt waato, wɛ fu̧u̧z a Bɛt ge, wɛɛ dood zaadɛ wɔ waal du sɛw hi waak a loorɛha̧a̧lɛ bɔ gi za̧a̧n bɔbtin gi naan du.

Wɛ mɛɛ hɛw a Bɛt waa bɔ zaa waal du gogsɛ hinmɛɛki an wɛ mɛɛ Bɛt yɔ gi rɔbo, wɛ́ wɛɛ wɛ́ ɔks hi Bɛt yɔ gi rɔbo hi waaɔ Yeesu Kristu yɔ gi rɔb be. Gii Yeesu Kristu gi Bɛt rɔbo. Wɛɛ gi za̧a̧tig faa bɔ hɛw.
Waat mi hatil wɛ, oon zul nɛ an bɔnɛ fɔb bɛt za ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya wɔ. Anbɔ.
Mii ɗɛnt bɔ, mi gi bi̧i̧sig naad bɔ yɔ Bɛt herige hi waatɔ wɔ hii ɗɛɛrwol yɛrɛ. Ha̧a̧m a nɛ muul hi rɔbo, hā̧ā̧ mii kpɔd gɛ, ha̧a̧ wɔ hi mɛɛ rɔ́b dɔgl sɛw hɛw.
Ha̧a̧m a nɛɛge a rɔ́b dɔgl bɔ gi waak ɔksig gbun hi wɛɛ dɔŋgo. Gi waawa hi wɛɛ faa be.
An Baa Bɛt hi Yeesu Kristu, yɔ gi waawalɔ gi gaawɛ rɔbsɛ, ya̧a̧rmɛɛki hi boolumi, a rɔb gbɔnɔ du hi hato.
Mi dag hat gbɔɔltɔnɔ anyɔ mi zɛm waat mɔ zaadɛ hi waak a rɔb gbɔnɔ du anyɔ Baa wɛ Bɛt raawɛ.
Yɛrɛ nàa, hinyɔ mi gim ɛrko, hinɔ taa an mi gisin dɔgl seg bi̧i̧ko, gi dɔglyɔ wɛ gin nɛ amntɔnɔ gi yɛɛl a biitirnaandu gii an gi ha̧a̧tinwɛ.
Hinyɔ raakɔ a ha̧a̧wɛ Bɛto, gɛ: a wɛ wa̧a̧ dɔglɔ wɔ raawɛ. Dɔglyɔ raawɛ gɛ: a wɛ fɔ Bɛt ha̧a̧tigɔ gii anyɔ hi goksin da biitirnaandu.
Yɔ anbɔ, dood ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nyaadɛ hi tuuz a waal du kittɔnɔ, hā̧ā̧hi an hi ta̧a̧ a Yeesu Kristu zaa an dooyɔ hi rɔb gɛ. Za̧a̧n bɔ anbɔ gii gi doo ya̧a̧gɔ̧ɔ̧nya, wɛɛ gi Kristu lɔlhɛ̧ɛ̧nikyayɔ.
